scn aaNVB3IntroductionQuestSCRIPT
Short Messaged
Begin GameMode
If Messaged == 0 ;if SomeguyMaster.NVBStatus == 3 showmessage aaNVB3IntroMessage set Messaged to 1 startquest aaNVB3Main01 setstage aaNVB3Main01 5 set SomeguyMaster.NVBStatus to 4 stopquest aaNVB3Introduction ;endif endif
End

scn aaVirgilQuestSCRIPT
short Familiar ; Regulates familiarity with Virgil and his willingness to share anecdotes short Story; Regulates advancement of inquiry into Virgil's opinions short Vault; Regulates inquiry into Virgil's early years in a vault short Send; Regulates advancement of "Why Send You" Topic short About; Regulates "About Marko" Topic short bHouse; backup for House conversation
short Greeted ; Regulates special greeting topics - reverts to 0 for default greetings short HouseBark ; Regulates comments inside abandoned house short TroyBark ; Regulates exchange with Troy short TroyKilled ; stupid variable to ensure Virgil greets player short KarlBark ; Regulates exchange with Karl short KarlKilled ; another dumb variable

scn aaIntro01AmbushTriggerSCRIPT
Short DoOnce
BEGIN OnTriggerEnter Player
If DoOnce == 0 ;&& aaNVB3Main01.DrususGreeted == 0 setstage aaNVB3Main02 10 aaIntroAmbushParentREF.enable set aaNVB3Main02.AmbushPackage to 1 aaNVB3RandallREF.enable aaNVB3RandallREF.evp Set DoOnce to 1 disable markfordelete endif
END

scn aaPostSlideshow01TriggerSCRIPT
Short DoOnce
BEGIN OnTriggerEnter Player
If DoOnce == 0 enableplayercontrols SetInCharGen 0 player.removeitem aaNVB3DepartureToken 1 aaVirgilREF.moveto aaVirgilPostSlideshowMoveMarkerREF set aaVirgilQuest.Greeted to 100 aaVirgilREF.evp stopquest aaNVB3IntroSlides startquest aaNVB3RETimer; TURN THIS OFF IN THE ENDING, YOU DUMB BASTARD! setstage aaNVB3Main02 5 Set DoOnce to 1 disable markfordelete endif
END

scn aaIntroAmbushQuestSCRIPT
Begin GameMode
If aaNVB3Main02.AmbushCount >= 5
setstage aaNVB3Main02 15 set aaNVB3Main02.AmbushPackage to 0 set aaRandallQuest.RandallGreeted to 15 aaNVB3RandallRef.evp aaNVB3RandallRef.SayTo Player aaNVB3Main02RandallBARKPostAmbush stopquest aaIntroAmbushQuest
endif
END

scn aaNVB3RandallNPCSCRIPT
Begin OnDeath
If GetStage aaNVB3Main03 == 15 && (aaNVB3Main03.FordBark == 1) set aaNVB3Main03.MarkoGreeted to 39 aaMarkoREF.evp aaFordTownREF.removescriptpackage aaFordTravelToExecutePackage set aaNVB3Main03.FordBark to 2 aaFordTownREF.say aaNVB3Main03FordPostRandall aaFordTownREF.evp endif
END

scn aaFrosthillDialogueQuestSCRIPT
short TownTrust; Regulates acceptance of player in town
short LawsonDealt; 1 = convinced, 2 = killed
short JeffersGreeted short JeffersStory
short BrimleyHelped; 1 = in progress, 2 = complete short BrimleyStory; Regulates Brimley's storytelling short BigTimStory short BigTimHelped short CalStory short VasquezStory short VasquezGreeted short StoudenmireStory short VermillionStory short AlGreeted short AlStory short DocStory short RatKilled
short FelinaRelation; Regulates player's chances of scoring with Felina, < 4 = indifferent, 4-9 = friendly, 10+ = Romance short FelinaStory; Regulates Felina's backstory exposition short FelinaLife; Regulates "What do you want out of life" dialogue short FelinaSex; 10 = casual, 15 = proto-love, future together short FelinaInseminated short FelinaGreeted short GotJournal short FelinaHelped; Regulates stages of unmarked quests with Felina ;1 = dealing with Lawson ;2 = Lawson dealt with ;3 = Repairs in progress ;4 = Repairs complete ;5 = Recovering diary ;6 = Diary in possession ;7 = Diary returned
short SinkFixed short ToiletFixed

END

scn aaOutlawSlaughterSetupTriggerSCRIPT
Short DoOnce
BEGIN OnTriggerEnter Player
If DoOnce == 0 && aaNVB3Main02.OutlawReleased == 1 && GetStage aaNVB3Main02 == 155 ;move npc's aaBHExecutionParentREF.enable aaKetchumOutlaw01REF.moveto aaOutlaw01ExecuteMarkerREF aaKetchumOutlaw02REF.moveto aaOutlaw01ExecuteMarkerREF aaKetchumOutlaw03REF.moveto aaOutlaw01ExecuteMarkerREF aaKetchumOutlaw04REF.moveto aaOutlaw01ExecuteMarkerREF aaKetchumOutlaw05REF.moveto aaOutlaw01ExecuteMarkerREF aaKetchumOutlawSpokesmanREF.moveto aaSpokesmanExecuteMarkerREF aaKetchumOutlaw01REF.setav health 10 aaKetchumOutlaw02REF.setav health 10 aaKetchumOutlaw03REF.setav health 10 aaKetchumOutlaw04REF.setav health 10 aaKetchumOutlaw05REF.setav health 10 aaKetchumOutlawSpokesmanREF.setav health 10 aaThorneKetchumREF.startcombat aaKetchumOutlawSpokesmanREF set aaNVB3Main02.OutlawReleased to 2 Set DoOnce to 1 disable markfordelete elseif DoOnce == 0 && aaNVB3Main02.OutlawReleased != 1 && GetStage aaNVB3Main02 == 155 set DoOnce to 1 disable markfordelete endif
END

scn aaNVB3GenericCleanupScript
short deadstate short deadstartday
Begin OnDeath
If deadstate == 0 Set deadstartday to GameDaysPassed Set deadstate to 1 endif
END
Begin Gamemode
If deadstate == 1 if GameDaysPassed - deadstartday >= 1 disable markfordelete Set deadstate to 2 EndIf endif
END

scn aaKetchumExecutionTriggerSCRIPT
Short DoOnce
BEGIN OnTriggerEnter Player
If DoOnce == 0 && aaNVB3Main02.OutlawReleased == 2 ;Thorne & Co. Open Fire setenemy aaBountyHunterFaction aaKetchumOutlawFaction setenemy aaKetchumOutlawFaction aaBountyHunterFaction aaBHExecutionParentREF.enable aaKetchumOutlaw01REF.say flee aaKetchumOutlaw02REF.say flee aaKetchumOutlaw03REF.say flee aaKetchumOutlaw04REF.say flee aaKetchumOutlaw05REF.say flee aaKetchumOutlawSpokesmanREF.say flee set aaNVB3Main02.OutlawReleased to 3 if aaThorneREF.GetDead == 0 aaThorneKetchumREF.enable aaThorneREF.disable aaThorneREF.markfordelete else aaThorneREF.disable aaThorneREF.markfordelete endif Set DoOnce to 1 disable markfordelete elseif DoOnce == 0 && aaNVB3Main02.OutlawReleased != 2 && GetStage aaNVB3Main02 == 150 aaThorneREF.disable aaThorneREF.markfordelete set DoOnce to 1 disable markfordelete endif
END

END

scn aaNVB3REZone01QuestScript
short Eligible; 0 = yes, 1 = no short Setup; Regulates stage of setup short nChoice; chooses encounter short nCount01; NPC count short nCount02; NPC count short nCount03; NPC count short nCount04; NPC count
Begin Gamemode
If Setup == 1 ;just started, rolling dice for various stuff set nChoice to 1 + GetRandomPercent * 55/100; 47 set nCount01 to 2 + GetRandomPercent * (4-2+1) / 100; 2-4 set nCount02 to 2 + GetRandomPercent * (4-2+1) / 100; 2-4 set nCount03 to 1 + GetRandomPercent * (2-1+1) / 100; 1-2 set nCount04 to 1 + GetRandomPercent * (2-1+1) / 100; 1-2 set Setup to 2 endif
if Setup == 2; finalizing selection if nChoice == 1; bounty hunters vs outlaws ;set up NPC's aaNVB3REZone01Marker01REF.placeatme aaRELvlBountyHunter nCount01 aaNVB3REZone01Marker02REF.placeatme aaRELvlGenericOutlaw nCount02 ;kill quest, set timer set Setup to 0 set aaNVB3RETimer.Zone01state to 1 stopquest aaNVB3REZone01 endif
if nChoice == 2; outlaw ambushers ;set up NPC's aaNVB3REZone01Marker03REF.placeatme aaRELvlOutlawAmbusher nCount03 aaNVB3REZone01Marker04REF.placeatme aaRELvlOutlawAmbusher nCount04 ;kill quest, set timer set Setup to 0 set aaNVB3RETimer.Zone01state to 1 stopquest aaNVB3REZone01 endif
if nChoice == 3; vet bounty hunter vs two groups of outlaws ;set up NPC's aaNVB3REZone01Marker01REF.placeatme aaRELvlBountyHunterVet 1 aaNVB3REZone01Marker03REF.placeatme aaRELvlGenericOutlaw nCount01 aaNVB3REZone01Marker04REF.placeatme aaRELvlGenericOutlaw nCount03 ;kill quest, set timer set Setup to 0 set aaNVB3RETimer.Zone01state to 1 stopquest aaNVB3REZone01 endif
if nChoice == 4; outlaw RL vs. bounty hunters ;set up NPC's aaNVB3REZone01Marker01REF.placeatme aaRELvlGenericOutlawBoss 1 aaNVB3REZone01Marker03REF.placeatme aaRELvlBountyHunter nCount01 aaNVB3REZone01Marker04REF.placeatme aaRELvlBountyHunter nCount03 ;kill quest, set timer set Setup to 0 set aaNVB3RETimer.Zone01state to 1 stopquest aaNVB3REZone01 endif
if nChoice == 5; vet BH vs Outlaw RL ;set up NPC's aaNVB3REZone01Marker01REF.placeatme aaRELvlGenericOutlawBoss 1 aaNVB3REZone01Marker02REF.placeatme aaRELvlBountyHunterVet 1 ;kill quest, set timer set Setup to 0 set aaNVB3RETimer.Zone01state to 1 stopquest aaNVB3REZone01 endif
if nChoice == 6; BH vs Outlaws, large group ;set up NPC's aaNVB3REZone01Marker01REF.placeatme aaRELvlBountyHunterVet 1 aaNVB3REZone01Marker02REF.placeatme aaRELvlBountyHunter nCount01 aaNVB3REZone01Marker03REF.placeatme aaRELvlGenericOutlaw nCount02 aaNVB3REZone01Marker04REF.placeatme aaRELvlGenericOutlawBoss 1 ;kill quest, set timer set Setup to 0 set aaNVB3RETimer.Zone01state to 1 stopquest aaNVB3REZone01 endif
if nChoice == 7 && aaREDialogue.GunfighterMet == 0; Gunfighter seeking duel ;set up NPC's aaNVB3REZone01Marker01REF.placeatme aaREGunfighter 1 ;kill quest, set timer set Setup to 0 set aaNVB3RETimer.Zone01state to 1 stopquest aaNVB3REZone01 else set Setup to 1; re-roll endif
if nChoice == 8; Yao Guai and corpses ;set up NPC's aaNVB3REZone01Marker01REF.placeatme aaREYaoGuai 1 aaNVB3REZone01Marker01REF.placeatme aaREDevouredWastelander 1 64 0 aaNVB3REZone01Marker01REF.placeatme aaREDevouredWastelander 1 64 2 aaNVB3REZone01Marker01REF.placeatme VLootRNDDuffleBagNVGen11 1 64 3 ;kill quest, set timer set Setup to 0 set aaNVB3RETimer.Zone01state to 1 stopquest aaNVB3REZone01 endif
if nChoice == 9; Big Ambush ;set up NPC's aaNVB3REZone01Marker03REF.placeatme aaRELvlOutlawBossAmbusher 1 64 1 aaNVB3REZone01Marker02REF.placeatme aaRELvlOutlawAmbusher nCount01 aaNVB3REZone01Marker03REF.placeatme aaRELvlOutlawAmbusher nCount02 aaNVB3REZone01Marker04REF.placeatme aaRELvlOutlawAmbusher nCount01 ;kill quest, set timer set Setup to 0 set aaNVB3RETimer.Zone01state to 1 stopquest aaNVB3REZone01 endif
if nChoice == 10 && SomeguyMaster.MartinStatus == 1; Glanton Gang Ambush ;set up NPC's aaNVB3REZone01Marker03REF.placeatme aaRELvlGlantonGangAmbusher nCount01 aaNVB3REZone01Marker04REF.placeatme aaRELvlGlantonGangAmbusher nCount02 ;kill quest, set timer set Setup to 0 set aaNVB3RETimer.Zone01state to 1 stopquest aaNVB3REZone01 else set Setup to 1; re-roll endif
if nChoice == 11; Crazed Nightkin Ambush ;set up NPC's aaNVB3REZone01Marker03REF.placeatme aaRENightkinAmbusher 1 ;kill quest, set timer set Setup to 0 set aaNVB3RETimer.Zone01state to 1 stopquest aaNVB3REZone01 endif
if nChoice == 12; Deathclaw vs Wastelanders ;set up NPC's aaNVB3REZone01Marker03REF.placeatme aaRELvlWastelander nCount01 aaNVB3REZone01Marker03REF.placeatme aaREDeathClaw 1 128 0 ;kill quest, set timer set Setup to 0 set aaNVB3RETimer.Zone01state to 1 stopquest aaNVB3REZone01 endif
if nChoice == 13; Yao Guai vs Wastelanders ;set up NPC's aaNVB3REZone01Marker03REF.placeatme aaRELvlWastelander nCount01 aaNVB3REZone01Marker03REF.placeatme aaREYaoGuai nCount03 128 0 ;kill quest, set timer set Setup to 0 set aaNVB3RETimer.Zone01state to 1 stopquest aaNVB3REZone01 endif
if nChoice == 14; Outlaws knife fighting ;set up NPC's aaNVB3REZone01Marker01REF.placeatme aaREOutlawKnifeFight 1 32 0 aaNVB3REZone01Marker01REF.placeatme aaREOutlawKnifeFight 1 32 1 ;kill quest, set timer set Setup to 0 set aaNVB3RETimer.Zone01state to 1 stopquest aaNVB3REZone01 endif
if nChoice == 15; Yao Guai's fighting ;set up NPC's aaNVB3REZone01Marker01REF.placeatme aaREYaoGuaiFrenzied 1 32 0 aaNVB3REZone01Marker01REF.placeatme aaREYaoGuaiFrenzied 1 32 1 ;kill quest, set timer set Setup to 0 set aaNVB3RETimer.Zone01state to 1 stopquest aaNVB3REZone01 endif
if nChoice == 16 && aaNVB3RETimer.MerchantPlaced == 0; Merchant ;set up NPC's aaREMerchantREF.moveto aaNVB3REZone01Marker01REF aaREMerchantBrahminREF.moveto aaNVB3REZone01Marker01REF 0 64 0 aaMerchantDogREF.moveto aaNVB3REZone01Marker01REF 0 -64 0 set aaNVB3RETimer.MerchantPlaced to 1 ;kill quest, set timer set Setup to 0 set aaNVB3RETimer.Zone01state to 1 stopquest aaNVB3REZone01 else set Setup to 1; re-roll endif
if nChoice == 17 && (Someguymaster.ZimmerStatus == 1) && (Player.HasPerk WildWasteland == 1) ; Hobos Seeking Bounty - requires The Inheritance and WW ;set up NPC's aaNVB3REZone01Marker01REF.placeatme aaRELvlHoboAmbusher nCount01 32 0 aaNVB3REZone01Marker01REF.placeatme aaRELvlHoboBossAmbusher 1 32 2 aaNVB3REZone01Marker02REF.placeatme aaRELvlHoboAmbusher nCount02 32 1 aaNVB3REZone01Marker02REF.placeatme aaRELvlHoboBossAmbusher 1 32 0 aaNVB3REZone01Marker03REF.placeatme aaRELvlHoboAmbusher nCount04 ; PlaySound UIWildWasteland; ShowMessage WildWastelandMessage; ;kill quest, set timer set Setup to 0 set aaNVB3RETimer.Zone01state to 1 stopquest aaNVB3REZone01 else set Setup to 1; re-roll endif
if nChoice == 18; Prospector ;set up NPC's aaNVB3REZone01Marker01REF.placeatme aaRELvlProspector 1 ;kill quest, set timer set Setup to 0 set aaNVB3RETimer.Zone01state to 1 stopquest aaNVB3REZone01 endif
if nChoice == 19; Traveler ;set up NPC's aaNVB3REZone01Marker01REF.placeatme aaRELvlTraveler 1 ;kill quest, set timer set Setup to 0 set aaNVB3RETimer.Zone01state to 1 stopquest aaNVB3REZone01 endif
if nChoice == 20; Tribal Outlaw Ambush ;set up NPC's aaNVB3REZone01Marker03REF.placeatme aaRETribalOutlawAmbushRingleader 1 aaNVB3REZone01Marker03REF.placeatme aaRETribalOutlawBoneBreakerAmbush nCount03 64 0 aaNVB3REZone01Marker03REF.placeatme aaRETribalOutlawPainMakerAmbush nCount01 64 1 aaNVB3REZone01Marker04REF.placeatme aaRETribalOutlawBoneBreakerAmbush nCount04 64 0 aaNVB3REZone01Marker04REF.placeatme aaRETribalOutlawPainMakerAmbush nCount02 64 1 ;kill quest, set timer set Setup to 0 set aaNVB3RETimer.Zone01state to 1 stopquest aaNVB3REZone01 endif
if nChoice == 21; Vicious Dogs - one group ;set up NPC's aaNVB3REZone01Marker03REF.placeatme aaREDogViciousBoss 1 64 1 aaNVB3REZone01Marker03REF.placeatme aaREDogVicious nCount01 ;kill quest, set timer set Setup to 0 set aaNVB3RETimer.Zone01state to 1 stopquest aaNVB3REZone01 endif
if nChoice == 22; Vicious Dogs - two groups ;set up NPC's aaNVB3REZone01Marker03REF.placeatme aaREDogViciousBoss 1 64 1 aaNVB3REZone01Marker03REF.placeatme aaREDogVicious nCount01 aaNVB3REZone01Marker04REF.placeatme aaREDogViciousBoss 1 64 1 aaNVB3REZone01Marker04REF.placeatme aaREDogVicious nCount02 ;kill quest, set timer set Setup to 0 set aaNVB3RETimer.Zone01state to 1 stopquest aaNVB3REZone01 endif
if nChoice == 23; Vicious Dogs vs Prospector ;set up NPC's aaNVB3REZone01Marker02REF.placeatme aaREDogViciousBoss 1 64 1 aaNVB3REZone01Marker02REF.placeatme aaREDogVicious nCount03 aaNVB3REZone01Marker02REF.placeatme aaRELvlProspector 1 128 0 ;kill quest, set timer set Setup to 0 set aaNVB3RETimer.Zone01state to 1 stopquest aaNVB3REZone01 endif
if nChoice == 24; Vicious Dogs vs Yao Guai ;set up NPC's aaNVB3REZone01Marker02REF.placeatme aaREDogViciousBoss 1 64 1 aaNVB3REZone01Marker02REF.placeatme aaREDogVicious nCount01 aaNVB3REZone01Marker02REF.placeatme aaREYaoGuaiFrenzied 1 128 0 ;kill quest, set timer set Setup to 0 set aaNVB3RETimer.Zone01state to 1 stopquest aaNVB3REZone01 endif
if nChoice == 25; Vicious Dogs vs Wastelanders ;set up NPC's aaNVB3REZone01Marker02REF.placeatme aaREMtMongrelBoss 1 64 1 aaNVB3REZone01Marker02REF.placeatme aaREMtMongrel nCount01 aaNVB3REZone01Marker02REF.placeatme aaRELvlWastelander nCount02 128 0 ;kill quest, set timer set Setup to 0 set aaNVB3RETimer.Zone01state to 1 stopquest aaNVB3REZone01 endif

if nChoice == 28; Robobrain(s) vs. dogs ;set up NPC's aaNVB3REZone01Marker03REF.placeatme aaRERobobrain nCount03 aaNVB3REZone01Marker04REF.placeatme aaREDogVicious nCount01 ;kill quest, set timer set Setup to 0 set aaNVB3RETimer.Zone01state to 1 stopquest aaNVB3REZone01 endif

scn aaNVB3RETimerQuestScript
short Zone01state short Zone01startday
short Zone02state short Zone02startday
short Zone03state short Zone03startday
short Zone04state short Zone04startday
short Zone05state short Zone05startday
short Zone06state short Zone06startday
short Zone07state short Zone07startday
short MerchantPlaced; 0 = waits in cell, 1 = traveling wastes, selling wares, 2 = dead short SchwartzPlaced; 0 = waits in cell, 1 = placed short LiamPlaced short ThingPlaced
Begin Gamemode
If Zone01state == 1 Set Zone01startday to GameDaysPassed Set Zone01state to 2 ElseIf Zone01state == 2 if GameDaysPassed - Zone01startday >= 1 ;reset zone 01 to eligible set aaNVB3REZone01.Eligible to 0 Set Zone01state to 0 EndIf endif
If Zone02state == 1 Set Zone02startday to GameDaysPassed Set Zone02state to 2 ElseIf Zone02state == 2 if GameDaysPassed - Zone02startday >= 1 ;reset zone 02 to eligible set aaNVB3REZone02.Eligible to 0 Set Zone02state to 0 EndIf endif
If Zone03state == 1 Set Zone03startday to GameDaysPassed Set Zone03state to 2 ElseIf Zone03state == 2 if GameDaysPassed - Zone03startday >= 1 ;reset zone 03 to eligible set aaNVB3REZone03.Eligible to 0 Set Zone03state to 0 EndIf endif
If Zone04state == 1 Set Zone04startday to GameDaysPassed Set Zone04state to 2 ElseIf Zone04state == 2 if GameDaysPassed - Zone04startday >= 1 ;reset zone 04 to eligible set aaNVB3REZone04.Eligible to 0 Set Zone04state to 0 EndIf endif
If Zone05state == 1 Set Zone05startday to GameDaysPassed Set Zone05state to 2 ElseIf Zone05state == 2 if GameDaysPassed - Zone05startday >= 1 ;reset zone 05 to eligible set aaNVB3REZone05.Eligible to 0 Set Zone05state to 0 EndIf endif
If Zone06state == 1 Set Zone06startday to GameDaysPassed Set Zone06state to 2 ElseIf Zone06state == 2 if GameDaysPassed - Zone06startday >= 1 ;reset zone 06 to eligible set aaNVB3REZone06.Eligible to 0 Set Zone06state to 0 EndIf endif
If Zone07state == 1 Set Zone07startday to GameDaysPassed Set Zone07state to 2 ElseIf Zone07state == 2 if GameDaysPassed - Zone07startday >= 1 ;reset zone 07 to eligible set aaNVB3REZone07.Eligible to 0 Set Zone07state to 0 EndIf endif
END

scn aaGenericRENPCCleanupSCRIPT
short deadstate short deadstartday
Begin OnDeath
If deadstate == 0 Set deadstartday to GameDaysPassed Set deadstate to 1 endif
END
Begin Gamemode
If deadstate == 1 if GameDaysPassed - deadstartday >= 1 disable markfordelete Set deadstate to 2 EndIf endif
if (GetDistance Player >= 10000) Disable markfordelete endif
END

SCN aaGlantonTribalCaptiveSCRIPT
Short Freed Short ThankedPlayer Short Button Short DoOnce
Float Timer
BEGIN OnLoad
if ( Freed == 0 ) RemoveFromFaction WastelandFreedCaptiveFACTION ; ignore crime so that I won't respond to friendly fire IgnoreCrime 1 ; reset restrained state so I can get back into position after load set DoOnce to 0 setRestrained 0 endif
END
BEGIN OnActivate
if ( GetDead == 0 ) if ( freed == 0 ) if ( IsActionRef player == 1 ) if ( Player.IsInCombat == 0 ) if ( GetIsSex Male == 1 ) ShowMessage aaGlantonCaptiveMessageBoxM elseif ( GetIsSex Female == 1 ) ShowMessage aaGlantonCaptiveMessageBoxF endif else ShowMessage FFSupermutantCaptiveNoActivateMessage endif endif endif elseIf ( GetDead == 1 ) Activate endif
END
BEGIN GameMode ; restrain me once I'm in position if ( DoOnce == 0 ) if ( GetSitting == 3 ) set DoOnce to 1 setRestrained 1 endif endif
if ( freed == 0 ) set button to GetButtonPressed
if ( button == 1 ) SetRestrained 0 rewardkarma 10 RemoveFromFaction aaCaptiveTribalFaction AddToFaction aaFreedTribalFaction 1 removescriptpackage FFSupermutantCaptiveCaptured addscriptpackage aaTribalCaptiveRunAwayPackage set Freed to 1 ; stop ignoring crime ignoreCrime 0 endif
elseif ( freed == 1 ) && ( GetDistance aaNVB3CaptiveEscapeMarkerREF <= 1024 ) set Freed to 2 disable markfordelete endif
END

scn aaNVB3MasterSCRIPT
short JillFate ; 0 = keeps hookin, goes Fiend, 1 = rescued, 2 = dead short JimmyFate ; 0 = dies a slave, 1 = rescued, short DanaFate; 0 = moves to Freeside, commits suicide, 1 = hangs on to farm, 2 = killed by player, young son dies, elder swears revenge short DoolinFate; 0 = dead (skip it), 1 = Went back home, took on new identity and lived out his days as a farmer short PorterFate; 0 = dead (skip it), 1 = Leaves, goes to Jacobstown, 2 = Goes to Mojave but finds Jacobstown abandoned, struggles to find his way, becomes head of outlaw gang short LeeFate; 0 = dead (skip it), 1 = TP, goes to California and lives out his days as a meek librarian, 2 = Starts gang, gets gunned down outside Goliad short GlantonFate; 0 = dead, 1 = freed, goes to Mexico, fate uncertain, 2 = killed, but took hostages with him short MarkoFate; 0 = left alive, 1 = dead short SweetUsed; 1 = used Sweet Revenge to kill Marko short FordFate; 0 = dead, 1 = left alive short GodwinFate; 0 = alive, 1 = dead, 2 = alive, peaceful short RonnieFate; 0 = alive, 1 = dead short FrostFate; 0 = alive, 1 = dead short CooperFate; short ThorneFate; 0 = didn't go home, 1 = went home ;

scn aaNVB3MainAttackQuestScript
short started; 0 = not started, 1 = in progress, 5 = finished (player can advance main quest) short setup; used to move bounty hunters and monitor attack waves
short KillCount; Pretty obvious short FinalCount; accounts for the final wave - they decay slower
float timer; used as failsafe since the goddamn engine can't count short DoOnce short open
Begin Gamemode
If Setup < 1 ;move folks aaCampBH01REF.moveto aaCampAttackBH01GuardMarkerREF aaCampBH01REF.SetIgnoreFriendlyHits 1 aaCampBH02REF.moveto aaCampAttackBH02GuardMarkerREF aaCampBH02REF.SetIgnoreFriendlyHits 1 aaCampBH03REF.moveto aaCampAttackBH03GuardMarkerREF aaCampBH03REF.SetIgnoreFriendlyHits 1 aaCampBH04REF.moveto aaCampAttackBH04GuardMarkerREF aaCampBH04REF.SetIgnoreFriendlyHits 1 aaCampBH05REF.moveto aaCampAttackBH05GuardMarkerREF aaCampBH05REF.SetIgnoreFriendlyHits 1 aaCampBH06REF.moveto aaCampAttackBH06GuardMarkerREF aaCampBH06REF.SetIgnoreFriendlyHits 1 aaThorneREF.moveto aaThorneDefendCompoundMarkerREF aaThorneREF.SetIgnoreFriendlyHits 1 aaNVB3RandallREF.SetIgnoreFriendlyHits 1 ;FIRST ATTACKERS aaFirstWaveAttackParentREF.enable aaSecondWaveAttackParentREF.enable ;set story-related npc's essential ;SetEssential aaNVB3Randall 1 ;SetEssential aaThorne 1 ;SetEssential aaFord 1 ;ai bullshit aaThorneREF.removescriptpackage DefaultSandboxEditorLocation512 aaFordREF.removescriptpackage DefaultSandboxEditorLocation256 aaThorneREF.evp aaFordREF.evp set setup to 1 endif
If Setup == 2 && KillCount == 5; ; Player has entered trigger and begun battle ;showmessage aaDebug02MSG aaThirdWaveAttackParentREF.enable aaSaundersREF.enable aaIngramREF.enable aaFINALWaveAttackParentREF.enable set setup to 3 endif
If aaSaundersREF.GetDead == 1 ;&& aaIngramREF.GetDead = 1 aaFirstWaveAttackParentREF.disable aaFirstWaveAttackParentREF.markfordelete aaSecondWaveAttackParentREF.disable aaSecondWaveAttackParentREF.markfordelete setstage aaNVB3MainAttack 10 setquestdelay aaNVB3MainAttack 15 ;ai shit aaThorneREF.addscriptpackage DefaultSandboxEditorLocation512 aaFordREF.addscriptpackage DefaultSandboxEditorLocation256 set setup to 4 endif
;remember to disable later waves in next quest! ;aaFifthWaveAttackParentREF ;aaFINALWaveAttackParentREF
;STUPID BACKUP SHIT
if DoOnce == 0 && Setup < 4 set Timer to 180 set DoOnce to 1 elseif DoOnce == 1 && Setup < 4 set Timer to ( Timer - GetSecondsPassed ) set DoOnce to 2 elseif DoOnce == 2 && Setup < 4 if ( Timer <= 0 ) setstage aaNVB3MainAttack 10 setquestdelay aaNVB3MainAttack 15 ;ai shit aaThorneREF.addscriptpackage DefaultSandboxEditorLocation512 aaFordREF.addscriptpackage DefaultSandboxEditorLocation256 set setup to 4 set DoOnce to 3 endif endif
END

scn aaNVB3Main03QuestSCRIPT
short Speech; regulates Randall's delivery of speech short CaptorBark short CompanionKillCount
;Stuff for town square scene short SceneStage; self-explanatory short MarkoGreeted
short FordBark short RandallTorment
short ExecutionCount
float shottimer float setshottimer
float timer short DoOnce
BEGIN GameMode
If setshottimer == 1 set shottimer to 2 set shottimer to ( shottimer - GetSecondsPassed ) set setshottimer to 2 endif
If DoOnce == 2 set Timer to 5 set Timer to ( Timer - GetSecondsPassed ) set DoOnce to 3 endif
if ( Timer <= 1 ) && ( DoOnce == 3 ) && (aaNVB3RandallREF.GetDead == 0) aaMarkoREF.Say aaNVB3Main03MarkoShotRandall set DoOnce to 4 elseif ( Timer <= 1 ) && ( DoOnce == 3 ) && (aaNVB3RandallREF.GetDead == 1) set DoOnce to 4 endif
if ( shottimer <= 1 ) && ( setshottimer == 2 ) player.say hit ;player.DamageActorValue RightAttackCondition 100 ;player.DamageActorValue LeftAttackCondition 100 set MarkoGreeted to 1 aaMarkoREF.addscriptpackage aaMarkoGreetPostHand01Package aaMarkoREF.evp set setshottimer to 3 endif
END

elseif getstage aaNVB3Main03 >= 5 RemoveMe endif
RemoveMe

scn aaBrookshireTrapTriggerScript
short StartUp ;1= Player has tripped the trigger zone short EndStartUp float TimerA float TimerB float TimerC float TimerD float TimerE float TimerZ ;Added for first timer to trigger player teleportation
short bTimerZDone
short CooperSet
BEGIN OnTrigger Player
; get the player set up to be knocked out. if (StartUp == 0) && (GetStage aaNVB3Main03 == 5) aaBrookshireDeviceMarkerREF.placeatme MQ08FlashBangExplosion aaBrookshireREF.additem NVDLC04HelmetBreathingMask 1 aaBrookshireREF.equipitem NVDLC04HelmetBreathingMask 0 1 if aaFordREF.HasBeenHired == 1 aaFordREF.additem NVDLC04HelmetBreathingMask 1 aaFordREF.equipitem NVDLC04HelmetBreathingMask 0 1 aaFordREF.playidle LooseCheeringClapping endif ;SetStage aaEpilogue07 20 DisablePlayerControls 1 1 1 1 1 1 1 ;dialogue and sound fx to support capture sequence
Set TimerA to 1 Set TimerA to .2 Set StartUp to 1 ApplyImageSpaceModifier ExplosionInFace
;PlaySound QSTNVDLC01OpeningStinger ;PlaySound QSTDLCTrap
endif
END
BEGIN GameMode
; Player gets gassed.
if ( StartUp == 1 )
if ( TimerZ > 0 ) && (bTimerZDone== 0) Set TimerZ to ( TimerZ - GetSecondsPassed ) else set bTimerZDone to 1 ;Player.Moveto aaClownTrapStartMarkerRef endif
if ( TimerA > 0 ) Set TimerA to ( TimerA - GetSecondsPassed ) else player.AddScriptPackage aaNVB3PlayerCapturedPackage PipboyRadioOff Set TimerB to 2 Set StartUp to 2 endif endif
; Player hits the ground, dazed.
if ( StartUp == 2 ) if ( TimerB > 0 ) Set TimerB to ( TimerB - GetSecondsPassed ) ;BeginFX aaBrookshireTrapFXParentREF.enable ;EndFX else Set TimerC to 8 Set StartUp to 3 endif endif
; Player slowly passes out.
if ( StartUp == 3 ) if ( TimerC > 0 ) Set TimerC to ( TimerC - GetSecondsPassed ) else ;player.RemoveAllItems aaClownGearLockerRef aaBrookshireREF.SayTo Player aaNVB3Main03BrookshireCaptInProgress imod FadeToBlackPermanent Set TimerC to 5 Set StartUp to 4 endif endif
; Player wakes up. if ( StartUp == 4 ) if ( TimerC > 0 ) Set TimerC to ( TimerC - GetSecondsPassed ) else ;StartQuest NVDLC01Intro Set TimerE to 5 Set StartUp to 5 endif endif
if ( StartUp == 5 ) if ( TimerC > 0 ) Set TimerC to ( TimerC - GetSecondsPassed ) else Player.RemoveScriptPackage Set StartUp to 6 ;DisableFX aaBrookshireTrapFXParentREF.disable aaBrookshireTrapFXParentREF.markfordelete ; ;DisableFX ;SAVE COOPER! if (aaCooperREF.HasBeenHired == 1) && (aaCooperREF.GetDead == 0) && (CooperSet != 1) Set aaCooperREF.Waiting to 0 Set aaCooperREF.HasBeenHired to 0 Set aaCooperREF.L38 to 0 Set aaCooperREF.IsFollowingDefault to 0 Set aaCooperREF.IsFollowingLong to 0 aaCooperREF.SetPlayerTeammate 0 Player.RemovePerk aaFollowYourNose aaCooperREF.MoveTo aaCooperDoolinShackWaitMarkerREF set aaCooperQuest.FinishedMod to 5 ShowMessage aaCooperRemovePerkMessage aaCooperREF.evp set CooperSet to 1 elseif (aaCooperREF.HasBeenHired == 0) && (aaCooperREF.GetDead == 0) && (CooperSet != 1) aaCooperREF.MoveTo aaCooperDoolinShackWaitMarkerREF set aaCooperQuest.FinishedMod to 5 aaCooperREF.evp set CooperSet to 1 endif ;Ford if aaFordREF.HasBeenHired == 1 ShowMessage aaFordFiredMessage Set aaFordREF.Waiting to 0 Set aaFordREF.HasBeenHired to 0 Set aaFordREF.IsFollowingDefault to 0 Set aaFordREF.IsFollowingLong to 0 aaFordREF.SetPlayerTeammate 0 Player.RemovePerk aaLuckBeatsSkill;(If there is a perk given by your Companion) ShowMessage aaFordRemovePerkMessage aaFordREF.MoveToMarkerWithFade aaCooperHomeRandallMarkerREF set aaFordREF.RandallShack to 1 aaFordREF.evp endif ; player.moveto aaPlayerKillRoomMarkerREF ; endif endif
END

scn aaKillRoomExitTriggerSCRIPT
short DoOnce
Begin OnTrigger Player
If DoOnce == 0 && (aaNVB3Main03.CaptorBark == 6) ;move player into town, establish scene aaNVB3RandallREF.removescriptpackage aaNVB3PlayerCapturedPackage aaNVB3RandallREF.addscriptpackage aaRandallCaptiveinTownPackge aaNVB3RandallREF.moveto aaRandallTownCaptureMarkerREF aaNVB3RandallREF.setav health 2 setessential aaNVB3Randall 0 ; If aaLoriREF.getdead == 0 aaLoriREF.removescriptpackage DefaultSandboxEditorLocation256 aaLoriREF.addscriptpackage aaLoriTownCaptivePackage aaLoriREF.moveto aaLoriCaptiveMarkerREF aaLoriREF.setav health 2 endif ; if aaStoudenmireREF.getdead == 0 aaStoudenmireREF.setav health 2 aaStoudenmireREF.moveto aaStoudenmireCaptiveMarkerREF endif ; if aaDoctorMusgroveREF.getdead == 0 aaDoctorMusgroveREF.moveto aaDocMusgroveCaptiveMarkerREF aaDoctorMusgroveREF.setav health 2 endif ; if aaFelinaREF.GetDead == 0 aaFelinaREF.moveto aaFelinaCaptiveMarkerREF aaFelinaREF.setav health 2 endif ; if aaFrosthillDialogue.FelinaSex == 15 || aaFrosthillDialogue.FelinaInseminated == 1 aaFelinaREF.removefromfaction aaFrosthillFaction endif ; if aaBrianJeffersREF.GetDead == 0 aaBrianJeffersREF.moveto aaBrianJeffersCaptiveMarkerREF aaBrianJeffersREF.setav health 2 endif ; if aaDanaJeffersREF.GetDead == 0 aaDanaJeffersREF.moveto aaDanaJeffersCaptiveMarkerREF aaDanaJeffersREF.setav health 2 endif ; if aaBrimleyREF.GetDead == 0 aaBrimleyREF.moveto aaBrimleyCaptiveMarkerREF aaBrimleyREF.setav health 2 endif ; If aaBigTimREF.GetDead == 0 aaBigTimREF.moveto aaBigTimCaptiveMarkerREF aaBigTimREF.setav health 2 endif ; if aaPamMathesonREF.GetDead == 0 aaPamMathesonREF.moveto aaPamMathesonCaptiveMarkerREF aaPamMathesonREF.setav health 2 endif ; if aaVermillionREF.GetDead == 0 aaVermillionREF.moveto aaVermillionCaptiveMarkerREF aaVermillionREF.setav health 2 endif ; scn aaRENightkinScript
short DoOnce short combatcheck short soundcheck float timerEffect
short deadstate short deadstartday
int Cloaked ; 0 = Stealth Boy effect not on ; 1 = Stealth Boy effect on ; This var is meant to ensure we never try to remove ; the effect when it's not already on.
begin onLoad ModActorValue sneak 100
; Add the effect, update the flag if Cloaked == 0 addspell StealthBoyInvisibilitySpell ;ShowWarning "Cloaking on load!" set Cloaked to 1 endif
set soundcheck to 0 set timerEffect to 0 end
begin OnSTARTCombat set combatcheck to 1 end
begin OnCombatEND set combatcheck to 0 ; ShowWarning "Combat ending!" end
begin OnDeath set combatcheck to 0
; If the nightkin is currently using the Stealth Boy effect, remove it if Cloaked == 1 RemoveSpell StealthBoyInvisibilitySpell set Cloaked to 0 endif
end
begin GameMode ref refvar set refvar to this
;if GetDetected player ; startcombat player ;endif
; Backup check to decloak nightkin after death if (GetDead == 1) && (DoOnce == 0) && Cloaked == 1 RemoveSpell StealthBoyInvisibilitySpell set Cloaked to 0 set DoOnce to 1 endif
if combatcheck == 1 ref mytarget set mytarget to refvar.GetCombatTarget else ; If not in combat, use Stealth Boy again if refvar.GetDead == 0 && Cloaked == 0 addspell StealthBoyInvisibilitySpell ; ShowWarning "Not in combat, cloaking!" set Cloaked to 1 set soundcheck to 0 endif endif
; Have nightkin decloak when they attack if GetAnimAction == 2 && Cloaked == 1 RemoveSpell StealthBoyInvisibilitySpell set Cloaked to 0 PMS NightkinCloakFXShader 1 if soundcheck == 0 refvar.PlaySound3D OBJStealthBoyActivate set soundcheck to 1 endif endif
if (GetDistance Player >= 10000) Disable markfordelete endif
END
Begin OnDeath
If deadstate == 0 Set deadstartday to GameDaysPassed Set deadstate to 1 ElseIf deadstate == 1 if GameDaysPassed - deadstartday >= 2 disable markfordelete Set deadstate to 2 EndIf endif
END

scn aaFelinaNPCSCRIPT
short DoOnce ;Script blocker short SexStart float Timer ;Timer used for animation control int iSexed ;toggled when player sexed to change greetings.

set Timer to ( Timer - GetSecondsPassed )
if ( Timer <= 6 ) && ( DoOnce == 1 ) IMod FadeToBlackISFX set DoOnce to 2 endif
if ( Timer <= 0 ) && ( IsImagespaceActive FadeToBlackISFX == 0 ) ; setrestrained 0 enablePlayerControls player.addspell WellRestedSpell ;resetai set SexStart to 0 Set DoOnce to 0 set iSexed to 1 aaAnnaRobbinsREF.enable StartConversation player aaFelinaPostSex01Intro endif
endif
END
BEgin OnDeath
if aaNVB3Main03.MarkoGreeted == 10 set aaNVB3Main03.MarkoGreeted to 20;not pregnant aaMarkoREF.SetRestrained 0 aaMarkoREF.evp endif
if aaNVB3Main03.MarkoGreeted == 15 aaMarkoREF.SetRestrained 0 set aaNVB3Main03.MarkoGreeted to 20;pregnant aaMarkoREF.evp endif

RemoveMe
End

scn aaNVB3REZone02QuestSCRIPT
short Eligible; 0 = yes, 1 = no short Setup; Regulates stage of setup short nChoice; chooses encounter short nCount01; NPC count short nCount02; NPC count short nCount03; NPC count short nCount04; NPC count
Begin Gamemode
If Setup == 1 ;just started, rolling dice for various stuff set nChoice to 1 + GetRandomPercent * 55/100; 46 set nCount01 to 2 + GetRandomPercent * (4-2+1) / 100; 2-4 set nCount02 to 2 + GetRandomPercent * (4-2+1) / 100; 2-4 set nCount03 to 1 + GetRandomPercent * (2-1+1) / 100; 1-2 set nCount04 to 1 + GetRandomPercent * (2-1+1) / 100; 1-2 set Setup to 2 endif
if Setup == 2; finalizing selection if nChoice == 1; bounty hunters vs outlaws ;set up NPC's aaNVB3REZone02Marker01REF.placeatme aaRELvlBountyHunter nCount01 aaNVB3REZone02Marker02REF.placeatme aaRELvlGenericOutlaw nCount02 ;kill quest, set timer set Setup to 0 set aaNVB3RETimer.Zone02state to 1 stopquest aaNVB3REZone02 endif
if nChoice == 2; outlaw ambushers ;set up NPC's aaNVB3REZone02Marker03REF.placeatme aaRELvlOutlawAmbusher nCount03 aaNVB3REZone02Marker04REF.placeatme aaRELvlOutlawAmbusher nCount04 ;kill quest, set timer set Setup to 0 set aaNVB3RETimer.Zone02state to 1 stopquest aaNVB3REZone02 endif
if nChoice == 3; vet bounty hunter vs two groups of outlaws ;set up NPC's aaNVB3REZone02Marker01REF.placeatme aaRELvlBountyHunterVet 1 aaNVB3REZone02Marker03REF.placeatme aaRELvlGenericOutlaw nCount01 aaNVB3REZone02Marker04REF.placeatme aaRELvlGenericOutlaw nCount03 ;kill quest, set timer set Setup to 0 set aaNVB3RETimer.Zone02state to 1 stopquest aaNVB3REZone02 endif
if nChoice == 4; outlaw RL vs. bounty hunters ;set up NPC's aaNVB3REZone02Marker01REF.placeatme aaRELvlGenericOutlawBoss 1 aaNVB3REZone02Marker03REF.placeatme aaRELvlBountyHunter nCount01 aaNVB3REZone02Marker04REF.placeatme aaRELvlBountyHunter nCount03 ;kill quest, set timer set Setup to 0 set aaNVB3RETimer.Zone02state to 1 stopquest aaNVB3REZone02 endif
if nChoice == 5; vet BH vs Outlaw RL ;set up NPC's aaNVB3REZone02Marker01REF.placeatme aaRELvlGenericOutlawBoss 1 aaNVB3REZone02Marker02REF.placeatme aaRELvlBountyHunterVet 1 ;kill quest, set timer set Setup to 0 set aaNVB3RETimer.Zone02state to 1 stopquest aaNVB3REZone02 endif
if nChoice == 6; BH vs Outlaws, large group ;set up NPC's aaNVB3REZone02Marker01REF.placeatme aaRELvlBountyHunterVet 1 aaNVB3REZone02Marker02REF.placeatme aaRELvlBountyHunter nCount01 aaNVB3REZone02Marker03REF.placeatme aaRELvlGenericOutlaw nCount02 aaNVB3REZone02Marker04REF.placeatme aaRELvlGenericOutlawBoss 1 ;kill quest, set timer set Setup to 0 set aaNVB3RETimer.Zone02state to 1 stopquest aaNVB3REZone02 endif
if nChoice == 7 && aaREDialogue.GunfighterMet == 0; Gunfighter seeking duel ;set up NPC's aaNVB3REZone02Marker01REF.placeatme aaREGunfighter 1 ;kill quest, set timer set Setup to 0 set aaNVB3RETimer.Zone02state to 1 stopquest aaNVB3REZone02 else set Setup to 1; re-roll endif
if nChoice == 8; Yao Guai and corpses ;set up NPC's aaNVB3REZone02Marker01REF.placeatme aaREYaoGuai 1 aaNVB3REZone02Marker01REF.placeatme aaREDevouredWastelander 1 64 0 aaNVB3REZone02Marker01REF.placeatme aaREDevouredWastelander 1 64 2 aaNVB3REZone02Marker01REF.placeatme VLootRNDDuffleBagNVGen11 1 64 3 ;kill quest, set timer set Setup to 0 set aaNVB3RETimer.Zone02state to 1 stopquest aaNVB3REZone02 endif
if nChoice == 9; Big Ambush ;set up NPC's aaNVB3REZone02Marker03REF.placeatme aaRELvlOutlawBossAmbusher 1 64 1 aaNVB3REZone02Marker02REF.placeatme aaRELvlOutlawAmbusher nCount01 aaNVB3REZone02Marker03REF.placeatme aaRELvlOutlawAmbusher nCount02 aaNVB3REZone02Marker04REF.placeatme aaRELvlOutlawAmbusher nCount01 ;kill quest, set timer set Setup to 0 set aaNVB3RETimer.Zone02state to 1 stopquest aaNVB3REZone02 endif
if nChoice == 10 && SomeguyMaster.MartinStatus == 1; Glanton Gang Ambush ;set up NPC's aaNVB3REZone02Marker03REF.placeatme aaRELvlGlantonGangAmbusher nCount01 aaNVB3REZone02Marker04REF.placeatme aaRELvlGlantonGangAmbusher nCount02 ;kill quest, set timer set Setup to 0 set aaNVB3RETimer.Zone02state to 1 stopquest aaNVB3REZone02 else set Setup to 1; re-roll endif
if nChoice == 11; Crazed Nightkin Ambush ;set up NPC's aaNVB3REZone02Marker03REF.placeatme aaRENightkinAmbusher 1 ;kill quest, set timer set Setup to 0 set aaNVB3RETimer.Zone02state to 1 stopquest aaNVB3REZone02 endif
if nChoice == 12; Deathclaw vs Wastelanders ;set up NPC's aaNVB3REZone02Marker03REF.placeatme aaRELvlWastelander nCount01 aaNVB3REZone02Marker03REF.placeatme aaREDeathClaw 1 128 0 ;kill quest, set timer set Setup to 0 set aaNVB3RETimer.Zone02state to 1 stopquest aaNVB3REZone02 endif
if nChoice == 13; Yao Guai vs Wastelanders ;set up NPC's aaNVB3REZone02Marker03REF.placeatme aaRELvlWastelander nCount01 aaNVB3REZone02Marker03REF.placeatme aaREYaoGuai nCount03 128 0 ;kill quest, set timer set Setup to 0 set aaNVB3RETimer.Zone02state to 1 stopquest aaNVB3REZone02 endif
if nChoice == 14; Outlaws knife fighting ;set up NPC's aaNVB3REZone02Marker01REF.placeatme aaREOutlawKnifeFight 1 32 0 aaNVB3REZone02Marker01REF.placeatme aaREOutlawKnifeFight 1 32 1 ;kill quest, set timer set Setup to 0 set aaNVB3RETimer.Zone02state to 1 stopquest aaNVB3REZone02 endif
if nChoice == 15; Yao Guai's fighting ;set up NPC's aaNVB3REZone02Marker01REF.placeatme aaREYaoGuaiFrenzied 1 32 0 aaNVB3REZone02Marker01REF.placeatme aaREYaoGuaiFrenzied 1 32 1 ;kill quest, set timer set Setup to 0 set aaNVB3RETimer.Zone02state to 1 stopquest aaNVB3REZone02 endif
if nChoice == 16 && aaNVB3RETimer.MerchantPlaced == 0; Merchant ;set up NPC's aaREMerchantREF.moveto aaNVB3REZone02Marker01REF aaREMerchantBrahminREF.moveto aaNVB3REZone02Marker01REF 0 64 0 aaMerchantDogREF.moveto aaNVB3REZone02Marker01REF 0 -64 0 set aaNVB3RETimer.MerchantPlaced to 1 ;kill quest, set timer set Setup to 0 set aaNVB3RETimer.Zone02state to 1 stopquest aaNVB3REZone02 else set Setup to 1; re-roll endif
if nChoice == 17 && (Someguymaster.ZimmerStatus == 1) && (Player.HasPerk WildWasteland == 1) ; Hobos Seeking Bounty - requires The Inheritance and WW ;set up NPC's aaNVB3REZone02Marker01REF.placeatme aaRELvlHoboAmbusher nCount01 32 0 aaNVB3REZone02Marker01REF.placeatme aaRELvlHoboBossAmbusher 1 32 2 aaNVB3REZone02Marker02REF.placeatme aaRELvlHoboAmbusher nCount02 32 1 aaNVB3REZone02Marker02REF.placeatme aaRELvlHoboBossAmbusher 1 32 0 aaNVB3REZone02Marker03REF.placeatme aaRELvlHoboAmbusher nCount04 ; PlaySound UIWildWasteland; ShowMessage WildWastelandMessage; ;kill quest, set timer set Setup to 0 set aaNVB3RETimer.Zone02state to 1 stopquest aaNVB3REZone02 else set Setup to 1; re-roll endif

scn aaNVB3REZone02TriggerSCRIPT

END

END

scn aaNVB3REZone06TriggerSCRIPT
Begin OnTrigger Player
If aaNVB3REZone06.Eligible == 0 startquest aaNVB3REZone06 set aaNVB3REZone06.Setup to 1 set aaNVB3REZone06.Eligible to 1 else return endif
END

scn aaDrususBarkTriggerSCRIPT
Short DoOnce
BEGIN OnTriggerEnter Player
If DoOnce == 0 && aaNVB3Main01.DrususGreeted == 0 aaVirgilRef.stopcombat aaVirgilRef.additem aaWeapUber44Revolver 1 aaDrususREF.SayTo aaVirgilREF aaNVB3DrususBark setstage aaNVB3Main01 51 Set DoOnce to 1 disable markfordelete endif
END

scn aaGodwinSpeechTriggerSCRIPT
short DoOnce
Begin OnTrigger Player
If DoOnce == 0
set aaNVB3Side01.GodwinGreeted to 1 aaGodwinREF.evp setstage aaNVB3Side01 10 set DoOnce to 1 disable markfordelete
endif
END

scn aaGodwinNPCScript
Begin OnDeath
aaGodwinEmmaREF.say flee aaGodwinPierreREF.flee
If GetStage aaNVB3Side01 < 15 setstage aaNVB3Side01 15 endif
set aaNVB3Master.GodwinFate to 1
END

scn aaEstherDialogueTriggerSCRIPT
Begin OnTrigger Player
if GetStage aaNVB3Side01 == 25 setstage aaNVB3Side01 30 endif
If (aaNVB3Side01.EstherGreeted == 0) && (SomeguyMaster.EstherStatus == 2) aaNVB3EstherREF.evp set aaNVB3Side01.EstherGreeted to 1 disable markfordelete else set aaNVB3Side01.EstherGreeted to 1 disable markfordelete endif
END

scn aaNVB3EstherNPCScript
short killed
Begin OnDeath Player
set killed to 1 set SomeguyMaster.EstherStatus to 5 rewardkarma -250
if aaJacksonREF.GetDead == 0 aaJacksonREF.say aaNVB3Side01JacksonKILLEDESTHER aaJacksonREF.startcombat player endif
END

scn aaJacksonNPCScript
short killed
Begin OnDeath
set killed to 1
If aaNVB3EstherREF.getdead == 0 aaNVB3EstherREF.say aaNVB3Side01EstherKilledJackson aaNVB3EstherREF.evp endif
if GetStage aaNVB3Side01 < 35 setstage aaNVB3Side01 35 endif
END

scn aaCooperQuestSCRIPT
short bCooperHireable short bCooperDoOnce
short HiredOnce short FinishedMod

scn aaCooperNPCScript
short HasBeenHired short RandallShack short Mojave short L38 short DoOnce
int CombatStyleRanged int CombatStyleMelee int IsFollowingDefault int IsFollowingLong int FollowerSwitchAggressive int Waiting
short deadstate short deadstartday
Begin Gamemode
if (DoOnce != 1) Set HasBeenHired to 0 Set RandallShack to 0 Set Mojave to 0 Set L38 to 0 Set CombatStyleRanged to 0 Set CombatStyleMelee to 1 Set IsFollowingDefault to 0 Set IsFollowingLong to 0 Set FollowerSwitchAggressive to 0 Set Waiting to 0 Set DoOnce to 1 endif
If deadstate == 1 if GameDaysPassed - deadstartday >= 2; 72 hours disable markfordelete Set deadstate to 2 EndIf endif
END
Begin OnDeath
set aaNVB3Master.CooperFate to 1
showmessage aaCooperRemovePerkMessage
If deadstate == 0 Set deadstartday to GameDaysPassed Set deadstate to 1 endif
END
BEGIN OnCombatEND
if ( GetPlayerTeammate == 1 ) resethealth restoreav perceptioncondition 100 restoreav endurancecondition 100 restoreav leftattackcondition 100 restoreav leftmobilitycondition 100 restoreav rightattackcondition 100 restoreav rightmobilitycondition 100 endif
END

scn aaJoeFrostNPCScript
short killed
Begin OnDeath
set killed to 1
set aaNVB3Master.FrostFate to 1
if GetStage aaNVB3Side01 < 55 setstage aaNVB3Side01 55 endif
END

scn aaFORDNPCScript
short HasBeenHired short RandallShack short DoOnce
int CombatStyleRanged int CombatStyleMelee int IsFollowingDefault int IsFollowingLong int FollowerSwitchAggressive int Waiting
Begin Gamemode
if (DoOnce != 1) Set HasBeenHired to 0 Set RandallShack to 1 Set CombatStyleRanged to 1 Set CombatStyleMelee to 0 Set IsFollowingDefault to 0 Set IsFollowingLong to 0 Set FollowerSwitchAggressive to 0 Set Waiting to 0 Set DoOnce to 1 endif
END
BEGIN OnCombatEND
if ( GetPlayerTeammate == 1 ) resethealth restoreav perceptioncondition 100 restoreav endurancecondition 100 restoreav leftattackcondition 100 restoreav leftmobilitycondition 100 restoreav rightattackcondition 100 restoreav rightmobilitycondition 100 endif
END

scn aaFordQuestSCRIPT

short bConversation; used for force-greets during the player's adventures short FordBark; Regulates barks

scn aaFordInitialBarkTriggerSCRIPT
short DoOnce
Begin OnTrigger Player
If (aaFordREF.HasBeenHired == 1) && (DoOnce != 1) && (aaFordQuest.ShutUp != 1) set aaFordQuest.FordBark to 1 aaFordREF.Say aaFordBark set DoOnce to 1 disable markfordelete endif
END

scn aaFordPreFirstTargetConTriggerSCRIPT
short DoOnce
Begin OnTrigger Player
If (aaFordREF.HasBeenHired == 1) && (aaFordREF.Waiting == 0) && (DoOnce != 1) && (aaFordQuest.ShutUp != 1) ;set aaFordQuest.bConversation to 1 ;aaFordREF.startconversation player, aaFordStartConversation set DoOnce to 1 disable markfordelete endif
END

Begin OnTrigger Player
if (Player.HasPerk WildWasteland) && (doonce == 0) PlaySound UIWildWasteland showmessage WildWastelandMessage aaJanetPosterREF.enable Set doonce to 1 disable markfordelete else set doOnce to 1 disable markfordelete endif

endif

scn aaNVB3REZone07QuestScript
short Eligible; 0 = yes, 1 = no short Setup; Regulates stage of setup short nChoice; chooses encounter short nCount01; NPC count short nCount02; NPC count short nCount03; NPC count short nCount04; NPC count
Begin Gamemode
If Setup == 1 ;just started, rolling dice for various stuff set nChoice to 1 + GetRandomPercent * 55/100; 47 set nCount01 to 2 + GetRandomPercent * (4-2+1) / 100; 2-4 set nCount02 to 2 + GetRandomPercent * (4-2+1) / 100; 2-4 set nCount03 to 1 + GetRandomPercent * (2-1+1) / 100; 1-2 set nCount04 to 1 + GetRandomPercent * (2-1+1) / 100; 1-2 set Setup to 2 endif
if Setup == 2; finalizing selection if nChoice == 1; bounty hunters vs outlaws ;set up NPC's aaNVB3REZone07Marker01REF.placeatme aaRELvlBountyHunter nCount01 aaNVB3REZone07Marker02REF.placeatme aaRELvlGenericOutlaw nCount02 ;kill quest, set timer set Setup to 0 set aaNVB3RETimer.Zone07state to 1 stopquest aaNVB3REZone07 endif
if nChoice == 2; outlaw ambushers ;set up NPC's aaNVB3REZone07Marker03REF.placeatme aaRELvlOutlawAmbusher nCount03 aaNVB3REZone07Marker04REF.placeatme aaRELvlOutlawAmbusher nCount04 ;kill quest, set timer set Setup to 0 set aaNVB3RETimer.Zone07state to 1 stopquest aaNVB3REZone07 endif
if nChoice == 3; vet bounty hunter vs two groups of outlaws ;set up NPC's aaNVB3REZone07Marker01REF.placeatme aaRELvlBountyHunterVet 1 aaNVB3REZone07Marker03REF.placeatme aaRELvlGenericOutlaw nCount01 aaNVB3REZone07Marker04REF.placeatme aaRELvlGenericOutlaw nCount03 ;kill quest, set timer set Setup to 0 set aaNVB3RETimer.Zone07state to 1 stopquest aaNVB3REZone07 endif
if nChoice == 4; outlaw RL vs. bounty hunters ;set up NPC's aaNVB3REZone07Marker01REF.placeatme aaRELvlGenericOutlawBoss 1 aaNVB3REZone07Marker03REF.placeatme aaRELvlBountyHunter nCount01 aaNVB3REZone07Marker04REF.placeatme aaRELvlBountyHunter nCount03 ;kill quest, set timer set Setup to 0 set aaNVB3RETimer.Zone07state to 1 stopquest aaNVB3REZone07 endif
if nChoice == 5; vet BH vs Outlaw RL ;set up NPC's aaNVB3REZone07Marker01REF.placeatme aaRELvlGenericOutlawBoss 1 aaNVB3REZone07Marker02REF.placeatme aaRELvlBountyHunterVet 1 ;kill quest, set timer set Setup to 0 set aaNVB3RETimer.Zone07state to 1 stopquest aaNVB3REZone07 endif
if nChoice == 6; BH vs Outlaws, large group ;set up NPC's aaNVB3REZone07Marker01REF.placeatme aaRELvlBountyHunterVet 1 aaNVB3REZone07Marker02REF.placeatme aaRELvlBountyHunter nCount01 aaNVB3REZone07Marker03REF.placeatme aaRELvlGenericOutlaw nCount02 aaNVB3REZone07Marker04REF.placeatme aaRELvlGenericOutlawBoss 1 ;kill quest, set timer set Setup to 0 set aaNVB3RETimer.Zone07state to 1 stopquest aaNVB3REZone07 endif

if nChoice == 35; Mr. Protectron(s) vs. Wastelanders ;set up NPC's aaNVB3REZone07Marker04REF.placeatme aaREProtectron nCount03 aaNVB3REZone07Marker03REF.placeatme aaRELvlWastelander nCount04 ;kill quest, set timer set Setup to 0 set aaNVB3RETimer.Zone07state to 1 stopquest aaNVB3REZone07 endif
if nChoice == 36; Bighorner(s) vs. Mongrels ;set up NPC's aaNVB3REZone07Marker03REF.placeatme aaREBigHorner nCount03 aaNVB3REZone07Marker04REF.placeatme aaREMtMongrel nCount01 ;kill quest, set timer set Setup to 0 set aaNVB3RETimer.Zone07state to 1 stopquest aaNVB3REZone07 endif
if nChoice == 37; Sentry Bot ;set up NPC's aaNVB3REZone07Marker01REF.placeatme aaRESentryBot 1 ;kill quest, set timer set Setup to 0 set aaNVB3RETimer.Zone07state to 1 stopquest aaNVB3REZone07 endif
if nChoice == 38; Sentry Bot vs. dogs ;set up NPC's aaNVB3REZone07Marker03REF.placeatme aaRESentryBot 1 aaNVB3REZone07Marker04REF.placeatme aaREDogVicious nCount01 ;kill quest, set timer set Setup to 0 set aaNVB3RETimer.Zone07state to 1 stopquest aaNVB3REZone07 endif
if nChoice == 39; Sentry Bot vs. Wastelanders ;set up NPC's aaNVB3REZone07Marker04REF.placeatme aaRESentryBot 1 aaNVB3REZone07Marker03REF.placeatme aaRELvlWastelander nCount02 ;kill quest, set timer set Setup to 0 set aaNVB3RETimer.Zone07state to 1 stopquest aaNVB3REZone07 endif
if nChoice == 40; bounty hunters vs Super Mutants ;set up NPC's aaNVB3REZone07Marker01REF.placeatme aaRELvlBountyHunter nCount01 aaNVB3REZone07Marker02REF.placeatme aaRELvlOutlawSupermutant nCount03 ;kill quest, set timer set Setup to 0 set aaNVB3RETimer.Zone07state to 1 stopquest aaNVB3REZone07 endif
if nChoice == 41 && (GetStage aaNVB3Main02 >= 125); player has defeated Ingram and Saunders, outlaws leaving ;set up NPC's aaNVB3REZone07Marker01REF.placeatme aaRELvlOutlawQuitterBoss 1 ; ;kill quest, set timer set Setup to 0 set aaNVB3RETimer.Zone07state to 1 stopquest aaNVB3REZone07 else set Setup to 1; re-roll endif
if nChoice == 42 && (Player.HasPerk WildWasteland == 1) ; Mad Brahmin ;set up NPC's aaNVB3REZone07Marker01REF.placeatme aaMadBrahmin nCount03 32 0 aaNVB3REZone07Marker02REF.placeatme aaMadBrahmin nCount04 32 1 aaNVB3REZone07Marker03REF.placeatme aaMadBrahmin nCount03 32 0 ; PlaySound UIWildWasteland; ShowMessage WildWastelandMessage; ;kill quest, set timer set Setup to 0 set aaNVB3RETimer.Zone07state to 1 stopquest aaNVB3REZone07 else set Setup to 1; re-roll endif
if nChoice == 43 && (aaNVB3RETimer.SchwartzPlaced == 0) ;set up NPC's aaAlfredSchwartzREF.moveto aaNVB3REZone07Marker02REF set aaNVB3RETimer.SchwartzPlaced to 1 aaAlfredSchwartzREF.evp ;kill quest, set timer set Setup to 0 set aaNVB3RETimer.Zone07state to 1 stopquest aaNVB3REZone07 else set Setup to 1; re-roll endif
if nChoice == 44; prospectors vs outlaws ;set up NPC's aaNVB3REZone07Marker01REF.placeatme aaRELvlProspector nCount03 aaNVB3REZone07Marker02REF.placeatme aaRELvlGenericOutlaw nCount01 ;kill quest, set timer set Setup to 0 set aaNVB3RETimer.Zone07state to 1 stopquest aaNVB3REZone07 endif
if nChoice == 45 && (Player.HasPerk WildWasteland == 1) && (aaNVB3RETimer.LiamPlaced == 0) ; "Liam" vs. Mongrels ;set up NPC's aaNVB3REZone07Marker01REF.placeatme aaLiam 1 32 0 aaNVB3REZone07Marker03REF.placeatme aaREMtMongrelBoss 1 64 1 aaNVB3REZone07Marker03REF.placeatme aaREMtMongrel nCount01 aaNVB3REZone07Marker04REF.placeatme aaREMtMongrel nCount02 ; PlaySound UIWildWasteland; ShowMessage WildWastelandMessage; ;kill quest, set timer set Setup to 0 set aaNVB3RETimer.LiamPlaced to 1 set aaNVB3RETimer.Zone07state to 1 stopquest aaNVB3REZone07 else set Setup to 1; re-roll endif
if nChoice == 46 && (Player.HasPerk WildWasteland == 1) && (aaNVB3RETimer.ThingPlaced == 0) ; "Kurt" vs. Thing ;set up NPC's aaNVB3REZone07Marker01REF.placeatme aaKurt 1 128 0 aaNVB3REZone07Marker03REF.placeatme aaREThingCentaur 1 PlaySound UIWildWasteland; ShowMessage WildWastelandMessage; ;kill quest, set timer set Setup to 0 set aaNVB3RETimer.ThingPlaced to 1 set aaNVB3RETimer.Zone07state to 1 stopquest aaNVB3REZone07 else set Setup to 1; re-roll endif
if nChoice >= 47; outlaw ambushers, big group ;set up NPC's aaNVB3REZone07Marker03REF.placeatme aaRELvlOutlawBossAmbusher 1 64 1 aaNVB3REZone07Marker02REF.placeatme aaRELvlOutlawAmbusher nCount01 aaNVB3REZone07Marker03REF.placeatme aaRELvlOutlawAmbusher nCount02 ;kill quest, set timer set Setup to 0 set aaNVB3RETimer.Zone07state to 1 stopquest aaNVB3REZone07 endif
endif

scn aaNVB3REZone07TriggerSCRIPT
Begin OnTrigger Player
If aaNVB3REZone07.Eligible == 0 startquest aaNVB3REZone07 set aaNVB3REZone07.Setup to 1 set aaNVB3REZone07.Eligible to 1 else return endif
END

ScriptName aaNVB3IntroSlidesSCRIPT
Short Topic; Used to advance narration in timely fashion
Short bSlideShowStarted; ; Used to run this script only once. Short bSkipIntro; ; Variable added to bypass the Intro Slide sequence (for quicker testing). Ref rVCountryRadio; ; Variable to hold ref of NV's country radio.
Float fTimer; Short Triggered;
BEGIN GameMode
If ( bSlideShowStarted == 0 ) ; Has the initialization run yet?
DisablePlayerControls 0 0 1 0 0 0 1;
Set fTimer To ( fTimer + GetSecondsPassed ); ; Increment the delay timer
If ( fTimer >= 1 )
Set bSlideShowStarted To 1; ; Prevent the script from running again.
Player.AddScriptPackage NVDLC02PlayerNoSavePackage; ; Prevent the player from saving the game DisablePlayerControls; ; Prevent the player from doing anything.
Player.DispelAllSpells; ; Removes all chem effects. Player.CastImmediateOnSelf NVDLC02RestUp; ; Restore the player's Dehydration, Sleep Deprivation, and Starvation Player.ResetHealth; ; Heal the player. PipBoyRadioOff; ; Turn off PipBoy radio.
;
PlayMusic NVDLC02SlideShowMusicIntro; ; Play music during Intro slides.
SetInCharGen 1; ; Keep the player from leveling during the show
Player.MoveTo aaNVB3PlayerSlideshowMarkerREF; ; Send the player to the "Theatre" AKA NVDLC02SlideShow interior. SetQuestDelay aaNVB3IntroSlides 2.5 endif
EndIf
END

ScriptName aaNVB3EndingSCRIPT
short Topic01 short Topic02 short Topic03 short Topic04 short Topic05 short Topic06 short Topic07 short Topic08 short Topic09 short Topic10 short Topic11 short Topic12 short Topic12bThorne short Topic12cBrookshire short Topic13 short Topic14
Short bSlideShowStarted; ; Used to initialize what's needed for the start of the End Slides (prevent the player from doing anything and teleport them to the "theatre") Float fTimer; ; Timer used to delay the start of the Ending Slide sequence
BEGIN GameMode
If ( bSlideShowStarted == 0 ) ; Has the initialization run yet?
DisablePlayerControls 0 0 1 0 0 0 1;
Set fTimer To ( fTimer + GetSecondsPassed ); ; Increment the delay timer
If ( fTimer >= 1 )
Set bSlideShowStarted to 1; ; Prevent the script from running again
Player.AddScriptPackage NVDLC02PlayerNoSavePackage; ; Prevent the player from saving the game DisablePlayerControls 1 1 1 1 1 1 1; ; Prevent the player from disrupting the show
Player.DispelAllSpells; ; Removes all chem effects RemoveImageSpaceModifier NVDLC02SacredDaturaPoisonISFX; ; Removes Dark Datura poison visual effect Player.CastImmediateOnSelf NVDLC02RestUp; ; Restore the player's Dehydration, Sleep Deprivation, and Starvation Player.ResetHealth; ; Heal the player and remove any crippling damage PipBoyRadioOff; ; Turn off PipBoy radio
PlayMusic EndSlideShow;
SetInCharGen 1; ; Keep the player from leveling during the show Set aaNVB3SlideshowTriggerREF.bRunScript To 1; ; Set Trigger's variable to let Ending Slide sequence run. aaNVB3DumbSlide02REF.enable Player.MoveTo aaNVB3PlayerSlideshowMarkerREF; ; Send the player to the "theatre" to begin slide show
endif
EndIf
END

scn aaNVB3DepartureTokenScript
int iButton
Begin OnAdd player
ShowMessage aaLeaveMojave01Message
End
Begin GameMode
set iButton to GetButtonPressed
if getstage aaNVB3Main02 < 5
if iButton == -1 ; No button has been pressed yet Return elseif iButton == 0 ; Option 0 Removeme elseif iButton == 1 ; Option 1 ; Begin Slideshow DisablePlayerControls 1 1 1 1 1 1 1; Prevent the player from doing anything. SwapTexture aaNVB3IntroSlide01REF "##NVDLC02_Intro:0" "nvb3_introslide01"; startquest aaNVB3IntroSlides setstage aaNVB3Main01 190 elseif iButton == 2 ; Option 2 ; skip Slideshow Playerref.moveto aaFrosthillEntryMarkerREF setstage aaNVB3Main01 190 endif
elseif getstage aaNVB3Main02 >= 5 RemoveMe endif
RemoveMe
End

scn aaNVB3EvolutionQuestSCRIPT
;;;LET'S FUCK WITH THE COMPLETIONISTS!!!;;;
; if Godwin is left alive and crazy, the player can trigger a mail bomb at... short BombSent; ;Embassy ;Mojave Outpost ;McCarran
short DrunkSent; Drunk who mocks player for letting massacre happen short LetterSent short HoboSent; Hobo who calls player a coward and a loser for letting Marko live
;Dialogue stuff short StoneFistGreeted short PollyGreeted short DrunkGreeted short CourierMet short HoboGreeted
;IT'S PAYBACK TIME! short PollySent; if Marko is dead, she comes calling short GlantonSent; if Glanton is dead, old gang members seek out the player short StoneFistSent; Kicking Dog's bro
short bState short bStartday
short Setup
short nChoice; chooses encounter short nCount01; NPC count short nCount02; NPC count short nPlace; Placement when appropriate
short EventCount; total number of events, quest killed at 10
;;; Every 3-5 days, the script will RANDOMLY choose an event - the timer quest kills it after 10 events
Begin GameMode
;;;ONE-SHOT EVENTS
If (DrunkSent == 0) ;set up drunk guy aaBobbyJammerREF.enable set DrunkSent to 1 endif
if (LetterSent == 0) && (SomeguyMaster.MartinStatus == 2); Glanton sends letter from Mexico ;set up Courier set LetterSent to 1 elseif (LetterSent == 0) && (SomeguyMaster.MartinStatus != 2) ;remove Courier set LetterSent to 1 endif
if (BombSent == 0) && (aaNVB3Master.GodwinFate == 0); Godwin is still mailing out goodies ;set up bomb triggers aaMojaveOutpostBombTriggerREF.enable aaMcCarranBombTriggerREF.enable aaEmbassyBombTriggerREF.enable set BombSent to 1 elseif (Bombsent == ) && (aaNVB3Master.GodwinFate != 0) ;disable, delete triggers and bombers aaMojaveOutpostBombTriggerREF.disable aaMojaveOutpostBombTriggerREF.markfordelete aaSEMojaveMailBomberREF.disable aaSEMojaveMailBomberREF.markfordelete ; aaMcCarranBombTriggerREF.disable aaMcCarranBombTriggerREF.markfordelete aaSEMcCarranMailBomberREF.disable aaSEMcCarranMailBomberREF.markfordelete ; aaEmbassyBombTriggerREF.disable aaEmbassyBombTriggerREF.markfordelete aaSEEmbassyMailBomberREF.disable aaSEEmbassyMailBomberREF.markfordelete ; set BombSent to 1 endif
;;;RANDOM EVENTS
If Setup == 0 set nChoice to 1 + GetRandomPercent * 10/100; 10 set nPlace to 1 + GetRandomPercent * 8/100; 8 set nCount01 to 2 + GetRandomPercent * (3-2+1) / 100; 2-3 set Setup to 1 endif
if Setup == 1; finalize selection
if (nChoice == 1) && (PollySent != 1) && (SomeguyMaster.MarkoStatus == 1); Polly ;placement if nPlace == 1 aaNVB3SEGSSpawnPointREF.placeatme aaPolly 1 elseif nPlace == 2 aaNVB3SEPrimmSpawnPointREF.placeatme aaPolly 1 elseif nPlace == 3 aaNVB3SENovacSpawnPointREF.placeatme aaPolly 1 elseif nPlace == 4 aaNVB3SEFSSpawnPointREF.placeatme aaPolly 1 elseif nPlace == 5 aaNVB3SE188SpawnPointREF.placeatme aaPolly 1 elseif nPlace == 6 aaNVB3SEWSSpawnPointREF.placeatme aaPolly 1 elseif nPlace == 7 aaNVB3SEFSGateSpawnPointREF.placeatme aaPolly 1 elseif nPlace == 8 aaNVB3SEGRGateSpawnPointREF.placeatme aaPolly 1 endif ;wrap-up set PollySent to 1 set EventCount to EventCount + 1 set Setup to 2 stopquest aaNVB3Evolution else; re-roll set Setup to 0 endif
if (nChoice == 2) && (aaNVB3EstherREF.Killed == 1); badass bounty hunters ;placement if nPlace == 1 aaNVB3SEGSSpawnPointREF.placeatme aaSELvlBountyHunterAmbusher nCount01 elseif nPlace == 2 aaNVB3SEPrimmSpawnPointREF.placeatme aaSELvlBountyHunterAmbusher nCount01 elseif nPlace == 3 aaNVB3SENovacSpawnPointREF.placeatme aaSELvlBountyHunterAmbusher nCount01 elseif nPlace == 4 aaNVB3SEFSSpawnPointREF.placeatme aaSELvlBountyHunterAmbusher nCount01 elseif nPlace == 5 aaNVB3SE188SpawnPointREF.placeatme aaSELvlBountyHunterAmbusher nCount01 elseif nPlace == 6 aaNVB3SEWSSpawnPointREF.placeatme aaSELvlBountyHunterAmbusher nCount01 elseif nPlace == 7 aaNVB3SEFSGateSpawnPointREF.placeatme aaSELvlBountyHunterAmbusher nCount01 elseif nPlace == 8 aaNVB3SEGRGateSpawnPointREF.placeatme aaSELvlBountyHunterAmbusher nCount01 endif ;wrap-up set EventCount to EventCount + 1 set Setup to 2 stopquest aaNVB3Evolution else; re-roll set Setup to 0 endif
if (nChoice == 3); drifter ;placement if nPlace == 1 aaNVB3SEGSSpawnPointREF.placeatme aaSELvlDrifterAmbusher 1 elseif nPlace == 2 aaNVB3SEPrimmSpawnPointREF.placeatme aaSELvlDrifterAmbusher 1 elseif nPlace == 3 aaNVB3SENovacSpawnPointREF.placeatme aaSELvlDrifterAmbusher 1 elseif nPlace == 4 aaNVB3SEFSSpawnPointREF.placeatme aaSELvlDrifterAmbusher 1 elseif nPlace == 5 aaNVB3SE188SpawnPointREF.placeatme aaSELvlDrifterAmbusher 1 elseif nPlace == 6 aaNVB3SEWSSpawnPointREF.placeatme aaSELvlDrifterAmbusher 1 elseif nPlace == 7 aaNVB3SEFSGateSpawnPointREF.placeatme aaSELvlDrifterAmbusher 1 elseif nPlace == 8 aaNVB3SEGRGateSpawnPointREF.placeatme aaSELvlDrifterAmbusher 1 endif ;wrap-up set EventCount to EventCount + 1 set Setup to 2 stopquest aaNVB3Evolution endif
if (nChoice == 4); gunfighter ;placement if nPlace == 1 aaNVB3SEGSSpawnPointREF.placeatme aaSELvlGunfighterAmbusher 1 elseif nPlace == 2 aaNVB3SEPrimmSpawnPointREF.placeatme aaSELvlGunfighterAmbusher 1 elseif nPlace == 3 aaNVB3SENovacSpawnPointREF.placeatme aaSELvlGunfighterAmbusher 1 elseif nPlace == 4 aaNVB3SEFSSpawnPointREF.placeatme aaSELvlGunfighterAmbusher 1 elseif nPlace == 5 aaNVB3SE188SpawnPointREF.placeatme aaSELvlGunfighterAmbusher 1 elseif nPlace == 6 aaNVB3SEWSSpawnPointREF.placeatme aaSELvlGunfighterAmbusher 1 elseif nPlace == 7 aaNVB3SEFSGateSpawnPointREF.placeatme aaSELvlGunfighterAmbusher 1 elseif nPlace == 8 aaNVB3SEGRGateSpawnPointREF.placeatme aaSELvlGunfighterAmbusher 1 endif ;wrap-up set EventCount to EventCount + 1 set Setup to 2 stopquest aaNVB3Evolution endif
if (nChoice == 5) && (StoneFistSent == 0); Stone Fist ;placement if nPlace == 1 aaNVB3SEGSSpawnPointREF.placeatme aaStoneFist 1 elseif nPlace == 2 aaNVB3SEPrimmSpawnPointREF.placeatme aaStoneFist 1 elseif nPlace == 3 aaNVB3SENovacSpawnPointREF.placeatme aaStoneFist 1 elseif nPlace == 4 aaNVB3SEFSSpawnPointREF.placeatme aaStoneFist 1 elseif nPlace == 5 aaNVB3SE188SpawnPointREF.placeatme aaStoneFist 1 elseif nPlace == 6 aaNVB3SEWSSpawnPointREF.placeatme aaStoneFist 1 elseif nPlace == 7 aaNVB3SEFSGateSpawnPointREF.placeatme aaStoneFist 1 elseif nPlace == 8 aaNVB3SEGRGateSpawnPointREF.placeatme aaStoneFist 1 endif ;wrap-up set StoneFistSent to 1 set EventCount to EventCount + 1 set Setup to 2 stopquest aaNVB3Evolution else set setup to 0 endif
if (nChoice == 6); outlaws ;placement if nPlace == 1 aaNVB3SEGSSpawnPointREF.placeatme aaSELvlOutlawAmbusher nCount01 elseif nPlace == 2 aaNVB3SEPrimmSpawnPointREF.placeatme aaSELvlOutlawAmbusher nCount01 elseif nPlace == 3 aaNVB3SENovacSpawnPointREF.placeatme aaSELvlOutlawAmbusher nCount01 elseif nPlace == 4 aaNVB3SEFSSpawnPointREF.placeatme aaSELvlOutlawAmbusher nCount01 elseif nPlace == 5 aaNVB3SE188SpawnPointREF.placeatme aaSELvlOutlawAmbusher nCount01 elseif nPlace == 6 aaNVB3SEWSSpawnPointREF.placeatme aaSELvlOutlawAmbusher nCount01 elseif nPlace == 7 aaNVB3SEFSGateSpawnPointREF.placeatme aaSELvlOutlawAmbusher nCount01 elseif nPlace == 8 aaNVB3SEGRGateSpawnPointREF.placeatme aaSELvlOutlawAmbusher nCount01 endif ;wrap-up set EventCount to EventCount + 1 set Setup to 2 stopquest aaNVB3Evolution endif
if (nChoice == 7); raiders ;placement if nPlace == 1 aaNVB3SEGSSpawnPointREF.placeatme aaSELvlRaiderAmbusher nCount01 elseif nPlace == 2 aaNVB3SEPrimmSpawnPointREF.placeatme aaSELvlOutlawAmbusher nCount01 elseif nPlace == 3 aaNVB3SENovacSpawnPointREF.placeatme aaSELvlOutlawAmbusher nCount01 elseif nPlace == 4 aaNVB3SEFSSpawnPointREF.placeatme aaSELvlOutlawAmbusher nCount01 elseif nPlace == 5 aaNVB3SE188SpawnPointREF.placeatme aaSELvlOutlawAmbusher nCount01 elseif nPlace == 6 aaNVB3SEWSSpawnPointREF.placeatme aaSELvlOutlawAmbusher nCount01 elseif nPlace == 7 aaNVB3SEFSGateSpawnPointREF.placeatme aaSELvlOutlawAmbusher nCount01 elseif nPlace == 8 aaNVB3SEGRGateSpawnPointREF.placeatme aaSELvlOutlawAmbusher nCount01 endif ;wrap-up set EventCount to EventCount + 1 set Setup to 2 stopquest aaNVB3Evolution endif
if (nChoice == 8) && (GlantonSent == 0) && (SomeguyMaster.MartinStatus == 10) ; Glanton boys ;placement if nPlace == 1 aaNVB3SEGSSpawnPointREF.placeatme aaSELvlGlantonGang nCount01 elseif nPlace == 2 aaNVB3SEPrimmSpawnPointREF.placeatme aaSELvlGlantonGang nCount01 elseif nPlace == 3 aaNVB3SENovacSpawnPointREF.placeatme aaSELvlGlantonGang nCount01 elseif nPlace == 4 aaNVB3SEFSSpawnPointREF.placeatme aaSELvlGlantonGang nCount01 elseif nPlace == 5 aaNVB3SE188SpawnPointREF.placeatme aaSELvlGlantonGang nCount01 elseif nPlace == 6 aaNVB3SEWSSpawnPointREF.placeatme aaSELvlGlantonGang nCount01 elseif nPlace == 7 aaNVB3SEFSGateSpawnPointREF.placeatme aaSELvlGlantonGang nCount01 elseif nPlace == 8 aaNVB3SEGRGateSpawnPointREF.placeatme aaSELvlGlantonGang nCount01 endif ;wrap-up set GlantonSent to 1 set EventCount to EventCount + 1 set Setup to 2 stopquest aaNVB3Evolution else set setup to 0 endif
if (nChoice == 9); badass raider ;placement if nPlace == 1 aaNVB3SEGSSpawnPointREF.placeatme aaSELvlRaiderBossAmbusher 1 elseif nPlace == 2 aaNVB3SEPrimmSpawnPointREF.placeatme aaSELvlRaiderBossAmbusher 1 elseif nPlace == 3 aaNVB3SENovacSpawnPointREF.placeatme aaSELvlRaiderBossAmbusher 1 elseif nPlace == 4 aaNVB3SEFSSpawnPointREF.placeatme aaSELvlRaiderBossAmbusher 1 elseif nPlace == 5 aaNVB3SE188SpawnPointREF.placeatme aaSELvlRaiderBossAmbusher 1 elseif nPlace == 6 aaNVB3SEWSSpawnPointREF.placeatme aaSELvlRaiderBossAmbusher 1 elseif nPlace == 7 aaNVB3SEFSGateSpawnPointREF.placeatme aaSELvlRaiderBossAmbusher 1 elseif nPlace == 8 aaNVB3SEGRGateSpawnPointREF.placeatme aaSELvlRaiderBossAmbusher 1 endif ;wrap-up set EventCount to EventCount + 1 set Setup to 2 stopquest aaNVB3Evolution endif
if (nChoice == 10); vengeful relative ;placement if nPlace == 1 aaNVB3SEGSSpawnPointREF.placeatme aaSELvlRelativeAmbusher 1 elseif nPlace == 2 aaNVB3SEPrimmSpawnPointREF.placeatme aaSELvlRelativeAmbusher 1 elseif nPlace == 3 aaNVB3SENovacSpawnPointREF.placeatme aaSELvlRelativeAmbusher 1 elseif nPlace == 4 aaNVB3SEFSSpawnPointREF.placeatme aaSELvlRelativeAmbusher 1 elseif nPlace == 5 aaNVB3SE188SpawnPointREF.placeatme aaSELvlRelativeAmbusher 1 elseif nPlace == 6 aaNVB3SEWSSpawnPointREF.placeatme aaSELvlRelativeAmbusher 1 elseif nPlace == 7 aaNVB3SEFSGateSpawnPointREF.placeatme aaSELvlRelativeAmbusher 1 elseif nPlace == 8 aaNVB3SEGRGateSpawnPointREF.placeatme aaSELvlRelativeAmbusher 1 endif ;wrap-up set EventCount to EventCount + 1 set Setup to 2 stopquest aaNVB3Evolution endif
endif
END

scn aaMojaveOutpostBombTriggerSCRIPT
short Stage
Begin OnTrigger Player
If Stage == 0 ;enable hapless courier aaSEMojaveMailBomberREF.enable aaSEMojaveMailBomberREF.evp aaSEMojaveMailBomberREF.Say aaSEMojaveBomberBark set Stage to 1 endif
END
Begin OnTrigger aaSEMojaveMailBomberREF
if Stage == 1 ;blow him to high hell aaSEMojaveMailBomberREF.placeatme C4Explosion aaSEMojaveMailBomberREF.kill; redundant, but you never know set Stage to 2 disable markfordelete endif
END

scn aaNVB3Main02QuestSCRIPT
short AmbushCount; counts number of ambusher killed in Frosthill intro short AmbushPackage; regulates the ai package of Randall & Co.
short BillGreeted; regulates Bill Blasius' greetings, duh short BillPissed; 0 = Player started fight, 1 = Bill started fight, 2 = Wild Wasteland solution short BillStare; variable for counting assessing staring contest with Bill short LoriScrewed; determines if player had intercourse with Lori while Bill was around
short DoolinGreeted;
short PorterGreeted;
short LeeGreeted; short LeeProvoked; 0 = no self-defense, 1 = self-defense short LeeSpared; 1 = spared without TP; he returns in ending
short OutlawGreeted short OutlawReleased short KetchumGreeted
short GlantonGreeted

scn aaNVB3SETimerQuestScript
short state short startday short nTime short nTotal
short NumberSet
Begin Gamemode
if NumberSet != 1 set nTotal to 4 + GetRandomPercent * (8-4+1) / 100; 4-8 events set NumberSet to 1 endif
If state == 1 set nTime to 5 + GetRandomPercent * (10-5+1) / 100; 5-10 days set state to 2 elseif state == 2 Set startday to GameDaysPassed Set state to 3 ElseIf state == 3 if GameDaysPassed - startday >= 1;nTime;Change back once testing is concluded ;start evolution quest startquest aaNVB3Evolution set aaNVB3Evolution.Setup to 0 Set state to 1 EndIf endif
If aaNVB3Evolution.EventCount == nTotal ;clean up loose references if aaBobbyJammerREF.GetDead == 0 aaBobbyJammerREF.kill; Poor Bobby's kidneys gave out endif ;kill scripts set aaNVB3Evolution.EventCount to 99 stopquest aaNVB3Evolution stopquest aaNVB3SETimer endif
END

scn aaBrookshireNPCSCRIPT
short deadstate short deadstartday
Begin OnDeath
set SomeguyMaster.Undefined02 to 1
additem aaBrookshireDeadNote 1
addreputation RepNVNCR 0 5
If deadstate == 0 Set deadstartday to GameDaysPassed Set deadstate to 1 endif
END
Begin GameMODE
If deadstate == 1 if GameDaysPassed - deadstartday >= 2 disable markfordelete Set deadstate to 2 EndIf endif
END

scn aaCuntyTriggerSCRIPT
short DoOnce
Begin OnTrigger Player
If (DoOnce == 0) && (Player.HasPerk WildWasteland) PlaySound UIWildWasteland showmessage WildWastelandMessage set aaNVB3MiscDialogue.CuntyGreeted to 1 aaNVB3CuntyMcleanREF.enable aaNVB3CuntyMcleanREF.evp set DoOnce to 1 disable markfordelete else set DoOnce to 1 disable markfordelete endif
END

scn aaBarberArgumentTrigger01SCRIPT
Short DoOnce
BEGIN OnTriggerEnter Player
If aaNVB3MiscDialogue.BarberTrigger != 1 && GetStage aaNVB3Main04 < 10 Set aaNVB3MiscDialogue.BarberTrigger to 1 elseif GetStage aaNVB3Main04 >= 10 disable markfordelete endif
END

scn aaBarberArgumentTrigger02SCRIPT
Short DoOnce
BEGIN OnTriggerEnter Player
If aaNVB3MiscDialogue.BarberTrigger == 1 && GetStage aaNVB3Main04 < 10 aaCockerREF.SayTo aaCuttyREF HELLO Set aaNVB3MiscDialogue.BarberTrigger to 0 elseif GetStage aaNVB3Main04 >= 10 disable markfordelete endif
END

ESP.ORIGINAL: Our Offer
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们的意向

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Ford,
Thank you for coming forward and arranging our meeting. I understand your frustration with Mr. Randall, who has never taken you seriously as a bounty hunter. If you are willing to assist the NCR in pacifying Frosthill, I will personally recommend you for a leadership position.
You will soon have the dignity and deference that was so brusquely denied by Randall for so long. The man is a backwards bully who will never appreciate the benefits of the NCR. As a fellow patriot, I know I can count on you. Good luck.
Sincerely, Brookshire
ESP.TRADUIT:
福特,
感谢您提出并安排我们的会议。 我了解您对兰道尔先生的不满，他从未将您视为赏金猎人。 如果您愿意协助NCR安抚霜地，我个人将推荐您担任领导职务。
您将很快拥有那些被兰道尔残酷拒绝的尊严和尊重。 这个人是一个向下施压欺负的人，而他永远不会欣赏到NCR的好处。 作为爱国者，我知道我可以依靠你。 祝好运。
真诚的， 布鲁克希尔

ESP.ORIGINAL: Time for Action
ESP.TRADUIT: 是时候行动了

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Ingram,
Marko's lost it, brother, plain and simple. Damn bounty hunters are killing everyone, and he's content to stay hidden up in the hills and let us get butchered. It's high time we make our own way here.
I want you to gather up the crew and meet me near the canyon entrance. We're going to hit the bounty hunters where they sleep, then we'll hit the town. Fucking Marko always had us on a leash, holding us to a fucking double standard. No more.
- Saunders
ESP.TRADUIT:
英格拉姆，
马尔科迷失了，兄弟，真是简单明了。那些该死的赏金猎人正在杀死我们所有人，而马尔科会十分乐意躲藏在山上，放任我们被屠杀的。 现在是时候在这里走出自己的路了。
我要你召集你那群乌合之众在峡谷入口处等我。我们要去他们睡觉的地方好好“打赏”那些赏金猎人，然后再去镇上。
那个该死的马尔科总是把我们拴在一条皮带上，让我们遵守他那所谓的双重标准。去他妈的，这种事情再也不会发生了。
-桑德斯

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thanks But No Thanks
ESP.TRADUIT: 感谢，但我拒绝

ESP.ORIGINAL: Congratulations
ESP.TRADUIT: 祝贺

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Brookshire,
First, congratulations on your promotion. I told you that good things would come if you merely placed your trust in the organization. You've done a great service for us and our client, Python Mining, so consider the pay raise a first step in a long and lucrative partnership.
I do have one quibble, however. There are conflicting reports surrounding [%]'s demise. I want proof of death, not mere assurances. That one has slipped from death's grasp too many times to be underestimated, even by Marko.
Once [%]'s death is verified, you can expect payment commensurate with your efforts. The Syndicate will be in your debt.
Sincerely, K.
ESP.TRADUIT:
布鲁克希尔，
首先，祝贺你升职。我告诉过你，只要你信任这个组织，好事就会接踵而至。你为我们和我们的客户蟒蛇矿业提供了很好的服务，所以请把加薪看作是长期和双赢合作关系的第一步。
不过，我确实有一个问题。关于[%]的死亡，有相互矛盾的消息。我要的是准确的死亡证明，而不仅仅是“保证“。那家伙逃脱死神的魔爪太多次了，甚至连马尔科都不会低估他。
一旦[%]的死亡被证实了，你就能获得符合你期待的血汗付出的回报。这是财团欠你的。
真诚的， K.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Baby Killer
ESP.TRADUIT: 婴儿杀手

ESP.ORIGINAL:
We got word of a baby killing savage, some big shot by the name of [%], killed a pregnant lady up in Utah. Boss wants this one done with extreme prejudice.
- Andy
ESP.TRADUIT:
我们得知了关于一个屠杀了婴儿的野蛮人，一个叫做[%]的大麻烦；这家伙在犹他州杀了一个怀孕的妇女。头儿希望这件事能以极端的方式还有偏见收场。
- 安迪

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hunter's Diary Part 1
ESP.TRADUIT: 猎人日记 第一部分

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Damn this cold. Damn these people. Damn this place.
One last job, that's what I told myself. It's the voice, that devil inside me that whispers, "You have to be the best." Knowing that Marko is out here, thinking that someone else might get him before me, it's like a knife in between the ribs, scraping the bone and shredding my guts. Randall will get here soon, and [%] will certainly follow.
People say that you shouldn't be in this business for glory, but that's bullshit. It's all glory, every second of it. When I take a target down, it's a bullet in the brain of a critic or one of those fucks who pushed me around as a kid. I'd like to catch up with a few of them now.
Dad was right about me, though - I am a coward. I've faked being brave so long that it's almost believable, but I know the truth. People are afraid, but if they knew what I was, the things I'd done, they'd probably laugh. I guess if you kill enough bums and outlaws folks just take it for granted that you're some sort of bold spirit, or just plain crazy.
Susan told me it was foolish to come here, and she might have been right. She was always the smart one. I wonder why she stayed with me for so long. She seemed happy enough with the new guy. She was just waiting for the next letdown with me, I guess. It was good to see her one last time.
Fuck diaries. Why am I writing this?
"To remind yourself of what you are, to keep pushing," the voice says. Fuck you. I've been doing this for ten years, I know how to do my job. Marko's a killer, just like the rest.
"He'll kill you." Fuck you twice. I've killed legionaries, psychopaths, gunfighters, all type of wicked shit you can't imagine. I'll cut Marko's fucking head clean off and kick it down main street in that shitheap town.
"You're afraid." No shit, I'm afraid. Doesn't mean I have to be a pussy about it. I'm more scared of being forgotten. When Marko's dead I'll be a legend. You understand that, you snide fuck?
Is this what normal people write in their journals? Fucking feet are numb in this frozen fuckhole of a shack. I found it abandoned, figured it was better than staying in town. I don't know how many of those saps are in Marko's pocket. I have to admit the mountains have an intimidating beauty about them, but it's just a distraction from the very real dangers around here. Outlaws, mongrels, cannibals, all kind of strange shit. Why did I come here?
"Glory, stupid." Yeah, I suppose so. That's reason enough for me.
ESP.TRADUIT:
诅咒这该死的寒冷，诅咒这些该死的人，诅咒这该死的地方。
这将会是最后的一次脏活,我总是这么告诉我自己的。 而这是我内心中，那魔鬼的声音低语道的, "你必须是最好的。" 在我得知马尔科在这里之后，我总以为有人会比我先抓住他，就好像一把利刃插在肋骨之间，刮坏我的骨头，撕碎我的内脏。兰道尔很快就会到的,还有[%]也一定如影随形。
那些人说我不应该为了荣誉而做这行，但那是纯粹的胡说八道。这都是荣耀，不论每分每秒。当我把一个目标打倒的时候，这消息会是那些批评家或把我当小孩推来推去乱搞的混蛋们脑子里一颗子弹。 而我现在就想追上他们中的一些。
不过，老爹说得对---我就是个懦夫。我一直假装勇敢，这几乎让我自己都深信不疑，但我心中知道真相。人们在害怕我，但如果他们知道我是什么，我做过些什么，他们可能会嘲笑我。 我想如果你杀了足够多的流浪汉和不法分子，人们就会想当然地认为你是一个勇敢的人，或者只是一个普通的疯子。
苏珊告诉过我，到这里来是愚蠢的，而且她可能是对的。她总是那个聪明的家伙。我想知道她为什么和我在一起这么久。她和那个新欢在一起似乎很开心。我猜啊，她只是在等我下次失望罢了。很高兴最后一次见到她。
去他妈的日记！ 我他妈的为什么要写这些垃圾。
"为了提醒你，你自己是什么，来保持行动," 那声音说道. 操你妈的. 我都他妈的做这件事超过十年了,我知道怎么完成自己的工作。马尔科只是个杀手罢了，就像那些其他垃圾一样.
"他会杀了你的。" 我再去你妈的. 我杀过军团士兵，变态狂，持枪劫匪，那些所有你想象不到的邪恶的东西。我要把那个马尔科的头割下来，像个痰盂一样踢到那个垃圾镇的大街上。
"你在害怕。" 不吹不黑，我是很怕。但这并不意味着我必须做个胆小鬼。更让我害怕的是被人遗忘。马尔科死后，我将会成为一个传奇。你明白吗，你这愚蠢的混蛋？
这会是正常人在日记里写的东西吗？该死的，我的脚在这间冰冷的破屋子里已经冻得麻木了。我发现这房子被遗弃了，但我想呆在这总比呆在城里要好。我不知道马尔科的口袋里有多少傻瓜手下。但我不得不承认这些山有一种不可描述的吓人的美，不过也只是分散了人们对周围真正危险的集中罢了。不法之徒，狗杂种，食人族，各种奇怪的东西。我为什么来这破地方？
"为了荣誉，你这傻逼。" 你说得对，我也这么觉得。 光是这个理由对我而言就足够了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hunter's Diary Part 2
ESP.TRADUIT: 猎人日记 第二部分

ESP.ORIGINAL: Frosthill is an odd little town. I was asking around for information on Marko, hoping to pick up a lead, as it seems he's hiding in the hills somewhere.
ESP.TRADUIT: 霜地是个奇怪的小镇。 我在四处打听马尔科的情况，希望能找到线索，因为他好像就藏在山上的某个地方。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Bounty
ESP.TRADUIT: 赏金通缉

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Residents of the Wasteland!
Let it be known that a private bounty is now available to any person capable of killing [%], also known as "Courier Six", who is charged with countless, injurious offenses to multiple parties. The details on the target are as follows:
Name: [%] Sex: &PCSex; Race: &PCRace;
[%] should be considered armed and extremely dangerous.
Submit proof of [%]'s death (a severed head or finger) to Walter M黮ler and earn a reward of 25,000 caps, or an equivalent sum in the currency of your choice.
ESP.TRADUIT:
至废土居民们！
众所周知，现在，任何能够杀死[%]的人（也称为"第六号邮差"）都可以获得私人赏金，他被指控对多个组织进行无数次伤害性犯罪。 目标的详细信息如下：
姓名: [%] 性别: &PCSex; 种族: &PCRace;
[%]应当被认为是持械并极度危险的
将能够证明[%]死亡的证据(断头或者手指)提交给沃尔特 米勒上校的人将会获得25，000瓶盖的奖励，或您选择的货币的等值金额。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's going on?
ESP.TRADUIT: 发生了什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Garza,
Where the fuck is Marko? We're getting picked apart by goddamn bounty hunters and he's off hiding in the fucking hills like some hermit. We gotta get organized, or pretty soon Randall and his gunmen are going to hunt us all down like animals.
How fucked up is this? He tells us to "Stay put" and then disappears without a word. I'm not saying we should go against his instructions, but I don't like sitting around and waiting to have my finger chopped off. We've got to take the fight to the bounty hunters at some point. I'll keep in touch.
- Ingram
ESP.TRADUIT:
加尔萨，
马尔科那鸡巴他妈的跑到哪里去了? 我们被那该死的赏金猎人隔离开了，而他像隐士一样躲在那傻逼山林中。我们必须赶快组织起来，不然兰道尔和他的枪手们会马上像秋季狩猎动物一样狩猎我们。
这他妈是怎么搞的？他叫我们“呆在原地不要走动”（我去买个橘子），然后就一言不发地消失了。我不是说我们应该违背他的指示，但老子可不喜欢坐在那里等我的手指被一根一根砍掉。我们必须在某个时候和那个傻逼赏金猎人交手。我会保持联系的。
- 英格拉姆

ESP.ORIGINAL: Forthcoming Developments
ESP.TRADUIT: 即将到来的事态发展

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Ford,
I'm going to bury Randall myself, so I'm counting on you to keep that crew under control until the other half of Brookshire's bounty gets here. They can cut loose for a few days, but don't let them vandalize the shops or any other property. Miners and settlers will be making their way into town soon, and I don't want to waste resources cleaning up the place.
Python has agreed to hire all of the hunters to act as temporary security until things are stabilized. With Glanton out of the picture, this means we'll have to keep pressure on the 80's to the north. It also means there's big potential for added income.
You showed me something, and I have high hopes for you here. Randall didn't recognize your potential, but I do. Stay focused and you'll go far.
- Marko
P.S. If there is any sort of emergency, send a runner to the old graveyard.
ESP.TRADUIT:
福特，
我要亲手埋葬兰道尔，所以我希望你要在布鲁克希尔的另一夥赏金猎人到来之前控制住那些人。他们可以放松几天，但不要让他们破坏商店或任何其他财产。矿工和定居者很快就会进城，我不想浪费资源来清理这个地方。
蟒蛇公司已经同意雇佣所有的猎人作为他们的临时保安，直到事情稳定下来。格兰顿不在，这意味着我们将不得不对北部的80年代帮（the 80‘s)保持压力。 这也意味着增加收入的潜力很大。
你让我看了一些实力，我对你有很高的期望。兰道尔不认同你的潜力，但我会的。保持专注，你会走得更远。
- 马尔科
P.S. 如果有什么紧急情况，派一个跑得快的人赶去旧墓地。

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's Over
ESP.TRADUIT: 结束了

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Half the men walked out last night, the other half are just waiting for an opportunity to split. All those years working for Marko amounted to nothing, I guess. Bastard has left us to the mercy of [%] and Randall. After they find me, I figure the boys will take it as a cue to get out while they can. There's nothing left for us here.
Dad always said I'd end up a loser if I left home. Maybe I should have stayed on the farm after all.
ESP.TRADUIT:
昨晚有一半的人走了出去，而另一半则在等待机会分散开来。我想，为马尔科工作的那些年都没有什么意义。那个混蛋把我们交给了[%]和兰道尔，任其摆布。在他们找到我后，我想那些小子们会把它当作一个线索，趁他们能出去的时候出去。我们这里已经什么都不会剩下了。
爸爸总是说如果我离开家，我会成为一个失败者。也许我真应该待在农场里。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Express Delivery
ESP.TRADUIT: 快递！

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Some guy up north paid double to get that package to the bigwigs down in Vegas, so don't stop unless absolutely necessary. Go straight to the delivery point.
-Billy
ESP.TRADUIT:
北方的某个家伙付了双倍的钱把这个包裹送到维加斯的大人物手里，所以除非无法避免的情况，否则不要停下来。直接去送货点。
-比利

ESP.TRADUIT: 是的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: How about a shot of whiskey to get that fucking chill out of you? First one is on the house. Lori can also offer you snatch at a reasonable rate.
ESP.TRADUIT: 喝杯威士忌让你冷静下来怎么样？第一个家伙在房子里。而洛里也可以以一个合理的价格提供服务。
