ESP.TRADUIT: 我能为你做什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Big Tim Matheson [04035DD7] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaFrosthil_GREETING_0003F66B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hello, welcome to Frosthill! I am Brian Jeffers, mayor of this fine town, now serving in my third term. It's a really exciting time to be here!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你好，欢迎来到霜地！我是布莱恩·杰弗斯，这个美丽小镇的市长，现在我第三个任期了。身处此地真是令人兴奋啊！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brian Jeffers [04037175] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaFrosthil_GREETING_0003FC78_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whatever or whoever brought you here, just know that you're welcome to trade, so long as you follow a few rules.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管是谁带你来的，只要你遵守一些规则，你就是受欢迎的顾客。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brian Jeffers [04037175] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaFrosthil_GREETING_0003FC78_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Violence that falls outside the scope of equitable self-defense will result in immediate banishment from the canyon, with no exceptions.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不属于公平自卫范围的暴力行为将导致立即被驱逐出峡谷，没有例外！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brian Jeffers [04037175] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaFrosthil_GREETING_0003FC78_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: With that out of the way, would you mind if I inquire into your business in Frosthill? Perhaps I can be of assistance.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别这样，我可以问问你在霜地的生意吗？也许我可以帮忙。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Admiring our handiwork?
ESP.TRADUIT: 来欣赏我们的手艺？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Thorne [04066FDF] (mod) Quest : ([0400FCB7]aaNVB3Main02) Devil's Due EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaThorneVoiceType\aaNVB3Main02_GREETING_00066FE1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thanks for rounding 'em up like that. Makes it easier for us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢你那样把他们耍的团团转。这让我们好过多了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Thorne [04066FDF] (mod) Quest : ([0400FCB7]aaNVB3Main02) Devil's Due EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaThorneVoiceType\aaNVB3Main02_GREETING_00066FE2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Gonna get a nice payday from this bunch.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你会从这帮人身上得到不错的薪水。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Thorne [04066FDF] (mod) Quest : ([0400FCB7]aaNVB3Main02) Devil's Due EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaThorneVoiceType\aaNVB3Main02_GREETING_00066FE3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Need something?
ESP.TRADUIT: 需要什么吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jill [0400469F] (mod) Quest : ([04000DBC]aaNVB3Main01) The City of Woe EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: You looking for a good time? Hundred caps will get you an hour.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在找乐子吗？一百瓶盖能让你爽一小时。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jill [0400469F] (mod) Quest : ([04000DBC]aaNVB3Main01) The City of Woe EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Main01.JillGreeted to 2
You again? Look, I'm working, so either show caps or walk the fuck on.
ESP.TRADUIT: 又是你？如你所见，我正在忙，所以要么掏点瓶盖要么他妈的滚出去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jill [0400469F] (mod) Quest : ([04000DBC]aaNVB3Main01) The City of Woe EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: One of my favorite customers. Back for another romp?
ESP.TRADUIT: 最喜欢的顾客之一。又回来玩了？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jill [0400469F] (mod) Quest : ([04000DBC]aaNVB3Main01) The City of Woe EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: I said I'd get help, and I'm doing it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我说过我会帮忙，而且我正在这样做。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jill [0400469F] (mod) Quest : ([04000DBC]aaNVB3Main01) The City of Woe EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thanks again for your help.
ESP.TRADUIT: 再次感谢你的帮助。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jill [0400469F] (mod) Quest : ([04000DBC]aaNVB3Main01) The City of Woe EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can I help you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 需要帮忙吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dana Quigley [04005394] (mod) Quest : ([04000DBC]aaNVB3Main01) The City of Woe EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\FemaleAdult01Default\aaNVB3Main01_GREETING_00006AB7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank you for everything.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢你做的一切。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dana Quigley [04005394] (mod) Quest : ([04000DBC]aaNVB3Main01) The City of Woe EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\FemaleAdult01Default\aaNVB3Main01_GREETING_00006AC9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank you for everything.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢你做的一切。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dana Quigley [04005394] (mod) Quest : ([04000DBC]aaNVB3Main01) The City of Woe EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\FemaleAdult01Default\aaNVB3Main01_GREETING_00006ACF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You'll always be welcome in our home.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们的家将永远欢迎您。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dana Quigley [04005394] (mod) Quest : ([04000DBC]aaNVB3Main01) The City of Woe EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\FemaleAdult01Default\aaNVB3Main01_GREETING_00006ACA_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You'll always be welcome in our home.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们的家将永远欢迎您。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dana Quigley [04005394] (mod) Quest : ([04000DBC]aaNVB3Main01) The City of Woe EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\FemaleAdult01Default\aaNVB3Main01_GREETING_00006AD0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Fearful}We're always happy to see you!
ESP.TRADUIT: {恐惧的}我们很高兴见到您！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dana Quigley [04005394] (mod) Quest : ([04000DBC]aaNVB3Main01) The City of Woe EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\FemaleAdult01Default\aaNVB3Main01_GREETING_00006ACB_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just leave.
ESP.TRADUIT: 走吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dana Quigley [04005394] (mod) Quest : ([04000DBC]aaNVB3Main01) The City of Woe EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\FemaleAdult01Default\aaNVB3Main01_GREETING_00006AD4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Get out!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dana Quigley [04005394] (mod) Quest : ([04000DBC]aaNVB3Main01) The City of Woe EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\FemaleAdult01Default\aaNVB3Main01_GREETING_00006AD5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've got some nerve showing your face here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的蠢脸在这里有些紧张不安。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dana Quigley [04005394] (mod) Quest : ([04000DBC]aaNVB3Main01) The City of Woe EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\FemaleAdult01Default\aaNVB3Main01_GREETING_00006AD6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Please, please don't tell anyone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 求求你了，请你不要告诉任何人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dana Quigley [04005394] (mod) Quest : ([04000DBC]aaNVB3Main01) The City of Woe EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\FemaleAdult01Default\aaNVB3Main01_GREETING_00006ADB_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What is it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQuest_GREETING_000010A5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Seen the light yet? This place is starting to really lose its luster.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你看到极光了吗？这个地方真的开始失去光彩了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQuest_GREETING_000010C6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This place doesn't look like much, does it? I didn't believe this was Randall's old joint until I checked inside.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这地方看起来可真不怎么样啊，不是么？直到我进去检查，我才相信这是兰道尔的旧同盟会。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQuest_GREETING_000010AA_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Shame that's it's been left abandoned. That painting is something to see.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那幅画真的值得一看。只可惜它已经遗失了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQuest_GREETING_000010AA_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaVirgilQuest.Greeted to 0
Yes?
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQuest_GREETING_000010CA_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes?
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的？

ESP.TRADUIT: 是的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes?
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes?
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQuest_GREETING_00006AEA_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes?
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQuest_GREETING_00008890_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes?
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQuest_GREETING_00008891_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This nice little cavern is the temporary home of one Marcus Scribonius Libo Drusus, an important man given his responsibility: slaves.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个漂亮的小洞穴是马库斯 斯克里博尼乌斯 立波 德鲁苏斯的临时住所，他可是个重要的人物，因为他被赋予了自己的职责：交易奴隶。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQuest_GREETING_00006EC2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Unbeknownst to his comrades, Drusus has been engaged with... unsavory elements who happen to be in the employ of Marko.
ESP.TRADUIT: 而他的同志们不为人知的是，德鲁索斯一直与...那些刚好在马尔科手底下工作的不愉快的人交往。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQuest_GREETING_00006EC2_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Lining your pockets is a capital offense in Caesar's Legion... along with everything else, but corruption makes it... more capital?
ESP.TRADUIT: 在凯撒军团里，在口袋里做内层可是死罪。。。这与其他一切规章一样，但也许是腐败使它。。。更加的致死？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQuest_GREETING_00006EC2_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Recently Drusus has had second thoughts about his past exchanges, so it's high time he's reminded of his obligations.
ESP.TRADUIT: 最近德鲁索斯对他过去的交易有了新的想法，所以现在是他提醒自己的义务的时候了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQuest_GREETING_00006EC2_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaNVB3Main01 50 set aaVirgilQuest.Greeted to 0 aaLPExtDoorREF.unlock
This fine residence is the home of Dana Quigley, widow of the late Tom Quigley. You remember him, right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这座漂亮的住宅是已故汤姆·奎格利的遗孀达娜·奎格利的家。你还记得他吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQuest_GREETING_00006AA7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Though an inveterate womanizer and a madman, Ranger Quigley still sent proceeds from his caravan robberies to his family.
ESP.TRADUIT: 尽管奎格利是一个根深蒂固的女拳主义和疯子，但他仍然把从商队抢劫所得的钱寄给了他的家人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQuest_GREETING_00006AA7_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: When his mischief caught up with him, Mrs. Quigley found herself destitute, and struggled to provide for three children.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当他的恶报终于到来时，奎格利太太发现自己一贫如洗，必须挣扎着养活三个孩子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQuest_GREETING_00006AA7_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: On the verge of starvation and homelessness, Mrs. Quigley soon received an offer from a... businessman.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在饥饿和无家可归的边缘，奎格利夫人很快收到了一个机会...从商人那里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQuest_GREETING_00006AA7_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: In exchange for a hefty sum, he would seize Mrs. Quigley's daughter and sell her to Caesar's Legion. She accepted the offer.
ESP.TRADUIT: 为了换取一大笔钱，他会拖走奎格利夫人的女儿，把她卖给凯撒军团。但她还是接受了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQuest_GREETING_00006AA7_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: While the initial windfall tided them over for a spell, the Quigley residence has fallen on hard times once again. Crop failures and what not.
ESP.TRADUIT: 虽然最初的意外之财让她们度过了一段时间，但奎格利一家再次陷入困境。庄稼歉收还有一堆不好的事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQuest_GREETING_00006AA7_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Already maddened with regret over her daughter's fate, now Mrs. Quigley must decide how to proceed. Sell the farm? Prostitute herself? Sell a child?
ESP.TRADUIT: 奎格利太太已经为她女儿的命运而懊悔不已，但现在她必须决定如何继续下去。卖掉农场？卖淫？还是继续卖孩子？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQuest_GREETING_00006AA7_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The dilemmas of the wasteland. Why don't we pay her a visit? You should have plenty to talk about.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这就是废土的困境。我们为什么不去看望她？你应该有很多话要说吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQuest_GREETING_00006AA7_8.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaVirgilQuest.Greeted to 0 aaVirgilREF.evp aaQuigleyHouseDoor01REF.unlock aaQuigleyHouseDoor02REF.unlock
{Deep breath through nose}Ah... urine, feces, vomit... that's the intoxicating aroma of Freeside. It's like smelling... hopelessness.
ESP.TRADUIT: {通过鼻子深呼吸}啊。。。尿液，粪便，呕吐物。。。那是自由之城令人陶醉的香味。就像闻到。。。绝望。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQuest_GREETING_0000469C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you're wondering, this fine establishment is known as Karl's Kandy, with a K. Unfortunately, they do not offer confectionaries.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你真的想知道，这个很好的机构被称为卡尔的甜蜜（Karl's Kandy)，带有K.。不过不幸的是，他们可不提供糖果。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQuest_GREETING_0000469C_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, Karl's is just one of many brothels in Freeside, but it should interest you for at least one reason... no, not that one!
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，卡尔的那个只是自由之城众多妓院之一，但它也至少有一个原因能让你感兴趣。。。不，不是那个！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQuest_GREETING_0000469C_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That comely young lady soliciting her services on the corner is known as Jill. Apparently, she's the daughter of the late Charlie Half-Cock.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那个在街角招揽服务的漂亮小姐叫吉尔。显然，她是已故查理 哈普科克的女儿。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQuest_GREETING_0000469C_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: See, Charlie's mercenary work provided for his daughter after his wife left him. With a name like half-cock, you can imagine why she left.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你瞧，查理的佣兵工作是在他妻子离开他后为了供养他女儿才开始的。他有个叫“断鸡鸡”的名字，你可以想象她为什么离开。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQuest_GREETING_0000469C_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Single father with half a penis and a powerful rifle, what a story! But then he met you. His kid? Orphaned.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个单身父亲只有半个阳具和一把强而有力的步枪，真像是个故事啊，对吧！但后来他遇到了你。而他的孩子呢？已经是孤儿了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQuest_GREETING_0000469C_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Though only at the tender age of sixteen, Jill took it upon herself to make her way in the Mojave.
ESP.TRADUIT: 尽管吉尔只有16岁，但她还是勇敢地踏上了她自己的莫哈维之路。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQuest_GREETING_0000469C_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: With few marketable skills, Jill was soon forced to rely on her most valuable asset - her body. Karl quickly scooped her up and made her his own.
ESP.TRADUIT: 由于没有什么市场化的技能，吉尔很快就不得不依靠她最宝贵的资产——她的身体。卡尔很快把她禁锢起来，让她变成他独享的东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQuest_GREETING_0000469C_8.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But it doesn't end there, friend. Karl doesn't just pimp out girls - he makes them utterly dependent through chem abuse.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但这并没有结束，朋友。卡尔不只是拉皮条，让女孩们去接客-他还让她们完全对毒品上瘾，那些该死的化学用品。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQuest_GREETING_0000469C_9.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Pretty soon Jill was strung out on Jet, and completely broke. She became de facto property of Karl.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很快吉尔就被杰特完全拴住了，完全破产。于是她就成了卡尔事实上的财产。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQuest_GREETING_0000469C_10.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Coincidentally, I have to deliver some news to Karl, so we can kill two perverts with one stone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真巧啊，我得给卡尔送点消息，这样我们就可以一石二鸟地杀死那个变态了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQuest_GREETING_0000469C_11.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You better lead the way, though. My rugged looks are simply magnetic to females, and I don't want to be swarmed by hussies.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过，你最好来带路。我想我那粗犷的外表对女性来说简直是有太有吸引力了，我可不想被小姑娘们团团围住。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQuest_GREETING_0000469C_12.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaVirgilQuest.Greeted to 0 setstage aaNVB3Main01 35 aaVirgilREF.evp set aaNVB3Main01.JillGreeted to 1 aaKarlExtDoorREF.unlock
I just love a quick jaunt through the ruins of a dead city, makes me feel... privileged to be alive. Maybe that's just me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我只是喜欢在一座死城的废墟中快速旅行，让我感觉。。。活着真好。也许也只有我会这么想吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQuest_GREETING_00003B09_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I suppose we should make our way to Troy now. Seeing as to how you're a{rough tone to mock player} famous, cold-blooded, god-fearing bounty hunter, I'll follow your lead.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想我们现在应该去找特洛伊。既然你是一个{用嘲弄邮差的粗野腔调}著名的，冷血的，连神鬼都怕的赏金猎人，我就跟着你走。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQuest_GREETING_00003B09_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: One thing, though - please don't cut off random fingers in hopes of collecting a reward. After you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过，有一件事-请不要为了获得奖励而随意剪掉他们的手指。你先走。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQuest_GREETING_00003B09_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaVirgilQuest.Greeted to 0 setstage aaNVB3Main01 25 aaVirgilRef.evp aaTroyHideoutExtDoorREF.unlock
Ah, you made it. The Fiends really know how to make a neighborhood their own, don't they?
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，你成功了！那些恶魔帮真的知道如何让一个社区变成他们的据点，不是吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQuest_GREETING_000013B2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Speaking of Fiends, you remember Eileen, right? Slightly unbalanced gal who liked to sever men's genitalia? Yeah, hard to forget.
ESP.TRADUIT: 说到恶魔帮，你还记得艾琳吧？那个心理有点不平衡的婊子是不是喜欢割断男人的肉棒？是啊，真的很难让人忘记。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQuest_GREETING_000013B2_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Way back when you knocked her off, NCR started telling people that it was finally safe to start moving in around here, due to law and order.
ESP.TRADUIT: 早在你把她干掉的时候，NCR就开始告诉人们，由于法律和秩序的原因，搬到这里来会是安全的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQuest_GREETING_000013B2_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, as you can probably know, the Fiends were a bit more resilient than they'd expected. Oh, and it turns out Eileen wasn't even the worst one.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，正如你可能知道的，恶魔帮比他们预期的更有弹性。哦，事实证明，艾琳甚至不是最糟糕的一个。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQuest_GREETING_000013B2_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Actually, she kept some of the more savage elements in line with the threat of emasculation. What a word, emasculation! Shout it to the heavens!
ESP.TRADUIT: 事实上，她保留了一些更野蛮的元素，以配合她阉割他人的威胁。多好的一个词啊，阉割！让我们向极乐世界呐喊一声！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQuest_GREETING_000013B2_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: After you disposed of Eileen, a nice gentleman named Troy took over her crew. He was no power player, but he certainly left his mark.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在你抛弃艾琳的尸体之后，一个叫特洛伊的绅士接管了她的手下。他不是强者，但他确实留下了印记。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQuest_GREETING_000013B2_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: See, Troy was a chronic rapist, even worse than old Cook-Cook. Not long after the Owen family moved in here, Troy paid them a visit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 瞧瞧，特洛伊是个长期强奸犯，甚至比那个老"大厨"还要坏。欧文一家刚搬来不久，特洛伊就袭击了他们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQuest_GREETING_000013B2_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's go inside and see his handiwork, shall we?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们进去看看他的“手工艺品”，怎么样？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQuest_GREETING_000013B2_8.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaVirgilQuest.Greeted to 0 setstage aaNVB3Main01 15 aaVirgilRef.evp aaMain01AbandonedHouseDoorREF.unlock showmessage aaVirgilTravelHouseMessage aaVirgilREF.moveto aaVirgilSpeechMarkerREF
Yes?
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQuest_GREETING_000010A8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Exaggerated Western accent to mock player}And that's how it's done, partner!
ESP.TRADUIT: {用夸张的西方口音来嘲笑邮差}这就是他的做法，伙伴！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQuest_GREETING_00003DFC_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You showed patience, but didn't hesitate when it was time to act. Well done.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不但表现出了耐心，而且在该采取行动的时候毫不犹豫。做得好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just one more stop and then we can begin the great trek. There's a little homestead I want you to see first, though. Here's the spot on your map.
ESP.TRADUIT: 再停一站，我们就可以开始伟大的跋涉了。不过，我想让你先看看一个小基地。这是你地图上的位置。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQuest_GREETING_00003DFC_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaVirgilQuest.KarlKilled to 2 setstage aaNVB3Main01 40 set aaVirgilQuest.Greeted to 40 showmessage aaVirgilTravel04Message aaVirgilREF.moveto aaWaitQuigleyMarkerREF
Gosh, you really have no respect for the power of presentation, do you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 天哪，你真的不尊重展示出来的力量，是吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQuest_GREETING_0000539C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If I don't deliver my fearsome monologues, this whole legend thing withers and dies. Marko would be rather displeased by that prospect.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我不发表我可怕的独白，整个传奇故事都会枯萎和死亡的。马尔科对这种前景可是相当不满。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: Next time, would you please be so kind as to wait for my cue? Thanks.
ESP.TRADUIT: 下次，能请你等到我的提示再动吗？谢谢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQuest_GREETING_0000539C_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just one more stop and then we can begin the great trek. There's a little homestead I want you to see first, though. Here's the spot on your map.
ESP.TRADUIT: 再停一站，我们就可以开始伟大的跋涉了。不过，我想让你先看看一个小基地。这是你地图上的位置。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQuest_GREETING_0000539C_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaVirgilQuest.KarlKilled to 2 setstage aaNVB3Main01 40 set aaVirgilQuest.Greeted to 40 showmessage aaVirgilTravel04Message aaVirgilREF.moveto aaWaitQuigleyMarkerREF
Bravo, bravo!
ESP.TRADUIT: 干得好，干得好！（Bravo, bravo!）
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQuest_GREETING_00005032_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: When Marko told me to bring you, I told him... well, I thought that it was crazy, but you know... he was right. You're a real killer.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当马尔科叫我带你来的时候，我告诉他...好吧，我以为这很疯狂，但你知道...他是对的。你可真是个杀手。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: Next stop: Freeside. We get to take in the splendor of Vegas' grand cesspool. I'll see you there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 下一站：自由之城！我们可以在那领略新维加斯最壮观的污水池。到时候见。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQuest_GREETING_00005032_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaVirgilRef.playidle LooseBDayClapCheerB
set aaVirgilQuest.TroyKilled to 2 setstage aaNVB3Main01 30 set aaVirgilQuest.Greeted to 30 showmessage aaVirgilTravel03Message aaVirgilREF.moveto aaWaitFreesideMarkerREF
Next time, could please wait until I've finished my speech? Marko likes it when we scare them first. Reputation, you know?
ESP.TRADUIT: 下次，请等我讲完再说好吗？马尔科喜欢我们先吓唬住他们。这可是名声！你知道吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQuest_GREETING_00003DFD_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Regardless, he's dead, so... good work? What do the bounty people normally say when you bring them rotting fingers? Actually, I don't want to know.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管怎样，他死了，所以。。。我猜干得不错？当你把腐烂的手指带给那些赏金猎人时，他们通常会怎么说？得了吧，我不想知道。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQuest_GREETING_00003DFD_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Next stop: Freeside. We get to take in the splendor of Vegas' grand cesspool. I'll see you there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 下一站：自由之城！我们可以在那领略新维加斯最壮观的污水池。到时候见。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaVirgilQuest.TroyKilled to 2 setstage aaNVB3Main01 30 set aaVirgilQuest.Greeted to 30 showmessage aaVirgilTravel03Message aaVirgilREF.moveto aaWaitFreesideMarkerREF
Did it burn you up having to lie to her like that? Maybe it was natural for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你非得那样对她撒谎不可吗？也许这对你来说是很自然的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQuest_GREETING_00006AE4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You can tell yourself that she's got the caps, so it makes things right... but deep down that demon whispers the truth: you caused this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你可以告诉你自己她已经有瓶盖了，所以这让事情变得正确。。。但在内心深处，恶魔低语着真相：这些都是你造成的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQuest_GREETING_00006AE4_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Try to bury it, suppress it all you want. Everything you've done comes back to you in the end.
ESP.TRADUIT: 试着埋葬它吧，压抑它会是你想要的一切。你所做的一切最终都会回到你身边，所谓的因果报应。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQuest_GREETING_00006AE4_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If all my pestering is starting to bother you, take heart - we're nearing the end of the line.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我所有的纠缠开始困扰到你了，振作起来吧-我们快到终点了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQuest_GREETING_00006AE4_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We've got a date with some fancy Legionary near Cottonwood Cove. See you there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们和棉花丛台地附近的优秀军团士兵可有个约会。到那再见，邮差。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQuest_GREETING_00006AE4_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaNVB3Main01 48
200 caps? Now that's cruel. Just enough to give an iota of hope, but it can't even buy a threesome in Freeside. Well, maybe if it's happy hour.
ESP.TRADUIT: 才200瓶盖？现在来看这也太残忍了。这只够给人一点希望，甚至在自由之城都买不到一次三P。好吧，如果是欢乐时光的话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQuest_GREETING_00006AE5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You can tell yourself that she's got the caps, so it makes things right... but deep down that demon whispers the truth: you caused this, Courier.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你可以告诉你自己她已经有瓶盖了，所以这让事情变得正确。。。但在内心深处，恶魔低语着真相：这些都是你造成的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQuest_GREETING_00006AE5_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Try to bury it, suppress it all you want. Everything you've done comes back to you in the end.
ESP.TRADUIT: 试着埋葬它吧，压抑它会是你想要的一切。你所做的一切最终都会回到你身边，所谓的因果报应。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQuest_GREETING_00006AE5_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If all my pestering is starting to bother you, take heart - we're nearing the end of the line.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我所有的纠缠开始困扰到你了，振作起来吧-我们快到终点了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQuest_GREETING_00006AE5_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We've got a date with some fancy Legionary near Cottonwood Cove. See you there, Courier.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们和棉花丛台地附近的优秀军团士兵可有个约会。到那再见，邮差。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQuest_GREETING_00006AE5_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaNVB3Main01 48 showmessage aaVirgilTravel05Message aaVirgilREF.moveto aaWaitCottonwoodMarkerREF
Using fear to do good... I can almost get behind that. I never realized how important inflection is to get the full effect. I'll work on that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 用恐惧来做好事。。。我几乎可以做到这一点。但我从未意识到突然转折对于获得完整的效果有多重要。我会努力的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQuest_GREETING_00006AE6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You can tell yourself that she's got the caps, so it makes things right... but deep down that demon whispers the truth: you caused this, Courier.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你可以告诉你自己她已经有瓶盖了，所以这让事情变得正确。。。但在内心深处，恶魔低语着真相：这些都是你造成的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQuest_GREETING_00006AE6_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Try to bury it, suppress it all you want. Everything you've done comes back to you in the end.
ESP.TRADUIT: 试着埋葬它吧，压抑它会是你想要的一切。你所做的一切最终都会回到你身边，所谓的因果报应。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQuest_GREETING_00006AE6_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If all my pestering is starting to bother you, take heart - we're nearing the end of the line.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我所有的纠缠开始困扰到你了，振作起来吧-我们快到终点了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQuest_GREETING_00006AE6_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We've got a date with some fancy Legionary near Cottonwood Cove. See you there, Courier.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们和棉花丛台地附近的优秀军团士兵可有个约会。到那再见，邮差。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQuest_GREETING_00006AE6_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaNVB3Main01 48 showmessage aaVirgilTravel05Message aaVirgilREF.moveto aaWaitCottonwoodMarkerREF
You're either principled to a fault or a simpleton, though those often overlap. You should've seen her face! You get points for pure balls.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你要么是原则性的错误，要么是耍宝，尽管你常常两边都不落下。你应该看看她的脸！为你的混蛋行为感到自责。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQuest_GREETING_00006AE7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now that she's broke and destined for some type of damnable existence, do you feel the tiniest bit of responsibility?
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在她彻底破产了，注定要有一种他妈的可悲的生活，你不觉得你自己有一点点责任吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQuest_GREETING_00006AE7_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Try to bury it, suppress it all you want. Everything you've done comes back to you in the end.
ESP.TRADUIT: 试着埋葬它吧，压抑它会是你想要的一切。你所做的一切最终都会回到你身边，所谓的因果报应。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQuest_GREETING_00006AE7_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If all my pestering is starting to bother you, take heart - we're nearing the end of the line.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我所有的纠缠开始困扰到你了，振作起来吧-我们快到终点了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQuest_GREETING_00006AE7_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We've got a date with some fancy Legionary near Cottonwood Cove. See you there, Courier.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们和棉花丛台地附近的优秀军团士兵可有个约会。到那再见，邮差。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQuest_GREETING_00006AE7_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaNVB3Main01 48 showmessage aaVirgilTravel05Message aaVirgilREF.moveto aaWaitCottonwoodMarkerREF
Wow, you actually surprised me that time. I am impressed. You have a cold, cold heart my friend. There's more to you than I realized.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哇，这次你真的让我吃惊啊。我印象深刻。你真的是非常非常冷血啊，我的朋友。你比我想象中的要更可怕。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQuest_GREETING_00006AE8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd ask if you feel responsible, but I know you don't care. She might as well be a pesky bug or some other insignificant creature.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想问你是否有责任感，但我知道你不在乎。她也可能是一只讨厌的虫子或其他无关紧要的畜生罢了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQuest_GREETING_00006AE8_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't like to issue predictions, but Marko might just have a use for you. Strange partnership it would be, but who's to say it wouldn't work?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不想发布预测，但马尔科可能会和你臭味相投。这将会是一种奇怪的伙伴关系，但谁会说它不起作用呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQuest_GREETING_00006AE8_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We've got a date with some fancy Legionary near Cottonwood Cove. See you there, Courier.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们和棉花丛台地附近的优秀军团士兵可有个约会。到那再见，邮差。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaNVB3Main01 48 showmessage aaVirgilTravel05Message aaVirgilREF.moveto aaWaitCottonwoodMarkerREF
Well, we made it. Don't you love that clean, mountain air. Breath it in, savor it! Do you have anything you want me to relay to Marko?
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好，我们成功了。你不喜欢那清新的山间空气吗。吸气吧，尽情享受吧！你有什么要我转告马尔科的吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQuest_GREETING_0004BB88_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaVirgilQuest.Greeted to 0
Requiescat in pace, Drusus. He couldn't accept the change rendered by his choices... now, where have I heard that before?
ESP.TRADUIT: 愿彼安息，德鲁索斯。他不能接受自己的选择所带来的改变。。。现在，我从哪里听说过来着？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQuest_GREETING_000085B0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you're poised to loose some witty retort or just good old-fashioned vitriol, save it for just a touch longer.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你准备用你的脑子做些机智的反驳或只是展示那些老套的尖酸刻薄的话，闭嘴，留着之后再多说一点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQuest_GREETING_000085B0_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: My business here is settled, so I must depart for Frosthill. If you wish to join me, go to the Northern Passage, and we'll make final preparations.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在这里的生意已经定下来了，所以我必须动身去霜地。如果你想和我一起去北方通道，我们会做最后的准备。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQuest_GREETING_000085B0_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, and please leave any accompanying rabble here in the Mojave. Marko instructed me to bring you, and no one else. See you there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，请把你随行的那群人留在莫哈维吧。马尔科只让我带你进来，别带别人来。之后再见。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQuest_GREETING_000085B0_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaNVB3Main01 60 aaVirgilREF.moveto aaCooperMojaveHomeMarkerREF showmessage aaVirgilTravel06Message
You know, if I knew that I caused this, even in a crazy, roundabout sort of way... that would just eat me up inside. Sort of awkward now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道，如果我知道这是我造成的，即使是以一种疯狂的，迂回的方式。。。那只让我的内在吞掉我。真他妈尴尬。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: What you got?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有什么想问的？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQuest_GREETING_0000FCD5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What is it, partner?
ESP.TRADUIT: 怎么了，搭档？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQuest_GREETING_0000FCD6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, hell fire! If it isn't my old protege, come up all the way from the Mojave Wasteland. You are a sight for sore eyes, old friend!
ESP.TRADUIT: 天哪，地狱之火啊！这不是我的老朋友么，从莫哈维废土一路走来。老朋友，你真是个令人眼痛的人！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQuest_GREETING_0000FCD7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How the hell are you? Took your sweet-ass time getting here, if I may say so.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你他妈的现在怎么样？如果我可以这么说的话，看来你花了不少时间才把你这小屁股挪过来的啊。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQuest_GREETING_0000FCD7_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRandallQuest.RandallGreeted to 0
Go on and meet up with me at the shack.
ESP.TRADUIT: 去小屋见我吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQuest_GREETING_000153F1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I got to get out of this goddamn cold! Freezing my nuts off...
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要离开这该死的冰冷！这他妈的要把我的蛋蛋都冻掉了。。。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQuest_GREETING_000153F2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I only have one question - are you willing to kill people for money?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我只有一个问题-你愿意为了钱杀人吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQuest_GREETING_000153F6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm just joshing you, partner. Had to ask... for old time's sake. Lord knows you've killed enough for the both of us, and then some.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我只是在和你开玩笑，伙计。不得不问。。。看在过去的份上。主已经知道你为我们两个杀了足够多的人，而且还有一些要杀。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQuest_GREETING_000153F6_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I heard about you taking down Judge Richter, Red Bear and Sergio. Damn fine work by all accounts.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我听说你干掉了审判官里希特，红熊和塞尔吉奥。不管怎么说，干得都很好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQuest_GREETING_000153F6_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I know you might have a lot of different reasons for coming here, but I want you to know I appreciate it. Fact is I could use your help.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道你来这里可能有很多不同的原因，但我想让你知道我很感激。事实上我需要你的帮助。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQuest_GREETING_000153F6_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: My goal is to find Marko and kill the sonofabitch, plain and simple. We even got the NCR bankrolling us this time, thanks to Mr. Brookshire.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的目标是找到马尔科，杀死那个婊子养得混蛋，简单明了。这次我们甚至得到了NCR的资助，多亏了布鲁克希尔先生。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQuest_GREETING_000153F6_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Truth is that we're in a tight spot here. When Marko came to Frosthill he brought a passel of outlaws with him, all of them a rough bunch.
ESP.TRADUIT: 事实上我们现在处境很困难。当马尔科来到霜地时，他带来了一群不法之徒，而那些混蛋都是一群粗野的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQuest_GREETING_000153F6_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm talking about the hardest, meanest vermin west of the Mississipi, gathered over years of raiding. We ain't takin' no prisoners up here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我说的是密西西比州西部最艰苦，最卑鄙的害虫，这是经过数年的突击搜集而来的。 在这里我们并没有俘虏到任何人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQuest_GREETING_000153F6_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's gonna be sort of like what we did back in Vegas, except this time we finish it... together. Marko has nowhere else to run now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就像我们在维加斯做的那样，除了这次我们是。。一起完成了。马尔科现在已经无处可逃了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQuest_GREETING_000153F6_8.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's gonna be tough, partner... and downright bloody. You let me know when you're ready to start, and I'll get you on track.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这会很艰难的，伙计。。。而且会完全是血腥的。你准备好开始的时候告诉我，我会让带你过去的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQuest_GREETING_000153F6_9.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd tell you not to distract me with questions, but I reckon that would be downright rude considering everything that's transpired.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我告诉过你不要用问题来分散我的注意力，但是考虑到所有发生的事情，我认为现在保持沉默是不礼貌的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQuest_GREETING_000153F6_10.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you're curious, ask away, so long as you don't keep me away from my typing for too long. I reckon somebody has to keep this outfit organized.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你好奇，请开口吧，只要你不让我花太多时间说话而不是打字。我想总得有人把这套衣服整理好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQuest_GREETING_000153F6_11.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRandallQuest.RandallGreeted to 0

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cunty McLean [04097DFF] (mod) Quest : ([0408572A]aaNVB3MiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : Courier [0407EDC7] (mod) Quest : ([0408572A]aaNVB3MiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : Courier [0407EDD0] (mod) Quest : ([0408572A]aaNVB3MiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : Courier [0407EDD7] (mod) Quest : ([0408572A]aaNVB3MiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have tracked you far, outlander. You're the one who walks and bears messages. Well, I have a message for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我已经追踪到你很远了，异乡人。你是那个走来走去传递信息的人。好吧，我有个口信给你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stone Fist [0407F46B] (mod) Quest : ([0408572A]aaNVB3MiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\NVDLC02WhiteLegsMale\aaNVB3Misc_GREETING_0007F46C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Today you answer for the death of Kicking Dog, my brother. When I have gouged the eyes from your skull, then he will be at rest.
ESP.TRADUIT: 今天你要为我好兄弟恶腿踢狗的死负责。他会安息的！当我把你该死的眼球全部从你的头骨上挖出来之后。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stone Fist [0407F46B] (mod) Quest : ([0408572A]aaNVB3MiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\NVDLC02WhiteLegsMale\aaNVB3Misc_GREETING_0007F46C_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Evolution.StoneFistGreeted to 1 setenemy aaStoneFistFaction playerfaction startcombat player

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stone Fist [0407F46B] (mod) Quest : ([0408572A]aaNVB3MiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: So you're the one. It wasn't easy finding you, but I did it just the same.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以你就是那个传闻中的人。找到你并不容易，但我依然做到了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Polly [0407F470] (mod) Quest : ([0408572A]aaNVB3MiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm saving my last bullet for me, but everything else is going into your stinking corpse!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在为我留下最后一颗子弹，但其他的一切都会倾泻到你的腐臭的尸体里面！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Polly [0407F470] (mod) Quest : ([0408572A]aaNVB3MiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Evolution.PollyGreeted to 1 setenemy aaPollyFaction playerfaction startcombat player
If it ain't the savior of Frosthill! You gonna watch while the rest of us get killed?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不是霜地的救世主吗！难道你要看着我们其他人被杀吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bobby Jammer [04081558] (mod) Quest : ([0408572A]aaNVB3MiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaBobbyJammerVoiceType\aaNVB3Misc_GREETING_0008155E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Heard you got your ass whooped by Marko.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听说你被马尔科打得屁滚尿流。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bobby Jammer [04081558] (mod) Quest : ([0408572A]aaNVB3MiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaBobbyJammerVoiceType\aaNVB3Misc_GREETING_0008155F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You ain't so tough. Heard you let all them people get butchered up in Utah. Fucking loser.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你也没那么强硬嘛。我听说你让犹他州的人都被杀了。你这该死的失败者。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bobby Jammer [04081558] (mod) Quest : ([0408572A]aaNVB3MiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaBobbyJammerVoiceType\aaNVB3Misc_GREETING_00081560_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Did you piss your pants when Marko killed all them folks in front of you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 当马尔科杀了你面前的所有人时你是不是尿裤子了？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bobby Jammer [04081558] (mod) Quest : ([0408572A]aaNVB3MiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaBobbyJammerVoiceType\aaNVB3Misc_GREETING_0008156A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How could you sit there and do nothing? I'd have done something, by God! I'd have put my foot up Marko's ass!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你怎么能只坐在那里什么也不做？我也至少会做点什么的，神啊！我会把我的脚放在马尔科的屁股上！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bobby Jammer [04081558] (mod) Quest : ([0408572A]aaNVB3MiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaBobbyJammerVoiceType\aaNVB3Misc_GREETING_0008156B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What you gonna do, stare me to death? Heard about you gettin your ass whipped up in Utah.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你要怎么做，瞪死我？我可听说你在犹他州被狠狠教训了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bobby Jammer [04081558] (mod) Quest : ([0408572A]aaNVB3MiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaBobbyJammerVoiceType\aaNVB3Misc_GREETING_00081561_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You don't scare me, cause you're nothing but a little bitch. You hear that? You're Marko's little bitch!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你可吓不到我，因为你只是个小婊子罢了。你听到了吗？你只是马尔科的臭婊子！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bobby Jammer [04081558] (mod) Quest : ([0408572A]aaNVB3MiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaBobbyJammerVoiceType\aaNVB3Misc_GREETING_00081569_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Welcome to the Mountain Warfare Training Center, Sir or Ma'am. Please state your branch of service.
ESP.TRADUIT: 欢迎来到山战训练中心，先生或女士。请说明你希望的服务。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private C. Luster [0409CFB6] (mod) Quest : ([0408572A]aaNVB3MiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaPvtClusterVoiceType\aaNVB3Misc_GREETING_0009CFB8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hello, sir or ma'am. How may I assist you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你好，先生或女士。我能为您效劳吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private C. Luster [0409CFB6] (mod) Quest : ([0408572A]aaNVB3MiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaPvtClusterVoiceType\aaNVB3Misc_GREETING_0009D651_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What'ya need there?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你需要些什么吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cocker [0409CF4C] (mod) Quest : ([0408572A]aaNVB3MiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaCockerVoiceType\aaNVB3Misc_GREETING_0009D655_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hello!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你好！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cutty [0409CF88] (mod) Quest : ([0408572A]aaNVB3MiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\CreatureLowIntSM\aaNVB3Misc_GREETING_0009D656_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It is good to see you! Thank you for what you did. I'm fitting in well up here, Marcus has been very friendly.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很高兴见到你！谢谢你所做的一切。我很适应这里，马库斯也很友好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Porter [040791E8] (mod) Quest : ([04041B05]aaMarkoDialogue) Marko's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\CreatureLowIntSM\aaMarkoDialogue_GREETING_000791EA_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Everyone is talking about what happened in Utah. I'm just glad to see you're okay. I hope to see you around!
ESP.TRADUIT: 每个人都在谈论犹他州发生的事。我真的很高兴看到你没事。希望能再次见面！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Porter [040791E8] (mod) Quest : ([04041B05]aaMarkoDialogue) Marko's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\CreatureLowIntSM\aaMarkoDialogue_GREETING_000791EA_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaMarkoDialogue.PorterGreeted to 1
Hello again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 又见面了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Porter [040791E8] (mod) Quest : ([04041B05]aaMarkoDialogue) Marko's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\CreatureLowIntSM\aaMarkoDialogue_GREETING_000791EC_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I came here looking for peace, and all I found was death! It's your fault! You are worse than the boss! I CRUSH YOU!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我来这里是为了寻求和平的，但我所看到的只有死亡！这都是你的错！你比头儿还坏！我会碾碎你的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Porter [040791E8] (mod) Quest : ([04041B05]aaMarkoDialogue) Marko's Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\CreatureLowIntSM\aaMarkoDialogue_GREETING_000791EB_1.ogg

My name's Ford. I am Randall's number one killer, just so you know. And who the hell are you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我叫福特。是兰道尔手下的头号杀手。那么你到底是谁？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Jackson, what are you doing out in this god-forsaken weather... hold on, who are you? What's your business here?

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Godwin [0406504C] (mod) Quest : ([04061050]aaNVB3Side01) The Long Arm EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleOld01\aaNVB3Side01_GREETING_00065D0E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're going to pay for this. I swear it.

ESP.ORIGINAL: And so the great hunter appears. I have I feeling that I'll be paying out a lot more bounties soon, seeing as to how you're around.
ESP.TRADUIT: 于是伟大的猎人出现了。我觉得我很快就会拿出更多的赏金，这就要看你在这周围干的事情了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brookshire [0402E666] (mod) Quest : ([04029364]aaHunterDialogue) Dialogue for Named Bounty Hunters EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaNVB3GenericVoiceType\aaHunterDialogue_GREETING_0002E689_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No... no goddamn way.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不。。。这他妈的不可能。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brookshire [0402E666] (mod) Quest : ([04029364]aaHunterDialogue) Dialogue for Named Bounty Hunters EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaNVB3GenericVoiceType\aaHunterDialogue_GREETING_00070327_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now, now, now before you do anything rash... think about where we are... and who I am. There will be consequences if you lose your cool.
ESP.TRADUIT: 此时此刻，在你做任何鲁莽的事之前...想想我们在哪里...我是谁。如果你失去冷静就会有严重后果。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brookshire [0402E666] (mod) Quest : ([04029364]aaHunterDialogue) Dialogue for Named Bounty Hunters EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaNVB3GenericVoiceType\aaHunterDialogue_GREETING_00070327_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There are big things about to happen, and I'll have a hand in them. Things that could change this war. I could get you on board, set you for life.
ESP.TRADUIT: 将会有大变动要发生了, 而我也会参与其中。那是能改变这场战争的东西。我可以让你也参与来求得生存。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brookshire [0402E666] (mod) Quest : ([04029364]aaHunterDialogue) Dialogue for Named Bounty Hunters EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaNVB3GenericVoiceType\aaHunterDialogue_GREETING_00070327_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What the fuck do you want?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你他妈到底想要什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bobby Harrison [0403F639] (mod) Quest : ([04029364]aaHunterDialogue) Dialogue for Named Bounty Hunters EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaBobbyHarrisonVoiceType\aaHunterDialogue_GREETING_0003F641_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And the dead shall rise and walk the earth. I wasn't sure if you'd make it, but here you are, on your feet no less.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个死人复活了，还在漫步大地。 我不确定你是否真的能做的到，但你现在就站在这儿，而且居然在慢慢恢复。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Thorne [0405C8F3] (mod) Quest : ([04029364]aaHunterDialogue) Dialogue for Named Bounty Hunters EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaThorneVoiceType\aaHunterDialogue_GREETING_0005DAC7_1.ogg

Hello

ESP.TRADUIT: 你怎么样？

ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿你好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQuest_HELLO_0001540C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ford, why the fuck are you hanging out in here? Can't you see I'm working?
ESP.TRADUIT: 福特，你他妈的为什么在这里闲逛？你没看见我在工作吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQuest_HELLO_0009CD4D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey, Ford, whatever you're thinking about saying, you just keep it to yourself. I don't want to hear that bullshit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿，福特，不管你想说什么，只管自己胡扯吧。我不想听那些废话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQuest_HELLO_0009CD4E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I swear to God, Ford, one of these days, I'm gonna have Cooper just bite your nuts straight off. That'll be a good fucking day.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我发誓，福特，总有一天，我会让库珀直接咬你的蛋蛋。那他妈的会是个最好的日子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQuest_HELLO_0009CD4F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You want to impress me, Ford? Quit hanging out in this damn shack, go out and there and collect some fingers from some of them outlaws and what not.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你想给我留下深刻印象吗，福特？别在这该死的小屋里闲逛了，滚到外面去，从那些不法之徒那里弄点指头来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQuest_HELLO_0009CD50_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ain't that the savior of Frosthill over there?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这不是那个霜地的救世主吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bobby Jammer [04081558] (mod) Quest : ([0408572A]aaNVB3MiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Shit, we got a genuine hero in Freeside! Better watch out or we'll all get killed!
ESP.TRADUIT: 妈的，自由之城有个真正的英雄！小心点，不然我们都会被杀的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bobby Jammer [04081558] (mod) Quest : ([0408572A]aaNVB3MiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's the one that shot Marko! Probably shot him in the back, wasn't nearly tough enough to face him down like a real fighter.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你就是那个开枪打了马尔科的人！你大概是从背后射中了他，因为你还不够坚强到像个真正的战士一样面对他。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bobby Jammer [04081558] (mod) Quest : ([0408572A]aaNVB3MiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey! Hey! I know who you are, loser! You're that bum who got whipped by Marko!
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿！嘿！我知道你是谁，失败者！你就是那个被马尔科打成屎的混蛋！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bobby Jammer [04081558] (mod) Quest : ([0408572A]aaNVB3MiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey! Anybody ever tell you that you're a giant pussy? Fucking coward!
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿！有人告诉过你你是个大傻逼吗？他妈的懦夫！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bobby Jammer [04081558] (mod) Quest : ([0408572A]aaNVB3MiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey there, Cutty, what'd you do with my smokes?
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿，卡蒂，你拿我的烟做什么了？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cocker [0409CF4C] (mod) Quest : ([0408572A]aaNVB3MiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaCockerVoiceType\aaNVB3MiscDialogue_HELLO_0009D657_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaCuttyREF.Say aaCuttySmokesUpAss
Cutty, why the fuck are you shufflin' around like that all the time? You're freaking me out!
ESP.TRADUIT: 卡蒂，你他妈的为什么老是这样混日子？你把我吓坏了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cocker [0409CF4C] (mod) Quest : ([0408572A]aaNVB3MiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\CreatureLowIntSM\aaNVB3MiscDialogue_HELLO_0009DCF0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaCuttyREF.Say aaCuttyShuffle
Hey, Cutty, after the shift you want to go get a drink?
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿，卡蒂，下班后你想去喝一杯吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cocker [0409CF4C] (mod) Quest : ([0408572A]aaNVB3MiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaCockerVoiceType\aaNVB3MiscDialogue_HELLO_0009DD10_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaCuttyREF.Say aaCuttyDrink
Sweet Christ in a handbasket, did you just shit yourself? You nasty fucking thing! God! <Coughing>
ESP.TRADUIT: 在手提篮里我的神啊，你刚刚是不是在你屁股后面拉出屎了？ 你这可恶的东西！ 神！ <咳嗽>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cocker [0409CF4C] (mod) Quest : ([0408572A]aaNVB3MiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaCockerVoiceType\aaNVB3MiscDialogue_HELLO_0009DD18_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaCuttyREF.Say aaCuttyFart
Cutty, if I'm not mistaken, I overheard you giving woman advice to that last guy in here. Tell me I'm wrong, please.
ESP.TRADUIT: 卡蒂，如果我没弄错的话，我无意中听到你给这里最后离开的男人提了女人的建议。请告诉我我错了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cocker [0409CF4C] (mod) Quest : ([0408572A]aaNVB3MiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaCockerVoiceType\aaNVB3MiscDialogue_HELLO_0009DD25_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaCuttyREF.Say aaCuttyWomanAdvice
All right, Cutty, what do you think about this Hoover Damn nonsense down in the Mojave? Who should win? Who's gonna win?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，卡蒂，你觉得在莫哈维的胡佛水坝的战乱怎么样？谁应该赢？谁会赢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cocker [0409CF4C] (mod) Quest : ([0408572A]aaNVB3MiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaCockerVoiceType\aaNVB3MiscDialogue_HELLO_000A1F11_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is so fucking amazing, I'm trading gear with the greatest bounty hunter in history!

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ford [0402856D] (mod) Quest : ([0406C066]aaFordQuest) Ford's Companion Quest EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaFordVoiceType\aaFordQuest_FollowersTrade_0006C097_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 紧跟着我。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, like real partners. You got it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，就像真正的搭档。你应得的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ford [0402856D] (mod) Quest : ([0406C066]aaFordQuest) Ford's Companion Quest EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaFordVoiceType\aaFordQues_FollowersTactic_0006C08F_1.ogg

Let's talk about how close you're following me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们来讨论下你我之间的距离。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Where do you need me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你需要我在哪？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ford [0402856D] (mod) Quest : ([0406C066]aaFordQuest) Ford's Companion Quest EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaFordVoiceType\aaFordQues_FollowersTactic_0006C08E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <pant pant pant>
ESP.TRADUIT: <喘气 喘气 喘气>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cooper [04020396] (mod) Quest : ([040203A0]aaCooperQuest) Cooper's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\VoiceDoNotRecordM\aaCooperQu_FollowersTactic_000675F7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I want you to use ranged weapons.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我希望你使用远距攻击武器。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nice! I am the fucking god of guns.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好！我可是无敌的枪神。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ford [0402856D] (mod) Quest : ([0406C066]aaFordQuest) Ford's Companion Quest EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaFordVoiceType\aaFordQues_FollowersTactic_0006C089_1.ogg

Loaded and locked!
ESP.TRADUIT: 载弹完毕！索敌！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ford [0402856D] (mod) Quest : ([0406C066]aaFordQuest) Ford's Companion Quest EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaFordVoiceType\aaFordQues_FollowersTactic_0006C08A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaFordREF.SetCombatStyle FollowersCombatStyleRanged set aaFordREF.CombatStyleRanged to 1 set aaFordREF.CombatStyleMelee to 0
Fuck yeah, I'm like a sniper, right? But with huge balls, like, like bighorner balls that make me invincible.
ESP.TRADUIT: 妈的，我就像个狙击手，对吧？但是我有超大的勇气（蛋蛋），就像大角羊的蛋蛋一样，这会让我无敌。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ford [0402856D] (mod) Quest : ([0406C066]aaFordQuest) Ford's Companion Quest EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaFordVoiceType\aaFordQues_FollowersTactic_0006C08B_1.ogg

You better watch out or I'll kill more than you!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你最好用心点，否则我杀的会比你还多！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ford [0402856D] (mod) Quest : ([0406C066]aaFordQuest) Ford's Companion Quest EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaFordVoiceType\aaFordQues_FollowersTactic_0006C08C_1.ogg

I'm gonna kill everything in sight!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要杀死眼前的一切！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ford [0402856D] (mod) Quest : ([0406C066]aaFordQuest) Ford's Companion Quest EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaFordVoiceType\aaFordQues_FollowersTactic_0006C08D_1.ogg

{sad whimper}[Cooper is incapable of ranged attacks and will continue using melee attacks.]
ESP.TRADUIT: {悲伤的呜咽声}[库珀不能远程攻击，将继续使用近战攻击。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cooper [04020396] (mod) Quest : ([040203A0]aaCooperQuest) Cooper's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\VoiceDoNotRecordM\aaCooperQu_FollowersTactic_000675F6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Switch to a melee weapon.
ESP.TRADUIT: 切换到近战武器。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, you got it. I'll stick em' in their ribs, cut their kidney. I'm gonna make em' wish that, that they, uh... that they hadn't been stabbed!
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，你会看到的。我会把他们的肋骨插进去，切碎他们的肾。我要让他们希望，他们，呃。。。他们没有被刺伤！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ford [0402856D] (mod) Quest : ([0406C066]aaFordQuest) Ford's Companion Quest EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaFordVoiceType\aaFordQues_FollowersTactic_0006C086_1.ogg

I'll stab them right in their assholes!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要把他们都刺死！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ford [0402856D] (mod) Quest : ([0406C066]aaFordQuest) Ford's Companion Quest EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaFordVoiceType\aaFordQues_FollowersTactic_0006C087_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's talk about something else.
ESP.TRADUIT: 让我们谈点别的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure thing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ford [0402856D] (mod) Quest : ([0406C066]aaFordQuest) Ford's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaFordVoiceType\aaFordQues_FollowersTactic_0006C084_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: <喘气 喘气 喘气>

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's all. Let's get going.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就这样。我们走吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yep.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的。

ESP.TRADUIT: {happy bark}<犬吠！>

ESP.TRADUIT: 我希望你改变你的战斗风格。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Uh, all right.
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃，好吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: <bark!>
ESP.TRADUIT: <吠叫！>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cooper [04020396] (mod) Quest : ([040203A0]aaCooperQuest) Cooper's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\VoiceDoNotRecordM\aaCooperQu_FollowersTactic_000675F0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's talk about your tactics.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们谈谈你的战术吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, you want me to shoot them in between the eyes? Or stab them in the balls? I'll kill them either way, you just tell me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好啊，你想让我在他们的眼睛之间开枪吗？还是刺他们的蛋蛋？不管怎样我都会杀了他们，你告诉我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ford [0402856D] (mod) Quest : ([0406C066]aaFordQuest) Ford's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaFordVoiceType\aaFordQues_FollowersTactic_0006C080_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <pant pant pant>
ESP.TRADUIT: <喘气 喘气 喘气>

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's get going.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们走。

ESP.ORIGINAL: <He nods emphatically>
ESP.TRADUIT: <他断然点头>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ford [0402856D] (mod) Quest : ([0406C066]aaFordQuest) Ford's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral

It's time for us to part ways.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们该分道扬镳了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you sure you want me to go?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你确定要我离开吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ford [0402856D] (mod) Quest : ([0406C066]aaFordQuest) Ford's Companion Quest EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaFordVoiceType\aaFordQuest_FollowersFired_0006C073_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: {sad whimper}<呜咽>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cooper [04020396] (mod) Quest : ([040203A0]aaCooperQuest) Cooper's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\VoiceDoNotRecordM\aaCooperQu_FollowersFired_000675E9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think we should travel together.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我觉得我们应该同行。

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is so fucking amazing! I'm actually helping you kill outlaws! Man, we're gonna be the most badass team in history!
ESP.TRADUIT: 这真他妈的棒极了！我确定我会帮你杀亡命之徒的！伙计，我们会成为史上最屌爆的团队！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ford [0402856D] (mod) Quest : ([0406C066]aaFordQuest) Ford's Companion Quest EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaFordVoiceType\aaFordQuest_FollowersHired_0006C076_1.ogg

That's ridiculous. I'm not paying you that much!
ESP.TRADUIT: 真可笑。我不会付你那么多！

ESP.ORIGINAL: AttackResponse
StartCombatResponse
Shit, caught me off guard.
ESP.TRADUIT: 妈的，让我措手不及。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ford [0402856D] (mod) Quest : ([0406C066]aaFordQuest) Ford's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaFordVoiceType\aaFordQues_StartCombatResp_0006C0DB_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey, watch out!
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿，给我小心点！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ford [0402856D] (mod) Quest : ([0406C066]aaFordQuest) Ford's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaFordVoiceType\aaFordQues_StartCombatResp_0006C0DC_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: NormalToAlertResponse
I think I'll tough it out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想我将勇敢接受。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your choice.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如你所愿。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Musgrove [040286C8] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaDocMusgroveVoiceType\aaFrosthil_DoctorAddiction_00081C00_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, cure me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，请治疗我。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay... you're golden.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的...你已经完美了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Musgrove [040286C8] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaDocMusgroveVoiceType\aaFrosthil_DoctorAddiction_00081C01_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ; set Begin Medical Services variable: setav variable01 2 Player.RemoveItem Caps001 50
I think I might be addicted to something.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想我或许对某些东西上瘾了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure. I can help you out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，我可以治好你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Musgrove [040286C8] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaDocMusgroveVoiceType\aaFrosthil_DoctorAddiction_00081BFF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I need medical supplies.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我需要医疗物资。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here's what I have.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是我有的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Musgrove [040286C8] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaDocMusgroveVoiceType\aaFrosthil_DoctorSupplies_00081BFD_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: showbartermenu
On second thought, stick with me for a little longer.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想了一下，还是留在我身边吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, you got it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，如你所愿。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ford [0402856D] (mod) Quest : ([0406C066]aaFordQuest) Ford's Companion Quest EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaFordVoiceType\aaFordQues_FollowersFiredN_0006C074_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: {happy bark}<犬吠！>

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, I'm sure.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，我确定。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Man, that's some bullshit!
ESP.TRADUIT: 伙计，这是胡说八道！

No, thanks.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不了，谢谢。

ESP.ORIGINAL: When you start glowing in the dark, don't blame me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当你开始在黑暗中发光时，不要怪我。

ESP.TRADUIT: 来吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay, just be still for one moment.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，安静一下。

Here's your 100 caps. Do it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是100个瓶盖，来吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can you heal my radiation?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能治疗我的辐射吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure. It's 100 caps to get you cleared up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，100瓶盖我就帮你清理干净。

Yeah, whatever you want.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，你想要什么都行。

ESP.TRADUIT: {confirmation bark}<犬吠！>

ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我没有动手，你也不要擅自攻击敌人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You get to have all the fun. {Resigned}Fine.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你会独占所有的乐趣。{顺从}好吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaFordREF.FollowerSwitchAggressive to 0
Oh, I see what you're doing. You're trying to make it a challenge for me, ain't you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，我知道你想做什么了。给我一个挑战，不是吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ford [0402856D] (mod) Quest : ([0406C066]aaFordQuest) Ford's Companion Quest EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaFordVoiceType\aaFordQues_FollowersTactic_0009B93F_1.ogg

{sad whimper}<whimper>

I want you to attack enemies the moment you see them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要你看到敌人就马上攻击他们。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fuck yeah, I'll kill them all!
ESP.TRADUIT: 干他妈的好耶，我会杀光他们！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ford [0402856D] (mod) Quest : ([0406C066]aaFordQuest) Ford's Companion Quest EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaFordVoiceType\aaFordQues_FollowersTactic_0006C083_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaCooperREF.FollowerSwitchAggressive to 1
I'd like you to go back to the Lucky 38 for now.

ESP.ORIGINAL: {happy bark}<bark!>
ESP.TRADUIT: {happy bark}<犬吠！>

HealthQuarter
This... can't be how it ends.
