ESP.ORIGINAL: It's the... final chapter.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是..是.最后一章。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0406C066]aaFordQuest) Ford's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaFordVoiceType\aaFordQuest_HealthQuarter_0009B943_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: HealthHalf
Oh, fuck! Something don't feel right!
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，操！有些东西感觉不对劲！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0406C066]aaFordQuest) Ford's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaFordVoiceType\aaFordQuest_HealthHalf_0006C0B9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wasn't... like this... in the books.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在书里，可不是这么说的..
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0406C066]aaFordQuest) Ford's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaFordVoiceType\aaFordQuest_HealthHalf_0006C0BA_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can see blood. MY blood!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我能看到血。是我的血！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0406C066]aaFordQuest) Ford's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaFordVoiceType\aaFordQuest_HealthHalf_0006C0BB_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wake
ESP.TRADUIT: 醒来

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ford [0402856D] (mod) Quest : ([0406C066]aaFordQuest) Ford's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: ArmorIneffective
Oh, fuck!
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦！干！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ford [0402856D] (mod) Quest : ([0406C066]aaFordQuest) Ford's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaFordVoiceType\aaFordQues_ArmorIneffectiv_0006C0A3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: WeaponIneffective
WeaponBroke
NoAmmo
Shit! I need bullets!
ESP.TRADUIT: 妈的！我需要弹药！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ford [0402856D] (mod) Quest : ([0406C066]aaFordQuest) Ford's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaFordVoiceType\aaFordQuest_NoAmmo_0006C0C5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: UsedDoctorBag
Woo-hoo. Relief at last!
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦吼！终于解脱了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ford [0402856D] (mod) Quest : ([0406C066]aaFordQuest) Ford's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaFordVoiceType\aaFordQuest_UsedDoctorBag_0006C0C9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Crippled
ESP.TRADUIT: 残废

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can't feel my legs! Help, please!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我他妈感觉不到我的腿了！求求你帮帮我！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ford [0402856D] (mod) Quest : ([0406C066]aaFordQuest) Ford's Companion Quest EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaFordVoiceType\aaFordQuest_Crippled_0006C0AD_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: KOed
KnockedBack
Regenerating
ESP.TRADUIT: 治愈中

ESP.ORIGINAL: Man, that's awesome.
ESP.TRADUIT: 伙计，这真是吊炸天了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ford [0402856D] (mod) Quest : ([0406C066]aaFordQuest) Ford's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaFordVoiceType\aaFordQuest_Regenerating_0006C0C7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Much better.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好多了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ford [0402856D] (mod) Quest : ([0406C066]aaFordQuest) Ford's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaFordVoiceType\aaFordQuest_Regenerating_0006C0C8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: OnFire
Frenzy
ESP.TRADUIT: 狂暴

ESP.ORIGINAL: Poison
ESP.TRADUIT: 中毒

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ugh, I don't feel right.
ESP.TRADUIT: 恶，我不觉得很舒服。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ford [0402856D] (mod) Quest : ([0406C066]aaFordQuest) Ford's Companion Quest EmotionType : Puzzled Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaFordVoiceType\aaFordQuest_Poisoned_0006C0C6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: FollowersOverburdened
{Straining, defying body's signals}I can carry it, I can, I... fuck it, no way this is happening.
ESP.TRADUIT: {紧张，无视身体的提示}我应该可以携带它，我可以，我。。。去他妈的，这简直不可能！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ford [0402856D] (mod) Quest : ([0406C066]aaFordQuest) Ford's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {sad whimper}[Cooper is overburdened and is having difficulty keeping up with you.]
ESP.TRADUIT: {悲伤的呜咽声}[库珀负担过重，跟不上你。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cooper [04020396] (mod) Quest : ([040203A0]aaCooperQuest) Cooper's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\VoiceDoNotRecordM\aaCooperQu_FollowersOverbu_000675EE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: FollowersStealthing
I'll be quiet as a grass snake, slipping through the weeds and eating rats. {Breaks into song}
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会安静得像一条草蛇，从杂草中溜走，吞吃老鼠。{开始哼唱}
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ford [0402856D] (mod) Quest : ([0406C066]aaFordQuest) Ford's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaFordVoiceType\aaFordQues_FollowersStealt_0006C078_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, shit... are we sneaking now?
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，该死。。。我们现在是在偷偷摸摸吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ford [0402856D] (mod) Quest : ([0406C066]aaFordQuest) Ford's Companion Quest EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaFordVoiceType\aaFordQues_FollowersStealt_0009B940_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm so sneaky I could fuck a gecko in the ass and they wouldn't know it until I finished. That is how fucking sneaky I am!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我太鬼鬼祟祟了，我能把壁虎操的屁滚尿流并在我结束前他们都不会感觉到。我就是这么的“隐秘”！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ford [0402856D] (mod) Quest : ([0406C066]aaFordQuest) Ford's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaFordVoiceType\aaFordQues_FollowersStealt_0006C079_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are we gonna do like you did with the bootlegging hillbillies? Book says you snuck in there, cut their throats. Man, we are such badasses!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们会像你那样处理那些走私的乡巴佬吗？书上说你偷偷溜进去，割断他们的喉咙。伙计，我们真是牛逼！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ford [0402856D] (mod) Quest : ([0406C066]aaFordQuest) Ford's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaFordVoiceType\aaFordQues_FollowersStealt_0006C07A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm all right with sneaking and stuff, but don't you want to look the bad guys in the eye first? Dime novels said you usually fought pretty fair.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的确可以偷偷摸摸的行动，但你不想先看看坏人的眼睛吗？廉价小说里面说你对待战斗通常都是很公平的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ford [0402856D] (mod) Quest : ([0406C066]aaFordQuest) Ford's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaFordVoiceType\aaFordQues_FollowersStealt_0006C07B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Am I gonna get to stab someone? One time I stabbed a molerat with a pitchfork. It's the same with people, I think.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是不是要背刺别人？有一次我用干草叉捅了一只鼹鼠。我想这对人也是一样的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ford [0402856D] (mod) Quest : ([0406C066]aaFordQuest) Ford's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wow, I'm actually sneaking with Randall's prot間? This is so fucking badass!
ESP.TRADUIT: 哇，我真的在和兰道尔的门徒一起潜行！这真他妈的太老卵了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ford [0402856D] (mod) Quest : ([0406C066]aaFordQuest) Ford's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Being stealthy is ok, but I bet I could fight them straight up. Just sayin'.
ESP.TRADUIT: 偷偷摸摸是可以的，但我敢打赌我可以直截了当地干死他们。只是说说。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ford [0402856D] (mod) Quest : ([0406C066]aaFordQuest) Ford's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Singings}<Singing>
ESP.TRADUIT: {唱歌}<哼唱>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ford [0402856D] (mod) Quest : ([0406C066]aaFordQuest) Ford's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaFordVoiceType\aaFordQues_FollowersStealt_0006C07F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Singings}<Singing>
ESP.TRADUIT: {唱歌}<哼唱>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ford [0402856D] (mod) Quest : ([0406C066]aaFordQuest) Ford's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaFordVoiceType\aaFordQues_FollowersStealt_0009B941_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Stea
I understand you wanted to meet with me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道你想见我。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Really? You're... special, aren't you? {Disappointed}This day started out so well, and to found out that you're like this. God hates me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真的？你是。。。很特别的，不是吗？{失望}这一天明明开始的很好，但发现你是这样的人之后。。。果然上天很恨我呢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilIntro01_000010AD_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You make ask about me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 是你在到处问我的事？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I figured it was a matter of time before you showed. Rumors spread like the clap in the Mojave.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想你出现是迟早的事。 谣言像莫哈维废土的霹雳一样蔓延开来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilIntro01_00061DB5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: At any rate, you're here in all your glory. The Courier. Do you get tired of that title? It's not very... imposing, you know?
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管怎么说，你在这里充满了荣耀，邮差。你厌倦了那个头衔吗？大概是因为那不是很。。。令人印象深刻，你知道吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilIntro01_00061DB5_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe that's the beauty of it - nobody expects to be downed by a messenger. "Hey, here's your letter, oh, and you're dead!"
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许这就是它的美妙之处——没人希望被邮差干掉。”嘿，这是你的信，哦对了，你已经死了！”
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilIntro01_00061DB5_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you pronounce it cor-ee-ur, or cur-ee-ur? Probably doesn't matter. Tomato, tomato.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是说信使还是邮差？可能也没什么关系。就像西红柿，番茄，能懂就行。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilIntro01_00061DB5_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you're here to settle a score, just know you aren't the first. I'll bury you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你来这里是为了算账，请记住你不是第一个。因为我会把你埋进废土，让你和其他人做伴的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Really? You're... special, aren't you? {Disappointed}This day started out so well, and to found out that you're like this. God hates me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真的？你是。。。很特别的，不是吗？{失望}这一天明明开始的很好，但发现你是这样的人之后。。。果然上天很恨我呢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilIntro01_000010AE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Touch and I make stomp.
ESP.TRADUIT: 碰一下我就做跺。（低智力）

ESP.ORIGINAL: Going alpha right out the gate, huh? Good negotiating tactic. Your body language needs work, though. Puff your chest out, it looks... meaner.
ESP.TRADUIT: 直截了当...吗？真是很“好”的谈判策略。不过，看起来你的肢体语言更多需要练习。挺胸，让自己看起来。。。更卑鄙。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilIntro01_00061DB7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: At any rate, you're here in all your glory. The Courier. Do you get tired of that title? It's not very... imposing, you know?
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管怎么说，你在这里充满了荣耀，邮差。你厌倦了那个头衔吗？大概是因为那不是很。。。令人印象深刻，你知道吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilIntro01_00061DB7_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe that's the beauty of it - nobody expects to be downed by a courier. "Hey, here's your letter, oh, and you're dead!"
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许这就是它的魅力所在——没人希望被邮差干掉。”嘿，这是你的信，哦对了，你已经死了！”
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilIntro01_00061DB7_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you pronounce it cor-ee-ur, or cur-ee-ur? Probably doesn't matter. Tomato, tomato.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是说信使还是邮差？可能也没什么关系。就像西红柿，番茄，能懂就行。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilIntro01_00061DB7_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you mind telling me what you want?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你介意告诉我你想要什么吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's a matter of what I need, actually. My job is to relay a message from my... supervisor. Fellow by the name of Marko.
ESP.TRADUIT: 实际上，这不是我需要什么的问题。我的工作是从我的...上级。那个叫马尔科的人颁布的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilIntro01_000010B4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: See, he's rather upset over his brother's death, and he wants to settle with you. In Utah. It's a very long trip. Luckily, I know the way.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你看，他对他哥哥的死很不安，而且他想和你和解。他现在就在犹他州。这会是一次很长的旅行。幸运的是，我知道路。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilIntro01_000010B4_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What want?
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么想要？（低智力）

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's a matter of what I need, actually. My job is to relay a message from my... supervisor. Fellow by the name of Marko.
ESP.TRADUIT: 实际上，这不是我需要什么的问题。我的工作是从我的...上级。那个叫马尔科的人颁布的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilIntro01_00061DB6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: See, he's rather upset over his brother's death, and he wants to settle with you. In Utah. It's a very long trip. Luckily, I know the way.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你看，他对他哥哥的死很不安，而且他想和你和解。他现在就在犹他州。这会是一次很长的旅行。幸运的是，我知道路。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilIntro01_00061DB6_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure, it's pronounced go-fuck-your-self.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，它的发音是滚去一边操-你-自-己。

ESP.ORIGINAL: How very witty. I'll get to my point.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真机智。我会说到重点的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilIntro01_000010B3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: My job is to relay a message from my... supervisor. Fellow by the name of Marko.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的工作是从我的...上级。那个叫马尔科的人那儿拿到的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilIntro01_000010B3_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: See, he's rather upset over his brother's death, and he wants to settle with you. In Utah. It's a very long trip. Luckily, I know the way.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你看，他对他哥哥的死很不安，而且他想和你和解。他现在就在犹他州。这会是一次很长的旅行。幸运的是，我知道路。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilIntro01_000010B3_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How about you skip to the part where you tell me what you want?
ESP.TRADUIT: 跳到你想要我什么的那部分怎么样？

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's a matter of what I need, actually. My job is to relay a message from my... supervisor. Fellow by the name of Marko.
ESP.TRADUIT: 实际上，这不是我需要什么的问题。我的工作是从我的...上级。那个叫马尔科的人颁布的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilIntro01_000010B2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: See, he's rather upset over his brother's death, and he wants to settle with you. In Utah. It's a very long trip. Luckily, I know the way.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你看，他对他哥哥的死很不安，而且他想和你和解。他现在就在犹他州。这会是一次很长的旅行。幸运的是，我知道路。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilIntro01_000010B2_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: WHAT WANT?!
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么想要？！（低智力）

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's a matter of what I need, actually. My job is to relay a message from my... supervisor. Fellow by the name of Marko.
ESP.TRADUIT: 实际上，这不是我需要什么的问题。我的工作是从我的...上级。那个叫马尔科的人颁布的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilIntro01_00061DB8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: See, he's rather upset over his brother's death, and he wants to settle with you. In Utah. It's a very long trip. Luckily, I know the way.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你看，他对他哥哥的死很不安，而且他想和你和解。他现在就在犹他州。这会是一次很长的旅行。幸运的是，我知道路。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilIntro01_00061DB8_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, what are we waiting for? I've also got unfinished business with Marko.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我们在等什么？毕竟我和马尔科也有未竟之事。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You are tightly wound, you know that? Just relax, hero. You'll get there soon enough. First, you're going to help me with some business here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看来你心里伤得很重，你知道吗？放松点，英雄。你很快就会到那儿的。但首先，你要帮我做点事情。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilIntro01_000010B9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There are a few contacts here in the Mojave that I need to... sort out, on behalf of Marko's business interests.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在莫哈维有几个联系人需要...整理一下，这代表了马尔科的商业利益。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilIntro01_000010B9_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Funny thing is that there is some overlap with your past work. I managed to look through some of Randall's old records in the shack.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有趣的是，你过去的工作看起来有些重叠。我设法翻阅了兰道尔在那间小屋里的一些旧的记录文件。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilIntro01_000010B9_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: To his credit, the man kept very meticulous records. He must have been quite the typist.
ESP.TRADUIT: 值得称赞的是，这个人保存了非常细致的记录。他一定是个很擅长打字的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilIntro01_000010B9_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anyway, if you want to reach Utah, first you'll help me... solve problems. Sort of like bounty hunting.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管怎样，如果你想去犹他州，首先你要帮我。。。解决一些问题。这有点像赏金狩猎。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilIntro01_000010B9_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, and don't worry, you won't have to kill any women or children, nothing that might compromise your code. These pretty much have it coming.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，别担心，你不必杀掉任何女人和孩子，也不需要破坏你的信条。虽然这些都有可能发生。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilIntro01_000010B9_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's the catch?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有什么想要的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Very perceptive.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你还真是敏锐。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: There are a few contacts here in the Mojave that I need to... sort out, on behalf of Marko's business interests.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在莫哈维有几个联系人需要...整理一下，这代表了马尔科的商业利益。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Funny thing is that there is some overlap with your past work. I managed to look through some of Randall's old records in the shack.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有趣的是，这和你过去的工作看起来有些重叠。我设法翻阅了兰道尔留在那间小屋里的一些旧的记录文件。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.TRADUIT: 值得称赞的是，兰道尔保存了非常细致的记录。他一定是个很擅长打字的人。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.TRADUIT: 先做什？（低智力）

ESP.TRADUIT: 你还真是敏锐。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Marko? You're going to take me to him right now, or I'll bleed you slowly.
ESP.TRADUIT: 马尔科？看着我的眼睛，你现在就带我去见他，否则我会慢慢的给你放血。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You are tightly wound, you know that? Just relax, hero. You'll get there soon enough. First, you're going to help me with some business here.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Take me to the Mario or I stomp.
ESP.TRADUIT: 带我去找马里奥不然我就跺脚了。（低智力）

ESP.ORIGINAL: You are tightly wound, you know that? Just relax, hero. You'll get there soon enough. First, you're going to help me with some business here.

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilIntro01_00061DB1_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Could you elaborate on what sort of problems I'd be solving?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能详细说明一下我要解决什么样的问题吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: The sort involving scumbags who haven't kicked up to their betters, and are a touch... defiant. That kind of hubris tends to draw bad karma.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这涉及到那些没有表现出自己的强项的卑鄙小人，而且他们都有点……反抗。而那种傲慢往往会招致恶报。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilIntro01_000010BF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I sauce limbs?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要腌制四肢？(低智力）

ESP.ORIGINAL: The sort involving scumbags who haven't kicked up to their betters, and are a touch... defiant. That kind of hubris tends to draw bad karma.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这涉及到那些没有表现出自己的强项的卑鄙小人，而且他们都有点……反抗。而那种傲慢往往会招致恶报。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilIntro01_00061DB2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't have a choice, do I?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我别无选择，是吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: That depends. Everybody likes choices in life, so let me varnish my offer so there's an illusion of freedom.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那要看情况。每个人都喜欢生活中的选择，所以请让我粉饰我的提议，这样我就有了自由的幻觉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilIntro01_000010C1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You can swallow your pride and help me, which will doubtlessly provide opportunities for enrichment, conversation, and all manner of excitement.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你可以咽下你的骄傲，来帮帮我，这无疑将提供丰富的机会，与人交谈，以及各种让人兴奋的事情。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilIntro01_000010C1_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Or... you can forgo my offer and fecklessly wander the wastes, wondering how you let a chance at Marko slip through your fingers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 或者...你可以放弃我的提议，无所适从地游荡在废土之中，我在想你是如何让一个干掉马尔科的机会从你的手指间溜走的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilIntro01_000010C1_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm sure some people would consider them equally valid choices.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我相信有些人会认为他们的选择同样有效。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilIntro01_000010C1_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why don't I just kill you and set out after Marko on my own?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我何不直接杀了你然后自己去追马尔科算了？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Traveling to Frosthill isn't like taking one of your little nature walks here in the valley. It's hundreds of miles through dangerous terrain.
ESP.TRADUIT: 去霜地可不像在山谷里散步。要穿过危险的地形的道路有几百英里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilIntro01_000010C8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: On top of that, you could easily encounter roaming bands of cannibalistic tribals, or just get lost and freeze to death in the mountains.
ESP.TRADUIT: 除此之外，你还可以很容易地遇到成群结队的食人部落，或者在山里迷路冻死。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilIntro01_000010C8_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But I'm sure you pondered all that when you made that crack about killing me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但我相信当你开玩笑说要杀我的时候你已经考虑过了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilIntro01_000010C8_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Remain Silent>
ESP.TRADUIT: <保持沉默>

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you still firing on all cylinders? I know you suffered a brain injury, but I'm not sure if I can ferry an invalid about.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你还在向那些气缸开火吗？我知道你受过脑损伤，但我不确定我能不能把一个病人送去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilIntro01_000010C0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ok, I'll help you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我会帮助你的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm beginning to sense that this was a terrible, terrible mistake. Just... stay close, and don't run around carrying sharp objects, ok?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我开始觉得这是一个可怕的错误。只是。。。靠近点，不要带着锋利的东西到处跑，好吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilIntro01_000010C9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaVirgilQuest.Greeted to 7 SetStage aaNVB3Main01 10 aaVirgilRef.evp showmessage aaVirgilTravel01Message aaVirgilREF.moveto aaDumbassGamebryo01REF
I helps.
ESP.TRADUIT: 帮忙我。（低智力）

ESP.ORIGINAL: What a team we'll be... I can't wait! Got to make a little stop before we meet the first guy. Here's the spot on your map. See your there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们会是一个怎样的团队。。。我都等不及了！在我们遇到第一个人呢之前先停一下。这是你地图上的位置。在那儿见。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilIntro01_00061DB3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaVirgilQuest.Greeted to 7 SetStage aaNVB3Main01 10 aaVirgilRef.evp showmessage aaVirgilTravel01Message aaVirgilREF.moveto aaDumbassGamebryo01REF
aaVirgilIntro01DecideNeg
ESP.TRADUIT: aa维吉尔介绍01决定负面

ESP.ORIGINAL: I need more time to think about it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我需要更多时间来考虑这事。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure, take your time. I'll just postpone your meeting with the most dangerous man alive.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没问题，请随意。我会推迟你和那个最危险的人会面的时间。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaVirgilQuest.Greeted to 6
aaVirgilIntro01DecidePsycho
ESP.TRADUIT: aa维吉尔介绍01决定疯子

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaBARKVirgilHouse01
ESP.TRADUIT: aa巴克维吉尔房子01

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Whistles}I'm gonna go out on a limb here and say this wasn't a freak accident involving plungers and broom handles.
ESP.TRADUIT: {口哨声}我要站出来说，这可不是一起涉及活塞和扫帚柄的怪事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaVirgilQuest.HouseBark to 1 aaVirgilRef.Sayto player aaBARKVirgilHouse01
Who'd have thought that Fiends don't make for friendly neighbors? I'm gonna do a little detective work... just stand back and be amazed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谁会想到恶魔不适合友好的邻居呢？我要做点侦查工作。。。退后一点，再感到惊讶一点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaVirgilQuest.HouseBark to 2 aaVirgilRef.Sayto player aaBARKVirgilHouse01
Fiends rushed in, brought everyone in here after a brief tussle, then made dad watch while they gave mom the plunger treatment. {Audible wince}Splinters, yeow!
ESP.TRADUIT: 恶魔们冲了进来，在短暂的争吵之后把所有人都带到了这里，然后让爸爸看着他们给妈妈做活塞治疗。{听得见的畏缩}碎片(表示痛苦和震惊的声音）！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaVirgilQuest.HouseBark to 3 aaVirgilRef.Sayto player aaBARKVirgilHouse01
But they didn't stop there, no. Dad had to watch while his kid got the broom handle... then they cut everyone's throat. Oh, except dad.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但他们并没有停下来，不。爸爸必须看着他的孩子拿着扫帚柄。。。然后他们割断了每个人的喉咙。哦，除了爸爸。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaVirgilQuest.HouseBark to 4 aaVirgilRef.Sayto player aaBARKVirgilHouse01
Pops had to stew in his own entrails while he died a slow, agonizing death. That's nasty, even by Fiend standards.
ESP.TRADUIT: 爸爸在缓慢而痛苦地死去时，不得不在自己的内脏里炖肉。即使以恶魔的标准来衡量，这也很糟糕。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaVirgilQuest.HouseBark to 5 aaVirgilRef.startconversation Player, aaVirgilHousePostDisc01
aaVirgilHousePostDisc01
ESP.TRADUIT: aa维吉尔防止之后DISC01

ESP.ORIGINAL: You know, if I knew that I caused this, even in a crazy, roundabout sort of way... that would just eat me up inside. Sort of awkward now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道，如果我知道这是我造成的，即使是以一种疯狂的，迂回的方式。。。那只让我的内在吞掉我。真他妈尴尬。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilHousePo_00001FDA_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Troy and the Fiends did this, not me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是特洛伊和恶魔帮干的，不是我。

ESP.ORIGINAL: In some circles, that would be called ducking responsibility. Troy was nothing before you killed Eileen.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在某些逻辑里，这被称为逃避责任。特洛伊在你杀掉艾琳之前什么都不是。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilHousePo_00001FDF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: On top of the money, I completely understand killing Eileen, give the habitual severing of penises. In my book, that's right up there with murder.
ESP.TRADUIT: 除了金钱之外，我完全能理解你杀死艾琳，因为她会惯常的割断阴茎。在我的书里，上面写着谋杀。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Puzzled Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilHousePo_00001FDF_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But don't doubt for a second that you set this in motion. You can't kill and walk away, no matter what side of the law you think you're on.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但不要怀疑，这事情已经不可收拾了。不管你认为你站在法律的哪一边，你都不能杀人然后走开。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilHousePo_00001FDF_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nonetheless, we can sit here arguing about rapists and dick-cutters... or we can go kill Fiends. Never gets old, does it? I'll meet you at Troy's.
ESP.TRADUIT: 尽管如此，我们还是可以坐在这里争论强奸犯和肉棒切割者。。。或者我们可以去杀点恶魔帮。这永远不会过时不是吗？我会在特洛伊那和你碰面。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilHousePo_00001FDF_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaNVB3Main01 20 set aaVirgilQuest.Greeted to 20 showmessage aaVirgilTravel02Message aaVirgilREF.moveto aaTroyWaitMarkerREF
Toy cause stink, not me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 玩具引起恶臭，不是我。（低智力）

ESP.ORIGINAL: In some circles, that would be called ducking responsibility. Troy was nothing before you killed Eileen.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在某些逻辑里，这被称为逃避责任。特洛伊在你杀掉艾琳之前什么都不是。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilHousePo_00061DB0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: On top of the money, I completely understand killing Eileen, give the habitual severing of penises. In my book, that's right up there with murder.
ESP.TRADUIT: 除了金钱之外，我完全能理解你杀死艾琳，因为她会惯常的割断阴茎。在我的书里，上面写着谋杀。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Puzzled Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilHousePo_00061DB0_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But don't doubt for a second that you set this in motion. You can't kill and walk away, no matter what side of the law you think you're on.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但不要怀疑，这事情已经不可收拾了。不管你认为你站在法律的哪一边，你都不能杀人然后走开。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilHousePo_00061DB0_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nonetheless, we can sit here arguing about rapists and dick-cutters... or we can go kill Fiends. Never gets old, does it? I'll meet you at Troy's.
ESP.TRADUIT: 尽管如此，我们还是可以坐在这里争论强奸犯和肉棒切割者。。。或者我们可以去杀点恶魔帮。这永远不会过时不是吗？我会在特洛伊那和你碰面。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilHousePo_00061DB0_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaNVB3Main01 20 set aaVirgilQuest.Greeted to 20 showmessage aaVirgilTravel02Message aaVirgilREF.moveto aaTroyWaitMarkerREF
Don't even go there, you twisted fuck.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别他妈的往那儿走，你这个变态的混蛋。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wow, the mouth on you! I would use that old clich?about kissing your mother, but I don't know if you have one. You probably killed her.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哇，看看你这张臭嘴！我会用那种老套的方法“吻”你的妈妈，但我不知道你有没有。因为你可能杀了她。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilHousePo_00001FE1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: All that anger, white-hot rage driving you, it kind of protects you from this stuff, doesn't it? {Overdramatic impersonation}I'm so angry, everything I do is right!
ESP.TRADUIT: 所有激怒，狂热的怒火驱使着你，某种程度上让你免受此类侵害，不是吗？ {过分的冒充}我很生气，我所做的一切都是对的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilHousePo_00001FE1_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The fire will always burn out, my friend. When it does, all you'll have is unfinished missions, unpaid payback, and cold regret.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的朋友，火焰总会熄灭的。当它发生时，你所拥有的只有未完成的任务、未付的回报和冷酷的遗憾罢了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilHousePo_00001FE1_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And the swearing, is it really necessary? I've found it a shallow substitute for substantive discourse, even when you're killing people.
ESP.TRADUIT: 还有提到骂人，这真的有必要吗？我发现它是一种肤浅的实质性话语的替代品，即使当你在屠戮的时候。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilHousePo_00001FE1_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, while I've got you good and primed to explode, let's just point you towards Troy. On the way, think of something really crazy to say to him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，显然我已经让你准备好了爆发，让我把你引导到特洛伊那里。在路上，想些很疯狂的话跟他说。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilHousePo_00001FE1_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaNVB3Main01 20 set aaVirgilQuest.Greeted to 20 showmessage aaVirgilTravel02Message aaVirgilREF.moveto aaTroyWaitMarkerREF
Eh, I've seen worse.
ESP.TRADUIT: 额..我其实见过更糟的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's the spirit! Denial, I love it. As a kid, my dad - a raging, wild drunk - would regularly beat us, then refused to acknowledge it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这就是精神！是否认现实，是吾之所爱。小时候，我爸爸——那个狂暴的酒鬼——经常打我们，然后他还拒绝承认。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilHousePo_00001FE0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Later, I found out that smashing someone's kneecaps with a bat tends to correct the problem. They also confess a lot. A kneecap revival, if you will.
ESP.TRADUIT: 后来，我发现用球棒砸别人的膝盖骨就可以纠正这个问题。而他们也承认了很多。击碎膝盖骨这一方法会复兴的，只要你愿意的话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilHousePo_00001FE0_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Relax, we're not going down that road. When you're thirteen, you do all sort of things that make you cringe later on. Hormones, I suppose.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别紧张，我们还没不会用那样的方法做事的。当你十三岁的时候，你就做了所有那些可能会让你以后会畏缩不前的事情。我想是因为荷尔蒙吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilHousePo_00001FE0_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Point is... old pappy stayed in denial until it blew up in his face... or his kneecaps. You can lie to yourself, but the truth will have its day.
ESP.TRADUIT: 重点是。。。老爸一直否认他做过的过分的事情，直到那些报应在他脸上爆炸。。。或者在他的膝盖骨上。你可以自欺欺人，但真相终有一天会被公之于众的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilHousePo_00001FE0_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: On that note, let's go deliver some truth to Troy. You can even use the bat technique if you want. See you there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在那张纸条上写了，所以让我们也去告诉特洛伊一些真相吧。如果你想的话，你甚至也可以用我的这种球棒技术哦。到那见。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilHousePo_00001FE0_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaNVB3Main01 20 set aaVirgilQuest.Greeted to 20 showmessage aaVirgilTravel02Message aaVirgilREF.moveto aaTroyWaitMarkerREF
aaVirgilHousePostDiscWW
ESP.TRADUIT: aa维吉尔防止之后DIScWW

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaBARKTroy01
ESP.TRADUIT: aa巴克特洛伊01

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who the fuck are you? What the fuck are you doing here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你他妈的是谁？你他妈的在这里干什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Troy [04003827] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaVirgilQuest_aaBARKTroy01_00004A63_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaVirgilQuest.TroyBark to 1 aaVirgilRef.Sayto aaTroyREF aaBARKTroy01
What? Who the fuck... I'm about to light your ass up, cocksucker! Do you know who I am? I'm gonna smoke you, then fuck you right up the ass!
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么？他妈的。。。我要给你点上火了，混蛋！你知道我是谁吗？我要抽你的烟，然后他妈的把你打得屁滚尿流！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Troy [04003827] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaVirgilQuest_aaBARKTroy01_00003B12_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaVirgilQuest.TroyBark to 3 aaVirgilRef.Sayto aaTroyREF aaBARKTroy01
Marko? H-he sent you? Oh, oh, oh fuck, I didn't mean to ignore him, shit, shit just got fucked up, I was busy, and, and...
ESP.TRADUIT: 马尔科？是他派你来的？哦，哦，哦，妈的，我不是故意不理他，妈的，妈的，我只是搞砸了，我很忙，而且...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Troy [04003827] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaVirgilQuest_aaBARKTroy01_00003B15_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaVirgilQuest.TroyBark to 5 aaVirgilRef.Sayto aaTroyREF aaBARKTroy01 aaTroyRef.playidle LooseCowerIdles aaTroyRef.setav confidence 0
Oh God! He sent you to kill me, didn't he? Please, please, please, please! Don't! I'll give you money, girls, anything!
ESP.TRADUIT: 天哪！他让你杀了我，是吗？求你了，请不要，求求你，拜托了！不要！我会给你钱的，还是姑娘们，或是任何东西！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Troy [04003827] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaVirgilQuest_aaBARKTroy01_00003B17_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaVirgilQuest.TroyBark to 7 aaVirgilRef.Sayto aaTroyREF aaBARKTroy01 aaTroyRef.playidle LooseCowerIdles
I can't go like this! Momma!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不能这样走！妈妈！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Troy [04003827] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaVirgilQuest_aaBARKTroy01_00003B19_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaVirgilQuest.TroyBark to 9 aaVirgilRef.Sayto aaTroyREF aaBARKTroy01 aaTroyRef.playidle LooseCowerIdles
R-r-really? Oh, thank you, thank you, thank you! I'll do whatever you want, just tell Marko I'll do it!
ESP.TRADUIT: 真...真的吗？哦，谢谢你，衷心感谢，向你致敬！我会做你要求做任何事，告诉马尔科我会做的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Troy [04003827] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaVirgilQuest_aaBARKTroy01_00003B1B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaVirgilQuest.TroyBark to 11 aaVirgilRef.Sayto aaTroyREF aaBARKTroy01 aaTroyRef.playidle LooseScaredListenB
Oh, shit! Momma!
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，该死！妈妈！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Troy [04003827] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaVirgilQuest_aaBARKTroy01_00003B1D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaVirgilQuest.TroyBark to 13 aaTroyREF.startcombat player player.startcombat aaTroyREF
Troy, Troy, Troy. You have been a busy little boy, haven't you. All that robbing and raping going on, yet you can't seem to return messages.
ESP.TRADUIT: 特洛伊，特洛伊，特洛伊。你是个很忙的小男孩，是吗。看看这所有的抢劫和强奸，而你似乎连回个信息都不愿意。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQuest_aaBARKTroy01_00003B11_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaVirgilQuest.TroyBark to 2 aaTroyREF.Sayto aaVirgilREF aaBARKTroy01
No you won't, Troy. Do you know who I work for? Gentleman by the name of Marko. He's very unhappy that you ignored his messages. Not good, Troy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，你不会的，特洛伊。你知道我为谁工作吗？马尔科先生。他很不高兴你忽视了他的信息。这可不好，特洛伊。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQuest_aaBARKTroy01_00003B13_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaVirgilQuest.TroyBark to 4 aaTroyREF.Sayto aaVirgilREF aaBARKTroy01
Shhhhhh, Troy. Calm yourself. No point in making a scene. Keep your dignity intact. You could've avoided this with timely correspondence.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘘，特洛伊。冷静点。没有必要大吵大闹。保持你的尊严。你本来可以通过及时的通信来避免这件事的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQuest_aaBARKTroy01_00003B16_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaVirgilQuest.TroyBark to 6 aaTroyREF.Sayto aaVirgilREF aaBARKTroy01
Why does everyone just assume I would want a woman? I do prefer them, but you never know. Doesn't matter. Troy, this is a matter of... balance.
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么每个人都以为我想要一个女人？我确实喜欢，但你永远不知道。没关系。特洛伊，这是个。。。平衡。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQuest_aaBARKTroy01_00003B18_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaVirgilQuest.TroyBark to 8 aaTroyREF.Sayto aaVirgilREF aaBARKTroy01
Now would you look at that? Troy, you went and pissed yourself. Would you relax? I'm not going to kill you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在你能看看那个了吗？特洛伊，你自己去，还惹了自己生气。你能放松点吗？我不会杀你的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQuest_aaBARKTroy01_00003B1A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaVirgilQuest.TroyBark to 10 aaTroyREF.Sayto aaVirgilREF aaBARKTroy01
No, I won't kill you, Troy. This bounty hunter will.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，我不会杀你的，特洛伊。但这个赏金猎人会的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQuest_aaBARKTroy01_00003B1C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaVirgilQuest.TroyBark to 12 aaTroyREF.Sayto aaVirgilREF aaBARKTroy01
aaVirgilTroyDead
ESP.TRADUIT: aa维吉尔特洛伊死亡

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaBARKKarl01
ESP.TRADUIT: aa巴克卡拉01

ESP.ORIGINAL: Uh, do you mind? I am trying to work here. If you're looking for some tail, check downstairs.
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃，你介意吗？我想在这里工作。如果你想找些乐子，下楼去看看。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : King Karl [04004A5C] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaVirgilQuest_aaBARKKarl01_00004D4B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaVirgilQuest.KarlBark to 4 aaVirgilRef.Sayto Player aaBARKKarl01
Excuse me? You gonna walk into my place and lay down attitude? Motherfucker, I will crack your skull open and shit in it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 请原谅我？你要走进我的房间，然后摆出一副什么样的态度？他妈的，我会把你的头盖骨打开，然后在里面拉屎。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : King Karl [04004A5C] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaVirgilQuest_aaBARKKarl01_00004D4D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaVirgilQuest.KarlBark to 6 aaVirgilRef.Sayto Player aaBARKKarl01
Marko? Are you serious? That motherfucker ain't even real! So I took some guy's money and said I'd kick up to Marko, what of it? It was a scam!
ESP.TRADUIT: 马尔科？你认真的？那混蛋根本不是真人！所以我才拿了一个人的钱说我要去踢马克的屁股，怎么了？这不过是个骗局！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : King Karl [04004A5C] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaVirgilQuest_aaBARKKarl01_00004D4F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaVirgilQuest.KarlBark to 8 aaVirgilRef.Sayto Player aaBARKKarl01
You can't be serious. I was just joking with some boys in Freeside, everybody knows Marko isn't real, right? Oh fuck, man. Oh fuck! Holy shit, man!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不可能是认真的。我只是和自由城的一些男孩开玩笑罢了，大家都知道马尔科不是真的，对吧？哦，操，伙计。哦，操！天哪，朋友！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : King Karl [04004A5C] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaVirgilQuest_aaBARKKarl01_00004D51_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaVirgilQuest.KarlBark to 10 aaVirgilRef.Sayto Player aaBARKKarl01 aaKingKarlRef.setav confidence 0 aaKingKarlRef.playidle LooseCowersIdle
Well, I think that's our boy. Real charmer.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想那是我们的孩子。真迷人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQuest_aaBARKKarl01_00004A64_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ah, Karl. Tell me, does it make you feel strong when you smack around starving hookers? This is a real man right here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，卡尔。告诉我，当你和饥饿的妓女打交道的时候，你会感到很坚强吗？这里就站着个真正的男人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQuest_aaBARKKarl01_00004D4C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaVirgilQuest.KarlBark to 5 aaKingKarlREF.Sayto aaVirgilRef aaBARKKarl01
As much as I want to be moved by that arresting imagery, I need to get to the point, Karl. Do you remember the arrangement you had with Marko?
ESP.TRADUIT: 尽管我很想被那些吸引人的画面所感动，但我还是要说到点子上，卡尔。你还记得你和马尔科的安排吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQuest_aaBARKKarl01_00004D4E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaVirgilQuest.KarlBark to 7 aaKingKarlREF.Sayto aaVirgilRef aaBARKKarl01
No scam, Karl. You knowingly stole from one of Marko's associates, then went on to denounce the whole affair in public. Bad judgment, my boy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别骗人，卡尔。你明知故犯地从马尔科的一个同伙那里偷了东西，然后当众谴责了整件事。真是糟糕的判断力，我的孩子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQuest_aaBARKKarl01_00004D50_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaVirgilQuest.KarlBark to 9 aaKingKarlREF.Sayto aaVirgilRef aaBARKKarl01
No joke, Karl. We'll make it quick. Or maybe not. It's really up to the discretion of my associate.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不开玩笑，卡尔。我们会让你马上解脱的。或许也会很痛苦。这真的取决于我的助手。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQuest_aaBARKKarl01_00004D52_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaKingKarlRef.playidle LooseCowersIdle aaKingKarlREF.startcombat player
set aaVirgilQuest.KarlBark to 11 aaKingKarlREF.Say flee aaKingKarlREF.setav confidence 0
aaVirgilKarlDead
ESP.TRADUIT: aa维吉尔卡尔死亡

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaNVB3JillSpeech01
ESP.TRADUIT: aaNVB3吉尔演讲1

ESP.ORIGINAL: What? You got no right to judge me. What the fuck else am I gonna do anyway? No use trying to get clean in this shithole.
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么？你可没有权利评判我。我他妈还能怎么办？在这破地方洁身自好可没什么用。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jill [0400469F] (mod) Quest : ([04000DBC]aaNVB3Main01) The City of Woe EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Jill, you're destroying yourself right now. You need help.
ESP.TRADUIT: 吉尔，你现在在毁灭自己。你需要帮助。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That doesn't even make sense. Fuck off.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的屁话根本没有道理。滚开。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jill [0400469F] (mod) Quest : ([04000DBC]aaNVB3Main01) The City of Woe EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey girl, let's re-evaluate the direction of your life.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿，女孩，让我们重新评估一下你的生活方向吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: INCOMPLETE
ESP.TRADUIT: 未完成

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaNVB3JillMedical
ESP.TRADUIT: aaNVB3吉尔医疗

ESP.ORIGINAL: What? You're right. I just thought I'd have more time, that I could get some cash together and then get clean, you know?
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么？你说得对。我只是想我会有更多的时间罢了，我可以一起凑点钱然后把自己收拾干净，你知道吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jill [0400469F] (mod) Quest : ([04000DBC]aaNVB3Main01) The City of Woe EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll go see a doc at the Fort. I can't promise anything beyond that. Goodbye, stranger.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我去要塞看医生。除此之外，我不能保证什么。再见，陌生人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jill [0400469F] (mod) Quest : ([04000DBC]aaNVB3Main01) The City of Woe EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Main01.JillGreeted to 15 aaJillRef.evp set aaNVB3Master.JillFate to 1
The life expectancy of chem addicts is measure in months, not years. The clock is ticking, Jill.
ESP.TRADUIT: 化学药物成瘾者的预期寿命是以月计算的，而不是以年计算的。时钟还在冷漠的摆动着，吉尔。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Idiot.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你个笨蛋。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jill [0400469F] (mod) Quest : ([04000DBC]aaNVB3Main01) The City of Woe EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Chems are bad, m'kay?
ESP.TRADUIT: 化学不好，对吧？（低智力）

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaNVB3JillFixer
ESP.TRADUIT: aaNVB3吉尔抗瘾剂

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, anything but this... ugh, ok. God, I fucking hate that goddamn noise. {Sighs}I'll visit the Followers, but I don't promise nothing else.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，其实除了这个什么都。。。呃，好吧。天哪，我他妈讨厌那该死的噪音。{叹气}我会去拜访追随者的，但我不会答应你关于其他任何事的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jill [0400469F] (mod) Quest : ([04000DBC]aaNVB3Main01) The City of Woe EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.removeitem NVFixer 1
set aaNVB3Main01.JillGreeted to 15 aaJillRef.evp set aaNVB3Master.JillFate to 1
Use this Fixer to get you by. In the meantime, go see the Followers. <Give 1 Fixer>
ESP.TRADUIT: 用这支抗瘾剂把你治好吧。同时，记得去拜访一下天启追随者们。<给予1支抗瘾剂>

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaNVB3JillFuck
ESP.TRADUIT: aaNVB3吉尔上床

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ok, just step into my office.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的，先进我的办公室来吧~~。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jill [0400469F] (mod) Quest : ([04000DBC]aaNVB3Main01) The City of Woe EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.RemoveItem caps001 100 ApplyImageSpaceModifier FadeToBlackAndBackISFX set aaNVB3Main01.JillGreeted to 10
Ok, let's party. <Pay 100 caps>
ESP.TRADUIT: 那好！让我们开始派对吧. <支付100瓶盖>

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nevermind.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没关系。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whatever.
ESP.TRADUIT: 随便。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jill [0400469F] (mod) Quest : ([04000DBC]aaNVB3Main01) The City of Woe EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: Once you go hussy you never come back. You're a waste of life. <Attack>
ESP.TRADUIT: 当你变成荡妇后，那就再没有回头路了。你只是在浪费生命罢了。<攻击>

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fuck you, motherfucker!
ESP.TRADUIT: 操你妈的，你个臭傻逼。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jill [0400469F] (mod) Quest : ([04000DBC]aaNVB3Main01) The City of Woe EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaJillREF.startcombat player
aaNVB3JillSpeech02
ESP.TRADUIT: aaNVB3吉尔演讲2

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ok, ok. I just thought they would judge me. I... I don't want to live like this. Maybe I can change. I'll see them, right now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，好吧。我以为他们会评判我的。我 。。。我不想这样生活。但也许我可以改变。我马上去找他们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jill [0400469F] (mod) Quest : ([04000DBC]aaNVB3Main01) The City of Woe EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Main01.JillGreeted to 15 aaJillRef.evp set aaNVB3Master.JillFate to 1
The Followers are right there, Jill. They'll help you, with no strings attached. Do it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 追随者就在那里，吉尔。他们会帮你的，而且没有附加条件。去做吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaVirgilJillDead
ESP.TRADUIT: aa维吉尔吉尔死亡

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now that's one way to cure her. Nicely done.
ESP.TRADUIT: 瞧瞧，这才是治愈她的一种方法。做得好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilJillDea_00006AA3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaVirgilJillHelp
ESP.TRADUIT: aa维吉尔吉尔帮助

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're a regular paladin, aren't you? She'll probably be dead in a week anyway. Good initiative, though. Very commendable.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你真是个有操守的圣骑士啊，不是么？不管怎样，她大概也会在几个星期之后死掉。但你的积极性非常不错。非常的值得称赞。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilJillHel_00006AA2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've had about enough of your ghost of Christmas past bullshit. Regardless, I'll talk to her.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我受够了你圣诞颂歌般的胡扯故事了。不管怎样，我会和她谈谈。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Have I struck a nerve? I knew you were angry, but wow! Look at that vein, just... throbbing! I'm gonna guess you have high blood pressure.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我伤到你的神经了吗？我知道你很生气，但是，哇哦！看看你的血管，只是。。。在不断抽动呢！我猜你有高血压吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilPostQui_00006AB3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's go help this old bag, whether she likes it or not!
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管她喜不喜欢，让我们去帮这个老泼妇吧！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilPostQui_00006AB3_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaNVB3Main01 45 aaVirgilRef.evp
Cut it out, or I'm going to drag your corpse down memory lane, you fucking windbag.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别说了，不然我就把你的尸体抛到记忆里去，你这个该死的空话连篇的人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Windbag? Now that's just rude.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你说我夸夸其谈?这真是太侮辱人了.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilPostQui_00006AB2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaNVB3Main01 45 aaVirgilRef.evp
There's nothing to be done here. Let's go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这里没什么可做的。走吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You can't look her in the eyes, can you? Either that, or you really have ice water in your veins. Maybe I underestimated you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不能直视她的眼睛，对吗？要么，就是你的血管里流淌着的只有冷酷罢了。也许我低估了你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilPostQui_00006AAF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Since we're just moving right along, you can meet me at a little cave near Cottonwood Cove. Legion has quite a slavery operation inside.
ESP.TRADUIT: 既然我们正往前走，你可以在靠近棉花丛台地的一个小山洞里等我。军团在那里有相当多的奴隶交易。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilPostQui_00006AAF_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaNVB3Main01 50 showmessage aaVirgilTravel05Message aaVirgilREF.moveto aaWaitCottonwoodMarkerREF
Fine, I'll see if I can help her.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我看看能不能帮她。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's the spirit. Help the hapless damsel who pawned her only daughter off to be the plaything of sadistic barbarians. Fantastico!
ESP.TRADUIT: 这就是西部精神。去帮助那个不幸的女人吧，她可能会走投无路把自己的独生女卖掉，让她成为残暴野蛮人的玩物的。你会是一个了不起的人的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilPostQui_00006AB1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaNVB3Main01 45 aaVirgilRef.evp
Stupid bitch got what was coming. Let's move on.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那个愚蠢的婊子知道要发生什么了。让我们走吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You can't look her in the eyes, can you? Either that, or you really have ice water in your veins. Maybe I underestimated you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不能直视她的眼睛，对吗？要么，就是你的血管里流淌着的只有冷酷罢了。也许是我低估了你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Since we're just moving right along, you can meet me at a little cave near Cottonwood Cove. Legion has quite a slavery operation inside.
ESP.TRADUIT: 既然我们正往前走，你可以在靠近棉花从台地的一个小山洞里等我。军团在那里有相当多的奴隶交易。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaNVB3Main01 50 showmessage aaVirgilTravel05Message aaVirgilREF.moveto aaWaitCottonwoodMarkerREF
<Remain silent>
ESP.TRADUIT: <保持沉默>

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ok, let me try a different approach. {Speaking slowly to patronize player}Woman inside... no money. Sell daughter to bad men. No rain. Now no money. You help. Understand? Good.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，让我试试不同的方法。{慢慢地对光顾的邮差说话}里面的女人。。。没有钱。把女儿卖给了坏人。不下雨。现在没钱了。你来帮忙。明白吗？很好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilPostQui_00006AB4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Remain Silent>
ESP.TRADUIT: <保持沉默>

ESP.ORIGINAL: <He stares at you intently>
ESP.TRADUIT: <他目不转睛地盯着你>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: I understand you're having some financial difficulties. Maybe I can help.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道你有些经济困难。也许我能帮忙。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaNVB3DanaWWAngel
ESP.TRADUIT: aaNVB3达娜WW天使

ESP.ORIGINAL: You want help? Shut up and take my money.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你想要些帮忙吗？拿上我的钱然后闭嘴吧你。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I wonder how your neighbors would feel about you selling your daughter into slavery?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我还挺想知道你的邻居对你把女儿卖为奴隶，会有什么样的感觉呢？

ESP.ORIGINAL: You... how did you know? I never told anyone, not ever. Please, please, please, you can't tell anyone! You must understand, we were starving!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你。。。你怎么知道的？我从来没有告诉过任何人，从来没有。拜托，拜托，拜托，你不能告诉任何人的！你必须明白，我们都快饿死了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dana Quigley [04005394] (mod) Quest : ([04000DBC]aaNVB3Main01) The City of Woe EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\FemaleAdult01Default\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3DanaPsych_00006AD9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Main01.DanaGreeted to 15 rewardkarma -25
I'm just passing through. Is there anything I can do to help?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我只是路过。有什么我能帮忙的吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Unless you've got a golden goose, there's nothing. Damn fat cats in town are about to push me off my land.
ESP.TRADUIT: 除非你有一只会下金蛋的牲畜，否则这儿什么都没有。城里的肥猫都快把我赶出我的地盘了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dana Quigley [04005394] (mod) Quest : ([04000DBC]aaNVB3Main01) The City of Woe EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\FemaleAdult01Default\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3DanaPassi_00006ABD_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fat cats? Just give me their names, and all your problems will go away.
ESP.TRADUIT: 肥猫？只要告诉我他们的名字，你所有的问题就会迎刃而解的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What? No, it's... they're bureaucrats, someone else would just take their place. You must be crazy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么？不，是。。。他们是官僚，而别人会取代他们的位置的。你一定是疯了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dana Quigley [04005394] (mod) Quest : ([04000DBC]aaNVB3Main01) The City of Woe EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\FemaleAdult01Default\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3DanaGiveM_00006AC0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaNVB3DanaOfferPolite
ESP.TRADUIT: aaNVB3达娜提供应酬

ESP.ORIGINAL: I, I don't know what to say. Wait, did the Hostetlers put you up to this? You don't look rich... how did you get that kind of cash? Is this a con?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我、 我不知道该说什么。等等，是招待员让你这么做的吗？因为你看起来不富有。。。你是怎么拿到那笔钱的？这会是个骗局吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dana Quigley [04005394] (mod) Quest : ([04000DBC]aaNVB3Main01) The City of Woe EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\FemaleAdult01Default\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3DanaOffer_00006AC1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Would 2,000 caps get you on your feet? <Offer 2,000 caps>
ESP.TRADUIT: 2000瓶盖能让你走出低谷吗？<提供2000瓶盖>

ESP.ORIGINAL: I should get going.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我该走了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ok, bye.
ESP.TRADUIT: 行，再见。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dana Quigley [04005394] (mod) Quest : ([04000DBC]aaNVB3Main01) The City of Woe EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\FemaleAdult01Default\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3DanaNever_00006AC3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaNVB3DanaSpeech01
ESP.TRADUIT: aaNVB3达娜对话01

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't know what to say to this, other than thank you. You're going to give us our lives back, stranger. God bless you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 除了谢谢你，我不知道该说什么。你要我们的命还给了我们，陌生人。上帝保佑你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dana Quigley [04005394] (mod) Quest : ([04000DBC]aaNVB3Main01) The City of Woe EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\FemaleAdult01Default\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3DanaSpeec_00006AD7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.removeitem caps001 2000 set aaNVB3Main01.DanaGreeted to 6 setstage aaNVB3Main01 47
<Lie>My rich uncle recently died and left me a pile of caps. A little charity makes for good karma.
ESP.TRADUIT: <说谎>我有钱的叔叔最近去世了，他给我留下了一堆瓶盖。小小的施舍会带来好的汇报。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Take this money or I'll deposit your heart into the First Bank of Hell.
ESP.TRADUIT: 拿上这些钱吧，否则我会把你的心存进地狱第一银行的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, Christ almighty, anything you say! We are so very thankful! No questions, none whatsoever. Bless you, bless you, bless you!
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，万能的上帝啊，你说什么都行！我们非常感谢您！没有其他问题了，没有任何问题啦。祝福你，歌颂你，赞美你！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dana Quigley [04005394] (mod) Quest : ([04000DBC]aaNVB3Main01) The City of Woe EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\FemaleAdult01Default\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3DanaTerri_00006AC6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.removeitem caps001 2000 set aaNVB3Main01.DanaGreeted to 6 setstage aaNVB3Main01 47
<Lie> I'm just a concerned citizen with some extra caps. Nothing devious, I swear.
ESP.TRADUIT: <说谎> 我只是个有些多余瓶盖的热心市民。我发誓，这没什么不妥的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, ok. This is... I don't know what to say to this other than thank you. You're going to give us our lives back, stranger. God bless you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，好吧。这是。。。除了谢谢你，我不知道该怎么说。你把我们的命还给了我们，陌生人。上帝保佑你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dana Quigley [04005394] (mod) Quest : ([04000DBC]aaNVB3Main01) The City of Woe EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\FemaleAdult01Default\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3DanaLiePa_00006AC8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.removeitem caps001 2000 rewardkarma 50 set aaNVB3Main01.DanaGreeted to 5 setstage aaNVB3Main01 47 set aaNVB3Master.DanaFate to 1
Well, if you're going to take that kind of approach, you can just walk on out of here!
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，如果你要采取这种方法，你可以走了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dana Quigley [04005394] (mod) Quest : ([04000DBC]aaNVB3Main01) The City of Woe EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\FemaleAdult01Default\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3DanaLiePa_00006AD8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You want help? Shut up and take my money.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你需要些帮忙吗？拿上我的钱然后闭嘴吧你。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaNVB3DanaOfferMeager
ESP.TRADUIT: aaNVB3达娜提供不毛

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank you, stranger. I do appreciate the help. You'll always be welcome in our home.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢你，陌生人。我真的很感激你的帮助。我们家永远欢迎你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dana Quigley [04005394] (mod) Quest : ([04000DBC]aaNVB3Main01) The City of Woe EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\FemaleAdult01Default\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3DanaOffer_00006ACE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.removeitem caps001 200 set aaNVB3Main01.DanaGreeted to 4 setstage aaNVB3Main01 47
It's not much, but maybe this will make things easier for you. <Pay 200 caps>
ESP.TRADUIT: 虽然不多，但也许这会让你的生活更容易一些。<支付200瓶盖>

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's alright, hon. It's hard times for everyone right now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没关系，亲爱的。现在每个人都很困难。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dana Quigley [04005394] (mod) Quest : ([04000DBC]aaNVB3Main01) The City of Woe EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\FemaleAdult01Default\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3DanaOffer_00006AD1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm sorry, but I'm short on caps right now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我很抱歉，但我现在手头有点紧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've got to be honest with you - I'm the bounty hunter who killed your husband. I wanted to...
ESP.TRADUIT: 我必须对你说实话-我就是杀死你丈夫的赏金猎人。我想要。。。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wait, so you're the one... the one who killed my Tom? Get out, right now! Get out and take your blood money, you piece of shit! Out, now!
ESP.TRADUIT: 等等，你就是那个。。。杀了我的汤姆的那个人？滚出去，马上！出去去挣你的血汗钱吧，你这混蛋！滚出去，现在就滚出去！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dana Quigley [04005394] (mod) Quest : ([04000DBC]aaNVB3Main01) The City of Woe EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\FemaleAdult01Default\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3DanaTruth_00006AD3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Main01.DanaGreeted to 10 setstage aaNVB3Main01 47
That depends - what can you give me in return for my silence?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那要看情况了-你能给我什么来报答我的沉默？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have a handful of caps stowed away, but if that's not enough, well... I'll give you... myself. You can do anything you want.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我藏了一大把瓶盖，但如果这还不够的话。。。我会用我自己。。。我自己来支付你的报酬的。你想做什么就做什么吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dana Quigley [04005394] (mod) Quest : ([04000DBC]aaNVB3Main01) The City of Woe EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\FemaleAdult01Default\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3DanaPsych_00006ADE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fine, I'll keep your secret - for now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 行吧，我会帮你保密的————当然只是现在。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank you. Please, just leave me in peace now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢你。现在，请让我稍稍安静一会儿吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dana Quigley [04005394] (mod) Quest : ([04000DBC]aaNVB3Main01) The City of Woe EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\FemaleAdult01Default\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3DanaPsych_00006ADD_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaNVB3Main01 47
You'll do.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你会做的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's go in the bedroom, so my boys won't hear. {Sobs}
ESP.TRADUIT: 让我们去我卧室吧，这样我的孩子就不会听见了。{抽泣}
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dana Quigley [04005394] (mod) Quest : ([04000DBC]aaNVB3Main01) The City of Woe EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\FemaleAdult01Default\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3DanaPsych_00006AE2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: rewardkarma -100 ApplyImageSpaceModifier FadeToBlackAndBackISFX setstage aaNVB3Main01 47
Give me the caps and I'll keep my mouth shut.
ESP.TRADUIT: 把瓶盖给我，我就会让我的嘴巴闭上，在这件事像是个哑巴一样。

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is... {Holding back tears}everything we have. I don't know how we'll make it now, but I can't bear anyone knowing what I've done.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这就是。。。{忍住眼泪}我们所拥有的一切了。我不知道我们现在该怎么做，但我不能忍受任何人知道我做了些什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dana Quigley [04005394] (mod) Quest : ([04000DBC]aaNVB3Main01) The City of Woe EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\FemaleAdult01Default\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3DanaPsych_00006AE1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.additem caps001 250 rewardkarma -50 setstage aaNVB3Main01 47
aaNVB3DrususBark
ESP.TRADUIT: aaNVB3布拉修斯大脚

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who dares intrude in my quarters? Name yourselves.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谁胆敢侵入我的领地？报出你的名号！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marcus Scribonius Libo Drusus [04006DF5] (mod) Quest : ([04000DBC]aaNVB3Main01) The City of Woe EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3DrususBar_00006DFC_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Main01.DrususGreeted to 1 aaVirgilRef.SayTo aaDrususRef aaNVB3DrususBark
By Mars, if you don't identify yourself, I'll bludgeon you and that other renegade into bloody pulp!
ESP.TRADUIT: 以战神之名，如果你还不表明自己的身份，我就把你和那个叛徒打得血肉模糊！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marcus Scribonius Libo Drusus [04006DF5] (mod) Quest : ([04000DBC]aaNVB3Main01) The City of Woe EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3DrususBar_00006E02_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Main01.DrususGreeted to 3 aaVirgilRef.SayTo aaDrususRef aaNVB3DrususBark
You listen, profligate. I am done dealing with Marko or his lackeys. I do not answer to lawless scum!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你给我听着，堕落者。我不再和马尔科或他的仆人打交道了。我不会回应那些无法无天的人渣的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marcus Scribonius Libo Drusus [04006DF5] (mod) Quest : ([04000DBC]aaNVB3Main01) The City of Woe EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3DrususBar_00006E04_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Main01.DrususGreeted to 5 aaVirgilRef.SayTo aaDrususRef aaNVB3DrususBark
I... I can't... the speculatores are investigating. If they know I dealt with you, I'll be scourged and crucified like a low criminal!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我...我不能...那些密探正在调查我。如果他们知道我和你打过交道，我会像个卑鄙的罪犯一样被鞭打和钉死在十字架上的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marcus Scribonius Libo Drusus [04006DF5] (mod) Quest : ([04000DBC]aaNVB3Main01) The City of Woe EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3DrususBar_00006E06_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Main01.DrususGreeted to 7 aaVirgilRef.SayTo aaDrususRef aaNVB3DrususBark
I will never yield! I am mighty, I am invincible, I am a colossus!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我决不屈服！我是强大的，我是不可战胜的，我可是一个巨人！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marcus Scribonius Libo Drusus [04006DF5] (mod) Quest : ([04000DBC]aaNVB3Main01) The City of Woe EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3DrususBar_00006E08_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaNVB3Main01 52 aaVirgilREF.UseWeapon aaWeapUber44Revolver aaVirgilConfrontDrususREF aaDrususREF 1 0 0 1 0
{QUID-AH-GEES}Not a polite reception, I must say. Is the hammer necessary? I think you're making my friend nervous.
ESP.TRADUIT: {什-么-鬼}我得说，这的确不是一个礼貌的接待。你有必要用锤子吗？我想你让我朋友感到紧张了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([04000DBC]aaNVB3Main01) The City of Woe EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3DrususBar_00006E01_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Main01.DrususGreeted to 2 aaDrususRef.SayTo aaVirgilRef aaNVB3DrususBark
I go by Virgil, but that's not really germane to the discussion. See, Drusus... I answer to a certain Marko, you might have heard of him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是维吉尔，但这和我们的讨论并没有什么关系。看，德鲁苏斯...我要向马尔科准确的回答你的事情，而你可能听说过他。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([04000DBC]aaNVB3Main01) The City of Woe EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3DrususBar_00006E03_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Main01.DrususGreeted to 4 aaDrususRef.SayTo aaVirgilRef aaNVB3DrususBark
Scum? That's harsh, Drusus. Harsh. You might not deign to speak with us now, but I seem to recall you happy to accept our captives a few months ago.
ESP.TRADUIT: 人渣？那太残酷了，德鲁索斯。太严厉了。你现在也许不会屈尊跟我们说话，但我似乎记得几个月前你很高兴接受了我们的俘虏。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([04000DBC]aaNVB3Main01) The City of Woe EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3DrususBar_00006E05_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Main01.DrususGreeted to 6 aaDrususRef.SayTo aaVirgilRef aaNVB3DrususBark
But you are a criminal. You should've embraced it. Believe me, life is so much simpler... and fulfilling. Better than all this stilted soldiering.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但你是个罪犯。而你应该接受这个身份。相信我，在那儿生活会简单很多的。。。也会令人满足。总比这些踩着高跷的士兵要好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([04000DBC]aaNVB3Main01) The City of Woe EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3DrususBar_00006E07_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Main01.DrususGreeted to 8 aaDrususRef.SayTo aaVirgilRef aaNVB3DrususBark
aaBARKKarlBitch
ESP.TRADUIT: aa巴克卡尔婊子

ESP.ORIGINAL: Shut the fuck up, bitch! You want another smack? Do you? When Karl says to suck his dick, you better motherfucking suck!
ESP.TRADUIT: 闭嘴，婊子！你想再被扇一巴掌吗？你想吗？当卡尔说吸他的鸡巴的时候，你最好他妈的吸！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : King Karl [04004A5C] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaVirgilQu_aaBARKKarlBitch_00003B10_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Actually, I need more time to prepare.
ESP.TRADUIT: 事实上，我需要更多时间来准备。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's fine. I'll just be waiting up here amidst Cazadors, Deathclaws, and roving bands of raiders. No problem whatsoever.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没关系。我就在大毒蜂、死亡爪和游荡的匪徒中等着你。没有丝毫的问题。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilLeaveWa_00008894_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaVirgilLeaveReady
ESP.TRADUIT: aa维吉尔准备离开

ESP.ORIGINAL: Christ, this is going to be a long trip.
ESP.TRADUIT: 天哪...这一定会是一段非常漫长的旅途。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilLeaveRe_00008895_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.additem aaNVB3DepartureToken 1 1
I has pee-peed. We goes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我已经尿好了。我们去。（低智力)

ESP.ORIGINAL: Only 250 miles to go. Let's get started.
ESP.TRADUIT: 只剩下250英里了。我们开始吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilLeaveRe_00061DAA_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.additem aaNVB3DepartureToken 1 1
I'm ready to leave for Frosthill.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我已经准备好去霜地了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, there's no way I'm hauling that riffraff to Frosthill. You need to kiss your amigos goodbye, then we can set off.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是啊，不过我不可能把你的伙计们都拖到霜地去。你得跟你的朋友吻别，然后我们才能出发。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilLeaveRe_00008896_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm ready.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我准备好了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, there's no way I'm hauling that riffraff to Frosthill. You need to kiss your amigos goodbye, then we can set off.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是啊，不过我不可能把你的伙计们都拖到霜地去。你得跟你的朋友吻别，然后我们才能出发。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilLeaveRe_00008898_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm ready.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我准备好了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, there's no way I'm hauling that riffraff to Frosthill. You need to kiss your amigos goodbye, then we can set off.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是啊，不过我不可能把你的伙计们都拖到霜地去。你得跟你的朋友吻别，然后我们才能出发。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilLeaveRe_00008897_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm ready.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我准备好了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaRandallPostAmbush01Greeting
ESP.TRADUIT: aa兰道尔伏击之后greeting

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, hell fire! If it isn't my old protege, come up all the way from the Mojave Wasteland. You are a sight for sore eyes, old friend!
ESP.TRADUIT: 天哪，地狱之火啊！这不是我的老朋友[%]么，从莫哈维废土一路走来。老朋友，你真是个令人眼痛的人！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallPostAm_000153F0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How the hell are you? Took your sweet-ass time getting here, if I may say so.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你他妈的现在怎么样？如果我可以这么说的话，看来你花了不少时间才把你这小屁股挪过来啊。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallPostAm_000153F0_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRandallQuest.RandallGreeted to 0
aaNVB3Main02RandallBARKPostAmbush
ESP.TRADUIT: aaNVB3主线02兰道尔大叫在伏击之后

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll be damned if they don't try to bushwhack everbody that comes in this God-forsaken canyon! You ok, stranger?
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果他们不想对这个被上帝遗弃的峡谷里的每一个人都进行丛林袭击的话，我肯定会乐意下地狱的！你还好吧，陌生人？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FCB7]aaNVB3Main02) Devil's Due EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main02Ran_00012366_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's good to see you too. I had a few delays, but I got here just the same.
ESP.TRADUIT: 见到你也很高兴。我有几次耽搁，但我还是来了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, I reckon so. We got a lot of catching up to do, but we best do it back at my shack. It ain't safe out here in the open.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，我想是的。我们有很多事情要赶着做好，但最好还是回我的小屋去。外面可不安全。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallPostAm_000153EF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here's the spot on your map. It ain't much, but there's shelter and some warm beds. Stop by and I'll catch you up on everything. Be careful, now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是你地图上的位置。虽然没什么东西，但至少有个庇护所和一些温暖的床。过来，我会把一切都告诉你的。现在小心点些。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallPostAm_000153EF_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaNVB3RandallREF.addscriptpackage aaRandallSitOnAssPackage aaNVB3RandallREF.evp setstage aaNVB3Main02 20
I got here, didn't I? It's not exactly a quick trip.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我来了，不是吗？这其实不算是一次短暂的旅行。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, I reckon so. We got a lot of catching up to do, but we best do it back at my shack. It ain't safe out here in the open.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，我想是的。我们有很多事情要赶着做好，但最好还是回我的小屋去。外面可不安全。
