ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallPostAm_000153ED_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here's the spot on your map. It ain't much, but there's shelter and some warm beds. Stop by and I'll catch you up on everything. Be careful, now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是你地图上的位置。虽然没什么东西，但至少有个庇护所和一些温暖的床。过来，我会把一切都告诉你的。现在小心点些。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallPostAm_000153ED_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaNVB3RandallREF.addscriptpackage aaRandallSitOnAssPackage aaNVB3RandallREF.evp setstage aaNVB3Main02 20
Turning into a zombie made you surly, didn't it? I got here when I could, goddamit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 变成僵尸让你变成了暴脾气，不是吗？我一有空就来了，你这家伙。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I see you still don't have any manners. We got a lot of catching up to do, but we best do it back at my shack. It ain't safe out here in the open.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我看的出来，你还是什么没礼貌。虽然我们有很多事情要赶着去做，但最好还是回我的小屋去吧。外面可不安全。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallPostAm_000153EE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here's the spot on your map. It ain't much, but there's shelter and some warm beds. Stop by and I'll catch you up on everything. Be careful, now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是你地图上的位置。虽然没什么东西，但至少有个庇护所和一些温暖的床。过来，我会把一切都告诉你的。现在小心点些。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallPostAm_000153EE_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaNVB3RandallREF.addscriptpackage aaRandallSitOnAssPackage aaNVB3RandallREF.evp setstage aaNVB3Main02 20
You're alive? I thought they buried you in the desert.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你还活着？ 我还以为他们把你埋在沙漠中了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Easy, partner. I'm a zombie, but not a ghost. Did you have any more traumatic head injuries? I don't remember you being like... this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 放轻松，伙伴。 我是个僵尸，但不是鬼。 你还有其他头部的外伤吗？ 我不记得你像...这样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallPostAm_000136AD_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: YOU IS GHOST!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你死鬼！（低智力）

ESP.ORIGINAL: Didn't you get the letter? Damn, I paid that Courier extra, and he still couldn't get it done. Goddamn messengers are useless!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你没收到信吗？该死，我付了快递费，他还是没能办到。这该死的信使真是没用！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallPostAm_00061DBA_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: As you can see, I ain't dead... well, not entirely. I'm more or less a walking corpse thanks to that cocksucker Sugar. Goddamn sonofabitch!
ESP.TRADUIT: 如你所见，我并没有死。。。嗯，不完全是。多亏了那个笨蛋做的蠢事，不然我差不多就是个活死人了。那个该死的狗娘养的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallPostAm_00061DBA_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaRandallPostAmbush01GotLetter
ESP.TRADUIT: aa兰道尔在腹肌01得到信件

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd like to ask you a question.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想问你一个问题。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ask away.
ESP.TRADUIT: 问吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallASK01_000153F8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaRandallNextBounty
ESP.TRADUIT: aa兰道尔下一个赏金

ESP.ORIGINAL: Brookshire's got the intel, go see him for the details. I'll get the rest of our posse formed up. It's time to finish this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 布鲁克希尔有情报了，去看他了解详情。我会把剩下的人安排好的。是时候结束这一切了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.additem aaNVB3SpeechToken 1 1
I'm ready to go after Marko.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我准备去追马尔科了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is the last one, and he's the only thing between us and Marko. He's a scalphunter by the name of Glanton. I believe ya'll have some history.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是最后一个，他是我们和马尔科之间唯一的阻碍。他是个叫格兰顿的猎头。我相信你会有一些关于他的历史。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: Glanton and Marko certainly seem like an odd pair, but it worked out for both parties. Marko hates 80's, and Glanton likes scalping them. Bingo.
ESP.TRADUIT: 格兰顿和马尔科看起来确实是一对奇怪的人，但这对双方都适用。马克讨厌80年代帮，而格兰顿喜欢把他们剥下来。瞧瞧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: We have a good idea on where Marko's holed up, but I'm not going to move on him until Glanton is out of the picture. He's simply too dangerous.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们很清楚马尔科藏身的地方，但在格兰顿没有离开之前我不会去找马克的。他太危险了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: As you probably know, this ain't a ragtag band of shitbirds. Glanton's crew will fight you tooth and nail, so be ready.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你可能知道，这不是一群乱七八糟的混蛋。格兰顿的人会全力对付你的，所以准备好了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: The good news is that you'll get another shot to claim the bounty on Glanton. It's 10,000 caps if you bring back his finger. Any questions?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好消息是，你会得到另一个机会来获得格兰顿赏金。如果你把他的手指拿回来就能有10000个瓶盖。有问题吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm ready for another bounty.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我准备好接下一个赏金了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is the last one, and he's the only thing between us and Marko. His name is Glanton, an old scalphunter who came here to slaughter 80's.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是最后一个，他是我们和马尔科之间唯一的阻碍。他叫格兰顿，一个来这里屠宰80年代帮的老黄牛猎人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: Story on him is that he used to kill tribals for the NCR, but over time he got carried away and was sort of disowned by the brass.
ESP.TRADUIT: 关于他的故事是，他曾经为NCR杀死部落，但随着时间的推移，他变得神魂颠倒，有点被黄铜否认。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: Before teaming up with Marko, he supposedly exterminated an entire tribe south of Vegas, not far from your neck of the woods.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在和马尔科合作之前，他应该消灭了维加斯以南的一个部落，离你的地段不远。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: Glanton and Marko certainly seem like an odd pair, but it worked out for both parties. Marko hates 80's, and Glanton likes scalping them. Bingo.
ESP.TRADUIT: 格兰顿和马尔科看起来确实是一对奇怪的人，但这对双方都适用。马克讨厌80年代帮，而格兰顿喜欢把他们剥下来。瞧瞧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: We have a good idea on where Marko's holed up, but I'm not going to move on him until Glanton is out of the picture. He's simply too dangerous.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们很清楚马尔科藏身的地方，但在格兰顿没有离开之前我不会去找马克的。他太危险了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: This ain't a ragtag band of shitbirds, either. Glanton's crew will fight you tooth and nail, so be ready.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这可不是一群乱七八糟的混蛋。格兰顿的人会全力对付你的，所以准备好了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallNextBo_000233B1_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The good news is that Glanton still has one hell of a bounty on his head. It's 10,000 caps if you bring back his finger. Any questions?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好消息是，你会得到另一个机会来获得格兰顿赏金。如果你把他的手指拿回来就能有10000个瓶盖。有问题吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallNextBo_000233B1_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm ready for another bounty.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我准备好接受另一个赏金了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: This time you'll be going after Ketchum, who heads the "Hole-in-the-Ground" Gang, or as I like to call them, the gloryhole gang.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这一次你要去追凯彻姆，他是"地洞"帮派的头目，或者正如我喜欢叫他们的，一发洞帮。（指将阳具伸入期中获得口交服务的洞）
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallNextBo_000233AC_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Folks say that Ketchum has been with Marko for a long time, probably since he was in the plains. He's got a nasty bunch that run with him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 人们说凯彻姆和马尔科在一起已经有很长时间了，可能是因为他在平原上。而他有一群讨厌的家伙跟他一起活动。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallNextBo_000233AC_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: See, the gloryhole gang does the nasty stuff in places where others won't go, so Marko always has a job or some place to stick them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你看，一发洞帮在别人不去的地方干坏事，所以马尔科总是有工作或是有地方能派遣他们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallNextBo_000233AC_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: On top of running a gang, Ketchum is supposed to be a mad scientist type with explosives. He can open safes or rig up nasty traps all the same.
ESP.TRADUIT: 除了管理一个团伙，凯彻姆应该是一个疯狂的科学家类型还有大量爆炸物。他可以打开保险箱，也可以装上肮脏的陷阱。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallNextBo_000233AC_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Everybody knows that you're gunning for them now, so that means Ketchum will be ready, and probably has all type of shit in place.
ESP.TRADUIT: 每个人都知道你现在正在向他们开枪，所以这意味着凯彻姆已经准备好了，而且可能已经准备好了各种各样的东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallNextBo_000233AC_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You best watch your step, cause I don't feel like collecting your guts from some dirty cave. Any questions?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你最好小心你的脚步，因为我不想把你的内脏从肮脏的山洞里捡起来。有问题吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallNextBo_000233AC_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm ready for another bounty.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我准备好接受另一个赏金了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's no secret that Marko likes to keep expert gunmen in his crew, but there is one that stands out above the rest: Angel Lee.
ESP.TRADUIT: 马尔科喜欢在他的团队里保留专业的枪手，这已经不是什么秘密了，但有一个比其他人更突出的：安杰尔·李。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallNextBo_00020393_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He is a gunfighter on par with Doc Friday, and I don't have to tell you how fast that is. Lee is as deadly as a damn snake.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他是一个和星期五医生一样的枪手，我不需要告诉你有多快。李就像蝰蛇一样致命。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallNextBo_00020393_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just like with Bill, you need to try and make this an honest case of self-defense. Lee should be easy to convince, though. He's a duelist.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就像对待比尔一样，你需要努力让这成为一个诚实的自卫案例。不过，李应该很容易被说服。他是个决斗者。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallNextBo_00020393_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Find some way to get him to draw first... but don't get yourself killed in the process. Any questions?
ESP.TRADUIT: 想办法让他先拔枪。。。但不要在这个过程中丢了小命。有问题吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallNextBo_00020393_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm ready for another bounty.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我准备好接受另一个赏金了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You'll be getting two for the price of one with this next bounty. The targets are Ingram and Saunders, two badasses that've always run together.
ESP.TRADUIT: 下一笔赏金，你将以一个的价格处理两个目标。目标是英格拉姆和桑德斯，这两个坏蛋总是跑在一起。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallNextBo_00029336_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They're the honchos of a big, nasty raider crew. Word is that they're just outside the pass, hitting caravans and fighting 80's.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们是一个又大又讨厌的突击队的元帅。据说他们就在山口外，袭击商队和与80年代帮大战。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallNextBo_00029336_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're gonna have a long trip ahead of... hold on, did you hear that? Fucking gunfire... fuck, we better get to the wall! C'mon!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你会有一个漫长的旅程。。。等等，你听到了吗？该死的枪声。。。妈的，我们最好到墙上去！快点！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallNextBo_00029336_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: startquest aaNVB3MainAttack set aaNVB3MainAttack.Started to 1 setstage aaNVB3MainAttack 5
I'm ready for another bounty.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我准备好接受另一个赏金了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: For years Marko has kept a badass super mutant in his entourage, supposedly goes by the name of Porter. He's a veritable monster by all accounts.
ESP.TRADUIT: 多年来，马尔科在他的随行人员中一直保留着一个超级变种人，据说叫波特。听说他是个名副其实的怪物。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallNextBo_0001D3EA_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: My source says that Porter is little better than a slave to Marko, but he's completely devoted. No telling what makes that thing tick.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的线人说波特只不过是马尔科的奴隶，但他完全忠于职守。不知道是什么让这件事发生。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallNextBo_0001D3EA_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anyway, he's supposed to be hidden away in that old pre-war base inside a nearby mountain. On top of the mutant, Marko keeps supplies in there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管怎么说，他应该藏在附近一座山的战前基地里。在变种人身上，马尔科会把补给放在那里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallNextBo_0001D3EA_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You might be thinking, "This is my lucky day", but think again. Marko and his boys keep that place booby-trapped to high hell.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你可能会想，"这是我的幸运日"，但请再想想。马尔科和他的小子们把那个地方变成了地狱。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallNextBo_0001D3EA_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Once the mutant is gone, it'll be one less reason for Frosthill to support Marko. Any questions?
ESP.TRADUIT: 一旦变种人消失，这将是霜地不再支持马尔科的一个理由。有问题吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm ready for another bounty.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我准备好接受另一个赏金了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay, your target is Oliver Doolin, one of the most prolific caravan robbers in recent history.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，你的目标是奥利弗 杜林，最近历史上最多产的商队劫匪之一。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallNextBo_0001B6D9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: For over two decades he and a number of cronies pillaged NCR commerce in and around the frontier. It was only recently that he teamed up with Marko.
ESP.TRADUIT: 二十多年来，他和一些亲信在边境内外掠夺NCR的商队。直到最近他才和马尔科开始合作。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallNextBo_0001B6D9_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nobody's quite sure why he got in bed with Marko, but he did. That gets him on our list. My source indicates he's alone in a shack outside town.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没人知道他为什么和马尔科上了一张床，但他确实是。这让他上了我们的名单。我的消息来源显示他独自一人在城外的一个棚屋里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallNextBo_0001B6D9_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He might not be surrounded by a gang, but don't underestimate Doolin. He's rumored to be quick and steady, a dangerous combination.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他也许没有被帮派包围，但不要低估杜林。据传他动作敏捷稳重，这是一个危险的组合。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallNextBo_0001B6D9_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Any questions?
ESP.TRADUIT: 有问题吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallNextBo_0001B6D9_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm ready for another bounty.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我准备好接受另一个赏金了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: This time you're going after Squirrely Bill Blasius, a bigmouthed cowboy who heads a gang of rowdies called "The Vacqueros".
ESP.TRADUIT: 这次你要找的是狂人比尔·布拉修斯，一个说大话的牛仔，他领导着一帮叫“牛仔们”的无赖。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallNextBo_0001A350_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: In addition to being a full-time bandit, he claims to have the most magnificent moustache in the territory.
ESP.TRADUIT: 除了是一个全职的强盗，他还自称拥有全境最华丽的胡子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallNextBo_0001A350_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: In my experience, only civil servants and pedophiles wear moustaches with pride. He's definitely not the former, so that narrows it down.
ESP.TRADUIT: 以我的经验，只有公务员和恋童癖者才会骄傲地留胡子。他肯定不是前一个，所以我们可以缩小范围。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallNextBo_0001A350_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ol' Bill recently set himself up at the town saloon, and he's now in the midst of a gambling bender. He also brought a few ruffians with him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 老比尔最近在镇上的酒馆自谋生路，他现在正处于一场赌博狂欢中。他还带了几个恶棍。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallNextBo_0001A350_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: A bounty is a bounty, but this one ain't so simple. We already have a touchy relationship with the town, so I don't want to make things worse.
ESP.TRADUIT: 赏金就是赏金，但这个并不简单。我们和镇上的关系已经很紧张了，所以我不想让事情变得更糟。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallNextBo_0001A350_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You can't just slip in and chop his head off or snipe him. It needs to at least look like self-defense, otherwise the townsfolk get all pissy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不能随便溜进来砍他的头或是狙击他。至少要看起来像自卫，否则镇上的人都会发火。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallNextBo_0001A350_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've no doubt you can find some way to offend the fellow. Once he draws on you it's fair game. If you can pull it off I'll throw in a bonus.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我相信你能找到办法得罪那家伙。一旦他向你拔枪，那这是场公平的游戏了。如果你能成功，我会给你一笔奖金。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallNextBo_0001A350_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Word has it that he's particularly touchy about the moustache, so there's a start. Any questions?
ESP.TRADUIT: 据说他对胡子特别敏感，所以有个开始。有问题吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallNextBo_0001A350_8.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm ready for another bounty.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我准备好接受另一个赏金了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good. The target is Kicking Dog, a humongous savage who broke away from the White Legs a while back and formed his own gang.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好。目标是恶腿踢狗，他是一个脱离了白腿不久后的大野蛮人，之后形成了自己的团伙。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallNextBo_000180AF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Seeing as to how he only had a few men with him, Dog eventually joined up with Marko, who was more than happy to put his skills to use.
ESP.TRADUIT: 考虑到他身边只有几个男人，狗狗最终加入了马尔科的行列，而马尔科非常乐意运用他的技能。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallNextBo_000180AF_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Kicking Dog got his name from the way he kicks men to death, all while he snarls and drools like a mad dog. He's probably on chems.
ESP.TRADUIT: 恶腿踢狗的名字来源于他把人踢死的方式，他会像疯狗一样咆哮着流口水。他可能是在化疗。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallNextBo_000180AF_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You can find him and a few compadres over in Wolfhead Cavern, not far from here. Any questions?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你可以在离这里不远的狼头洞穴里找到他和几个同伴。有问题吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallNextBo_000180AF_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm ready for another bounty.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我准备好接受另一个赏金了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I got to tell you, I'm downright giddy about this. It's just like the old days. You excited too? Ready to get out and kill some bad guys?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我得告诉你，我完全晕了。就像以前一样。你也很兴奋？准备好出去杀几个坏人了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallNextBo_00016561_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd like to go after the first target.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想追第一个目标。

ESP.ORIGINAL: We're off to a good start, then. I've still got a long list of names, so let me know when you're ready for the next target.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么，我们有一个好的开始。我还有一长串的名字，所以等你准备好下一个目标的时候告诉我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallNextBo_00015F35_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.removeitem aaGarzaFinger 1 setstage aaNVB3Main02 40 player.additem caps001 500
I killed Garza. Here's his finger.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我杀了加尔萨，这是他的手指。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I suppose he kicked his last, then. Serves that savage right. Here's your reward. Come on back when you're ready for the next one.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么，我想他踢了人生中最后一条狗。为那个野蛮人服务。这是你的奖励。等你准备好下一个再来吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallNextBo_000180AE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.removeitem aaKickingDogFinger 1 setstage aaNVB3Main02 60 player.additem caps001 500
I killed Kicking Dog. Here's his finger.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我杀死了恶腿踢狗，这是他的手指。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sometimes nicknames are just random or nonsensical, but his was dead on. Squirrelly, indeed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有时绰号只是随机的或是荒谬的，但他的绰号已经过时了。真是疯了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallNextBo_00018A97_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You played this one smart, and I appreciate it. We're one step closer to Marko, and the townsfolk are starting to... hate us less.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你很聪明，我很感激。我们离马尔科又近了一步，镇民们开始...少恨我们一点了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallNextBo_00018A97_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It was excellent work, so here's the bonus, as promised. Get rested and report back when you're ready.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是一项出色的工作，所以这是我们承诺过的奖金。休息一下，准备好后再报告。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallNextBo_00018A97_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.removeitem aaBillBlasiusFinger 1 setstage aaNVB3Main02 80 player.additem caps001 1000
I killed Bill Blasius in self-defense. Here's his finger.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我通过正当防卫杀死了比尔·布拉修斯。这是他的手指。

ESP.ORIGINAL: There is a time and place to shoot first. Hell, I'm all for shooting first, did it once in a fucking cantina with a smuggler.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有时间和地点让你先开枪。见鬼，我完全赞成先开枪，因为我在他妈的酒馆和走私犯一起干过一次。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallNextBo_00018A98_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: However, this was not one of those other moments... specifically, it was a time for you to follow instructions.
ESP.TRADUIT: 然而，这不是其他的时刻。。。具体来说，这是一个让你遵循指示的时间。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallNextBo_00018A98_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The bonus is gone, but that ain't the point. I need to know I can rely on you when shit starts to get serious around here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 奖金没了，但那不是重点。我要知道当这里的事情变得严重的时候我可以依靠你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallNextBo_00018A98_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Soon there's gonna come a time when you can't retard your way through problems, and if you fuck up it will be more than your paycheck that suffers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很快就会有这样一个时刻：你不能迟迟不去解决问题，如果你搞砸了，你的损失将超过你的薪水。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallNextBo_00018A98_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now get the fuck out of here, and don't come back until you've pulled your head out of your ass.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在他妈的滚出去，等你把脑袋从屁股里拔出来再回来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallNextBo_00018A98_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.removeitem aaBillBlasiusFinger 1 setstage aaNVB3Main02 80 player.additem caps001 500
I killed Bill Blasius, but I had to shoot first. Here's his finger.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我杀了比尔·布拉修斯，但我必须先开枪。这是他的手指。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, I heard... some kind of freak aneurysm, right? Just, uh... don't stare at me, please? Kind of creeping me out right now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，我听说。。。某种畸形动脉瘤，对吧？只是，呃。。。别盯着我看，好吗？我现在有点害怕。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallNextBo_0001990D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, here's your pay, bonus included. Come back when you're ready for another job.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，这是你的工资，包括奖金。等你准备好另一份工作再回来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallNextBo_0001990D_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.removeitem aaBillBlasiusFinger 1 setstage aaNVB3Main02 80 player.additem caps001 1000
Bill Blasius had an... accident. Here's his finger.
ESP.TRADUIT: 比尔·布拉修斯发生了一个...意外。这是他的手指。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I know he wasn't as rough as some of the others, but it had to be done. His past was bound to catch up with him at some point.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道他不像其他人那么粗鲁，但这是必须的。他的过去罪行一定会在某个时候抓住他的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallNextBo_0001A897_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I hope you caught your breath with Doolin, because the next one is going to be a bitch. Just let me know when you're ready for it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我希望你能和杜林在一起屏住呼吸，因为下一个会是个婊子。你准备好了就告诉我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallNextBo_0001A897_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.removeitem aaOliverDoolinFinger 1 setstage aaNVB3Main02 100 player.additem caps001 500
I killed Oliver Doolin. Here's his finger.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我杀了奥利弗 杜林。这是他的手指。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What? That makes my ass want to dip snuff! Goddamn ridiculous!
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么？这让我想吸鼻烟！真他妈可笑！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallNextBo_0001A898_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I trust you to carry out these bounties and have a little faith in my strategy. Every one you take down gets us one step closer to Marko.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我相信你会执行这些赏金，并对我的策略有一点信心。你每击倒一个都能让我们离马尔科更近一步。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallNextBo_0001A898_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you start picking and choosing, we won't get nowhere. Oh, and we'll be broke. Now I have to explain to Brookshire why Doolin escaped.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你开始挑选，我们就一无所获。哦，我们会破产的。现在我得向布鲁克希尔解释为什么杜林逃跑了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallNextBo_0001A898_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You can forget about any payment, goddamit. Just get the fuck out of here, and don't come back until you stop being all pussified.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不要想要任何报酬了，该死的。他妈的给我滚出去，别再回来了，直到你不再被人欺负。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallNextBo_0001A898_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaNVB3Main02 100
I decided to let Oliver Doolin go. He's no threat to us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我决定让奥利弗·杜林离开，他对我们不再有威胁了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Did you pick up religion or something since we last worked together? I'm worried you're turning into some kind of humanitarian. Shit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 自从我们上次一起工作以来，你有没有染上宗教信仰？我担心你会变成一个人道主义者。倒霉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallNextBo_0001CF18_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Porter is a pure killing machine, and you just let him go. Nice, real nice. I'm gonna have to concoct some bullshit explanation for Brookshire.
ESP.TRADUIT: 波特是个纯粹的杀人机器，你就放了他。很好，真的很好。我得给布鲁克希尔编些胡说八道的解释。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here, I'll give you half-pay, out of my own pocket, no less. Consider it my charitable act for... forever. Now get the fuck out of here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在这里，我会给你一半的报酬，从我自己的口袋里掏出来，一点也不少。我的慈善行为。。。永远。现在他妈的滚出去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaNVB3Main02 120 player.additem caps001 250
I persuaded Porter to leave. He won't be assisting Marko anymore.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我说服波特离开。他不会再帮助马尔科了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Taking down a crazed super mutant is no small thing, so here's a bonus for seeing it through.
ESP.TRADUIT: 击倒一个疯狂的超级变种人并不是一件小事，所以这里有一个奖励来帮助你度过难关。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallNextBo_0001CF19_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: When you're ready for more work, just check in with me. The next one is a gunfighter, should be right up your alley.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当你准备好做更多的工作时，就和我联系。下一个是枪手，应该就在你的掌心里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallNextBo_0001CF19_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.removeitem aaPorterFinger 1 setstage aaNVB3Main02 120 player.additem caps001 750
I killed Porter. Here's his finger.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我杀了波特。这是他的手指。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Excellent work. Killed him in the same exact way he gunned down so many others... fitting. Here's a bonus for doing it right.
ESP.TRADUIT: 干得好。以他枪杀了那么多人的同样方式杀死他。。。太他妈适合了。这是你做对的奖励。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallNextBo_0001E283_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Come on back when you're ready for the next gig. We're coming down to the last of them, so it's gonna be tough. See ya later.
ESP.TRADUIT: 等你准备好下一场演出再回来。我们快要到最后一个了，所以这会很艰难。再见。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallNextBo_0001E283_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.removeitem aaLeeFinger 1 setstage aaNVB3Main02 140 player.additem caps001 1000
I killed Angel Lee in self-defense. Here's his finger.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我用正当防卫的方式杀死了安杰尔·李。这是他的手指。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Stupid! Goddamn stupid! This bastard would have dueled Jesus Christ if he'd asked, yet you had to bushwhack him like a fucking idiot!
ESP.TRADUIT: 蠢货！你这该死的蠢货！如果他问的话，这个混蛋会和耶稣决斗的，但你不一样，你必须像他妈的白痴一样揍他！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallNextBo_0001E284_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No bonus, that's for fucking sure. Keep it up and we might just have to call the whole fucking thing off! Get the fuck out of here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没有奖金，这他妈的是肯定的。继续这么做，我们可能就得把这一切都搞砸了！他妈的滚出去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallNextBo_0001E284_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.removeitem aaLeeFinger 1 setstage aaNVB3Main02 140 player.additem caps001 500
I killed Angel Lee, but I had to shoot first. Here's his finger.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我杀了安杰尔·李，但我不得不先开枪。这是他的手指。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, if there's anyone you can trust it's a greasy gunfighter who's been working for a psychopath. Good call, chief.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，如果有人你可以相信的话，那就是一个为精神病患者工作的油腻的枪手。打得好，长官。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallNextBo_0001E285_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You must not like money, because this peace and charity bullshit will make you broke. If asshole Lee shows up again, it's your ass, comprende?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你必须不能喜欢上钱，因为这种和平和慈善的胡说八道会让你破产。如果那个叫李的混蛋再出现，那是你惹的祸，明白吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallNextBo_0001E285_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now get on out of here and get your shit together. The next job is gonna be bloody, and you won't be able to talk your way out of it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在离开这里，把你的东西都收拾好。因为下一份工作会是血腥的，而你却无法说服你自己留出一条活路。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallNextBo_0001E285_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.removeitem aaLeeFinger 1 setstage aaNVB3Main02 140
I wounded Angel Lee and decided to let him go on the condition he never returns.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我打伤了安杰尔·李，并决定让他走，条件是他永远也不会回来。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Normally I'd call bullshit, but somehow I believe you. I don't know how you do it, but you can sure put the fear of God in a man.
ESP.TRADUIT: 通常我会认为这是胡扯，但不知怎的我相信你。我不知道你是怎么做到的，但你可以肯定地把对上帝的恐惧加迫于一个人身上。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallNextBo_0001E286_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: On account of your confidence in this outcome, I'll throw in half the bounty. Come on back when you're ready for work.
ESP.TRADUIT: 考虑到你对这个结果的信心，我将把赏金的一半投进去。当你准备好工作了就回来找我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallNextBo_0001E286_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.removeitem aaLeeFinger 1 setstage aaNVB3Main02 140 player.additem caps001 250
Lee begged for his life after I wounded him. I convinced him to leave, so he won't be a problem.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在我打伤他后，李哀求我放他一条生路。我说服他离开，所以他不会再对我们造成什么问题了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Damn, I figured Ketchum would run before he would swallow a bullet. They're fucking scared. They're starting to fear you more than Marko.
ESP.TRADUIT: {格兰顿死了}该死，我以为凯彻姆会在他吞下一颗子弹之前就逃跑了。他们真的他妈的很害怕。比起马尔科，他们开始更害怕你了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallNextBo_00020841_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He's losing his hold on this place, seeing as to how his men are dropping like flies. We're almost ready to go after him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他失去了对这个地方的控制，看他的人怎么像苍蝇一样掉下来。我们几乎要准备好追他了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallNextBo_00020841_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This last one is gonna be rough. Get rested and squared away, then check in with me to get the ball rolling. We're almost there, partner.
ESP.TRADUIT: 最后一个会很艰难。休息一下，整理一下，然后和我一起去打那个混球吧。我们就快到了，伙计。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallNextBo_00020841_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.removeitem aaKetchumFinger 1 setstage aaNVB3Main02 160 player.additem caps001 500
Ketchum was dead when I found him. He had recently committed suicide. Here's his finger.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在我找到凯彻姆的时候他就死了。看起来他最近自杀了。这是他的手指。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Glanton Dead}Damn, I figured Ketchum would run before he would swallow a bullet. They're fucking scared. They're starting to fear you more than Marko.
ESP.TRADUIT: {格兰顿死了}该死，我以为凯彻姆会在他吞下一颗子弹之前就逃跑了。他们真的他妈的很害怕。比起马尔科，他们开始更害怕你了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallNextBo_000735FD_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We've got one name left on our list. I think it's high time we put everything in motion for the final push.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们的名单上只剩下一个名字。我想是时候把一切都付诸行动了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallNextBo_000735FD_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've still got a few preparations to make, so just let me know when you're ready, and we'll round up the posse. The readiness is all, my friend.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我还有一些准备工作要做，所以你准备好了就告诉我，我们会把队伍召集起来的。准备就绪，我的朋友。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallNextBo_000735FD_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.removeitem aaKetchumFinger 1 setstage aaNVB3Main02 190 player.additem caps001 500
Ketchum was dead when I found him. He had recently committed suicide. Here's his finger.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我找到凯彻姆的时候他已经死了。看起来他最近自杀了。这是他的手指。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The old scalphunter got scalped. I understand you took him down without any collateral damage. That takes skill.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那个老猎头被割了头皮。我知道你在没有任何附带损害的情况下把他送到了地狱。这可需要技巧！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallNextBo_0002E667_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You earned yourself a nice, fat wad of caps for this one. Only one thing left to do now, partner. We know where Marko is, we just have to get him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你为这个赚了一大笔钱。现在只剩下一件事了，伙计。我们知道了马尔科在哪里，而我们只要抓住他。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallNextBo_0002E667_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've still got a few preparations to make, so just let me know when you're ready, and we'll round up the posse. The readiness is all, my friend.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我还有一些准备工作要做，所以你准备好了就告诉我，我们会把队伍召集起来的。准备就绪，我的朋友。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallNextBo_0002E667_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.removeitem aaGlantonFinger 1 setstage aaNVB3Main02 190 player.additem caps001 10000
I killed Glanton. Here's his finger.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我杀了格兰顿。这是他的手指。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Word's already gotten out that he took out a passel of tribal kiddies with him... and you let it happen. Disgraceful, that's what this is.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有消息说他带了一群部落小孩。。。然后你就这么眼睁睁的让它发生了。真是可耻，这整件事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallNextBo_0002E669_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You fucking earned your caps, didn't you? I hope it was worth it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你他妈的赚了些瓶盖，不是吗？我希望这是值得的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallNextBo_0002E669_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anyway, we'd best put that behind us, because we've got one name left on our list: Marko.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管怎样，我们最好把它抛在脑后，因为我们的名单上只剩下一个名字：马尔科。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallNextBo_0002E669_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've still got a few preparations to make, so just let me know when you're ready, and we'll round up the posse. The readiness is all, my friend.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我还有一些准备工作要做，所以你准备好了就告诉我，我们会把队伍召集起来的。准备就绪，我的朋友。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallNextBo_0002E669_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.removeitem aaGlantonFinger 1 setstage aaNVB3Main02 190 player.additem caps001 10000
I killed Glanton, but there were some complications. Here's his finger.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我杀了格兰顿，但那有一些复杂的事情发生。这是他的手指。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's a tough one, friend. I hate to let him go, as I know you certainly do... but no bounty is worth the lives of kids.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这真的是一次很难的赏金狩猎，朋友。我不想让他走，因为我知道你肯定会。。。但是孩子们的生命比起任何赏金都要有价值。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallNextBo_0002E66A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Brookshire won't authorize the bounty, of course, but I can give you a little something for showing a little humanity. You have my thanks for it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 布鲁克希尔当然不会批准赏金，但我可以给你一点东西，让你表现出一点人性。谢谢你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallNextBo_0002E66A_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anyway, we'd best put that behind us, because we've got one name left on our list: Marko.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管怎样，我们最好把它抛在脑后，因为我们的名单上只剩下一个名字：马尔科。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallNextBo_0002E66A_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've still got a few preparations to make, so just let me know when you're ready, and we'll round up the posse. The readiness is all, my friend.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我还有一些准备工作要做，所以你准备好了就告诉我，我们会把队伍召集起来的。准备就绪，我的朋友。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallNextBo_0002E66A_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaNVB3Main02 190 player.additem caps001 1000
Glanton had taken some children as hostages, so I had to let him go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 格兰顿把一些孩子当作人质，所以我不得不放了他。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I need to get going.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我得走了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: See you later.
ESP.TRADUIT: 回头见。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallLeave_00015405_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How'd you become a ghoul?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是怎么变成尸鬼的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Been a long time since I've seen home... my real home. Hot and humid doesn't sound so bad when you're freezing your nuts off.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我很久没回家了。。。我那真正的家。当你把蛋蛋都冻掉的时候，酷热和潮湿就听起来不那么糟糕了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallASKGho_00060A55_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hell of a long trip back to Mississippi, but I reckon that's where I'll go. I've missed it, even with all the hurt that comes with thinking of it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 回密西西比真他妈是一场长途旅行，但我想那正是我要去的地方。我已经思念它很久了，尽管想到它会带来很多伤痛。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallASKGho_00060A55_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fact is that I'm tired. Tired of fighting, tired of knowing that I'm alive and my family is dead. I wish I'd died with them, truly.
ESP.TRADUIT: 事实上我累了。已经厌倦了战斗，厌倦了知道我还活着，我的家人都死了。有时候我真希望我能和他们一起死，真的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallASKGho_00060A55_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If I can make it back there, I know what I'm gonna do.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我真能回到那时候，我知道我要做什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallASKGho_00060A55_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRandallQuest.RandallStory to 4
What will you do once Marko is dead?
ESP.TRADUIT: 一旦马尔科死了你会怎么做？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Plenty'll steer clear, to be certain. But there are always others out for your blood. Some want to land themselves in your legend by killing you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 可以肯定的是，很多事情都不会发生。但总有人在为你流血。有些人想通过杀了你来进入你创造的传说。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallASKGho_00072F35_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Seen it happen. There will come a time when you don't pay attention, get careless, or just get unlucky, and somebody will make their move.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看得出来这很可能会发生。总有一天，当你不注意，不小心，或只是运气不好的时候，有人会采取行动的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallASKGho_00072F35_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: See, you're carrying a brand. You're a killer. That's how people will always see you, for good or bad. And the ones you killed? They'll haunt you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看，你现在正带着一个烙印。你是个杀手。不管好坏，人们总是这样看你。而你杀的人呢？它们会永远缠着你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallASKGho_00072F35_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Somebody once told me "Blood will have blood". You can't stop it. All you can do is survive it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有人曾经告诉我"血债血偿"。而你不能阻止它。你能做的就只有活下来罢了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRandallQuest.RandallStory to 3
Why do you think I'll be looking over my shoulder? Once Marko is dead, nobody will want to cross us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你为什么觉得我要担心背后？一旦马尔科死了，没人会盯上我们的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I got into this business because of revenge. Do you know what revenge is? It's a special kind of hatred that burns in your soul.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我做这行是为了报仇。你知道什么是复仇吗？这是一种特殊的仇恨，会慢慢的燃尽你的灵魂。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallASKGho_000681FD_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It can motivate you... it can keep you alive... and it can poison you. When I gave you that pistol I put that weight on you, and that ain't right.
ESP.TRADUIT: 它能激励你。。。它能让你活着。。。它还能毒死你。当我给你那把手枪的时候，我留下了那么重的责任和仇恨给你，而这是不对的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallASKGho_000681FD_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: To know that I put you in a place, in a lifestyle that will have you looking over your shoulder your whole life, it hurts.
ESP.TRADUIT: 要知道我把你放在了一个不好的处境，让你一辈子都在担心你背后的生活方式，这真的很伤人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRandallQuest.RandallStory to 2
When you say you regret setting me on this path, what do you mean?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你说你后悔让我走上这条路，这是什么意思？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, how did I become a zombie? Yeah, I can say that shit with impunity now. Zombie, zombie, zombie, motherfucker.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，我是怎么变成僵尸的？是啊，我现在终于可以不受惩罚地胡说八道了。僵尸，僵尸，僵尸，去他妈的混蛋。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallASKGho_000681F3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Uh, anyway... Sugar had busted me up, then buried me up to my neck in dirt not far from some old waste site. Made me sick as fuck.
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃，不管怎样。。。那时候糖先生当场就把我逮住了，然后把我埋在离旧垃圾场不远的土里，一直埋到脖子。这让我恶心得要命。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallASKGho_000681F3_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There I am, wasting away, sun burning my head, thinking it can't get worse. Wrong. Fucking giant ants showed up, about to chomp my dome off.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在那里，变得消瘦，太阳灼烧着我的头，我还以为这不会变得更糟了呢。我他妈错了。那些该死的大蚂蚁出现了，想要把我的头顶都啄掉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallASKGho_000681F3_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Right when I'm about to become a snack for the bugs, a pack of wild dogs comes running in, chew up the ants, then run them off.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就在我要成为虫子的零食的时候，一群野狗跑了进来，把蚂蚁啃了，然后他们跑了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallASKGho_000681F3_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm thinking "Hallelujah for man's best friend". Wrong again. Big alpha dog came up and commenced to humping my face, did it all night.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当我在想"连神都会歌颂的，狗是人类最好的朋友"的时候。我他妈又错了。一头杂种狗首领跑了过来，开始操起我的脸，整晚都没停下过。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallASKGho_000681F3_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So that mangy fucker is making love to my ear when finally I hear gunshots, despite my... impairment. Thought I'd finally caught a break.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但当我终于听到了枪声的时候，那个肮脏的混蛋正在跟我的耳朵做爱，尽管我的耳朵。。。受到了些损伤。但我认为我终于可以休息了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallASKGho_000681F3_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dogs run off, but it was Jackals that found me. Cocksuckers had a real laugh at me, half-ghoulified and covered in dog jizz.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那些狗跑了，但是豺狼帮的人找到了我。那群吸鸡巴的人真是会嘲笑我，叫我半尸鬼，还浑身是狗的精液。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallASKGho_000681F3_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Where did you get the other bounty hunters?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你从哪儿弄来的其他赏金猎人？

ESP.ORIGINAL: When the NCR jiggled its coin purse, they came to me like flies to shit. Most are passable fighters, but I ain't too sure about their character.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当NCR开始摇晃它的钱包时，他们就像苍蝇一样飞向我。大多数人都是尚可的战士，但我不太确定他们的性格。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallASK01O_00015413_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Truth is, that's the norm in this business. It takes a hard heart to kill someone for a greasy wad of dough.
ESP.TRADUIT: 事实上，这是这个行业的准则。为了一块油腻的面团而杀人是需要铁石心肠的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallASK01O_00015413_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Some of these hunters don't care if the mark is good, bad, or somewhere in between. It's strictly business all the time, and that worries me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有些猎人不在乎目标是好是坏，或者介于两者之间。他们一直都只把这当做是生意，这让我很担心。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallASK01O_00015413_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe I'm just getting more picky after I worked with you. Ain't none of them cut from the same cloth.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许和你一起工作后我开始变得更挑剔了。因为他们都不是从同一块布上剪下来的，技术参差不齐。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallASK01O_00015413_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: All this goddamn philosophizing is downright distracting. We'll just have to suck it up and make due with what we got, and that's the end of it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所有的这些该死的哲学思想完全分散了人们的注意力。我们只能忍气吞声，用我们得到的报酬来弥补，然后也没什么剩下的了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallASK01O_00015413_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's the deal with Ford?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你和福特有过什么交易？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ford's a youngster with a big mouth and a chip on his shoulder. I've seen plenty like him over the years.
ESP.TRADUIT: 福特是个年轻人，嘴巴很大，有根深蒂固的观念。多年来我见过很多像他这样的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallASK01F_0001540F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He ain't bad or nothin', but he is just about useless. Maybe you can teach him a thing or two and he won't be such a pain the ass.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他不坏也没什么不好的，但他几乎没用。也许你可以教他一两件事，他就不会那么让人头疼了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallASK01F_0001540F_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How did you track Marko here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是怎么追踪马尔科到这儿的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Man like Marko comes around, word travels fast. I believe he made some feeble attempt to conceal his identity at first.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一旦像马尔科这样的人出现了，消息是传得很快的。我相信他一开始是为了掩饰自己的身份而做过一些软弱的尝试。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallASK01H_00015410_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Rumor is that he even used a different name for a spell, tried to settle down. I can't imagine a man like him living any sort of normal life.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有传言说他甚至用了一个不同的名字来生活，试图安定下来。我真的无法想象像他这样的人过着正常的生活。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallASK01H_00015410_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Story is that he had a run-in with some local toughs, killed five of them outside the saloon.
ESP.TRADUIT: 据说他和一些当地的恶棍发生了冲突，在酒馆外杀死了其中的五个。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wasn't long before people figured out who he was, what with him shooting like the devil and a band of outlaws in tow.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不久人们就知道他是谁了，因为他像魔鬼一样的射击，还有一群歹徒跟着他。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallASK01H_00015410_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I haven't even gotten a look at him, but he's here. I know it. He stays up in those mines most of the time, leaves the dirty work to his peons.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我甚至没看到他一眼，但他的确就在这里。我知道的。他大部分时间都呆在那些矿井里，把脏活留给他的苦力们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallASK01H_00015410_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: When I got set up here with the other hunters, things turned ugly right away. We lost some, but we gave as good as we got.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当我和其他猎人一起被安排在这里时，事情立刻变得很糟糕。我们失去了一些兄弟，但我们付出了我们所做到的一切。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: Marko ain't stupid, of course. He'll keep biding his time until he feels strong, or until his back is up against the wall.
ESP.TRADUIT: 马尔科当然不傻。他会一直等待时机，直到他感到自己已经足够强壮，或者直到他有了坚实的靠山的时候。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallASK01H_00015410_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Mark my words, though... when he does show, it's gonna get biblical. Fire, brimstone, and all that good shit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 记住我的话，尽管。。。当他出现的时候，这些就会变得像圣经一样无用。还有火，硫磺，所有的这些好东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallASK01H_00015410_8.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's up with Frosthill? Is it friendly or not?
ESP.TRADUIT: 霜地是怎么了？它是友好的还是不友好的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's a complicated matter, my friend. See, the NCR has a bounty out on just about everybody in this here canyon.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那是件复杂的事，我的朋友。你看，NCR对峡谷里的每个人都记着赏金。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallASK01A_0001540D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thing is, most of them are just outcasts and poor folk, not really bad, except for Marko and his crew.
ESP.TRADUIT: 问题是，他们中的大多数只是被驱逐者和穷人，并不是真的很坏，除了马尔科和他的那队人马之外。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallASK01A_0001540D_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: A lot of them came up here to get away from one type of government or another, be it NCR, Legion, or whatever.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们中的很多人来到这里是为了摆脱一种或另一种政府，无论是NCR、军团还是其他什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallASK01A_0001540D_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Damnable thing is that most of them are loyal to Marko right now, mainly cause they see us as part of the NCR.
ESP.TRADUIT: 可恶的是，他们中的大多数人现在都忠于马尔科，主要是因为他们把我们看作NCR的一部分。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallASK01A_0001540D_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm hoping that if we can whittle away some of Marko's muscle, people will start to have a change of heart. I ain't no NCR stooge.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我希望如果我们能削掉马尔科的一些忍受的话，人们会开始改变心意的。我可不是NCR的傀儡。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallASK01A_0001540D_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Somebody wants to pay me for bounties, fine. You want me to conquer your territory for you? That dog won't hunt.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有人想付赏金给我，好吧。你想让我为你征服你的领地？那这条狗可不会打猎。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallASK01A_0001540D_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If we can clean out the worst of them, then maybe the NCR will see this place as legitimate. Might even grant amnesty, or so they say.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我们能清除其中最坏的人的话，那么NCR可能会认为这个地方是合法的。大家都可能会被特赦，或者像他们说的那样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallASK01A_0001540D_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We got a lot of graves to fill before that's on the table, though. We'll see.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过，我们还有很多坟墓要填满，才能把霜地摆在台面上。让我们拭目以待。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallASK01A_0001540D_8.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's the story on Brookshire?
ESP.TRADUIT: 布鲁克希尔有什么故事？

ESP.ORIGINAL: He's some sort of NCR agent man. You can never tell with those weasels. They got nice suits, silver tongues, and deep pockets.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他是NCR探员。你永远无法真正了解这些黄鼠狼。他们有漂亮的西装，能舌灿莲花，还有很深的口袋。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallASK01B_0001540E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: As long as they keep paying for bounties and I get to run things my way, I got no complaints. He seems squared away, as far as I can tell.
ESP.TRADUIT: 只要他们继续支付赏金，我能按自己的方式处理这些事情，我就没有抱怨。据我所知，他似乎是个好人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallASK01B_0001540E_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How'd you hear about me killing the Judge and all the others?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是怎么知道我杀了法官和其他人的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't play coy. You killed a string of badasses, one right after the next, like something out of a goddamn dime novel.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别装模作样得了。你杀了一帮混蛋，一个接着一个，就像那本该死的廉价小说里写的东西一样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallASK01H_00015411_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Somebody offs Sergio in his own damn town, people are gonna talk about that shit for decades. Every damn trader I met was blabbing about it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有人在塞尔吉奥自己的小镇上干掉了他，人们会在几十年里意志谈论这个问题的。我遇到的每一个该死的商队都在喋喋不休这件事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallASK01H_00015411_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There were others I heard about, like Red Bear. Some said you killed him, others claimed you took him alive. I hope you cut his goddamn throat.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我还听说过其他的，像红熊。有人说你杀了他，也有人说你活捉了他。我倒是很希望你割断他的喉咙。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallASK01H_00015411_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You must be managing the fame pretty well. I've no doubt you've dealt with your share of bushwhackers trying to get payback.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你一定是管理名气管得很好。我毫不怀疑你已经处理好了你内心中想得到回报的游击战士的那部分。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallASK01H_00015411_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I wish I could tell you that it would stop, but it won't. All that counts is that you're alive, and that you're here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我真希望我能告诉你它会停止的，但事实上不会。但最重要的是你还活着，而且你在这里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallASK01H_00015411_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you have any idea where Marko is right now?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道马尔科现在在哪里吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: No idea, nothing. Sonofabitch drifted off into the hills, only has a few gunmen with him. We'll find him, though. It's just gonna take time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不知道，什么都不知道。那个婊子养得漂流到山上，身边只有几个持枪歹徒跟着。不过，我们会找到他的。只是需要时间罢了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallASK01W_0005936F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Once we thin out his lieutenants, the rank and file will abandon him, mark my words. He leads through fear, so the key is to show he's weak.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一旦我们精简了他的副手，其他的普通人就会抛弃他，记住我的话。他在恐惧中领导着他们，所以关键是要表现出他的软弱。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallASK01W_0005936F_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd like to ask you another question.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想再问你一个问题。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's on your mind?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在想什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallASKOth_00015404_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you want me to take any of these targets in alive?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你想让我活捉这些目标吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Out of all them bounties I gave you, was there ever one that involved capturing some bastard and bringing 'em back? The answer's no.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在我给你的所有赏金中，有没有一个涉及抓到某个混蛋并把活着他们带回来？答案是不。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallASK01A_00015BAC_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Assuming you could bring one back in one piece, all that would happen is Mr. Brookshire would make a summary judgment.
ESP.TRADUIT: 假设你能把一个完整的人活着带回来，会发生的事情就只是布鲁克希尔先生会做出的一个简单的判断。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallASK01A_00015BAC_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We'd just end up hanging 'em, and the pay would be the same. Better to just kill them on sight. No fuss, no nonsense.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们会把它们吊死，而获得的薪水也一样。所以最好一看到就杀了他们。别大惊小怪的，也别胡说八道。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallASK01A_00015BAC_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hell yes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他妈的对。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good, now squash that bullshit right now. You better harden the fuck up when you go after this bunch, because they're killers, every one of them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好，现在就把那些废话给压扁咽下去吧。当你去追这帮人的时候，你最好他妈的"硬"起来，因为他们是杀手，每一个都是。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallBounty_000158EF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The first is Garza, a Mexican sharpshooter who's served as Marko's scout for years. He's a first-rate marksman by all accounts.
ESP.TRADUIT: 第一个是加尔萨，一个墨西哥神枪手，他多年来一直担任马尔科的侦察员。他是个一流的神枪手。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallBounty_000158EF_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Word is that he's in Buckston Mine, where he's holed up with a trio of hussies, the 'amantes', or whatever. I can't speak that shit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有消息说他在巴克斯顿的矿里，和三个小贱人，“阿曼人”或其他什么人一起藏身。我不能说清楚那些废话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's a crazy man with three bloodthirsty bitches. Nuff' said. Any questions?
ESP.TRADUIT: 他是个疯子，还有三个嗜血的婊子。无需多说了。还有问题吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallBounty_000158EF_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you going to use wanted posters?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你要用通缉令吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Posters? Only use for those things is to wipe your ass, not a damn thing else. Wasteful and stupid, I call them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 海报？这些东西的唯一用途就是擦屁股，不是别的。我管他们叫浪费和愚蠢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallASK01P_00015417_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I give you a name, you kill the motherfucker. That's how this business is supposed to operate. It keeps things organized and neat.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我给你个名字，然后你去杀了那个混蛋。这就是这家公司的运作方式。这样会使事情井然有序。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: Most of the time posters are spread all over creation, and it's a pain in the ass to even find work. Goddamn ridiculous!
ESP.TRADUIT: 大多数时候，海报铺天盖地散布在整个创作过程中，要找工作真是他妈的让人头疼。这真他妈可笑！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallASK01P_00015417_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You show me the man who invented wanted posters, and I'll gladly stomp his nuts.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你给我看看那个发明通缉令的人，我会很高兴地跺碎他的蛋蛋。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallASK01P_00015417_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRandallQuest.PosterTopic to 1
Ford put that mess up, I don't even know what the fuck it's about. Babies and demons, some kind of fucked up love story written by perverts.
ESP.TRADUIT: 福特把那玩意贴在那的，我都不知道是怎么回事。婴儿和恶魔，一些变态写的糟糕爱情故事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallASK01P_000791E1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Honestly, what kind of demented minds come up with this shit? Whatever happened to thoughtful, quality entertainment?
ESP.TRADUIT: 说真的，是什么样的疯子想出了这玩意？那些有思想，有质量的娱乐都去哪了？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallASK01P_000791E1_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Everything nowadays is just swearing and violence, no depth at all. It's a sign of intellectual regression and moral decline.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在的一切都充满了脏话和暴力，根本没有深度。这是智力衰退和道德滑坡的迹象。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallASK01P_000791E1_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look at me, getting distracted by this filth. When you're ready, I've got more of these fucking assholes for you to kill.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看着我，我都被这些肮脏的东西弄得心烦意乱了。等你准备好了，我还有更多的混蛋要你杀。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallASK01P_000791E1_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRandallQuest.PosterTopic to 2
Where did you get that movie poster?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你从哪儿弄到那张电影海报的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I guess so.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想是的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good, now squash that bullshit right now. You better harden the fuck up when you go after this bunch, because they're killers, every one of them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好，现在就把那些废话给压扁咽下去吧。当你去追这帮人的时候，你最好他妈的"硬"起来，因为他们是杀手，每一个都是。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallBounty_000158EE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The first is Garza, a Mexican sharpshooter who's served as Marko's scout for years. He's a first-rate marksman by all accounts.
ESP.TRADUIT: 第一个是加尔萨，一个墨西哥神枪手，他多年来一直担任马尔科的侦察员。他是个一流的神枪手。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallBounty_000158EE_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Word is that he's in Buckston Mine, where he's holed up with a trio of hussies, the 'amantes', or whatever. I can't speak that shit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有消息说他在巴克斯顿的矿里，和三个小贱人，“阿曼人”或其他什么人一起藏身。我不能说清楚那些废话。
