ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's a crazy man with three bloodthirsty bitches. Nuff' said. Any questions?
ESP.TRADUIT: 他是个疯子，还有三个嗜血的婊子。无需多说了。还有问题吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallBounty_000158EE_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: For fuck's sake, just give me the name already.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看在他妈的份上，告诉我他们的名字就行了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll get to it soon enough. You better harden the fuck up when you go after this bunch, because they're killers, every one of them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我很快就会说了。当你去追这帮人的时候，你最好他妈的"硬"起来，因为他们是杀手，每一个都是。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallBounty_0001541A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The first is Garza, a Mexican sharpshooter who's served as Marko's scout for years. He's a first-rate marksman by all accounts.
ESP.TRADUIT: 第一个是加尔萨，一个墨西哥神枪手，他多年来一直担任马尔科的侦察员。他是个一流的神枪手。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallBounty_0001541A_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Word is that he's in Buckston Mine, where he's holed up with a trio of hussies, the 'amantes', or whatever. I can't speak that shit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有消息说他在巴克斯顿的矿里，和三个小贱人，“阿曼人”或其他什么人一起藏身。我不能说清楚那些废话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's a crazy man with three bloodthirsty bitches. Nuff' said. Any questions?
ESP.TRADUIT: 他是个疯子，还有三个嗜血的婊子。无需多说了。还有问题吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallBounty_0001541A_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What else can you tell me about the women accompanying Garza?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你还可以告诉我关于陪同加尔萨的女人的其他情报吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Garza is reportedly something of a ladies' man, so much so that he always has a stable of sluts on hand, no matter the circumstances.
ESP.TRADUIT: 据报道，加尔萨是一个妇女之友（小白脸），以至于他总是有一个的对他死心塌地的荡妇在手，无论情况如何。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallBounty_000158F0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Crazy bitches feed him, bring him supplies, even fight for him, screaming like banshees on the rag. Goddamn terrifying, if you ask me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那些疯狂的婊子们养着他，给他带补给，甚至为他而战，她们尖叫得像雷格泰姆乐曲上的女妖。如果你问我，他妈的太可怕了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallBounty_000158F0_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then again, maybe Garza is smarter than all of us. At any rate, keep your eyes open for him and his manatees.
ESP.TRADUIT: 再说一次，也许加尔萨比我们都要聪明。但无论如何，要为他和他的海牛们（指美人鱼）睁大眼睛。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallBounty_000158F0_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, he likes to knock people down and then pound the shit out of them. He's big, fast, and mean, so it works most of the time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是啊，他喜欢把人击倒到地上然后再把他们打得屁滚尿流。他又大，又快，又刻薄，所以他的战术大部分时间都很管用。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallBounty_00016562_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: My advice is to keep your distance, cripple him, then take your time planting shots in his dome.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的建议是保持距离，打断他的腿，然后花点时间在他的"穹顶"上放射子弹。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallBounty_00016562_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Size and strength don't mean shit if you put a bullet in his brain. Anything else?
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你在他脑子里开了一枪，他的身材和力量就不算什么了。还有别的吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallBounty_00016562_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you know anything about Kicking Dog's fighting style?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道恶腿踢狗的战斗方式吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: If it were me, I'd bash his testicles with the butt of my pistol, but that's probably a bit... overt.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果是我的话，我会用我的枪托猛击他的蛋蛋，但那可能有点。。。太过于明显了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallBounty_000180B0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, I almost forgot. He is supposed to be sweet on that yellow-haired whore, Lori. He likes to keep a monopoly on her when he's in town.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，我差点忘了。他应该对那个黄头发的婊子很好，洛里。他在城里时喜欢"垄断"她。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallBounty_000180B0_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I imagine it would be disconcerting if you were to partake of the young lady, particularly in earshot of Mr. Blasius.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想，如果你和这位年轻女士在一起，尤其是在布拉修斯先生的耳边，会很不安的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallBounty_000180B0_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Any other questions?
ESP.TRADUIT: 还有其他问题吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallBounty_000180B0_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Is there anything else that might provoke Bill?
ESP.TRADUIT: 还有什么可能激怒比尔的吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nobody runs with Marko unless they're a bad customer. Doolin wasn't just a robber - he killed at least one sheriff in cold blood.
ESP.TRADUIT: 除非他们都是坏顾客，否则没有人和马尔科一起鬼混。杜林不仅仅是个强盗，他还冷血杀害了至少一位警长。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallBounty_0001A896_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Besides, Brookshire is adamant about this one. NCR doesn't forgive or forget.
ESP.TRADUIT: 另外，布鲁克希尔对这件事很坚决。NCR可不会原谅或忘记。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallBounty_0001A896_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why are we targeting one old bandit? He doesn't sound like much.
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么我们要紧追一个老强盗？他听起来不可怎么样。

ESP.ORIGINAL: He's the literal muscle to complement Marko's guns. Marko often has Porter perform the worst acts, killing children and eating people alive.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他是补充马尔科枪手资本的真正力量。马克经常让波特做出最坏的行为，杀害儿童，还活生生地吃人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallBounty_0001B6DA_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nobody's sure how Porter came to run with Marko, but he's utterly loyal. Makes no sense to me. Anyway, he's gotta die just the same.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没人知道波特是怎么跟马尔科鬼混的，但他绝对忠诚。不过这对我来说毫无意义。不管怎样，他也会死的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallBounty_0001B6DA_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Any other questions?
ESP.TRADUIT: 还有其他问题吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallBounty_0001B6DA_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why is Porter so intimidating to the townspeople?
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么镇民对波特如此害怕？

ESP.ORIGINAL: The kind that wrap your testicles around your throat. Seriously, watch for trip wires, bottle cap mines, and even c4 placed nearby.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他是那种会把你的蛋蛋缠在喉咙上的人。说真的，小心绊线陷阱，瓶盖地雷，甚至放在附近的C4。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallBounty_00020394_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Rumor has it that Ketchum likes to hide bombs underneath corpses so that they're not readily visible. Check any dead critters to be safe.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有传言说凯彻姆喜欢把炸弹藏在尸体下面，这样走过的人就看不见了。你最好检查所有死去的动物以确保安全。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallBounty_00020394_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They've probably got it dark as fuck, so here's something that might help out. Any other questions?
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们可能已经把那里搞得黑得像他妈的地底一样，所以这里有些东西可以帮上忙。还有其他问题吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallBounty_00020394_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.additem NVcateye 2
What kind of traps will Ketchum most likely be using?
ESP.TRADUIT: 凯彻姆最可能使用哪种陷阱？

ESP.ORIGINAL: The battle-hardened, well-armed type, that's what he has. Most of them are ex-military or old bounty hunters that prefer hunting scalps.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他就是这样一个身经百战，装备精良的人。他们中的大多数都是前军人或老赏金猎人，喜欢猎取头皮。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallBounty_000233AD_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's a nasty business. Old Judge Richter used to be in cahoots with Glanton. Thank you again for killing that fat bastard, by the way.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是一件令人讨厌的事。里希特老法官过去常和格兰顿勾结在一起。顺便说一句，我再次感谢你杀了那个胖混蛋。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallBounty_000233AD_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anyway, you best keep an eye out for ambushes and traps of all sorts. Glanton won't go down easy. Anything else?
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管怎样，你最好留意各种伏击和陷阱。格兰顿不会被轻易解决的。还有什么别的吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallBounty_000233AD_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What type of manpower does Glanton have with him?
ESP.TRADUIT: 格兰顿有什么样的人手？

ESP.ORIGINAL: You want his finger, right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你想要他的手指，对吧？

ESP.ORIGINAL: He's better than most, but he's mainly just crazy... unpredictable is probably a better description. That's how he got his name, he's hard to read.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他比大多数人都好，但他主要是疯了。。。不可预测性可能是更好的描述。这就是他怎么得到的这个名字，他真的很难完全被猜透。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallBounty_000158F1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He's like a lot of these hotshot banditos. Everything is wrapped up in that revolver at his side. Disarm him or wound him and he's helpless.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他就像很多火爆的强盗一样。一切都在他身边的左轮手枪里。只要解除他的武装或伤害到他，他就是你的了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallBounty_000158F1_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Any other questions?
ESP.TRADUIT: 还有其他问题吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallBounty_000158F1_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Is Bill a decent fighter?
ESP.TRADUIT: 比尔是个像样的战士吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: He's an absolute master with melee weapons, so you can't let him get close. I mean he will absolutely shit on your world with just one swing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他是一个拥有近战经验的绝世高手，所以你不能让他靠近。我的意思是他只要挥动一下，你的世界就完蛋了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallBounty_0001B6DB_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's the same with those other dumb fucks trying to karate chop your ass - shoot their knees, then pick them apart once they're crippled.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这和其他的那些蠢家伙想用空手道砍你的屁股是一样的-打他们的膝盖，然后一旦他们的腿断了，就可以更加谨慎的对待他们了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallBounty_0001B6DB_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Any other questions?
ESP.TRADUIT: 还有其他问题吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallBounty_0001B6DB_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What can you tell me about Porter's fighting style?
ESP.TRADUIT: 关于波特的战斗风格你能告诉我什么吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: The man is a butcher, plain and simple. I'd sooner exhume fatass Judge Richter and use his corpse as a meat shield than work with Glanton.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个人是个屠夫，既朴素又简单。我宁愿把里希特审判官给挖出来，把他的尸体当作肉盾，也不愿和格兰顿一起工作。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallBounty_000233AE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Brookshire and the others might not care about our methods, but I do. There are some lines you don't cross... or you never come back from it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 布鲁克希尔和其他人可能不在乎我们的方法，但我在乎。有几条底线你不能越过...否则你就再也回不来了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallBounty_000233AE_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Besides, you just can't trust a man like Glanton. I imagine him and Brookshire would get along just fine. You got anything else?
ESP.TRADUIT: 再说，你就是不能相信格兰顿这样的人。但我想他和布鲁克希尔会相处得很好。你还有别的事吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallBounty_000233AE_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What if I could convince Glanton to help us? He doesn't seem like a natural ally of Marko.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我能说服格兰顿帮我们会怎么样？他看起来可不像是马尔科的天然盟友。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't have any more questions.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我没别的问题了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: We're almost there, partner. Stay focused and take care of yourself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们就快到了，伙计。保持专注，照顾好你自己。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallBounty_000158F2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaNVB3Main02 165
Remember, move steady and keep your eyes open for traps. I'll see you when you get back.
ESP.TRADUIT: 记住，动作要稳，眼睛要睁大，以防任何陷阱。等你回来的时候见。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallBounty_000233AF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaNVB3Main02 145
Lee is very, very fast. Once you get him out in the street, just be ready when the music starts. Good luck.
ESP.TRADUIT: 李非常非常的快。一旦你把他带到街上，音乐开始的时候就做好准备。祝你好运。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallBounty_00020D20_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaNVB3Main02 125
He might be a mutant, but he can still die. It will just take more bullets, is all. Be careful, and I'll see you when you get back.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他可能是个变种人，但他还是会死的。只是需要更多的子弹罢了。小心点，你回来后我会来看你的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallBounty_0001ECCF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaNVB3Main02 105
All right, you just watch yourself out there. Good luck.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，你自己小心点。祝你好运。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallBounty_0001B6DC_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaNVB3Main02 85
Don't forget - there's a bonus if you make Bill draw first. Good luck.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别忘了，如果你先让比尔先拔枪，就会有奖金的。祝你好运。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallBounty_0001A895_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaNVB3Main02 65
All right, just be careful and I'll see you when you get back. Good luck.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，小心点，你回来后我会来看你的。祝你好运。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallBounty_000180B1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaNVB3Main02 45
Good, just keep your head down and do what you do best. I'll see you when you get back.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好，低下头做你最擅长的事情吧。等你回来的时候见。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallBounty_00016564_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, almost forgot. If you gonna be running around out in that freezing ass cold, might as well dress for it. Here's something I had stowed away.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，差点忘了。如果你要在寒冷的天气里到处跑，最好穿上衣服。这是我藏起来的一些东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallBounty_00016564_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaNVB3Main02 25 player.additem aaMtDrifterOutfit 1 player.additem aaMtDrifterHat 1 player.additem aaMtDrifterHat02 1
How much will the bounties pay?
ESP.TRADUIT: 奖金要付多少钱？

ESP.ORIGINAL: It ain't like that damn gravy train we had in Vegas, but it's enough. A lot of it will depend on how you... resolve each situation.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这不像我们在维加斯坐的那辆充满了飞来横财的该死的火车，但也算是足够了。这很大程度上取决于你。。。因为要解决各种情况。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallASK01R_00059371_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: See, we got a tense relationship with Frosthill, so it's a balancing act of cleaning out Marko's boys while not pissing off the town.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你看，我们和霜地的关系很紧张，所以这是一个需要平衡的行为，在不惹恼镇子的同时，我们要把马尔科的小子们都清理干净。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallASK01R_00059371_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There may be times when you're asked to handle things in a specific sort of way. Clear? About as much as mud, right? Yeah, that's the NCR for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有时你会被要求以一种特定的方式处理事情。明白了吗？差不多和泥巴一样难，对吧？是的，那就是你的NCR。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallASK01R_00059371_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Sweet Revenge] Do you want your old pistol back?
ESP.TRADUIT: [甜蜜的复仇] 你想要回你的这把旧手枪吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: It does my heart good to see that old Remington, let me tell you. It means a lot to me that you brought it all the way here. Damn good of you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看到那把老雷明顿我真心高兴，让我告诉你。你一路带过来对我意义重大。你真是太好了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallASK01S_00059370_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, the way I see it is that it's yours now. So long as you kill Marko with it I'm happy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，我看现在这把枪是你的了。只要你用它杀了马尔科我就很高兴了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallASK01S_00059370_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Truth is that just holding that thing can dredge up bad memories for me. I'd just end up stowing it in a safe again. Better to see it put to use.
ESP.TRADUIT: 事实上，仅仅是抱着那东西就可以让我回忆起那些不好的记忆。我只想再把它放进保险箱。所以它最好的归宿就是继续被用下去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallASK01S_00059370_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Sweet Revenge] Share sweat binge.
ESP.TRADUIT: [甜蜜的复仇]分享大汗淋漓（低智力）

ESP.ORIGINAL: It does my heart good to see that old Remington, let me tell you. It means a lot to me that you brought it all the way here. Damn good of you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看到那把老雷明顿我真心高兴，让我告诉你。你一路带过来对我意义重大。你真是太好了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallASK01S_00061DB9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, the way I see it is that it's yours now. So long as you kill Marko with it I'm happy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，我看现在这把枪是你的了。只要你用它杀了马尔科我就很高兴了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallASK01S_00061DB9_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Truth is that just holding that thing can dredge up bad memories for me. I'd just end up stowing it in a safe again. Better to see it put to use.

ESP.TRADUIT: <保持沉默>

ESP.ORIGINAL: I wonder... why you really came here. I've heard the stories about Randall and all that business down in Vegas, but this is different.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想知道。。。为什么你真的会来这里。我听说过兰道尔和你在维加斯的所有的事迹，但这是不同的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Oliver Doolin [04019DE6] (mod) Quest : ([0400FCB7]aaNVB3Main02) Devil's Due EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: They say you've killed a lot of bad men, got a real instinct for it. Maybe you really are as good as they say.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们说你杀了很多坏人，这是你的本能。也许你真的和他们说的一样好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Oliver Doolin [04019DE6] (mod) Quest : ([0400FCB7]aaNVB3Main02) Devil's Due EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let me tell you something, though. It won't matter if you go up against Marko. I'm not trying to scare you, because it's not about skill.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过，还是让我先告诉你一件事。如果你真的想和马尔科对决，你的一切都不在有意义了。我不是想吓唬你，因为这和你的技艺无关。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Oliver Doolin [04019DE6] (mod) Quest : ([0400FCB7]aaNVB3Main02) Devil's Due EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I know Marko. I know him well. I believe he came here to turn away from what he was, start over. He changed his name, even got a woman.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我熟识马尔科。我很了解他。我相信他来这里是为了改变现状，重新开始的。他已经改名了，甚至还有个女人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Oliver Doolin [04019DE6] (mod) Quest : ([0400FCB7]aaNVB3Main02) Devil's Due EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: When he found out about Sergio... I saw him change again, like somebody had flipped over a card. That old demon inside was awake again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当他听说了塞尔吉奥的事情后...我又看到他变了，好像有人翻开了一张卡片。他内在的那个老恶魔又苏醒了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Oliver Doolin [04019DE6] (mod) Quest : ([0400FCB7]aaNVB3Main02) Devil's Due EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: You might be fast... you might be tough... but Marko will do anything to settle that score. He wanted you to come here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你可能很迅捷...你可能很强悍...但马尔科会尽一切努力来解决你这个问题的。他就是想让你来这里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Oliver Doolin [04019DE6] (mod) Quest : ([0400FCB7]aaNVB3Main02) Devil's Due EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Say your piece.
ESP.TRADUIT: 说吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I wonder... why you really came here. I've heard stories about Randall and all that business down in Vegas, but this is different.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想知道。。。为什么你真的会来这里。我听说过兰道尔和你在维加斯的所有的事迹，但这是不同的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Oliver Doolin [04019DE6] (mod) Quest : ([0400FCB7]aaNVB3Main02) Devil's Due EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3DoolinInt_00019F84_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They say you've killed a lot of bad men, got a real instinct for it. Maybe you really are as good as they say.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们说你杀了很多坏人，这是你的本能。也许你真的和他们说的一样好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Oliver Doolin [04019DE6] (mod) Quest : ([0400FCB7]aaNVB3Main02) Devil's Due EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3DoolinInt_00019F84_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let me tell you something, though. It won't matter if you go up against Marko. I'm not trying to scare you, because it's not about skill.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过，还是让我先告诉你一件事。如果你真的想和马尔科对决，你的一切都不在有意义了。我不是想吓唬你，因为这和你的技艺无关。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Oliver Doolin [04019DE6] (mod) Quest : ([0400FCB7]aaNVB3Main02) Devil's Due EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3DoolinInt_00019F84_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I know Marko. I know him well. I believe he came here to turn away from what he was, start over. He changed his name, even got a woman.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我熟识马尔科。我很了解他。我相信他来这里是为了改变现状，重新开始的。他已经改名了，甚至还有个女人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Oliver Doolin [04019DE6] (mod) Quest : ([0400FCB7]aaNVB3Main02) Devil's Due EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3DoolinInt_00019F84_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: When he found out about Sergio... I saw him change again, like somebody had flipped over a card. That old demon inside was awake again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当他听说了塞尔吉奥的事情后...我又看到他变了，好像有人翻开了一张卡片。他内在的那个老恶魔又苏醒了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Oliver Doolin [04019DE6] (mod) Quest : ([0400FCB7]aaNVB3Main02) Devil's Due EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3DoolinInt_00019F84_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You might be fast... you might be tough... but Marko will do anything to settle that score. He wanted you to come here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你可能很迅捷...你可能很强悍...但马尔科会尽一切努力来解决你这个问题的。他就是想让你来这里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Oliver Doolin [04019DE6] (mod) Quest : ([0400FCB7]aaNVB3Main02) Devil's Due EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3DoolinInt_00019F84_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How'd you get mixed up with Marko?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你怎么会和马尔科混在一起的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I grew up on the frontier, my parents were NCR settlers. Farming never suited me, though.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在边疆长大，我的父母都是NCR的定居者。不过，种地从来都不适合我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Oliver Doolin [04019DE6] (mod) Quest : ([0400FCB7]aaNVB3Main02) Devil's Due EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3DoolinHow_00019F82_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: As a young man I just wanted to feel alive, not like dying a little every day. That's what farming was to me... a slow death.
ESP.TRADUIT: 作为一个年轻人，我只想感觉自己还活着，而不是每天都一点点的缓慢死去。这就是种田对我的意义。。。缓慢的死亡。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Oliver Doolin [04019DE6] (mod) Quest : ([0400FCB7]aaNVB3Main02) Devil's Due EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3DoolinHow_00019F82_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I ran away at fifteen, joined a gang. I learned the trade soon enough and took to robbing caravans, but it was never about the money.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我十五岁就逃出家门加入了一个帮派。并且我很快就学会了如何做好这一行当，开始抢劫商队，但这与钱无关。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Oliver Doolin [04019DE6] (mod) Quest : ([0400FCB7]aaNVB3Main02) Devil's Due EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3DoolinHow_00019F82_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I enjoyed the chase, leading men into the fray, staying ahead of the law. Only the rangers ever got close to me, though.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我很喜欢追逐，带领人们加入战斗，在法律面前保持领先。只有游骑兵真的能接近到我的面前。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Oliver Doolin [04019DE6] (mod) Quest : ([0400FCB7]aaNVB3Main02) Devil's Due EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3DoolinHow_00019F82_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Last few years it got harder, though. We'd been boxed in by NCR, Legion and 80's, and they all wanted me dead.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过，最近几年情况变得更糟了。我们被NCR，军团和80年代帮包围了，而他们中的每个都想杀我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Oliver Doolin [04019DE6] (mod) Quest : ([0400FCB7]aaNVB3Main02) Devil's Due EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3DoolinHow_00019F82_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: When Marko showed up, he offered to get me set up in Frosthill in exchange for a share of my earnings and unwavering loyalty.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当马尔科出现时，他提出让我在霜地安个家，以换取我的一部分收入和对他坚定不移的忠诚。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Oliver Doolin [04019DE6] (mod) Quest : ([0400FCB7]aaNVB3Main02) Devil's Due EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3DoolinHow_00019F82_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: See, Frosthill is a haven for old bandits like me. It's where we come to escape and settle down, free from the government and savages out there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看，霜地就是像我这样的老强盗的避风港。我们就是从各处逃出并安顿下来的地方，不受任何政府和野蛮人的控制。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Oliver Doolin [04019DE6] (mod) Quest : ([0400FCB7]aaNVB3Main02) Devil's Due EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3DoolinHow_00019F82_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ironically, now that I'm getting older, I find myself missing that old farm more and more. I do wonder what became of it sometimes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 讽刺的是，现在我老了，我发现自己越来越想念那个旧农场了。有时候我会想如果我还呆在那，我的人生会怎么样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Oliver Doolin [04019DE6] (mod) Quest : ([0400FCB7]aaNVB3Main02) Devil's Due EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3DoolinHow_00019F82_8.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I had hoped to ease out of this racket, maybe start selling tobacco. A man will always pay good money for a smoke.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我本想摆脱这场闹剧的，也许我可以开始卖烟草。一个人抽烟总是要花很多钱的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Oliver Doolin [04019DE6] (mod) Quest : ([0400FCB7]aaNVB3Main02) Devil's Due EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3DoolinHow_00019F82_9.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I soon realized that Marko had other plans for me, and for this town. I don't know exactly what, but things will never be the same up here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我很快就意识到马尔科还有其他的计划要在我和这个城市实施。我不知道具体是什么，但这里，事情永远都会不一样的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Oliver Doolin [04019DE6] (mod) Quest : ([0400FCB7]aaNVB3Main02) Devil's Due EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3DoolinHow_00019F82_10.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: NCR always wanted my head for the money I stole. They didn't much care about that sheriff and the two deputies I shot. Just the money.
ESP.TRADUIT: NCR一直想用我的头来偿还抢我偷的那些钱。他们反而不太在乎那个警长和我枪杀的两个副手。在乎的只是钱而已。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Oliver Doolin [04019DE6] (mod) Quest : ([0400FCB7]aaNVB3Main02) Devil's Due EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3DoolinHow_00019F82_11.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, you gonna gun me down like the rest and saw off my finger? Vicious business. Damn bears love their records.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以，你要像其他人一样把我枪毙然后把我的手指锯掉吗？这真是种恶毒的生意。该死的熊会喜欢他们的记录的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Oliver Doolin [04019DE6] (mod) Quest : ([0400FCB7]aaNVB3Main02) Devil's Due EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3DoolinHow_00019F82_12.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've heard enough. It's time to settle this. <Attack>
ESP.TRADUIT: 我听够了。是时候解决这个问题了。<攻击>

ESP.ORIGINAL: I suppose it was meant to be.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想是这是命中注定的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Oliver Doolin [04019DE6] (mod) Quest : ([0400FCB7]aaNVB3Main02) Devil's Due EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3DoolinHea_00019F81_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaOliverDoolinREF.startcombat player
So what happens next?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么接下来会发生什么呢？

ESP.ORIGINAL: What happens next? I'd like for you to walk away, leave this behind while you're still in one piece. As for me... I'd like to do the same.
ESP.TRADUIT: 接下来会发生什么？我想我会让你走开，趁你还活着的时候让你忘了这一切。至于我。。。我其实也想这么做。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Oliver Doolin [04019DE6] (mod) Quest : ([0400FCB7]aaNVB3Main02) Devil's Due EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3DoolinWha_00019F85_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But let's face it... I'm a dead man outside Frosthill. I know you aren't going anywhere, so that sort of boils it down.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但让我们面对现实吧...在霜地之外我就只是个死人罢了。我知道你怎样也不会离开的，所以就让我们这样结束吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Oliver Doolin [04019DE6] (mod) Quest : ([0400FCB7]aaNVB3Main02) Devil's Due EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3DoolinWha_00019F85_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I killed the Judge and took care of Red Bear. I doubt Marko can be much worse.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我杀了审判官还料理了红熊。我有理由怀疑马尔科会不会更难对付。

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you're going to speak in degrees of bad, there's Marko... and then there's everybody else. Those men you mentioned feared Marko for a reason.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你要用坏的程度来比较的话，首先就是马尔科...其次才是其他人。你提到的那些人害怕马尔科是有原因的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Oliver Doolin [04019DE6] (mod) Quest : ([0400FCB7]aaNVB3Main02) Devil's Due EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3DoolinBut_00019F7E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: See, he doesn't live to outshoot folks or even kill people. He revels in domination. He believes he's special... more so than anyone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你看，他活下来并不是为了勾引别人，甚至是为了杀人。他沉迷于支配。并且他相信他很特别...比任何人都重要。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Oliver Doolin [04019DE6] (mod) Quest : ([0400FCB7]aaNVB3Main02) Devil's Due

ESP.ORIGINAL: Going after you is probably as much about revenge for Sergio as it is to preserve the myth around him. He loves to be feared more than anything.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他追杀你可能是为了报塞尔吉奥的仇，也可能是为了保护关于塞尔吉奥的神话。他最喜欢别人怕他了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Oliver Doolin [04019DE6] (mod) Quest : ([0400FCB7]aaNVB3Main02) Devil's Due EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3DoolinBut_00019F7E_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: All the others... I bet they never did that to you, gave you real pause. You just went after them like a hunter. And it worked.
ESP.TRADUIT: 而其他人...我敢打赌他们从来没有这样对过你，对你造成了真正的阻碍。你像个猎人一样追捕他们。并且看得出来你成功了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Oliver Doolin [04019DE6] (mod) Quest : ([0400FCB7]aaNVB3Main02) Devil's Due EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3DoolinBut_00019F7E_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Marko will use that instinct against you. I don't know how or when, but he'll find a way. I just wish you wouldn't give him the opportunity.
ESP.TRADUIT: 马尔科会利用这种本能来对付你的。我不知道他会怎么做，也不知道他会什么时候做，但他会找到办法的。我只希望你不要给他任何机会。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Oliver Doolin [04019DE6] (mod) Quest : ([0400FCB7]aaNVB3Main02) Devil's Due EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3DoolinBut_00019F7E_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaNVB3DoolinTerrifyingPresence
ESP.TRADUIT: aaNVB3冬令恐吓表现

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaNVB3DoolinSpeechLeave
ESP.TRADUIT: aaNVB3杜林说话离开

ESP.ORIGINAL: What, so I can start over and be an honest citizen? I might just be a half-assed bandit, but even I have some sense of justice.
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么，我能洗心革面来做一个诚实的公民？我可能只是个半途而废的强盗，但即使是这样的我也有正义感。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Oliver Doolin [04019DE6] (mod) Quest : ([0400FCB7]aaNVB3Main02) Devil's Due EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3DoolinSpe_00019F8F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why don't you follow your own advice and just leave this place? There's no future here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你为什么不听从你自己的建议离开这里？这里可没有未来。

ESP.ORIGINAL: This ain't the place to flaunt your wealth. There's a lot more money up in these mountains than you realize. All the more reason to stay.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这里不是炫耀财富的地方。山上的钱比你想象的多得多。那才是更多留下来的理由。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Oliver Doolin [04019DE6] (mod) Quest : ([0400FCB7]aaNVB3Main02) Devil's Due EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3DoolinSpe_0001AD6F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You don't look very prosperous. What have you got to lose by leaving?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你看起来可不大富裕。你离开会有什么损失？

ESP.ORIGINAL: It seems there's only one way to end this. <Attack>
ESP.TRADUIT: 看来只有一个办法可以结束这一切。<攻击>

ESP.ORIGINAL: So it does, so it does.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真的呢，你说得对。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Oliver Doolin [04019DE6] (mod) Quest : ([0400FCB7]aaNVB3Main02) Devil's Due EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3DoolinWha_00019F87_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaOliverDoolinREF.startcombat player
I assassinated Caesar in his own camp. Anybody can be killed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在凯撒自己的营地里刺杀了他。你要知道任何人都可能被杀的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, including you. Marko doesn't have an army, and he won't need one. He'll hit you before you hit him, that much I can promise.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，包括你。马尔科没有军队，而他也不需要军队。他会在你打到他之前就击杀你，我可以保证。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Oliver Doolin [04019DE6] (mod) Quest : ([0400FCB7]aaNVB3Main02) Devil's Due EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3DoolinBut_00019F7D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I bested Ulysses at the Divide. Marko has right to fear me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在分水岭上打败了尤利西斯。马尔科他有害怕我的理由。

ESP.ORIGINAL: No offense, but beating a bitchy mailman isn't going to help you here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 无意冒犯，但我想打败一个出言不逊的邮差对于这儿的人来说可没什么帮助。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Oliver Doolin [04019DE6] (mod) Quest : ([0400FCB7]aaNVB3Main02) Devil's Due EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3DoolinBut_00019F88_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Marko isn't trying to make a political statement or preach to you. He's going to break you down, make you hurt... then the real suffering starts.
ESP.TRADUIT: 马尔科可不想发表政治声明或向你说教。他会让你崩溃，让你受伤...然后真正的痛苦就开始了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Oliver Doolin [04019DE6] (mod) Quest : ([0400FCB7]aaNVB3Main02) Devil's Due EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3DoolinBut_00019F88_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You may have bought into Marko's mystique, but he's just a man. He'll die like the rest.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你也许深信马尔科的神神秘秘，但他终究是一介人类。他会像其他人一样死去的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You say it like you mean it. But even if you do kill him, the price you'll have to pay... it's not worth it. Just leave it be, live out your life.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你说得像是真心话。但即使你真的杀了他，你也要付出代价的。。。这真的不值得。别管它了，过好你的生活吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Oliver Doolin [04019DE6] (mod) Quest : ([0400FCB7]aaNVB3Main02) Devil's Due EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3DoolinSti_00019F80_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Stay the course, and you'll wish you never came here. Mark my words.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你继续走下去的话，你会希望你从未来过这里的。请记住我的话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Oliver Doolin [04019DE6] (mod) Quest : ([0400FCB7]aaNVB3Main02) Devil's Due EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3DoolinSti_00019F80_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaNVB3DoolinSpeechLeave02
ESP.TRADUIT: aaNVB3杜林对话离开2

ESP.ORIGINAL: I never expected to leave here alive. For what it's worth, you have my thanks.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我从没想过要活着离开这里。不管这对你来说价值什么，我都要谢谢你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Oliver Doolin [04019DE6] (mod) Quest : ([0400FCB7]aaNVB3Main02) Devil's Due EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3DoolinSpe_00019F90_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL:
showmessage aaDoolinLeaveMessage aaOliverDoolinREF.disable aaOliverDoolinREF.markfordelete setstage aaNVB3Main02 92 set aaNVB3Master.DoolinFate to 1
If (aaFordREF.HasBeenHired == 1) && (aaFordREF.Waiting == 0) set aaFordQuest.bConversation to 2 aaFordREF.startconversation player, aaFordStartConversation endif
Killing you in this shack isn't justice, either. Now get out of here before I change my mind.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在这个棚屋里杀了你也算不公平。在我改变主意之前离开这里。

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's my choice, you uppity fuck.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是我的选择，你这个该死的混蛋。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Oliver Doolin [04019DE6] (mod) Quest : ([0400FCB7]aaNVB3Main02) Devil's Due EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3DoolinSpe_0001CF11_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you really want to stay cooped up in this shithole for the rest of your life?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你真的想一辈子被关在这个破地方吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nevermind.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没关系。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't be a motherfucking stranger.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别他妈的像个怪人一样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Al Swearer [04017DB2] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaFrosthil_aaAlSwearerNeve_0001AD6E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaNVB3PorterBark
ESP.TRADUIT: aaNVB3波特大叫

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't make him look, please! Don't make him look at their faces! Make it stop, boss! Please, boss!
ESP.TRADUIT: 别让他看到，求你了！别让他看到他们的脸！住手，老大！拜托，老大！求你了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Porter [04019F94] (mod) Quest : ([0400FCB7]aaNVB3Main02) Devil's Due EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\CreatureLowIntSM\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3PorterBar_0001CEF3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Main02.PorterGreeted to 2
aaNVB3PorterGreet01
ESP.TRADUIT: aaNVB3波特greet01

ESP.ORIGINAL: You... you are not boss. Why are you here? What do you want?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你。。。你不是头儿。你为什么在这里？你想要什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Porter [04019F94] (mod) Quest : ([0400FCB7]aaNVB3Main02) Devil's Due EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\CreatureLowIntSM\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3PorterGre_0001CEF7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Main02.PorterGreeted to 6
You know there's a bounty on your head, right? I'm here to collect it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道你头上有赏金，对吧？我是来取款的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why? I only did what the boss said to do. He, he... {Shift in tone}the boss gives life and takes it away! Only the boss! Who are you to take my life?
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么？我只是照老板说的做了。他，他。。。{语气的转变}只有老板能给我们生命再夺走它！只有老板可以这么做！你要杀我的命吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Porter [04019F94] (mod) Quest : ([0400FCB7]aaNVB3Main02) Devil's Due EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\CreatureLowIntSM\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3PorterHer_0001CEFE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaPorterRef.startcombat player
I came here to make you bleed, freak. <Attack>
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是来让你流血的，怪胎。<攻击>

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have bled enough for ten lifetimes! You cannot hurt me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我已经流血够十次了！你伤害不了我的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Porter [04019F94] (mod) Quest : ([0400FCB7]aaNVB3Main02) Devil's Due EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\CreatureLowIntSM\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3PorterHer_0001CEFC_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaPorterREF.startcombat player
Porter, you've done a lot of bad things. I'm here to see that justice is served.
ESP.TRADUIT: 波特，你做了很多坏事。我来这里是为了伸张正义。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Please, make him stop! Give me the justice if it will stop the hurting! {Angry}You cannot command me! The boss decides right and wrong. You will die!
ESP.TRADUIT: 拜托，让他停下来！如果它真的能能阻止伤害的话，就给我正义的制裁吧！{生气}你不能命令我！只有老板能决定是非。你会死的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Porter [04019F94] (mod) Quest : ([0400FCB7]aaNVB3Main02) Devil's Due EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\CreatureLowIntSM\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3PorterHer_0001CEFD_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaPorterREF.startcombat player
aaNVB3PorterLowHealthGreet
ESP.TRADUIT: aaNVB3波特低生命演讲

ESP.ORIGINAL: Stop! I feel it again, the pain. Why do you hurt me? Only the boss hurts me. Why?
ESP.TRADUIT: 住手！我又感觉到了，疼痛。你为什么能伤害到我？只有老板会伤害我。为什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Porter [04019F94] (mod) Quest : ([0400FCB7]aaNVB3Main02) Devil's Due EmotionType : Puzzled Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\CreatureLowIntSM\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3PorterLow_0001CF01_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Main02.PorterGreeted to 11
aaNVB3PorterLowHealthSpeech01
ESP.TRADUIT: aaNVB3波特低生命演讲1

ESP.ORIGINAL: A long time ago, Porter was... a good guy. Guarded town far away from here. Boss came with men, killed everyone. Porter failed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很久以前，波特。。。是一个好人。远离这里守卫城镇。老板带着人来了，杀了所有人。波特失败了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Porter [04019F94] (mod) Quest : ([0400FCB7]aaNVB3Main02) Devil's Due EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\CreatureLowIntSM\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3PorterLow_0001CF07_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Boss made Porter his pet, his tool. Used Porter to do mean things... awful things... Porter is a monster. {Sobs briefly}{Angry, switching tone}But he is boss' monster!
ESP.TRADUIT: 老板让波特做他的宠物，他的工具。用波特做的事。。。可怕的事情。。。波特是个怪物。{短暂地抽泣}{愤怒，变调}但他是老板的怪物！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Porter [04019F94] (mod) Quest : ([0400FCB7]aaNVB3Main02) Devil's Due EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\CreatureLowIntSM\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3PorterLow_0001CF07_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Porter wants to leave, but boss will find him and hurt him like before.
ESP.TRADUIT: 波特想离开，但老板会找到他，像以前一样伤害他。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Porter [04019F94] (mod) Quest : ([0400FCB7]aaNVB3Main02) Devil's Due EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\CreatureLowIntSM\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3PorterLow_0001CF07_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Slow down, I'm not going to hurt you anymore. Just tell me what happened.
ESP.TRADUIT: 慢点，我不会再伤害你了。告诉我发生了什么。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You don't know the boss! He hurt me for so long. {Turning angry}You are just another bug to be squished!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不认识老板！他伤害了我这么久。{变得生气}你只是另一个要被压扁的虫子罢了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Porter [04019F94] (mod) Quest : ([0400FCB7]aaNVB3Main02) Devil's Due EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\CreatureLowIntSM\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3PorterLow_0001CF0A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaPorterREF.startcombat player
I could help you if you'd stop mumbling nonsense and tell me about the boss.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你不再胡言乱语，并告诉我你老板的事，我可以帮你。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm sorry, Porter, but this can only end one way. <Attack>
ESP.TRADUIT: 对不起，波特，但这只能以一种方式结束。<攻击>

ESP.ORIGINAL: No! I won't let you do it!
ESP.TRADUIT: 不！我不会让你这么做的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Porter [04019F94] (mod) Quest : ([0400FCB7]aaNVB3Main02) Devil's Due EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\CreatureLowIntSM\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3PorterLow_0001CF08_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaPorterREF.startcombat player
Stop crying like a little bitch and fight. <Attack>
ESP.TRADUIT: 别像个小婊子一样哭了，站起来战斗吧。<攻击>

ESP.ORIGINAL: I will break your spine and eat your guts!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会折断你的脊椎，吃掉你的内脏！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Porter [04019F94] (mod) Quest : ([0400FCB7]aaNVB3Main02) Devil's Due EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\CreatureLowIntSM\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3PorterLow_0001CF09_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaPorterREF.modav health 500 aaPorterREF.startcombat player
aaNVB3PorterLowHealthSpeech02
ESP.TRADUIT: aaNVB3波特低生命力演讲02

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, maybe... I can start over, not hurt anyone. Not be hurt anymore. I have to try.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，也许。。。我可以重新开始，不伤害任何人。别再伤害别人了。我得试试。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Porter [04019F94] (mod) Quest : ([0400FCB7]aaNVB3Main02) Devil's Due EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\CreatureLowIntSM\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3PorterLow_0001CF10_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL:
showmessage aaPorterLeaveMessage aaPorterREF.disable aaPorterREF.markfordelete setstage aaNVB3Main02 112
If VDialogueJacobstown.bMarcusDead == 1 set aaNVB3Master.PorterFate to 2 elseif VDialogueJacobstown.bMarcusDead != 1 set aaNVB3Master.PorterFate to 1 endif
If (aaFordREF.HasBeenHired == 1) && (aaFordREF.Waiting == 0) && (aaFordQuest.ShutUp != 1) set aaFordQuest.bConversation to 3 aaFordREF.startconversation player, aaFordStartConversation endif
The boss can't control you if don't let him. Take the first step and you can leave this behind you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果不让他做的话，老板就控制不了你。迈出第一步，你就可以把这个抛在脑后。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Porter will stuff your guts into your throat, make you choke on them, big mouth!
ESP.TRADUIT: 波特会把你的内脏塞进你的喉咙，让你窒息，大嘴巴！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Porter [04019F94] (mod) Quest : ([0400FCB7]aaNVB3Main02) Devil's Due EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\CreatureLowIntSM\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3PorterLow_0001CF12_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaPorterREF.startcombat player
Aren't you super mutants supposed to be tough? Grow a pair and be your own... mutant.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你们这些超级变种人不是应该很坚强吗？做你自己的想做的。。。变种人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaNVB3PorterLowHealthSpeechCharisma
ESP.TRADUIT: aaNVB3波特低生命力魅力检定

ESP.ORIGINAL: Porter heard whispers of this place. He will trust you... I will trust you. Thank you, stranger.
ESP.TRADUIT: 波特听到过这个地方的低语声。他会相信你。。。我也会相信你的。谢谢你，陌生人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Porter [04019F94] (mod) Quest : ([0400FCB7]aaNVB3Main02) Devil's Due EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\CreatureLowIntSM\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3PorterLow_0001CF13_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL:
showmessage aaPorterLeaveMessage aaPorterREF.disable aaPorterREF.markfordelete setstage aaNVB3Main02 112
If VDialogueJacobstown.bMarcusDead == 1 set aaNVB3Master.PorterFate to 2 elseif VDialogueJacobstown.bMarcusDead != 1 set aaNVB3Master.PorterFate to 1 endif
If (aaFordREF.HasBeenHired == 1) && (aaFordREF.Waiting == 0) && (aaFordQuest.ShutUp != 1) set aaFordQuest.bConversation to 3 aaFordREF.startconversation player, aaFordStartConversation endif
I know a place where you'll be safe. It's called Jacobstown. You'll just have to trust me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道一个能让你安全的地方。它叫雅各布斯镇。你只要相信我就行了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Leave right now, or I'll rip out your guts and turn you into a living bobsled.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在就走，否则我就把你的内脏挖出来，把你变成一辆活生生的雪橇。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fuck the boss! I is gone!
ESP.TRADUIT: 去他妈的老板！俺走了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Porter [04019F94] (mod) Quest : ([0400FCB7]aaNVB3Main02) Devil's Due EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\CreatureLowIntSM\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3PorterLow_0001CF0E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL:
showmessage aaPorterLeaveMessage aaPorterREF.disable aaPorterREF.markfordelete setstage aaNVB3Main02 112
If VDialogueJacobstown.bMarcusDead == 1 set aaNVB3Master.PorterFate to 2 elseif VDialogueJacobstown.bMarcusDead != 1 set aaNVB3Master.PorterFate to 1 endif
If (aaFordREF.HasBeenHired == 1) && (aaFordREF.Waiting == 0) && (aaFordQuest.ShutUp != 1) set aaFordQuest.bConversation to 3 aaFordREF.startconversation player, aaFordStartConversation endif
aaNVB3LeeSpeech01
ESP.TRADUIT: aaNVB3李对话1

ESP.ORIGINAL: I... I know. I know! I just... can't accept that he'd throw me away. I've done more for him than you know... and this life... it's all I know.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我...我知道。我知道了！我只是...不能接受他把我抛弃了。我为他做的比你知道的还要多...今生...我只知道这些。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Angel Lee [0401D3EB] (mod) Quest : ([0400FCB7]aaNVB3Main02) Devil's Due EmotionType : Puzzled Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3LeeSpeech_0001E27D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you honestly think you'll be included in Marko's plans? You're expendable.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你真的认为你会被列入马尔科的计划吗？你是可以牺牲的废物。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You don't know what he's capable of. {Painful laughter}You're going to find out soon enough.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不知道他有什么本事。{痛苦的笑声}你很快就会亲身体会到的的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Angel Lee [0401D3EB] (mod) Quest : ([0400FCB7]aaNVB3Main02) Devil's Due EmotionType : Puzzled Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3LeeSpeech_0001E27E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Stop being such a pussy about Marko. I'm going to kill that fucker, so what does it matter?
ESP.TRADUIT: 别对马尔科那么小题大做了。我要杀了那个混蛋，那又有什么关系？

ESP.ORIGINAL: We both know why I'm here. Meet me outside and we'll settle this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们都知道我来这里的原因。在外面等我，我们会解决一切的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You don't lack for confidence, do you? I only fear one man, and you ain't him. After you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你一点也不缺乏信心，对吗？我只害怕一个人，而你并不是他。你先走吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Angel Lee [0401D3EB] (mod) Quest : ([0400FCB7]aaNVB3Main02) Devil's Due EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3LeeIntroC_0001D3F7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Main02.LeeGreeted to 10 aaAngelLeeREF.evp
You knew this day was coming, asshole. Reap what you sow. <Attack>
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道这一天就要到了，混蛋。你种下什么坏事就要收获什么恶果。<攻击>

ESP.ORIGINAL: No appreciation for common courtesy. {Sighs}Very well.
ESP.TRADUIT: 连普通的礼貌都不会欣赏。{叹息}很好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Angel Lee [0401D3EB] (mod) Quest : ([0400FCB7]aaNVB3Main02) Devil's Due EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3LeeIntroD_0001D3F8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaAngelLeeREF.startcombat player
I don't want your surrender. I want you to leave Frosthill now and forever.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不想要你的投降。我要的是你现在永远离开霜地。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you dense? I'm wounded, but I have no intention of throwing my life away. Marko would hunt me down.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你疯了吗？我已经受伤了，但我不想放弃我的生命。马尔科会派人追杀我的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Angel Lee [0401D3EB] (mod) Quest : ([0400FCB7]aaNVB3Main02) Devil's Due EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3LeeHurtPr_0001E27A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Run and don't look back. If you even peek, I'll carve out your eyes with a fucking fork.
ESP.TRADUIT: 滚吧，别再回头了。如果你敢偷看的话，我会用叉子划出你该死的眼睛。

ESP.ORIGINAL: My eyes are closed, my eyes are closed, all right? My eyes... closed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的眼睛闭上了，我的眼睛已经看不见了，好吗？我的眼睛。。。。让它瞎了好了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Angel Lee [0401D3EB] (mod) Quest : ([0400FCB7]aaNVB3Main02) Devil's Due EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaNVB3Main02_aaNVB3LeeTP_0001E289_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: showmessage aaLeeLeaveMessage aaAngelLeeREF.disable aaAngelLeeREF.markfordelete setstage aaNVB3Main02 132 set aaNVB3Main02.LeeSpared to 1 set aaNVB3Master.LeeFate to 1
You chose a violent path, Lee. It had to end this way. <Attack>
ESP.TRADUIT: 既然你选择了一条充满暴力的路，李。你就必须用这种方式结束你的罪恶。<攻击>

ESP.ORIGINAL: So it does. I should've listened to mama.
ESP.TRADUIT: 确实如此。我真应该听妈妈的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Angel Lee [0401D3EB] (mod) Quest : ([0400FCB7]aaNVB3Main02) Devil's Due EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3LeeHurtRe_0001E27B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaAngelLeeREF.startcombat player
Why don't you get on your knees and beg? <Attack>
ESP.TRADUIT: 你为什么不跪下来祈求我的怜悯呢？<攻击>

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not while I'm breathing, you worthless cunt!
ESP.TRADUIT: 至少在我还活着的时候不会，你这个没用的婊子！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Angel Lee [0401D3EB] (mod) Quest : ([0400FCB7]aaNVB3Main02) Devil's Due EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3LeeHurtEn_0001E27C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaAngelLeeREF.modav health 250 aaAngelLeeREF.startcombat player
aaNVB3LeeStartDuel
ESP.TRADUIT: aaNVB3李开始决斗

ESP.ORIGINAL: Draw.
ESP.TRADUIT: 拔枪吧！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Angel Lee [0401D3EB] (mod) Quest : ([0400FCB7]aaNVB3Main02) Devil's Due EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3LeeStartD_0001D403_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setobjectivecompleted aaNVB3Main02 126 1
set aaNVB3Main02.LeeGreeted to 11 set aaNVB3Main02.LeeProvoked to 1 aaAngelLeeRef.startcombat player
aaNVB3LeeHurtIntro
ESP.TRADUIT: aaNVB3李受伤对话

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's enough! I... I'm hurt. Goddamit, I surrender! That's what you want, isn't it? I won't fight back. {Grunts in pain}
ESP.TRADUIT: 够了！我 。。。我受伤了。该死，我投降了！这就是你想要的，不是吗？我不会再反击的。{痛苦的呻吟}
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Angel Lee [0401D3EB] (mod) Quest : ([0400FCB7]aaNVB3Main02) Devil's Due EmotionType : Puzzled Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3LeeHurtIn_0001E277_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Main02.LeeGreeted to 16
aaNVB3LeeSpeech02
ESP.TRADUIT: aaNVB3李对话2

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Sighs out of reluctance}I don't have a choice, do I? Very well, you have my word on it. I'll leave... maybe go east. It's more interesting that way.
ESP.TRADUIT: {不情愿地叹口气}我别无选择，是吗？很好，我向你保证。我要走了。。。也许向东走。因为这样更有趣点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Angel Lee [0401D3EB] (mod) Quest : ([0400FCB7]aaNVB3Main02) Devil's Due EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3LeeSpeech_0001E27F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: showmessage aaLeeLeaveMessage aaAngelLeeREF.disable; save for ending setstage aaNVB3Main02 132 set aaNVB3Main02.LeeSpared to 1 set aaNVB3Master.LeeFate to 2
Give me your word that you won't return, and you're free to go. It's that simple.
ESP.TRADUIT: 答应我你不会回来，你就可以走了。就这么简单。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's what I get for coming up here to this frozen shithole. Goddamn asshole.
ESP.TRADUIT: 答应我你不会回来，你就可以走了。就这么简单。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Angel Lee [0401D3EB] (mod) Quest : ([0400FCB7]aaNVB3Main02) Devil's Due EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3LeeSpeech_0001E288_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're the one who was asking for mercy. I can't work miracles, you simple bastard.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你就是那个祈求饶恕的人。我可不能创造奇迹，你这个混蛋。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're scared, I can see it. Marko is going to die here. Save your skin and don't look back.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你害怕了，我看得出来。马尔科会死在这里的。带着你完整的皮肤滚吧，不要回头看。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've never been scared of anyone... except Marko. I just can't imagine anyone killing him. If you can do it, then it's like you say.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我从来没有害怕过任何人...除了马尔科。我只是无法想象有人会杀了他。如果你能做到，那就像你说的吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Angel Lee [0401D3EB] (mod) Quest : ([0400FCB7]aaNVB3Main02) Devil's Due EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3LeeSpeech_0001E287_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I got no more reason to stay up here, freezing my ass off. I'll head east, I guess. Goodbye, bounty hunter.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我再也没有理由呆在这里，已经冻得屁滚尿流了。我想我要往东走。再见了，赏金猎人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Angel Lee [0401D3EB] (mod) Quest : ([0400FCB7]aaNVB3Main02) Devil's Due EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3LeeSpeech_0001E287_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: showmessage aaLeeLeaveMessage aaAngelLeeREF.disable; save for ending setstage aaNVB3Main02 132 set aaNVB3Main02.LeeSpared to 1 set aaNVB3Master.LeeFate to 2
Nevermind.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没关系。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Farewell.
ESP.TRADUIT: 再会。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Angel Lee [0401D3EB] (mod) Quest : ([0400FCB7]aaNVB3Main02) Devil's Due EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3LeeNeverm_0001F1A1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaNVB3KetchumOutlawIntro01
ESP.TRADUIT: aaNVB3凯彻姆无法者导入01

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hold your shit, don't shoot! We surrender! We ain't gonna fight you!
ESP.TRADUIT: 别动，别开枪！我们投降！我们不会再攻击你了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Outlaw Ringleader [040202DA] (mod) Quest : ([0400FCB7]aaNVB3Main02) Devil's Due EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3KetchumOu_000202E9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set up goddamn traps night and day, but even that wasn't enough. Well, I say fuck this!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们日以继夜地设陷阱，但这看起来还是不够。好吧，去他妈的吧！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Outlaw Ringleader [040202DA] (mod) Quest : ([0400FCB7]aaNVB3Main02) Devil's Due EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3KetchumOu_000202E9_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Main02.OutlawGreeted to 2
You don't fool me, criminal scum. Run if you want, it won't make any difference. <Attack>
ESP.TRADUIT: 你骗不了我，罪恶的人渣。你想跑就跑吧，因为这对我不会有区别的。<攻击>

ESP.ORIGINAL: Christ, we're fucked! Run!
ESP.TRADUIT: 天哪，我们玩儿完了！快跑！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Outlaw Ringleader [040202DA] (mod) Quest : ([0400FCB7]aaNVB3Main02) Devil's Due EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3KetchumOu_000202EC_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaKetchumOutlawSpokesmanREF.startcombat player
What do you mean, surrender? Explain yourself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你什么意思，投降？解释一下你的话。

ESP.ORIGINAL: We knew you was coming, and we heard about everything you done, all them people you killed. We don't want no part in this no more.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们知道你要来，并我们听说了你所做的一切，还有那些你杀的人。我们不想再参与这件事中了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Outlaw Ringleader [040202DA] (mod) Quest : ([0400FCB7]aaNVB3Main02) Devil's Due EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3KetchumOu_000202ED_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It was Ketchum's dumb idea to pack c4 on Annie and send her to blow you up. I ain't never seen no dumber plan than that shit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是凯彻姆想到了把c4装在安妮身上，让她炸死你的蠢计划。我从没见过比这更傻的计划。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Outlaw Ringleader [040202DA] (mod) Quest : ([0400FCB7]aaNVB3Main02) Devil's Due EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3KetchumOu_000202ED_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ketchum can stick with Marko if he wants, but as for me and the boys, we're walking out of these mountains. Fuck Marko!
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果凯彻姆愿意的话，他可以和他继续待在一起，但对于我和孩子们来说，我们要逃出这些山了。去他妈的马尔科！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Outlaw Ringleader [040202DA] (mod) Quest : ([0400FCB7]aaNVB3Main02) Devil's Due EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3KetchumOu_000202ED_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Throw down your weapons and I'll allow you to leave, so long as you never return.
ESP.TRADUIT: 放下武器吧，只要你再也不回来，我就允许你离开。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I speak for everybody when I say we don't ever want to see this place again! Thank you!
ESP.TRADUIT: 当我说我们再也不想看到这个地方时，我是代表所有人在说话！谢谢您！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Outlaw Ringleader [040202DA] (mod) Quest : ([0400FCB7]aaNVB3Main02) Devil's Due EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3KetchumOu_000202F1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL:
set aaNVB3Main02.OutlawReleased to 1 aaKetchumTrapParentREF.disable
aaKetchumOutlaw01REF.RemoveAllTypedItems aaBullshitWeaponContainerREF 1 0 40 aaKetchumOutlaw02REF.RemoveAllTypedItems aaBullshitWeaponContainerREF 1 0 40 aaKetchumOutlaw03REF.RemoveAllTypedItems aaBullshitWeaponContainerREF 1 0 40 aaKetchumOutlaw04REF.RemoveAllTypedItems aaBullshitWeaponContainerREF 1 0 40 aaKetchumOutlaw05REF.RemoveAllTypedItems aaBullshitWeaponContainerREF 1 0 40 aaKetchumOutlawSpokesmanREF.RemoveAllTypedItems aaBullshitWeaponContainerREF 1 0 40
I'm sorry, but I can't let you go. You live as an outlaw, you die as an outlaw. <Attack>
ESP.TRADUIT: 对不起，我不能让你走。既然你活得像个亡命之徒，就得死得像个亡命之徒。<攻击>

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sweet Jesus, run!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的天哪，快跑！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Outlaw Ringleader [040202DA] (mod) Quest : ([0400FCB7]aaNVB3Main02) Devil's Due EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3KetchumOu_000202F9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaKetchumOutlawSpokesmanREF.startcombat player
I had considered letting you go, but your use of double negatives irks me. Time to die. <Attack>
ESP.TRADUIT: 我曾考虑过让你走的，但你用的双重否定句让我很厌烦。所以是时候死了。<攻击>

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh God, we gotta move!
ESP.TRADUIT: 天啊，我们得快跑！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Outlaw Ringleader [040202DA] (mod) Quest : ([0400FCB7]aaNVB3Main02) Devil's Due EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3KetchumOu_000202FA_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaKetchumOutlawSpokesmanREF.startcombat player
aaNVB3KetchumOutlawBrahmin
ESP.TRADUIT: aaNVB3凯彻姆无法者巴哈名

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaNVB3GlantonIntro
ESP.TRADUIT: aaNVB3格兰顿介绍

ESP.ORIGINAL: One step, just one more step and I pull the trigger on this detonator.
ESP.TRADUIT: 再往前走一步，我就拉动这个雷管的击发器。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Glanton [04023AA9] (mod) Quest : ([0400FCB7]aaNVB3Main02) Devil's Due EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleOld01\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3GlantonIn_00027954_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There are a half-dozen kids taken from the 80's in the adjacent room. I've wired the room, so don't try anything.
ESP.TRADUIT: 隔壁房间里有六个80年代帮的小子。而我给那间房间也装上了导线，所以不要想做任何事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Glanton [04023AA9] (mod) Quest : ([0400FCB7]aaNVB3Main02) Devil's Due EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleOld01\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3GlantonIn_00027954_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Randall sent you, didn't he? He won't stop until he's buried Marko in the dirt. I can respect that. But I'm not Marko.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是兰道尔派你来的，不是吗？除非他把马尔科埋在土里，不然他不会停下来的。我可以尊重你们的选择。但我不是马尔科。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Glanton [04023AA9] (mod) Quest : ([0400FCB7]aaNVB3Main02) Devil's Due EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleOld01\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3GlantonIn_00027954_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm walking out of these mountains, and nobody's stopping me. I'm not going to die up here on behalf of some miscreant like Marko.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要走出这些山，没人能阻止我的。我不会为了马尔科这样的恶棍死在这里的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Glanton [04023AA9] (mod) Quest : ([0400FCB7]aaNVB3Main02) Devil's Due EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleOld01\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3GlantonIn_00027954_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let me pass and the kids are yours, safe and sound. Push me... and I'll pull the fucking temple down on both of us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 让我过去，那些小子们都会安全无恙的被你救下的。但如果你再向我施压。。。我就他妈的把我们两个都炸到土里，死也要拖你垫背。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Glanton [04023AA9] (mod) Quest : ([0400FCB7]aaNVB3Main02) Devil's Due EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleOld01\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3GlantonIn_00027954_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Main02.GlantonGreeted to 2
It had to be you, didn't it? I knew you had run with Randall, but I didn't expect you to come all the way up here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那肯定是你，不对吗？我知道你和兰道尔一起共事，但没想到你会一路跑到这里来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Glanton [04023AA9] (mod) Quest : ([0400FCB7]aaNVB3Main02) Devil's Due EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleOld01\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3GlantonIn_00027955_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm sorry we didn't have a proper goodbye back in Silverwood, but my departure was a matter of necessity.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很抱歉我们在银林没有好好道别，但我的离开是必须的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Glanton [04023AA9] (mod) Quest : ([0400FCB7]aaNVB3Main02) Devil's Due EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleOld01\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3GlantonIn_00027955_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, I salute you for your brilliant, if improvised defense of the town. I doubt I could've done any better. Pity about the Sand Wolves.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，我向你致敬，感谢你对这座城市做出的出色的、即兴的防御。但我怀疑我能做得更好。我真是可怜那些沙狼。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Glanton [04023AA9] (mod) Quest : ([0400FCB7]aaNVB3Main02) Devil's Due EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleOld01\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3GlantonIn_00027955_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now before you do anything rash, just know I've got a half-dozen tribals strapped with explosives in the next room.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在，在你做任何鲁莽的事之前，你要知道我在隔壁房间放了六个被绑着炸药的部落疯子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Glanton [04023AA9] (mod) Quest : ([0400FCB7]aaNVB3Main02) Devil's Due

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm walking out of these mountains, and nobody's stopping me. I'm not going to die up here on behalf of some miscreant like Marko.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要走出这些山，没人能阻止我的。我不会为了马尔科这样的恶棍死在这里的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Glanton [04023AA9] (mod) Quest : ([0400FCB7]aaNVB3Main02) Devil's Due EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleOld01\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3GlantonIn_00027955_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let me pass and the kids are yours, safe and sound. Push me... and I'll pull the fucking temple down on both of us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 让我过去，那些小子们都会安全无恙的被你救下的。但如果你再向我施压。。。我就他妈的把我们两个都炸到土里，死也要拖你垫背。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Glanton [04023AA9] (mod) Quest : ([0400FCB7]aaNVB3Main02) Devil's Due EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleOld01\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3GlantonIn_00027955_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Main02.GlantonGreeted to 2
Kill the kids or don't, it makes no difference to me. You're a fucking dead man. <Attack>
ESP.TRADUIT: 无论你杀不杀那些孩子，这他妈对我来说都没有任何区别。你已经死了。<攻击>

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not leaving here without your scalp!
ESP.TRADUIT: 没有割下你的头皮之前我是不会离开的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Glanton [04023AA9] (mod) Quest : ([0400FCB7]aaNVB3Main02) Devil's Due EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL:
aaNVB3GlantonREF.startcombat player
aaGlantonCaptiveAliveParentREF.disable aaGlantonCaptiveAliveParentREF.markfordelete aaGlantonCaptiveDEADParentREF.enable aaCaptiveBombMarker01REF.placeatme FatManNukeExplosion aaCaptiveBombMarker02REF.placeatme FatManNukeExplosion set aaNVB3Master.GlantonFate to 2 aaNVB3GlantonREF.unequipitem WeapNVDetonator aaNVB3GlantonREF.equipitem aaGlantonBowieKnife
If you pull that trigger I'll cut your nuts off and make you gargle them for my amusement.<Attack>
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你敢扣动起爆器的话，我就把你的蛋蛋射掉，然后让你用他们漱口来取乐。<攻击>

ESP.ORIGINAL: Baby Jesus, watch over me!
ESP.TRADUIT: 天哪，请保佑我！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Glanton [04023AA9] (mod) Quest : ([0400FCB7]aaNVB3Main02) Devil's Due EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaNVB3GlantonREF.playidle CowersLoose

aaNVB3GlantonREF.startcombat player aaNVB3GlantonREF.castonme TerrifyingPresenceSpell aaNVB3GlantonREF.setav confidence 0 aaNVB3GlantonREF.unequipitem WeapNVDetonator aaNVB3GlantonREF.equipitem aaGlantonBowieKnife
Why should I let you go? You'll just end up killing again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我为什么要让你走？你会再次开始滥杀的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: And who have I killed? Innocents? Hardly! Base animals living in a state of nature, removed from civilization, law, and decency.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么我杀了谁？无辜？没有人无辜！低等动物正生活在自然法则之下，脱离了文明、法律和正义的制裁。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Glanton [04023AA9] (mod) Quest : ([0400FCB7]aaNVB3Main02) Devil's Due EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleOld01\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3GlantonIn_00027964_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Sand Wolves executed helpless babes, tortured settlers for days. I gave them a quick death, which was far more than they deserved.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那些沙狼处决了无助的婴儿，折磨了定居者好几天。而我却给了他们一个痛快，这远远达不到了他们应遭受的报应。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Glanton [04023AA9] (mod) Quest : ([0400FCB7]aaNVB3Main02) Devil's Due EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleOld01\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3GlantonIn_00027964_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And the 80's? Murderous maniacs, every one of them. I merely turned back their encroachment into these mountains, little else.
ESP.TRADUIT: 80年代帮呢？他们每个人都是杀人狂。我只不过把他们对这些山的侵占拿了回来，除此之外什么也没做。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Glanton [04023AA9] (mod) Quest : ([0400FCB7]aaNVB3Main02) Devil's Due EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleOld01\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3GlantonIn_00027964_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe I will kill again, Courier. But will you stand there and tell me I'm doing wrong? I am the line between life and death on the frontier!
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许我会再次开始杀戮，邮差。但你能站在那里告诉我，我做错了吗？我是这边疆分辨生死的分界线！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Glanton [04023AA9] (mod) Quest : ([0400FCB7]aaNVB3Main02) Devil's Due EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleOld01\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3GlantonIn_00027964_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't enjoy hurting children. I make it quick and painless. But I know what they'll become. I won't hesitate to pull this trigger.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不喜欢伤害孩子。我让死亡的过程迅捷，并且没有任何痛苦。但我知道他们最后会变成什么样的恶徒。所以我才会毫不犹豫地扣动扳机。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Glanton [04023AA9] (mod) Quest : ([0400FCB7]aaNVB3Main02) Devil's Due EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleOld01\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3GlantonIn_00027964_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Leave the children unharmed and you can leave in peace. I give you my word.
ESP.TRADUIT: 只要你让那些孩子安全，你就可以安然无恙地离开了。我向你保证。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wise choice. I'd make a quip about seeing you again, but I think it's better left unsaid. Goodbye, Courier.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真是明智的选择。我本想开个玩笑，跟你以后再见的，但我想还是不说为好。永别了，邮差。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Glanton [04023AA9] (mod) Quest : ([0400FCB7]aaNVB3Main02) Devil's Due EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleOld01\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3GlantonLe_00027968_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaNVB3Main02 172 Set SomeguyMaster.MartinStatus to 2 showmessage aaGlantonLeaveMessage aaNVB3GlantonREF.disable aaNVB3GlantonREF.markfordelete set aaNVB3Master.GlantonFate to 1 player.additem aaGlantonKey 1
aaNVB3GlantonLetYouGoDeny
ESP.TRADUIT: aaNVB3格兰顿让你走拒绝

ESP.ORIGINAL: You can't run forever, Glanton. Face me and we can end it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不能永远跑下去的，格兰顿。面对我，这样我们就可以结束痛苦了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do I look like some filthy savage to you? That might work on a cretin like Red Bear, but I won't humor your ego. It's not happening.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你觉得我像个肮脏的野蛮人吗？你的做法可能对像红熊这样的白痴有用，但我不会迁就你的自负。这不会发生的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Glanton [04023AA9] (mod) Quest : ([0400FCB7]aaNVB3Main02) Devil's Due EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleOld01\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3GlantonDu_00027963_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaNVB3GlantonDuelSpeech
ESP.TRADUIT: aaNVB3格兰顿对决对话

ESP.ORIGINAL: You wouldn't stand a chance, but I am intrigued. Even then... no, no, it's not worth it. You're not worth it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不会有机会的，但我很感兴趣。即使这样。。。不，不，这不值得。你不值得我这样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Glanton [04023AA9] (mod) Quest : ([0400FCB7]aaNVB3Main02) Devil's Due EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleOld01\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3GlantonDu_0002796C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fight me now and you'll have resolution. Run and you'll have to keep looking over your shoulder.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在跟我打一场，你就能解决你的问题了。快跑，而且你将不得不一直回头看。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You... you might actually be legally retarded. Well, that simplifies things.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你。。。实际上你可能是法律上定义的弱智吧。好吧，这简化了事情。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Glanton [04023AA9] (mod) Quest : ([0400FCB7]aaNVB3Main02) Devil's Due EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleOld01\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3GlantonDu_0002796D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Too scared to fight the big, bad Courier? GLANTON IS A PUSSY! GLANTON IS A PUSSY!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你害怕得不敢和一个又强壮又坏的邮差打架？格兰顿可真是个娘娘腔！格兰顿可真是个娘娘腔！！（低智力）

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Charisma Check}
ESP.TRADUIT: {魅力检定}

ESP.ORIGINAL: The weather doesn't concern me so much as staying alive.
ESP.TRADUIT: 天气与我无关，我更关心的是如何活下去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Glanton [04023AA9] (mod) Quest : ([0400FCB7]aaNVB3Main02) Devil's Due EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleOld01\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3GlantonDu_0002796F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wouldn't you rather fight in here where it's warm? It's freezing outside!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不想在暖和点的地方打架吗？外面太冷了！

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Annoyed, but recognizes point}So they do. Very well, Courier. I'll be carrying your scalp with me when I leave this place.
ESP.TRADUIT: {恼怒，但听懂了内在含义}所以他们会没事的。行吧，邮差。当我离开这里的时候，我会带走你的头皮。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Glanton [04023AA9] (mod) Quest : ([0400FCB7]aaNVB3Main02) Devil's Due EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleOld01\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3GlantonDu_00027970_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaNVB3GlantonREF.startcombat player aaNVB3GlantonREF.unequipitem WeapNVDetonator aaNVB3GlantonREF.equipitem aaGlantonBowieKnife
Real men face their problems head-on. They don't cower behind children or run away. <Attack>
ESP.TRADUIT: 真正的有种的男人会直面他们的问题。他们不会畏缩在孩子们后面或逃跑。<攻击>

ESP.ORIGINAL: I saw what you did to the Sand Wolves. You're a monster.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我见过你对沙狼们做了写什么。你就是个怪物。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Monsters kill indiscriminately. I like to think of myself as a surgeon, extracting malign substances from the greater body of civilization.
ESP.TRADUIT: 怪物会滥杀无辜。而我喜欢把自己想象成一个外科医生，从更大的文明体系中提取那些有害的物质。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Glanton [04023AA9] (mod) Quest : ([0400FCB7]aaNVB3Main02) Devil's Due EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleOld01\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3GlantonIn_00027967_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Any madman with a bloodlust can be a monster. It takes skill and a sense of responsibility to be a surgeon, to do what few can in a crisis.
ESP.TRADUIT: 任何嗜血的疯子都可能是怪物。而做一名外科医生则需要技巧和责任感，在危急关头要能做到别人做不到的事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Glanton [04023AA9] (mod) Quest : ([0400FCB7]aaNVB3Main02) Devil's Due EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleOld01\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3GlantonIn_00027967_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Remove me and there will be another, or perhaps the cancer will grow. Then the masses and their mewling bureaucrats will bemoan their fate.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就算你杀了我，会有另一个人顶替我的，否则癌症会不断地生长下去。然后，那些群众和让他们哀号的官僚们会为他们的命运而悲叹。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Glanton [04023AA9] (mod) Quest : ([0400FCB7]aaNVB3Main02) Devil's Due EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleOld01\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3GlantonIn_00027967_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If that day comes, I'll look up from hell and have a nice, long laugh. Then you'll see the real monsters, Courier... the ones who sow anarchy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果那一天真的到来的话，我会从地狱里昂起我的头，好好地嘲笑你们一番。然后你才会看到真正的怪物，邮差。。。怪物是那些散布无政府主义的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Glanton [04023AA9] (mod) Quest : ([0400FCB7]aaNVB3Main02) Devil's Due EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleOld01\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3GlantonIn_00027967_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How in the hell did you get teamed up with Marko?
ESP.TRADUIT: 以地狱之名，你到底是怎么和马尔科合作的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fate is fickle. I'm no longer welcome in the Mojave, so my options were running out until I received a letter from Marko.
ESP.TRADUIT: 命运变化无常。我在莫哈维已经不受欢迎了，所以在收到马尔科的信之前，我根本没有选择的余地。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Glanton [04023AA9] (mod) Quest : ([0400FCB7]aaNVB3Main02) Devil's Due EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleOld01\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3GlantonIn_0002796A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Though it seems absurd now, Marko was attempting to establish a higher form of order in Frosthill, though nothing I'd call a government.
ESP.TRADUIT: 虽然这现在看来很荒谬，但马尔科真的试图在霜地建立一种更高形式的秩序，尽管我仍然不会称之为政府。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Glanton [04023AA9] (mod) Quest : ([0400FCB7]aaNVB3Main02) Devil's Due EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleOld01\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3GlantonIn_0002796A_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I suspect he just wanted a quiet place to retire, so marauding raiders couldn't be tolerated. Thus, I was hired to solve the 80's problem.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我怀疑他只是想找个安静的地方退休罢了，所以那些扫荡的袭击者是不能被容忍的。因此，我才被雇来解决80年代帮的问题。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Glanton [04023AA9] (mod) Quest : ([0400FCB7]aaNVB3Main02) Devil's Due EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleOld01\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3GlantonIn_0002796A_3.ogg
