ESP.ORIGINAL: My solution was... complete. The 80's will no longer tread in the Deep Creek Mountains, or at least not for a generation.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的解决办法是...绝对完成了的。80年代帮的人将不再踏入深溪山脉了，或者至少这一代人都不会了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Glanton [04023AA9] (mod) Quest : ([0400FCB7]aaNVB3Main02) Devil's Due EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleOld01\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3GlantonIn_0002796A_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Marko paid well enough, but I am uneasy working with the man. He exudes an indescribable malignance and cunning I've never encountered.
ESP.TRADUIT: 马尔科支付的薪水很高，但我还是不愿意和他一起工作。他很自然的流露出一种我从未遇到过的难以形容的恶毒和狡猾。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Glanton [04023AA9] (mod) Quest : ([0400FCB7]aaNVB3Main02) Devil's Due EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleOld01\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3GlantonIn_0002796A_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have long been at odds with his various cronies scattered throughout the canyons, but I now suspect Marko will remove me at the first opportunity.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我和他散布在峡谷里的各种各样的亲信早就不和了，但我现在怀疑马尔科一有机会就会把我解决的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Glanton [04023AA9] (mod) Quest : ([0400FCB7]aaNVB3Main02) Devil's Due EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleOld01\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3GlantonIn_0002796A_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He is planning something, and I doubt I am included in his vision. You have certainly simplified his plans by purging all his hangers-on.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他在计划什么，而我怀疑我是否被纳入他的视野中。你肯定是把他所有的晾衣架都清理干净了，你肯定是通过削减他的左膀右臂来简化他的计划的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Glanton [04023AA9] (mod) Quest : ([0400FCB7]aaNVB3Main02) Devil's Due EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleOld01\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3GlantonIn_0002796A_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They were a troublesome, restless lot that had an uneasy relationship with the town, anyway. Marko may have planned it all along.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管怎样，他们只会是一个麻烦的、不安的群体，和这个城镇的关系很不稳定。马尔科可能一直都在计划这件事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Glanton [04023AA9] (mod) Quest : ([0400FCB7]aaNVB3Main02) Devil's Due EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleOld01\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3GlantonIn_0002796A_8.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You may kill those children, but they're the last lives you'll take. This ends now. <Attack>
ESP.TRADUIT: 你可以杀了那些孩子，但他们会是你最后夺走的生命了。现在一切都结束了。<攻击>

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not leaving here without your scalp!
ESP.TRADUIT: 没有割下你的头皮之前我是不会离开的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Glanton [04023AA9] (mod) Quest : ([0400FCB7]aaNVB3Main02) Devil's Due EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleOld01\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3GlantonIn_0002796B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL:
aaNVB3GlantonREF.startcombat player
aaGlantonCaptiveAliveParentREF.disable aaGlantonCaptiveAliveParentREF.markfordelete aaGlantonCaptiveDEADParentREF.enable aaCaptiveBombMarker01REF.placeatme FatManNukeExplosion aaCaptiveBombMarker02REF.placeatme FatManNukeExplosion set aaNVB3Master.GlantonFate to 2 aaNVB3GlantonREF.unequipitem WeapNVDetonator aaNVB3GlantonREF.equipitem aaGlantonBowieKnife
aaNVB3GlantonDuelAcceptTerms
ESP.TRADUIT: aaNVB3格兰顿对决接受对话

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaNVB3GlantonDuelDenyTerms
ESP.TRADUIT: aaNVB3格兰顿对决推迟对话

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaREGunfighterIntro
I come for ya. That's right, I heard all about you. Some kind of badass, huh? You don't look too special to me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是来找你的。是的，我听说了关于你的一切。你是个有种的人，是吧？你看起来可不太特别啊。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gunfighter [04027F68] (mod) Quest : ([04027F62]aaREDialogue) Dialogue for Random Encounters EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaREDialog_aaREGunfighterI_00027F71_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What would you do if I called you a chickenshit? You got any balls, or is it all just talk? What you got to say about that, scooter?
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我叫你胆小鬼，懦夫，你会怎么办？你是真的有种，还是只是吹吹牛罢了？你想说点什么么，你这儿童踏板车？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gunfighter [04027F68] (mod) Quest : ([04027F62]aaREDialogue) Dialogue for Random Encounters EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaREDialog_aaREGunfighterI_00027F71_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaREDialogue.GunfighterGreeted to 1
aaREGunfighterSpeech
ESP.TRADUIT: aaRE枪手对话

ESP.ORIGINAL: I come a long, long way to see what you're made of. I got a reputation of my own, you see. Man's name means a lot in the wasteland.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我走了很长很长的路来看看你是用什么做的。你知道，我有自己的名声。人的名字在这废土里可是很重要的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gunfighter [04027F68] (mod) Quest : ([04027F62]aaREDialogue) Dialogue for Random Encounters EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaREDialog_aaREGunfighterS_00027F78_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, I aim to see this through to the finish.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，我的目标是把这整件事看完。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gunfighter [04027F68] (mod) Quest : ([04027F62]aaREDialogue) Dialogue for Random Encounters EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaREDialog_aaREGunfighterS_00027F78_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's nothing to be gained by fighting me. Even if you kill me, it would be hard to prove it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 跟我打架没什么好处。即使你杀了我，也很难证明你想要的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fame, and maybe some caps to boot. That's enough for me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 名声，也许还有一些瓶盖。对我来说已经够了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gunfighter [04027F68] (mod) Quest : ([04027F62]aaREDialogue) Dialogue for Random Encounters EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaREDialog_aaREGunfighterS_00027F79_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't even know you, and you want to kill me. Is there any point in this?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我都不认识你，你却想杀了我。这有什么意义吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaREGunfighterCharisma
ESP.TRADUIT: aaRE枪手魅力检定

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, when you put it like that... maybe I should just move on. There's better things to do than freezing my ass up here in the mountains.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当你这样说的时候。。。也许我该继续。还有比在山上冻死我更好的事要做。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gunfighter [04027F68] (mod) Quest : ([04027F62]aaREDialogue) Dialogue for Random Encounters EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaREDialog_aaREGunfighterC_00027F7A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaREDialogue.GunfighterGreeted to 5 evp
If you kill me, someone will be hunting you for the rest of your days. Reputation has a price.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你杀了我，有人会在你剩下的日子里追捕你。名誉是有代价的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Snowballs? Are you one of them special folks? Damn, that's a disappointment.
ESP.TRADUIT: 雪仗？你是他们中的一员吗？该死，真让人失望。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gunfighter [04027F68] (mod) Quest : ([04027F62]aaREDialogue) Dialogue for Random Encounters EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaREDialog_aaREGunfighterC_00027F7B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why don't we have a snowball fight instead?
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么我们不打个雪仗呢？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not looking to start a fight, but I'll finish one if I have to. <Attack>
ESP.TRADUIT: 我可不想挑起斗争，但如果必须的话，我会结 束 一 场。<攻击>

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fucking pussies like you make it too easy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 像你这样的娘娘腔让这事儿太容易了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gunfighter [04027F68] (mod) Quest : ([04027F62]aaREDialogue) Dialogue for Random Encounters EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: startcombat player setenemy aaREGunfighterFaction PlayerFaction
You came a long way just to die. <Attack>
ESP.TRADUIT: 你走了这么长的一段路就是为了死么。<攻击>

ESP.ORIGINAL: It ain't my day, asshole.
ESP.TRADUIT: 今天不是我的好日子，混蛋。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gunfighter [04027F68] (mod) Quest : ([04027F62]aaREDialogue) Dialogue for Random Encounters EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaREDialog_aaREGunfighterE_00027F76_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: startcombat player setenemy aaREGunfighterFaction PlayerFaction
God himself will weep when he sees what I've done to your miserable shell of a body. <Attack>
ESP.TRADUIT: 当上帝看到我对你可怜的躯壳所做的一切时，他自己也会哭泣的。<攻击>

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can we just call this an honest misunderstanding? Shit!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们能不能说这是一个真诚的误会？倒霉！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gunfighter [04027F68] (mod) Quest : ([04027F62]aaREDialogue) Dialogue for Random Encounters EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaREDialog_aaREGunfighterT_00027F74_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: startcombat player setenemy aaREGunfighterFaction PlayerFaction set aaREDialogue.GunfighterGreeted to 10 evp
I think that's all of them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想就这些了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, Ingram and Saunders weren't holding the fuck back, that's for goddamn certain. Shit fire!
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，英格拉姆和桑德斯并没有退缩，这是他妈的肯定的。该死的火！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallRepell_0002934D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The bounty came to us this time, but you earned it... and then some. Here's a bonus. Catch your breath and check with me when you want another job.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这次赏金主动来找我们，但你已经拿到手了。。。然后还有一些。这是奖金。当你想找别的工作时，屏住你的呼吸和我商量一下吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallRepell_0002934D_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3MainAttack.Started to 5 setstage aaNVB3MainAttack 190 player.additem caps001 2000
aaNVB3MainAttackRandallWeGotTrouble
ESP.TRADUIT: aaNVB3主线袭击兰道尔我们有麻烦了

ESP.ORIGINAL: We got big trouble, amigo! Looks like Ingram and Saunders decided to come to us! Find cover and kill anything that comes our way!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们有大麻烦了，朋友！看来英格拉姆和桑德斯决定来找我们！给自己找个掩护吧，然后干掉我们遇到的任何人！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([04029334]aaNVB3MainAttack) Hell-Bent EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3MainAttac_00029359_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaNVB3MainAttackRandallNobodyPuss
ESP.TRADUIT: aaNVB3主线攻击兰道尔每人puss

ESP.ORIGINAL: Listen up! Everyone keep your cool - use cover, conserve ammo, and aim for center of mass. If you puss out, I'll fucking shoot you myself!
ESP.TRADUIT: 听着！每个人都保持冷静-躲在掩护后面，保存弹药，瞄准目标中心。如果你出去，我他妈的会亲自开枪打死你的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([04029334]aaNVB3MainAttack) Hell-Bent EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3MainAttac_0002935E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaFordRef.SayTo aaNVB3RandallREF aaNVB3MainAttackFordCheer
aaNVB3MainAttackFordCheer
ESP.TRADUIT: aaNVB3主线攻击福特欢呼

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, you fucking tell those motherfuckers, Randall! We'll kill anybody who runs!
ESP.TRADUIT: 是啊，你他妈的告诉那些混蛋，兰道尔！我们会杀了任何逃跑的人的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ford [0402856D] (mod) Quest : ([04029334]aaNVB3MainAttack) Hell-Bent EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaNVB3RandallREF.SayTo aaFordREF aaNVB3MainAttackFordCheer
Shut the fuck up, Ford.
ESP.TRADUIT: 闭嘴，福特。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([04029334]aaNVB3MainAttack) Hell-Bent EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3MainAttac_00029363_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaFordRef.SayTo aaNVB3RandallREF aaNVB3MainAttackFordCheer
aaHunterThorneIntro
ESP.TRADUIT: aa猎人索恩导入

ESP.ORIGINAL: Heard of you. Some kind of hotshot from the Mojave, right? Well, let me set things straight. I'm the fucking alpha dog here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我听说过你。你是莫哈维的一个辣手，对吧？好吧，让我把事情说清楚。我他妈的是这里的头儿（alpha dog）。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Thorne [04020845] (mod) Quest : ([04029364]aaHunterDialogue) Dialogue for Named Bounty Hunters EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaThorneVoiceType\aaHunterDi_aaHunterThorneI_0002936B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not that I'm worried. I hear you didn't do shit to help out Randall, left him to get zombified. Fucking shitbird move.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我并不担心。我听说你没帮兰道尔的忙，而是丢下他，让他变成一头僵尸。你他妈的狗娘养的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Thorne [04020845] (mod) Quest : ([04029364]aaHunterDialogue) Dialogue for Named Bounty Hunters EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaThorneVoiceType\aaHunterDi_aaHunterThorneI_0002936B_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You got anything to say, shitbird?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有什么要说的吗，混蛋？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Thorne [04020845] (mod) Quest : ([04029364]aaHunterDialogue) Dialogue for Named Bounty Hunters EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaThorneVoiceType\aaHunterDi_aaHunterThorneI_0002936B_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaHunterDialogue.ThorneGreeted to 2
Whatever, bub.
ESP.TRADUIT: 随便了，伙计。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, too cool to talk with ol' Thorne, huh? Ok, shitbird. I'll see you around.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，太酷了，不能和大索恩谈谈，是吧？好的，混蛋。回头见。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Thorne [04020845] (mod) Quest : ([04029364]aaHunterDialogue) Dialogue for Named Bounty Hunters EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaThorneVoiceType\aaHunterDi_aaHunterThorneI_00029379_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fuck with me and I'll eat your soul. I'm the goddamn lizard king.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你敢惹毛我，我就吃掉你的灵魂。我可是他妈的蜥蜴王。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was just, just kidding around, you know? Cutting up and getting to know you, eh? Sorry for any misunderstanding!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我只是在开玩笑，你知道吗？我开始了解你了，不是么？抱歉产生这些有误会！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Thorne [04020845] (mod) Quest : ([04029364]aaHunterDialogue) Dialogue for Named Bounty Hunters EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaThorneVoiceType\aaHunterDi_aaHunterThorneI_00029371_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaHunterDialogue.ThorneScared to 1
Fuck you and your attitude, cocksucker. I've killed more men than you can count.
ESP.TRADUIT: 去你妈的和你的态度，你个吸吊混蛋。我杀的人你数都数不过来。

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right, you got a little fire in your belly. Maybe you ain't a shitbird after all. I'll see you around.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，看来你肚子里有点火气。也许你终究不是个没有自知之明的混蛋。回头见。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Thorne [04020845] (mod) Quest : ([04029364]aaHunterDialogue) Dialogue for Named Bounty Hunters EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaThorneVoiceType\aaHunterDi_aaHunterThorneI_0002937A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaHunterDialogue.ThorneScared to 1
I don't want any trouble. I'm just here to do my job, same as you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不想惹任何麻烦。我来这只是为了我的工作罢了，就像你一样。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, aren't you a nice person! I imagine you have to be tactful when you're a shitbird fucking pussy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，难道你不是个好人吗！我想当你是个狗娘养的女人的时候，你必须变得圆滑。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Thorne [04020845] (mod) Quest : ([04029364]aaHunterDialogue) Dialogue for Named Bounty Hunters EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaThorneVoiceType\aaHunterDi_aaHunterThorneI_0002937B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Choke him> Say shitbird one more time and I'll end you.
ESP.TRADUIT: <掐住他>你再说一次像混蛋之类屁话，我就会终结你。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Coughs forcefully, catches breath}Fuck, ok! Goddamn psycho, I didn't mean anything by it! Christ!
ESP.TRADUIT: {用力咳嗽，喘着粗气}操，好吧！该死的疯子，我真的不是故意的！天哪！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Thorne [04020845] (mod) Quest : ([04029364]aaHunterDialogue) Dialogue for Named Bounty Hunters EmotionType : Puzzled Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaThorneVoiceType\aaHunterDi_aaHunterThorneI_00029372_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaHunterDialogue.ThorneScared to 1
aaHunterThorneShitbirdSpeech
ESP.TRADUIT: aa猎人索恩屁话对话

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ok, ok. I was just breaking balls, you know? You're the FNG and all, nothing more to it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，好吧。我只是在"捣蛋"，你知道吗？你可真是个菜鸟，没什么好说的了。（译者注：FNG为军队俚语，Fucking New Guy）
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Thorne [04020845] (mod) Quest : ([04029364]aaHunterDialogue) Dialogue for Named Bounty Hunters EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaThorneVoiceType\aaHunterDi_aaHunterThorneS_00029377_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaHunterDialogue.ThorneScared to 1
You mind taking it easy with the 'shitbird' routine? If you're such a professional, act like it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你介意放轻松点，不说"ShitBird"（混蛋，自视甚高）吗？如果你真是个专业人士，就要表现得像这样。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure thing, shitbird.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然了，混蛋。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Thorne [04020845] (mod) Quest : ([04029364]aaHunterDialogue) Dialogue for Named Bounty Hunters EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaThorneVoiceType\aaHunterDi_aaHunterThorneS_00029378_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I find the term 'shitbird' to be offensive, degrading, and just mean-spirited. Please stop.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我觉得“ShitBird”（混蛋，自视甚高）这个词是无礼的，有辱人格的，而且是刻薄的。请停下来。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaNVB3Main03Speech01
ESP.TRADUIT: aaNVB3主线03对话01

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right, I think this is everyone. Well, I ain't much for big speeches, but I'd like to say a quick word.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我想这就是所有人了。我真的不太喜欢做大演讲，但我想说一句简短的话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0402E668]aaNVB3Main03) And Hell Followed With Him EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Main03.Speech to 2 aaNVB3RandallREF.Say aaNVB3Main03Speech01
What we're about to do is the culmination of a search I began long, long ago. It's what got me in this occupation... trying to set things right.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们将要做的是我很久以前开始的一次搜索的高潮部分。这就是我从事这个职业的原因。。。请试着把事情摆正。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0402E668]aaNVB3Main03) And Hell Followed With Him EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Main03.Speech to 3 aaNVB3RandallREF.Say aaNVB3Main03Speech01
We can't bring back Marko's victims, but we can damn sure make them rest a little easier by putting him down once and for all.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们不能把马尔科杀害的受害者们带回来，但我们可以把他一劳永逸地解决掉，让那些人能够安息。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0402E668]aaNVB3Main03) And Hell Followed With Him EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Main03.Speech to 4 aaNVB3RandallREF.Say aaNVB3Main03Speech01
I also have a little bit of good news that should sweeten this expedition for everyone - Mr. Brookshire, would you come on up here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我还有一个小小的好消息可以让这次探险对每个人都有好处——布鲁克希尔先生，你能上来吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0402E668]aaNVB3Main03) And Hell Followed With Him EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Main03.Speech to 5 aaNVB3RandallREF.Say aaNVB3Main03Speech01 aaBrookshireREF.removescriptpackage aaBrookshireListenPackage aaBrookshireREF.addscriptpackage aaBrookshireSetUpDevicePackage aaBrookshireREF.evp
We've got a nice bonus lined up for everybody in this little posse. Go ahead, Brookshire, tell them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 每人都会分的很丰厚的赏金的。去吧，布鲁克希尔，告诉他们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0402E668]aaNVB3Main03) And Hell Followed With Him EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Main03.Speech to 6 aaBrookshireREF.Say aaNVB3Main03Speech01
You bet, Randall. Thanks for that warm introduction. I've got something of my own to share, actually.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，兰道尔。谢谢你热情的介绍。实际上，我也有自己的事情要分享。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brookshire [0402E666] (mod) Quest : ([0402E668]aaNVB3Main03) And Hell Followed With Him EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaBrookshireREF.playidle LooseNPCGiving set aaNVB3Main03.Speech to 7
aaNVB3Main03CompanionKilledBark
ESP.TRADUIT: aaNVB3主线03搭档被杀大叫

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Generic BH Voice}Hey, make sure you bury any of the others that were with them.
ESP.TRADUIT: {平凡的赏金猎人声音}嘿，确保你埋葬了和他们一起的所有其他人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mike from Maintenance [0402E6FB] (mod) Quest : ([0402E668]aaNVB3Main03) And Hell Followed With Him EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main03Com_0002F2DE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Generic BH Voice}Be sure to dispose of that one.
ESP.TRADUIT: {平凡的赏金猎人声音}一定要处理掉那个。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mike from Maintenance [0402E6FB] (mod) Quest : ([0402E668]aaNVB3Main03) And Hell Followed With Him EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main03Com_0002F2DF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Generic BH Voice}Marko said to kill any of the others that were with them.
ESP.TRADUIT: {平凡的赏金猎人声音}马尔科说过要杀死其他任何和他们在一起的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mike from Maintenance [0402E6FB] (mod) Quest : ([0402E668]aaNVB3Main03) And Hell Followed With Him EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main03Com_0002F2E0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaNVB3Main03CaptorBarks
ESP.TRADUIT: aaNVB3主线03捕捉大叫

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Struggling physically}Fucking heavy bitch! Are you gonna help me move this pile of shit or what? Why don't we just shoot the fucker?
ESP.TRADUIT: {挣扎身体}这该死的重婊子！你是要帮我搬走这堆屎还是怎么样？我们干吗不开枪打死这个混蛋？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mike from Maintenance [0402E6FB] (mod) Quest : ([0402E668]aaNVB3Main03) And Hell Followed With Him EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main03Cap_0002F2E5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Main03.CaptorBark to 2 aaCaptor03REF.SayTo Player aaNVB3Main03CaptorBarks
Brookshire said not to touch this one or Randall. It's part of the deal. Fuck up and we don't get paid.
ESP.TRADUIT: 布鲁克希尔说不要碰这个人或者兰道尔。这是交易的一部分。如果搞砸了，我们就得不到报酬了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mike from Maintenance [0402E6FB] (mod) Quest : ([0402E668]aaNVB3Main03) And Hell Followed With Him EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main03Cap_0002F2E6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Main03.CaptorBark to 3 aaCaptor02REF.SayTo Player aaNVB3Main03CaptorBarks
Why the fuck are we hauling them to town? When are we getting paid?
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么我们要把他们拖到镇上？我们什么时候才能领工资？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mike from Maintenance [0402E6FB] (mod) Quest : ([0402E668]aaNVB3Main03) And Hell Followed With Him EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main03Cap_0002F2E7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Main03.CaptorBark to 4 aaCaptorREF.SayTo Player aaNVB3Main03CaptorBarks
Relax, Brookshire said we'll get paid once the business in town is settled. Here's the Brahmin, let's load them up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别紧张，布鲁克希尔说一旦镇上的生意都搞定了我们就可以拿到工资。这是双头牛，让我们把他们装上到它背上去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mike from Maintenance [0402E6FB] (mod) Quest : ([0402E668]aaNVB3Main03) And Hell Followed With Him EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main03Cap_0002F2E8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Main03.CaptorBark to 5 aaCaptor02REF.SayTo Player aaNVB3Main03CaptorBarks
Careful, one of them is coming around. Keep that hood on... here, this should take care of them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 小心，他们中的一个快醒过来了。把风帽戴上。。。看这个，这应该会好好照顾他们的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mike from Maintenance [0402E6FB] (mod) Quest : ([0402E668]aaNVB3Main03) And Hell Followed With Him EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main03Cap_0002F2E9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Main03.CaptorBark to 6
aaNVB3Main03BrookshireCaptInProgress
Breathe deeply, Courier, and don't strain yourself. I need you alive. I have a trade to make.
ESP.TRADUIT: 深呼吸，邮差，请别紧张。我需要你活下去。因为我有活儿要你做。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brookshire [0402E666] (mod) Quest : ([0402E668]aaNVB3Main03) And Hell Followed With Him EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaNVB3GenericVoiceType\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main03Bro_0002FECC_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How'd you end up in Frosthill?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是怎么来到霜地的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I won't dance around the truth like some of these folks. I was a raider back in my youth, and a nasty one at that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不会像这些人那样绕着真相跳舞。我年轻的时候可是个匪徒，而且是个讨人厌的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brimley [04035DD6] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleOld01\aaFrosthil_aaBrimleyAboutY_0003CD89_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now I ain't exactly proud of that, but I ain't ashamed either. It was a sure way to survive, not to mention steady access to poontang.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在我并不为此感到骄傲，但我也不感到羞愧。这是一种可靠的生存方式，更不用说稳定地尝到女人的阴道了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brimley [04035DD6] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleOld01\aaFrosthil_aaBrimleyAboutY_0003CD89_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Notions of morality and even self-preservation tend to pale in comparison to such matters when you're a young man.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当你还是一个年轻人的时候，道德甚至自我保护的观念与这些事情相比都显得苍白无力。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brimley [04035DD6] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleOld01\aaFrosthil_aaBrimleyAboutY_0003CD89_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Enough years go by and you start to slow down, though. Take a few bullets and you're slower still.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是，足够多年过去了，你就会开始放慢脚步。当你多吃几颗子弹，你就更慢了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brimley [04035DD6] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Puzzled Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleOld01\aaFrosthil_aaBrimleyAboutY_0003CD89_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Unless you're chief, getting old and raidin' don't mix. After I damn near got my nuts cut off over a bottle of whiskey, I called it quits.
ESP.TRADUIT: 除非你是个头儿，否则变老和劫掠不能混为一谈。我差点因为一瓶威士忌把我的蛋蛋切掉，所以我就不干了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brimley [04035DD6] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleOld01\aaFrosthil_aaBrimleyAboutY_0003CD89_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Been here for almost thirty years now. I remember when Pop Jamison ran this shop, sold some mean meat pies.
ESP.TRADUIT: 到现在已经快三十年了。我还记得当波普 贾米森经营这家店时，卖过一些低劣的肉饼。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brimley [04035DD6] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleOld01\aaFrosthil_aaBrimleyAboutY_0003CD89_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Town had been in place for at least a few decades when I came up here. Rumor was that cannibals started it, but I never saw anything like that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当我来到这里的时候，这个小镇已经存在了至少几十年了。有传言说是食人族开始住在这里的，但我从没见过这样的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brimley [04035DD6] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleOld01\aaFrosthil_aaBrimleyAboutY_0003CD89_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaFrosthillDialogue.BrimleyStory to aaFrosthillDialogue.BrimleyStory + 1
Little bit of trading with caravans, but it's mostly Bighorners. They do better up in this climate, tend to have tastier meat for some reason.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在商队有过点交易，但大多是大角羊。在这种气候下，它们会做得更好，因为某些原因，它们的肉往往更加美味。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brimley [04035DD6] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's

ESP.ORIGINAL: The weather can be tough on folks at first, seeing as to how it's a big shock. You get used to it, though. Hell, I've come to prefer it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一开始天气对人们来说可能很难受，但看看它是如何让人大吃一惊的。不过，看来你已经习惯了。见鬼，我好不容易才喜欢上它的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brimley [04035DD6] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's too cold for Deathclaws and any badass bugs like Cazadors. I say fuck those things to whatever hell they came from!
ESP.TRADUIT: 这里太冷了，不适合死爪和像大毒蜂这样的坏东西。虽然我可不管这些东西是从哪里来的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brimley [04035DD6] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's

ESP.ORIGINAL: My bones might ache a little more and the mornings are uncomfortable, but at least I won't get stung to death by those fucking devil wasps!
ESP.TRADUIT: 虽然我的骨头可能会痛一点，早上也过的不舒服，但至少我不会被那些该死的魔鬼黄蜂蜇死！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brimley [04035DD6] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaFrosthillDialogue.BrimleyStory to aaFrosthillDialogue.BrimleyStory + 1
What do people do for a living here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 人们在这里以什么为生？

ESP.ORIGINAL: When you're young and wild it's a damn enjoyable lifestyle. Drink, fuck, party all the time. You might die going after a caravan, but fuck it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当你年轻狂野的时候，这是一种非常享受的生活方式。喝酒，妈的，人们总是开派对。你可能会死在一辆大篷车后面，但去他妈的，谁在乎。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brimley [04035DD6] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's

ESP.ORIGINAL: I ain't proud of everything I done, but it was all we knew. Most were orphans or rejects who had enough balls to fight for a meal.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我并不为我所做过的一切感到骄傲，但这是我们所知道的。这里大多数是孤儿或被拒绝的人，他们有足够的胆量去争取一顿饭。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brimley [04035DD6] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's

ESP.ORIGINAL: Today you got crazies like the fucking 80's, the White Legs, and the Claws, all bloodthirsty lunatics killing everyone they see. Ridiculous!
ESP.TRADUIT: 今天你能看到像他妈的80年代帮的疯子，他们有白色的腿，和爪子，那些嗜血的疯子会杀死他们看到的每个人。这太荒谬了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brimley [04035DD6] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaFrosthillDialogue.BrimleyStory to aaFrosthillDialogue.BrimleyStory + 1
What was it like being a raider?
ESP.TRADUIT: 当一个匪徒是什么感觉？

ESP.ORIGINAL: He came in from the east, which is more than a little unusual. Only had a few scouts with him, but I could tell he meant business.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他是从东方来的，这有点不寻常。虽然他只带了几个侦察兵，但我能看出他是认真的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brimley [04035DD6] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's

ESP.ORIGINAL: Marko didn't cause no fuss, though. Just got himself a shack near the old graveyard and minded his own business.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过，马尔科并没有引起任何骚动。他就在老坟场附近给自己找了间小屋，只管好他自己的事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brimley [04035DD6] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's

ESP.ORIGINAL: He'd come into town and buy supplies every week, always paid up front and was polite to everyone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他每周都进城买生活用品，总是预先付钱，对每个人都彬彬有礼。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brimley [04035DD6] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's

ESP.ORIGINAL: After a while we just figured he had just started over like the rest of us. We all heard stories of things he'd done, but who knows what's true?
ESP.TRADUIT: 过了一段时间后，我们才发现他和我们其他人一样刚刚开始。我们都听说过他做过的事，但谁知道什么是真的呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brimley [04035DD6] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's

ESP.ORIGINAL: When word came about all that business down in the Mojave, with you killing Sergio and all, Marko changed. He was... restless.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当你杀了塞尔吉奥和其他人之后，莫哈维发生的事情传开了，马尔科就变了。他是...那样的不安。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brimley [04035DD6] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's

ESP.ORIGINAL: More of his old buddies started showing up and camping in the hills. Only reason they didn't cause trouble is because they feared Marko.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他更多的老朋友开始出现在山上露营。他们不惹麻烦的唯一原因是他们害怕马尔科。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brimley [04035DD6] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleOld01\aaFrosthil_aaBrimleyAboutY_0003F668_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not long after that, Randall rolled in with a passel of bounty hunters and some NCR suit funding them. Canyon has become a fucking war zone since.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不久之后，兰道尔带着一群赏金猎人和一些资助了他们的NCR诉讼来到了这里。从那以后，峡谷就成了他妈的战区。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brimley [04035DD6] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleOld01\aaFrosthil_aaBrimleyAboutY_0003F668_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaFrosthillDialogue.BrimleyStory to aaFrosthillDialogue.BrimleyStory + 1
How did Marko wind up in Frosthill?
ESP.TRADUIT: 马尔科怎么会在霜地？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ain't gonna happen, no way in hell. Most of us still have bounties, and even if we get amnesty, NCR would still use it to void our property rights.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这不会发生的，绝对不会。我们大多数人仍然有悬赏金，即使我们得到特赦，NCR仍然会用它来剥夺我们的财产权。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brimley [04035DD6] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's

ESP.ORIGINAL: NCR wants one thing: silver. I heard they've had money problems since somebody ruined their gold, so they're after the next best thing.
ESP.TRADUIT: NCR只想要一件事：银矿。我听说自从有人毁了他们的黄金矿后他们就有了财政上的问题，所以他们在追求下一个最好的替代品。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brimley [04035DD6] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's

ESP.ORIGINAL: To the NCR we're just an impediment, nothing more. They'll fuck us with a bear dick while they rob us blind, won't even think twice about it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对NCR来说，我们只是一个障碍罢了，没有更多的价值。他们会在我们瞎打劫的时候用他们的熊鸡巴操我们，甚至不会三思而后行。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brimley [04035DD6] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaFrosthillDialogue.BrimleyStory to aaFrosthillDialogue.BrimleyStory + 1
What do you think of the NCR annexing Frosthill?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你觉得NCR吞并霜地这件事怎么样？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Scared, partner. Real scared. Marko ain't some trifling hobo to be stomped like a bug. He's a conniving bastard who'll find a way to get you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 害怕，搭档。真的很害怕。马尔科可不是个像虫子一样被踩死的小流浪汉。他是个阴险狡猾的混蛋，会想方设法抓住你的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brimley [04035DD6] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's

ESP.ORIGINAL: Difference between you and Marko is that he'd kill everyone in this canyon if it meant he'd come out on top. I'll be prayin' for ya.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你和马尔科的区别在于，他会杀死峡谷里的每一个人,如果这意味着他能爬上权力的顶峰的话。我会为你祈祷的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brimley [04035DD6] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaFrosthillDialogue.BrimleyStory to aaFrosthillDialogue.BrimleyStory + 1
Things are about to come to a head with Marko. How are the townspeople?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所有事很快就要和马尔科撞在一起了。城里的人怎么样了？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd like a room, please.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想要一个房间，可以吗。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd like to have your business, but they're all taken.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是想和你做生意，但房间都被抢走了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brimley [04035DD6] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleOld01\aaFrosthil_aaBrimleyGetRoo_0003CD6F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But you know... you look like a sturdy sort. If you don't mind getting your hands dirty, I'll give you the best room in the joint.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但你知道。。。你看起来很强壮。如果你不介意弄脏你的手，我会给你最好的房间。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brimley [04035DD6] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleOld01\aaFrosthil_aaBrimleyGetRoo_0003CD6F_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Is there anything I can do to help out?
ESP.TRADUIT: 有什么我能帮忙的吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hell yes! You could solve my rat problem. They done taken over the entire goddamn floor, and there's one monster rat that's running the show.
ESP.TRADUIT: 见鬼，是的！你可以解决那些老鼠的问题。它们已经占领了整个该死的楼层，甚至还有一只怪物老鼠在主持节目。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brimley [04035DD6] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleOld01\aaFrosthil_aaBrimleyHowHel_0003CD76_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He's a big, greasy fucker with gnarled teeth and evil eyes, like some hell-spawned vermin of the night!
ESP.TRADUIT: 他是一个又大又油腻的混蛋，有着多瘤的牙齿和邪恶的眼睛，就像一个地狱般的夜间害虫！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brimley [04035DD6] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleOld01\aaFrosthil_aaBrimleyHowHel_0003CD76_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: A few months back I went up there to clean the rats out with a shovel... you know... bashing their brains out. It's kinda fun sometimes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 几个月前我去过那里想用铲子把老鼠清理干净。。。你知道的。。。把他们的脑袋打出来。不得不说这有时候还挺好玩的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brimley [04035DD6] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleOld01\aaFrosthil_aaBrimleyHowHel_0003CD76_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anyway, I'm smashin' and bashin' and out of nowhere this mutant bastard comes charging. If I hadn't had that shovel, he'd a bit my leg off!
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管怎么说，我是在捣乱，但不知从哪里，这个变种杂种突然就冲了进来。如果我没有那把铲子，他会把我的腿咬下来的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brimley [04035DD6] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleOld01\aaFrosthil_aaBrimleyHowHel_0003CD76_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He was big as a goddamn attack dog! I gave him a good whack on the noggin' and he just glared, then flashed them shitty fangs.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他真他妈的像只进攻犬！我狠狠地敲着他的头揍了他一顿，他便狠狠地瞪了我一眼，然后那群老鼠就露出了亮闪闪的尖牙。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brimley [04035DD6] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleOld01\aaFrosthil_aaBrimleyHowHel_0003CD76_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I took it upon myself to make a tactical retreat, sealed up that whole floor. I'm ashamed to say that the rat king has licked me for the time being.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我自作主张进行战术撤退，把整层楼都封起来了。我很惭愧地说鼠王暂时把我掠夺了一番。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brimley [04035DD6] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleOld01\aaFrosthil_aaBrimleyHowHel_0003CD76_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you can slay that critter I'll give you the whole upstairs for as long as you're here. I'll clean the place up, of course. What do you say?
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你能杀死那些小畜生，我就把你整个楼上都给你，只要你愿意呆在这里。当然，我会把这地方打扫干净。你怎么看？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brimley [04035DD6] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleOld01\aaFrosthil_aaBrimleyHowHel_0003CD76_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That is great news. You just stay put, I'll have that place cleaned up in no time!
ESP.TRADUIT: 这可是个好消息。你别动，我马上就把那地方打扫干净！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brimley [04035DD6] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's

ESP.ORIGINAL: imod FadeToBlackAndBackISFX set aaFrosthillDialogue.BrimleyHelped to 2 aaFHHotelRatsParentREF.disable aaFHHotelRatsParentREF.markfordelete aaFHHotelCleanParentREF.enable showmessage aaHotelMessage set aaFrosthillDialogue.TownTrust to aaFrosthillDialogue + 1 aaHumongousRatREF.disable aaHumongousRatREF.markfordelete aaRatangoREF.disable aaRatangoREF.markfordelete
I took care of the rat.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我已经料理好了那些老鼠了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: As a matter of fact, Felina over at Robbins Ranch could use some help. She was recently widowed and left to raise a young one all alone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 事实上，罗宾斯农场的费琳娜需要一些帮助。她最近寡居，独自抚养一个年轻人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brimley [04035DD6] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just tread lightly at first, ok? She's pretty jumpy after what happened to her husband. She's a good woman, just... scared.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一开始就脚步放轻点，好吗？她丈夫出事后，她很紧张。费琳娜是个好女人，只是。。。太容易害怕了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brimley [04035DD6] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you know of anyone else that could use a hand?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道还有谁需要帮忙吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you think about the bounty hunters?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你觉得赏金猎人怎么样？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Most of them are ruthless bastards, cutthroats out for a quick handful of caps. Not much better than raiders, really. They just act legitimate.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们中的大多数都是无情的混蛋，为了一把瓶盖就当杀人犯。不比匪徒们强多少，真的。他们只是行为合法罢了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brimley [04035DD6] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleOld01\aaFrosthil_aaBrimleyBHers_0003F65A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How'd you get caught up in that business, anyhow? You don't seem like a bad man, but then again, maybe I'm not a good judge of character anymore.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管怎样，你是怎么卷入那件事的？你看起来不像个坏人，但话说回来，也许我不再是个能看出人品行端不端正的人了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brimley [04035DD6] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleOld01\aaFrosthil_aaBrimleyBHers_0003F65A_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Most of them are ruthless bastards, cutthroats out for a quick handful of caps. Not much better than raiders, really. They just act legitimate.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们中的大多数都是无情的混蛋，为了一把瓶盖就当杀人犯。不比匪徒们强多少，真的。他们只是行为合法罢了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brimley [04035DD6] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleOld01\aaFrosthil_aaBrimleyBHers_0003F65B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How'd you get caught up in that business, anyhow? You don't seem like a bad gal, but then again, maybe I'm not a good judge of character anymore.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管怎样，你是怎么卷入那件事的？你看起来不像个坏女孩，但话说回来，也许我不再是个能看出人品行端不端正的人了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brimley [04035DD6] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleOld01\aaFrosthil_aaBrimleyBHers_0003F65B_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What can you tell me about Marko?
ESP.TRADUIT: 关于马尔科你能告诉我什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: NULL: INTEGRATED INTO OTHER TOPIC. I AM A FUCKING ROBOT!
ESP.TRADUIT: 无效：汇入到其他主题中。我是个该死的机器人！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brimley [04035DD6] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: What did you have in mind?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有什么想法？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I got rats living upstairs. They done taken over the entire goddamn floor, and there's one monster rat that's running the show.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有老鼠住在楼上。他们已经占领了整个该死的楼层，还有一只怪物老鼠在主持节目。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brimley [04035DD6] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleOld01\aaFrosthil_aaBrimleyWhatIn_0003CD78_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He's a big, greasy fucker with gnarled teeth and evil eyes, like some hell-spawned vermin of the night!
ESP.TRADUIT: 他是一个又大又油腻的混蛋，有着多瘤的牙齿和邪恶的眼睛，就像一个地狱般的夜晚的害虫！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brimley [04035DD6] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleOld01\aaFrosthil_aaBrimleyWhatIn_0003CD78_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: A few months back I went up there to clean the rats out with a shovel... you know, bashing their brains out. It's kinda fun sometimes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 几个月前我去过那里用铲子把老鼠清理干净。。。你知道，就是把他们的脑袋打出来。这有时候还挺好玩的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brimley [04035DD6] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleOld01\aaFrosthil_aaBrimleyWhatIn_0003CD78_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anyway, I'm smashin' and bashin' and out of nowhere this mutant bastard comes charging. If I hadn't had that shovel, he'd have bit my leg off!
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管怎么说，我是在捣乱，但不知从哪里，这个变种杂种突然就冲了进来。如果我没有那把铲子，他会把我的腿咬下来的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brimley [04035DD6] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleOld01\aaFrosthil_aaBrimleyWhatIn_0003CD78_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He was big as a goddamn attack dog! I gave him a good whack on the noggin and he just glared, and flashed them shitty fangs!
ESP.TRADUIT: 他真他妈的像只进攻犬！我狠狠地敲着他的头揍了他一顿，他便狠狠地瞪了我一眼，然后那群老鼠就露出了亮闪闪的尖牙。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brimley [04035DD6] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleOld01\aaFrosthil_aaBrimleyWhatIn_0003CD78_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I took it upon myself to make a tactical retreat, sealed up that whole floor. I'm ashamed to say that the rat king has licked me for the time being.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我自作主张进行战术撤退，把整层楼都封起来了。我很惭愧地说鼠王暂时把我掠夺了一番。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brimley [04035DD6] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleOld01\aaFrosthil_aaBrimleyWhatIn_0003CD78_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you can slay that critter I'll give you the whole upstairs for as long as you're here. I'll clean the place up, of course. What do you say?
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你能杀死那些小畜生，我就把你整个楼上都给你，只要你愿意呆在这里。当然，我会把这地方打扫干净。你怎么看？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brimley [04035DD6] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleOld01\aaFrosthil_aaBrimleyWhatIn_0003CD78_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You can just stop right there. I'm not interested.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你可以就此停止了。因为我并不感兴趣。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Pardon me, I meant no offense. I suppose you'll just have to wait until another room opens up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对不起，我无意冒犯你。但我想你得等到另一个房间的客人离开才行了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brimley [04035DD6] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleOld01\aaFrosthil_aaBrimleyWhatNo_0003CD77_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nevermind.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没关系。

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right, then.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，那。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brimley [04035DD6] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleOld01\aaFrosthil_aaBrimleyNeverm_0003CD75_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nevermind.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没关系。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ok.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felina Robbins [04017DBB] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fine, I'll clean out the rats.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我去把老鼠清理干净。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank you! Here's the key. Just be careful, now - that big bastard is no joke!
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢你！这是钥匙。小心点，那个大混蛋可不是开玩笑的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brimley [04035DD6] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleOld01\aaFrosthil_aaBrimleyRatAff_0003CD7C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaFrosthillDialogue.BrimleyHelped to 1 player.additem aaHotelKey 1
Thanks, but no thanks.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢，我不需要。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, that's damn unfortunate. Is there anything else I can help you with?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，真不幸。还有什么我可以帮你的吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brimley [04035DD6] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleOld01\aaFrosthil_aaBrimleyRatNeg_0003CD7F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaBrimleyRatBarter
ESP.TRADUIT: aa布里姆利老鼠交易

ESP.ORIGINAL: I could have just hired Big Tim for this kind of dough. Just make sure it gets done.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我本可以雇大提姆做这种生意的。请你一定要成功。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brimley [04035DD6] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleOld01\aaFrosthil_aaBrimleyRatBar_0003CD80_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaFrosthillDialogue.BrimleyHelped to 1 player.additem aaHotelKey 1 player.additem caps001 150
A room sounds nice, but I need a little more incentive to chase down vermin.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一个房间听起来不错，但我需要更多的动力来追捕害虫。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaBrimleyMarkoSpeech
ESP.TRADUIT: aa布里姆利马克交谈

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ok, I see your point. I'll tell you what I know.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我明白你的意思了。我会告诉你我知道的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brimley [04035DD6] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Marko's days here are numbered. There are too many bounty hunters out for him now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 马尔科能留在这里的日子已经屈指可数了。现在追捕他的赏金猎人对他来说可太多了点。

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, I think I'll be content just to mind my own business, thank you very much.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，我想只要管好自己的事我就满足了，非常感谢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brimley [04035DD6] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Marko won't hurt you as long as I'm in Frosthill, I can promise you that much.
ESP.TRADUIT: 马尔科不会伤害你的，只要我还在霜地，这我可以向你保证。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tell me about Marko, or I'll construct a no vacancy sign with your living organs.
ESP.TRADUIT: 告诉我马尔科的事，不然我就用你的活器官做一个没有空房的标志。

ESP.ORIGINAL: C'mon, I helped you with the rats, didn't I? You can trust me to keep my mouth shut.
ESP.TRADUIT: 来吧，我帮你对付了那些老鼠，不是吗？你可以相信来让我闭嘴的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, that's true, that is true.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，那是真的，你说得对。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brimley [04035DD6] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaFelinaIntro01
ESP.TRADUIT: aa费琳娜导入1

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't you fucking move, bitch! One more step and I'll plant buckshot in your face. Are you here for a bounty? Is that it? What the fuck do you want?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你他妈的别动，婊子！再往前走一步，我就把子弹打在你脸上。你是来找赏金的吗？是这样吗？你他妈的想要什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felina Robbins [04017DBB] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaFrosthillDialogue.FelinaGreeted to 2 aaFelinaREF.addscriptpackage aaGenericSBDayPackage aaFelinaREF.addscriptpackage aaGenericSBEveningPackage aaFelinaREF.addscriptpackage aaGenericSleepNightPackage
aaFelinaIntro01Speech
ESP.TRADUIT: aa费琳娜导入01对话

ESP.ORIGINAL: Easy, I'm here to help. I already gave Brimley a hand at the hotel.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别紧张，我是来帮忙的。我已经在旅馆帮了布里姆利一把了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That was you? I heard somebody cleaned out the rats, but I didn't expect it to be some bounty killer.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那是你做的？我听说有人把老鼠清理干净了，但我没想到会是个赏金杀手。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felina Robbins [04017DBB] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: You really want to help? Ok, killer. There's a company man named Lawson over at the hotel who keeps hounding me about buying the ranch.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你真的想帮忙吗？好吧，杀手。旅馆里有一个叫罗森的公司职员一直缠着我要买下牧场。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felina Robbins [04017DBB] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not selling my land. It's all I have left. You damn bounty killers already took my husband, now the silver hounds want my livelihood.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不想卖出我的土地。因为我只剩下这些了。你们这些该死的赏金杀手已经夺去了我的丈夫，而现在银猎犬还想要我的生计。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felina Robbins [04017DBB] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: You say you want to be a do-gooder, there's your chance. So, you gonna tell me how it's not your problem now? Or do you expect caps?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你说你想做个好人，那这就是你的机会。所以，你现在要告诉我这对你来说小菜一碟？或者你希望有额外的瓶盖奖励？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felina Robbins [04017DBB] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: I just wanted to see if you needed help around here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我只是想看看你在这附近是否需要帮助。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Did Brimley put you up to this? Damn people need to mind their own business. I'm not some helpless little woman out here, you know?
ESP.TRADUIT: 是布里姆利让你这么做的吗？那个该死的人需要管好自己的事。我可不是一个无助的小女人，你知道吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felina Robbins [04017DBB] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: You really want to help? Ok, killer. There's a company man named Lawson over at the hotel who keeps hounding me about buying the ranch.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你真的想帮忙吗？好吧，杀手。旅馆里有一个叫罗森的公司职员一直缠着我要买下牧场。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felina Robbins [04017DBB] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not selling my land. It's all I have left. You damn bounty killers already took my husband, now the silver hounds want my livelihood.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不想卖出我的土地。因为我只剩下这些了。你们这些该死的赏金杀手已经夺去了我的丈夫，而现在银猎犬还想要我的生计。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felina Robbins [04017DBB] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: You say you want to be a do-gooder, there's your chance. So, you gonna tell me how it's not your problem now? Or do you expect caps?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你说你想做个好人，那这就是你的机会。所以，你现在要告诉我这对你来说小菜一碟？或者你希望有额外的瓶盖奖励？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felina Robbins [04017DBB] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaFrosthillDialogue.FelinaHelped to 1
I was just passing through, nothing more to it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我只是路过，没别的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Really? Nobody passes through Frosthill, much less my ranch. You fuck up in here, and I'll make sure nobody finds your body.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真的？没人会经过霜地的，更别提我的牧场了。如果你在这里搞砸了，我保证没人能找到你的尸体。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felina Robbins [04017DBB] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Point that boomstick somewhere else or I'll collect your head, bounty or no.
ESP.TRADUIT: 把那根爆炸棍指向别的地方去，不然我就收下你的头，不论是赏金还是其他的什么。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just like I figured, another cocksucking bounty killer. Do you mind getting out of my home?
ESP.TRADUIT: 就像我想的，又一个吸鸡巴的冷血赏金杀手。你介意离开我家吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felina Robbins [04017DBB] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaFrosthillDialogue.FelinaRelation to aaFrosthillDialogue.FelinaRelation -1
You seem to have a troubled existence. Let me simplify things for you. <Attack>
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的生活似乎有问题。让我为你简化一下。<攻击>

ESP.ORIGINAL: Jesucristo!
ESP.TRADUIT: 耶稣基督！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felina Robbins [04017DBB] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaFelinaREF.startcombat player
I'll speak to Lawson for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 为了你，我和罗森交流过了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure you will. Have a nice day, do-gooder.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你当然会的。祝你今天愉快，好家伙。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felina Robbins [04017DBB] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaFrosthillDialogue.FelinaHelped to 1
You're a regular mind reader, because this isn't my problem.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能经常看透别人的心思吗，因为这不是我的问题。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Pendejo.
ESP.TRADUIT: 傻逼！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felina Robbins [04017DBB] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaFrosthillDialogue.FelinaRelation to aaFrosthillDialogue.FelinaRelation -1
aaFelinaLawsonTurnIn
ESP.TRADUIT: aa费琳娜罗森回应

ESP.ORIGINAL: No bullshit? Well... thank you. I, I'm sorry for doubting you, but it's just that we haven't had much reason to trust outsiders lately.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你没胡说吧？好。。。谢谢您。我、 我很抱歉怀疑你，因为我们最近没有太多理由相信外人了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felina Robbins [04017DBB] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't have any caps to spare, but would you settle for a steak? I wish I could offer more, but meat is the only thing I have left in abundance.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我没有多余的瓶盖了，但你愿意吃牛排吗？虽然我希望我能提供更多的回报给你，但这些肉是我仅存的富余的东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felina Robbins [04017DBB] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaFrosthillDialogue.FelinaRelation to aaFrosthillDialogue.FelinaRelation +2 set aaFrosthillDialogue.FelinaHelped to 2
Lawson won't be bothering you any more.
ESP.TRADUIT: 罗森不会再打扰你了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Damn, I didn't mean for you to kill the man! Por dios, now they'll probably put another bounty on my head. Well, at least he's out of the picture.
ESP.TRADUIT: 该死，我不是真的想让你杀了那个人！我的神啊（Pro Dios)，现在他们会再给我定上一笔赏金。好吧，至少他已经出局了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felina Robbins [04017DBB] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't have any caps to spare, but would you settle for a steak? I wish I could offer more, but meat is the only thing I have left in abundance.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我没有多余的瓶盖了，但你愿意吃牛排吗？虽然我希望我能提供更多的回报给你，但这些肉是我仅存的富余的东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felina Robbins [04017DBB] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaFrosthillDialogue.FelinaRelation to aaFrosthillDialogue.FelinaRelation +2 set aaFrosthillDialogue.FelinaHelped to 2
I took care of Lawson - permanently.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我料理好罗森了——永久的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Is there anything else I can do to help out?
ESP.TRADUIT: 还有什么我能帮忙的吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: You really want to help? Ok, killer. There's a company man named Lawson over at the hotel who keeps hounding me about buying the ranch.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你真的想帮忙吗？好吧，杀手。旅馆里有一个叫罗森的公司职员一直缠着我要买下牧场。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felina Robbins [04017DBB] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not selling my land. It's all I have left. You damn bounty killers already took my husband, now the silver hounds want my livelihood.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不想卖出我的土地。因为我只剩下这些了。你们这些该死的赏金杀手已经夺去了我的丈夫，而现在银猎犬还想要我的生计。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felina Robbins [04017DBB] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: You say you want to be a do-gooder, there's your chance. So, you gonna tell me how it's not your problem now? Or do you expect caps?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你说你想做个好人，那这就是你的机会。所以，你现在要告诉我这对你来说小菜一碟？或者你希望有额外的瓶盖奖励？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felina Robbins [04017DBB] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you need any help around here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你需要帮忙吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, everything in the bathroom is either broken or back up right now. It's no fun having to use an outhouse in the freezing cold.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，浴室里的东西不是坏了就是堵得不行。在这种寒冷的天气里进行户外活动可是没有什么乐趣的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felina Robbins [04017DBB] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you're handy, I suppose you could try to fix it yourself. If you can't do it, I guess you could hire Big Time to make repairs.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你方便的话，我想你可以自己解决。但如果你做不到的话，我想你可以雇大蒂姆来修理。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felina Robbins [04017DBB] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can't offer you caps right now, but at the very least I'll throw in some food. Thank you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我现在不能给你瓶盖，但至少我会给你一些食物。谢谢您。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felina Robbins [04017DBB] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaFrosthillDialogue.FelinaHelped to 3
Thank you so much. Please take some food in exchange for your help.
ESP.TRADUIT: 非常感谢。请吃点东西以换取你的帮助。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felina Robbins [04017DBB] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaFrosthillDialogue.FelinaHelped to 4 set aaFrosthillDialogue.FelinaRelation to aaFrosthillDialogue.FelinaRelation +2
The sink and the toilet are working now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 水槽和马桶现在都已经能用了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I suppose I can trust with this now. After that bounty killer shot my husband, he mutilated him and then took his personal effects.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想我现在可以相信你了。在那个赏金杀手射杀我丈夫之后，他还肢解了他，然后拿走了他的所有个人物品。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felina Robbins [04017DBB] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: One of the things he stole was Mike's journal. I can't understand why anyone would pilfer someone's diary, it has no monetary value.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他偷的东西之一是迈克的日记。我不明白为什么有人会去偷别人的日记，因为它没有任何金钱价值。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felina Robbins [04017DBB] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: I begged him not to take it, but he just told me to shut up and mind my own business. That journal is all I have left of Mike.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我哀求过他不要去拿这个，但他只是叫我闭嘴，管好自己的事。关于迈克我只剩下那本被拿走的日记了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felina Robbins [04017DBB] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: The killer who took it is a big fellow, pale skin. I think his name is Bobby, based on what another guy called him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 杀人凶手是个大个子，脸色苍白。我想他的名字叫鲍比，根据另一个人对他的称呼。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felina Robbins [04017DBB] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I imagine he's at the compound with the rest of the killers. If you can recover that diary, I'd be eternally grateful. Thank you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想他和其他凶手一起在院子里。如果你能找回那本日记，我将永远感激你。谢谢您。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felina Robbins [04017DBB] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaFrosthillDialogue.FelinaHelped to 5 aaBobbyHarrisonREF.enable
You mentioned that you might have another job. What is it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你提到你可能有另一个活要我做。这是怎么一回事？

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is it! You actually got it. Thank you so much. You've done so much for us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就这样！你真的明白了。非常感谢你为我们做了这么多。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felina Robbins [04017DBB] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: This time I insist that you accept some food for your efforts - no arguing. You're always welcome in my home.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这次我坚持要你接受一些食物来做回报你的努力-请不要争论了。你在我家永远会受欢迎的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felina Robbins [04017DBB] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaFrosthillDialogue.FelinaHelped to 7 player.removeitem aaRobbinsJournal 1 player.additem FoodGeneric100 1 rewardkarma 25 aaBobbyHarrisonREF.disable aaBobbyHarrisonREF.markfordelete set aaFrosthillDialogue.FelinaRelation to aaFrosthillDialogue.FelinaRelation +2
I managed to retrieve Mike's journal.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我设法找回了迈克的日记。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's your story?
ESP.TRADUIT: 说说你的故事好吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you in the habit of asking strangers about their business? I don't know you, you don't know me. We'll leave it at that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你习惯问陌生人他们的隐私吗？我又不认识你，你也不认识我。我们之间就到此为止。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felina Robbins [04017DBB] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ok, ok. I came here a few years ago, on the run for an armed robbery near Reno. I almost died getting here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，好吧。我几年前来到了这里，逃亡是因为我在里诺附近被持械抢劫。我差点就死在这里了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felina Robbins [04017DBB] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: I had been through my share of winters, but I wasn't ready for the cold up here. It took a while to get acclimated.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我已经度过了可以接受的冬天，但我还没准备好迎接这里的寒冷。这可需要一段时间才能适应。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felina Robbins [04017DBB] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Mike already had the ranch when I got in town, so I started working as a hand, cleaning up the house. Didn't take long for us to hit it off.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我进城的时候迈克已经有了这件农场，所以我开始帮忙打扫房子。没过多久我们就在一起了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felina Robbins [04017DBB] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: Life is a fragile thing, too short to hang onto "What if's", so I didn't hesitate when he proposed. I was... happy... truly happy for the first time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 生活是一件脆弱的事情，太短了，不能坚持"如果那样会怎么样"，所以当他求婚时我便毫不犹豫的。因为我是。。。快乐。。。那是我第一次感到真正的快乐。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felina Robbins [04017DBB] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Holding back tears, breathing to regain compsure}But there's no use dwelling on it. He's gone now, and that's that. So, what brought you to Frosthill?
ESP.TRADUIT: {忍住眼泪，不断呼吸以恢复镇静}但沉湎于此是毫无用处的。他现在已经走了，就这样。那么，是什么把你带到霜地的？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felina Robbins [04017DBB] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaFrosthillDialogue.FelinaStory to 1
Any chance you'll tell me about yourself now?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你现在有机会告诉我关于你自己的事情吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Trying to maintain composure}Before he moved to Frosthill, Michael had been muscle for a crime family in New Reno.
ESP.TRADUIT: {试图保持冷静}在搬到霜地之前，迈克尔一直是新里诺一个犯罪家族的主力。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felina Robbins [04017DBB] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's

ESP.ORIGINAL: He never talked about it much, only said that it was all he knew as a young man, and he never took pleasure in it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他从不多谈这件事，只说这是他年轻时所做过，知道的一切，而他从不以此为乐。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felina Robbins [04017DBB] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's

ESP.ORIGINAL: After he stole from an elected official, Mike earned a bounty, so he came here and started over. He hoped the NCR would forget. They didn't.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在他从一个民选官员那里偷东西之后，迈克就有了一笔赏金悬赏他，所以他才来到这里重新开始。他希望NCR会忘记他。但他们没有。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felina Robbins [04017DBB] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's

ESP.ORIGINAL: A bounty killer shot him in the back of the head one afternoon when he was tending the Bighorners. No warning, nothing. Just walked up and shot him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一天下午，一个赏金杀手在他照顾大角羊的时候朝他的后脑开枪了。没有任何警告，什么都没有。只是走上前朝他开枪。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felina Robbins [04017DBB] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's

ESP.ORIGINAL: I couldn't even think, could barely stay on my feet when I found Mike... he was face-down, the snow all around him turned red, steaming.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当我发现迈克的时候，我甚至无法思考，几乎无法站立。。。他脸朝下，四周的雪变得通红，还冒着热气。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felina Robbins [04017DBB] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: The killer was casually cutting off his finger and looting his corpse, didn't care that I was there. I screamed and he told me to shut up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 凶手毫不在意地割下了他的手指，抢走了他的尸体，他甚至根本不在乎我站在那里。我尖叫着，他叫我闭上嘴。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felina Robbins [04017DBB] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: He told me Mike had a bounty of 1,000 caps on his head, and that was that. My life was ruined for 1,000 goddamn caps.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他告诉我迈克头上有1000瓶盖的赏金，就这样。我的生活因为那该死的1000瓶盖而毁了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felina Robbins [04017DBB] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: How can you do it? Slaughtering people like they're cattle for some caps? Do you even feel anything when you pull the trigger?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你们怎么能做到这样？像杀一头牛一样杀人灭口？当你扣动扳机的时候，你甚至有考虑过什么感觉吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felina Robbins [04017DBB] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaFrosthillDialogue.FelinaStory to 2
What happened to your husband?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你丈夫发生了什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's crossed my mind, though I doubt any good would come of it. I think the NCR still has some kind of bounty on my head.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我突然想起了这件事，尽管我怀疑说出这件事会有什么好处。我想NCR还有一些赏金记在我的头上。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felina Robbins [04017DBB] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's

ESP.ORIGINAL: Depending on how things shake out in the Mojave, I might be inclined to settle there with Anna. I'm worried the NCR will be here soon enough.
ESP.TRADUIT: 根据莫哈维的情况，我可能倾向于和安娜在那里定居。因为我担心NCR很快就会到的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felina Robbins [04017DBB] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's

ESP.ORIGINAL: I trust your judgment, though. What do you think of my prospects in the Mojave?
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过，我相信你的判断。你觉得我在莫哈维的前途如何？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felina Robbins [04017DBB] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaFrosthillDialogue.FelinaStory to 3
You ever thought about leaving Frosthill?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有想过离开霜地吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: My family owned a ranch outside Sac-Town. They had come up from old Mexico before I was born.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的家庭在萨克镇外有一个牧场。在我出生之前，他们是从老墨西哥来的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felina Robbins [04017DBB] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't remember much about it, honestly. Dad was gored to death by a bull and mom had to sell the place. That's when things got rough.
ESP.TRADUIT: 老实说，我不太记得了。爸爸被一头公牛咬死了，而妈妈不得不把房子卖掉。从那时候起事情就变得很艰难。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felina Robbins [04017DBB] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's

ESP.ORIGINAL: It was just me, Mom, and my two brothers. She took to turning tricks while they stole food to stay alive. We were always hungry.
ESP.TRADUIT: 只有我，妈妈和我的两个兄弟。当他们为了活下来而去偷食物时，她开始用自己的身体来赚钱。因为我们总是饿。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felina Robbins [04017DBB] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wasn't long before I had to choose between sucking cock or stealing. I picked the latter. It's a brutal business, but I adapated.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不久我就不得不在吸鸡巴和偷窃之间做出选择。我选了后者。虽然这是一件很残酷的事，但我同意了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felina Robbins [04017DBB] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's

ESP.ORIGINAL: Once Mom passed it was just me and my brothers. We started hitting caravans, making good money in the process.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当妈妈去世的时候，就只有我和我的兄弟了。我们开始袭击商队，在这个过程中赚了不少钱。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felina Robbins [04017DBB] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Smiling}Carlos was crazy, a funny bastard. He'd always stick a gun in their faces and yell, {Exaggerate for dramatic purpose}"You want to die, cocksuckers?". He was always so dramatic!
ESP.TRADUIT: {微笑着}卡洛斯是疯狂的，他是一个有趣的混蛋。他总是拿枪对着他们的脸大喊，{为了戏剧性的目的而夸张的说道}"你想死吗，混蛋？"。他总是那么戏剧化！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felina Robbins [04017DBB] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: It worked well for a time. We didn't even have to kill anyone, just kneecapped people who gave us lip. Everything comes to an end, though.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有一段时间这效果不错。我们甚至不需要杀任何人，只要射击那些说话粗暴的人的膝盖让他们跪下就行了。不过，一切都结束了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felina Robbins [04017DBB] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: One time we came on a Crimson Caravan group, thought they were just traders. They were actually mercs. My brothers were killed in the gunfight.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有一次我们袭击了一队赤红商队的人，以为他们只是商人。他们实际上是一群雇佣兵。我的兄弟们都在枪战中丧生了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felina Robbins [04017DBB] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: I ran, ran further than I thought possible. I was no more than seventeen then, but I had earned a bounty of 500 caps.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我跑，跑得比我想象的更远。那时我不到17岁，但我已经给自己“赢得了”500瓶盖的赏金。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felina Robbins [04017DBB] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: My brothers and I had heard of Frosthill, even talked of coming here. I knew it was my best shot at staying alive, so I made the trip.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我和我的兄弟们过去听说过霜地的事情，甚至谈到过来这里。我知道来这是我活下去的最好机会，所以我就走了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felina Robbins [04017DBB] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm still surprised I survived the trip up here, dodging raiders and fighting frostbite and hypothermia. It damn near killed me, but I made it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我仍然很惊讶我在这里的旅行中幸存下来，躲过了那些匪徒，与冻伤和低温作斗争。虽然它差点让我丧命，但我还是成功了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felina Robbins [04017DBB] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: I often think of my brothers, Carlos and Manny. They weren't perfect, but they both had a good coraz髇... a good heart. I think you do, too.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我经常想起我的兄弟，卡洛斯和曼尼。他们并不是完美的人，但他们都有一个很好的心脏（corazón）。。。有一颗善良的心。而我想你也是。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felina Robbins [04017DBB] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Uncertain}Would... would you like to stay here... stay with me?
ESP.TRADUIT: {不确定地问}你会。。。你想留在这里吗。。。跟我在一起？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felina Robbins [04017DBB] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaFrosthillDialogue.FelinaStory to 4
Where did you grow up?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在哪里长大的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Absolutely.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felina Robbins [04017DBB] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaFelinaREF.SexStart to 1
Since I was in the area, I wanted to find out if you'd like for me to "stay" again...
ESP.TRADUIT: 既然我还在这一带，我想知道你是否愿意让我再"留下"一次。。。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaFelinaBHers
ESP.TRADUIT: aa费琳娜B她的

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank you, but I can't accept it. Save it for you and your child.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢，但我不能接受。把它留给你和你的孩子。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank you, stranger. It's clear that I underestimated you. If you need any more work, just swing by. There's plenty that needs doing around here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢你，陌生人。很明显我低估了你。如果你需要更多的工作，就顺路过去。这里有很多事情需要做。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felina Robbins [04017DBB] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaFrosthillDialogue.FelinaRelation to aaFrosthillDialogue.FelinaRelation +1 rewardkarma 10
You're very kind, more than I would've expected. Thank you for everything.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你真是太好了，比我想象的还要好。谢谢你做的一切。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felina Robbins [04017DBB] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you still want to help out, I might have something for you, though it's a bit more personal than simple repairs. Check back if you're interested.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你还想帮忙的话，我可能有点别的东西给你，虽然这比简单的修理要私人一点。如果你感兴趣的话，可以回头来看看。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felina Robbins [04017DBB] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaFrosthillDialogue.FelinaRelation to aaFrosthillDialogue.FelinaRelation +1 rewardkarma 10
Sure, I can eat.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，我可以吃。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here you go, stranger. If you need any more work, just swing by. There's plenty that needs doing around here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 给你，陌生人。如果你需要更多的工作，就顺路过去。这里有很多事情需要做。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felina Robbins [04017DBB] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.additem BighornerSteak 1
If you still want to help out, I might have something for you, though it's a bit more personal than simple repairs. Check back if you're interested.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你还想帮忙的话，我可能还有些东西给你，虽然这比简单的修理要私人一点。如果你感兴趣的话你可以回头来看看。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felina Robbins [04017DBB] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.additem FoodGeneric100 1
That would be great. Thank you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那可太好了。谢谢你。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're seriously offering me stinking meat? This was a waste of time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你真的要给我这些发臭的肉吗？这真是浪费时间。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Stinking meat? Get the fuck out of my home, and don't you come back!
ESP.TRADUIT: 发臭的肉？给我他妈的滚出去，别再回来了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felina Robbins [04017DBB] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaFrosthillDialogue.FelinaRelation to aaFrosthillDialogue.FelinaRelation -4
Like what? Take my clothes off and dance on the table for you? Get out of my house, pig!
ESP.TRADUIT: 比如什么？帮你脱下衣服在桌上跳舞？滚出我的房子，你这猪猡！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felina Robbins [04017DBB] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaFrosthillDialogue.FelinaRelation to aaFrosthillDialogue.FelinaRelation -4
You have indoor plumbing now, thanks to me. How about a real display of gratitude?
ESP.TRADUIT: 多亏我，你现在有室内管道了。表现出一些真正的感激之情怎么样？

ESP.ORIGINAL: What brings you to Frosthill?
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么风把你吹到了霜地？

ESP.ORIGINAL: The ineluctable allure of metal, my friend! Silver, to be specific. Folks may not know it, but these frigid canyons hold a surfeit of wealth.
ESP.TRADUIT: 金属有那种我无法抗拒的诱惑，我的朋友！具体来说，是银矿。人们可能不知道，但这些寒冷的峡谷里可蕴藏着太多的财富了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felina Robbins [04017DBB] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: I am of course a mere eye in the greater body of the Python Mining Corporation. They have dispatched me to scour and scrutinize everything here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，我只是巨蟒矿物公司中的一只眼睛罢了。他们派我来检查这里的一切。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felina Robbins [04017DBB] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Once this territory is included in the dominion of the NCR, we can begin extracting its wealth in earnest.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一旦这块领土被纳入NCR的统治，我们就可以开始认真地开采它的财富。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felina Robbins [04017DBB] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Felina would like for you to stop making offers on her property.
ESP.TRADUIT: 费琳娜希望你不要再对她的财产出价了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you her representative now? The young lady is simply being obstinate. She stands to gain nothing by stubbornly clenching that deed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你现在是她的代表吗？这位年轻女士简直是固执。她固执地抓住那个农场，搞得我们什么也得不到。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lawson [0403DD85] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaFrosthil_aaLawsonFelinaS_0003EFF7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: My course is clear, and I believe in time she'll come around. Coin can soften even the staunchest resolve.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的想法很清楚，我相信她迟早会回来找我的。因为硬币甚至可以软化最坚定的决心，只需要一个机会。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lawson [0403DD85] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaFrosthil_aaLawsonFelinaS_0003EFF7_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Condescending}Now why don't you run along and do... whatever it is you do.
ESP.TRADUIT: {居高临下}现在你为什么不滚出去。。。我可不想管你要做什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lawson [0403DD85] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaFrosthil_aaLawsonFelinaS_0003EFF7_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaLawsonFelinaSpeech
ESP.TRADUIT: aa罗森费琳娜对话

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ok, ok. I'll back off. It's probably just a matter of time before she's forced to sell, but it won't be to me. We'll leave it at that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，好吧。我会退出的。但她被迫卖掉那间农场可能只是个时间问题，但这对我来说可不是。我们之间就到此为止。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lawson [0403DD85] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaFrosthil_aaLawsonFelinaS_000491D1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaFrosthillDialogue.LawsonDealt to 1
Do the other residents know how you're strong-arming Felina? I wonder how they'd react...
ESP.TRADUIT: 其他的居民知道你是怎么强迫费琳娜做这种事情的吗？我可不知道他们会怎么反应。。。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've been doing this long enough to know who will sell and who won't. Mrs. Robbins can play tough, but she's vulnerable. No, she'll sell.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我已经做了这么长时间，知道谁会卖谁不卖。罗宾斯太太可以表现的很强硬，但她实际上很脆弱。不，我觉得她会同意卖出农场的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lawson [0403DD85] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaFrosthil_aaLawsonFelinaS_000491D2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why don't you just accept the fact that she won't sell? Leave the lady alone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你为什么不接受她愿意进行交易的事实？别再碰那位女士了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Since you mentioned coin softening resolve, how about some caps? <Pay 500 caps>
ESP.TRADUIT: 既然你提到了硬币能软化你的决心，那就来点瓶盖吧？<支付500瓶盖>
