ESP.ORIGINAL: And thus you affirm my argument regarding the power of monetary incentives. I will consider the matter settled.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看来你的确了解我关于货币激励力量的论点。我会考虑解决这件事的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lawson [0403DD85] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaFrosthil_aaLawsonFelinaB_0003EFF9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.removeitem caps001 500 set aaFrosthillDialogue.LawsonDealt to 1
I can think of something I'd stubbornly clench, and it's not a deed. Why don't we talk in private?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我能想到我会狠狠捏住的东西，并且那可不会是一份契约。我们为什么不私下谈谈呢？

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Nervous, surprised}I see. Well, I... I will just postpone any negotiations with Mrs. Robbins... indefinitely. Yes, let's do talk in private.
ESP.TRADUIT: {紧张，惊讶}我明白了。嗯，我...我会推迟和罗宾斯太太的任何谈判...无限期的。你说得对，让我们私下谈谈吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lawson [0403DD85] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaFrosthil_aaLawsonFelinaB_0003EFFA_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: imod FadeToBlackAndBackISFX set aaFrosthillDialogue.LawsonDealt to 1
Nevermind.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没关系。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lawson [0403DD85] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaLawsonFelinaTP
ESP.TRADUIT: aa罗森费琳娜TP

ESP.ORIGINAL: Negotiations... are over. <Attack>
ESP.TRADUIT: 谈判。。。已经结束了。<攻击>

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're a lunatic!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是个疯子！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lawson [0403DD85] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaFrosthil_aaLawsonFelinaP_0003EFF8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaLawsonREF.startcombat player
I knew there was money to be made.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道这里有很多钱要赚。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Like so many others. Killing for money... I don't see how anyone can do it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你就像其他人一样。为了钱而杀人。。。我看没人能做到。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felina Robbins [04017DBB] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaFrosthillDialogue.FelinaRelation to aaFrosthillDialogue.FelinaRelation -1
I'd prefer to keep my reasons to myself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我宁愿为我的理由保密。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, so the little lady in the ranch should share her secrets, but not the big, bad bounty hunter with a grim scowl? Preposterous!
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，所以牧场上的小姑娘应该分享她的秘密，但那个面色阴沉的大坏蛋赏金猎人却不能？真是荒谬！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felina Robbins [04017DBB] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: I came to get revenge.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是来报仇的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Revenge for what? I know you're talking about Marko. What did he do to you? You've never even seen the man... and you don't want to.
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么报仇？我知道你在说马尔科。但他对你做了什么？你从没见过那个男人...而你也不会想的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felina Robbins [04017DBB] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: I came to help a friend.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是来帮助一个朋友的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I respect your loyalty, then. Not many would come here on account of friendship.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我尊重你的忠诚。但没有多少人会因为友谊而来这里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felina Robbins [04017DBB] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaFrosthillDialogue.FelinaRelation to aaFrosthillDialogue.FelinaRelation +1
It's never easy killing someone, but trust me - some of them have it coming.
ESP.TRADUIT: 杀人从来都不是件容易的事，但相信我，有些人会成功的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't doubt that. I heard about the Judge and some of the others you killed, horrible people. The world was better without them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不怀疑。我听说了法官和你杀的其他人，那些可怕的人。没有他们世界会更好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felina Robbins [04017DBB] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I just hope it doesn't get too easy for you, or you may well lose yourself in the process.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我只是希望这对你来说不太容易，否则你很可能在这个过程中迷失自我的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felina Robbins [04017DBB] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaFrosthillDialogue.FelinaRelation to aaFrosthillDialogue.FelinaRelation +1
It's not about feelings, it's about justice. I have to execute the law without passion or prejudice.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不是感情，而是正义。我必须在没有激情和偏见的情况下去执行法律。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You'd be a good politician, you know that? People like to quote the law when it suits their interests, but it's just another wall.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你会是个好政治家，你知道吗？人们喜欢在符合自己利益的时候引用法律，但这只是另一面围城。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felina Robbins [04017DBB] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Killing an unarmed man in front of his family is wrong, the law be damned. You can keep your laws.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在家人面前杀死一个手无寸铁的人是错误的，法律是该死的。但你可以遵守你的法律。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felina Robbins [04017DBB] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: Killing a mark provides income, ensuring my survival. The way I see it, it's me or them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 杀掉一个被标记的目标来提供收入，来确保我的生存。依我看，不论是是我还是他们都一样。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I know that desperation. It's why I robbed people on the highway near Reno. Is there an end to it, though? Don't you have enough caps now?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道那种绝望。所以我曾在里诺附近的高速公路上抢劫。不过，这一切结束了，不是么？你现在还没有足够的瓶盖吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felina Robbins [04017DBB] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I stopped feeling anything a long time ago. It's nothing personal.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我很久以前就没有任何感觉了。这可不是私人问题。

ESP.ORIGINAL: But you did feel it at one time, no? Sad to think you went so far down this path that it's robbed you of your humanity. I pity you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但你曾经感觉到过，不是吗？很遗憾你走过了这么遥远的路途，以至于它夺走了你的人性。我真可怜你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felina Robbins [04017DBB] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: I enjoy it every single time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我每次都很享受。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're a monster.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你真是个怪物。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felina Robbins [04017DBB] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaFrosthillDialogue.FelinaRelation to aaFrosthillDialogue.FelinaRelation -8
I think you should stay put. You're part of a community now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我认为你应该呆在原地。你现在是社区的一份子了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's true. Everyone here has been good to me, better than I ever expected, especially after Mike was killed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你说得对。这里的每个人都对我很好，比我想象的要好的多，特别是在迈克去世后。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felina Robbins [04017DBB] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: I just... I get the feeling like time is running out here, and there won't be anything left for me. Thank you for your candor, regardless.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我只是。。。我觉得我的时间不多了，我已经什么都没有了。但无论如何，我都谢谢你的坦率。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felina Robbins [04017DBB] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaFrosthillDialogue.FelinaRelation to aaFrosthillDialogue.FelinaRelation +1
Soon there won't be any NCR around New Vegas. I'd personally see to your safety.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很快在新维加斯就不会有NCR了。而我个人会保护你的安全。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't underestimate the bear's resolve, friend. They're stubborn well past the point of reason or self-interest. They won't give it up easily.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别低估了熊的决心，朋友。他们的固执远远超过了理智和私利的界限。他们是不会轻易放弃的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felina Robbins [04017DBB] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's something to consider, regardless. I appreciate the fact that you'd be willing to look out for us like that. Thank you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 无论如何，这事需要更多考虑。我很感激你愿意那样照顾我们。谢谢您。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felina Robbins [04017DBB] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaFrosthillDialogue.FelinaRelation to aaFrosthillDialogue.FelinaRelation +1
[NCR] I've got a lot of influence with the NCR now. Nobody would touch you in the Mojave.
ESP.TRADUIT: [NCR]我现在对NCR有很大的影响力。在莫哈维没人会碰你。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I know you believe that, you'll just have to forgive me if I'm a little more skeptical of the NCR's capacity for mercy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道你相信那个，如果我对NCR的仁慈能力还是有点怀疑的话，你得原谅我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felina Robbins [04017DBB] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's something to consider, regardless. I appreciate the fact that you'd be willing to look out for us like that. Thank you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 无论如何，这事需要更多考虑。我很感激你愿意那样照顾我们。谢谢您。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felina Robbins [04017DBB] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaFrosthillDialogue.FelinaRelation to aaFrosthillDialogue.FelinaRelation +1
I don't care what you do.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不在乎你做什么。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I guess I was wrong to think highly of you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想我对你评价过高是错的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felina Robbins [04017DBB] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaFrosthillDialogue.FelinaRelation to aaFrosthillDialogue.FelinaRelation -2
This is your decision, Felina. I can't make it for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是你的决定，费琳娜。我不能为你下定决心。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I know, I've just been sitting on the fence, and I just worry with everything that's going on in the canyon. I worry that there's no future here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道，我只是坐在篱笆上，我只是担心峡谷里发生的一切罢了。我担心在这里没有未来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felina Robbins [04017DBB] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: New Vegas and the surrounding area is no place to raise a family. You'd be better off here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 新维加斯和周边地区没有地方养家。你最好在这里。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That settles that, then. I don't want to put Anna in any unnecessary danger. Thank you for your honesty on the matter.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那就解决了。我也不想让安娜陷入任何不必要的危险。谢谢你在这件事上的诚实。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felina Robbins [04017DBB] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, I'd like to stay.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，我会留下来的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I thought you'd say that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我就知道你会这么说。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felina Robbins [04017DBB] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaFelinaREF.SexStart to 1 set aaFrosthillDialogue.FelinaStory to 5
I hope you won't take offense if I say no. It just isn't in the cards.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我说不，我希望你不要生气。这只是不大可能发生的事情。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Surprised, embarrassed}No, I... what was I thinking, anyway? Being so forward like that. I was just... I don't know, it was stupid of me. I apologize.
ESP.TRADUIT: {惊讶，尴尬}不，我。。。我到底在想什么？我们一起像那样向前。我只是。。。我不知道，我太傻了。我道歉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felina Robbins [04017DBB] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: We're friends, good friends. I don't want to do anything that would disrupt our friendship. You're always welcome here. Thanks for understanding.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们是朋友，好朋友。我不想做任何破坏我们友谊的事。你在这里总是受欢迎的。谢谢你的理解。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felina Robbins [04017DBB] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: No thanks, I don't like sloppy seconds.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，谢谢，我不喜欢草率的时间。

ESP.ORIGINAL: How... how could you say something so vile and callous? I was ready to... just, just get the fuck out, you animal!
ESP.TRADUIT: 怎样。。。你怎么能说这么卑鄙无情的话？我都已经准备好。。。只是，滚出去，你这个畜牲！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felina Robbins [04017DBB] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaFrosthillDialogue.FelinaRelation to aaFrosthillDialogue.FelinaRelation -20
When you say "stay", do you mean spend the night... together?
ESP.TRADUIT: 当你说“留下来”的时候，你的意思是过夜。。。一起？

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Giggles}That is exactly what I mean.
ESP.TRADUIT: {捂住嘴害羞的咯咯笑}这正是我的意思。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felina Robbins [04017DBB] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaFelinaPostSex01Intro
ESP.TRADUIT: aa费琳娜经过sx01介绍

ESP.ORIGINAL: That was fantastic. Thank you for reminding me what it feels like to be alive.
ESP.TRADUIT: 太棒了。谢谢你提醒了我活着是怎样的感觉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felina Robbins [04017DBB] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaFrosthillDialogue.FelinaSex to 1 set aaFrosthillDialogue.FelinaInseminated to 1
That was fantastic. Thank you for reminding me what it feels like to be alive.
ESP.TRADUIT: 太棒了。谢谢你提醒了我活着是怎样的感觉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felina Robbins [04017DBB] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaFrosthillDialogue.FelinaSex to 1
Whoo, that was fun! That might have heard me all the way in town.
ESP.TRADUIT: 喔，这真有趣！城里一路上的大家可能都听到我的声音了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felina Robbins [04017DBB] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaFrosthillDialogue.FelinaSex to aaFrosthillDialogue.FelinaSex +1
Don't stay away for too long, all right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 别离开太久，好吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felina Robbins [04017DBB] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaFrosthillDialogue.FelinaSex to aaFrosthillDialogue.FelinaSex +1
Hot damn, I just about lost my senses that time. Next time... I'm gonna make you scream my name.
ESP.TRADUIT: 天哪，我刚刚几乎失去理智了。下一次。。。我要让你叫我的名字。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felina Robbins [04017DBB] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaFrosthillDialogue.FelinaSex to aaFrosthillDialogue.FelinaSex +1
I don't normally smoke, but this calls for a cigarette.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我通常不抽烟，但事后需要来一根，不是么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felina Robbins [04017DBB] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaFelinaREF.playidle loosesmokingstanding
set aaFrosthillDialogue.FelinaSex to aaFrosthillDialogue.FelinaSex +1
Por dios, I'm still shaking! Where did you learn how to... on second thought, I don't want to know. Just keep doing it, ok?
ESP.TRADUIT: 天哪，我到现在还在发抖！你从哪学的。。。仔细想想，我也不想知道。让我们继续做，好吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felina Robbins [04017DBB] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaFrosthillDialogue.FelinaSex to aaFrosthillDialogue.FelinaSex +1
We've been spending so much time together now, I just have to wonder... what sort of future do we have?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们花了这么多时间在结合在一起，我只是想知道。。。我们会有什么样的未来？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felina Robbins [04017DBB] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaFrosthillDialogue.FelinaSex to 6
{Awkward, detached}Thanks for a good time. I'll see you later.
ESP.TRADUIT: {有些尴尬，但慢慢地变得超然}谢谢你带来的的好时光。待会见。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felina Robbins [04017DBB] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sometimes... I just like looking at your eyes. It's calming.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有时。。。我只是喜欢注视你的眼睛。这能让我平静下来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felina Robbins [04017DBB] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you really have to go now? Just stay a little longer, please.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你真的要走了吗？请再多待一会儿嘛。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felina Robbins [04017DBB] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good god, that was amazing! You better get your sweet ass back here soon!
ESP.TRADUIT: 天哪，这太神奇了！你最好快点把你甜蜜的屁股挪回来！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felina Robbins [04017DBB] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: I love being next to you. Even when we're not making love, just... lying there is an amazing feeling. Please stay awhile.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我喜欢和你在一起。即使当我们没有做爱时，只是。。。我们一起躺在那里有一种奇妙的感觉。请再多呆一会。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felina Robbins [04017DBB] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: You make me so happy. Please don't go just yet.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你让我很开心。请不要马上走嘛。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felina Robbins [04017DBB] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can keep the feeling going if you're ready for another round.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你准备好再来一轮的话，我可以让你保持这种快感的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm sure you could, but I need to regain my strength. Come back later and... we'll see.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我相信你可以，但我需要恢复体力。之后再来吧。。。让我们拭目以待。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felina Robbins [04017DBB] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaFrosthillDialogue.FelinaRelation to aaFrosthillDialogue.FelinaRelation +2
It was my pleasure, darling.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是我的荣幸，亲爱的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: So it's darling, now? I could get used to that. Don't stay away for too long, ok?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以现在就变成亲爱的了？我会尝试习惯的。别离开太久，好吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felina Robbins [04017DBB] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaFrosthillDialogue.FelinaRelation to aaFrosthillDialogue.FelinaRelation +2
Why don't we make this a regular thing?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们为什么不把这当作一件平常的事呢？

ESP.ORIGINAL: You'd like that, wouldn't you? You come back later and if I'm feeling generous... we'll talk.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你会喜欢的，不是吗？你晚点再来，如果我觉得我足够慷慨大方的时候。。。我们再谈谈。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felina Robbins [04017DBB] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaFrosthillDialogue.FelinaRelation to aaFrosthillDialogue.FelinaRelation +2
I've had better.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真是糟糕。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fucking pig! Get out!
ESP.TRADUIT: 该死的猪猡！走出！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felina Robbins [04017DBB] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaFrosthillDialogue.FelinaRelation to aaFrosthillDialogue.FelinaRelation -20
When this is all settled, maybe you could come back to the Mojave with me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当一切都解决了，也许你可以和我一起回到莫哈维。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Really? We're... moving along pretty fast, and I know you won't be here much longer, so I had to wonder. I'm starting to really care about you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真的吗？我们也许。。。进展得太快了？我知道你不会在这里呆太久，所以我不得不怀疑。我开始真正关心你了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felina Robbins [04017DBB] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you really feel that way, then maybe we could start a life... together. We'd be a proper family. Would you like that?
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你真的这么想，也许我们可以开始一段生活。。。一起。我们会成为一个合适的家庭的。你会喜欢吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felina Robbins [04017DBB] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: I thought this was more of a casual thing. We're both adults having a good time, nothing more.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我觉得这更像是随便的事。我们两个成年人都玩得很开心，没别的了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Slightly embarrassed, goes along with player's statement}Yeah, absolutely. I didn't mean to make things weird, I was just curious, that's all.
ESP.TRADUIT: {有点尴尬，同意邮差的说法}是的，当然。我不是故意让事情变得奇怪，我只是好奇而已。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felina Robbins [04017DBB] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaFrosthillDialogue.FelinaSex to 10 set aaFrosthillDialogue.FelinaRelation to aaFrosthillDialogue.FelinaRelation -2
You knew what this was when you got involved. Don't try to fence me in, hussy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当你参与进来的时候你就知道这会是什么了。别想把我圈养起来，小丫头。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Get the fuck out, you piece of shit!
ESP.TRADUIT: 滚出去，你这混蛋！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felina Robbins [04017DBB] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaFrosthillDialogue.FelinaRelation to aaFrosthillDialogue.FelinaRelation -20
Yes, I'd like that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，我会喜欢的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Happy, almost crying}Thank you. I... do care about you. Just promise me you'll take care of yourself until this is all finished. I can't lose anyone again.
ESP.TRADUIT: {高兴，快哭了}谢谢。我、 。。。真的很关心你。答应我你会照顾好自己直到一切结束的。我不能再失去任何人了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felina Robbins [04017DBB] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Wanting to say "I love you" but can't}I... I want you to know how much I'm thinking of you and our future. Please stay safe.
ESP.TRADUIT: {想说"我爱你"，但不能}我。。。我真的很想让你知道我有多想你谈论我们的未来。请保持安全。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felina Robbins [04017DBB] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaFrosthillDialogue.FelinaSex to 15 set aaFrosthillDialogue.FelinaRelation to aaFrosthillDialogue.FelinaRelation +4
aaFelinaPostSexFutureFamilyNoCool
ESP.TRADUIT: aa费丽安娜左爱之后未来家庭不coll

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaFelinaPostSexFutureFamilyNoCrazy
ESP.TRADUIT: aa费琳娜左爱之后家庭未来不疯狂

ESP.ORIGINAL: I just wanted to let you know that we're about to go after Marko.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我只想让你知道我们要去追马尔科。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What? Ya'll are really going to go after him? Please take care of yourself, ok. You've been a good friend to me and Anna, I appreciate it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么？你真的要追他吗？请照顾好你自己，好吗。你一直是我和安娜的好朋友，我很感激。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felina Robbins [04017DBB] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just don't underestimate him, ok? I've seen all sorts come after him, and he always finds a way to beat them... more like destroy them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别小看他，好吗？我见过各种各样的人来找他的麻烦，而他总是想办法打败了他们。。。更像是摧毁他们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felina Robbins [04017DBB] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: You'll be in my prayers, Courier.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会为你祈祷的，邮差。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felina Robbins [04017DBB] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, you can't. You can't!
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，你不能。你不能！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felina Robbins [04017DBB] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: He'll kill you, he'll find a way. He always does. You don't know him like I do. He's worse than anyone you've gone after.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他会杀了你，他会找到办法的。他总是这样。你不像我那样了解他。他比你追逐过的任何人都要坏。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felina Robbins [04017DBB] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just leave with me. Let's take Anna and leave this hellhole. Please, I can't lose another like Mike. Please don't go!
ESP.TRADUIT: 跟我走吧。我们带安娜离开这个鬼地方。拜托，我不能再失去像迈克那样的人了。请不要走！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felina Robbins [04017DBB] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: I believe you have Mike Robbins' journal. His widow would like it returned.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我相信你你身上有迈克·罗宾斯的日记，而他遗孀想把它要回来。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ain't you a hot dog comin' at me with questions about the book. I damn well took it, as I was entitled to. He was a murderin' assbag!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你对我提关于这本书的问题不是显得十分高难度吗。我他妈的带走了它，因为这是我应得的。他是个混蛋！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bobby Harrison [0403F639] (mod) Quest : ([04029364]aaHunterDialogue) Dialogue for Named Bounty Hunters EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaBobbyHarrisonVoiceType\aaHunterDi_aaBobbyHarrison_0003F644_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can do what I please with it, ain't nobody can do nothing about it. Not nothing. Is you hypnotized by that widow's pussy? I suspect she's tasty.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我可以随心所欲的做我想做的任何事，而且没有人能对此造成任何影响。没有人！你是被那个寡妇的小穴催眠了吗？我怀疑那确实很多汁紧实。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bobby Harrison [0403F639] (mod) Quest : ([04029364]aaHunterDialogue) Dialogue for Named Bounty Hunters EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaBobbyHarrisonVoiceType\aaHunterDi_aaBobbyHarrison_0003F644_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaBobbyHarrisonBribe
Fuck yeah, I'm gonna get drunk as a motherfucker!
ESP.TRADUIT: 对啊！去他妈的，我要去干他娘的一醉方休了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bobby Harrison [0403F639] (mod) Quest : ([04029364]aaHunterDialogue) Dialogue for Named Bounty Hunters EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaBobbyHarrisonVoiceType\aaHunterDi_aaBobbyHarrison_0003F647_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.removeitem caps001 500 aaBobbyHarrisonREF.additem caps001 500 aaBobbyHarrisonRef.removeitem aaRobbinsJournal 1 player.additem aaRobbinsJournal 1
Perhaps a few caps could convince you to part with the diary. <Pay 500 caps>
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许一些瓶盖能说服你放弃这本日记。<支付500瓶盖>

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaBobbyHarrisonSpeech
Goddamn, I was just taking the spoils of war, you know? Don't go fucking up my livelihood! Here, take the damn thing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他妈的，我只是拿走战利品，你知道吗？别毁了我的生计！给，把这那该死的东西带走吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bobby Harrison [0403F639] (mod) Quest : ([04029364]aaHunterDialogue) Dialogue for Named Bounty Hunters EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaBobbyHarrisonVoiceType\aaHunterDi_aaBobbyHarrison_0003F649_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaBobbyHarrisonRef.removeitem aaRobbinsJournal 1 player.additem aaRobbinsJournal 1
You know I'm friends with Randall, right? Piss me off and you won't collect bounties.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道我和兰道尔是朋友，对吧？惹我生气的话，你就收不了赏金了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was thinking of using it as shitpaper. Or I could just go to fantasizing about that spicy widow, then whack off between pages, make 'em stick.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想用它当厕纸来擦屁股。或者我可以去幻想一下那个辣寡妇，然后在书页之间"猛射一发"，把它们都粘起来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bobby Harrison [0403F639] (mod) Quest : ([04029364]aaHunterDialogue) Dialogue for Named Bounty Hunters EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaBobbyHarrisonVoiceType\aaHunterDi_aaBobbyHarrison_0003F64A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What are you going to do with a journal? Can you even read?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你打算拿日记怎么办？你难道认字吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dear diary, today I used a workbench vice to squeeze Bobby's genitals into paste. He cried. A lot.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我亲爱的日记，今天我用工作台虎钳把鲍比的生殖器捏成糊状了。他哭了。超多的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You want the fucking book? Here, take it! Just keep away from my jewels, you crazy fuck!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你想要那本该死的书吗？给，拿着！离我的"珠宝"远点，你这个疯子！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bobby Harrison [0403F639] (mod) Quest : ([04029364]aaHunterDialogue) Dialogue for Named Bounty Hunters EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaBobbyHarrisonVoiceType\aaHunterDi_aaBobbyHarrison_0003F648_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaBobbyHarrisonRef.removeitem aaRobbinsJournal 1 player.additem aaRobbinsJournal 1
<Spit in his face> <Attack>
ESP.TRADUIT: <朝他脸上吐口水> <攻击>

ESP.ORIGINAL: Cocksucker! I'll motherfuck you in the eye!
ESP.TRADUIT: 混蛋！我他妈的要操你的眼睛！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bobby Harrison [0403F639] (mod) Quest : ([04029364]aaHunterDialogue) Dialogue for Named Bounty Hunters EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaBobbyHarrisonVoiceType\aaHunterDi_aaBobbyHarrison_0003F646_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaBobbyHarrisonREF.startcombat player
Your blatant disregard for grammar has voided your right to live. <Attack>
ESP.TRADUIT: 你对语法的公然漠视使你的生存权无效了。<攻击>

ESP.ORIGINAL: The fuck?
ESP.TRADUIT: 三小？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bobby Harrison [0403F639] (mod) Quest : ([04029364]aaHunterDialogue) Dialogue for Named Bounty Hunters EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaBobbyHarrisonVoiceType\aaHunterDi_aaBobbyHarrison_0003F645_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaBobbyHarrisonREF.startcombat player
Nevermind.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没关系。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bobby Harrison [0403F639] (mod) Quest : ([04029364]aaHunterDialogue) Dialogue for Named Bounty Hunters EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaBobbyHarrisonVoiceType\aaHunterDi_aaBobbyHarrison_0003F643_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Darling, I've got to do this, but I won't be doing it alone. I'll come for you when it's over.
ESP.TRADUIT: 亲爱的，我必须这么做，但我不会一个人去做的。结束后我会来找你的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: It doesn't matter if there's a hundred, Marko will find a way! You're still going, aren't you? God damn it all.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有一百个帮手也没用的，马尔科总会找到办法的！你还是决意要去，不是吗？真是该死的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felina Robbins [04017DBB] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll be waiting for you. I want you to know before you go... I love you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会等你的。我想让你在走之前知道。。。我爱你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felina Robbins [04017DBB] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: Some things are a matter of duty, Felina. Marko has to be stopped.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有些事是我身上的责任，费琳娜。马尔科必须被阻止。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Duty? What about your life? Our life? You're still going, aren't you? God damn it all.
ESP.TRADUIT: 责任？那你的生活怎么样？我们的生活呢？你还是决定要去，不是吗？真是该死的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felina Robbins [04017DBB] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll be waiting for you. I want you to know before you go... I love you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会等你的。我想让你在走之前知道。。。我爱你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felina Robbins [04017DBB] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: Calm down. I've faced far worse than Marko. He's just a man, and he'll die like any other.
ESP.TRADUIT: 冷静。我所面对的东西比马尔科还要糟糕。他只是个人类，而这会让他像其他人一样死去的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: But he isn't just a man... he is the devil! You're still going, aren't you? God damn it all.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但他不仅仅是个人。。。他是魔鬼！你还是决意要去，不是吗？真是该死的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felina Robbins [04017DBB] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll be waiting for you. I want you to know before you go... I love you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会等你的。我想让你在走之前知道。。。我爱你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felina Robbins [04017DBB] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: I love you too.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我也爱你。

ESP.ORIGINAL: <She kisses you gently> You've made me happier than I thought possible. All you have to do is stay alive now. No heroics, ok? Go on and go now.
ESP.TRADUIT: <她郑重的吻了你>你让我比我想象中的还要快乐。你只要活着就行了。不要逞英雄，好吗？现在就去吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felina Robbins [04017DBB] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaFrosthillDialogue.FelinaRelation to aaFrosthillDialogue.FelinaRelation +20
I know.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can't say it, can you? I understand, I just blurted it out without thinking. Just know that I need you... preferably in one piece, ok? Go on now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你说不出来，是吗？我明白，我只是不假思索地脱口而出。我才知道我需要你。。。最好是一整块的，好吗？现在继续说吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felina Robbins [04017DBB] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Remain Silent>
ESP.TRADUIT: <保持沉默>

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can't say it, can you? I understand, I just blurted it out without thinking. Just know that I need you... preferably in one piece, ok? Go on now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你说不出来，是吗？我明白，我只是不假思索地脱口而出。我才知道我需要你。。。最好是一整块的，好吗？现在继续说吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felina Robbins [04017DBB] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: For shit's sake, I'm about to fight the devil and you're making me go soft. Stop it, please.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看在他妈的神的份上，我都要和那魔鬼战斗，而你却让我变得心软了。请停下。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can't say it, can you? I understand, I just blurted it out without thinking. Just know that I need you... preferably in one piece, ok? Go on now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你说不出来，是吗？我明白，我只是不假思索地脱口而出。我才知道我需要你。。。最好是一整块的，好吗？现在继续说吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felina Robbins [04017DBB] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: I do it for the money.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我这么做是为了钱。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You and every other swinging dick in that camp, I suppose. A few rusty ol' caps will make people do things they'd never imagine.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想是你和营地里人是一类人。一些生锈的旧瓶盖就会让人们做一些他们从未想象过的事情。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brimley [04035DD6] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleOld01\aaFrosthil_aaBrimleyBHMone_0003F664_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alls I ask is that you remember that not all of us is bad, you hear? Everybody makes mistakes, and we all pay for it in the end.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我只要求你记住，不是所有人都是坏人，你听到了吗？每个人都会犯错的，而我们最终都会为此付出代价。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brimley [04035DD6] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Puzzled Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleOld01\aaFrosthil_aaBrimleyBHMone_0003F664_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sometimes that little voice in your noggin is worse than any hangman's noose, believe you me. You just remember that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有时候，你酒杯里的那个小声音比任何绞索都要难听，只要相信我就行了。你马上就会记住的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brimley [04035DD6] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's

ESP.ORIGINAL: I got tired of seeing bad men walk free, so I decided to do something about it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我厌倦了看到坏人逍遥法外，所以我决定做点什么。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Shit, we got a true-blue vigilante! Ain't met too many, cause they don't live long, believe me. Most are a little too... self-righteous. No offense.
ESP.TRADUIT: 妈的，我们有一个真正坚定不移的义务警员！我没见过太多，因为他们都活不了多久，相信我。大多数都有点太。。。太自以为是了。我并没有冒犯的意思。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brimley [04035DD6] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleOld01\aaFrosthil_aaBrimleyBHTire_0003F665_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alls I ask is that you remember that not all of us is bad, you hear? Everybody makes mistakes, and we all pay for it in the end.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我只要求你记住，不是所有人都是坏人，你听到了吗？每个人都会犯错的，而我们最终都会为此付出代价。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brimley [04035DD6] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Puzzled Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleOld01\aaFrosthil_aaBrimleyBHTire_0003F665_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sometimes that little voice in your noggin is worse than any hangman's noose, believe you me. You just remember that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有时候，你酒杯里的那个小声音比任何绞索都要难听，只要相信我就行了。你马上就会记住的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brimley [04035DD6] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was just bored, and it seemed like an exciting way make a living.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我只是觉得无聊罢了，而且这似乎是一种令人兴奋的谋生方式。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's honesty right there, and it ain't as crazy as you might think. Lot of folks get stir crazy in the wastes, do unpredictable things.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这就是诚实，这不像你想象的那么疯狂。很多人等着在垃圾堆里发疯，做些不可预知的事情。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brimley [04035DD6] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleOld01\aaFrosthil_aaBrimleyBHBore_0003F661_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alls I ask is that you remember that not all of us is bad, you hear? Everybody makes mistakes, and we all pay for it in the end.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我只要求你记住，不是所有人都是坏人，你听到了吗？每个人都会犯错的，而我们最终都会为此付出代价。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brimley [04035DD6] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Puzzled Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleOld01\aaFrosthil_aaBrimleyBHBore_0003F661_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sometimes that little voice in your noggin is worse than any hangman's noose, believe you me. You just remember that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有时候，你酒杯里的那个小声音比任何绞索都要难听，只要相信我就行了。你马上就会记住的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brimley [04035DD6] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's

ESP.ORIGINAL: I enjoy killing, plain and simple.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我可喜欢杀人了，这简单明了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm sure that'll scare some, but not me. I know the feeling, had it when I was young and crazy. Ain't nothing else like it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我相信这会吓到一些人，但你不会吓到我的。我知道那种感觉，在我年轻疯狂的时候就有过了。没有什么比这更好的了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brimley [04035DD6] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleOld01\aaFrosthil_aaBrimleyBHEnjo_0003F663_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alls I ask is that you remember that not all of us is bad, you hear? Everybody makes mistakes, and we all pay for it in the end.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我只要求你记住，不是所有人都是坏人，你听到了吗？每个人都会犯错的，而我们最终都会为此付出代价。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brimley [04035DD6] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Puzzled Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleOld01\aaFrosthil_aaBrimleyBHEnjo_0003F663_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sometimes that little voice in your noggin is worse than any hangman's noose, believe you me. You just remember that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有时候，你酒杯里的那个小声音比任何绞索都要难听，只要相信我就行了。你马上就会记住的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brimley [04035DD6] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can't remember how or why I got started. I just do it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我已经不记得我是怎么开始的了，也不知道为什么。我就是这么做的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ain't that life in a nutshell? Shit, we got people givin' us rules and tasks from day one, ain't no meaning to it half the time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那不是简单的生活吗？妈的，我们从第一天起就有人给我们规定了规则和任务，有一半时间都在没有意义的乱晃。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brimley [04035DD6] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleOld01\aaFrosthil_aaBrimleyBHCant_0003F662_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alls I ask is that you remember that not all of us is bad, you hear? Everybody makes mistakes, and we all pay for it in the end.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我只要求你记住，不是所有人都是坏人，你听到了吗？每个人都会犯错的，而我们最终都会为此付出代价。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brimley [04035DD6] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Puzzled Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleOld01\aaFrosthil_aaBrimleyBHCant_0003F662_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sometimes that little voice in your noggin is worse than any hangman's noose, believe you me. You just remember that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有时候，你酒杯里的那个小声音比任何绞索都要难听，只要相信我就行了。你马上就会记住的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brimley [04035DD6] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd like to see your wares.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想看看你的货物。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You got it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我马上照办。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Big Tim Matheson [04035DD7] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaFrosthil_aaBigTimRepairs_0003F66F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ShowBarterMenu
What's your story?
ESP.TRADUIT: 说说你的故事好吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: My story? {Sarcastic}Well, I came to Frosthill looking to spread the gospel and save the souls of these villainous bums!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的故事？{讽刺的}好吧，我来霜地是想传播福音，拯救这些恶棍的灵魂！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Big Tim Matheson [04035DD7] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaFrosthil_aaBigTimYourSto_0003F672_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Laughing}You should see your face, stranger. I can't tell if you want to run or reach for a weapon. Relax, I'm not having a fit or anything.
ESP.TRADUIT: {大笑}你应该看看你的脸上的表情，陌生人。我不知道你是想跑还是想拿武器。但别紧张，我不想惹你生气或是不舒服什么的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE:
NPC : Big Tim Matheson [04035DD7] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's
Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaFrosthil_aaBigTimYourSto_0003F672_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You'll have to forgive me, seeing as to how I don't have many newcomers up and ask me about my background. It just seems a little odd.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你得原谅我，因为没有多少新人来问过我的背景。你的出现只是有点奇怪。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Big Tim Matheson [04035DD7] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaFrosthil_aaBigTimYourSto_0003F672_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you must know, I came here after a minor legal dispute, settled down and opened up this fine establishment. Not much else to say.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你一定要知道的话，我是在一场小小的法律纠纷之后来到这里的，安定下来，开了这家好公司。其他没什么好说的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Big Tim Matheson [04035DD7] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaFrosthil_aaBigTimYourSto_0003F672_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What about you? What's... {Emphasizing for humor and dramatic effect}your story?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你呢？什么是。。。{强调幽默和戏剧效果}你的故事？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Big Tim Matheson [04035DD7] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaFrosthil_aaBigTimYourSto_0003F672_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaFrosthillDialogue.BigTimStory to 1
{Sighs out of reluctance}About ten years ago I was working as a smith and doing general repairs near Sac-Town. Most of my family had been around there for ages.
ESP.TRADUIT: {不情愿地叹了口气}大约十年前，我在萨克镇附近做铁匠，做一般修理。我的大多数家人都在那里呆了很久了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Big Tim Matheson [04035DD7] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaFrosthil_aaBigTimYourSto_0004027C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Most of my kin were farmers and the like, minded our own business. I was very close with my big sister, Kate, who was studying with the Followers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的大多数亲戚都是农民之类的，只关心我们自己的事。我和我的大姐凯特关系很好，而她正在跟追随者们一起学习。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Big Tim Matheson [04035DD7] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaFrosthil_aaBigTimYourSto_0004027C_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: She was hoping to become a doctor, so she helped out in their clinic. One night a drunk ranger came in for stitches after he had busted his head.
ESP.TRADUIT: 她希望成为一名医生，所以她在他们的诊所帮忙。一天晚上，一个醉酒的游骑兵撞伤了他的头，所以他来缝了针。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Big Tim Matheson [04035DD7] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaFrosthil_aaBigTimYourSto_0004027C_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Kate tended to this ranger, guy named Daniels, who had it in his head that he would pick up Kate then and there. She would have nothing of it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 凯特照顾了这个叫丹尼尔斯的游骑兵，而他脑子里想着要去接走凯特。但她一点也不想要。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Big Tim Matheson [04035DD7] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaFrosthil_aaBigTimYourSto_0004027C_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Everybody there said he got loud and belligerent, threatened to kill her if she didn't agree to date him. The Followers threw him out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在场的每个人都说他很吵闹还很好斗，他威胁说如果她不同意和他约会就杀了她。天启追随者们把他赶了出去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Big Tim Matheson [04035DD7] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaFrosthil_aaBigTimYourSto_0004027C_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Solemn}When Kate left the clinic she never came home. They found her corpse in a ditch the next morning.
ESP.TRADUIT: {严肃的}而凯特离开诊所之后，她再也没回过家。第二天早上他们在沟里发现了她的尸体。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Big Tim Matheson [04035DD7] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaFrosthil_aaBigTimYourSto_0004027C_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The was an investigation, then a trial. Daniels denied everything, pulled rank and stories of his heroism out of his ass during his testimony.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那是一次调查，然后是一次审判。丹尼尔斯否认一切，在作证时把自己的英雄主义和军衔地位从他的屁眼里抹去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Big Tim Matheson [04035DD7] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaFrosthil_aaBigTimYourSto_0004027C_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Cocksucker walked, got off scot-free. On the way out he smiled and winked at my family. He laughed as he walked by me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那个吸吊混蛋走了，获得自由了。在出去的路上，他微笑着向我的家人眨了眨眼。而他从我身边走过时笑了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Big Tim Matheson [04035DD7] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaFrosthil_aaBigTimYourSto_0004027C_8.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was younger and more... angry back then. The night after he was freed, I tracked him down to his cabin, then waited till he was in his bed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我那时候很年轻。。。当时也很生气。在他获释的那晚，我跟踪他到他的小屋，然后一直等到他躺在床上。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Big Tim Matheson [04035DD7] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaFrosthil_aaBigTimYourSto_0004027C_9.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He might have been a badass ranger, but once I got my hands on him it was over. He wheezed like a dying bird.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他可能是个很厉害的的游骑兵，但当我用手狠狠抓住他的时候，他就"结束"了。他喘息得像只垂死的鸟。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Big Tim Matheson [04035DD7] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaFrosthil_aaBigTimYourSto_0004027C_10.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I squeezed his neck so hard that I felt his spine crack.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我使劲地捏住他的脖子，太用力了，这让我感觉到他的脊椎都裂了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Big Tim Matheson [04035DD7] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaFrosthil_aaBigTimYourSto_0004027C_11.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There were no witnesses, but the law is a bit more efficient when a ranger's on the slab and not a farmer's daughter.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当时没有任何目击者，但当一个游骑兵在墓碑上，而不是一个农夫的女儿时，法律就变得十分有效率了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Big Tim Matheson [04035DD7] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaFrosthil_aaBigTimYourSto_0004027C_12.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They put out a warrant on me, so I ran. Then there was a bounty. Frosthill was my only option then.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们对我发出了搜查令，所以我逃跑了。然后便是赏金悬赏。从那时候起，霜地就成了我唯一的选择了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Big Tim Matheson [04035DD7] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaFrosthil_aaBigTimYourSto_0004027C_13.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They always told us to trust in the NCR's justice, but it failed Kate. What else could I do? Was I just supposed to be a fucking sheep?
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们总是让我们相信NCR的公正，但这没能让凯特获得公平。我还能做什么？难道我们应该是只该死的羊吗，任人宰割？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Big Tim Matheson [04035DD7] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's

ESP.ORIGINAL: What are you supposed to do? What would you have done?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你该怎么办？在那种情况下你又会怎么做？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Big Tim Matheson [04035DD7] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaFrosthil_aaBigTimYourSto_0004027C_15.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaFrosthillDialogue.BigTimStory to 2
Any chance you'll tell me why you came to Frosthill now?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能告诉我你为什么现在来霜地吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Where else could we go? Legion territory? East? My choices are tyranny or chaos... no, I'll stick right here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们还能去哪里？军团领地？东方？我的选择不是暴政就是混乱。。。不，我就呆在这里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Big Tim Matheson [04035DD7] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's

ESP.ORIGINAL: You know what makes me happy? Seeing my children go to school and able to play outside, free from fear. I'll pay any price for that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道什么让我快乐吗？看到我的孩子们上学，能够在外面玩耍，没有恐惧。而我愿意为此付出任何代价。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Big Tim Matheson [04035DD7] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaFrosthillDialogue.BigTimStory to 3
Do you plan on leaving Frosthill at any point?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有过打算离开霜地吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've only seen him a handful of times, but I know he's dangerous. It's how he carries himself, it's obvious. It's like his eyes are always on edge.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我只见过他几次，但我知道他很危险。很明显，这是他自己的表现。就像他的眼睛总是紧张不安并且烦躁的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Big Tim Matheson [04035DD7] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's

ESP.ORIGINAL: But all that aside, it's been nothing but amicable in town. Truth is people are glad to have him around. He keeps out the really bad guys.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但撇开这些不说，他在城里除了展示出和蔼可亲之外什么都没有。事实是人们很高兴有他在身边。因为他让我们避开了真正的坏人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Big Tim Matheson [04035DD7] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's

ESP.ORIGINAL: 80's were looking like they could be a threat before he showed up. Whatever he did before, nobody around here seems to care much, myself included.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在他出现之前，80年代帮的人看起来可能是个威胁。不管他以前做了什么，这里似乎没有人在乎，包括我自己。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Big Tim Matheson [04035DD7] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaFrosthillDialogue.BigTimStory to 4
What do you know about Marko?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你对马尔科知道些什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nevermind.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没关系。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ok, then.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那好吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Big Tim Matheson [04035DD7] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaFrosthil_aaBigTimNevermi_0003FC75_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No story, really. I'm just a courier.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没有故事，真的。我只是个邮差罢了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: We get our share of couriers up here, but I'm fairly certain you're bringing more than just mail. God knows you're better-armed than most.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们这里有很多邮差，但我敢肯定你带来的不仅仅是邮件。天知道你的武器比大多数的人要好多少。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Big Tim Matheson [04035DD7] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaFrosthil_aaBigTimYourSto_0003F67B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look, if you need any repairs, stop by anytime. Good luck to you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听着，如果你需要修理，随时可以过来。祝你好运。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Big Tim Matheson [04035DD7] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaFrosthil_aaBigTimYourSto_0003F67B_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I took a bullet to the head but managed to survive. You could say I gained a new lease on life.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我头部中了一枪，但还是活了下来。你可以说我获得了新生。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I would hope so. You're lucky that you didn't come out of it half-retarded. I knew one guy that survived a headshot but was... funny afterwards.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我希望如此。你很幸运的没有半死不活地从坟墓中走出来。我认识一个在爆头中幸存下来的人，但是。。。事情在那之后很有趣。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Big Tim Matheson [04035DD7] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaFrosthil_aaBigTimYourSto_0003F678_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look, if you need any repairs, stop by anytime. Good luck to you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听着，如果你需要修理，随时可以过来。祝你好运。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Big Tim Matheson [04035DD7] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaFrosthil_aaBigTimYourSto_0003F678_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I defied death and now I live to sow misery and anguish at every opportunity. It's very rewarding.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我藐视死亡，现在我活着是为了在任可能的人上播种混乱和苦难。这是非常值得的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's a good one! You... you're not joking, are you? Nice, a veritable psychopath in our community. This will end well.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真是很好的一个想法！你。。。你不是在开玩笑？太他妈好了，我们社区里有了一个真正的精神病患者。这会是个很好的结束。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Big Tim Matheson [04035DD7] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaFrosthil_aaBigTimYourSto_0003F67A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look, if you need any repairs, stop by anytime. Good luck to you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听着，如果你需要修理，随时可以过来。祝你好运。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Big Tim Matheson [04035DD7] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaFrosthil_aaBigTimYourSto_0003F67A_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've survived everything that's been thrown at me, and I'm beholden to no one.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我从所有扔到我身上的东西中幸存了下来，我不接受任何人的恩惠。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tough guy, huh? We're pretty big on individualism up here, so you'll fit right in.
ESP.TRADUIT: 硬汉，嗯？我们在个人主义方面做得很好，所以我想你很适合。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Big Tim Matheson [04035DD7] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaFrosthil_aaBigTimYourSto_0003F679_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look, if you need any repairs, stop by anytime. Good luck to you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听着，如果你需要修理，随时可以过来。祝你好运。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Big Tim Matheson [04035DD7] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaFrosthil_aaBigTimYourSto_0003F679_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Remain Silent>
ESP.TRADUIT: <保持沉默>

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ah, the strong, silent type. Or maybe a retard. There is some overlap there, so please don't take offense if I'm presumptuous.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，是强壮，保持沉默的类型呢。又或者是个弱智。这里我想肯定有些重叠，所以如果我太放肆，请不要生气。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Big Tim Matheson [04035DD7] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaFrosthil_aaBigTimYourSto_0003F67C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look, if you need any repairs, stop by anytime. Good luck to you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听着，如果你需要修理，随时可以过来。祝你好运。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Big Tim Matheson [04035DD7] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaFrosthil_aaBigTimYourSto_0003F67C_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you need any help around here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你需要什么帮助吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, an adventurer! This is my lucky day, then. I do have a job that no one has taken me up on, but I'll happily offer it to you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，一个冒险家！那么，今天是我的幸运日。我确实有一份没人接受的工作，但我很乐意为你提供。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Big Tim Matheson [04035DD7] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: You may have noticed the solar panels up on the roof. Sadly, they provide most the town's power. The supply is intermittent at best.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你可能已经注意到屋顶上的太阳能电池板了。可悲的是，它们提供了镇上大部分的电力。但供应充其量只能算是断断续续的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Big Tim Matheson [04035DD7] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm trying to improve the supply by utilizing some pre-war tech, namely a special type of coil. Luckily, I know where one can be found.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我正试图利用一些战前技术，即一种特殊类型的线圈，来改善供应。幸运的是，我知道在哪里能找到它。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Big Tim Matheson [04035DD7] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: On the other side of the canyon you'll find a pre-war military site. By all appearances it still has power, so its reactor must be in working order.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在峡谷的另一边，你会发现一个战前军事遗址。从表面上看，它仍然有动力，所以它的反应堆肯定处于工作状态。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Big Tim Matheson [04035DD7] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Since no one is living there, I see no reason not to loot the coil. The only thing stopping me are the base defenses, which are also still active.
ESP.TRADUIT: 既然没有人住在那里，我看没有理由不去抢线圈。唯一能阻止我的是基地防御系统，它们即使到了现在也仍然很活跃。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Big Tim Matheson [04035DD7] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You'll get caps and a discount here at the store, and you'll be doing something eminently philanthropic for the community as a whole. Sound good?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你会得到瓶盖和在商店里的折扣，你会为整个社区做一些杰出的慈善事业。听起来不错吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Big Tim Matheson [04035DD7] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure, I'll get the coil for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，我帮你拿到线圈的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I under... wait, you will? Usually this is when the adventurers tell me in no uncertain terms to take the offer and shove it. I am impressed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我明。。。等等，你会吗？通常这都是那些冒险家们毫不含糊地告诉我接受这个提议并将其抛之脑后的时候。你真的令我印象深刻。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Big Tim Matheson [04035DD7] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll have the caps for you when you get back. Just be careful. Those pre-war sites are usually deathtraps for some damned reason. Good luck.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你回来的时候我给你瓶盖的。小心点。那些战前遗址通常是致命的陷阱，因为某些该死的原因。祝你好运。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Big Tim Matheson [04035DD7] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: ;start Tim's quest set aaFrosthillDialogue.BigTimHelped to 1
I think I'll pass on the job for now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想我暂时不干这项工作了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: And that would be the wise choice. Why anyone would want to go traipsing through pre-war cesspools to find junk, I'll never understand.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这将是一个明智的选择。为什么有人想在战前的污水池里寻找垃圾，我永远不会明白。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Big Tim Matheson [04035DD7] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't get me wrong, I feel obligated to offer the job to bold types like yourself, but I really can't fathom why anyone would do it. Go figure.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别误会，我觉得有义务把这份工作提供给像你这样大胆的人，但我真的不明白为什么会有人这样做。想想看。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Big Tim Matheson [04035DD7] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was hoping to arrange for you to make some repairs in Felina's house.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我希望能安排你去费琳娜家去修理一下。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, and I'm happy to do it. I can't work for free, but I'll give you a discount. 50 caps per job should cover it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，我很高兴这么做。虽然我不能免费工作，但我可以给你打折。每项工作只要你50个瓶盖。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Big Tim Matheson [04035DD7] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaFrosthil_aaBigTimRepairF_0003FC70_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd like to get the toilet fixed. <Pay 50 caps>
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想把马桶修好。<支付50瓶盖>

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nothing like repairing a toilet to start the day.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没有什么比修理厕所开始新的一天更美好的了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Big Tim Matheson [04035DD7] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaFrosthil_aaBigTimRepairF_0003FC74_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.removeitem caps001 50 imod FadeToBlackAndBackQuickExtendedISFX aaFelinaSinkBrokenREF.disable aaFelinaSinkBrokenREF.markfordelete set aaFrosthillDialogue.ToiletFixed to 1
I'd like to get the sink fixed. <Pay 50 caps>
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想把水槽修好。<支付50瓶盖>

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ok, I'll get right on it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的，我马上去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Big Tim Matheson [04035DD7] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaFrosthil_aaBigTimRepairF_0003FC73_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.removeitem caps001 50 imod FadeToBlackAndBackQuickExtendedISFX aaFelinaSinkBrokenREF.disable aaFelinaSinkBrokenREF.markfordelete set aaFrosthillDialogue.SinkFixed to 1
Nevermind.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没关系。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Take care now!
ESP.TRADUIT: 那就保重。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brian Jeffers [04037175] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaFrosthil_aaJeffersNeverm_0003FC81_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm here for... business.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我来这是为了...干活。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ah, a person of commerce! We welcome you with open arms! You'll find accommodations and dining at the hotel just down the street.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，一个商人！我们会张开双臂欢迎你的！你可以在街对面的旅馆找到住宿和用餐的地方。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brian Jeffers [04037175] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaFrosthil_aaJeffersHereBu_0004026F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you're seeking recreation of a more... physical nature, I kindly direct you to our saloon at the end of the street.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你想找一个更加。。。需要身体素质的消遣，请你到我们街道尽头的酒馆去看看吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brian Jeffers [04037175] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaFrosthil_aaJeffersHereBu_0004026F_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Please, just let me know if I can help in any way, or if you have questions. No question is too trifling. Take care now!
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你有什么需要我的地方，或者你有什么问题的时候，请告诉我。任何问题都是微不足道的。多多保重！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brian Jeffers [04037175] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaFrosthil_aaJeffersHereBu_0004026F_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Remain Silent>
ESP.TRADUIT: <保持沉默>

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well... um... you know, we have a fine physician, Doc Musgrove. He can... {Slowing down as if talking to mentally challenged person}he will give you happy pills, make everything better. Ok? Bye!
ESP.TRADUIT: 好...嗯...你知道，我们这儿有个很好的精神科医生，马斯格罗夫医生。他可以...{放慢语句，好像在和智障人士说话}他会给一些让你快乐的药丸，让一切都好起来的。好吗？再见！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brian Jeffers [04037175] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaFrosthil_aaJeffersHereSi_0004026D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm a bounty hunter with Randall and Associates.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是兰道尔的赏金猎人以及助手。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not one to judge someone else on their manner of occupation, but I would strongly urge you to keep that to yourself while in town.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不是一个评判别人职业态度的人，但我强烈建议你在城里的时候不要对除了自己外的人说这些。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brian Jeffers [04037175] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaFrosthil_aaJeffersHereBo_0004026E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There have been some recent... disagreements, and passions are still high with some of the population. Tact is paramount.
ESP.TRADUIT: 最近有一些。。。一些人的意见分歧和热情仍在不断的激化着。保持机智是最重要的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brian Jeffers [04037175] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaFrosthil_aaJeffersHereBo_0004026E_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've no doubt that you'll exercise good judgment and prudence when discussing your profession. Have a good stay in Frosthill!
ESP.TRADUIT: 毫无疑问，在讨论你的职业时，你应该表现出很好的判断力和谨慎。祝你在霜地能过的不错！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brian Jeffers [04037175] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaFrosthil_aaJeffersHereBo_0004026E_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I came here to kill Marko.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我来这是为了杀掉马尔科的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, you are direct. I'm not one to judge someone's business, but I would strongly urge you to keep that to yourself while in town.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，你真是直接呢。我不是一个评判别人意愿的人，但我强烈建议你在城里的时候把这事保密。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brian Jeffers [04037175] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaFrosthil_aaJeffersHereKi_00040271_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There have been some recent... disagreements, and passions are still inflamed with some of the population. Tact is paramount.
ESP.TRADUIT: 最近有一些。。。一些人的意见分歧和热情仍在不断的激化着。保持机智是最重要的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brian Jeffers [04037175] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaFrosthil_aaJeffersHereKi_00040271_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've no doubt that you'll exercise good judgment and prudence when discussing your profession. Have a good stay in Frosthill!
ESP.TRADUIT: 毫无疑问，在讨论你的职业时，你应该表现出很好的判断力和谨慎。祝你在霜地能过的不错！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brian Jeffers [04037175] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaFrosthil_aaJeffersHereKi_00040271_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm just passing through.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我只是路过。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Travelers are always welcome here! You'll find accommodations at the hotel just down the street. Nothing like a warm bed after a long trip, right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这里永远欢迎旅客！你可以在街对面的旅馆找到住处。没有什么比长途旅行后的温床更好的了，对吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brian Jeffers [04037175] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaFrosthil_aaJeffersHerePa_00040270_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you're seeking recreation of a more... physical nature, I kindly direct you to our saloon at the end of the street.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你想找一个更加。。。需要身体素质的消遣，请你到我们街道尽头的酒馆去看看吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brian Jeffers [04037175] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaFrosthil_aaJeffersHerePa_00040270_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Please, just let me know if I can help in any way, or if you have questions. Take care now!
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你有什么需要我的地方，或者你有什么问题的时候，请告诉我。任何问题都是微不足道的。多多保重！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brian Jeffers [04037175] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaFrosthil_aaJeffersHerePa_00040270_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What brought you to Frosthill?
ESP.TRADUIT: 是什么把你带到霜地的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: A variety of unforeseen circumstances, my friend. I was once a respected member of a community east of New Reno, had a good life there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 各种不可预见的情况，我的朋友。我曾经是新里诺东部一个社区的受人尊敬的成员，在那里过着美好的生活。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brian Jeffers [04037175] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaFrosthil_aaJeffersYourSt_00040272_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: When the NCR decided to annex our town, I protested in the interest of property rights, though it was merely a token gesture to aid negotiations.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当NCR决定吞并我们的城镇时，我为了财产权的利益提出了抗议，尽管这只是一个象征性的姿态来帮助谈判罢了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brian Jeffers [04037175] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaFrosthil_aaJeffersYourSt_00040272_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Unfortunately, the brahmin barons spearheading annexation didn't appreciate my subtle tactics, and interpreted it as a legitimate threat.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不幸的是，带头吞并的双头牛贵族们并不欣赏我的微妙策略，并将其解释为一种合法的威胁。（译者注：双头牛贵族为辐射2中的一个贸易组织头目）
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brian Jeffers [04037175] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaFrosthil_aaJeffersYourSt_00040272_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not a violent man, but when some clerk informed me that I was losing my land, I found the man who'd engineered my displacement and shot him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我可不是一个暴力的人，但是当某个职员告诉我我将要失去我的土地时，我找到了那个使我流离失所的人并开枪打死了他。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brian Jeffers [04037175] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaFrosthil_aaJeffersYourSt_00040272_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: In hindsight it was unforgiveably stupid, just asinine. But when you push a man too far, he will... lash out. I had no legal recourse.
ESP.TRADUIT: 事后看来，这是不可原谅的愚蠢，真的只有愚蠢。但如果你向一个人施压过多，他会。。。猛力回击的。我可没有法律上的追索权。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brian Jeffers [04037175] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaFrosthil_aaJeffersYourSt_00040272_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I had to gather my family and flee across hundreds of miles of hazardous terrain, with bounty hunters and raiders all around. It was... hellish.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不得不召集我的家人，带他们逃离数百英里的危险地带，因为到处都是赏金猎人和匪徒。就像是...地狱一般。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brian Jeffers [04037175] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaFrosthil_aaJeffersYourSt_00040272_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Frosthill saved me and my entire family. They didn't care who I was or what I had done, but helped us without hesitation or questions.
ESP.TRADUIT: 霜地救了我和我全家。他们并不在乎我是谁，也不在乎我做过什么，但是他们还是毫不犹豫地帮助了我们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brian Jeffers [04037175] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaFrosthil_aaJeffersYourSt_00040272_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It might be damn cold, but Frosthill will be my home until I die. On that note, if the NCR wants this town it will have to be over my dead body.
ESP.TRADUIT: 天气可能真的很冷，但霜地将是我的家，直到我死为止。从这点上说，如果NCR想要夺走这个城镇，那就必须站在我的尸体上。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brian Jeffers [04037175] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaFrosthil_aaJeffersYourSt_00040272_8.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaFrosthillDialogue.JeffersStory to aaFrosthillDialogue.JeffersStory +1
It has its ups and downs, but at least we're free from outside influence. Marko was kind enough to rid us of the 80's threat.
ESP.TRADUIT: 虽然生活有起有落，但至少我们没有受到外界的影响。马尔科很仁慈，他让我们摆脱了80年代帮的威胁。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brian Jeffers [04037175] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaFrosthil_aaJeffersYourSt_0004BB96_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I still don't understand why so many people are out to get him. He's been nothing but good to us since he's arrived.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我还是不明白为什么这么多人要抓他。他到了以后对我们一直很好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brian Jeffers [04037175] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaFrosthil_aaJeffersYourSt_0004BB96_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hell, none of us here can judge the man for having a rough past. Besides, he's not a youngster anymore. Age tends to change people.
ESP.TRADUIT: 见鬼，我们这里没人能判断这个人过去的坎坷。再说了，他已经不是个年轻人了。时间和年龄往往会改变人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brian Jeffers [04037175] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaFrosthil_aaJeffersYourSt_0004BB96_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Until the bounty hunters showed up, he was content to stay shacked up with his significant other, a nice young lady by the name of Polly.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在赏金猎人出现之前，他一直都很乐意和另一个重要的人呆在一起，一个叫波利的好姑娘。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brian Jeffers [04037175] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaFrosthil_aaJeffersYourSt_0004BB96_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I know you've got your reasons, but can't you just leave us alone? Do you even know Marko? Why are you doing this?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道你有你的理由，但你不能让我们平静的生活下去吗？你真的认识马尔科吗？你为什么这么做？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brian Jeffers [04037175] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaFrosthil_aaJeffersYourSt_0004BB96_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaFrosthillDialogue.JeffersStory to aaFrosthillDialogue.JeffersStory +1
How do you like being mayor?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你觉得当市长怎么样？

ESP.ORIGINAL: How'd you end up in Frosthill?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你会怎么来到霜地的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Raided for a bit in the rowdy days of my youth till I met the right lady, and ended up settling down. NCR still had a price on my head, though.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在我年轻时的吵闹日子里，我劫掠了一段时间，直到遇到了合适的女士，最后才安顿下来。不过，我对NCR来说还是有一部分赏金的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cal Vermillion [04035DD4] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaVermillionVoiceType\aaFrosthil_aaVermillionYou_00081C0B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I been here for over twelve years now, my wife was with me for like, ten of 'em. It's an imperfect town, but, you know, it's ours.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在这里已经12年了，我妻子和我在一起差不多有10年了。这是个不完美的城市，但是，你知道，这是我们的城市。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cal Vermillion [04035DD4] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaVermillionVoiceType\aaFrosthil_aaVermillionYou_00081C0B_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It was hardly any trouble until the hunters showed up, started raising hell going after Marko's boys. Ain't nothing good gonna come of it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 直到那些猎人们出现，开始向马尔科的小子们发起攻击，这才算开始有了什么麻烦。这不会有什么好结果的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cal Vermillion [04035DD4] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaVermillionVoiceType\aaFrosthil_aaVermillionYou_00081C0B_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaFrosthillDialogue.VermillionStory to 1
You got no idea. First time I saw her was in a frontier town, outside the saloon. Me and some of the crew were in town to buy supplies.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不知道。我第一次见到她是在一个边境小镇，酒馆外面。我和一些队员在城里买补给品。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cal Vermillion [04035DD4] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaVermillionVoiceType\aaFrosthil_aaVermillionYou_00084371_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: She had brown hair that cascaded past her neck, and when she turned and I saw those eyes... tiny sapphires winking at me, I knew she was the one.
ESP.TRADUIT: 她棕色的头发从脖子上垂下来，当她转过身来，我看到了她的眼睛。。。两块小小的蓝宝石在向我眨眼，我知道她就是我命中注定的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cal Vermillion [04035DD4] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaVermillionVoiceType\aaFrosthil_aaVermillionYou_00084371_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It was as if she already knew who I was, what I'd done, and didn't care. The right woman has power over a man, can make him forsake everything he is.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好像她已经知道我是谁，知道我做了什么，但她也不在乎。正确的女人对男人有很大的吸引力，大到可以让他抛弃一切。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cal Vermillion [04035DD4] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaVermillionVoiceType\aaFrosthil_aaVermillionYou_00084371_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tammy was like a cool breeze that just calmed my soul. I quit the crew and started honest work in town, finally got the nerve to talk to her.
ESP.TRADUIT: 塔米就像一阵凉风，让我的灵魂平静下来。我辞掉了我的团队，开始在镇上诚实的工作，然后终于鼓起勇气和她说话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cal Vermillion [04035DD4] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaVermillionVoiceType\aaFrosthil_aaVermillionYou_00084371_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: When she spoke to me, time itself, the very universe was irrelevant. We had a connection, right from the start. Unfortunately, her dad was sheriff.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当她和我说话的时候，不管是时间本身，还是整个宇宙都无关紧要。我们从一开始就有联系。不幸的是，她爸爸是个治安官。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cal Vermillion [04035DD4] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaVermillionVoiceType\aaFrosthil_aaVermillionYou_00084371_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He knew my background, believed I'd never change, that I'd only put Tammy in harm's way. If I was in his shoes, I might have done the same.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他知道我的背景，相信我永远都不会改变，我只会伤害塔米。不过如果我是他的话，我也会这么做的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cal Vermillion [04035DD4] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaVermillionVoiceType\aaFrosthil_aaVermillionYou_00084371_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He found out that the NCR had a bounty on my head, so he called in hunters to run me off. It was do or die, so Tammy and I eloped.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他发现NCR有悬赏挂在我头上，所以他叫猎人把我赶走。这是要生还是死，所以我和塔米私奔了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cal Vermillion [04035DD4] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaVermillionVoiceType\aaFrosthil_aaVermillionYou_00084371_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: She put all of her trust in me, and I did my damnest to honor it by protecting her, providing for her. Shit, I brought her here to do just that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 她把所有的信任都放在了我身上，而我尽了最大的努力来保护她，供养她。妈的，我带她来就是为了这个。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cal Vermillion [04035DD4] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaVermillionVoiceType\aaFrosthil_aaVermillionYou_00084371_8.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We had a lot of good years, the kind that make you forget about pain... life in general. And then the fever took her two years ago.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们有很多美好的时光，是那种会让你忘记所有痛苦的时光。。。一般生活。之后，在两年前一场高烧将她从我身边带走了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cal Vermillion [04035DD4] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaVermillionVoiceType\aaFrosthil_aaVermillionYou_00084371_9.ogg
