ESP.ORIGINAL: I buried her up in the old graveyard, up near the summit. It's colder up there, but more quiet. I visit when I can. At least I have my boy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我把她埋在山顶附近的老墓地里。那里更冷，但更安静。我只要一有时间就去看看。至少我还有我的儿子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cal Vermillion [04035DD4] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaVermillionVoiceType\aaFrosthil_aaVermillionYou_00084371_10.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sometimes I wonder if she'd still be alive if I had just... played my part, kept on raiding.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有时我在想如果我继续。。。扮演了我的角色，继续劫掠的话，她可能还会活着。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cal Vermillion [04035DD4] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaVermillionVoiceType\aaFrosthil_aaVermillionYou_00084371_11.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I often hear the question: "Can people change?" but I always ask, "Should we change?" Maybe we're on a set course for a reason. What do you think?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我经常听到这样一个问题："人们能改变吗？"但我总是问，"我们应该改变吗？"也许我们在固定航线上行驶是有原因的。你怎么认为？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cal Vermillion [04035DD4] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaVermillionVoiceType\aaFrosthil_aaVermillionYou_00084371_12.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaFrosthillDialogue.VermillionStory to 2
It must've taken a special woman to make you turn away from raiding.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一定是一个特别的女人让你远离了劫掠。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you looking for help with anything? I'm trying to find work in town.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在找人帮忙吗？我在城里想找点活儿干。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nevermind.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没关系。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, see you later.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好啊，之后见。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cal Vermillion [04035DD4] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaVermillionVoiceType\aaFrosthil_aaVermillionNev_0004027A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd like to see your wares.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想看看你的货物。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure thing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cal Vermillion [04035DD4] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaVermillionVoiceType\aaFrosthil_aaVermillionBuy_00040279_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ShowBarterMenu
I probably would have done the same.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我可能也会这么做。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then you understand. You can't put a man in some box and call it civilization. That's slavery, plain and simple. I won't live like that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那你就明白了。你不能把一个人放在某个盒子里，然后称之为文明。那是奴隶制度，简单明了。我不会像那样生活的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Big Tim Matheson [04035DD7] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaFrosthil_aaBigTimYourSto_00040287_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I would have tortured him until his last breath.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会折磨他直到他最后一口气。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then you understand. You can't put a man in some box and call it civilization. That's slavery, plain and simple. I won't live like that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那你就明白了。你不能把一个人放在某个盒子里，然后称之为文明。那是奴隶制度，简单明了。我不会像那样生活的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Big Tim Matheson [04035DD7] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaFrosthil_aaBigTimYourSto_00040288_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Remain Silent>
ESP.TRADUIT: <保持沉默>

ESP.ORIGINAL: It wasn't a rhetorical question. Do you even know what that means? Great, I just shared my life story with an idiot. What a day.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这不是一个反问句。你知道那是什么意思吗？太好了，我刚和一个白痴分享了我的人生故事。多么美好的一天。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Big Tim Matheson [04035DD7] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaFrosthil_aaBigTimYourSto_00040286_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaBigTimYourStory01TP
ESP.TRADUIT: aa大蒂姆你的故事01TP

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fuck, I believe you! I wish you had been there. You mind not looking at me like that? Christ alive, that's unsettling.
ESP.TRADUIT: 操，我相信你！我真希望你当时在那里。你介意不要那样看着我吗？基督在世，这真是太让人不安了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Big Tim Matheson [04035DD7] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaFrosthil_aaBigTimYourSto_00040289_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The only thing that would exceed his agony would be the paralyzing terror I'd instill in him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 唯一能超越他痛苦的会是我灌输给他的麻痹性恐惧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The system isn't perfect, but it's the best we have. That ranger would get his in good time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个系统并不完美，但它是我们所拥有的最好的。那个游骑兵的果报也最终会让他付出代价的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That is such fucking bullshit! He wouldn't get anything except a fucking slap on the wrist. Cocksuckers knew he did it, but they let him go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你真他妈的敢胡说！除了他妈的一记耳光，他什么也得不到。那些混蛋知道是他干的，但他们还是放了他。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Big Tim Matheson [04035DD7] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaFrosthil_aaBigTimYourSto_0004028A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You can take your system and jam it right up your fucking ass! Get the fuck out of here!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你可以把你的那套系统塞进你的屁股里了！给我他妈的滚出去！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Big Tim Matheson [04035DD7] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaFrosthil_aaBigTimYourSto_0004028A_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: In a manner of speaking, I already did it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 从某种意义上说，我已经做到了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then you understand. You can't put a man in some box and call it civilization. That's slavery, plain and simple. I won't live like that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那你就明白了。你不能把一个人放在某个盒子里，然后称之为文明。那是奴隶制度，简单明了。我不会像那样生活的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Big Tim Matheson [04035DD7] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaFrosthil_aaBigTimYourSto_00040285_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaNVB3Main03MarkoGreeting
ESP.TRADUIT: aaNVB3主线03马克问候

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh how the mighty have fallen.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，看啊，强者是如何堕落的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marko [040357E4] (mod) Quest : ([0402E668]aaNVB3Main03) And Hell Followed With Him EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main03Mar_00041B08_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You honestly can't be surprised that it's me, can you? Virgil is my favorite alias, given the literary roots.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看到我，你真的不会惊讶的，对吧？维吉尔是我最喜欢的化名，因为他有文学渊源。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marko [040357E4] (mod) Quest : ([0402E668]aaNVB3Main03) And Hell Followed With Him EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main03Mar_00041B08_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your expression right now... forgive the clich? but it truly is priceless. If Brookshire had only known what this was worth to me...
ESP.TRADUIT: 从你现在的表情来看...请原谅那些陈词滥调，但它看起来确实是无价之宝。如果布鲁克希尔知道这对我来说值多少钱的话就好了...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marko [040357E4] (mod) Quest : ([0402E668]aaNVB3Main03) And Hell Followed With Him EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main03Mar_00041B08_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's right, Brookshire wasn't inclined to consider the fate of the townspeople, much less you... when weighed against a supply of silver.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是啊，当与银矿的供应量相比较时，布鲁克希尔甚至都懒得考虑镇上居民之后的命运了，更不用说你了......
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marko [040357E4] (mod) Quest : ([0402E668]aaNVB3Main03) And Hell Followed With Him EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main03Mar_00041B08_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not sure what your political leanings are, but if you consider yourself a patriot of the NCR, that must really, really sting.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道你的政治倾向是什么，但如果你认为自己是NCR的爱国者的话，这一定非常非常让你心痛的一件事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marko [040357E4] (mod) Quest : ([0402E668]aaNVB3Main03) And Hell Followed With Him EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main03Mar_00041B08_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: In this moment of unforeseen, inconceivable reversal you must be thinking, "How did this happen?"
ESP.TRADUIT: 在这个无法预料、无法想象的逆转时刻，你一定在想，"这是怎么发生的？"
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marko [040357E4] (mod) Quest : ([0402E668]aaNVB3Main03) And Hell Followed With Him EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main03Mar_00041B08_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It boils down to one simple characteristic: resolve. When you killed Sergio, I... resolved to make you suffer to your last breath.
ESP.TRADUIT: 它归结为一个简单的特征：决心。当你杀了塞尔吉奥的时候，我就...决心让你痛苦至死。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marko [040357E4] (mod) Quest : ([0402E668]aaNVB3Main03) And Hell Followed With Him EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main03Mar_00041B08_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe you're thinking of ways to break from your binds, disarm me, kill the guards, save the day... not this time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许你在想办法挣脱束缚，解除我的武装，杀死守卫，拯救你自己。。。但恐怕这次行不通了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marko [040357E4] (mod) Quest : ([0402E668]aaNVB3Main03) And Hell Followed With Him EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main03Mar_00041B08_8.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whatever happens next, you're going to be utterly powerless to stop me. Doesn't that just burn you up?
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管接下来发生什么，你都会完全无力阻止我的。那是不是让你很恼火？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marko [040357E4] (mod) Quest : ([0402E668]aaNVB3Main03) And Hell Followed With Him EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main03Mar_00041B08_9.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you didn't have that gag, I can only imagine what you might be saying. Well, I'm a cautious fellow, so I want to be safe.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你没有那个封口布堵住嘴的话。。不过我只能想象你可能会说些什么。嗯，我是个谨慎的人，所以我想保持安全。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marko [040357E4] (mod) Quest : ([0402E668]aaNVB3Main03) And Hell Followed With Him EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main03Mar_00041B08_10.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can't risk any interruptions during my theatrics. Nothing is worse that a disruptive audience.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不能冒险在表演时让人插嘴。没有比引起骚乱的观众更糟糕的事情了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marko [040357E4] (mod) Quest : ([0402E668]aaNVB3Main03) And Hell Followed With Him EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main03Mar_00041B08_11.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Main03.MarkoGreeted to 99 aaMarkoREF.evp set aaNVB3Main03.SetShotTimer to 1
Oh how the mighty have fallen.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，看啊，强者是如何堕落的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marko [040357E4] (mod) Quest : ([0402E668]aaNVB3Main03) And Hell Followed With Him EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main03Mar_00048BE4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You honestly can't be surprised that it's me, can you? Virgil is my favorite alias, given the literary roots.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看到我，你真的不会惊讶的，对吧？维吉尔是我最喜欢的化名，因为他有文学渊源。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marko [040357E4] (mod) Quest : ([0402E668]aaNVB3Main03) And Hell Followed With Him EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main03Mar_00048BE4_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your expression right now... forgive the cliche, but it truly is priceless. If Brookshire had only known what this was worth to me...
ESP.TRADUIT: 从你现在的表情来看。。。请原谅那些陈词滥调，但它看起来确实是无价之宝。如果布鲁克郡知道这对我来说值多少钱的话就好了...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marko [040357E4] (mod) Quest : ([0402E668]aaNVB3Main03) And Hell Followed With Him EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main03Mar_00048BE4_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's right, Brookshire wasn't inclined to consider the fate of the townspeople, much less you... when weighed against a supply of silver.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是啊，当与银矿的供应量相比较时，布鲁克希尔甚至都懒得考虑镇上居民之后的命运了，更不用说你了......
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marko [040357E4] (mod) Quest : ([0402E668]aaNVB3Main03) And Hell Followed With Him EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main03Mar_00048BE4_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not sure what your political leanings are, but if you consider yourself a patriot of the NCR, that must really, really sting.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道你的政治倾向是什么，但如果你认为自己是NCR的爱国者的话，这一定非常非常让你心痛的一件事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marko [040357E4] (mod) Quest : ([0402E668]aaNVB3Main03) And Hell Followed With Him EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main03Mar_00048BE4_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: In this moment of unforeseen, inconceivable reversal you must be thinking, "How did this happen?"
ESP.TRADUIT: 在这个无法预料、无法想象的逆转时刻，你一定在想，"这是怎么发生的？"
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marko [040357E4] (mod) Quest : ([0402E668]aaNVB3Main03) And Hell Followed With Him EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main03Mar_00048BE4_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It boils down to one simple characteristic: resolve. When you killed Sergio, I... resolved to make you suffer to your last breath.
ESP.TRADUIT: 它归结为一个简单的特征：决心。当你杀了塞尔吉奥的时候，我就...决心让你痛苦至死。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marko [040357E4] (mod) Quest : ([0402E668]aaNVB3Main03) And Hell Followed With Him EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main03Mar_00048BE4_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe you're thinking of ways to break from your binds, disarm me, kill the guards, save the day... not this time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许你在想办法挣脱束缚，解除我的武装，杀死守卫，拯救你自己。。。但恐怕这次行不通了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marko [040357E4] (mod) Quest : ([0402E668]aaNVB3Main03) And Hell Followed With Him EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main03Mar_00048BE4_8.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whatever happens next, you're going to be utterly powerless to stop me. Doesn't that just burn you up?
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管接下来发生什么，你都会完全无力阻止我的。那是不是让你很恼火？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marko [040357E4] (mod) Quest : ([0402E668]aaNVB3Main03) And Hell Followed With Him EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main03Mar_00048BE4_9.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你没有那个封口布堵住嘴的话。。不过我只能想象你可能会说些什么。嗯，我是个谨慎的人，所以我想保持安全。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marko [040357E4] (mod) Quest : ([0402E668]aaNVB3Main03) And Hell Followed With Him EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main03Mar_00048BE4_10.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can't risk any interruptions during my theatrics. Nothing is worse that a disruptive audience.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不能冒险在表演时让人插嘴。没有比引起骚乱的观众更糟糕的事情了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marko [040357E4] (mod) Quest : ([0402E668]aaNVB3Main03) And Hell Followed With Him EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main03Mar_00048BE4_11.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, and sorry about your friend. I took the liberty of burying the body. Just thought you would want to know.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，对你的朋友我也很抱歉。我擅自埋葬了他的尸体。我只是想让你知道罢了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marko [040357E4] (mod) Quest : ([0402E668]aaNVB3Main03) And Hell Followed With Him EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main03Mar_00048BE4_12.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Main03.MarkoGreeted to 99 aaMarkoREF.evp set aaNVB3Main03.SetShotTimer to 1
Oh how the mighty have fallen.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，看啊，强者是如何堕落的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marko [040357E4] (mod) Quest : ([0402E668]aaNVB3Main03) And Hell Followed With Him EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main03Mar_00048BE5_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 不管接下来发生什么，你都会完全无力阻止我的。那是不是让你很恼火？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marko [040357E4] (mod) Quest : ([0402E668]aaNVB3Main03) And Hell Followed With Him EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main03Mar_00048BE5_9.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你没有那个封口布堵住嘴的话。。不过我只能想象你可能会说些什么。嗯，我是个谨慎的人，所以我想保持安全。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marko [040357E4] (mod) Quest : ([0402E668]aaNVB3Main03) And Hell Followed With Him EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main03Mar_00048BE5_10.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can't risk any interruptions during my theatrics. Nothing is worse that a disruptive audience.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不能冒险在表演时让人插嘴。没有比引起骚乱的观众更糟糕的事情了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marko [040357E4] (mod) Quest : ([0402E668]aaNVB3Main03) And Hell Followed With Him EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main03Mar_00048BE5_11.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, in case you were looking over your shoulder for companions to save you, I'm afraid it's out of the question.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，如果你想要你背后的同伴救你的话，恐怕那是不可能的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marko [040357E4] (mod) Quest : ([0402E668]aaNVB3Main03) And Hell Followed With Him EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main03Mar_00048BE5_12.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's no delicate way to put this... I gunned your friends down like dogs, though they fought admirably.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没什么好办法把这个。。。我像狗一样把你的朋友都打死了，尽管他们都抗争的很好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marko [040357E4] (mod) Quest : ([0402E668]aaNVB3Main03) And Hell Followed With Him EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main03Mar_00048BE5_13.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Main03.MarkoGreeted to 99 aaMarkoREF.evp set aaNVB3Main03.SetShotTimer to 1
Ah, right through the hands. That does look painful. You won't be opening any jars again, much less handling a weapon.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，就是用这双手。看起来那确实很痛苦啊。不过你没法再打开任何罐子了，更不用说拿武器了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marko [040357E4] (mod) Quest : ([0402E668]aaNVB3Main03) And Hell Followed With Him EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main03Mar_00041B10_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Even with the pain, I wonder if you're consumed by rage... or dread. Neither benefits you, but dread suggests an honesty that I have to admire.
ESP.TRADUIT: 即使这么痛苦，我也不知道你是否真的被愤怒吞噬了。。。或者是恐惧？这两者都不利于你，但恐惧意味着真诚，那会是我不得不佩服的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marko [040357E4] (mod) Quest : ([0402E668]aaNVB3Main03) And Hell Followed With Him EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main03Mar_00041B10_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Were you expecting a fair fight? A climactic showdown in the street? Sergio tried it that way, didn't he? My brother had heart, I'll give him that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在期待一场公平的战斗吗？就像在街上进行一场激动人心的决胜？塞尔吉奥试过了，不是吗？我兄弟很有勇气，我会为他报仇的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marko [040357E4] (mod) Quest : ([0402E668]aaNVB3Main03) And Hell Followed With Him EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main03Mar_00041B10_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've never had a mind for fair fights, though I've won my share. I prefer domination... and most importantly, survival. That's all that matters.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我从来没有想过公平竞争，尽管我赢得了我的份额。但我更喜欢支配。。。最重要的是生存。这才是最重要的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marko [040357E4] (mod) Quest : ([0402E668]aaNVB3Main03) And Hell Followed With Him EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main03Mar_00041B10_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You want to speak, don't you? No doubt you have a pithy retort or some eloquent overture prepared that would convince me to throw down my arms.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你想说话，不是吗？毫无疑问的，你会进行一次精辟的辩驳或拉开一些辩论的序曲，准备说服我放下武器。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marko [040357E4] (mod) Quest : ([0402E668]aaNVB3Main03) And Hell Followed With Him EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main03Mar_00041B10_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not tonight. This time you'll be silent, like a dog following its owner. When this is over, you'll acknowledge me as your master.
ESP.TRADUIT: 至少今晚不行。这一次你会永远沉默的，就像狗跟着它的主人一样。当这一切结束后，你会承认我就是你的主人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marko [040357E4] (mod) Quest : ([0402E668]aaNVB3Main03) And Hell Followed With Him EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main03Mar_00041B10_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Quiet}You're going to beg for death. You'll pray to God for it to end, but he won't listen. Only when you pray to me will you gain release.
ESP.TRADUIT: {安静}你想要乞求死亡。你会祈求上帝让这噩梦结束的，但他却充耳不闻。只有当你向我祈祷时，你才能得到解放。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marko [040357E4] (mod) Quest : ([0402E668]aaNVB3Main03) And Hell Followed With Him EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main03Mar_00041B10_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But that can wait. Right now I'm an official agent of the New California Republic, warden of their new outpost in Frosthill.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但那可以等很久。现在我是新加州共和国的官方特工，是他们在霜地的新哨所的典狱长。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marko [040357E4] (mod) Quest : ([0402E668]aaNVB3Main03) And Hell Followed With Him EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main03Mar_00041B10_8.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: In my administration, law and order will be upheld without exception. Why not get off to a strong start here and now?
ESP.TRADUIT: 在我的政府中，法律和秩序将毫无例外地得到维护。为什么不从此时此刻开始呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marko [040357E4] (mod) Quest : ([0402E668]aaNVB3Main03) And Hell Followed With Him EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main03Mar_00041B10_9.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Main03.MarkoGreeted to 5 aaMarkoREF.evp ;captured citizens beg for mercy
Did you see that one coming? The newfound love of your life killed like a dog... and you unable to do a thing. Ah, the misery of it all.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你看到果报的到来了吗？那些在你生命中找到的新的爱恋，当它们像狗一样被杀死的时候。。。你却什么也做不了。啊，多美妙啊，这一切的痛苦。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marko [040357E4] (mod) Quest : ([0402E668]aaNVB3Main03) And Hell Followed With Him EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main03Mar_00041B1D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe you'll think of her when your time comes, hoping for some type of otherworldly reunion. I'd rather have a dog in the afterlife, personally.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许到了你死期的时候你会想起她，希望你们能有一种超凡脱俗的重逢。而我宁愿死后养条狗，就我个人而言。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marko [040357E4] (mod) Quest : ([0402E668]aaNVB3Main03) And Hell Followed With Him EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main03Mar_00041B1D_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Main03.MarkoGreeted to 21 aaMarkoREF.evp
Now... what are we going to do with you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在。。。我们要拿你怎么办？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marko [040357E4] (mod) Quest : ([0402E668]aaNVB3Main03) And Hell Followed With Him EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main03Mar_00041B1E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I could put a round in your head, make it quick, clean. Then again, that's been tried. I don't fear failure so much as being... unoriginal.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我可以在你脑子里装上一颗子弹，让它迅速，干净的解决你。但那已经被试过了不是么。我虽然不怕失败，但讨厌。。。没有自己创意的手法。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marko [040357E4] (mod) Quest : ([0402E668]aaNVB3Main03) And Hell Followed With Him EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main03Mar_00041B1E_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, I've got something better in mind. You ever heard stories of drunks being buried alive?
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，我有更好的主意。你听说过那些醉汉被活埋的故事吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marko [040357E4] (mod) Quest : ([0402E668]aaNVB3Main03) And Hell Followed With Him EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main03Mar_00041B1E_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Since you're not in a position to speak, I'll take your indignant squinting as a 'yes', so I'll continue.
ESP.TRADUIT: 既然你不能说话，我就把你愤怒的眯眼当作是肯定的回答，所以我就继续说下去了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marko [040357E4] (mod) Quest : ([0402E668]aaNVB3Main03) And Hell Followed With Him EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main03Mar_00041B1E_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: When a man is buried alive in say, a coffin, he might have thirty minutes or so to live. Trust me, I know. I've seen it firsthand.
ESP.TRADUIT: 人们认为，当一个人被活埋在棺材里，他可能有30分钟左右的时间。相信我，我知道的。因为我亲眼见证过。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marko [040357E4] (mod) Quest : ([0402E668]aaNVB3Main03) And Hell Followed With Him EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main03Mar_00041B1E_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's one heck of an interrogation technique, acting like you're burying them. I leave them down there for a bit, then pull them up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是一个很好的审问技巧，就像你在禽兽埋葬他们一样。我会把它们放在泥土下一段时间，然后再把他们拉上来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marko [040357E4] (mod) Quest : ([0402E668]aaNVB3Main03) And Hell Followed With Him EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main03Mar_00041B1E_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They always come up gasping, a few even lose their minds in that short span. I guess it's the darkness... and the noise.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们总是上气不接下气，有几个人甚至在那短短的时间里失去了理智。我想是黑暗。。。还有那些噪音让他们发疯。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marko [040357E4] (mod) Quest : ([0402E668]aaNVB3Main03) And Hell Followed With Him EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main03Mar_00041B1E_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Imagine... your breathing is strained, dust fills your mouth and eyes, and you hear the weight of earth shifting above you. It's inexorable death.
ESP.TRADUIT: 想象一下...你呼吸紧张，而灰尘会塞满你的嘴巴和眼睛，你能听到大地的重量在你上方移动。这才是最无情的死亡。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marko [040357E4] (mod) Quest : ([0402E668]aaNVB3Main03) And Hell Followed With Him EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main03Mar_00041B1E_8.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's why I saved you for last... I want you to feel that terror as you dwell on what transpired here tonight, how you were beaten.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以我会把你留到最后的。。。我想让你感受到那种恐惧，因为你会沉湎于今晚发生的事情，意识停留在你是如何被打败的这一刻。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marko [040357E4] (mod) Quest : ([0402E668]aaNVB3Main03) And Hell Followed With Him EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main03Mar_00041B1E_9.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No matter how hard you are, the terror will take you eventually. In that moment, when you're wishing for it all to end, just remember...
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管你有多努力，恐惧终究会夺走你的意志。在那一刻，当你希望一切结束的时候，要记住。。。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marko [040357E4] (mod) Quest : ([0402E668]aaNVB3Main03) And Hell Followed With Him EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main03Mar_00041B1E_10.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Quiet}I was one the man who beat you, and that's what people will remember, what they'll say for years to come.
ESP.TRADUIT: {安静}我就是那个打败你的人，这是所有人都会记住的事情，也是他们在未来几年里会一直脍炙人口的事情。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marko [040357E4] (mod) Quest : ([0402E668]aaNVB3Main03) And Hell Followed With Him EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main03Mar_00041B1E_11.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It isn't just your body that I'm burying tonight. It's your legend.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我今晚埋葬的不只有你的身体。而是你的传奇。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marko [040357E4] (mod) Quest : ([0402E668]aaNVB3Main03) And Hell Followed With Him EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main03Mar_00041B1E_12.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Main03.MarkoGreeted to 41 aaMarkoREF.evp
INCOMPLETE: Player Finale
ESP.TRADUIT: 未完成：玩家结局
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marko [040357E4] (mod) Quest : ([0402E668]aaNVB3Main03) And Hell Followed With Him EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Main03.MarkoGreeted to 51 aaMarkoREF.evp
aaNVB3Main03MarkoShootHands
ESP.TRADUIT: aaNVB3主线马克射击手

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can't risk any interruptions during my theatrics. Nothing is worse that a disruptive audience.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不能冒险在表演时让人插嘴。没有比引起骚乱的观众更糟糕的事情了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marko [040357E4] (mod) Quest : ([0402E668]aaNVB3Main03) And Hell Followed With Him EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaMarkoREF.UseWeapon aaMarko44Revolver aaMarkoIntroMarkerREF aaMarkoHandTarget01REF 1 0 0 0 0 player.say hit player.DamageActorValue LeftAttackCondition 100 aaMarkoRef.Sayto player aaNVB3Main03MarkoShootOtherHand
aaNVB3Main03MarkoShootOtherHand
ESP.TRADUIT: aaNVB3主线03马克射击另一只手

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now there, just breathe and try not to think about it. If you're lucky you'll go into shock soon. Just be still for one more moment...
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在，呼吸，尽量不去想它。如果你幸运的话，你很快就会休克的。再安静一会儿。。。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marko [040357E4] (mod) Quest : ([0402E668]aaNVB3Main03) And Hell Followed With Him EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaMarkoREF.UseWeapon aaMarko44Revolver aaMarkoIntroMarkerREF aaMarkoHandTarget01REF 1 0 0 0 0
aaNVB3Main03MarkoSentence
ESP.TRADUIT: aaNVB3主线03马克句子

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Clears throat}By the powers invested in me by the New California Republic, I hereby authorize these agents of the justice system to collect on lawful bounties.
ESP.TRADUIT: {清嗓子}根据新加州共和国赋予我的权力，我在此授权这些司法系统的代理人以合法的赏金收受。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marko [040357E4] (mod) Quest : ([0402E668]aaNVB3Main03) And Hell Followed With Him EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main03Mar_00041B13_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaLoriREF.Say aaNVB3Main03TownBeg ;aaStoudenmireREF.Say aaNVB3Main03TownBeg ;aaDoctorMusgroveREF.say aaNVB3Main03TownBeg ;aaFelinaREF.say aaNVB3Main03TownBeg ;aaBrianJeffersREF.say aaNVB3Main03TownBeg ;aaBrimleyREF.say aaNVB3Main03TownBeg ;aaBigTimREF.say aaNVB3Main03TownBeg ;aaVasquezREF.say aaNVB3Main03TownBeg
set aaNVB3Main03.MarkoGreeted to 75 aaMarkoREF.evp setenemy aaBountyHunterFaction aaFrosthillFaction set aaNVB3Main03.DoOnce to 1; timer aaVasquezREF.say aaNVB3Main03TownBeg
aaNVB3Main03CitizenPlead
ESP.TRADUIT: aaNVB3主线03市民祈求

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaNVB3Main03MarkoAllAccording
ESP.TRADUIT: aaNVB3主线03马克都想管

ESP.ORIGINAL: So it was done... all according to the law.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以该做的都做了。。。这一切都是合法的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marko [040357E4] (mod) Quest : ([0402E668]aaNVB3Main03) And Hell Followed With Him EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main03Mar_00041B19_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: if aaFrosthillDialogue.FelinaSex == 15 set aaNVB3Main03.MarkoGreeted to 7 aaMarkoREF.evp elseif aaFrosthillDialogue.FelinaInseminated == 1 set aaNVB3Main03.MarkoGreeted to 7 aaMarkoREF.evp else set aaNVB3Main03.MarkoGreeted to 21 aaMarkoREF.evp endif
aaNVB3Main03MarkoTorment
ESP.TRADUIT: aaNVB3主线03马克折磨

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ah, sweet Felina. A beautiful, tender flower if there ever was one. The Courier really cared for you. I can see why.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，亲爱的费琳娜。多么一朵美丽的，柔嫩的花呢，如果那里还会有的话。看来那个邮差真的很关心你啊。我想我知道为什么了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marko [040357E4] (mod) Quest : ([0402E668]aaNVB3Main03) And Hell Followed With Him EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main03Mar_00041B24_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Main03.MarkoGreeted to 8 aaFelinaREF.sayto aaMarkoREF aaNVB3Main03MarkoTorment
Please, please don't do this. I... I am with child. He doesn't know. I was going to tell him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 求你了，别这样。我 。。。我有他的孩子了。他不知道。而我正要告诉他。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felina Robbins [04017DBB] (mod) Quest : ([0402E668]aaNVB3Main03) And Hell Followed With Him EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Main03.MarkoGreeted to 9 aaMarkoREF.sayto aaFelinaREF aaNVB3Main03MarkoTorment
Please, please don't do this. We were going to leave and start over. Just let us go, you'll never see us again, I swear it!
ESP.TRADUIT: 求你了，别这样。我们正要离开，重新开始呢。让我们走吧，你再也见不到我们了，我发誓！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felina Robbins [04017DBB] (mod) Quest : ([0402E668]aaNVB3Main03) And Hell Followed With Him EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Main03.MarkoGreeted to 9 aaMarkoREF.sayto aaFelinaREF aaNVB3Main03MarkoTorment
Did I hear that right? You... you're pregnant? Well, this day just keeps getting better and better!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我没听错吧？你。。。你怀孕了？好吧，我今天真是越来越走运了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marko [040357E4] (mod) Quest : ([0402E668]aaNVB3Main03) And Hell Followed With Him EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main03Mar_00041B27_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Main03.MarkoGreeted to 10 aaMarkoREF.startconversation player, aaNVB3Main03MarkoTorment
Don't worry, honey. It will be over soon... for you, at least.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别担心，亲爱的。这很快就会结束。。。至少对你来说。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marko [040357E4] (mod) Quest : ([0402E668]aaNVB3Main03) And Hell Followed With Him EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main03Mar_00041B28_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Main03.MarkoGreeted to 10 aaFelinaREF.addtofaction aaFrosthillFaction 1 aaMarkoREF.SetRestrained 1
You didn't know, did you? Not in my wildest dreams could I have seen my plan coming to fruition like this. Magnificent!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你真的不知道，是吗？我做梦也没想到我的计划会这样实现。这真是太棒了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marko [040357E4] (mod) Quest : ([0402E668]aaNVB3Main03) And Hell Followed With Him EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main03Mar_00041B2A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What would you do to save her life, I wonder? Or the life of the brood squirming in her belly? Would you trade your own life for theirs?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想知道，你会做什么来挽救她的生命？还是那只在她肚子里蠕动的幼儿的生命？你愿意用自己的生命换取他们的生命吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marko [040357E4] (mod) Quest : ([0402E668]aaNVB3Main03) And Hell Followed With Him EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main03Mar_00041B2A_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Main03.MarkoGreeted to 11
Randall, Randall, Randall. You came so far only to taste the bitterness of defeat again. Deep down, you knew it would end this way.
ESP.TRADUIT: 兰道尔，兰道尔啊，兰道尔啊。。。你到这里来只是为了再次尝到失败的苦味。在内心深处，你本就知道事情会这样结束的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marko [040357E4] (mod) Quest : ([0402E668]aaNVB3Main03) And Hell Followed With Him EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main03Mar_00041B33_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Main03.MarkoGreeted to 22 ;set aaNVB3Main03.RandallTorment to 1 ;aaMarkoREF.SayTO aaNVB3RandallREF aaNVB3Main03MarkoTorment set aaNVB3Main03.RandallTorment to 6 aaMarkoREF.say aaNVB3Main03FordInteract
You remember when I killed your family, don't you? Is it worse knowing that you came so close, yet you were still unable to stop me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你还记得我杀了你家人的事情，是吗？知道自己离我这么近，却仍然阻止不了我，是不是让事情更糟了？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marko [040357E4] (mod) Quest : ([0402E668]aaNVB3Main03) And Hell Followed With Him

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Main03.RandallTorment to 2 aaMarkoREF.SayTO aaNVB3RandallREF aaNVB3Main03MarkoTorment
I imagine you've got a few choice words you'd like to say right now. I'll pass on your profane raving, thank you very much.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想你现在有几句话要说。而我会转告你的亵渎的，非常感谢你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marko [040357E4] (mod) Quest : ([0402E668]aaNVB3Main03) And Hell Followed With Him

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Main03.RandallTorment to 3 aaMarkoREF.SayTO aaNVB3RandallREF aaNVB3Main03MarkoTorment
You were just a dumb hick that was chosen by sheer chance. It wasn't personal, really. It boiled down to you or me that night.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你只是个愚蠢的乡巴佬罢了，完全是偶然被选中的。哦，这不是针对你个人的，真的。那天晚上决定事情的关键是你还是我呢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marko [040357E4] (mod) Quest : ([0402E668]aaNVB3Main03) And Hell Followed With Him

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Main03.RandallTorment to 4 aaMarkoREF.SayTO aaNVB3RandallREF aaNVB3Main03MarkoTorment
Now look at you. A battle-scarred killer who's endured more than I can imagine. At least I gave you an interesting life.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在看看你。一个饱受战争创伤的杀手，还承受了我无法想象的痛苦。至少我给了你一个有趣的生活不是吗。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marko [040357E4] (mod) Quest : ([0402E668]aaNVB3Main03) And Hell Followed With Him

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Main03.RandallTorment to 5 aaMarkoREF.SayTO aaNVB3RandallREF aaNVB3Main03MarkoTorment
I have to admit, I admire your persistence after all these years. I'll make it quick for you, which is more than I can say for your protege.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不得不承认，我钦佩你这么多年来的坚持。比起我要对你门徒做的事情，我会尽快让你解脱的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marko [040357E4] (mod) Quest : ([0402E668]aaNVB3Main03) And Hell Followed With Him

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Main03.RandallTorment to 6 aaMarkoREF.say aaNVB3Main03FordInteract
<Nod your head in agreement>
ESP.TRADUIT: <点头表示同意>

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're good man, Courier. Not good enough, though.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是好人，邮差。不过，还不够好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marko [040357E4] (mod) Quest : ([0402E668]aaNVB3Main03) And Hell Followed With Him EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main03Mar_00041B2F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Main03.MarkoGreeted to 15 aaFelinaREF.addtofaction aaFrosthillFaction 1 aaMarkoREF.SetRestrained 1
<Shake your head in disagreement>
ESP.TRADUIT: <不同意的摇头>

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wow, even now you're holding onto self-preservation! That takes a different sort of courage. You aren't afraid of being called a coward, huh?
ESP.TRADUIT: 哇，即使现在你还在坚持自我保护！那需要另一种勇气。你不怕别人叫你懦夫，是吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marko [040357E4] (mod) Quest : ([0402E668]aaNVB3Main03) And Hell Followed With Him EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main03Mar_00041B32_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: A lot of men aren't brave enough to recognize how much they value their life. Too bad, sweetheart. He would have been a lousy husband, anyway.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很多男人没有勇气认识到自己有多珍惜自己生命。这太糟了，亲爱的。无论如何，他会是个糟糕的丈夫。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marko [040357E4] (mod) Quest : ([0402E668]aaNVB3Main03) And Hell Followed With Him EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main03Mar_00041B32_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Main03.MarkoGreeted to 15 aaFelinaREF.addtofaction aaFrosthillFaction 1 aaMarkoREF.SetRestrained 1
<Remain Still>
ESP.TRADUIT: <保持沉默>

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nothing, not one hint of emotion? There's a true stoic, Felina. Fortunately you won't have to marry him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么都没有，你难道没有一点人类的感情？看那，这里有一个真正的超脱泰然之人，费利娜。幸运的是你不用嫁给他。 （译者注：斯多葛派人：stoic，指对痛苦或困难能默默承受或泰然处之的人）
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marko [040357E4] (mod) Quest : ([0402E668]aaNVB3Main03) And Hell Followed With Him EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main03Mar_00041B31_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Main03.MarkoGreeted to 15 aaFelinaREF.addtofaction aaFrosthillFaction 1 aaMarkoREF.SetRestrained 1
<Shake violently and attempt to stand>
ESP.TRADUIT: <剧烈摇晃并试图站立>

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wow, you just don't know when to give up, do you? You always had all the heart in the world, but never enough foresight.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哇，你就是不知道什么时候该放弃，是吗？你的心一直都在这个世界上，但你从来没有足够的远见。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marko [040357E4] (mod) Quest : ([0402E668]aaNVB3Main03) And Hell Followed With Him EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main03Mar_00041B30_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Main03.MarkoGreeted to 15 aaFelinaREF.addtofaction aaFrosthillFaction 1 aaMarkoREF.SetRestrained 1
aaNVB3Main03FordInteract
ESP.TRADUIT: aaNVB3主线03福特反应

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ford, you were quite eager to betray Mr. Randall. Why don't you do the honors?
ESP.TRADUIT: 福特，你真的很想背叛兰道尔先生。为什么不是你来获得这次的荣誉呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marko [040357E4] (mod) Quest : ([0402E668]aaNVB3Main03) And Hell Followed With Him EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main03For_0004682C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Main03.FordBark to 1 aaFordTownREF.stopcombat aaFordTownREF.removescriptpackage aaFordHoverCapturedPlayerPackage aaFordTownREF.addscriptpackage aaFordTravelToExecutePackage aaFordTownREF.evp
aaNVB3Main03FordPostRandall
ESP.TRADUIT: aaNVB3主线03福特兰道尔死后

ESP.ORIGINAL: You sonofabitch!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你个婊子养得！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ford [0403401E] (mod) Quest : ([0402E668]aaNVB3Main03) And Hell Followed With Him EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaFordVoiceType\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main03For_00046E1B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ;Marko says something snarky
aaNVB3Main03MarkoAcknowledge
ESP.TRADUIT: aaNVB3主线03马克了解

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaNVB3Main03MarkoFuckYou
ESP.TRADUIT: aaNVB3主线03马克去你妈的

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaNVB3Main03MarkoWhateverItTakes
ESP.TRADUIT: aaNVB3主线03马克无论如何发生了

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaNVB3Main03MarkoSilent
ESP.TRADUIT: aaNVB3主线03马克保持沉默

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaNVB3Main03MarkoWhy
ESP.TRADUIT: aaNVB3主线03马克为什么

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaNVB3Main03MarkoJustKillMe
ESP.TRADUIT: aaNVB3主线03马克杀了我吧

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaNVB3Main03MarkoWhatYouDo
ESP.TRADUIT: aaNVB3主线03马克你要怎么

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaNVB3Main04BuryBark
ESP.TRADUIT: aaNVB3主线04白长对话

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey, boss, you sure you don't want me to shoot 'em first?
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿，老大，你确定你不想让我先开枪射他们？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mike from Maintenance [0402E6FB] (mod) Quest : ([04035DD8]aaNVB3Main04) Ain't No Grave EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main04Bur_0004C835_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Main04.CoffinBark to 1 aaCaptor05REF.sayto player aaNVB3Main04BuryBark
{Marko}No, I want the Courier to suffer to the last. {Louder so Courier can hear it}You hear that, friend? Of course you can, even with that hood on. Is the coffin comfy?
ESP.TRADUIT: {马尔科不，我要那个邮差吃亏到最后。{声音大一点，这样那邮差就能听到它}你听到了吗，朋友？你当然可以，即使你戴着帽子。那顶棺材舒服吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mike from Maintenance [0402E6FB] (mod) Quest : ([04035DD8]aaNVB3Main04) Ain't No Grave EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main04Bur_0004C838_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Main04.CoffinBark to 2 aaCaptor05REF.sayto player aaNVB3Main04BuryBark
{Closer to Courier, speaking softly}Just so you know, I'm putting you in an unmarked grave in the middle of nowhere. From a legal standpoint, you will have simply... vanished.
ESP.TRADUIT: {靠近那个邮差，轻声点儿说话}你知道的，我会把你放在一个没有标记的坟墓里。从法律的角度来看，你只需要。。。消失就行了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mike from Maintenance [0402E6FB] (mod) Quest : ([04035DD8]aaNVB3Main04) Ain't No Grave EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main04Bur_0004C839_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Main04.CoffinBark to 3 aaCaptor05REF.sayto player aaNVB3Main04BuryBark
You're going to be just another anonymous stiff. You afraid now? Just let it wash over you, don't fight it. You're so close to the end.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你将成为另一个匿名的呆子。你现在害怕了？就让它冲过你，不要反抗死亡了。因为你就快结束了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mike from Maintenance [0402E6FB] (mod) Quest : ([04035DD8]aaNVB3Main04) Ain't No Grave EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main04Bur_0004C83A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Main04.CoffinBark to 4 aaCaptor05REF.sayto player aaNVB3Main04BuryBark
I wonder how you might have molded the Mojave if you'd lived. I'm sure people will speculate to no end.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想知道如果你还活着的话，你会怎么继续塑造莫哈维。我相信人们会一直猜测下去的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mike from Maintenance [0402E6FB] (mod) Quest : ([04035DD8]aaNVB3Main04) Ain't No Grave EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main04Bur_0004C83B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Main04.CoffinBark to 5 aaCaptor05REF.sayto player aaNVB3Main04BuryBark
They'll forget you, though... they always do. At this moment of acute reflection, I wonder if you appreciate the futility of your efforts.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是他们会忘记你的。。。他们总是这样。在这个深思熟虑的时刻，我想知道的是，你是否理解你的努力是徒劳的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mike from Maintenance [0402E6FB] (mod) Quest : ([04035DD8]aaNVB3Main04) Ain't No Grave EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main04Bur_0004C83C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Main04.CoffinBark to 6 aaCaptor05REF.sayto player aaNVB3Main04BuryBark
Your mentor is dead. Really dead. I'll face no legal or governmental consequences - quite the contrary.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的导师已经死了。他真的死了！我不会面临任何法律或政府给我带来的审判——恰恰相反。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mike from Maintenance [0402E6FB] (mod) Quest : ([04035DD8]aaNVB3Main04) Ain't No Grave EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main04Bur_0004C83D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Main04.CoffinBark to 7 aaCaptor05REF.sayto player aaNVB3Main04BuryBark
I'll become a respected citizen... leading this town while the worms gnaw on your rotting corpse. You remember that when the air thins out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会成为一个受人尊敬的公民。。。而当那些虫子在你腐烂的尸体上啃食你骨肉的时候，我会领导这个镇。你记得当空气越来越稀薄的那些时刻，那会成为你最后的记忆。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mike from Maintenance [0402E6FB] (mod) Quest : ([04035DD8]aaNVB3Main04) Ain't No Grave EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main04Bur_0004C83E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Main04.CoffinBark to 8 aaCaptor05REF.sayto player aaNVB3Main04BuryBark
If you could do it all over again, would you even come here? {Drawn-out}So much to ponder in the darkness. Rest easy. Close it up, boys.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你能重来一遍，你还会来这里吗？{他把手抽了出来}你在黑暗中有太多的想法可以做了。别紧张。把它关上吧，孩子们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mike from Maintenance [0402E6FB] (mod) Quest : ([04035DD8]aaNVB3Main04) Ain't No Grave EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main04Bur_0004C83F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Main04.CoffinBark to 9 aaCaptor04REF.sayto player aaNVB3Main04BuryBark aaCaptor06REF.sayto player aaNVB3Main04MoreFXTopic playsound aaNailsDriven01
<Wood moving, hammers driving nails>
ESP.TRADUIT: <木板变成盖子，铁锤敲打钉子>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mike from Maintenance [0402E6FB] (mod) Quest : ([04035DD8]aaNVB3Main04) Ain't No Grave EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main04Bur_0004C840_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Main04.CoffinBark to 10 aaCaptor06REF.sayto player aaNVB3Main04BuryBark aaCaptor04REF.sayto player aaNVB3Main04Dig01Topic aaCaptor05REF.saytoplayer aaNVB3Main04Dig02Topic playsound aaDigging01
<Dirt being piled on coffin>
ESP.TRADUIT: <泥土开始缓慢但切实的堆在棺材上>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mike from Maintenance [0402E6FB] (mod) Quest : ([04035DD8]aaNVB3Main04) Ain't No Grave EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main04Bur_0004C841_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Main04.CoffinBark to 15 ;Ideal spot to play bink?
aaNVB3Main05MarkoGreeting
ESP.TRADUIT: aaNVB3Main05马克迎宾

ESP.ORIGINAL: How in the...
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是如何在。。。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marko [040357E4] (mod) Quest : ([04035DD8]aaNVB3Main04) Ain't No Grave EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main05Mar_0004AF7F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I should have known. I deliberately provided simple instructions, yet people can't manage if I'm not supervising. I do hate leadership at times.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我早该知道的。我故意提供简单的指导，但如果我不监督，人们就无法被管理。我有时确实讨厌领导。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marko [040357E4] (mod) Quest : ([04035DD8]aaNVB3Main04) Ain't No Grave EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main05Mar_0004AF7F_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's no way you can be healed up. Why even come here? You can't win this fight. You're broken and alone. You lost.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不可能痊愈的。为什么你还要来这里呢？你根本赢不了这场比赛。你已经崩溃了。所以你输了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marko [040357E4] (mod) Quest : ([04035DD8]aaNVB3Main04) Ain't No Grave EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main05Mar_0004AF7F_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You could have walked out of this canyon, and I'd never have given you a second thought. Apparently I'm just not good at vengeance.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你本可以走出这个峡谷的，而我，也不会再考虑你了。显然我只是不擅长复仇罢了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marko [040357E4] (mod) Quest : ([04035DD8]aaNVB3Main04) Ain't No Grave EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main05Mar_0004AF7F_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You killed my brother, so I maimed and humiliated you, then slaughtered a town and forced you to watch. That's more or less even, right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你杀了我兄弟，所以我才会残害于你，羞辱你，然后屠杀了一整个城镇，还强迫你看着。这样我俩做的就就多不少差不多了吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marko [040357E4] (mod) Quest : ([04035DD8]aaNVB3Main04) Ain't No Grave EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main05Mar_0004AF7F_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I know you're anxious to spew some venomous diatribe, but permit me a moment. Let's say that a miracle occurs and you kill me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道你现在急于说些恶毒的话，但请允许我再说一分钟。假设奇迹发生了让你杀了我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marko [040357E4] (mod) Quest : ([04035DD8]aaNVB3Main04) Ain't No Grave EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main05Mar_0004AF7F_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You'll limp back to the Mojave with a broken body, your myth shattered. People will only remember your failings. They're just lousy that way.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你会一瘸一拐地回到莫哈维，让你的神话也破灭。人们只会记住你的失败。因为他们就是这样糟糕的生物。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marko [040357E4] (mod) Quest : ([04035DD8]aaNVB3Main04) Ain't No Grave EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main05Mar_0004AF7F_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They won't talk about how you killed me. They'll mock you for getting captured and allowing the town to get butchered.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们不会到处宣传你是怎么杀我的。恰恰相反，他们会嘲笑你被抓，像个无动于衷的死耗子一样，让这个城镇被屠杀。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marko [040357E4] (mod) Quest : ([04035DD8]aaNVB3Main04) Ain't No Grave EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main05Mar_0004AF7F_8.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You had a good thing in the Mojave. You should've stayed there. {Breathes}Quite a stage we have here, huh? Audience of dead men.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在莫哈维有一件好差事。你就应该呆在那里的。{呼吸}我们这里的舞台可真不错不是么？哈？来看死人的观众。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marko [040357E4] (mod) Quest : ([04035DD8]aaNVB3Main04) Ain't No Grave EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main05Mar_0004AF7F_9.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Go ahead, tell me how I'm destined for the infernal reaches or all manner of mutilation. {Condescending}I'm sure it will be very bold and original.
ESP.TRADUIT: 去吧，告诉我我是怎么注定要去那地狱般的深渊，或是还要受的各种各样的残害。{居高临下的看着你}我相信这将是非常大胆和原创的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marko [040357E4] (mod) Quest : ([04035DD8]aaNVB3Main04) Ain't No Grave EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main05Mar_0004AF7F_10.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Main04.MarkoSaid to 2
I've heard you jabber for long enough. Let's see if you're as good as they say. <Attack>
ESP.TRADUIT: 我已经听你唠叨够久了。让我们看看你是否像他们说的那么棒。<攻击>

ESP.ORIGINAL: C'mon, words are just fun. {Sighs}Well, if you insist.
ESP.TRADUIT: 来吧，明明说话是很有趣的活动。{叹息}好吧，如果你坚持的话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marko [040357E4] (mod) Quest : ([04035DD8]aaNVB3Main04) Ain't No Grave EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main05Mar_00059F56_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaMarkoREF.startcombat player enableplayercontrols
NO LIPPING! YOU NAP!
ESP.TRADUIT: 不 要 嘴 唇！你 给 我 睡！（低智力）

ESP.ORIGINAL: C'mon, words are just fun. {Sighs}Well, if you insist.
ESP.TRADUIT: 来吧，明明说话是很有趣的活动。{叹息}好吧，如果你坚持的话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marko [040357E4] (mod) Quest : ([04035DD8]aaNVB3Main04) Ain't No Grave EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main05Mar_00061DC7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaMarkoREF.startcombat player enableplayercontrols
I took care of Ford and the other hunters. Looks like you're alone, too.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我“关照”过福特和其他的猎人。看来你也是孤单一个人呢。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ford was a parasite, the lowest form of man... unable to stand on his own, forge his own path. He could only leech off the energy of others.
ESP.TRADUIT: 福特是个寄生虫，是人类最低级的形态...他无法自立，自力更生。他只能吸取别人的精力。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marko [040357E4] (mod) Quest : ([04035DD8]aaNVB3Main04) Ain't No Grave EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main05Mar_00059334_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: At least Randall had purpose... and guts. Once the hunters were paid and gone, I was going to personally cut Ford's throat, so thanks.
ESP.TRADUIT: 至少兰道尔还有目的。。。还有胆量。一旦猎人们得到报酬，离开了，我就会亲自割断福特的喉咙，所以我还得谢谢你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marko [040357E4] (mod) Quest : ([04035DD8]aaNVB3Main04) Ain't No Grave EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main05Mar_00059334_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: As for being alone... that's how it's always been. Anyone who's honest knows that's what life is. It's a slow, lonely stroll through hell.
ESP.TRADUIT: 至于孤独。。。一直都是这样。任何诚实的人都知道生活的本质就是这样的。这是一个缓慢的，孤独的地狱漫步之旅。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marko [040357E4] (mod) Quest : ([04035DD8]aaNVB3Main04) Ain't No Grave EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main05Mar_00059334_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Only person I ever cared about was my brother, and you took it upon yourself to snuff him out for a greasy wad of caps.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我唯一关心过的人就是我的兄弟，而你却自作主张，为了一堆油腻的瓶盖把他掐死了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marko [040357E4] (mod) Quest : ([04035DD8]aaNVB3Main04) Ain't No Grave EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main05Mar_00059334_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is how it should be. I'm ready, Courier.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这大概就应该是这样的。我准备好了，邮差。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marko [040357E4] (mod) Quest : ([04035DD8]aaNVB3Main04) Ain't No Grave EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main05Mar_00059334_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hell is waiting, you sonofabitch. <Attack>
ESP.TRADUIT: 地狱已经等不及了，你这个婊子养得混蛋。<攻击>

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's "hell", you imbecile. Only morons like you get into heaven, anyway. Let's get this over with.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那是“地狱”，你这个笨蛋。不管怎样，只有像你这样的白痴才能进入天堂。让我们结束这一切吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marko [040357E4] (mod) Quest : ([04035DD8]aaNVB3Main04) Ain't No Grave EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main05Mar_00059337_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaMarkoREF.startcombat player enableplayercontrols
You nap in shell.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在贝壳里睡觉！（低智力）

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ah, yes. The reliable quip about eternal judgment awaiting me after I shuffle off this mortal coil.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，是的。可靠的调侃，关于永恒的审判，正等着我摆脱这凡人的界限呢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marko [040357E4] (mod) Quest : ([04035DD8]aaNVB3Main04) Ain't No Grave EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main05Mar_00061DC6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you kill me, my "punishment" is just a void that can't help or harm me, a far cry from the fiery justice you envision.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你杀了我，我的"惩罚"只不过是一种无法帮助或伤害我的空虚罢了，这可与你想象中的炽热正义相去甚远吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marko [040357E4] (mod) Quest : ([04035DD8]aaNVB3Main04) Ain't No Grave EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main05Mar_00061DC6_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The right and wrong of this will be decided with our weapons, not the decree of a celestial tyrant who likes pissing on us from a cloud.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这件事的对与错将由我们的武器来决定，而不是一个喜欢从云端向我们撒尿的天王的命令。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marko [040357E4] (mod) Quest : ([04035DD8]aaNVB3Main04) Ain't No Grave EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main05Mar_00061DC6_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I rather prefer it that way. If you disagree, just try to pray me away in the next few moments and we'll see who tastes the darkness first.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我宁愿那样。如果你不同意，那就试着在接下来的几分钟里祈祷我离开，我们会看到谁先尝到黑暗的滋味。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marko [040357E4] (mod) Quest : ([04035DD8]aaNVB3Main04) Ain't No Grave EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main05Mar_00061DC6_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaMarkoREF.startcombat player enableplayercontrols
[Sweet Revenge] You recognize this pistol? I've waited a long time to kill you with it. <Attack>
ESP.TRADUIT: [甜蜜的复仇]你认得这把手枪吗？我可等了太久，现在才能用它把你干死。<攻击>

ESP.ORIGINAL: Jesus, you can't even get the name right! You're a living insult to Randall's memory. What possessed him to give you his pistol? No sense!
ESP.TRADUIT: 天哪，你连名字都记不清楚！你简直是对兰道尔那记忆的侮辱。是什么驱使他把手枪送给你的？没道理！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marko [040357E4] (mod) Quest : ([04035DD8]aaNVB3Main04) Ain't No Grave EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main05Mar_00059338_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: At least cock it and pull the trigger so I feel a sense of accomplishment, all right? Stepping on slugs might be more sporting than this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 至少扣动扳机，让我能有一些成就感，好吗？踩鼻涕虫可能比这还更有趣些。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marko [040357E4] (mod) Quest : ([04035DD8]aaNVB3Main04) Ain't No Grave EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main05Mar_00059338_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaMarkoREF.startcombat player enableplayercontrols
[Sweet Revenge] Sweat binge make you nap.
ESP.TRADUIT: [甜蜜的复仇] 大汗淋漓会让你打个盹儿的。（低智力）

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, how sentimental of you, using Randall's old piece. I knew I shouldn't have buried that stuff with you. Very careless.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，你真是太让人感伤了，居然用兰道尔的老伙计。我就知道我不该把那东西和你一起埋了。真是太粗心。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marko [040357E4] (mod) Quest : ([04035DD8]aaNVB3Main04) Ain't No Grave EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main05Mar_00061DC8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You know, I've also got a revolver that I've used over the years. I call it "Old Scratch", not sure exactly what inspired the name. It just stuck.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道吗，我还有一把左轮手枪，这些年来我一直在用。我称之为“老魔爪”，我都不记得是什么启发了我起了这个名字。它只是卡住了罢了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marko [040357E4] (mod) Quest : ([04035DD8]aaNVB3Main04) Ain't No Grave EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main05Mar_00061DC8_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm normally not keen on religion, but sometimes I think this old Roscoe has a hunger for souls... crazy, right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我通常不热衷于宗教，但有时我认为这个老罗斯科有一个对于灵魂的渴望。。。我大概是疯了，对吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marko [040357E4] (mod) Quest : ([04035DD8]aaNVB3Main04) Ain't No Grave EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main05Mar_00061DC8_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So it's your Remington versus Old Scratch. Sounds like a pre-war monster movie. Wouldn't it be ironic if that's all that people remembered?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以这是你的那把雷明顿对我的老魔爪。听起来像是战前的怪物电影。如果人们只记得这些，那不是很讽刺吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marko [040357E4] (mod) Quest : ([04035DD8]aaNVB3Main04) Ain't No Grave EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main05Mar_00061DC8_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Pardon me, I'm normally not so glib in these moments, but the tension is just... invigorating. {Breathes, collects himself}It's time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 抱歉，我在这种时候通常不会这么油嘴滑舌，但紧张只是。。。振奋人心。{呼吸，振作起来}是时候了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marko [040357E4] (mod) Quest : ([04035DD8]aaNVB3Main04) Ain't No Grave EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main05Mar_00061DC8_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaMarkoREF.startcombat player enableplayercontrols
<Remain Silent>
ESP.TRADUIT: <保持沉默>

ESP.ORIGINAL: So this is the culmination of my career - a climactic contest with an intellectual insect. Drop the silent act, ok? No? Ok... stare off!
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以这是我职业生涯的巅峰——一场与一只知性昆虫的巅峰较量。停止沉默，好吗？不愿意？好啊。。。那我们接着盯着对方！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marko [040357E4] (mod) Quest : ([04035DD8]aaNVB3Main04) Ain't No Grave EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main05Mar_00059F57_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Main04.MarkoStare to aaNVB3Main04.MarkoStare + 1
<He stares intently>
ESP.TRADUIT: <他目不转睛地盯着>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marko [040357E4] (mod) Quest : ([04035DD8]aaNVB3Main04) Ain't No Grave EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Main04.MarkoStare to aaNVB3Main04.MarkoStare + 1
<Remain Silent>
ESP.TRADUIT: <保持沉默>

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ok, my eyes are starting to dry out, and this is simply uncomfortable. Can we settle this in a more... conventional way?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我的眼睛开始干了，这很不舒服。我们能不能用让这件事以。。。梗传统的方式结束？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marko [040357E4] (mod) Quest : ([04035DD8]aaNVB3Main04) Ain't No Grave EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main05Mar_00059F59_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Main04.MarkoStare to aaNVB3Main04.MarkoStare + 1
<Stare Intently>
ESP.TRADUIT: <专注地凝视>

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've made your point. Enough!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你已经表明了你的想法。够了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marko [040357E4] (mod) Quest : ([04035DD8]aaNVB3Main04) Ain't No Grave EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main05Mar_00059F5A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Main04.MarkoStare to aaNVB3Main04.MarkoStare + 1
<Stare Intently>
ESP.TRADUIT: <专注地凝视>

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marko [040357E4] (mod) Quest : ([04035DD8]aaNVB3Main04) Ain't No Grave EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaMarkoREF.startcombat player enableplayercontrols
set aaNVB3Main04.MarkoStare to aaNVB3Main04.MarkoStare + 1
<Stare Intently>
ESP.TRADUIT: <专注地凝视>

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Surprised, horrified}You don't have... what... how? No, you can't... stop! My head! {Screams in agony}
ESP.TRADUIT: {惊讶，惊恐}你没有做。。。什么。。。怎么做的？不，你不能。。。住手！我的头！{痛苦地尖叫}
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marko [040357E4] (mod) Quest : ([04035DD8]aaNVB3Main04) Ain't No Grave EmotionType : Puzzled Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main05Mar_00059F5C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Main04.MarkoStare to aaNVB3Main04.MarkoStare + 1 aaMarkoREF.killactor player 1 1 PlaySound UIWildWasteland showmessage WildWastelandMessage
RIDE THE SNAKE!
ESP.TRADUIT: 骑 蛇 者！（译者注：Ride the snake指把谨慎抛诸脑后，摄入大量迷幻药，在口语中多指做危险的事情，比如制造毒品。）

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm going to skull fuck you, and I won't be gentle. <Attack>
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要去操死你的脑袋瓜子，我他妈可不会温柔的。<攻击>

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Revolted}You know how uncomfortable that would actually be? That's a vile way to close things, talking like a demented necrophiliac.
ESP.TRADUIT: {反感}你知道那会有多不舒服吗？这是一种结束事情的卑鄙方式，你说话就像一个精神错乱的恋尸癖。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marko [040357E4] (mod) Quest : ([04035DD8]aaNVB3Main04) Ain't No Grave EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main05Mar_00059335_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I guess the world will be a little less profane without you around. That's reason enough for me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想如果没有你在我身边的话，这世界会少一些亵渎。这对我来说已经足够了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marko [040357E4] (mod) Quest : ([04035DD8]aaNVB3Main04) Ain't No Grave EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main05Mar_00059335_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaMarkoREF.startcombat player enableplayercontrols
I make happy poke in eye.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我让开心用那玩意“戳戳”眼睛。（低智力）

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Revolted}You know how uncomfortable that would actually be? That's a vile way to close things, talking like a demented necrophiliac.
ESP.TRADUIT: {反感}你知道那会有多不舒服吗？这是一种结束事情的卑鄙方式，你说话就像一个精神错乱的恋尸癖。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marko [040357E4] (mod) Quest : ([04035DD8]aaNVB3Main04) Ain't No Grave EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main05Mar_00061DC5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I guess the world will be a little less profane without you around. That's reason enough for me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想如果没有你在我身边的话，这世界会少一些亵渎。这对我来说已经足够了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marko [040357E4] (mod) Quest : ([04035DD8]aaNVB3Main04) Ain't No Grave EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main05Mar_00061DC5_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaMarkoREF.startcombat player enableplayercontrols
Why did Marko send you? Why didn't he just come and face me himself?
ESP.TRADUIT: 马尔科为什么派你来？他为什么不亲自来面对我？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Mar-ko... sent me to... {Struggling to simplify}talk with other men to make money. You understand money? No? Green paper with faces? {Player recognizes it}Yeah, that stuff.
ESP.TRADUIT: 马...尔科...把我送到...{努力简化}和其他男人聊天赚钱。你懂钱吗？不？有脸的绿皮纸？{邮差认出了}是的，那东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilWhySend_0004BB72_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaVirgilQuest.Send to aaVirgilQuest.Send + 1
Why Mario sends you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么马里奥拍你？（低智力）

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you always imagine elaborate, contrived showdowns with your antagonists? I'm afraid Marko's a touch more pragmatic in his outlook.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你总是想象与对手精心策划的摊牌吗？恐怕马尔科的观点有点务实。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilWhySend_00061DA0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't worry, he'll fight you on his own terms, when the time's right. First I have see to his interests while he stabilizes things in Utah.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别担心，等时机成熟，他会以自己的方式和你战斗的。首先我要注意的是他在犹他州稳定局势时候的兴趣。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilWhySend_00061DA0_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He told me that Sergio came here, squared off with you in some mountain town. Didn't work out well for him, did it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 他告诉我塞尔吉奥来过这里，在某个山城和你算了一账。你对他来说不太好，是吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilWhySend_00061DA0_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you want Marko that badly? You have to know that it's risky going up to Utah.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你就那么极度的想要见到马尔科吗？你必须知道去犹他州是很危险的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilWhySend_00061DA0_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaVirgilQuest.Send to aaVirgilQuest.Send + 1
What's your background? How did you get mixed up with Marko?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的背景是什么？你是怎么和马尔科混在一起的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's Mar-ko. I talked to Marko a long time ago when we met. He helped me survive. We killed the really bad men, then ate big steaks!
ESP.TRADUIT: 是马-尔科。很久以前我们见面的时候我就谈过马尔科了。他帮助过我活下来。我们杀了真正的坏人，然后吃了大牛排！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilYourBac_0004BB78_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaVirgilQuest.Story to aaVirgilQuest.Story + 1
How you talk Mario?
ESP.TRADUIT: 怎么你说马里奥？（低智力）

ESP.ORIGINAL: I had a... non-traditional upbringing, with the requisite amount of violence for wasteland standards. Marko found me when I was a young man.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我受到了...非传统的教育方式，按照废土标准来说，这需要一定数量的暴力。马尔科在我年轻的时候就找到了我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilYourBac_00061D9F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was just a thug when we met. He saw something in me, something I didn't know about myself. He just has that ability. It's uncanny.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们相遇时我只是个暴徒。但他在我身上看到了一些东西，一些我自己不知道的东西。他就是有这种能力。这太不可思议了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilYourBac_00061D9F_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He pushed me to become more proficient at violence, but also instilled the urge to educate myself. It's amazing what learned slaves can teach you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他促使我更加精通暴力，但也灌输了我教育自己的冲动。一个有学问的奴隶能教你的东西会让人吃惊。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilYourBac_00061D9F_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have no doubt I would have perished in some scrape back east if I hadn't met Marko. I would've been another anonymous, forgotten raider.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我毫不怀疑，如果我没有遇见马尔科，我会在东边的某个地方死去。我会是另一个无名的，被遗忘的劫匪。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilYourBac_00061D9F_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Some gang members came and went, like Red Bear. They feared Marko, so their presence was usually ephemeral. There was always a core, though.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一些帮派成员来来往往，像红熊。他们很害怕马尔科，所以他们的存在通常是短暂的。但总会有一个核心存在的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilYourBac_00061D9F_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We stay loyal to Marko because he wins every time, against all odds. There is profit, but also brotherhood. Is it the same with your group?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们忠于马尔科，因为他每次都能战胜一切困难。不但有利益，也有兄弟情谊。你的小组也是这样吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilYourBac_00061D9F_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaVirgilQuest.Story to aaVirgilQuest.Story + 1
What's your background? How did you get mixed up with Marko?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的背景是什么？你是怎么和马尔科混在一起的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: What can you tell me about Marko?
ESP.TRADUIT: 关于马尔科你能告诉我什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Frustrated, yet pitying}It's... it's Marko, with a "k", understand? {Drawn out}Mar-ko. {As if explaining to a child}He's a bad, bad man. He might hurt you.
ESP.TRADUIT: {沮丧,怜悯}这...是马尔科，有个"K"，明白吗？{拉长了音}Mar--Ko。{好像在向孩子解释}他是个坏男人，坏男人。因为他可能会伤害你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilAboutMa_0004B582_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaVirgilQuest.About to aaVirgilQuest.About + 1
Tell about Mario.
ESP.TRADUIT: 说说马里奥吧。（低智力）

ESP.ORIGINAL: I suppose in a strange way he's not much different from you, Courier. He was forged in violence, reborn a survivor.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想最奇怪的是，他和你没什么不同，邮差。他在暴力中被千锤百炼，重生成了一个幸存者。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilAboutMa_00061D9C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He's not exceptional in any physical sense, nor is he the most intelligent man I've met. I suppose it's his will that sets him apart.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他在任何身体机能上都和常人无异，也不是我见过的最聪明的人。我想是他坚强的意志使他与众不同。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: There have been times when most men would have succumbed to defeat or even death, yet Marko won in the end.
ESP.TRADUIT: 大多数人，有很多时候，都会屈服于失败甚至死亡，但马尔科最后总会是赢家。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilAboutMa_00061D9C_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He told me about the time he was captured by raiders back east. They ate Marko's comrades and forced him into servitude.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他告诉我他在东部被那些匪徒抓获的时候。他们吃掉了马尔科的战友，还强迫他服苦役。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilAboutMa_00061D9C_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He went along with it, ingratiating himself with the leader and even proving himself as a capable cook. The raiders grew to trust him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他欣然接受，讨好领导，甚至证明自己是个能干的厨师。这种种行为都让那些匪徒开始信任他了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilAboutMa_00061D9C_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He was eventually offered the chance to join their ranks - on the condition that he prove his ability to kill without hesitation.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他最终获得了入伙匪徒的机会，条件是他要证明自己能够毫不犹豫地杀人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilAboutMa_00061D9C_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: While he had certainly killed before, this was different. He was ordered to slaughter the family of a random farmer, fellow by the name of Randall.
ESP.TRADUIT: 虽然他以前肯定杀过人，但这次情况不同。他被命令屠杀一个名叫兰道尔的农民的家庭。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilAboutMa_00061D9C_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Given your history with Randall, I have no doubt he's told you what transpired. Marko killed them all in front of Randall in gruesome fashion.
ESP.TRADUIT: 鉴于你和兰道尔的关系，我毫不怀疑他告诉过你发生了什么。马尔科在兰道尔面前以可怕的方式杀死了他们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilAboutMa_00061D9C_8.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The slavers' leader was so impressed that he made Marko his right-hand man. Marko soon exceeded all expectations as a raider.
ESP.TRADUIT: 奴隶贩子首领被他的冷彻深深地打动了，他把马尔科当作他的得力助手。马尔科很快就展露出超出了作为一个突击队员的应有期望的强大。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilAboutMa_00061D9C_9.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It seemed as if Marko had assimilated into this new lifestyle with no regrets or grudges... for a time. Then they ran into a rival group of raiders.
ESP.TRADUIT: 似乎马尔科已经融入了这种新的生活方式，他没有任何遗憾或怨恨...这持续了一段很长很长的时间。然后他们遇到了一个敌对的匪帮。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilAboutMa_00061D9C_10.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaVirgilQuest.About to aaVirgilQuest.About + 1
Mar-ko. Oh, to hell with it. Yes, I has the bad. I has all the bad in the world. God in heaven, why did I come here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 马-尔科。哦，见鬼去吧。是的，我有缺点。我是世界上所有的坏东西的整合。上帝啊，我为什么来这里？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilAboutMa_0005874A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaVirgilQuest.About to aaVirgilQuest.About + 1
You has bad like Mario?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你像马里奥一样的坏吗？（低智力）

ESP.ORIGINAL: Marko always said, "Man is the measure of all things." In this world you make your own law for yourself and those closest to you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 马尔科经常念叨：“人是万物的尺度。”在这个世界上，你会为自己和你最亲近的人制定自己的法则。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilAboutMa_00061D9D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Talking about right and wrong is delusional... and self-indulgent. If you had traveled and seen what I have... you'd appreciate the truth in this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谈论是非的话，只能说是妄想。。。以及自我放纵罢了。如果你去旅行的话，看到我所拥有的那一切。。。你就会明白这里面的真相的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilAboutMa_00061D9D_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Seen towns where they ate people but wouldn't let the women out in public for fear of immorality. Other places they killed kids for stealing food.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我见过那些城镇里的人吃人，但却不让妇女在公共场合出现，因为他们害怕那是不道德的。而在其他地方，他们会为了偷食物而杀了孩子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilAboutMa_00061D9D_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Deep down everybody has an idea about what's right. Sleeping with another man's wife? It's ok, she's unhappy. How about robbery? Oh, they're rich.
ESP.TRADUIT: 每个人内心深处都知道什么是对的。和另一个男人的妻子上床？没关系，她只是会不开心。抢劫怎么样？哦，因为他们很有钱。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilAboutMa_00061D9D_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Marko taught me to look within, trust my own instincts, and most importantly... to do what it takes to stay alive. He always looked after his people.
ESP.TRADUIT: 马尔科教会我万物要看内在，要相信自己的直觉，最重要的是...尽一切努力活下去。他总是会照顾他的人民。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilAboutMa_00061D9D_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So to answer your question, I don't feel guilty. There ain't no heaven or hell, just this rock, and I'll get mine while I'm here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以回答你之前的问题：我并不觉得内疚。因为这世上没有天堂也没有地狱，只有这块石头罢了。而我，当我埋葬在这里的时候会得到我的那块的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilAboutMa_00061D9D_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaVirgilQuest.About to aaVirgilQuest.About + 1
Do you ever feel guilty about running with Marko? Surely you've seen and done awful things.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有没有因为和马尔科一起共事而感到内疚？你肯定看到过，也做过可怕的事情。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, the bad is good, I mean... shit! {Regains composure}I mean, bad is relative. You might think eating feces is good, but to me, it's bad. Understand? No? Great.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，越坏越好，我是说。。。倒霉！{恢复镇静}我是说，坏是相对的。你可能认为吃粪便是好的，但对我来说，它是坏的。明白吗？不明白？那就对了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilAboutMa_00058D43_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaVirgilQuest.About to aaVirgilQuest.About + 1
You likes the bad?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你喜欢恶棍？

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Flash of anger}I want to know what effete, sniveling worm coined the term "bad guy". Probably some spineless wretch who relied on stronger men for his safety.
ESP.TRADUIT: {一瞬而逝的愤怒}我想知道衰弱的，哭哭啼啼的蠕虫怎么定义了"坏人"这个词。可能只是个没骨气的可怜虫，只能靠强壮的人来保证自己的安全。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilAboutMa_00061D9E_1.ogg
