ESP.ORIGINAL: You know what "bad" means to me? It means you're strong, you endure when others listen to that pussified voice inside, lay down and die.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道“恶人”对我意味着什么吗？这意味着你很坚强，当别人听到你从内而外发出的那低沉可怕的声音时，他们会害怕到忍受，躺下死去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilAboutMa_00061D9E_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't know about your world with all its nations and laws, but in my world "good" is raw flesh that is stripped and eaten by the hungry.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道你们所认知的世界，也不知道你们的一切国家法律，但在我所认知的世界里，饥饿的人为刀俎，“善人”为鱼肉，是会被吃干抹净的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilAboutMa_00061D9E_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What would you do without a few bad men around? No job, for starters. You're only as good as the man across from you, it's what builds you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没有几个坏人，你的日子又会怎么样的？首先，你会没有工作。因为你只有和你面对的那些人一样“好”的时候，这才是你的本领发挥的时候。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilAboutMa_00061D9E_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've smoked a few lowlifes, and now you're supposed to be special? You're just another meatbag with an expiration date.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你应该抽过几支低档烟，现在你应该很特别了吧？你只不过是另一个有过期日期的肉袋罢了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilAboutMa_00061D9E_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The hubris of it... to call me bad. There will come a time when you'll wish you'd had more bad in you, because good... lets you down in the end.
ESP.TRADUIT: 称我为恶徒的...傲慢。总有一天，你会希望自己变得更坏，因为当个好人。。。最后让你失望。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilAboutMa_00061D9E_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaVirgilQuest.About to aaVirgilQuest.About + 1
If I'm hearing you right, you seem to embrace being the bad guy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我没听错的话，你好像很喜欢当个恶徒。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why wouldn't it be about Sergio? Even bad men love their brothers. You might say their mutual interests made them closer.
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么不是关于塞尔吉奥的话题？即使坏人也会爱他们的兄弟。你可能会说是他们的共同利益使他们更加亲密。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilAboutMa_000687FF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're not completely off base, though. Before Sergio was killed, Marko had already heard some of the stories coming out of the Mojave.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过，你并没有完全偏离底线。在塞尔吉奥被杀之前，马尔科已经听过一些来自莫哈维的故事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilAboutMa_000687FF_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: People talked about some courier who was all but unstoppable. A veritable force of nature, by all accounts. That's didn't sit well with Marko.
ESP.TRADUIT: 人们到处讨论一个几乎势不可挡的邮差。不管怎么说，这是一种真正的自然趋势。这对马尔科来说可不太好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilAboutMa_000687FF_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I guess on some level he wants to prove that you're no better than the rest of us mere mortals... or at least not better than him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想在某种程度上他想证明你并不比我们这些凡人强。。。或者至少不比他强。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilAboutMa_000687FF_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've been riding high since you ducked the reaper... maybe too high. If you aren't careful, you'll get a nasty lesson in mortality soon enough.
ESP.TRADUIT: 从你玩弄死神，躲开了他的袭击之后，你就一直被捧得很高。。。可能太高了。如果你不小心，你很快就会上一堂关于死亡的毕业课。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilAboutMa_000687FF_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaVirgilQuest.About to aaVirgilQuest.About + 1
Is this all about Sergio? I have a hard time believing that Marko was close to his brother.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这都是塞尔吉奥的事吗？我很难相信马尔科和他的兄弟这么亲近。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaVirgilAskAnotherQuestion
ESP.TRADUIT: aa维吉尔询问另一个问题

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nevermind.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没关系。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Very well.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那好吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilGoodbye_0004B585_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaVirgilFaceMarkoDontCare
ESP.TRADUIT: aa维吉尔面对马克不关心

ESP.ORIGINAL: He can scheme
ESP.TRADUIT: 他能图谋

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaVirgilFaceMarkoSickOfHearing
ESP.TRADUIT: aa维吉尔面对马克不想听

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaVirgilFaceMarkoSilent
ESP.TRADUIT: aa维吉尔面对马克沉默

ESP.ORIGINAL: It doesn't matter where I fight Marko. He's going to die by my hand.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在哪里对决马尔科并不重要。他肯定会死在我的手上。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't ever talk about my companions, bub.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别对我的同伴评头论足，小家伙。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Relax. Are you always this cagey about your companions? They're just people, not saints from on high.
ESP.TRADUIT: 放松点。你对你的同伴总是这么守口如瓶吗？他们只是普通人罢了，可不是上流社会的圣徒。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilCompani_0004BB83_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No talk about pan onions!
ESP.TRADUIT: 没有对话一锅洋葱。（低智力）

ESP.ORIGINAL: Relax. Are you always this cagey about your companions? They're just people, not saints from on high.
ESP.TRADUIT: 放松点。你对你的同伴总是这么守口如瓶吗？他们只是普通人罢了，可不是上流社会的圣徒。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilCompani_00061DAD_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, I'm close with my companions. I dare say they'd readily die for me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，我和我的同伴很亲近。我敢说他们愿意为我而死。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then you know full well of what I speak. Marko's men would do the same for him, myself included. Something to think about when you go to Utah.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那你对我说的话了如指掌。马尔科的人也会为他做同样的事，包括我自己。这是你在去犹他州的时候要考虑的事情。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilCompani_0004BB82_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Pan onions hug lots.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一锅洋葱拥抱全部。（低智力）

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then you know full well of what I speak. Marko's men would do the same for him, myself included. Something to think about when you go to Utah.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那你对我说的话了如指掌。马尔科的人也会为他做同样的事，包括我自己。这是你在去犹他州的时候要考虑的事情。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilCompani_00061DAB_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: My companions are more like business partners. We're in it for the profit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的同伴的关系更像是商业伙伴。我们摄入其中是为了利润。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Cats? Oh, Caps! So, you're interested in profit-sharing and monetary concerns, right? Every conversation with you is an adventure .
ESP.TRADUIT: 猫？哦，瓶盖！所以，你对利润分享和货币问题感兴趣，对吧？与你的每一次谈话都是一次冒险。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilCompani_0004BB81_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We counts cats.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我门数猫。（低智力）

ESP.ORIGINAL: So it's strictly about the caps? No relationship beyond that? Cold, but probably more efficient.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以严格来说这些都是关于瓶盖的？除此之外没有关系？真是冰冷无情，但你的做法可能更有效。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilCompani_00061DAC_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: My companions stick with me out of mutual respect.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我和的同伴出于相互尊重而站在一起，共同作战。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Respect? All the time, even when someone is drunk or careless? I wonder how you tolerate their flaws, and vice versa.
ESP.TRADUIT: 尊重？你一直如此吗，即使有人喝醉了或是粗心大意？我不知道你怎么能容忍他们的缺点，反之亦然。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilCompani_0004BB85_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We has red specks.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我门有的红色斑点。（低智力）

ESP.ORIGINAL: Respect? All the time, even when someone is drunk or careless? I wonder how you tolerate their flaws, and vice versa.
ESP.TRADUIT: 尊重？你一直如此吗，即使有人喝醉了或是粗心大意？我不知道你怎么能容忍他们的缺点，反之亦然。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilCompani_00061DAF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: My companions know to fear me, hence their loyalty.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的同伴知道害怕我，因此他们才会如此忠诚。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's God's honest truth, right there. You and Marko might have become good friends in another life. Then again, you might have killed each other.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这就是神所说的坦率真相。你和马尔科可能在其他世界的人生中成为要好朋友。我再说一遍，你们可能会互相残杀的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilCompani_0004BB84_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I scares pan onions.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我吓到了一锅洋葱。（低智力）

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's God's honest truth, right there. You and Marko might have become good friends in another life. Then again, you might have killed each other.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这就是神所说的坦率真相。你和马尔科可能在其他世界的人生中成为要好朋友。我再说一遍，你们可能会互相残杀的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilCompani_00061DAE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Actually, all my companions are dead.
ESP.TRADUIT: 实际上，我所有的同伴都死了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, this took an awkward turn, didn't it? Let's just keep moving, shall we?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，这真是一个尴尬的转折啊，不是吗？我们继续走吧，好吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilCompani_0004BB80_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Remain Silent>
ESP.TRADUIT: <保持沉默>

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, this again? Is this your leadership style? Long, silent stares with drool dripping from your lips? Brilliant. Maybe they pity you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，又是这个？这是你的领导风格吗？长久的，沉默的盯着对方，嘴唇里还流口水？太棒了。也许他们会可怜你的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilCompani_0004BB86_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Remain Silent>
ESP.TRADUIT: <保持沉默>

ESP.ORIGINAL: Walk softly, Courier. I'll see you soon.
ESP.TRADUIT: 走慢点，邮差。待会见。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilTellMar_0004BB93_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: showmessage aaVirgilLeaveMessage aaVirgilREF.disable aaVirgilREF.markfordelete stopquest aaVirgilQuest
Tell Marko he's a fucking dead man.
ESP.TRADUIT: 告诉马尔科他他妈的死定了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wait, you mean like a dirt nap? Well, that's almost poetic! I'm impressed. You've really made progress in our travels. I'm very proud.
ESP.TRADUIT: 等等，你是说打个盹儿？好吧，那几乎是诗意的！真令我印象深刻。你在我们的旅行中真的取得了些进步。这让我很自豪。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilTellMar_0004BB92_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: showmessage aaVirgilLeaveMessage aaVirgilREF.disable aaVirgilREF.markfordelete stopquest aaVirgilQuest
Mario take nap.
ESP.TRADUIT: 马里奥小睡了（低智力）

ESP.ORIGINAL: So much anger! I'll inform him of your... emotional state. I'll see you soon, Courier. Do try to remain calm in the interim.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你太愤怒了！我会把你的。。。情绪状态告诉他的。很快见，邮差。在这过渡期间请一定要保持冷静。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilTellMar_00061DA2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: showmessage aaVirgilLeaveMessage aaVirgilREF.disable aaVirgilREF.markfordelete stopquest aaVirgilQuest
Just tell him that I'm coming for him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你给我去告诉他，就说那个邮差来找他了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You know, I'm not even going to bother correcting you. I'll tell Mario that you come. You've successfully stultified me during our travels.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道，我甚至都不会费心纠正你。我会告诉马尔科你来了。因为你在我们旅行中成功地愚弄了我多次。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilTellMar_0004BB91_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: showmessage aaVirgilLeaveMessage aaVirgilREF.disable aaVirgilREF.markfordelete stopquest aaVirgilQuest
Tell Mario I come.
ESP.TRADUIT: 告诉马里奥我来了。（低智力）

ESP.ORIGINAL: I will convey your message to the letter. I'll see you soon, Courier.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我将把你的信息转达成这封信。待会见，邮差。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilTellMar_00061DA1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: showmessage aaVirgilLeaveMessage aaVirgilREF.disable aaVirgilREF.markfordelete stopquest aaVirgilQuest
Tell him I look forward to our meeting. We have a lot to talk about.
ESP.TRADUIT: 告诉他我期待着我们的会面。我们有很多事情要谈。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, what a colorful yarn you will weave. Goodbye, Courier.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，你会织出多么多彩的纱线啊。再见，邮差。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: showmessage aaVirgilLeaveMessage aaVirgilREF.disable aaVirgilREF.markfordelete stopquest aaVirgilQuest
I tell story.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我说故事。（低智力）

ESP.ORIGINAL: More than you know, perhaps. No doubt he shares your enthusiasm for spirited discourse. Goodbye, Courier.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这可能比你知道的还要多。毫无疑问，他和你一样热衷于充满激情的谈话。再见，邮差。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilTellMar_00061DA4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: showmessage aaVirgilLeaveMessage aaVirgilREF.disable aaVirgilREF.markfordelete stopquest aaVirgilQuest
[Sweet Revenge] Tell him I packed this pistol and I'll be using it to send him to hell.
ESP.TRADUIT: [甜蜜的复仇] 告诉他我带了这把手枪，我要用它把他送进地狱。

ESP.ORIGINAL: God, this isn't even going to be sporting... like shooting a mole rat with a howitzer. Oh, well.
ESP.TRADUIT: 天哪，这根本就不是什么风格高尚的运动。。。这就像用榴弹炮射鼹鼠一样。哦，好吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilTellMar_0004BB94_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: showmessage aaVirgilLeaveMessage aaVirgilREF.disable aaVirgilREF.markfordelete stopquest aaVirgilQuest
[Sweet Revenge] I bring sweat binge.
ESP.TRADUIT: [甜蜜的复仇]我带了大汗淋漓（低智力）

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nice! Is that an old pre-war Remington? If you're going to get killed by something, that would be a good choice. Take care, Courier.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好！那是把战前的老雷明顿吗？如果你要被什么东西杀死，那真是个不错的选择。保重了，邮差。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilTellMar_00061DA3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: showmessage aaVirgilLeaveMessage aaVirgilREF.disable aaVirgilREF.markfordelete stopquest aaVirgilQuest
<INCOMPLETE>
ESP.TRADUIT: <未完成>

ESP.ORIGINAL: You only think you know Marko, mister. He'd kill you and this entire town in a heartbeat.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你只认为你了解马尔科罢了，先生。他能在心跳的间隔中杀了你和整个镇子的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I haven't seen anything that is remotely in line with what you're alleging. It's hearsay, plain and simple. Damn wasteland myth.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我没有看到任何与你所说的话有一丁点符合的东西。你说的只是传闻罢了，这简单明了。那些该死的废土神话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brian Jeffers [04037175] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaFrosthil_aaJeffersMarkoY_0004BBA0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Remain Silent>
ESP.TRADUIT: <保持沉默>

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Sincere}I'm sorry, I went over your head, didn't I? I didn't realize you were a... special sort. Why don't you have a donut over at the hotel?
ESP.TRADUIT: {真诚的}对不起，我想我的话超出你的理解限度了，不是吗？我不知道你是。。。那种特殊的种类。你为什么不去旅馆吃个甜甜圈呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brian Jeffers [04037175] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaFrosthil_aaJeffersMarkoS_0004BB9F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: After everything that he's done, Marko doesn't get to start over. The man has to pay.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在他做了所有的这些事情后，马尔科就再也没办法重新开始了。这个人必须付出代价。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just remember that most of us aren't involved with Marko, and we shouldn't pay for whatever he's done.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但你要记住，我们大多数人都不参与马尔科的活动，我们不应该为他所做的一切付出代价。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brian Jeffers [04037175] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaFrosthil_aaJeffersMarkoP_0004BB9D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's nothing personal with Marko. I just know there's money to be made here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这和马尔科无关。我只知道这里可以赚钱。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm a man of commerce, but you have to draw the line sometimes. Is the bounty really worth jeopardizing an entire town?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我也是个生意人，但有时你得划清界限。赏金真的值得危害整个城镇吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brian Jeffers [04037175] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaFrosthil_aaJeffersMarkoP_0004BB9E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This isn't about simple revenge or profit. I came here to set things right.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这可不是关于什么简单复仇或获得好处。我来这里是为了纠正错误的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just remember that most of us aren't involved with Marko, and we shouldn't pay for whatever he's done.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但你要记住，我们大多数人都不参与马尔科的活动，我们不应该为他所做的一切付出代价。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brian Jeffers [04037175] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaFrosthil_aaJeffersMarkoC_0004BB9C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What can you tell me about Frosthill?
ESP.TRADUIT: 关于霜地，你能告诉我些什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: We had a sheriff once, but after the last one fell into drinking nonstop the town just decided to do away with the office entirely.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们曾经有过一位警长，但在最后一位警长不停地喝酒之后，镇上的人就决定把办公室全部撤掉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brian Jeffers [04037175] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaFrosthil_aaFrosthillGene_0006F578_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We have an informal militia of sorts, but given the high rate of firearms ownership and the presence of certain man named Marko, we feel safe enough.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们有一个非正式的民兵组织，但是由于枪支拥有率很高，而且有一个叫马尔科的人在场，我们都感到很安全。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brian Jeffers [04037175] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaFrosthil_aaFrosthillGene_0006F578_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Does the town have any law enforcement?
ESP.TRADUIT: 镇上有执法部门吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: It is a fine town with magnificent people, every one of them. There are some undesirables on the outskirts, but they keep to themselves.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是个有壮丽的人民的美丽小镇。虽然市郊有一些不受欢迎的人，但他们不作声。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vasquez [04035DD5] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\aaFrosthil_aaFrosthillGene_0006F57B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We have a wonderful saloon, though its host is terribly profane. I find his abuse of your language uninspired and not at all artful.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们有一个很棒的酒馆，尽管它的主人世俗的可怕。我发现他辱骂你的语言既不鼓舞人心，也一点也不巧妙。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vasquez [04035DD5] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\aaFrosthil_aaFrosthillGene_0006F57B_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's a bunch of has-been lawbreakers, renegades, and rejects, but it's a community nonetheless. There's an unusual degree of philanthropy, in fact.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这里有一群违法者，叛徒，和拒绝者，但这里仍然是一个社区。事实上，这里乐善好施的程度非同寻常。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Big Tim Matheson [04035DD7] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaFrosthil_aaFrosthillGene_00075044_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Outsiders just assume that this is some kind of lawless shithole brimming with vice and intrigue, but it's surprisingly quiet most of the time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 外乡人只认为这是一种充满了恶习和阴谋的无法无天的粪坑，但是在大多数时候它是这样令人惊讶的安静。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Big Tim Matheson [04035DD7] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaFrosthil_aaFrosthillGene_00075044_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Heard any interesting news?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你听到什么有趣的消息了吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Travelers tell of a madman named Zimmer who started a cult near Redding. Used to be one of those Syndicate cocksuckers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 旅行者们说，一个叫齐默的疯子在雷丁附近创立了一场邪教。他曾经是那些财团的混蛋之一。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Al Swearer [04017DB2] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaFrosthil_aaFrosthillGene_00061DD0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There are hyperbolic tales of some cannibal prowling outside of town, goes by the name of Schwartz.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有一些食人族在城外徘徊的夸张故事，他的名字叫施瓦茨。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Al Swearer [04017DB2] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaFrosthil_aaFrosthillGene_00061DD1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: In my opinion, it's bullshit born of sexual repression. It's like a restless viper stirring in your pants.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在我看来，这是性压抑的产物。就像是一条不安分的毒蛇在你的裤子里搅动一样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Al Swearer [04017DB2] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaFrosthil_aaFrosthillGene_00061DD1_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now I find that furious, frequent masturbation ameliorates this malignancy, though blowjobs are the definitive cure.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在我发现狂暴的，频繁的手淫可以改善这种恶性肿瘤，尽管吹箫会是最终的治疗方法。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Al Swearer [04017DB2] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaFrosthil_aaFrosthillGene_00061DD1_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: A chem-addled prospector proclaimed that the Legion is planning some kind of attack near Bullhead, Firebase Zama or some such. Absurd fucking name.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一个沉迷于毒品的探矿者宣称军团正计划在牛头、烈火基地祖鲁附近发动某种攻击。真是荒谬的名字。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Al Swearer [04017DB2] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaFrosthil_aaFrosthillGene_00061DD2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Some of the passing persiflage contains mention of a grand rising of the servile masses in Arizona, unified under the banner of some "Spartacus".
ESP.TRADUIT: 一些路人的插科打诨中提到过，在亚利桑那州，在一些“斯巴达克斯”的旗帜下，一群统一起来的奴隶正在崛起。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Al Swearer [04017DB2] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaFrosthil_aaFrosthillGene_00084383_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Deeply sarcastic}Reviving archaic names and titles from the empires of yore will always yield positive results, as evidenced by Caesar's artful aping of the ancients.
ESP.TRADUIT: {深刻的讽刺}从古代帝国中恢复古老的名字和头衔总是会产生积极的结果，正如凯撒巧妙地模仿古人的行为所证明的那样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Al Swearer [04017DB2] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaFrosthil_aaFrosthillGene_00084383_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: In all candor, though... the poor saps will be crushed, the survivors... crucified. The bear is too lethargic, too timid for action, to its shame.
ESP.TRADUIT: 尽管如此，坦率地说。。。那些可怜的笨蛋会被压碎，而幸存者。。。会被钉死。熊太懒了，太胆小，不敢采取行动，真是丢人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Al Swearer [04017DB2] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's

ESP.ORIGINAL: Have you heard of El Quemador, "The Burner"? They say he has a great army in the old deserts of Mexico, and he roasts captives alive. Babaro!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你听说过"燃烧者"艾尔 奎马多吗？他们说他在墨西哥的老沙漠有一支庞大的军队，他会活生生地烤俘虏。真是个野蛮人！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vasquez [04035DD5] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\aaFrosthil_aaFrosthillGene_0006F57C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: El Gran Desierto de Altar is not a place for men. It is for beasts and demons, nothing else.
ESP.TRADUIT: 大祭坛沙漠不是什么供人居住的地方。那是只有野兽和魔鬼存在的地方，没有别的东西能在那活着。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vasquez [04035DD5] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\aaFrosthil_aaFrosthillGene_0006F57C_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have heard stories of a great slave rebellion near Flagstaff, deep in the heart of Legion territory, led by a man named Spartacus.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我听说过在弗拉格斯塔夫附近，在军团领地的中心地带，有一个叫斯巴达克斯的人领导了一场大规模的奴隶起义。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vasquez [04035DD5] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\aaFrosthil_aaFrosthillGene_0006F57D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The pitiful creatures will probably all be crucified, but I pray for them. Ojala that they can taste freedom one day, even if it is in death.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这些可怜的生物们可能都会被钉死的，但我会为他们祈祷。奥贾拉说，他们有一天会尝到自由的滋味，即使是在死亡中。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vasquez [04035DD5] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\aaFrosthil_aaFrosthillGene_0006F57D_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Travelers from the south say that a great of the Legion is gathered to attack a place called Firebase Zulu. What a silly name.
ESP.TRADUIT: 来自南方的旅行者说，军团中的一大群人聚集在一起，攻击一个叫做“烈火基地祖鲁”的地方。多傻的名字啊。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vasquez [04035DD5] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\aaFrosthil_aaFrosthillGene_0006F57E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Someone told me of a strange cult led by someone named Zimmer, supposedly a former mobster. Preposterous!
ESP.TRADUIT: 有人告诉我一个叫齐默的人领导了一个奇怪的邪教，据说他以前是个黑手党。真是荒谬！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vasquez [04035DD5] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\aaFrosthil_aaFrosthillGene_0006F57F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I recently met a merchant who had passed through a place called Goliad. He told me that the ranchers and farmers are about to have a range war.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我最近遇到一个商人，他路过一个叫歌利亚的地方。他告诉我农场主和农工要开战了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vasquez [04035DD5] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\aaFrosthil_aaFrosthillGene_0006F580_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Brimley over at the hotel has a rat infestation, so I heard. I'd clean the place up if he wasn't being such a tightwad about the fee.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我听布里姆利说旅馆那边有老鼠出没。如果他不在费用上那么吝啬的话，我会把那地方打扫干净的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Big Tim Matheson [04035DD7] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaFrosthil_aaFrosthillGene_00075045_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Last week a traveler from down south was telling stories about some slave revolt over in Arizona, right outside Flagstaff.
ESP.TRADUIT: 上周，一位来自南方的旅行者讲述了亚利桑那州在弗拉格斯塔夫郊外发生的奴隶起义的事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Big Tim Matheson [04035DD7] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaFrosthil_aaFrosthillGene_00075046_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hard to believe something like that could happen in the Legion's backyard, but who knows?
ESP.TRADUIT: 很难相信在军团的后院会发生这样的事，但谁知道呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Big Tim Matheson [04035DD7] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaFrosthil_aaFrosthillGene_00075046_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: A few merchants have disappeared outside of town recently. People say it is a strange cannibal hiding in the mountains, but I think it was animals.
ESP.TRADUIT: 最近有几个商人在城外失踪了。人们说这是藏在山里的奇怪的食人族干的，但我还是认为是动物袭击了他们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vasquez [04035DD5] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\aaFrosthil_aaFrosthillGene_0006F581_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How did you end up Frosthill?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你怎么会来到霜地的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Once I was a robber of banks. I was very, very good. It was an enjoyable life, full of irony and pity... until I angered the NCR.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我曾经是银行劫匪。我干的非常非常好。这是一种愉快的生活，充满了讽刺和怜悯。。。直到我激怒了NCR。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vasquez [04035DD5] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\aaFrosthil_aaVazquezYourSt_0006F57A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Stealing bullion from one of their reserve banks hit a nerve in the great oso. They sent rangers to kill me, but I was too quick.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我从他们的一家储备银行偷金条，这触动了大熊的神经。他们派巡警来杀我，但我实在是太快了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vasquez [04035DD5] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\aaFrosthil_aaVazquezYourSt_0006F57A_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have made a good life here since. A cold life, but a good one nonetheless. I believe such cold is a small taste of death, so it makes me uneasy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 从那以后我在这里过得很好。这是种冰冷的生活，但仍然是美好的。我相信这样的寒冷是一种对死亡的浅尝，所以它才使我不安。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vasquez [04035DD5] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\aaFrosthil_aaVazquezYourSt_0006F57A_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaFrosthillDialogue.VasquezStory to 1
Yes, yes. So many jokes about it. I just like the touch of money, even the smell. It is life in the palm of your hands, no?
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，是的。关于它的笑话太多了。我只是喜欢金钱的触感，甚至是气味。那会是你藏在手里的生活，不是吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vasquez [04035DD5] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\aaFrosthil_aaVazquezYourSt_00072F51_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Think about it. You have food, entertainment, travel, even sex when you hold currency. Doesn't matter if it's caps, paper, or funny Legion gold.
ESP.TRADUIT: 想想看。当你持有货币时，你有食物，娱乐，旅行，甚至性。不管是瓶盖、纸币还是有趣的军团金币。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vasquez [04035DD5] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\aaFrosthil_aaVazquezYourSt_00072F51_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You have money, you can do anything, you can be anybody. I sleep better knowing that I have such power.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有钱，你可以做任何事，你可以成为任何人。我知道自己有这样的能力，所以我才睡得更香。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vasquez [04035DD5] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\aaFrosthil_aaVazquezYourSt_00072F51_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaFrosthillDialogue.VasquezStory to 2
So you're a bank robber... who opened a bank?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以你是个银行劫匪。。。谁开的银行？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sadly, I have no family left. I turned ghoul not long after the war, so I cannot make little Vazquezes, not that it stops me from trying, you know?
ESP.TRADUIT: 不幸的是，我已经没有家人了。战后不久我就变成了尸鬼，所以我不能制造"小吸血鬼"，不是因为它阻止了我的尝试，你知道吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vasquez [04035DD5] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\aaFrosthil_aaVazquezYourSt_00072F52_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It is such a different world than what came before. Families are so rare, so fragile. It is a blessing to see the little ones here in town.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是一个与以前完全不同的世界。家庭如此罕见，如此脆弱。在城里看到这些小家伙真是太好了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vasquez [04035DD5] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\aaFrosthil_aaVazquezYourSt_00072F52_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What about you? Do you have a family, traveler?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你呢？你有家人吗，旅行者？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vasquez [04035DD5] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\aaFrosthil_aaVazquezYourSt_00072F52_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaFrosthillDialogue.VasquezStory to 3
Do you have any family or friends in town?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在城里有家人或朋友吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: How do I get women? Oh, ok, so you're looking for some tips?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我怎么把女人搞到手的？哦，好吧，你是在找些小技巧吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vasquez [04035DD5] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\aaFrosthil_aaVazquezYourSt_0009B91D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, I can tell you for one it helps to be me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我可以告诉你一件事，当"我"会有帮助的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vasquez [04035DD5] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\aaFrosthil_aaVazquezYourSt_0009B91D_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Secondly, if you had a voice of gold like this. That would help too, I suppose.
ESP.TRADUIT: 其次，如果你有像我这样金子般的嗓音的话。我想那也会有帮助的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vasquez [04035DD5] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\aaFrosthil_aaVazquezYourSt_0009B91D_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaFrosthillDialogue.VasquezStory to 4
I'm curious - how do you pick up women?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我很好奇-你是怎么结识女人的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I should get going.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我该走了。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vasquez [04035DD5] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who are you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是谁？

ESP.ORIGINAL: John Brookshire, serving in an official capacity for the New California Republic. I'm the man who signs the paychecks around here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 约翰·布鲁克希尔，我以官方身份为新加州共和国服务。我是在这里签工资单的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brookshire [0402E666] (mod) Quest : ([04029364]aaHunterDialogue) Dialogue for Named Bounty Hunters EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaNVB3GenericVoiceType\aaHunterDi_aaBrookshireWho_0004D42F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd like to ask you a question.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想问你一个问题。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's on your mind?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在想什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brookshire [0402E666] (mod) Quest : ([04029364]aaHunterDialogue) Dialogue for Named Bounty Hunters EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaNVB3GenericVoiceType\aaHunterDi_aaBrookshireAsk_0004D42E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I should get going.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我该走了。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Thorne [04020845] (mod) Quest : ([04029364]aaHunterDialogue) Dialogue for Named Bounty Hunters EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : Thorne [0405C8F3] (mod) Quest : ([04029364]aaHunterDialogue) Dialogue for Named Bounty Hunters EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : Brookshire [0402E666] (mod) Quest : ([04029364]aaHunterDialogue) Dialogue for Named Bounty Hunters EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ok, bye.
ESP.TRADUIT: 行，再见。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ford [0402856D] (mod) Quest : ([04029364]aaHunterDialogue) Dialogue for Named Bounty Hunters EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: How did the NCR get involved with Randall?
ESP.TRADUIT: NCR是怎么跟兰道尔扯上关系的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Randall came to us, actually. He was short on funds and armament, and we had long since known about Frosthill and its renegade population.
ESP.TRADUIT: 实际上，是兰道尔来找我们的。他缺乏资金和武器，而我们早就知道霜地和在这里的叛变人口。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brookshire [0402E666] (mod) Quest : ([04029364]aaHunterDialogue) Dialogue for Named Bounty Hunters EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaNVB3GenericVoiceType\aaHunterDi_aaBrookshireWho_0004D433_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's a standing bounty on almost every person here. Some of them have been running from justice for decades.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这里几乎每个人都有悬赏。而其中一些人数十年来一直都在逃避司法制裁。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brookshire [0402E666] (mod) Quest : ([04029364]aaHunterDialogue) Dialogue for Named Bounty Hunters EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaNVB3GenericVoiceType\aaHunterDi_aaBrookshireWho_0004D433_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: While Marko has not committed any known crimes against the NCR yet, many of his men have. With that in mind, we elected to partner with Randall.
ESP.TRADUIT: 虽然马尔科还没有对NCR犯下任何已知的罪行，但他的许多手下都犯过。考虑到这一点，我们选择与兰道尔进行合作。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brookshire [0402E666] (mod) Quest : ([04029364]aaHunterDialogue) Dialogue for Named Bounty Hunters EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaNVB3GenericVoiceType\aaHunterDi_aaBrookshireWho_0004D433_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thanks to Randall's reputation and our money, we now have a strong contingent of bounty hunters, perhaps enough to reckon with the outlaw populace.
ESP.TRADUIT: 多亏了兰道尔的名声和我们的资金，我们现在有了一支强大的赏金猎人队伍，也许强大到足以对付那些非法的民众。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brookshire [0402E666] (mod) Quest : ([04029364]aaHunterDialogue) Dialogue for Named Bounty Hunters EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaNVB3GenericVoiceType\aaHunterDi_aaBrookshireWho_0004D433_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How did you wind up here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你怎么到这里来的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you have any extra work for me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有什么额外的工作给我吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I do have some additional bounties that Randall passed on. Seems if they're not directly related to his crusade against Marko, he's not interested.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我还有一些兰道尔传给我的额外通缉令。那些人和他要讨伐的马尔科的十字军没有直接关系，因此他对他们并不感兴趣。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brookshire [0402E666] (mod) Quest : ([04029364]aaHunterDialogue) Dialogue for Named Bounty Hunters EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaNVB3GenericVoiceType\aaHunterDi_aaBrookshireExt_00061047_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Some of these targets are even of a... political nature. Bringing these people to justice is important to my superiors. So... are you interested?
ESP.TRADUIT: 其中一些目标甚至是。。。含有政治性质的。把这些人绳之以法对我的上级很重要。所以。。。你有兴趣吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brookshire [0402E666] (mod) Quest : ([04029364]aaHunterDialogue) Dialogue for Named Bounty Hunters EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaNVB3GenericVoiceType\aaHunterDi_aaBrookshireExt_00061047_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are bounty hunters authorized to kill the residents of Frosthill?
ESP.TRADUIT: 赏金猎人有权杀死霜地的居民吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, absolutely not. Although they're wanted, I want to arrange for a peaceful resolution with the more civilized elements in the canyon.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，绝对没有，虽然他们是被通缉的，但我想安排一个和平的解决方案，让峡谷里的文明人更多一些。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brookshire [0402E666] (mod) Quest : ([04029364]aaHunterDialogue) Dialogue for Named Bounty Hunters EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaNVB3GenericVoiceType\aaHunterDi_aaBrookshireWha_0004D435_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have made multiple attempts at a diplomatic solution, but my offers have been rebuffed each and every time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我曾多次试图通过外交途径解决问题，但每次都遭到拒绝。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brookshire [0402E666] (mod) Quest : ([04029364]aaHunterDialogue) Dialogue for Named Bounty Hunters EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaNVB3GenericVoiceType\aaHunterDi_aaBrookshireWha_0004D435_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I even put amnesty on the table, provided they accept NCR control. They acted as if I wanted their firstborn. Asinine.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果他们愿意接受NCR的控制，我甚至会把特赦放在桌面上。他们表现得好像我想要夺走他们的长子一样。真是愚蠢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brookshire [0402E666] (mod) Quest : ([04029364]aaHunterDialogue) Dialogue for Named Bounty Hunters EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaNVB3GenericVoiceType\aaHunterDi_aaBrookshireWha_0004D435_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Randall believes that this can be a peaceful, independent community once Marko and his ilk are gone, but I disagree.
ESP.TRADUIT: 兰道尔认为，只要马尔科和他的同类们离开，这里就可以成为一个和平、独立的社区，但我不同意他的想法。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brookshire [0402E666] (mod) Quest : ([04029364]aaHunterDialogue) Dialogue for Named Bounty Hunters

ESP.ORIGINAL: Only with the firm leadership of the NCR can Frosthill put its outlaw past behind it. The law will have its day, whether they like it or not.
ESP.TRADUIT: 只有在NCR的坚定领导下，霜地才能将其亡命之徒的过去完全隐藏。不管他们喜不喜欢，法律终有一天会制裁他们的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brookshire [0402E666] (mod) Quest : ([04029364]aaHunterDialogue) Dialogue for Named Bounty Hunters EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaNVB3GenericVoiceType\aaHunterDi_aaBrookshireWha_0004D435_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: When this is finished, the residents will have to choose between the NCR or... life elsewhere. Violence, however, is out of the question.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当这完成后，居民将不得不在NCR或。。。别的地方生活。然而，暴力是无路如何都无法被接受的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brookshire [0402E666] (mod) Quest : ([04029364]aaHunterDialogue) Dialogue for Named Bounty Hunters EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaNVB3GenericVoiceType\aaHunterDi_aaBrookshireWha_0004D435_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If I could convince the townspeople to allow NCR control, would you guarantee amnesty?
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我能说服镇民们同意接受NCR的控制，你能保证大赦他们吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Absolutely! That's what's in the offer, more or less. We want a smooth, profitable transition from outlawry to civilization. Nothing more.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然！这就是我们的回报，或多或少。我们希望这会个有利可图的从非法到文明的平稳过渡。没别的了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brookshire [0402E666] (mod) Quest : ([04029364]aaHunterDialogue) Dialogue for Named Bounty Hunters EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaNVB3GenericVoiceType\aaHunterDi_aaBrookshireWha_0004D438_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The bottom line is that we want the outlaws gone and the town turned legitimate... with proper leadership.
ESP.TRADUIT: 归根结底，我们想让不法分子消失，让这个城镇变得合法。。。还能有适当的领导。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brookshire [0402E666] (mod) Quest : ([04029364]aaHunterDialogue) Dialogue for Named Bounty Hunters EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaNVB3GenericVoiceType\aaHunterDi_aaBrookshireWha_0004D438_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: With your reputation, perhaps you'll succeed where I failed. In that event, I'll see that you're rewarded when this is settled. Good luck.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有了你的名声，也许你会在我失败的地方成功。如果是那样的话，我会保证你会得到应有的回报的。祝你好运。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brookshire [0402E666] (mod) Quest : ([04029364]aaHunterDialogue) Dialogue for Named Bounty Hunters EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaNVB3GenericVoiceType\aaHunterDi_aaBrookshireWha_0004D438_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaHunterDialogue.BrookeshireTown to 5
It sounds like you've tried everything. It's their own fault for being stubborn.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听起来你什么都试过了。固执己见的确是他们自己的错。

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's a sad situation, but that's the truth of it. The law is coming, one way or another. They'll have to learn the hard way.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是一个悲哀的局面，但这是事实。不管怎样，法律即将出台。而他们将不得不努力学会适应。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brookshire [0402E666] (mod) Quest : ([04029364]aaHunterDialogue) Dialogue for Named Bounty Hunters EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaNVB3GenericVoiceType\aaHunterDi_aaBrookshireWha_0004D43D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaHunterDialogue.BrookeshireTown to 200
aaBrookshireYourStory
ESP.TRADUIT: aa布鲁克希尔故事

ESP.ORIGINAL: What are you going to do after all this?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这一切之后你打算怎么办？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why can't you offer amnesty to the residents? Most of them seem peaceful enough.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你为什么不能赦免居民？他们大多数人看起来都足够和平了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Will there be a bounty on Marko?
ESP.TRADUIT: 马尔科身上会有赏金吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: There actually isn't a formal bounty out on Marko, at least as far as the NCR is concerned. Whatever he did back east, it didn't affect the republic.
ESP.TRADUIT: 事实上，马尔科并没有正式的赏金，至少就NCR而言。不管他在东部做了什么，他的行为都没有影响到共和国。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brookshire [0402E666] (mod) Quest : ([04029364]aaHunterDialogue) Dialogue for Named Bounty Hunters EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaNVB3GenericVoiceType\aaHunterDi_aaBrookshireMar_00061046_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: With that said, some of his gang members most definitely have a history with us. Once the canyon is secured, I'm sure we'll work something out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 话虽如此，他的一些帮派成员肯定和我们有过渊源。一旦峡谷安全下来了，我相信我们会解决这个问题的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brookshire [0402E666] (mod) Quest : ([04029364]aaHunterDialogue) Dialogue for Named Bounty Hunters EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaNVB3GenericVoiceType\aaHunterDi_aaBrookshireMar_00061046_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I want to talk about Frosthill becoming annexed by the NCR.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想谈谈NCR想要吞并霜地的事。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ha! That... that's a good one. Christ, you're serious? Did Brookshire send you? That damn snake.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哈！那...那是个好主意。天哪，你是认真的？是布鲁克希尔派你来的吗？那条该死的蛇。（指诱惑亚当与夏娃吃下禁果的那条蛇）
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brian Jeffers [04037175] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Everyone here, particularly me, came here to get away from the NCR. We would sooner drop dead than live under the bear.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这里的每个人，特别是我，都是来这里躲避NCR的。我们宁愿死也不愿活在熊的管理下。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brian Jeffers [04037175] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaJeffersJoinNCRSpeech01
Fine. {Frustrated}Fine! I'll hear your goddamn offer. Doesn't mean it will do any good.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的。{沮丧}很好！我会听到你那该死的提议的。但这并不意味着它会对我有任何好处。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brian Jeffers [04037175] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: You have nothing to lose by hearing a new offer. Fuming about the past gets you nowhere.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听从一个系的长官可没有什么能让你失去的。对过去愤怒只让你一事无成。

ESP.ORIGINAL: For your sake, I hope you don't believe the drivel coming from your mouth. Idiot.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看在你的份上，我希望你自己都不要相信从你嘴里冒出来的胡言乱语。白痴。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brian Jeffers [04037175] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: C'mon, the NCR isn't that bad, is it? Brookshire seems like a square guy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 拜托，NCR没那么糟吧？布鲁克希尔似乎是个正派的人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaJeffersJoinNCRSpeech02
aaJeffersJoinNCRCharisma
I didn't realize Brookshire was so determined. Damn him and the fucking bear. We don't have much choice then, do we? We can't fight them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我没意识到布鲁克希尔这么坚决，该死的他和那头该死的熊。那我们就别无选择了，是吗？我们没办法对抗他们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brian Jeffers [04037175] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: You tell him... {Struggling to restrain anger}tell him that I'll discuss annexation when the bounty hunters are gone and we have guaranteed amnesty.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你告诉他。。。{努力克制愤怒}告诉他，当赏金猎人走了，保证我们被大赦时，我会跟他讨论吞并的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brian Jeffers [04037175] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: In the meantime, this stays between you and me. I may call on you to help convince these folks when the time comes, and it won't be easy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在此期间，这件事只能一直保持在你和我之间。到时候我可能会请你帮忙说服这些人，但这可不容易。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brian Jeffers [04037175] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: Damn you and Brookshire for putting me in this position. I guess the bear will keep fucking us until we're all dead, huh? Get out of here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 诅咒你和该死的布鲁克希尔让我陷入这种处境。我想熊会一直干我们直到我们都死光了才好。对吗？滚出去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brian Jeffers [04037175] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaHunterDialogue.BrookeshireTown to 12
Once Marko is gone, the townspeople will have to accept the NCR or hit the bricks.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一旦马尔科走了，市民将不得不接受NCR或开始罢工。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Get the fuck out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 给我他妈的滚出去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brian Jeffers [04037175] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: The NCR will bring freedom, security, and rule of law. What's not to like?
ESP.TRADUIT: NCR将带来自由、安全和法治。你到底不喜欢什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaJeffersJoinNCRBarter
Well, this is... generous.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，这可真是。。。慷慨大方。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brian Jeffers [04037175] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: You tell him... {Struggling to restrain anger}tell him that I'll discuss annexation when the bounty hunters are gone and we have guaranteed amnesty.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你告诉他。。。{努力克制愤怒}告诉他，当赏金猎人走了，保证我们被大赦时，我会跟他讨论吞并的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brian Jeffers [04037175] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: In the meantime, this stays between you and me. I may call on you to help convince these folks when the time comes, and it won't be easy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在此期间，这件事只能一直保持在你和我之间。到时候我可能会请你帮忙说服这些人，但这可不容易。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brian Jeffers [04037175] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: If the NCR is serious about respecting property rights and commerce, this might work out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果NCR真的会认真与尊重产权和商业的话，也许我们能解决问题吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brian Jeffers [04037175] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaHunterDialogue.BrookeshireTown to 14 player.removeitem caps001 5000
Consider this a down payment on the rewards to come. <Pay 5,000 caps>
ESP.TRADUIT: 请把这看作是对未来奖励的首付。<支付5000瓶盖>

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you honestly think that food could offset betraying my principles? I mean, it has been done... with muffins, I think. But that's irrelevant.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你真的认为食物可以抵消对我原则的背叛吗？我是说，它已经完成了。。。如果是松饼的话。但这无关紧要。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brian Jeffers [04037175] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: My answer is a resounding "Fuck no". Understand? Good.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的回答是响亮的“他妈的不”。明白吗？很好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brian Jeffers [04037175] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaHunterDialogue.BrookeshireTown to 14 player.removeitem caps001 5000
The NCR can be very generous. How about a lifetime supply of sweetrolls?
ESP.TRADUIT: NCR可以是非常慷慨的。可以一辈子享受的糖果怎么样？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaJeffersJoinNCRNevermind
<Remain Silent>
ESP.TRADUIT: <保持沉默>

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, one of those types? You know, I'd offer you a glass of milk or some cookies, but I don't serve fucking children here. Idiot.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，是那种类型的吗？你知道，我会给你一杯牛奶或一些饼干，但我不为这里的孩子们服务。白痴。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Al Swearer [04017DB2] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaFrosthil_aaAlIntroSilent_00061DCF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm helping a friend.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在帮助一个朋友。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's fucking commendable. Most cocksuckers around here can't be asked to lift a finger for fuckall. Enjoy a complimentary libation.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是真他妈值得称赞。这里大多数的吸鸡巴傻逼都不能被要求为任何一点事举起一根手指。请享受免费的奠酒吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Al Swearer [04017DB2] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaFrosthil_aaAlIntroCool_00061DCC_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.additem whiskey 1
No offense, but I'd like to keep my business to myself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 无意冒犯，但我想把买卖留给自己。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I see, I see... keen on keeping the cards close to the chest, so to speak. Understandable in these heathen times of fuckall law.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我明白了，我明白了。。。可以这么说，你热衷于把牌放在靠近胸口的地方。在这充满异教徒的时代，这是可以理解的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Al Swearer [04017DB2] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaFrosthil_aaAlIntroEven_00061DCE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Great, another mouthy barkeep. Just shut up and get me a drink, ok?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好极了，又一个爱扯犊子的酒保。闭上嘴给我拿杯饮料，好吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Composed, yet threatening}Listen, shitheel. I wield this knife like an artist with a fucking paintbrush. I'll make a fucking still life out of your cunt face if you annoy me.
ESP.TRADUIT: {沉着，但有威胁性}听着，你这个卑鄙小人。我会像个画家用画笔一样挥舞着这把刀。如果你惹我生气，我他妈的会让你的臭脸变得死气沉沉的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Al Swearer [04017DB2] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaFrosthil_aaAlIntroDick_00061DCD_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Take my word for it - chems will wreck your world.
ESP.TRADUIT: 相信我的话-毒品会毁了你的一生的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, I can see that. I'll, uh... I'll go get help with the Followers, yeah.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，我看得出来。我，呃。。。我会去找人帮忙的，真的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jill [0400469F] (mod) Quest : ([04000DBC]aaNVB3Main01) The City of Woe EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Main01.JillGreeted to 15 aaJillRef.evp set aaNVB3Master.JillFate to 1
Go on.
ESP.TRADUIT: 继续。

ESP.ORIGINAL: On the eve of their battle, Marko sedated the leader and carried him to the rival encampment.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在他们战斗的前夜，马尔科给首领注射了镇静剂，并把他带到了敌方营地。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: With a rapt, surprised audience in full view, Marko blinded, castrated, and paralyzed his leader, then announced his intentions.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在全场观众目瞪口呆、惊讶不已的情况下，马尔科蒙住了他的眼睛、阉割并麻痹了他的领袖，然后宣布了他的意图。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: He declared himself leader of the rival tribe, and would face anyone who thought himself more worthy. None challenged him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他宣称自己是敌对部落的首领，并将直面任何认为比自己更有价值的人。没有人敢质疑他。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: With his intimate familiarity with his original clan's tactics, Marko led his men to an easy victory. The fate of the captured raiders was... grim.
ESP.TRADUIT: 由于他对原始部落的战术非常熟悉，马尔科带领他的部下轻松的获胜了。被俘的那些匪徒的命运是...十分严峻的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: Most were blinded, emasculated, and crippled, much like the leader. Additionally, they were disemboweled.
ESP.TRADUIT: 大多数人都被戳瞎，阉割，变得残废了，变得很像领袖了。除此之外，他们还被开膛破肚了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: For days, Marko allowed his dogs to feed on the entrails of the dying men, taking care to ensure their survival long enough to extend the agony.
ESP.TRADUIT: 几天来，马尔科让他的狗以垂死的人的内脏为食，注意确保他们的生存时间长到足以延长他们痛苦。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: They all died, eventually. Except the leader. He had a much worse fate. They say Marko carted him about for years, caged like an animal.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们最终都死了，除了那个首领。他的命运更糟。他们说马尔科像动物一样将他关在笼子里拖了好几年。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: He was a living reminder that crossing Marko could bring a fate far worse than death. No one ever questioned him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他活生生地提醒着我们，惹怒马尔科会带来比死亡更糟糕的命运。所以从来没有人敢质疑他。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've heard enough.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我已经听够了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's just a detailed account of someone who's likely planning your demise, so why listen, right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这只是关于很可能计划你死亡的人的详细描述罢了。这就是为什么你应该听下去，不是么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilAboutMa_0004DA44_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nevermind.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没关系。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Marko might be fast, but I'm faster.
ESP.TRADUIT: 马尔科也许很快，但我更加迅速。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You think you're good? Believe me, you ain't half as fast as Marko. Nobody, not even Doc Friday stands a chance in a straight fight.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你觉得你很厉害吗？相信我，你还没马尔科一半快。没有人，连星期五医生都没有机会跟马尔科打一架。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Oliver Doolin [04019DE6] (mod) Quest : ([0400FCB7]aaNVB3Main02) Devil's Due EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3DoolinGun_0004DA4B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Trust me, Marko won't see it coming. All I need is one clear shot.
ESP.TRADUIT: 相信我，马尔科不会预见到的。我只需要一次精准的射击罢了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You think he's going to show himself and let you pick him off? If you do fight, it will be on his terms, up close and quick.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你觉得他会自己跑出来让你把他带到地狱吗？如果你真的战斗的话，那就只能按他的条件来，你们会面对面，并且决斗快若瞬间。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Oliver Doolin [04019DE6] (mod) Quest : ([0400FCB7]aaNVB3Main02) Devil's Due EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3DoolinSni_0004DA4A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Where'd you get the Pip-Boy?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你从哪儿拿到这个哔哔小子的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I got this "Pip-Boy" as a child, when I was growing up in a vault. You like the light, don't you? No, don't touch it. You've got your own.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当我小时候在避难所里长大的时候，就有了这个"哔哔小子"（纠正）。你喜欢这光线，是吗？不，不要碰它。你明明有你自己的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilPipBoyI_0004E634_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaVirgilQuest.Vault to aaVirgilQuest.Vault + 1
Where gets piss boy?
ESP.TRADUIT: 哪里拿到尿尿小子？（低智力）

ESP.ORIGINAL: It was given to me when I came of age... so very long ago. Though it's unsightly and cumbersome, there's no questioning its value.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当我长大后它才到了我的手里。。。已经是很久以前了。虽然它难看又笨重，但毫无疑问的是它的价值。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilPipBoyI_00061DA5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The targeting alone has saved my skin more than a few times. Of all the paths I've walked, all the trials I've endured, it's been constant.
ESP.TRADUIT: 光是瞄准系统（VATS）就救了我好几次。这在我走过的所有道路中，在我经历的所有考验中，是永恒不变的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilPipBoyI_00061DA5_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, this Pip-Boy is better than a loyal hound... certainly superior to a wife. God, it's not even close.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，这个哔哔小子可比一只忠诚的猎犬要好的多。。。当然比妻子强。天哪，这俩甚至连边儿都沾不到。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilPipBoyI_00061DA5_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaVirgilQuest.Vault to aaVirgilQuest.Vault + 1
A vault. You know, one of the big buildings underground? My dad was mean, so I left the vault with my brother.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是一个"避难所"。你知道那是地下的一栋大楼吗？我父亲很刻薄，所以我和我弟弟一起离开了避难所。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilPipBoyI_0004E635_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaVirgilQuest.Vault to aaVirgilQuest.Vault + 1
You grow in wallet?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在钱包长大？(低智力）

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you find that remarkable? Most people have rather strong assumptions about vault dwellers. We're all naive, agoraphobic shut-ins, right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不觉得这很了不起吗？大多数人对避难所居民都有相当大的假设。我们都是天真的空旷恐惧症患者，不是么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilPipBoyI_00061DA6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Some of them never adapt to the outside, but me... I never liked being... trapped. As a boy, I constantly dreamed of life beyond the vault.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们中的一些人从不适应外界，但我。。。我从不喜欢。。。被困住。在小时候，我就一直梦想着避难所大门后的生活。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilPipBoyI_00061DA6_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I escaped through literature and comic books, never cared for school itself. My father... {Pained}punished me, even destroyed my books. I didn't care.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在文学和漫画书中逃避生活，从不关心学校本身。我父亲。。。{痛苦}惩罚了我，甚至毁了我的书。但我不在乎。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilPipBoyI_00061DA6_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I could paint grand vistas in my mind, climbing to the highest peaks while taking in real sunlight, breathing unfiltered air.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我可以在脑海中画出那些壮丽的景色，一边爬到最高的山峰，一边感受真正的阳光，呼吸未经过滤的空气。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilPipBoyI_00061DA6_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: My father hated his lot in the vault, working maintenance. He hated even more that I was content to spend my time withdrawn from his world.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我父亲讨厌他在避难所里的工作，当一个维修工。但他更恨我甘愿把时间花在从他的世界脱离出去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: He drank a lot, beat me and my brother when things boiled over. Overseer was a real traditional type, didn't want to interfere, so nothing changed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他喝了很多酒，当事情发展的过头的时候，他会狠狠地打我和弟弟。监管者真是一个老古董，他并不想干涉进来，所以一切都没有改变。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilPipBoyI_00061DA6_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Sarcastic}Dad had plans for me. {Dramatic}Maintenance and repair in the vault - an auspicious occupation! {Half-joking}I probably would've killed myself if I'd stayed in that vault.
ESP.TRADUIT: {讽刺的}爸爸可为我铺好了康庄大道。{戏剧性的}在避难所担任维护和维修的工作-多么吉祥的职业啊！{半开玩笑的}如果我继续呆在那个避难所里，我可能会自杀吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilPipBoyI_00061DA6_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaVirgilQuest.Vault to aaVirgilQuest.Vault + 1
Wait, you grew up in a vault?
ESP.TRADUIT: 等等，你在避难所长大？

ESP.ORIGINAL: After we left the {accenuating}vault, my brother made it to a town but I was captured by a mean slaver named Dickey. He was very, very bad.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们离开{强调的语气}"避难所"后，我和弟弟成功来到了一个城镇，但我被一个叫狄基的卑鄙奴隶贩子抓住了。他可是非常非常糟糕的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilPipBoyI_0004E636_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaVirgilQuest.Vault to aaVirgilQuest.Vault + 1
What after you leave wallet?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你离开钱包后什么？（低智力）

ESP.ORIGINAL: We left at night, but it was still disconcerting at first, seeing the sky above you, like an ocean bearing down on you. You feel so small.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们在晚上偷偷离开，但一开始还是很不安的，当你看到你头顶的天空，那感觉就像一片大海压在你身上。你甚至会觉得自己很渺小。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilPipBoyI_00061DA7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We adjusted soon enough, just kept walking east. It was so stupid in hindsight - a couple of kids with a baseball bat, nothing more.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们很快就适应了，继续向东走。但在事后看来，这太蠢了——两个孩子除了手里拿着棒球棒之外，什么都没有。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilPipBoyI_00061DA7_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You see, back east there aren't all these nations like you have here. It's just towns and tribes, with no real order. We had no idea.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你看，在东方并没有像你所处的那样的国家。只有城镇和部落，但那里并没有真正的秩序。那时我们知之甚少。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilPipBoyI_00061DA7_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I wish I could tell you we found a town and everything worked out. Not the case. We were picked up by slavers led by a man named Dickey.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我真希望我能告诉你我们找到了一个城镇，然后一切都平安无事。但并不是这样的。我们被一个叫狄基的人带领的奴隶贩子团伙抓走了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilPipBoyI_00061DA7_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dickey ran a roaming band who would lease out slaves to towns or raiding crews. To his credit, he was a sharp trader.
ESP.TRADUIT: 狄基经营着一夥扫荡者，他们会把奴隶出租给城镇或是土匪们。值得称赞的是，他可是个精明的交易者。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilPipBoyI_00061DA7_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I thought I had taken some harsh beatings, but the slavers made dad seem like some grandma with an old switch. They were merciless.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想我以前挨过几顿暴揍，但那些奴隶贩子们让我爸爸的教训看起来像是老婆婆的爱抚一样。他们真的很无情。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilPipBoyI_00061DA7_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It only bothered me when they hit my brother, though. He was no more than eight at the time, so they planned on making him a sex slave.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过，只有当他们打我弟弟的时候，我才会感到不安。当时他不到8岁，所以他们打算让他成为一个性奴隶。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilPipBoyI_00061DA7_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I despised Dickey not because of his cruelty, but because he was always smiling, whistling, making cracks.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会鄙视狄基并不是因为他的残忍，而是因为他总是保持微笑，吹口哨，开玩笑。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilPipBoyI_00061DA7_8.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dad may have been an abusive cretin, but at least he imparted some mechanical know-how. That's how I got the slave collars off.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许爸爸真的是个恶毒的白痴，但至少他传授了一些机械知识给我。我就是这样把奴隶项圈取下来的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilPipBoyI_00061DA7_9.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We ran until our blood burned and our bare feet bled, then ran some more. Dickey was tracking us with dogs, was close when I spotted the town.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们一直跑，直到我们的鲜血沸腾，赤足淌血，然后接着跑。狄基带着他的那群狗跟踪我们，当我发现小镇的时候，他就在我们附近。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilPipBoyI_00061DA7_10.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: In that moment I knew that we wouldn't make it. Dickey and his crew were too fast, so I sent my brother off towards the town while I backtracked.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在那一刻，我知道我们做不到了。狄基和他的队员们实在是跑得太快了，所以我把我弟弟送到镇上去了，而我却只身折返了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilPipBoyI_00061DA7_11.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He made it, I didn't. If I had known what awaited me... the sheer hell of it... I might have killed myself before they took me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他成功逃脱了，但我没有。如果我知道等待我的会是什么。。。真他妈的像是地狱。。。我可能在他们带走我之前就自杀了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilPipBoyI_00061DA7_12.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaVirgilQuest.Vault to aaVirgilQuest.Vault + 1
What happened after you escaped the vault?
ESP.TRADUIT: 在你逃离避难所之后发生了什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dickey was just bad. He made me work for no money, then forced me to fight other men in a cage.
ESP.TRADUIT: 狄基真的很坏。他让我白手起家，工作没有任何报酬，然后强迫我在笼子里和其他人打架。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilPipBoyI_0004E639_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaVirgilQuest.Vault to aaVirgilQuest.Vault + 1
What Hickey do?
ESP.TRADUIT: 希基做什么？（低智力）

ESP.ORIGINAL: What didn't Dickey do? {Seething}Five years. Five years of hell, that's what I got for leaving the vault and saving my brother.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你应该问狄基没有做什么？{愤怒到有些沸腾}五年。五年的地狱，这就是我离开避难所救我弟弟所得到的一切。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilPipBoyI_00061DA8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It was work, beatings, work, and then more beatings. All the while, there was Dickey's laughter... all the while I thought of my brother.
ESP.TRADUIT: 除了工作，殴打，工作，然后更多的殴打之外，什么都没有。不论何时，都有狄基的恶心的笑声。。。我一直在想我的弟弟。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilPipBoyI_00061DA8_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was near a man when Dickey got the idea of matching me up in the cage. That was a big draw, fighting slaves to the death. I knew it was my chance.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当狄基想到把我关在笼子里进行死斗时，我已经快要长成一个男人了。那是一场大抽签，与其他奴隶战斗,直到死亡。我知道这是我的机会。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilPipBoyI_00061DA8_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaVirgilQuest.Vault to aaVirgilQuest.Vault + 1
What did Dickey do when he re-captured you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 狄基再次抓到你后做了什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Has given up trying to explain}Yes, I fought on the stage. I fought with words... and songs. With my beautiful voice, I earned my freedom.
ESP.TRADUIT: {他已经放弃了解释}是的，我在舞台上战斗过。我用语言战斗。。。还有歌曲。我用优美的嗓音赢得了自由。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaVirgilQuest.Vault to aaVirgilQuest.Vault + 1
You fight on stage?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在舞台上战斗？（低智力）

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was strong enough from all the work, but I didn't know anything about real fighting. Dickey wanted to use me as bait for his stud fighter, Jay.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在所有的工作中都很坚强，但我对真正的战斗一无所知。狄基想用我做诱饵来引诱他种马斗士杰伊。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilPipBoyI_00061DA9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Guy had at least thirty pounds on me, had won a dozen matches. I saw him as an obstacle to my freedom, something between me and my brother.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那家伙比我重至少30磅，已经赢下了好几十场比赛了。我把他看作是我自由的障碍，是我和我弟弟之间的障碍。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilPipBoyI_00061DA9_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It was one of many lessons in the power of resolve. That man should have killed me, but I wanted it more, plain and simple.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是许多关于决心的教训之一。那个人应该杀了我的，但比起他，我更有决心，这简单明了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilPipBoyI_00061DA9_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He broke one arm and half my ribs, but I ended it when I gouged his eyes and then drove my heel through his skull like it was a piece of old fruit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他打断了我的一只胳膊和半根肋骨，但我戳爆了他的两只眼睛，然后像敲碎一块老水果一样把我的脚后跟踢进他的头骨里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilPipBoyI_00061DA9_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dickey wasn't laughing then. I was hurt, but seeing his face was worth every break and bruise that I'd suffered. It was the first time I killed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 狄基当时没笑。我受伤了，但看到他脸上的表情，这值得我遭受的每一次创伤。这是我第一次杀人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilPipBoyI_00061DA9_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not sure what Dickey had planned for me, because another man bought me on the spot. Guy named Thompson. He was all right.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道狄基为我做了什么计划，因为另一个人当场买下了我。那个叫汤普森的人。他还好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilPipBoyI_00061DA9_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thompson made me an offer: win enough matches and I'll set you free. Win a lot of matches and you can join the crew. So I did.
ESP.TRADUIT: 汤普森给了我一个条件：“赢得足够的比赛，我会让你自由。赢得很多很多的比赛，你就可以加入我的团队了。”所以我答应了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilPipBoyI_00061DA9_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So I fought... and I won. Every type of man, big, small, slow, fast, I found a way to kill them. It always boiled down to willpower, nothing else.
ESP.TRADUIT: 然后我不断地战斗。。。并且赢了。每一种类型的人，大的，小的，慢的，快的，我都想办法杀死了他们。我总是将胜利归结为意志力的强大，而不是别的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilPipBoyI_00061DA9_8.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thompson was an old fellow, gruff but fair. He pushed me hard but it paid off. He never beat me, not that I gave him reason. I respected him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 汤普森是个老家伙，虽然粗野但很漂亮。他向我狠狠地施压，但我还是成功了。他从不打我，不论我是不是给了任何他理由。因此我尊敬他。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilPipBoyI_00061DA9_9.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He recognized the fire burning in me, knew how to harness it without smothering me. Wasn't long before I was working alongside him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他认出了我体内那熊熊燃烧的火焰，知道如何驾驭它而不让我窒息。不久之后我就和他一起工作了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilPipBoyI_00061DA9_10.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: After Thompson died I was in charge. Wasn't long after that I met Marko, and the rest is... history?
ESP.TRADUIT: 汤普森死后我便开始全面负责。不久之后我遇到了马尔科，剩下的便算是...历史吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilPipBoyI_00061DA9_11.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaVirgilQuest.Vault to aaVirgilQuest.Vault + 1
What happened when you fought in the cage?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在笼子里打架时发生了什么事？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaVirgilPipBoyCharisma
ESP.TRADUIT: aa维吉尔哔哔小子魅力检定

ESP.ORIGINAL: When I was thirteen the water chip gave out, so we had to make contact with the outside. I wanted to leave with the scouting expedition, dad said no.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我十三岁的时候，避难所的净水芯片坏了，所以我们不得不和外面进行联系。我本想和侦察队一起离开，爸爸说不行。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilPipBoyC_0004E637_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I planned on sneaking out with my kid brother... couldn't leave him with dad. I got caught, and the old man pummeled me unconscious.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我打算和我弟弟一起溜出去。。。我不能把他留给爸爸。但我被抓住了，那个老人把我打晕了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilPipBoyC_0004E637_2.ogg
