ESP.ORIGINAL: I ended up in the infirmary, dad wound up in a cell. Didn't last, though. Overseer released him the next day. He had "Critical Skills".
ESP.TRADUIT: 我进了医务室，而爸爸进了牢房。不过，这没有持续多久。监工在第二天放了他。因为他身上的"关键技能"。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilPipBoyC_0004E637_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You see, I've found that life is a series of epiphanies. Some are minute, others hit you like a freight train. I had a big one in the infirmary.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你看，我发现生活是一系列的顿悟组成的：有的很小，有的却像一辆卡车撞到你身上一样。而我在医务室恰恰有一个大的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: I realized that the rules would always work against me and my dreams. Somebody with money or power pulls the strings, snuffs them out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我意识到这些规则总是违背我和我的梦想。那些有金钱或权力的人会操控我的一切，并掐灭我的梦想。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Puzzled Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilPipBoyC_0004E637_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It was that realization that finally pushed me over the edge... or made my balls drop. One night I picked up dad's bat and bashed his kneecaps.
ESP.TRADUIT: 正是这种意识最终把我推向了极端。。。或者让我有了种。一天晚上，我拿起爸爸的球棒，猛击他的膝盖骨。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilPipBoyC_0004E637_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He cried like little girl... apologized and confessed till he was hoarse. My stepmom stayed out of it. She was a timid soul.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他哭得像个小女孩。。。道歉并公开承认错误，直到他哭得声音嘶哑。我继母并没有插手，因为她是个胆小的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilPipBoyC_0004E637_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I told them that me and my brother were leaving, and that they shouldn't bother trying to find us. Dad just sobbed and nodded.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我告诉他们我和弟弟要离开了，他们不应该费心去找我们的。爸爸只是抽泣着点头。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilPipBoyC_0004E637_8.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There was a skeleton crew guarding the entrance, so we slipped out before they found dad. Don't know what became of him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有一个精干人员守卫着入口，所以我们在他们找到爸爸之前溜了出去。我不知道他后来怎么了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilPipBoyC_0004E637_9.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Knowing what I know now... I only wished I'd finished that bastard off. He was a waste of life.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在了解了我现在所知道的之后。。。我只希望那时候能把那个混蛋干掉。他只是在浪费生命。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilPipBoyC_0004E637_10.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How did you escape the vault?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是怎么逃离避难所的

ESP.ORIGINAL: I should get going.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我该走了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yep. Bye.
ESP.TRADUIT: 行。再见。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilPipBoyS_0004E638_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaNVB3Main04ThorneIntro
ESP.TRADUIT: aaNVB3主线04索恩导入

ESP.ORIGINAL: And the dead shall rise and walk the earth. I wasn't sure if you'd make it, but here you are, on your feet no less.
ESP.TRADUIT: 而死人却复活了，还在漫步大地。 我不确定你是否真的能做的到，但你现在就站在这儿，而且居然在慢慢恢复。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Thorne [0405C8F3] (mod) Quest : ([04035DD8]aaNVB3Main04) Ain't No Grave EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaThorneVoiceType\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main04Tho_0005041C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Main04.ThorneBark to 2 setquestdelay aaNVB3Main04 5 set aaHunterDialogue.ThorneGreeted to 50

ESP.TRADUIT: aaNVB3主线04更多的棺材主题

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Nails being driven}<Nails being driven>
ESP.TRADUIT: {钉子被定死}<钉子被定死>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mike from Maintenance [0402E6FB] (mod) Quest : ([04035DD8]aaNVB3Main04) Ain't No Grave EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main04Mor_00050423_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: aaNVB3主线04挖局主题01

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Digging>
ESP.TRADUIT: <挖掘的声音>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mike from Maintenance [0402E6FB] (mod) Quest : ([04035DD8]aaNVB3Main04) Ain't No Grave EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main04Dig_00050426_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: aaNVB3主线04挖掘02

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Digging>
ESP.TRADUIT: <挖掘的声音>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mike from Maintenance [0402E6FB] (mod) Quest : ([04035DD8]aaNVB3Main04) Ain't No Grave EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main04Dig_00050427_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How did I end up in here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我怎么会在这里？

ESP.ORIGINAL: What? Look, you're not dead. I tracked Marko and his boys after... what happened in town. Saw they aimed to bury you alive, so I watched and waited.
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么？听着，你没死。我跟踪了马尔科和他的手下...还有城里发生的那些事。我看到他们想活埋你，所以我才等着看着。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Thorne [0405C8F3] (mod) Quest : ([04035DD8]aaNVB3Main04) Ain't No Grave EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaThorneVoiceType\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main04Tho_0005042D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Marko cleared out and left a pair of men behind, so I slipped in and took them down with a flash-bang and a few smacks with my baton.
ESP.TRADUIT: 马尔科走了出去，留下了一对男人看守，所以我溜了进去，一闪而过，用我的警棍打了他们几下。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Thorne [0405C8F3] (mod) Quest : ([04035DD8]aaNVB3Main04) Ain't No Grave EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaThorneVoiceType\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main04Tho_0005042D_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then I went to digging as fast as possible, found you unconscious but breathing. Lucky for you that doc had some blood in his stores.
ESP.TRADUIT: 然后我尽可能最快地去挖掘，才发现你昏迷不醒但还在呼吸。你是太走运了，医生在他的店里有存了血。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Thorne [0405C8F3] (mod) Quest : ([04035DD8]aaNVB3Main04) Ain't No Grave EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaThorneVoiceType\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main04Tho_0005042D_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I managed to get you up here in the dark, got that blood in you, then patched up your hands. You're damn lucky, you know that?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我设法让你在黑暗中爬了上来，把血输进你身上，然后修补了你的手。你真幸运，知道吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Thorne [0405C8F3] (mod) Quest : ([04035DD8]aaNVB3Main04) Ain't No Grave EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaThorneVoiceType\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main04Tho_0005042D_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I is ghost?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我死鬼？（低智力）

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tracked Marko and his boys after... what happened in town. Saw they aimed to bury you alive, so I watched and waited.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我跟踪了马尔科和他的手下...还有城里发生的那些事。我看到他们想活埋你，所以我才等着看着。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Thorne [0405C8F3] (mod) Quest : ([04035DD8]aaNVB3Main04) Ain't No Grave EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaThorneVoiceType\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main04Tho_00061DC0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Marko cleared out and left a pair of men behind, so I slipped in and took them down with a flash-bang and a few smacks with my baton.
ESP.TRADUIT: 马尔科走了出去，留下了一对男人看守，所以我溜了进去，一闪而过，用我的警棍打了他们几下。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Thorne [0405C8F3] (mod) Quest : ([04035DD8]aaNVB3Main04) Ain't No Grave EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaThorneVoiceType\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main04Tho_00061DC0_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then I went to digging as fast as possible, found you unconscious but breathing. Lucky for you that doc had some blood in his stores.
ESP.TRADUIT: 然后我尽可能最快地去挖掘，才发现你昏迷不醒但还在呼吸。你是太走运了，医生在他的店里有存了血。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Thorne [0405C8F3] (mod) Quest : ([04035DD8]aaNVB3Main04) Ain't No Grave EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaThorneVoiceType\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main04Tho_00061DC0_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I managed to get you up here in the dark, got that blood in you, then patched up your hands. You're damn lucky, you know that?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我设法让你在黑暗中爬了上来，把血输进你身上，然后修补了你的手。你真幸运，知道吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Thorne [0405C8F3] (mod) Quest : ([04035DD8]aaNVB3Main04) Ain't No Grave EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaThorneVoiceType\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main04Tho_00061DC0_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whoa, where am I?
ESP.TRADUIT: 啥，我在哪？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Doolin's shack. Seeing as to how the previous owner no longer had a stake in it, I figured it was good enough for my needs. At least it's warm.
ESP.TRADUIT: 杜林的小屋。看到以前的老板怎么不再有他的股份，我想这已经足够满足我的需要了。至少这里天气暖和。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Thorne [0405C8F3] (mod) Quest : ([04035DD8]aaNVB3Main04) Ain't No Grave EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaThorneVoiceType\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main04Tho_0005042B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Where us?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们哪？（低智力）

ESP.ORIGINAL: Doolin's shack. Seeing as to how the previous owner no longer had a stake in it, I figured it was good enough for my needs. At least it's warm.
ESP.TRADUIT: 杜林的小屋。看到以前的老板怎么不再有他的股份，我想这已经足够满足我的需要了。至少这里天气暖和。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Thorne [0405C8F3] (mod) Quest : ([04035DD8]aaNVB3Main04) Ain't No Grave EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaThorneVoiceType\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main04Tho_00061DC4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you still running with the other hunters? I'll cut your fucking nuts off if you cross me!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你还在和其他赏金猎共事吗？你要是敢惹我生气，我就把你的蛋蛋砍掉！

ESP.ORIGINAL: You won't be cutting anything with your hands like that. I did my best, but they're still pretty mangled. Oh, and I'm not with the other hunters now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不再会那样用手切任何东西了。我已经尽力了，但他们还是被严重撕裂了。哦，我现在的确不跟其他猎人在一起了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Thorne [0405C8F3] (mod) Quest : ([04035DD8]aaNVB3Main04) Ain't No Grave EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaThorneVoiceType\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main04Tho_0005042C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why did you help me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你为什么帮我？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I knew something was going down when Brookshire pulled us aside before the op, told everyone there would be bounties on the townspeople.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当布鲁克希尔在手术前把我们拉到一边，告诉所有人镇上的那些人都有奖金的时候，我知道有什么不好的事情要发生了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Thorne [0405C8F3] (mod) Quest : ([04035DD8]aaNVB3Main04) Ain't No Grave EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaThorneVoiceType\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main04Tho_00050439_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He told us to keep our mouths shut and follow Marko's lead when the time came. Most everyone nodded and smiled, didn't even question him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他叫我们闭嘴，到时候跟着马尔科走。大多数人都点头微笑，甚至没有问他。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Thorne [0405C8F3] (mod) Quest : ([04035DD8]aaNVB3Main04) Ain't No Grave EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaThorneVoiceType\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main04Tho_00050439_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I had no loyalty to Randall, but it bothered me regardless. Brookshire told us to round up everyone in town, that he would handle you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我对兰道尔一点也不忠诚，但不管怎样，这件事还是困扰着我。布鲁克希尔叫我们把镇上所有人都召集起来，而他会处理你的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Thorne [0405C8F3] (mod) Quest : ([04035DD8]aaNVB3Main04) Ain't No Grave EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaThorneVoiceType\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main04Tho_00050439_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I didn't know what he had in store. I mean, I thought they'd capture everybody and haul them back for a trial. That's what they're supposed to do.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道他心理盘算的还有什么。我是说，我以为他们会抓到所有人并把他们带回去审判。这就是他们应该做的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Thorne [0405C8F3] (mod) Quest : ([04035DD8]aaNVB3Main04) Ain't No Grave EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaThorneVoiceType\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main04Tho_00050439_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I also didn't know that Brookshire would trade you and Randall out. I thought he would just tell you to fuck off, in typical NCR fashion.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我也不知道布鲁克希尔会出卖你和兰道尔。我以为他会告诉你滚开，用最典型的NCR方式。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Thorne [0405C8F3] (mod) Quest : ([04035DD8]aaNVB3Main04) Ain't No Grave EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaThorneVoiceType\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main04Tho_00050439_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: See, they had me posted up at the church, waiting with a rifle in case you tried anything. I had a clear view of everything, that's for sure.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看，他们把我安置在教堂里，拿着枪等着你，以防万一。我什么都看清楚了，这是肯定的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Thorne [0405C8F3] (mod) Quest : ([04035DD8]aaNVB3Main04) Ain't No Grave

ESP.ORIGINAL: I didn't know they'd kill them all right there, let Marko kill Randall... I should have done something, but I just... I just froze.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道他们会在那里杀了他们，放任马尔科杀了兰道尔...我应该做点什么，但我只是...我只是僵住了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Thorne [0405C8F3] (mod) Quest : ([04035DD8]aaNVB3Main04) Ain't No Grave

ESP.ORIGINAL: Marko was in the crosshairs, but I couldn't... I couldn't do it. I was... I was scared. Goddamn shameful fucking coward, that's what I am.
ESP.TRADUIT: 马尔科就在我的十字准星里面，但我不能...我做不到。我是...我很害怕。那该死的可耻的胆小鬼，就是我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Thorne [0405C8F3] (mod) Quest : ([04035DD8]aaNVB3Main04) Ain't No Grave EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaThorneVoiceType\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main04Tho_00050439_8.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The treatment you mentioned requires some skill. Where did you learn to practice medicine?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你提到的治疗需要一些技巧。你在哪里学会行医的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Followers of the Apocalypse. I was a physician for a time, enjoyed helping people. That was all I wanted to do as a young man.
ESP.TRADUIT: 天启追随者。我做过一段时间的医生，喜欢帮助别人。这就是我年轻时想做的一切。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Thorne [0405C8F3] (mod) Quest : ([04035DD8]aaNVB3Main04) Ain't No Grave EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaThorneVoiceType\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main04Tho_00050438_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But when you see good people get hurt and nothing is done, nothing changes... it can move you to action. I thought I could make things right.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但当你看到好人受到伤害而什么也没做成，什么也没变的时候。。。它能驱使你行动起来。我本以为我能把事情做好的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Thorne [0405C8F3] (mod) Quest : ([04035DD8]aaNVB3Main04) Ain't No Grave EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaThorneVoiceType\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main04Tho_00050438_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's why I hunted men down for so long. It was never about money. Every one I gunned down was a tiny piece of justice for what I'd lost.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以我才猎杀了这么久的人。从来都不是为了钱。我枪杀的每一个人都是用来弥补我所失去的正义的一小部分。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Thorne [0405C8F3] (mod) Quest : ([04035DD8]aaNVB3Main04) Ain't No Grave EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaThorneVoiceType\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main04Tho_00050438_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You do it for enough time and you stop seeing them as men. They're everything you hate... everything you fear... personified.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当你做了足够久的时候，你就不再把那些人看作人类了。它们只是你讨厌的一切。。。你害怕的一切。。。的具象罢了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Thorne [0405C8F3] (mod) Quest : ([04035DD8]aaNVB3Main04) Ain't No Grave EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaThorneVoiceType\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main04Tho_00050438_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe I can go back to the Followers, start practicing again somewhere, start over. I'm done killing, though. That I can promise you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许我可以回到天启追随者那里，在某个地方重新开始练习，重新开始。不过，我已经结束了我的杀戮了。我可以向你保证。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Thorne [0405C8F3] (mod) Quest : ([04035DD8]aaNVB3Main04) Ain't No Grave EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaThorneVoiceType\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main04Tho_00050438_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So you pussed out of helping me in town, and you can't even mend my wounds. Great job, asshole.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以你在城里的时候不肯帮我，而现在连我的伤口都治不好。干得好，混蛋。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not proud of what I've done, but I know I saved your life. I don't expect any thanks, but you should know that I did my best.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不为自己的所作所为而感到骄傲，但我知道的是我救了你的命。我不需要任何感谢，但你应该知道我已经尽力了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Thorne [0405C8F3] (mod) Quest : ([04035DD8]aaNVB3Main04) Ain't No Grave EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaThorneVoiceType\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main04Tho_0005043F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just how badly am I hurt?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我伤的有多重？

ESP.ORIGINAL: You suffered pretty severe ballistic trauma in both hands that caused pronounced blood loss.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的双手遭受了严重的弹道撕伤，这造成了明显的失血。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Thorne [0405C8F3] (mod) Quest : ([04035DD8]aaNVB3Main04) Ain't No Grave EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaThorneVoiceType\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main04Tho_00050434_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It will take you a few days to get your strength back, and I'm not sure if your hands will ever completely heal. I did my best. I'm sorry.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你需要几天才能恢复体力，我不确定你的手是否能完全康复。我尽力了。真的很抱歉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Thorne [0405C8F3] (mod) Quest : ([04035DD8]aaNVB3Main04) Ain't No Grave EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaThorneVoiceType\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main04Tho_00050434_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Where's Marko?
ESP.TRADUIT: 马尔科在哪？

ESP.ORIGINAL: He left town to bury Randall's body. He must've thought pretty highly of him, because the rest were buried in a mass grave.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他离开镇上去埋葬兰道尔的尸体了。我想他一定对他评价很高，因为其他死人都被埋在一个乱葬坑里了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Thorne [0405C8F3] (mod) Quest : ([04035DD8]aaNVB3Main04) Ain't No Grave EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaThorneVoiceType\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main04Tho_00055D81_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: When I last went into town to nab supplies I saw most of the hunters were living it up in the saloon. Ford was with them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当我最后一次进城去拿补给时，我看到大多数猎人都住在酒馆里。福特和他们在一起。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Thorne [0405C8F3] (mod) Quest : ([04035DD8]aaNVB3Main04) Ain't No Grave EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaThorneVoiceType\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main04Tho_00055D81_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look, I want to leave this place and never look back. I'm making straight for the Mojave, so you're welcome to join me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听着，我想离开这个地方，永远不要回头。我将直奔莫哈维，我欢迎你加入。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Thorne [0405C8F3] (mod) Quest : ([04035DD8]aaNVB3Main04) Ain't No Grave EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaThorneVoiceType\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main04Tho_00055D81_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaNVB3Main04 10
Why aren't you running with the other bounty hunters?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你为什么不和其他赏金猎人一起工作？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm done hunting anyone or anything. What they did... it was simple butchery. God help me, I'll never forget it. To hell with the bounty hunters.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我已经受够了赏金了。他们做了什么。。。那只能说是简单的屠宰。上帝保佑我，我永远不会忘记。让赏金猎人都见鬼去吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Thorne [0405C8F3] (mod) Quest : ([04035DD8]aaNVB3Main04) Ain't No Grave EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaThorneVoiceType\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main04Tho_00050440_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There was nothing you could do. There were too many of them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你无能为力。他们人太多了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, maybe. I'll have a long while to think about that, won't I?
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，也许吧。我要花很长时间考虑这个问题，不是吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Thorne [0405C8F3] (mod) Quest : ([04035DD8]aaNVB3Main04) Ain't No Grave EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaThorneVoiceType\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main04Tho_0005043E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're clearly suffering from posttraumatic stress. It will take time to move past this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很明显你患有创伤后应激。过这一关需要时间，孩子。

ESP.ORIGINAL: "Physician, heal thyself", huh? Yeah, you might be right. I just... I don't want to talk about it, ok? You saw what happened. No use dwelling now.
ESP.TRADUIT: “医生，治愈你自己”，嗯？是的，你可能是对的。我只是。。。我不想谈这个，好吗？你看到了发生的事。现在栖身此处没有任何意义了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Thorne [0405C8F3] (mod) Quest : ([04035DD8]aaNVB3Main04) Ain't No Grave EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaThorneVoiceType\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main04Tho_00055D80_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I intend to pursue Marko. Maybe you could find some solace in helping me enact justice.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我打算去追马尔科。也许你可以帮助我伸张正义来给我一份慰藉。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The only thing worse than acting like a pussy is whining about it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 唯一比扮成娘娘腔更糟糕是不停地抱怨。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're all heart, aren't you? Maybe you're on to something, though. No use dwelling on what's happened.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你很全心全意的，不是吗？不过，也许你在做什么。但对发生的事只字不提是没有用的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Thorne [0405C8F3] (mod) Quest : ([04035DD8]aaNVB3Main04) Ain't No Grave EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaThorneVoiceType\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main04Tho_00050441_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaNVB3Main03FordPlayerConscious
ESP.TRADUIT: aaNVB3主线03福特玩家有意识的

ESP.ORIGINAL: {The Courier's awake. Hey, everybody shut the fuck up, he's coming!}
ESP.TRADUIT: {邮差醒了。嘿，大家都闭上嘴，他要醒过来了！}
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ford [0403401E] (mod) Quest : ([0402E668]aaNVB3Main03) And Hell Followed With Him EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaBrimleyREF.say aaNVB3Main03TownBeg
aaNVB3Main03TownBeg
ESP.TRADUIT: aaNVB3主线03城镇乞讨

ESP.ORIGINAL: Cobardes, every one of you! Cobardes!
ESP.TRADUIT: 大人,所有人们!大家听好!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vasquez [04035DD5] (mod) Quest : ([0402E668]aaNVB3Main03) And Hell Followed With Him EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main03Tow_00050A35_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Yell of feral rage}Cowards! Every one of you are a fucking coward!{Struggling against bonds, desperately yelling and exerting himself}
ESP.TRADUIT: {狂暴的怒吼}懦夫！你们每个人都是他妈的懦夫！{与束缚作斗争，拼命地叫喊和努力}
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Big Tim Matheson [04035DD7] (mod) Quest : ([0402E668]aaNVB3Main03) And Hell Followed With Him EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main03Tow_00050A3C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You goddamn bounty hunters! Damn you all to hell!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你们这些该死的赏金猎人！见鬼去吧！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brimley [04035DD6] (mod) Quest : ([0402E668]aaNVB3Main03) And Hell Followed With Him EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleOld01\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main03Tow_00050A3B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is illegal, it flies in the face of justice! Think about what you're doing, for christ's sake! Oh, God!
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是违法的，这样做公然违抗法律！想想你们在做什么，看在上帝的份上！哦，天哪！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brian Jeffers [04037175] (mod) Quest : ([0402E668]aaNVB3Main03) And Hell Followed With Him EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main03Tow_00050A3A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, I have a little girl, a family! Por dios, don't do this! Spare us, please!
ESP.TRADUIT: 不要啊，我有一个小女孩，一个家庭！我的天哪，别这样！请饶了我们吧！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felina Robbins [04017DBB] (mod) Quest : ([0402E668]aaNVB3Main03) And Hell Followed With Him EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: Help!
ESP.TRADUIT: 救命啊！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Musgrove [040286C8] (mod) Quest : ([0402E668]aaNVB3Main03) And Hell Followed With Him EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main03Tow_00050A38_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Hysterical}No, no, no! This ain't right, listen to me! You bounty hunters, don't do this!
ESP.TRADUIT: {歇斯底里}不，不，不！这不对，听我说！你们这些赏金猎人，别这样！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stoudenmire [04028659] (mod) Quest : ([0402E668]aaNVB3Main03) And Hell Followed With Him EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaStoudenmireVoiceType\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main03Tow_00050A37_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Please, please don't do do it! You can't do this! {Crying, Hysterics}
ESP.TRADUIT: 求求你，求求你不要这样做！你不能这么做！{哭泣，歇斯底里}
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lori [040180AC] (mod) Quest : ([0402E668]aaNVB3Main03) And Hell Followed With Him EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\FemaleAdult01Default\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main03Tow_00050A36_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaNVB3Main03JeffersWhatGoingOn
What have you done with our children? Where are they?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你对我们的孩子做了什么？他们在哪里？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felina Robbins [04017DBB] (mod) Quest : ([0402E668]aaNVB3Main03) And Hell Followed With Him EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: What is the meaning of this? You have no right to detain us!
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是什么意思？你无权拘留我们！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brian Jeffers [04037175] (mod) Quest : ([0402E668]aaNVB3Main03) And Hell Followed With Him EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main03Jef_00050A42_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaFordTownREF.Say aaNVB3Main03JeffersWhatGoingOn
{All of you shut the fuck up!}
ESP.TRADUIT: {你们都给我闭嘴！}
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ford [0403401E] (mod) Quest : ([0402E668]aaNVB3Main03) And Hell Followed With Him EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaBigTimREF.say aaNVB3Main03TownBeg
aaDoctorMusgroveREF.say aaNVB3Main03TownBeg
aaNVB3Main04DumbCaptor01Topic
ESP.TRADUIT: aaNVB3主线04傻瓜主题01

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not going anywhere until I reckon with Marko.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在我和马尔科算账之前我哪儿也不去。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Burning your boats on the shore, huh? Look, if this is how you want to play it, I'll respect your decision. I can't help you, but I will wait.
ESP.TRADUIT: 破釜沉舟，对吗？听着，如果你想这么做，我会尊重你的决定。我帮不了你，但我会等你的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Thorne [0405C8F3] (mod) Quest : ([04035DD8]aaNVB3Main04) Ain't No Grave EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaThorneVoiceType\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main04Tho_00055D86_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You'll surprise them, they'll probably panic. Don't expect Marko to go easily, though.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你会让他们大吃一惊，他们可能会惊慌失措。不过，别指望马尔科会好对付。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Thorne [0405C8F3] (mod) Quest : ([04035DD8]aaNVB3Main04) Ain't No Grave EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaThorneVoiceType\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main04Tho_00055D86_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're walking wounded, won't be healed for weeks at least. Marko won't take any chances this time. He'll kill you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你现在尚未痊愈，至少几个星期都不会恢复。马尔科这次不会冒险。他会直截了当的杀了你的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Thorne [0405C8F3] (mod) Quest : ([04035DD8]aaNVB3Main04) Ain't No Grave EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaThorneVoiceType\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main04Tho_00055D86_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Come with me and you can recover, gather resources, then come back later when you'll be on even footing, at least have a chance.
ESP.TRADUIT: 跟我来，你可以恢复，收集资源，然后当我们再回来时，你会和马尔科平起平坐，至少有机会。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Thorne [0405C8F3] (mod) Quest : ([04035DD8]aaNVB3Main04) Ain't No Grave EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you say? You want to live to fight another day?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你怎么想？你想先活下来，之后再算总账吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Thorne [0405C8F3] (mod) Quest : ([04035DD8]aaNVB3Main04) Ain't No Grave EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I stomp the Mario till he naps.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我跺着马里奥直到他睡着。（低智力）

ESP.ORIGINAL: Burning your boats on the shore, huh? Look, if this is how you want to play it, I'll respect your decision. I can't help you, but I will wait.
ESP.TRADUIT: 破釜沉舟，对吗？听着，如果你想这么做，我会尊重你的决定。我帮不了你，但我会等你的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Thorne [0405C8F3] (mod) Quest : ([04035DD8]aaNVB3Main04) Ain't No Grave EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaThorneVoiceType\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main04Tho_00061DC1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You'll surprise them, they'll probably panic. Don't expect Marko to go easily, though.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你会让他们大吃一惊，他们可能会惊慌失措的。不过，别指望马尔科会被简单的解决。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Thorne [0405C8F3] (mod) Quest : ([04035DD8]aaNVB3Main04) Ain't No Grave EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaThorneVoiceType\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main04Tho_00061DC1_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're walking wounded, won't be healed for weeks at least. Marko won't take any chances this time. He'll kill you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你现在尚未痊愈，至少几个星期都不会恢复。马尔科这次不会冒险。他会直截了当的杀了你的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Thorne [0405C8F3] (mod) Quest : ([04035DD8]aaNVB3Main04) Ain't No Grave EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaThorneVoiceType\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main04Tho_00061DC1_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Come with me and you can recover, gather resources, then come back later when you'll be on even footing, at least have a chance.
ESP.TRADUIT: 跟我来，你可以恢复，收集资源，然后当我们再回来时，你会和马尔科平起平坐，至少有机会。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Thorne [0405C8F3] (mod) Quest : ([04035DD8]aaNVB3Main04) Ain't No Grave EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you say? You want to live to fight another day?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你怎么想？你想先活下来，之后再算总账吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Thorne [0405C8F3] (mod) Quest : ([04035DD8]aaNVB3Main04) Ain't No Grave EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Go on without me. A lot of blood is going to be spilled here, and I don't plan on surviving.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不要留意我，走吧。会有很多血会洒在这里的，而我，可不打算苟活。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Burning your boats on the shore, huh? Look, if this is how you want to play it, I'll respect your decision. I can't help you, but I will wait.
ESP.TRADUIT: 破釜沉舟，对吗？听着，如果你想这么做，我会尊重你的决定。我帮不了你，但我会等你的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Thorne [0405C8F3] (mod) Quest : ([04035DD8]aaNVB3Main04) Ain't No Grave EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: You'll surprise them, they'll probably panic. Don't expect Marko to go easily, though. Best case... you'll shoot each to pieces and die.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你会让他们大吃一惊，他们可能会惊慌失措。不过，别指望马尔科会好对付。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Thorne [0405C8F3] (mod) Quest : ([04035DD8]aaNVB3Main04) Ain't No Grave EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: Listen closely, Courier. You're walking wounded, won't be healed for weeks at least. Marko won't take any chances this time. He'll kill you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 仔细听好，邮差。你现在尚未痊愈，至少几个星期都不会恢复。马尔科这次不会冒险。他会直截了当的杀了你的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Thorne [0405C8F3] (mod) Quest : ([04035DD8]aaNVB3Main04) Ain't No Grave EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: Come with me and you can recover, gather resources, then come back later when you'll be on even footing, at least have a chance.
ESP.TRADUIT: 跟我来，你可以恢复，收集资源，然后当我们再回来时，你会和马尔科平起平坐，至少有机会。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Thorne [0405C8F3] (mod) Quest : ([04035DD8]aaNVB3Main04) Ain't No Grave EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaThorneVoiceType\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main04Tho_00055D87_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you say? You want to live to fight another day?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你怎么想？你想先活下来，之后再算总账吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Thorne [0405C8F3] (mod) Quest : ([04035DD8]aaNVB3Main04) Ain't No Grave EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaThorneVoiceType\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main04Tho_00055D87_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I make ghosts. Go or be ghost.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我制造鬼。走或者变成鬼。（低智力）

ESP.ORIGINAL: Burning your boats on the shore, huh? Look, if this is how you want to play it, I'll respect your decision. I can't help you, but I will wait.
ESP.TRADUIT: 破釜沉舟，对吗？听着，如果你想这么做，我会尊重你的决定。我帮不了你，但我会等你的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Thorne [0405C8F3] (mod) Quest : ([04035DD8]aaNVB3Main04) Ain't No Grave EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: You'll surprise them, they'll probably panic. Don't expect Marko to go easily, though. Best case... you'll shoot each to pieces and die.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你会让他们大吃一惊，他们可能会惊慌失措。不过，别指望马尔科会好对付。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Thorne [0405C8F3] (mod) Quest : ([04035DD8]aaNVB3Main04) Ain't No Grave EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: Listen closely, Courier. You're walking wounded, won't be healed for weeks at least. Marko won't take any chances this time. He'll kill you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 仔细听好，邮差。你现在尚未痊愈，至少几个星期都不会恢复。马尔科这次不会冒险。他会直截了当的杀了你的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Thorne [0405C8F3] (mod) Quest : ([04035DD8]aaNVB3Main04) Ain't No Grave EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: Come with me and you can recover, gather resources, then come back later when you'll be on even footing, at least have a chance.
ESP.TRADUIT: 跟我来，你可以恢复，收集资源，然后当我们再回来时，你会和马尔科平起平坐，至少有机会。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Thorne [0405C8F3] (mod) Quest : ([04035DD8]aaNVB3Main04) Ain't No Grave EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaThorneVoiceType\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main04Tho_00061DC2_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you say? You want to live to fight another day?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你怎么想？你想先活下来，之后再算总账吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Thorne [0405C8F3] (mod) Quest : ([04035DD8]aaNVB3Main04) Ain't No Grave EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaThorneVoiceType\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main04Tho_00061DC2_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们走。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's get the hell out of here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 让我们离开这鬼地方。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Thorne [0405C8F3] (mod) Quest : ([04035DD8]aaNVB3Main04) Ain't No Grave EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaThorneVoiceType\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main04Tho_00055D88_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ;show Rubicon-esque message player.additem aaNVB3ReturnToken 1 1
It's not about living or dying. It's about seeing this through to the finish, whatever the outcome.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这与生与死无关。不管结果如何，我都要看到最后一刻。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You act like this is your destiny or something. You've been buying into your own legend, and it's gonna kill you in the end. You have a choice here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你表现得好像这是你的命运什么的。你一直在相信你自己的传说，但这最后会杀了你的。你在这不得不选择。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Thorne [0405C8F3] (mod) Quest : ([04035DD8]aaNVB3Main04) Ain't No Grave EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaThorneVoiceType\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main04Tho_00055D90_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I won't stop you, but I won't leave you, either. I'll wait here for a day or two. If you don't come back, I'll just assume the worst and move on.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不会阻止你，但我也不会离开你。我在这儿等一两天。如果你不回来，我就只能做最坏的打算，继续前进。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Thorne [0405C8F3] (mod) Quest : ([04035DD8]aaNVB3Main04) Ain't No Grave EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaThorneVoiceType\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main04Tho_00055D90_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: showmessage aaMangledMessage player.addperk aaMangled
I don't care about my damn wounds. I'll find a way to kill Marko, even if it's with my bare teeth.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不在乎我该死的伤口。我会想办法杀死马尔科的，即使是我只剩下牙齿。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's just rage talking, like you're possessed by an animal. You go at Marko blinded by anger and he'll kill you all the same.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那只是你的气话罢了，就像你被野兽附身一样。你气得瞎了眼，而他也会杀了你的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Thorne [0405C8F3] (mod) Quest : ([04035DD8]aaNVB3Main04) Ain't No Grave EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaThorneVoiceType\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main04Tho_00055D8F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I won't stop you, but I won't leave you, either. I'll wait here for a day or two. If you don't come back, I'll just assume the worst and move on.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不会阻止你，但我也不会离开你。我会在这儿等一两天。如果你不回来，我就做好最坏的打算，继续前进。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Thorne [0405C8F3] (mod) Quest : ([04035DD8]aaNVB3Main04) Ain't No Grave EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaThorneVoiceType\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main04Tho_00055D8F_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: showmessage aaMangledMessage player.addperk aaMangled
You might have lost your balls, but mine are still working. Marko's going to pay.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你可能丢了你的种，但我的仍然健在。马尔科必须为此付出代价。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Did balls stop Marko? Did it save those people? Balls are what got you in this situation, and it was my lack of balls that saved your life.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你该死的无谋之勇能阻止马尔科吗？它能救下那些人吗？有种是你变成这种情况的原因，而我缺少勇气，这才救了你的命。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Thorne [0405C8F3] (mod) Quest : ([04035DD8]aaNVB3Main04) Ain't No Grave EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaThorneVoiceType\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main04Tho_00055D8E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I won't stop you, but I won't leave you, either. I'll wait here for a day or two. If you don't come back, I'll just assume the worst and move on.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不会阻止你，但我也不会离开你。我会在这儿等一两天。如果你不回来，我就会做最坏的打算，继续前进。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Thorne [0405C8F3] (mod) Quest : ([04035DD8]aaNVB3Main04) Ain't No Grave EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaThorneVoiceType\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main04Tho_00055D8E_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: showmessage aaMangledMessage player.addperk aaMangled
I owe it to Randall to at least try.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我欠兰道尔的，至少我欠了一次尝试。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Debts to dead men will just get you killed for nothing. There's nothing left here for you but regret. You can still help people in the Mojave.
ESP.TRADUIT: 欠死人的债只会让你白白死去。这里除了遗憾什么也不会留给你的。但你仍然可以帮助那些莫哈维的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Thorne [0405C8F3] (mod) Quest : ([04035DD8]aaNVB3Main04) Ain't No Grave EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaThorneVoiceType\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main04Tho_00055D8D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I won't stop you, but I won't leave you, either. I'll wait here for a day or two. If you don't come back, I'll just assume the worst and move on.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不会阻止你，但我也不会离开你。我会在这儿等一两天。如果你不回来，我就会做最坏的打算，继续前进。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Thorne [0405C8F3] (mod) Quest : ([04035DD8]aaNVB3Main04) Ain't No Grave EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaThorneVoiceType\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main04Tho_00055D8D_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: showmessage aaMangledMessage player.addperk aaMangled
aaNVB3Main04FordFinalIntro
ESP.TRADUIT: aaNVB3主线04福特的结局介绍

ESP.ORIGINAL: And as long as the money's coming we'll keep chasing the stragglers up in the... hills.
ESP.TRADUIT: 只要钱来了，我们就继续追那些在。。。小山上掉队的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ford [0405E6AA] (mod) Quest : ([04035DD8]aaNVB3Main04) Ain't No Grave EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: No... no fucking way, that's impossible. You, you're fucking dead! I saw them bury you!
ESP.TRADUIT: 不。。。不可能，那是不可能的。你，你他妈肯定死了啊！我看见他们把你埋了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ford [0405E6AA] (mod) Quest : ([04035DD8]aaNVB3Main04) Ain't No Grave EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Main04.FordSpeech to 2
I am death incarnate, risen from the grave to slowly murder every one of you cunts.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我就是死神的化身，从坟墓里复活，再慢慢地残杀你们每个贱人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh sweet Christ, I'm sorry!
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，我万能的上帝啊。我真的很抱歉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ford [0405E6AA] (mod) Quest : ([04035DD8]aaNVB3Main04) Ain't No Grave EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaFordFinalREF.startcombat player setenemy aaBountyHunterFaction playerfaction aaFordFinalREF.setav confidence 0 aaLvlBountyHunterFINAL01REF.setav confidence 0 aaLvlBountyHunterFINAL02REF.setav confidence 0 aaLvlBountyHunterFINAL03REF.setav confidence 0 aaLvlBountyHunterFINAL04REF.setav confidence 0 aaLvlBountyHunterFINAL05REF.setav confidence 0 aaLvlBountyHunterFINAL06REF.setav confidence 0 aaLvlBountyHunterFINAL07REF.setav confidence 0 aaLvlBountyHunterFINAL08REF.setav confidence 0 aaLvlBountyHunterFINAL09REF.setav confidence 0 aaLvlBountyHunterFINAL10REF.setav confidence 0
NAP TIME FOR COUNTY BUNKERS!
ESP.TRADUIT: 伤精劣人的小睡时间！（低智力）

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh sweet Christ, I'm sorry!
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，我万能的上帝啊。我真的很抱歉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ford [0405E6AA] (mod) Quest : ([04035DD8]aaNVB3Main04) Ain't No Grave EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaFordFinalREF.startcombat player setenemy aaBountyHunterFaction playerfaction aaFordFinalREF.setav confidence 0 aaLvlBountyHunterFINAL01REF.setav confidence 0 aaLvlBountyHunterFINAL02REF.setav confidence 0 aaLvlBountyHunterFINAL03REF.setav confidence 0 aaLvlBountyHunterFINAL04REF.setav confidence 0 aaLvlBountyHunterFINAL05REF.setav confidence 0 aaLvlBountyHunterFINAL06REF.setav confidence 0 aaLvlBountyHunterFINAL07REF.setav confidence 0 aaLvlBountyHunterFINAL08REF.setav confidence 0 aaLvlBountyHunterFINAL09REF.setav confidence 0 aaLvlBountyHunterFINAL10REF.setav confidence 0
You've should've learned by now that it takes more than a shallow grave to kill me. <Attack>
ESP.TRADUIT: 你现在应该明白了吧，要杀我可不只是浅埋的坟墓能做到的。<攻击>

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, fuck!
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦！干！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ford [0405E6AA] (mod) Quest : ([04035DD8]aaNVB3Main04) Ain't No Grave EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaFordFinalREF.startcombat player setenemy aaBountyHunterFaction playerfaction
What did you do with my companions' things?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你对我同伴的东西做了什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: We stashed it a footlocker here behind the bar, just like Marko ordered. They got decent burials, I swear!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们把它藏在吧台后面的一个鞋柜里，就像马尔科要求的那样。而他们都得到了体面的葬礼，我发誓！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ford [0405E6AA] (mod) Quest : ([04035DD8]aaNVB3Main04) Ain't No Grave EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaNVB3Main04FordFinalWild
ESP.TRADUIT: aaNVB3主线04福特的最后

ESP.ORIGINAL: Run... if you think it will save you. <Attack>
ESP.TRADUIT: 逃跑吧...如果你觉得那能够拯救你的话！！<攻击>

ESP.ORIGINAL: Please don't!
ESP.TRADUIT: 求求你不要！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ford [0405E6AA] (mod) Quest : ([04035DD8]aaNVB3Main04) Ain't No Grave EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaFordFinalREF.startcombat player setenemy aaBountyHunterFaction playerfaction
No matter what happens next, you're going to be the first one to die, Ford. <Attack>
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管接下来发生什么，你都会是第一个死者，福特。<攻击>

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, no!
ESP.TRADUIT: 不！不要！！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ford [0405E6AA] (mod) Quest : ([04035DD8]aaNVB3Main04) Ain't No Grave EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaFordFinalREF.startcombat player setenemy aaBountyHunterFaction playerfaction
I don't give a damn where he's holed up. I'll find him and kill him just the same.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我一点也不在乎他藏在哪里。我会找到并杀了他的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can see that you believe that. Making it a reality is going to take more than iron conviction and your ungovernable rage.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我看得出很相信你自己。但实现它需要的不仅仅是铁一般的信念和无法被控制的愤怒。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilWhySend_00058D41_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Risk only matters if you're truly afraid of dying. I sort of lost that feeling back in Goodsprings.
ESP.TRADUIT: 只有当你真的害怕死亡时，风险才会变得重要的。但我在清泉镇失去了那种感觉。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, you escaped the icy clutches of death, so now you don't feel anything, huh? That's a tired clich?
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，听起来你从冰冷的死亡魔爪中逃脱了，所以现在你什么都感觉不到了，哈？那可真是陈词滥调啊。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilWhySend_00058D40_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Getting popped by some thug dressed like a chessboard is one thing... facing off with Marko is something else.
ESP.TRADUIT: 被一个穿得像棋盘的暴徒撞倒是一回事...与马尔科对决可是另一回事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilWhySend_00058D40_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Remain Silent>
ESP.TRADUIT: <保持沉默>

ESP.ORIGINAL: To your credit, you are adaptable. Some things can't be accounted for, though. When you taste Marko's vengeance, it will cut you off at the knees.
ESP.TRADUIT: 值得称赞的是，你的确很有适应能力。不过，有些事情是无法解释的。当你尝到马尔科报复的滋味时，那种可怕会把你的膝盖割下来的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: You ever seen a cripple win a wrestling match? I mean, I've seen midgets put up a mean fight with armbars and what not, but never a gimp.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你见过瘸子赢得摔跤比赛吗？我是说，我见过侏儒用臂膀和其他什么东西打架，但从来没有见过一个瘸子赢过。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Risks are unavoidable. I'll adapt and overcome, even in Utah.
ESP.TRADUIT: 风险是不可避免的。即使在犹他州，我也会适应和克服困难的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: To your credit, you are adaptable. Some things can't be accounted for, though. When you taste Marko's vengeance, it will cut you off at the knees.
ESP.TRADUIT: 值得称赞的是，你的确很有适应能力。不过，有些事情是无法解释的。当你尝到马尔科报复的滋味时，那种可怕会把你的膝盖割下来的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilWhySend_00058749_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You ever seen a cripple win a wrestling match? I mean, I've seen midgets put up a mean fight with armbars and what not, but never a gimp.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你见过瘸子赢得摔跤比赛吗？我是说，我见过侏儒用臂膀和其他什么东西打架，但从来没有见过一个瘸子赢过。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Virgil [04000DC0] (mod) Quest : ([040010A4]aaVirgilQuest) Virgil's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaVirgilQu_aaVirgilWhySend_00058749_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Marko's dead. Let's go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 马尔科已经死了..让我们离开吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You did it. You actually did it. I didn't expect to see you again, sat here thinking how I'd break it to your people back in Vegas.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你做到了。你真的做到了。我没想到会再见到你，坐在这里的时候，我还在想我该怎么跟你在维加斯的人解释呢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Thorne [0405C8F3] (mod) Quest : ([04035DD8]aaNVB3Main04) Ain't No Grave EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaThorneVoiceType\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main04Tho_00059962_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.additem aaNVB3ReturnToken 1 1
Mario take nap. We walk!
ESP.TRADUIT: 马里奥睡着了。我们走。（低智力）

ESP.ORIGINAL: You did it. You actually did it. I didn't expect to see you again, sat here thinking how I'd break it to your people back in Vegas.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你做到了。你真的做到了。我没想到会再见到你，坐在这里的时候，我还在想我该怎么跟你在维加斯的人解释呢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Thorne [0405C8F3] (mod) Quest : ([04035DD8]aaNVB3Main04) Ain't No Grave EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaThorneVoiceType\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main04Tho_00061DC3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.additem aaNVB3ReturnToken 1 1
Oh, wait... you, you're the Courier! Holy shit, I didn't mean to come on as such a hardass, I mean it's just part of the business, right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，等等。。。你，你是邮差！天哪，我不是故意装成这样，我是说这只是生意的一部分，对吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ford [0402856D] (mod) Quest : ([04029364]aaHunterDialogue) Dialogue for Named Bounty Hunters EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaFordVoiceType\aaHunterDi_aaFordIntroMyNa_00059365_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You and Randall are the reason I got into this business. I read all those dime novels back when I was on the farm, told all about you in New Vegas.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你和兰道尔是我进入这个行业的原因。我在农场的时候读过很多关于你在新维加斯的廉价小说。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ford [0402856D] (mod) Quest : ([04029364]aaHunterDialogue) Dialogue for Named Bounty Hunters EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaFordVoiceType\aaHunterDi_aaFordIntroMyNa_00059365_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: My friends call me [%]. You can call me sir.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的朋友们都叫我 [%]。你可以叫我先生。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, wait... you, you're the Courier! Holy shit, I didn't mean to come on as such a hardass, I mean it's just part of the business, right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，等等。。。你，你是邮差！天哪，我不是故意装成这样，我是说这只是生意的一部分，对吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ford [0402856D] (mod) Quest : ([04029364]aaHunterDialogue) Dialogue for Named Bounty Hunters EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaFordVoiceType\aaHunterDi_aaFordIntroMyNa_0005936B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You and Randall are the reason I got into this business. I read all those dime novels back when I was on the farm, told all about you in New Vegas.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你和兰道尔是我进入这个行业的原因。我在农场的时候读过很多关于你在新维加斯的廉价小说。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ford [0402856D] (mod) Quest : ([04029364]aaHunterDialogue) Dialogue for Named Bounty Hunters EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaFordVoiceType\aaHunterDi_aaFordIntroMyNa_0005936B_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, wait... you, you're the Courier! Holy shit, I didn't mean to come on as such a hardass, I mean it's just part of the business, right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，等等。。。你，你是邮差！天哪，我不是故意装成这样，我是说这只是生意的一部分，对吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ford [0402856D] (mod) Quest : ([04029364]aaHunterDialogue) Dialogue for Named Bounty Hunters EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaFordVoiceType\aaHunterDi_aaFordIntroMyNa_0005936A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You and Randall are the reason I got into this business. I read all those dime novels back when I was on the farm, told all about you in New Vegas.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你和兰道尔是我进入这个行业的原因。我在农场的时候读过很多关于你在新维加斯的廉价小说。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ford [0402856D] (mod) Quest : ([04029364]aaHunterDialogue) Dialogue for Named Bounty Hunters EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaFordVoiceType\aaHunterDi_aaFordIntroMyNa_0005936A_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: My friends call me [%]. You can call me ma'am.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的朋友们都叫我[%]。你可以叫我夫人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You don't want to be like me, kid.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不会想和我一样，小子。

ESP.ORIGINAL: But I do! I read everything about what you did, how you help the innocent and only kill the bad guys as a last resort. You're a hero.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但我想要！我读过你所做的一切，你如何帮助无辜的人，只把杀死坏人作为最后手段。你可是个英雄。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ford [0402856D] (mod) Quest : ([04029364]aaHunterDialogue) Dialogue for Named Bounty Hunters EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaFordVoiceType\aaHunterDi_aaFordIntroDont_0006C060_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Please tell me you didn't get into this business because of something you read in a pamphlet.
ESP.TRADUIT: 请告诉我你不是因为你在小册子上读到的某些东西而进入这个行业的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: It wasn't just some pamphlet, it's an in-depth account of all your exploits, with a touch of dramatic license. That's what it said, I memorized it!
ESP.TRADUIT: 这不仅仅是一本小册子，它是对你所有功绩的一个深入的歌颂，还有一点戏剧性的描写。它就是这么说的，我记住了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ford [0402856D] (mod) Quest : ([04029364]aaHunterDialogue) Dialogue for Named Bounty Hunters EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaFordVoiceType\aaHunterDi_aaFordIntroPlea_0005936C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was already a killer before I started bounty hunting. I'm almost as good at killing as you, believe it or not.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在我开始赏金狩猎之前我就已经是个杀手了。我几乎和你一样擅长杀人，信不信由你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ford [0402856D] (mod) Quest : ([04029364]aaHunterDialogue) Dialogue for Named Bounty Hunters EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaFordVoiceType\aaHunterDi_aaFordIntroPlea_0005936C_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm sort of curious - what did those dime novels say?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有点好奇——那些廉价小说里到底是怎么说的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, man, they've tell everything about what you did, and it's completely accurate. Let me get something, just a second...
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，伙计，他们把你所做过的一切事都写出来了，而且是完全准确的！让我拿点东西给你看，稍等一下。。。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ford [0402856D] (mod) Quest : ([04029364]aaHunterDialogue) Dialogue for Named Bounty Hunters EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaFordVoiceType\aaHunterDi_aaFordIntroWhat_0005936D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, yeah, yeah! "Sergio pressed the cold, steel barrel against his captive's head. 'Make a move, and she gets it,' he muttered with serpentine rasp."
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，是的，是的！"塞尔吉奥把冰冷的枪管扣在俘虏的头上“敢动一下，她就交代在这儿了”，他用像蛇一般刺耳的声音咕哝着说"
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ford [0402856D] (mod) Quest : ([04029364]aaHunterDialogue) Dialogue for Named Bounty Hunters EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaFordVoiceType\aaHunterDi_aaFordIntroWhat_0005936D_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: "With eyes that exhibited steely resolve, the Courier calmly replied, 'You've taken your last captive, evildoer.' Sergio trembled as silence ensued."
ESP.TRADUIT: "带着坚定决心的眼神，邮差平静地回答道，“你已经俘虏了你一生中最后一个囚犯了，恶徒。”塞尔吉奥开始颤抖，接着便是沉默。"
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ford [0402856D] (mod) Quest : ([04029364]aaHunterDialogue) Dialogue for Named Bounty Hunters EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaFordVoiceType\aaHunterDi_aaFordIntroWhat_0005936D_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: "When Sergio's sweaty finger twitched, the Courier deftly lifted the pistol from its holster and loosed hot lead, effortlessly felling the outlaws."
ESP.TRADUIT: "当塞尔吉奥汗流浃背的开始手指抽搐时，邮差灵巧地把手枪从他的枪套里拿了出来，松开了滚烫的保险，毫不费力地将歹徒击毙。"
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ford [0402856D] (mod) Quest : ([04029364]aaHunterDialogue) Dialogue for Named Bounty Hunters EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaFordVoiceType\aaHunterDi_aaFordIntroWhat_0005936D_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You know, how accurate is that? All the details are in there, I mean, even Sergio's sweaty finger. What do you think?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道的，听听这有多准确！所有的细节都写在里面了，我的意思是，即使是像塞尔吉奥出汗的手指那样的细节，都有描述。你是怎么认为的？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ford [0402856D] (mod) Quest : ([04029364]aaHunterDialogue) Dialogue for Named Bounty Hunters EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaFordVoiceType\aaHunterDi_aaFordIntroWhat_0005936D_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you actually know about bounty hunting?
ESP.TRADUIT: 关于赏金狩猎你到底知道些什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I know that we're only hired to hunt down the worst of the worst, so the use of lethal force is never in question.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道我们只是被雇来追捕最坏的人，所以使用致命的武力从来就不是什么问题。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ford [0402856D] (mod) Quest : ([04029364]aaHunterDialogue) Dialogue for Named Bounty Hunters EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaFordVoiceType\aaHunterDi_aaFordIntroWhat_0005936E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You have to be quick, able to get the jump on the bad guys. Having a big gun helps, too. I think that about covers all the major points.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你必须要快，快到能抓住坏人。而拥有一把大枪也有会帮助。我认为这就能涵盖所有的要点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ford [0402856D] (mod) Quest : ([04029364]aaHunterDialogue) Dialogue for Named Bounty Hunters EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaFordVoiceType\aaHunterDi_aaFordIntroWhat_0005936E_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Say, what if I was to tag along with you, watch and see how it's really done? I mean, I can hold my own and all, but I want to learn from the best.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我说，如果我能和你并肩作战，并看看实际效果的话怎么样？我是说，我可以自己拥有这一切，但我想从最好的方面学习。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ford [0402856D] (mod) Quest : ([04029364]aaHunterDialogue) Dialogue for Named Bounty Hunters EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaFordVoiceType\aaHunterDi_aaFordIntroWhat_0005936E_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, I've got gumption and a sharp mind. I believe I would be an asset to you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我有进取心和敏锐的头脑。我相信我会成为你的一笔财富。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ford [0402856D] (mod) Quest : ([04029364]aaHunterDialogue) Dialogue for Named Bounty Hunters EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaFordVoiceType\aaHunterDi_aaFordIntroWhat_0005936E_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaNVB3Main03MarkoShotRandall
ESP.TRADUIT: aaNVB3主线03马克射击兰道尔

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm resigned to the fact that I'll have to do everything myself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我已经接受了我必须自己结束这一切的事实。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marko [040357E4] (mod) Quest : ([0402E668]aaNVB3Main03) And Hell Followed With Him EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main03Mar_00059F5E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaMarkoREF.UseWeapon aaWeapUber44Revolver aaMarkoConfrontRandallMarkerREF aaNVB3RandallREF 3 0 0 1 0
aaNVB3Main04ThorneAwakeBark
ESP.TRADUIT: aaNVB3主线0索恩醒来

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you value your life, tell me where Marko is, right now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你珍惜自己的生命的话，就告诉我马尔科去哪里了，现在就说！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, yeah, absolutely! He went to bury Randall over in the old graveyard, just north of here. <He points it out on your map>
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，是的，绝对！他去把兰道尔埋在这北边的老墓地里。<他在你的地图上指出了它>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ford [0405E6AA] (mod) Quest : ([04035DD8]aaNVB3Main04) Ain't No Grave EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: setobjectivecompleted aaNVB3Main04 12 1 setobjectivecompleted aaNVB3Main04 14 1 setobjectivedisplayed aaNVB3Main04 15 1 aaGYPassageExtParentREF.enable ;set aaNVB3Main04.NoteFound to 1
Where Mario is or I stomp.
ESP.TRADUIT: 马里奥去哪儿了？不然我就垛在你脸上。（低智力）

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, yeah, absolutely! He went to bury Randall over in the old graveyard, just north of here. <He points it out on your map>
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，是的，绝对！他去把兰道尔埋在这北边的老墓地里。<他在你的地图上指出了它>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ford [0405E6AA] (mod) Quest : ([04035DD8]aaNVB3Main04) Ain't No Grave EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: setobjectivecompleted aaNVB3Main04 12 1 setobjectivecompleted aaNVB3Main04 14 1 setobjectivedisplayed aaNVB3Main04 15 1 aaGYPassageExtParentREF.enable ;set aaNVB3Main04.NoteFound to 1
Leave, and take this rabble with you. If I see you again you're a dead man.
ESP.TRADUIT: 离开，把你这群乌合之众带走。如果我再见到你，你就死定了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You got it! You heard the Courier, pack your shit and go!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你们明白了吗！你们听到邮差的话了，收拾好你们的东西赶紧滚！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ford [0405E6AA] (mod) Quest : ([04035DD8]aaNVB3Main04) Ain't No Grave EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: showmessage aaFordLeftMessage aaFordFinalREF.disable aaFordFinalREF.markfordelete aaFinalBHSaloonParentMarkerREF.disable aaFinalBHSaloonParentMarkerREF.markfordelete set aaNVB3Master.FordFate to 1
Walks with county bunkers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 和伤精劣人散步去。（低智力）

ESP.ORIGINAL: You got it! You heard the Courier, pack your shit and go!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你们明白了吗！你们听到邮差的话了，收拾好你们的东西赶紧滚！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ford [0405E6AA] (mod) Quest : ([04035DD8]aaNVB3Main04) Ain't No Grave EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: showmessage aaFordLeftMessage aaFordFinalREF.disable aaFordFinalREF.markfordelete aaFinalBHSaloonParentMarkerREF.disable aaFinalBHSaloonParentMarkerREF.markfordelete set aaNVB3Master.FordFate to 1
Go and tell everyone what happened here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 去告诉大家这里发生了什么。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Of course I'm interested.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我当然感兴趣。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I knew you were a climber when I saw you. You might have one hell of a career waiting for you in the NCR when this is settled.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我看到你时就知道你是个攀爬者。当这被解决的之后，在NCR时等着你的可能是一个地狱般的职业生涯，
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brookshire [0402E666] (mod) Quest : ([04029364]aaHunterDialogue) Dialogue for Named Bounty Hunters EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaNVB3GenericVoiceType\aaHunterDi_aaBrookshireExt_0006104B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your first target is a terrorist by the name of Godwin. He was a journalist who began sending mail bombs to anyone associated with tax collection.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的第一个目标是一个叫戈德温的恐怖分子。他本是一名记者，直到他开始向任何与税收有关的人发送邮件炸弹。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brookshire [0402E666] (mod) Quest : ([04029364]aaHunterDialogue) Dialogue for Named Bounty Hunters EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaNVB3GenericVoiceType\aaHunterDi_aaBrookshireExt_0006104B_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Over time Godwin has become lionized by certain unpatriotic elements who view him as a hero in the anti-taxation movement. Absurd, all of it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 随着时间的推移，戈德温已经成为某些非爱国主义分子的崇拜者，他们认为他是反税收运动中的英雄。这事，这人都很荒谬。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brookshire [0402E666] (mod) Quest : ([04029364]aaHunterDialogue) Dialogue for Named Bounty Hunters EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaNVB3GenericVoiceType\aaHunterDi_aaBrookshireExt_0006104B_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He is a murderer, plain and simple. The fact that he's escaped justice for so long is an affront to the rule of law. Do you have any questions?
ESP.TRADUIT: 他是个杀人犯，平淡无奇的那种。他逃脱了这么长时间的审判，这是对法治的侮辱。你有什么问题吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brookshire [0402E666] (mod) Quest : ([04029364]aaHunterDialogue) Dialogue for Named Bounty Hunters EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaNVB3GenericVoiceType\aaHunterDi_aaBrookshireExt_0006104B_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm sure Randall had a good reason to pass on these bounties, so I'll do the same. No thanks.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我相信兰道尔有充分的理由把这些奖金转嫁出去，所以我也会这么做的。不，谢谢。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, that's a letdown. If you change your mind, just let me know. No hard feelings.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，那真让人失望。如果你改变主意，就告诉我。不要有难受的感觉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brookshire [0402E666] (mod) Quest : ([04029364]aaHunterDialogue) Dialogue for Named Bounty Hunters EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaNVB3GenericVoiceType\aaHunterDi_aaBrookshireExt_0006104A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: On second thought, this isn't what I had in mind. Find someone else to do your dirty work.
ESP.TRADUIT: 仔细想想，这不是我想要的。找别人来帮你干脏活吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Sighs}Fine, it's your choice. Just keep in mind that these targets aren't saints, and neither are you. Let me know if you change your mind.
ESP.TRADUIT: {叹息}好吧，这是你的选择。你要记住这些目标不是圣人，而你也不是。如果你改变主意的话，请告诉我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brookshire [0402E666] (mod) Quest : ([04029364]aaHunterDialogue) Dialogue for Named Bounty Hunters EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaNVB3GenericVoiceType\aaHunterDi_aaBrookshireExt_00061053_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't have any more questions.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我没别的问题了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Very well. Godwin should be in his shack southeast of here. Just be mindful of any traps left by that little madman.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好，戈德温应该在他东南的小屋里。小心那个小疯子留下的陷阱。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brookshire [0402E666] (mod) Quest : ([04029364]aaHunterDialogue) Dialogue for Named Bounty Hunters EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaNVB3GenericVoiceType\aaHunterDi_aaBrookshireExt_00061052_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaNVB3Side01 5 set aaHunterDialogue.BrookshireWork to 5
How much is the bounty?
ESP.TRADUIT: 赏金是多少？

ESP.ORIGINAL: 1,000 caps... dead. We don't have the resources to process live captives out here, so if it's all the same to you, we'll keep things simple.
ESP.TRADUIT: 1000个瓶盖。。。不论死活。我们没有处理现场俘虏的资源，所以如果对你来说哪种都一样的话，我们会保持简单。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brookshire [0402E666] (mod) Quest : ([04029364]aaHunterDialogue) Dialogue for Named Bounty Hunters EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaNVB3GenericVoiceType\aaHunterDi_aaBrookshireExt_00061054_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Is Godwin alone?
ESP.TRADUIT: 戈德温是一个人吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: According to our most recent intelligence, he's holed up by himself in a cabin. He's a deranged little hermit if there ever was one, a true nutjob.
ESP.TRADUIT: 根据我们最近的情报，他一个人躲在一个小木屋里。他是一个神经错乱的小隐士，如果真的会有的话，他是一个真正的疯子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brookshire [0402E666] (mod) Quest : ([04029364]aaHunterDialogue) Dialogue for Named Bounty Hunters EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaNVB3GenericVoiceType\aaHunterDi_aaBrookshireExt_00061055_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What are you doing?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在做什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm walking my ass out of this frozen shithole. Marko's finished, and I ain't sticking around to be somebody's payday.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要从这冻僵的狗屎堆里走出来。马尔科已经死了，我可不想再这乱晃成为别人的酬劳了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Outlaw Ringleader [04061D79] (mod) Quest : ([04027F62]aaREDialogue) Dialogue for Random Encounters EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: A lone outlaw with his guard down? That's unusual.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一个孤立无援的亡命之徒？这很不寻常。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm walking my ass out of this frozen shithole. Marko's finished, and I ain't sticking around to be somebody's payday.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要从这冻僵的狗屎堆里走出来。马尔科已经死了，我可不想再这乱晃成为别人的酬劳了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Outlaw Ringleader [04061D79] (mod) Quest : ([04027F62]aaREDialogue) Dialogue for Random Encounters EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaREAlfredSchwartzIntro
Traveler, are you in the habit of consuming irradiated food, toxic chemicals, or paprika?
ESP.TRADUIT: 旅行者，你有食用用辐射处理过的食品、有毒化学物质或辣椒粉的习惯吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Alfred Schwartz [04061D85] (mod) Quest : ([04027F62]aaREDialogue) Dialogue for Random Encounters

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3RETimer.SchwartzPlaced to 2
Excuse me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Sighs}The aforementioned substances can negatively impact the flavor of meat, hence my concern.
ESP.TRADUIT: {叹息}上述物质会对肉的味道产生负面影响，因此我担心。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Alfred Schwartz [04061D85] (mod) Quest : ([04027F62]aaREDialogue) Dialogue for Random Encounters EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaREDialog_aaREAlfredSchwa_00061D92_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have a refined palate, you see. Do you even understand what I'm saying, barbarian?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你看，我的味觉很高雅。你明白我在说什么吗，野蛮人？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Alfred Schwartz [04061D85] (mod) Quest : ([04027F62]aaREDialogue) Dialogue for Random Encounters EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaREDialog_aaREAlfredSchwa_00061D92_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You do look savory, though. Toned, but not too bulky. I never liked undue bulk.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过，你看起来确实很美味。结实有力，但并没有太大的块头。我从不喜欢过大的体积。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Alfred Schwartz [04061D85] (mod) Quest : ([04027F62]aaREDialogue) Dialogue for Random Encounters EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaREDialog_aaREAlfredSchwa_00061D92_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I also have an appreciation for quality victuals.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我也很欣赏高质量的食物。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you? Well, in that case please accept my apology for heaping you in with the common, uncultured rabble.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你…吗？好吧，如果是那样的话，请接受我的道歉，因为我把你和普通的、没有教养的暴民混在一起了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Alfred Schwartz [04061D85] (mod) Quest : ([04027F62]aaREDialogue) Dialogue for Random Encounters EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaREDialog_aaREAlfredSchwa_00061D95_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: As a token of goodwill, please take these fresh fillets extracted from a muscled prospector. Good luck, and happy hunting!
ESP.TRADUIT: 为了表示善意，请把这些新鲜的"生鱼片"从一个肌肉发达的探矿者身上割下来。祝你好运，狩猎愉快！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Alfred Schwartz [04061D85] (mod) Quest : ([04027F62]aaREDialogue) Dialogue for Random Encounters EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaREDialog_aaREAlfredSchwa_00061D95_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.additem humanflesh 2 aaAlfredSchwartzREF.addscriptpackage aaRESandboxAtExitPackage
You do, don't you? Poor thing. {Pitying player}Well, at least you have good taste as you stumble through this world like a dumb beast.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的确是，不是吗？可怜的家伙。{可怜邮差}好吧，至少你有很好的品味，当你像一头愚蠢的野兽在这个世界上蹒跚而行时。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Alfred Schwartz [04061D85] (mod) Quest : ([04027F62]aaREDialogue) Dialogue for Random Encounters EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaREDialog_aaREAlfredSchwa_00061D96_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here is some of the good meat. You take care now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这可是一些好肉。你现在小心点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Alfred Schwartz [04061D85] (mod) Quest : ([04027F62]aaREDialogue) Dialogue for Random Encounters EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaREDialog_aaREAlfredSchwa_00061D96_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.additem humanflesh 2 aaAlfredSchwartzREF.addscriptpackage aaRESandboxAtExitPackage
Me eats the good meat.
ESP.TRADUIT: 俺吃好肉。（低智力）

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fuck off, neckbeard.
ESP.TRADUIT: 操你妈的，混球。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ah, another crass troglodyte. I'll have to do this the hard way. Don't exert yourself too much, the lactic acid buildup will taint the flavor.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，又一个粗俗的洞窟人。我不得不这么做了。不要太用力了，乳酸的积累会污染味道。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Alfred Schwartz [04061D85] (mod) Quest : ([04027F62]aaREDialogue) Dialogue for Random Encounters EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaREDialog_aaREAlfredSchwa_00061D91_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaAlfredSchwartzREF.startcombat player
I'll be the only one dining today, thank you very much. <Attack>
ESP.TRADUIT: 今天只有我一个人会用餐，非常感谢。<攻击>

ESP.ORIGINAL: Haven't you heard of professional courtesy? it's uncouth to eat another of your own ilk. Very well, savage. I'll feast on your barbarous flanks!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你没听说过职业礼貌吗？把你自己的同类作为食物是不礼貌的。很好，野蛮人。我要吃你野蛮的胁腹！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Alfred Schwartz [04061D85] (mod) Quest : ([04027F62]aaREDialogue) Dialogue for Random Encounters EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaREDialog_aaREAlfredSchwa_00061D97_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaAlfredSchwartzREF.startcombat player
You simple wretch, you don't even realize what you're saying, do you? {Sighs}Very well, I'll put you out of your misery.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你这个单纯的混蛋，你甚至都不知道你在说什么，是吗？{叹息}很好，我会让你摆脱痛苦。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Alfred Schwartz [04061D85] (mod) Quest : ([04027F62]aaREDialogue) Dialogue for Random Encounters EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaREDialog_aaREAlfredSchwa_00061D98_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaAlfredSchwartzREF.startcombat player
I eats you first. <Attack>
ESP.TRADUIT: 我吃你先。（低智力）<攻击>

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've... bitten off more than you can chew. <Attack>
ESP.TRADUIT: 你已经。。。比你能咬的咬下更多了。<攻击>

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sometimes I have doubts about this, but hearing you say that... knowing that I'm improving the gene pool, it makes it all worthwhile.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有时我对此有疑问，但听到你这么说。。。知道我在改善基因库，这一切都是值得的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Alfred Schwartz [04061D85] (mod) Quest : ([04027F62]aaREDialogue) Dialogue for Random Encounters EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaREDialog_aaREAlfredSchwa_00061D9A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaAlfredSchwartzREF.startcombat player
aaREAlfredSchwartzSpeech
I'm not looking for trouble.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我可不是在找麻烦。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Calm, collected. Better flavor that way, to be certain. I can't wait!
ESP.TRADUIT: 冷静，镇定。当然，那样味道更好。我等不及了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Alfred Schwartz [04061D85] (mod) Quest : ([04027F62]aaREDialogue) Dialogue for Random Encounters EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaREDialog_aaREAlfredSchwa_00061D9B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaAlfredSchwartzREF.startcombat player
Bitch, you're about to eat a shit sandwich. <Attack>
ESP.TRADUIT: 婊子，你要吃个含屎三明治了。<攻击>

ESP.ORIGINAL: God, what warped mind planted such disgusting imagery in that hollowed-out head of yours? Ugh!
ESP.TRADUIT: 天哪，是什么扭曲的思想在你那挖空的脑袋里植入了如此恶心的意象？恶！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Alfred Schwartz [04061D85] (mod) Quest : ([04027F62]aaREDialogue) Dialogue for Random Encounters EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaREDialog_aaREAlfredSchwa_00061D99_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaAlfredSchwartzREF.startcombat player
aaNVB3Side01GodwinIntro
Jackson, what are you doing out in this god-forsaken weather... hold on, who are you? What's your business here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 杰克逊，你在这个遭雷劈的冷天里做什么...等等，你他妈是谁？你在这里做什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Godwin [0406504C] (mod) Quest : ([04061050]aaNVB3Side01) The Long Arm EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleOld01\aaNVB3Side_aaNVB3Side01God_00065D02_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Side01.GodwinGreeted to 2
The NCR has a price on your head. I'm afraid your number is up.
ESP.TRADUIT: NCR在你头上可有赏金挂着。恐怕你的电话占线了，消息不灵通。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Those fools finally managed to piece together my location, and now they've sent you, no doubt a serpentine killer of the lowest order.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那些傻瓜终于拼凑出了我的位置，现在他们终于派你来了，毫无疑问，你是一个最低级的只会动嘴皮子的杀手。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Godwin [0406504C] (mod) Quest : ([04061050]aaNVB3Side01) The Long Arm EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleOld01\aaNVB3Side_aaNVB3Side01God_00065D0D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have no shame or regret for what I've done. NCR ruined me, just like they've done to so many others. They'll continue to do so unless we act.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我对我所做的一切没有羞耻和遗憾。NCR毁了我，就像他们对其他人做的那样。而他们会继续这样做的，除非我们采取行动。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Godwin [0406504C] (mod) Quest : ([04061050]aaNVB3Side01) The Long Arm EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleOld01\aaNVB3Side_aaNVB3Side01God_00065D0D_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was disenfranchised and harried by their collectors until I was little more than a vagabond. That's what they do.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我被剥夺了公民权，被他们的收藏家骚扰，直到我变成了个流浪汉。他们就是这么对我们做的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Godwin [0406504C] (mod) Quest : ([04061050]aaNVB3Side01) The Long Arm EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleOld01\aaNVB3Side_aaNVB3Side01God_00065D0D_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: My actions helped remind those decadent beasts that they are still subject to the people, and they aren't beyond the reach of justice.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的行为是为了提醒了那些颓废的野兽，他们仍然受制于人民，他们并没有超出正义范围的权利。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Godwin [0406504C] (mod) Quest : ([04061050]aaNVB3Side01) The Long Arm EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleOld01\aaNVB3Side_aaNVB3Side01God_00065D0D_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If my politics don't move you, then consider the fate of my children. They are innocents in this struggle, and they'd be helpless without me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我的政见不能打动你，那就考虑我孩子的命运吧。他们在这场斗争中是无辜的，没有我他们将会是无助的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Godwin [0406504C] (mod) Quest : ([04061050]aaNVB3Side01) The Long Arm EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleOld01\aaNVB3Side_aaNVB3Side01God_00065D0D_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Drop the meek farmer act, asshole. I know who you are, and I'm here for the bounty.
ESP.TRADUIT: 停止装成一个温顺的农民吧，混蛋。我知道你是谁，我来这里是为了赏金的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Those fools finally managed to piece together my location, and now they've sent you, no doubt a serpentine killer of the lowest order.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那些傻瓜终于拼凑出了我的位置，现在他们终于派你来了，毫无疑问，你是一个最低级的只会动嘴皮子的杀手。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Godwin [0406504C] (mod) Quest : ([04061050]aaNVB3Side01) The Long Arm EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have no shame or regret for what I've done. NCR ruined me, just like they've done to so many others. They'll continue to do so unless we act.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我对我所做的一切没有羞耻和遗憾。NCR毁了我，就像他们对其他人做的那样。而他们会继续这样做的，除非我们采取行动。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Godwin [0406504C] (mod) Quest : ([04061050]aaNVB3Side01) The Long Arm EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was disenfranchised and harried by their collectors until I was little more than a penurious vagabond. That's what they do.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我被剥夺了公民权，被他们的收藏家骚扰，直到我变成了个流浪汉。他们就是这么对我们做的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Godwin [0406504C] (mod) Quest : ([04061050]aaNVB3Side01) The Long Arm EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: My actions helped remind those decadent beasts that they are still subject to the people, and they aren't beyond the reach of justice.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的行为是为了提醒了那些颓废的野兽，他们仍然受制于人民，他们并没有超出正义范围的权利。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Godwin [0406504C] (mod) Quest : ([04061050]aaNVB3Side01) The Long Arm EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: If my politics don't move you, then consider the fate of my children. They are innocents in this struggle, and they'd be helpless without me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我的政见不能打动你，那就考虑我孩子的命运吧。他们在这场斗争中是无辜的，没有我他们将会是无助的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Godwin [0406504C] (mod) Quest : ([04061050]aaNVB3Side01) The Long Arm EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: It might be better if we discuss our business outside, without the kids around.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们最好在外面谈谈生意，不要让孩子们在身边。

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, I'm not going anywhere. I hide nothing from my children. Besides, I don't want to stand out there and flirt with frostbite. I'll stay inside.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，我哪儿也不去。我对我的孩子从来就没隐瞒过什么。另外，我不想站在外面和冻伤调情。我会待在里面的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Godwin [0406504C] (mod) Quest : ([04061050]aaNVB3Side01) The Long Arm EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleOld01\aaNVB3Side_aaNVB3Side01God_00065CFF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wait, you have kids? I thought you were a loner?
ESP.TRADUIT: 等等，你有孩子吗？我还以为你是个孤独的人？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Is that what those cretins told you? I was married for almost ten years, and only recently lost my wife, Samantha. Not that it would matter to you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那是那些白痴告诉你的吗？我结婚都快十年了，最近才失去了我的妻子萨曼莎。但这对你并不重要。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Godwin [0406504C] (mod) Quest : ([04061050]aaNVB3Side01) The Long Arm EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleOld01\aaNVB3Side_aaNVB3Side01God_00065D01_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This isn't personal, just so you know. <Attack>
ESP.TRADUIT: 这不是什么私人问题，你只需要知道这些。<攻击>

ESP.ORIGINAL: How comforting. Do what you came here to do, monster.
ESP.TRADUIT: 多么令人宽慰啊。做你来这里要做的事吧，你这个怪物。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Godwin [0406504C] (mod) Quest : ([04061050]aaNVB3Side01) The Long Arm EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleOld01\aaNVB3Side_aaNVB3Side01God_00065D10_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaGodwinREF.startcombat player setenemy aaGodwinFaction playerfaction
It's all over, dickweed. <Attack>
ESP.TRADUIT: 一切都结束了，你个臭鸡巴。<攻击>

ESP.ORIGINAL: Be quick about it, then.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那就快点吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Godwin [0406504C] (mod) Quest : ([04061050]aaNVB3Side01) The Long Arm EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleOld01\aaNVB3Side_aaNVB3Side01God_00065D0F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaGodwinREF.startcombat player setenemy aaGodwinFaction playerfaction
I didn't sign up for this. Let's just pretend this meeting never happened.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我没有报名参加这次会面。我们就假装这次见面从未发生过吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: On my word, stranger. Farewell.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就像我说的，陌生人。再会。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Godwin [0406504C] (mod) Quest : ([04061050]aaNVB3Side01) The Long Arm EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleOld01\aaNVB3Side_aaNVB3Side01God_00065D16_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Give me your word that you'll stop mailing bombs and I'll walk out of here, right now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 告诉我你会停止邮寄炸弹，那样我就马上离开这里。

ESP.ORIGINAL: No. I chose this course, and I will accept the consequences. As long as I draw breath, I'll never stop striking at those autocratic apes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，既然我选择了这条路，我会承担后果的。只要我还活着，我就永远不会停止攻击那些专制的猴子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Godwin [0406504C] (mod) Quest : ([04061050]aaNVB3Side01) The Long Arm EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleOld01\aaNVB3Side_aaNVB3Side01God_00065D11_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaNVB3Side01GodwinInnocentKilled
aaNVB3Side01GodwinExplosives
Though my methods and my tools are crude, I've made it work this long. {Sigh}I do appreciate that the odds are against me, though.
ESP.TRADUIT: 虽然我的方法和工具都很粗糙，但我已经让它工作了这么久。{唉}不过，我的确意识到了这种可能性对我不利。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Godwin [0406504C] (mod) Quest : ([04061050]aaNVB3Side01) The Long Arm EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleOld01\aaNVB3Side_aaNVB3Side01God_0006630F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right. You walk out and I'll cease with any further "activities". You have my word.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧。只要你走出来，我就停止任何进一步的"活动"。我向你保证。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Godwin [0406504C] (mod) Quest : ([04061050]aaNVB3Side01) The Long Arm EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleOld01\aaNVB3Side_aaNVB3Side01God_0006630F_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Master.GodwinFate to 2
Eventually you'll make a mistake and end up maimed or dead. Is it really worth the risk?
ESP.TRADUIT: 最终你会犯一个错误，并以你致残或死亡来收场。这真的值得冒险吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaNVB3Side01GodwinSpeech01
Very well. Say your piece.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好。有屁快放。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Godwin [0406504C] (mod) Quest : ([04061050]aaNVB3Side01) The Long Arm EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleOld01\aaNVB3Side_aaNVB3Side01God_00065D14_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If I was hell-bent on killing you, I would've made my move already. At least hear me out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我真想杀了你，我早就行动了。至少听我说完。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't need saving, and certainly not by the likes of you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不需要拯救，当然也不需要你这样的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Godwin [0406504C] (mod) Quest : ([04061050]aaNVB3Side01) The Long Arm EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleOld01\aaNVB3Side_aaNVB3Side01God_00065D15_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You need to listen more closely. I'm trying to save you, jackass.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你给我仔细听好。我在尝试救你，你这混蛋。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nevermind.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没关系。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Very well.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那好吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Godwin [0406504C] (mod) Quest : ([04061050]aaNVB3Side01) The Long Arm EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleOld01\aaNVB3Side_aaNVB3Side01God_00065D0C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaNVB3Side01GodwinCharisma
I believe that. The truth of it stings, in fact. Very well, if the NCR is led to believe that I'm gone, then I'll cease my "activities".
ESP.TRADUIT: 我信了。真相总是很刺痛的。很好，如果NCR认为我走了，我就停止我的"活动"。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Godwin [0406504C] (mod) Quest : ([04061050]aaNVB3Side01) The Long Arm EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleOld01\aaNVB3Side_aaNVB3Side01God_00066310_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Master.GodwinFate to 2
If it's not me, someone else will do the job. The NCR will never relent. Think of your children.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就算不是我，别人也会做这件事的。NCR永远不会松懈。想想你的孩子。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaNVB3Side01GodwinIntelligence
aaNVB3Side01BrookshireTURNIN
