Really? That's surprising. I thought we finally had him nailed down. Guess he moved on to bigger and better things. Probably got scalped by 80's.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真的？这太令人惊讶了。我以为我们终于把他搞定了呢。我猜他是在追求更大更好的东西。可能在80年代帮被割了头皮。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brookshire [0402E666] (mod) Quest : ([04061050]aaNVB3Side01) The Long Arm EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaNVB3GenericVoiceType\aaNVB3Side_aaNVB3Side01Bro_00065D1D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: At least I can check him off of my list. This isn't a full bounty, but I appreciate the fact that you made a good try of it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 至少我可以把他从我的名单上除掉。虽然这不是一个全额的赏金，但我仍然很感激你做了一个好的尝试。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brookshire [0402E666] (mod) Quest : ([04061050]aaNVB3Side01) The Long Arm EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaNVB3GenericVoiceType\aaNVB3Side_aaNVB3Side01Bro_00065D1D_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've still got more names on my list, so let me know if you're interested in another job.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的名单上还有更多的名字，如果你对另一份工作感兴趣，请告诉我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brookshire [0402E666] (mod) Quest : ([04061050]aaNVB3Side01) The Long Arm EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaNVB3GenericVoiceType\aaNVB3Side_aaNVB3Side01Bro_00065D1D_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaNVB3Side01 20 player.additem caps001 250
<Lie> I couldn't find Godwin.
ESP.TRADUIT: <说谎> 我找不到戈德温。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Excellent. This will be big news back west. Newspapers have been running stories on him for years, always made the Republic look impotent.
ESP.TRADUIT: 太棒了。这将是西部大新闻。报纸多年来一直在报道他，总是让共和国显得无能。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brookshire [0402E666] (mod) Quest : ([04061050]aaNVB3Side01) The Long Arm EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaNVB3GenericVoiceType\aaNVB3Side_aaNVB3Side01Bro_00066312_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You certainly earned your pay. I look forward to working with you again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是你应得的报酬。我期待着与你再次合作。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brookshire [0402E666] (mod) Quest : ([04061050]aaNVB3Side01) The Long Arm EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaNVB3GenericVoiceType\aaNVB3Side_aaNVB3Side01Bro_00066312_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaNVB3Side01 20 player.additem caps001 1000
Godwin is dead.
ESP.TRADUIT: 戈德温已经死了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your target is a vigilante by the name of Jackson. For years he acted as a one-man judge, jury and executioner in NCR territory, defying the law.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的目标是一个叫杰克逊的义务警员。多年来，他违抗法律，在NCR地区担任一人法官、陪审团和处刑人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brookshire [0402E666] (mod) Quest : ([04061050]aaNVB3Side01) The Long Arm EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaNVB3GenericVoiceType\aaNVB3Side_aaNVB3Side01Bro_00066313_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: A few years ago he killed a senator who was accused of rape, but was eventually acquitted. We suspect the accuser hired Jackson to do the deed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 几年前，他杀害了一名被指控强奸的参议员，但最终被无罪释放。我们怀疑是原告雇了杰克逊做这件事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brookshire [0402E666] (mod) Quest : ([04061050]aaNVB3Side01) The Long Arm EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaNVB3GenericVoiceType\aaNVB3Side_aaNVB3Side01Bro_00066313_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: To top it off, he's supposedly shacked up with a slaver that we haven't identified. Kill them both, and I'll throw in a bonus. Good luck.
ESP.TRADUIT: 最重要的是，他应该和一个我们还没确认的奴隶同居了。把他们两个都杀了，我就给他们一笔奖金。祝你好运。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brookshire [0402E666] (mod) Quest : ([04061050]aaNVB3Side01) The Long Arm EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaNVB3GenericVoiceType\aaNVB3Side_aaNVB3Side01Bro_00066313_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaNVB3Side01 25 aaNVB3EstherREF.enable
I'd like to take on another job.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想换一份工作。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your target is a vigilante by the name of Jackson. For years he acted as a one-man judge, jury and executioner in NCR territory, defying the law.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的目标是一个叫杰克逊的义务警员。多年来，他违抗法律，在NCR地区担任一人法官、陪审团和处刑人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brookshire [0402E666] (mod) Quest : ([04061050]aaNVB3Side01) The Long Arm EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaNVB3GenericVoiceType\aaNVB3Side_aaNVB3Side01Bro_00066314_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: A few years ago he killed a senator who was accused of rape, but was eventually acquitted. We suspect the accusor hired Jackson to do the deed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 几年前，他杀害了一名被指控强奸的参议员，但最终被无罪释放。我们怀疑原告雇了杰克逊做这件事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brookshire [0402E666] (mod) Quest : ([04061050]aaNVB3Side01) The Long Arm

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good luck.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好运。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brookshire [0402E666] (mod) Quest : ([04061050]aaNVB3Side01) The Long Arm EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaNVB3GenericVoiceType\aaNVB3Side_aaNVB3Side01Bro_00066314_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaNVB3Side01 25
I'd like to take on another job.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想换一份工作。

ESP.ORIGINAL: He was always a slippery one. Here's a little something for your time, regardless.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他总是很狡猾。不管怎样，这里有些适合你的东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brookshire [0402E666] (mod) Quest : ([04061050]aaNVB3Side01) The Long Arm EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaNVB3GenericVoiceType\aaNVB3Side_aaNVB3Side01Bro_000687FB_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaNVB3Side01 40 player.additem caps001 250
<Lie> It seems that Jackson has already left the canyon. I couldn't find any trace of him.
ESP.TRADUIT: <说谎> 看来杰克逊已经离开了峡谷。我找不到他的踪迹。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're working out well for us, if I may say so. I have a few more contracts if you're still interested in additional work.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我可以这么说的话，你对我们很有帮助。如果你还对额外的工作感兴趣，我还有一些合同。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brookshire [0402E666] (mod) Quest : ([04061050]aaNVB3Side01) The Long Arm EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaNVB3GenericVoiceType\aaNVB3Side_aaNVB3Side01Bro_000687FC_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaNVB3Side01 40 player.additem caps001 1000
I took care of Jackson.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我料理了杰克逊了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Two for the price of... one and a half. Sorry, but she was just a target of opportunity. Jackson was the real prize. Excellent work.
ESP.TRADUIT: 两个人有...一个半的价格。对不起，她只是个额外的目标。杰克逊才是真正的奖品。干得好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brookshire [0402E666] (mod) Quest : ([04061050]aaNVB3Side01) The Long Arm EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaNVB3GenericVoiceType\aaNVB3Side_aaNVB3Side01Bro_000687FD_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaNVB3Side01 40 player.additem caps001 1500
I took care of Jackson and Esther.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我料理了杰克逊和以斯帖。

ESP.ORIGINAL: This one is... delicate, but the payout is significant. Your job is to eliminate one of the republic's worst traitors, Joe Frost.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个是...很微妙，但付出的代价是巨大的。你的工作是消灭共和国最坏的叛徒之一，乔 弗罗斯特。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brookshire [0402E666] (mod) Quest : ([04061050]aaNVB3Side01) The Long Arm EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaNVB3GenericVoiceType\aaNVB3Side_aaNVB3Side01Bro_000687FE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: A few years ago Joe was working as a high-level technician in an intelligence agency. His specialty was in surveillance equipment, to be specific.
ESP.TRADUIT: 几年前，乔在一家情报机构当高级技术员。具体来说，他的专长是监视设备。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brookshire [0402E666] (mod) Quest : ([04061050]aaNVB3Side01) The Long Arm EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaNVB3GenericVoiceType\aaNVB3Side_aaNVB3Side01Bro_000687FE_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He discovered that a rogue element in the agency was unlawfully monitoring citizens in the hopes of rooting out frumentarii.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他发现该机构的一个流氓分子非法监视公民，希望铲除弗鲁门塔里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brookshire [0402E666] (mod) Quest : ([04061050]aaNVB3Side01) The Long Arm EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaNVB3GenericVoiceType\aaNVB3Side_aaNVB3Side01Bro_000687FE_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Instead of reporting this to his superiors up the chain of command, Frost decided to leak the program and any pertinent intelligence to the press.
ESP.TRADUIT: 弗罗斯特没有向上级汇报这件事，而是决定向新闻界泄露了程序和所有相关情报。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brookshire [0402E666] (mod) Quest : ([04061050]aaNVB3Side01) The Long Arm EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaNVB3GenericVoiceType\aaNVB3Side_aaNVB3Side01Bro_000687FE_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This has been a public relations nightmare for the Republic, but more importantly, divulging that intelligence has endangered our troops.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这对共和国来说是一场公关噩梦，但更重要的是，泄露情报已经危及到我们的军队。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brookshire [0402E666] (mod) Quest : ([04061050]aaNVB3Side01) The Long Arm EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaNVB3GenericVoiceType\aaNVB3Side_aaNVB3Side01Bro_000687FE_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He released secret troop movements, plans, and other highly sensitive information. All the frumentarii had to do was pick up the damn newspaper.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他泄露了秘密的部队调动、计划和其他高度敏感的信息。而弗鲁门塔里要做的就是只是拿起那该死的报纸。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brookshire [0402E666] (mod) Quest : ([04061050]aaNVB3Side01) The Long Arm EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaNVB3GenericVoiceType\aaNVB3Side_aaNVB3Side01Bro_000687FE_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Unwilling to abide by the law and face a fair trial, Frost absconded like a coward. We've been fruitlessly searching for him... until now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 弗罗斯特不愿遵守法律，面对公正的审判，像个懦夫一样潜逃。我们一直在徒劳地寻找他...直到现在。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brookshire [0402E666] (mod) Quest : ([04061050]aaNVB3Side01) The Long Arm EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaNVB3GenericVoiceType\aaNVB3Side_aaNVB3Side01Bro_000687FE_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have it on good authority that he's staying at the Frosthill hotel. I want you to discreetly terminate him, preferably with no witnesses.
ESP.TRADUIT: 据我所知他住在霜地酒店。我要你谨慎地终结他，最好没有证人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brookshire [0402E666] (mod) Quest : ([04061050]aaNVB3Side01) The Long Arm EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaNVB3GenericVoiceType\aaNVB3Side_aaNVB3Side01Bro_000687FE_8.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you have any questions?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有什么问题吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brookshire [0402E666] (mod) Quest : ([04061050]aaNVB3Side01) The Long Arm EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaNVB3GenericVoiceType\aaNVB3Side_aaNVB3Side01Bro_000687FE_9.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm interested in more work.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我对更多的工作感兴趣。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That little bastard has a sixth sense, I swear it. You wouldn't believe how many times he's slipped through our fingers. We'll get him another time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那个小混蛋绝对有第六感，我发誓。你不会相信他有多少次从我们的指间溜走。我们下次再找他算了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brookshire [0402E666] (mod) Quest : ([04061050]aaNVB3Side01) The Long Arm EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaNVB3GenericVoiceType\aaNVB3Side_aaNVB3Side01Bro_0006B36A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm afraid that's everything I have at present. Stick with Randall if you're looking for more work.
ESP.TRADUIT: 恐怕这就是我目前所拥有的一切。如果你想找更多的工作，就跟着兰道尔混吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brookshire [0402E666] (mod) Quest : ([04061050]aaNVB3Side01) The Long Arm EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaNVB3GenericVoiceType\aaNVB3Side_aaNVB3Side01Bro_0006B36A_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaNVB3Side01 190
<Lie> It seems that Joe Frost skipped town.
ESP.TRADUIT: <说谎>乔·弗罗斯特似乎逃离了这座城市。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I know it may not have seemed glorious, but you've done a great service for the NCR. When this is all done I make sure you get a commendation.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道这看起来不太光彩，但你为NCR做了很不错的服务。当这一切完成后，我保证你会得到嘉奖。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brookshire [0402E666] (mod) Quest : ([04061050]aaNVB3Side01) The Long Arm EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaNVB3GenericVoiceType\aaNVB3Side_aaNVB3Side01Bro_0006B3A4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm afraid that's everything I have at present. Stick with Randall if you're looking for more work.
ESP.TRADUIT: 恐怕这就是我目前所拥有的一切。如果你想找更多的工作，就跟着兰道尔混吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brookshire [0402E666] (mod) Quest : ([04061050]aaNVB3Side01) The Long Arm EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaNVB3GenericVoiceType\aaNVB3Side_aaNVB3Side01Bro_0006B3A4_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.additem caps001 2000 setstage aaNVB3Side01 190
Joe Frost is dead.
ESP.TRADUIT: 乔·弗罗斯特死了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaNVB3Side01EstherIntro
ESP.TRADUIT: aaNVB3主线01伊瑟介入

ESP.ORIGINAL: Bloody. hell.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真血腥。我的天。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Esther [0406504A] (mod) Quest : ([04061050]aaNVB3Side01) The Long Arm EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wait! Please, just wait for a moment. Look, I'm with child right now, I'll be delivering in a few months. Please don't hurt my baby!
ESP.TRADUIT: 等等！请稍等片刻。听着，我现在有孩子了，几个月后就要分娩了。请不要伤害我的孩子好吗！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Esther [0406504A] (mod) Quest : ([04061050]aaNVB3Side01) The Long Arm EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whatever you're thinking of doing, please just consider the life of my little one. This baby doesn't deserve to die for the things I've done.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管你想做什么，请想想我的小家伙的生活。这个孩子不配为我的所作所为而死。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Esther [0406504A] (mod) Quest : ([04061050]aaNVB3Side01) The Long Arm EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Side01.EstherGreeted to 2
You know why I'm here, right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道我为什么在这里，对吧？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, it's sort of obvious. Random stranger happens in and starts a conversation? It's a little odd.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，真是明显啊。随便一个陌生人闯进我的房子，然后开始要求对话？真是奇怪。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackson [040669C6] (mod) Quest : ([04061050]aaNVB3Side01) The Long Arm EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaJacksonVoiceType\aaNVB3Side_aaNVB3Side01Jac_000669EC_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look, I know you're just doing your job and all that, but I'm not hurting anybody here. The truth is... I'm retired.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听着，我知道你只是在做你的工作，但我没有伤害任何人。事实上。。。我早就退休了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackson [040669C6] (mod) Quest : ([04061050]aaNVB3Side01) The Long Arm EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaJacksonVoiceType\aaNVB3Side_aaNVB3Side01Jac_000669EC_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Trust me when I say that everybody I took down had it coming, especially that fat-assed senator. He was a fucking monster.
ESP.TRADUIT: 相信我，我干掉的每一个人都有我的缘由，尤其是那个胖参议员。他是个该死的怪物。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackson [040669C6] (mod) Quest : ([04061050]aaNVB3Side01) The Long Arm

ESP.ORIGINAL: You off me and some pencil-pusher back in Shady will just check off a box on his form. Enough time passes and they might send someone after you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你杀了我，然后一个在阴暗处只会动动铅笔的人会他的表格上勾选一个方框。当足够的时间过去之后，他们反而会派人来追你的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackson [040669C6] (mod) Quest : ([04061050]aaNVB3Side01) The Long Arm EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaJacksonVoiceType\aaNVB3Side_aaNVB3Side01Jac_000669EC_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's how NCR works... they expect you to be a meek, obedient serf, utterly reliant on the state. Fuck that, all right? I did what had to be done.
ESP.TRADUIT: NCR就是这样工作的。。。他们希望你是一个温顺、听话的农奴，完全依赖国家。去他妈的，好吗？我真是做了我该做的事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackson [040669C6] (mod) Quest : ([04061050]aaNVB3Side01) The Long Arm EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaJacksonVoiceType\aaNVB3Side_aaNVB3Side01Jac_000669EC_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You and I aren't that different... so either do it or don't, but stop wasting my time, would you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你和我没什么不同。。。所以要么杀了我要么什么都不做，但别再浪费我的时间了，好吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackson [040669C6] (mod) Quest : ([04061050]aaNVB3Side01) The Long Arm EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaJacksonVoiceType\aaNVB3Side_aaNVB3Side01Jac_000669EC_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Side01.JacksonGreeted to 1
You think you're above the law? You don't get to cross the bear and walk away.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你认为你凌驾于法律之上？你可不能绕过熊然后就这么走开。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I did what needed to be done. Sort of like hunting bounties for money. Oh, but you're one of the good guys, right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我做了应该有人做的事。这有点像为了钱而猎取赏金。哦，但你是个好人，对吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackson [040669C6] (mod) Quest : ([04061050]aaNVB3Side01) The Long Arm EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaJacksonVoiceType\aaNVB3Side_aaNVB3Side01Jac_000669EB_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You fucking bounty hunters are all hypocrites. Do whatever you feel.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你们这些该死的赏金猎人都是伪君子。随心所欲的作恶。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackson [040669C6] (mod) Quest : ([04061050]aaNVB3Side01) The Long Arm EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaJacksonVoiceType\aaNVB3Side_aaNVB3Side01Jac_000669EB_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Side01.JacksonGreeted to 1
If that hammer is all that you've got, you just made my job a lot easier. <Attack>
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你只有那把锤子的话，你就让我的工作轻松多了。<攻击>

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've got no idea what I'm capable of!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你可不知道我能做什么！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackson [040669C6] (mod) Quest : ([04061050]aaNVB3Side01) The Long Arm EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaJacksonVoiceType\aaNVB3Side_aaNVB3Side01Jac_000669EA_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaJacksonREF.startcombat player
If you'll pardon my curiosity, how did you and Esther hook up?
ESP.TRADUIT: 请原谅我的好奇，你和伊瑟是怎么联系的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I rolled into town about the same time as her, hit it off, like right away. We're both just survivors... looking to put our old lives behind us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我和她差不多在同一时间进城，很快就一见如故了。我们都是幸存者。。。并且希望把我们的旧生活抛在脑后。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackson [040669C6] (mod) Quest : ([04061050]aaNVB3Side01) The Long Arm EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaJacksonVoiceType\aaNVB3Side_aaNVB3Side01Jac_000669E4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We both know how this world works. We just want to ensure our kids don't have to struggle like we did. It boils down to pragmatism... and sex.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们都知道这个世界是怎么运作的。我们只想确保我们的孩子不必像我们一样挣扎。这归根结底就是实用主义。。。还有性爱。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackson [040669C6] (mod) Quest : ([04061050]aaNVB3Side01) The Long Arm EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaJacksonVoiceType\aaNVB3Side_aaNVB3Side01Jac_000669E4_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're clearly a good judge of character.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你显然是个品行端正的人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ha fucking ha. Yeah, she told me about that score she pulled on you in Vegas. A fucking orphanage? You really fell for that? Christ alive, man.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哈哈哈。你他妈说的对，是的，她告诉过我她在维加斯揭露的你的事。一个孤儿院？你真的他妈的爱上了那个？上帝还活着，伙计。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackson [040669C6] (mod) Quest : ([04061050]aaNVB3Side01) The Long Arm EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaJacksonVoiceType\aaNVB3Side_aaNVB3Side01Jac_000669E9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Esther and I are a lot alike, and there's no shitting a shitter. We probably have a future president growing in her belly at this rate, I mean, shit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 伊瑟和我很像，一个不这么想的人都没有。在她的肚子，我们可能有一个未来的总统就以这样的速度里成长着，我的意思是，妈的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackson [040669C6] (mod) Quest : ([04061050]aaNVB3Side01) The Long Arm EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaJacksonVoiceType\aaNVB3Side_aaNVB3Side01Jac_000669E9_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How romantic.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真是浪漫啊。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fuck romantic. We're just two realists who like to fuck, and we both know a partnership like this is beneficial on the long run.
ESP.TRADUIT: 去他妈的浪漫。我们只是两个喜欢做爱的现实主义者，我们都知道这样的合作从长远来看是有益的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackson [040669C6] (mod) Quest : ([04061050]aaNVB3Side01) The Long Arm EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaJacksonVoiceType\aaNVB3Side_aaNVB3Side01Jac_000669E8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, uh, good luck.
ESP.TRADUIT: 行吧，嗯...祝你好运。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, thanks.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是啊，谢谢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackson [040669C6] (mod) Quest : ([04061050]aaNVB3Side01) The Long Arm EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaJacksonVoiceType\aaNVB3Side_aaNVB3Side01Jac_00073C8A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaNVB3Side01JacksonKILLEDESTHER
ESP.TRADUIT: aaNVB3支线01杰克森杀了

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, NO! I'll rip your fucking heart out!
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，不！我要把你的心给撕了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackson [040669C6] (mod) Quest : ([04061050]aaNVB3Side01) The Long Arm EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaJacksonVoiceType\aaNVB3Side_aaNVB3Side01Jac_000669DD_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaJacksonREF.addperk slayer aaJacksonREF.addperk HeavyHanded aaJacksonREF.addperk BetterCriticals aaJacksonREF.addperk Finesse aaJacksonREF.addperk BloodyMess
aaNVB3Side01EstherKilledJackson
ESP.TRADUIT: aaNVB3支线01伊瑟被杀杰克森

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, God! No, you monster! He didn't do anything! Why, why, why? You'll pay for this, you hear me! One day you'll damn well pay for everything!
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，天哪！不，你这个怪物！他什么也没做！为什么，为什么，为什么？你会为此付出代价的，听我说！总有一天你会为这一切付出代价的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Esther [0406504A] (mod) Quest : ([04061050]aaNVB3Side01) The Long Arm EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nevermind.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没关系。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Esther [0406504A] (mod) Quest : ([04061050]aaNVB3Side01) The Long Arm EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : Jackson [040669C6] (mod) Quest : ([04061050]aaNVB3Side01) The Long Arm EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Since when did you have a dog?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你什么时候养狗的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, Cooper? Found him when we cleared out a raider den just outside the canyon. They'd been using him as bait for their fighting dogs.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，库珀？当我们清理出峡谷外的一个匪徒巢穴时，我发现了他。他们一直用他做他们斗狗的开胃菜。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallASK01C_00067BF7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He was pretty tore up when we found him, but he bounced back real quick. Ain't the biggest or the fastest, but he's tough as an old boot.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们找到他时他很伤心，但他很快就恢复过来了。他不是最大的那只也不是最快的那只，但他很坚强。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallASK01C_00067BF7_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Feel free to take him with you the next time you go after a bounty. I'm sure he'd be a help to you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 下次你去找赏金的时候可以带他一起去。我相信他会帮到你的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallASK01C_00067BF7_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaCooperQuest.bCooperHireable to 1
I need to get going.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我得走了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: <pant pant pant>
ESP.TRADUIT: <喘气 喘气 喘气>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cooper [04020396] (mod) Quest : ([040203A0]aaCooperQuest) Cooper's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\VoiceDoNotRecordM\aaCooperQuest_aaCooperBye_00067BFA_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I want to talk about something else.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想谈谈其它的事。

ESP.ORIGINAL: <pant pant pant>
ESP.TRADUIT: <喘气 喘气 喘气>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cooper [04020396] (mod) Quest : ([040203A0]aaCooperQuest) Cooper's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's horrifying. Please continue.
ESP.TRADUIT: 太可怕了。请继续。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, the Jackals shackled me and hauled me around, made me their zombie slave. They just assumed I was some random hobo in the wastes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，那些豺狼帮把我铐起来，把我拖来拖去，把我变成他们的僵尸奴隶。他们以为我是那些废物流浪汉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallASKGho_000681F0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I ended up taking a page out of old Marshall Cooper's playbook. Late one night I used a fork to kill their leader, then grabbed a gun.
ESP.TRADUIT: 最后我从老马歇尔库珀的剧本里抽出一页来用。一天深夜，我用叉子杀了他们的头目，然后抓起一把枪。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallASKGho_000681F0_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Jackals are all pussies, of course, so they ran off. I did manage to kill two of them, though. After that I got my bearings and headed north.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，豺狼都是群娘炮，所以他们就逃跑了。不过，我确实杀了他们中的两个人。在那之后，我指明了方向，朝北走去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallASKGho_000681F0_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Please. Stop. I'm fighting the urge to gag.
ESP.TRADUIT: 拜托。停下来。我在克服呕吐的冲动。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey, you asked. Don't go expecting me to sugarcoat shit just cause you can't handle the gritty details of reality.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿，这可是你问的。别指望我会因为你无法处理现实中的细节而给你的狗屎涂上糖衣。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallASKGho_000681EF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why didn't you return to the Mojave?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你为什么不回莫哈维？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Jackals had hauled me up north to begin with, and I wasn't sure what was going on back in Vegas. For all I knew the Judge was still around.
ESP.TRADUIT: 豺狼帮一开始就把我拉到了北方，我不知道维加斯发生了什么。我只知道法官还在附近。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallASKGho_000681F2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I ain't proud of everything I've done, but it worked out. I was on the road when somebody told me Marko was up in Utah.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我并不为我所做的一切感到骄傲，但我成功了。我在路上，有人告诉我马尔科在犹他州。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallASKGho_000681F2_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hearing that gave me real purpose again, something to work towards. I got on as a caravan guard and got up here not long after that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听了这番话，我又有了真正的目标，要靠努力来实现。我当上了商队警卫，不久后就到了这里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallASKGho_000681F2_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I started to figure it was nothing. I'd heard stories of Marko dying for years... until I saw him. He was outside town, had a gang with him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我一开始觉得这没什么。因为我听过很多关于马尔科已经死去的故事...直到我亲眼看到他。他在城外，和一伙人在一起。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallASKGho_000681F2_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Deep down I knew he'd be too fast, or one of his boys would plug me first. I'd have to wait, but at least I knew where he was.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在内心深处，我知道现在对付他太轻率了，不然他其中一个小子会先插上我的。我得等等，但至少我知道他在哪了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: I went back with a caravan, used my paycheck to get geared up, and that's when Brookshire found me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我和一个商队回去了，用我的薪水去准备，而布鲁克希尔就在那时找到了我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallASKGho_000681F2_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He told me that NCR had a stake in Frosthill, wanted to fund a bounty hunting expedition. All they needed was some leadership.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他告诉我NCR在霜地有股份，想资助一次赏金狩猎探险。他们只需要一些领导就行了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallASKGho_000681F2_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: By that time word had gotten round bout your doings in the Mojave, so Brookshire figured I'd be a good fit to corral his gang of misfits.
ESP.TRADUIT: 到那时，关于你在莫哈维的所作所为的消息已经传开了，所以布鲁克希尔认为我很适合把他那帮不称职的人控制起来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallASKGho_000681F2_8.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I mean... it's going to work, but sometimes I have my doubts about all of this, the way things turned out. I regret starting you down this path.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是说。。。这是可行的，但有时我对这一切都抱有怀疑，对事情如何变化。我很抱歉也让你走上这条路了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallASKGho_000681F2_9.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRandallQuest.RandallStory to 1
I only wanted to see that justice was served. You have nothing to regret.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我只想看到正义得到伸张。所以你没有什么可后悔的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've seen a lot of judgment, but not much justice. I just hope God is understanding when I explain to him all the things I've done.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我看到了很多判决，但没有多少正义。我只希望上帝能理解我向他解释的我所做的一切。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallASKReg_000681F9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I knew what I was getting into, and I have no regrets. It was a privilege to work with you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道我在做什么，我不后悔。能和你一起工作是我的荣幸。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's just get through all this before we starting congratulating each other and talking about privileges. Jesus.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在我们开始互相祝贺和谈论特权之前，让我们先把这些都做完吧。天啊。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallASKReg_000681FC_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Remain Silent>
ESP.TRADUIT: <保持沉默>

ESP.ORIGINAL: I didn't realize losing your balls was a side effect of ghoulification.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道失去你的胆量是变成食尸鬼的副作用。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I know you can play the tough guy, but you better have more than bold talk when it comes time to ante up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道你可以扮演一个硬汉，但你最好有比起说大话更多的时间来进行准备。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallASKReg_000681FB_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We all have to live with our choices. That's life.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们都必须接受自己的选择。这就是生活。

ESP.ORIGINAL: God's honest truth. I just hope you don't have to pay for my choices.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真是上帝诚实的真理啊。我只希望你不用为我的选择而付出代价，朋友。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallASKReg_000681FA_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't worry. I hear babies go straight to heaven, just like dogs. <Attack>
ESP.TRADUIT: 别担心。我听说婴儿会像狗一样直接上天堂的。<攻击>

ESP.ORIGINAL: Jackson, help!
ESP.TRADUIT: 杰克逊，救救我们！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Esther [0406504A] (mod) Quest : ([04061050]aaNVB3Side01) The Long Arm EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaNVB3EstherREF.startcombat player aaJacksonREF.startcombat player
You probably planned this. I should just kill you here and now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这可能是你策划的。我现在就应该杀了你。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sweet Jesus, please, please, please don't harm me, if only for my child's sake. I know that I've done awful things, I know I deserve death.
ESP.TRADUIT: 亲爱的耶稣，求你了，求你了，请不要伤害我，即使只是为了我的孩子。我知道我做了写可怕的事，我知道我活该死。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Esther [0406504A] (mod) Quest : ([04061050]aaNVB3Side01) The Long Arm EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: You know you deserve to die, right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道你应该死，对吧？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sweet Jesus, please, please, please don't harm me, if only for my child's sake. I know that I've done awful things, I know I deserve death.
ESP.TRADUIT: 亲爱的耶稣，求你了，求你了，请不要伤害我，即使只是为了我的孩子。我知道我做了写可怕的事，我知道我活该死。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Esther [0406504A] (mod) Quest : ([04061050]aaNVB3Side01) The Long Arm EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: You lucked out, hussy. I'll let you go - for now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你走运了，婊子。我现在就放你走。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank you, thank you, thank you! It goes without saying that seeing you here is... unexpected. I never would have thought.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢，感谢，赞美你！不用说，在这里见到你。。。真是出乎意料。我从没想到过。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Esther [0406504A] (mod) Quest : ([04061050]aaNVB3Side01) The Long Arm EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: You owe me, bitch. How much is your child's life worth to you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你欠我的，婊子。你孩子的生命对你来说值多少钱？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Everything I have, everything we've saved! Here, take it, take it all!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我拥有的一切，我们存下来的一切！来，拿着，拿着！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Esther [0406504A] (mod) Quest : ([04061050]aaNVB3Side01) The Long Arm EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: Please, just leave us alone!
ESP.TRADUIT: 求你了，离我们远点！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Esther [0406504A] (mod) Quest : ([04061050]aaNVB3Side01) The Long Arm EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.additem caps001 5000
I'll show mercy to your child, but you better hope we never cross paths again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会对你的孩子表示怜悯，但你最好希望我们再也不会相遇了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank you, thank you, thank you! It goes without saying that seeing you here is... unexpected. I never would have thought.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢，谢谢，谢谢！不用说，在这里见到你。。。真是出乎意料。我从没想过这种事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Esther [0406504A] (mod) Quest : ([04061050]aaNVB3Side01) The Long Arm EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't have any other questions. I'll make sure it gets done.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我没有其他问题。我会确保完成它的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good luck, then.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那就祝你好运了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brookshire [0402E666] (mod) Quest : ([04061050]aaNVB3Side01) The Long Arm EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaNVB3GenericVoiceType\aaNVB3Side_aaNVB3Side01Bro_0006B368_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaNVB3Side01 45
I'm going to pass on this one.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不打算接受这一个。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Sigh of frustration}Well, that's damn unfortunate. I'll have to hire one of these dumb cutthroats wandering around the camp, then.
ESP.TRADUIT: {沮丧的叹息}好吧，真不幸。看来我得雇一个那些在营地里游荡的蠢杀手了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brookshire [0402E666] (mod) Quest : ([04061050]aaNVB3Side01) The Long Arm EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaNVB3GenericVoiceType\aaNVB3Side_aaNVB3Side01Bro_0006B369_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaNVB3Side01 190
Since when does blowing the whistle on an illegal government program warrant a death sentence?
ESP.TRADUIT: 从什么时候开始揭发一个非法的政府项目就应该被判死刑？

ESP.ORIGINAL: When two platoons of troopers are ambushed and massacred because of the leak, that's when. Frost's sedition has gotten men killed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当两排士兵因为泄密而遭到伏击和屠杀时。弗罗斯特引发的暴动使大量的人丧命。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brookshire [0402E666] (mod) Quest : ([04061050]aaNVB3Side01) The Long Arm EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaNVB3GenericVoiceType\aaNVB3Side_aaNVB3Side01Bro_0006B367_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I take it that you're a bright fellow, so you probably know why I'm here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我认为你是个聪明人，所以你可能知道我来这里的原因。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Even here, out in this frozen hole, the republic still finds me. It was bound to happen, I just didn't expect it here of all places.
ESP.TRADUIT: 即使在这里，在这个冰冻的洞里，共和国仍然能找到我。这是必然发生的，我只是没想到全部的方法吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Frost [0406B362] (mod) Quest : ([04061050]aaNVB3Side01) The Long Arm EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaJoeFrostVoiceType\aaNVB3Side_aaNVB3Side01Fro_0006B373_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I bet it was Brookshire. It was, wasn't it? Wickham wouldn't go for this. Clark is too stupid to find me. No, it has to be Brookshire, that slime.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我打赌是布鲁克希尔。是的，难道不是吗？维克汉姆可不会同意的。而克拉克太蠢了，他找不到我。不，一定是布鲁克希尔，那个肮脏的泥巴。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Frost [0406B362] (mod) Quest : ([04061050]aaNVB3Side01) The Long Arm EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaJoeFrostVoiceType\aaNVB3Side_aaNVB3Side01Fro_0006B373_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I did their dirty work for years, tapping phone lines and helping them spy on regular citizens. This war... it made them compromise our principles.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我为他们干了多年的脏活，窃听电话，帮他们监视普通市民。但这场战争。。。这让他们破坏了我们的原则。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Frost [0406B362] (mod) Quest : ([04061050]aaNVB3Side01) The Long Arm EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaJoeFrostVoiceType\aaNVB3Side_aaNVB3Side01Fro_0006B373_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This isn't the republic I learned about in school. Tandi wouldn't have stood for this. The people had a right to know.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这不是我在学校学到的共和国。坦迪也不会支持的。人民有权知道他们应该知道的事情。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Frost [0406B362] (mod) Quest : ([04061050]aaNVB3Side01) The Long Arm EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaJoeFrostVoiceType\aaNVB3Side_aaNVB3Side01Fro_0006B373_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you so blind that you can't see what's happening? They're just using you right now, and soon enough you'll be discarded.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是不是瞎到看不见这里发生了什么事？他们现在只是在利用你，很快你就会被抛弃的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Frost [0406B362] (mod) Quest : ([04061050]aaNVB3Side01) The Long Arm EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaJoeFrostVoiceType\aaNVB3Side_aaNVB3Side01Fro_0006B373_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Side01.FrostGreeted to 1
You shouldn't have fucked the bear, Joe. It's a capital offense.
ESP.TRADUIT: 乔，你不该和熊乱搞的。这可是死罪。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Even here, out in this frozen hole, the republic still finds me. It was bound to happen, I just didn't expect it here of all places.
ESP.TRADUIT: 即使在这里，在这个冰冻的洞里，共和国仍然能找到我。这是必然发生的，我只是没想到全部的方法吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Frost [0406B362] (mod) Quest : ([04061050]aaNVB3Side01) The Long Arm EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaJoeFrostVoiceType\aaNVB3Side_aaNVB3Side01Fro_0006B36F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I bet it was Brookshire. It was, wasn't it? Wickham wouldn't go for this. Clark is too stupid to find me. No, it has to be Brookshire, that slime.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我打赌是布鲁克希尔。是的，难道不是吗？维克汉姆可不会同意的。而克拉克太蠢了，他找不到我。不，一定是布鲁克希尔，那个肮脏的泥巴。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Frost [0406B362] (mod) Quest : ([04061050]aaNVB3Side01) The Long Arm EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaJoeFrostVoiceType\aaNVB3Side_aaNVB3Side01Fro_0006B36F_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I did their dirty work for years, tapping phone lines and helping them spy on regular citizens. This war... it them compromise our principles.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我为他们干了多年的脏活，窃听电话，帮他们监视普通市民。但这场战争。。。如果他们破坏了我们的原则。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Frost [0406B362] (mod) Quest : ([04061050]aaNVB3Side01) The Long Arm EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaJoeFrostVoiceType\aaNVB3Side_aaNVB3Side01Fro_0006B36F_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This isn't the republic I learned about in school. Tandi wouldn't have stood for this. The people had a right to know.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这不是我在学校学到的共和国。坦迪也不会支持的。人民有权知道他们应该知道的事情。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Frost [0406B362] (mod) Quest : ([04061050]aaNVB3Side01) The Long Arm EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaJoeFrostVoiceType\aaNVB3Side_aaNVB3Side01Fro_0006B36F_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you so blind that you can't see what's happening? They're just using you right now, and soon enough you'll be discarded.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是不是瞎到看不见这里发生了什么事？他们现在只是在利用你，很快你就会被抛弃的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Frost [0406B362] (mod) Quest : ([04061050]aaNVB3Side01) The Long Arm EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaJoeFrostVoiceType\aaNVB3Side_aaNVB3Side01Fro_0006B36F_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Side01.FrostGreeted to 1
aaNVB3Side01FrostWhyHere
I should get going.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我该走了。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Frost [0406B362] (mod) Quest : ([04061050]aaNVB3Side01) The Long Arm EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Did Marko really kill my companions?
ESP.TRADUIT: 马尔科..是不是杀了我的同伴？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, every single one, I'm afraid. Some fought, but the hunters were waiting for them when Brookshire hit the gas. Never had a chance.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，我恐怕连一个人都没有拉下。有些人还在反抗，但当布鲁克希尔踩足油门时，猎人们正等着他们。他们连一丝机会都没有。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Thorne [0405C8F3] (mod) Quest : ([04035DD8]aaNVB3Main04) Ain't No Grave EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaThorneVoiceType\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main04Tho_0006C04F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: All of them but Cooper. That little bastard literally ripped one of the hunter's balls off, took five slugs, but still managed to escape.
ESP.TRADUIT: 除了库珀，他们都死了。那个小混蛋真的撕掉了一个猎人的蛋蛋，他挨了五颗子弹，但还是逃了出来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Thorne [0405C8F3] (mod) Quest : ([04035DD8]aaNVB3Main04) Ain't No Grave EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaThorneVoiceType\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main04Tho_0006C050_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I managed to patch him up, but he'll need some time before he's back on his feet.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我设法把他治好了，但他需要一段时间才能重新站起来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Thorne [0405C8F3] (mod) Quest : ([04035DD8]aaNVB3Main04) Ain't No Grave EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaThorneVoiceType\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main04Tho_0006C050_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That little bastard literally ripped one of the hunter's balls off, took five slugs, but still managed to escape.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那个小混蛋真的撕掉了一个猎人的蛋蛋，他挨了五颗子弹，但还是逃了出来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Thorne [0405C8F3] (mod) Quest : ([04035DD8]aaNVB3Main04) Ain't No Grave EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaThorneVoiceType\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main04Tho_0006C051_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I managed to patch him up, but he'll need some time before he's back on his feet.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我设法把他治好了，但他需要一段时间才能重新站起来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Thorne [0405C8F3] (mod) Quest : ([04035DD8]aaNVB3Main04) Ain't No Grave EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaThorneVoiceType\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main04Tho_0006C051_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What happened to Cooper?
ESP.TRADUIT: 库珀怎么了？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaNVB3Main04ThorneBrookshire
ESP.TRADUIT: aaNVB3主线04索恩布鲁克希尔

ESP.ORIGINAL: Most everything you just said is a fabricated mass of drivel. You're better off reading real books.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你刚才说的大多数话都是胡编乱造的。你最好去读点真正的书。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Really? {Disappointed}Well, it must be because you were better than what it says, right? They had to tone it down for the sake of believability.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你认真的？{失望}嗯，一定是因为你比上面说的要好，对吧？为了可信度，他们不得不让书中的描述没那么极端。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ford [0402856D] (mod) Quest : ([04029364]aaHunterDialogue) Dialogue for Named Bounty Hunters EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaFordVoiceType\aaHunterDi_aaFordDimeNovel_0006C05D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There was no captive, and the shootout with Sergio was a damn close-run thing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那时根本没有俘虏，我和塞尔吉奥的枪战是完全近在咫尺的事情。

ESP.ORIGINAL: No captive? Why would they make that up? It doesn't matter, you killed Sergio, that's all that people care about. I still can't believe you're here!
ESP.TRADUIT: 没有俘虏吗？那他们为什么要编造这部分？不过没关系，你的确杀了塞尔吉奥，这就是人们所说关心的。我还是不敢相信你真的站在这里！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ford [0402856D] (mod) Quest : ([04029364]aaHunterDialogue) Dialogue for Named Bounty Hunters EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaFordVoiceType\aaHunterDi_aaFordDimeNovel_0006C05F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm glad you enjoyed it. I'll leave it at that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我很高兴你这样就爽了。我就不说什么了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thanks! I bet you do stuff like that all the time, wiping out bad guys before they can blink. I just want to learn all I can from you, you know?
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢！我敢打赌你一直都在做这样的事情，在坏人眨眼之前消灭他们。我只想向你学习，你知道吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ford [0402856D] (mod) Quest : ([04029364]aaHunterDialogue) Dialogue for Named Bounty Hunters EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaFordVoiceType\aaHunterDi_aaFordDimeNovel_0006C05E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think it would be best if you stayed here for the time being.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想你最好暂时留在这里。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Man, that's some bullshit!
ESP.TRADUIT: 伙计，这是胡说八道！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ford [0402856D] (mod) Quest : ([04029364]aaHunterDialogue) Dialogue for Named Bounty Hunters EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaFordVoiceType\aaHunterDi_aaFordJoinNoPol_0006C069_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaFordQuest.bFordHireable to 1
Sure, you're welcome to tag along.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，欢迎你跟我来。

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is my lucky day! You won't regret this, not one bit!
ESP.TRADUIT: 今天是我的幸运日！你不会后悔的，一点也不！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ford [0402856D] (mod) Quest : ([04029364]aaHunterDialogue) Dialogue for Named Bounty Hunters EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaFordQuest.bFordHireable to 1
No, thanks. I can already tell you'd be more trouble than you're worth.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，谢谢。我已经知道你的麻烦比你的价值还大了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Man, that's some bullshit!
ESP.TRADUIT: 伙计，这是胡说八道！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ford [0402856D] (mod) Quest : ([04029364]aaHunterDialogue) Dialogue for Named Bounty Hunters EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaFordVoiceType\aaHunterDi_aaFordJoinNoRud_0006C068_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaFordQuest.bFordHireable to 1
I'd like to ask you a question.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想问你一个问题。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, sure thing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 行啊，当然。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ford [0402856D] (mod) Quest : ([0406C066]aaFordQuest) Ford's Companion Quest EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaFordVoiceType\aaFordQues_aaFordAskQuesti_0006C082_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaFordStartConversation
ESP.TRADUIT: aa福特开始对话

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hold on, are we just gonna charge in there? In the novels it says that you would call out the bad guys and give them a chance to surrender first.
ESP.TRADUIT: 等等，我们要现在冲进那里吗？小说里说，你会叫出坏人，给他们一个先投降的机会。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ford [0402856D] (mod) Quest : ([0406C066]aaFordQuest) Ford's Companion Quest EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: I mean... they never do, and we'll get to kill them, but I just thought things would be more dramatic, that's all.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是说。。。他们永远不会投降的，我们会杀了他们，但我只是觉得这样会让事情更戏剧化，仅此而已。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ford [0402856D] (mod) Quest : ([0406C066]aaFordQuest) Ford's Companion Quest EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaFordQuest.bConversation to 0
<Ford shakes his head in disapproval and mutters complaints about your decision to spare Doolin>
ESP.TRADUIT: <福特摇摇头表示不赞成，抱怨你决定赦免杜林>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ford [0402856D] (mod) Quest : ([0406C066]aaFordQuest) Ford's Companion Quest EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaFordQuest.bConversation to 0
<NULL>
ESP.TRADUIT: <无效>

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Ford shakes his head in disapproval and mutters complaints about your decision to spare Porter>
ESP.TRADUIT: <福特摇摇头表示不赞成，并抱怨你决定赦免波特>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ford [0402856D] (mod) Quest : ([0406C066]aaFordQuest) Ford's Companion Quest EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaFordQuest.bConversation to 0
<NULL>
ESP.TRADUIT: <无效>

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaFordBark
ESP.TRADUIT: aa福特大叫

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is so fucking amazing! I'm actually helping you kill outlaws! Man, we're gonna be the most badass team in history!
ESP.TRADUIT: 这真他妈的棒极了！我确定我会帮你杀亡命之徒的！伙计，我们会成为史上最屌爆的团队！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ford [0402856D] (mod) Quest : ([0406C066]aaFordQuest) Ford's Companion Quest EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaFordVoiceType\aaFordQuest_aaFordBark_0006C76E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaFordQuest.FordBark to 0
Oh, man, you showed him. Take that, you whore-mongering asshole!
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，伙计，你给了他颜色看了。尝尝这个，你这个婊子贩子！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ford [0402856D] (mod) Quest : ([0406C066]aaFordQuest) Ford's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaFordVoiceType\aaFordQuest_aaFordBark_0006C77B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaFordQuest.FordBark to 0
Geeze, what did you do? That's not even... natural! {Fighting gag reflex}
ESP.TRADUIT: 天哪，你做了什么？那甚至不是。。。自然的！{对战斗反射性呕吐}
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ford [0402856D] (mod) Quest : ([0406C066]aaFordQuest) Ford's Companion Quest EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaFordVoiceType\aaFordQuest_aaFordBark_0006C8B9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaFordQuest.FordBark to 0
Keep your mouth shut if you want to stay alive. That's your only warning.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你想活下去就闭上你的嘴。这是你唯一一次警告。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure, I just want to give constructive criticism sometimes, that's all. Isn't it good to get a little feedback from the peers? Sorry, I'll be quiet.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，我只是想给一些建设性的批评，仅此而已。从同伴那里得到一点反馈不是很好吗？对不起，我会保持安静的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ford [0402856D] (mod) Quest : ([0406C066]aaFordQuest) Ford's Companion Quest EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaFordVoiceType\aaFordQues_aaFordConv01Shu_0006C778_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This isn't going to work. You'd be better off staying at Randall's.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这行不通。你最好呆在兰道尔那儿。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I fucked this up, didn't I? I'm so fucking sorry, it's just me and my big mouth. Please, please let me stick with you, I swear I will not fuck it up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我搞砸了，不是吗？我为我和我的大嘴巴他妈的很抱歉。求你了，请让我和你在一起，我发誓我不会再搞砸的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ford [0402856D] (mod) Quest : ([0406C066]aaFordQuest) Ford's Companion Quest EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaFordVoiceType\aaFordQues_aaFordConv01Thi_0006C77A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you sure you want me to go?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你确定要我离开吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ford [0402856D] (mod) Quest : ([0406C066]aaFordQuest) Ford's Companion Quest EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaFordVoiceType\aaFordQues_aaFordConv01Thi_0006C77A_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just follow my lead, and everything will go smoothly.
ESP.TRADUIT: 跟着我走，一切都会顺利的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You got it. I'll copy every move you make.
ESP.TRADUIT: 说得对。你的一举一动我都照做的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ford [0402856D] (mod) Quest : ([0406C066]aaFordQuest) Ford's Companion Quest EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaFordVoiceType\aaFordQues_aaFordConv01Coo_0006C777_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've been doing this a long time, kid. Have a little faith.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我已经做这行了很长时间了，小子。有点信心吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure, I just want to give constructive criticism sometimes, that's all. Isn't it good to take feedback from peers? Sorry, I'll be quiet.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，我只是想给一些建设性的批评，仅此而已。从同伴那里得到反馈不是很好吗？对不起，我会保持安静的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ford [0402856D] (mod) Quest : ([0406C066]aaFordQuest) Ford's Companion Quest EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Story Topic>
ESP.TRADUIT: <停止话题>

ESP.ORIGINAL: I came up on the family ranch west of New Reno, up in the mountains, you know? It wasn't too much different from here, actually.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我从新里诺西部的家庭牧场过来的，在山上，你知道吗？其实和这里没太大区别。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ford [0402856D] (mod) Quest : ([0406C066]aaFordQuest) Ford's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaFordVoiceType\aaFordQues_aaFordAskWhereF_0006C8A8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was in the middle of like, seven kids. I had to toughen up quick. People stopped pushing me soon enough, since I was a regular ass-kicker.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我差不多有七个孩子。我得快点坚强起来。人们很快就不再接近我了，因为我是个经常“踢屁股”的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ford [0402856D] (mod) Quest : ([0406C066]aaFordQuest) Ford's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaFordVoiceType\aaFordQues_aaFordAskWhereF_0006C8A8_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Herding bighorners ain't no life for a killer like me. I left the ranch a few years back, set out guarding caravans and hunting down bounties.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对于像我这样的杀人犯来说，放牧大黄蜂根本不算活着。几年前，我离开了牧场，开始看守商队，猎取赏金。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ford [0402856D] (mod) Quest : ([0406C066]aaFordQuest) Ford's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaFordVoiceType\aaFordQues_aaFordAskWhereF_0006C8A8_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: When I heard that the famous Steven Randall was tracking down Marko, I knew right away where I needed to be. It's my destiny to help you kill Marko.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当我听说著名的史蒂文·兰道尔正在追踪马克时，我立刻知道我该去哪里。我的命运是帮助你杀死马尔科。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ford [0402856D] (mod) Quest : ([0406C066]aaFordQuest) Ford's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaFordVoiceType\aaFordQues_aaFordAskWhereF_0006C8A8_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaFordQuest.bStory to 1
Where are you from?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你来自哪里？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I know he's a cannibal, and he sacrifices babies to demons. That's right, he's a rapist devil worshipper. His pistol is possessed by Satan.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道他是食人族，他把婴儿献给魔鬼。没错，他是个强奸犯还是个魔鬼崇拜者。他的那把左轮被撒旦附身了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ford [0402856D] (mod) Quest : ([0406C066]aaFordQuest) Ford's Companion Quest EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaFordVoiceType\aaFordQues_aaFordAskWhereF_0006C8A9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Marko's actually bigger than the Judge, has red eyes and long fingernails. Lucky for you, I'll be along to make sure he dies quick.
ESP.TRADUIT: 马尔科实际上比审判官高大，眼睛红，指甲长。你真幸运，我会陪着你，一起确保他死得快。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ford [0402856D] (mod) Quest : ([0406C066]aaFordQuest) Ford's Companion Quest EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaFordVoiceType\aaFordQues_aaFordAskWhereF_0006C8A9_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaFordQuest.bStory to 2
What do you know about Marko?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你对马尔科知道些什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Is there any reason you act so self-assured? It seems like you're overcompensating.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你表现的这么自信有什么理由吗？你好像有点矫枉过正了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not {deliberate mispronunciation}overcompentating, I'm just fucking good at everything. I was born this way, so you're gonna have to deal with it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不是{故意的发音错误}姣网过正，我只是他妈的什么都擅长。而我生来就是这样的，所以你得自己想办法处理好与我的关系。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ford [0402856D] (mod) Quest : ([0406C066]aaFordQuest) Ford's Companion Quest EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaFordVoiceType\aaFordQues_aaFordAskWhyInB_0006C89F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you hope to gain from bounty hunting?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你希望从赏金狩猎中得到什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's the caps, enough to set me up for life. I heard you getting all rich from Randall's bounty hunting back in Vegas.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有瓶盖，多到足以让我活下来。我听说你从兰道尔在维加斯的赏金狩猎中发了一笔横财。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ford [0402856D] (mod) Quest : ([0406C066]aaFordQuest) Ford's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaFordVoiceType\aaFordQues_aaFordAskWhatHo_0006C8AE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: After all this is done, I'm gonna be neck-deep in pussy, no question about it. Girls love confidence. I might even start my own bounty hunting firm.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在这一切都结束后，我会陷入小穴的，毫无疑问。女孩都喜欢自信的男人。我甚至可以开自己的赏金猎头公司。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ford [0402856D] (mod) Quest : ([0406C066]aaFordQuest) Ford's Companion Quest EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaFordVoiceType\aaFordQues_aaFordAskWhatHo_0006C8AE_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I might even let you work for me when I get everything set up. Of course, I'd be the fucking boss, and I wouldn't take none of this mercy nonsense.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当我安排好一切的时候，我甚至可以让你为我工作。当然，我会是他妈的老板，我不会接受你这种仁慈的胡说八道。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ford [0402856D] (mod) Quest : ([0406C066]aaFordQuest) Ford's Companion Quest EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaFordVoiceType\aaFordQues_aaFordAskWhatHo_0006C8AE_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We'd be the greatest bounty hunting business in history! We might even kill Lanius himself!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们将成为历史上最伟大的赏金猎手！我们甚至可以亲手杀了拉尼厄斯！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ford [0402856D] (mod) Quest : ([0406C066]aaFordQuest) Ford's Companion Quest EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaFordVoiceType\aaFordQues_aaFordAskWhatHo_0006C8AE_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How can I make the best use of your skills?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你究竟有哪些得意的本领？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I grew up shooting geckos on the farm, so I'm pretty good with a gun. I'm actually one of the best shots around. That's what everybody else tells me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我从小在农场里射杀壁虎，所以我很会持枪。我是最棒的射手之一。其他人都这么跟我说。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ford [0402856D] (mod) Quest : ([0406C066]aaFordQuest) Ford's Companion Quest EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaFordVoiceType\aaFordQues_aaFordAskBestUs_0006C89D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can use a blade, too. This one time, I was visiting this saloon, and there were like three hobos... and they all jumped me!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我也很会刀。有一次，我去这家酒馆，那里有三个流浪汉。。。他们都向我走来！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ford [0402856D] (mod) Quest : ([0406C066]aaFordQuest) Ford's Companion Quest EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaFordVoiceType\aaFordQues_aaFordAskBestUs_0006C89D_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was all like, pht, pht, pht, yeah, you want some of this? And they were like, "Oh, no, don't kill me. You're so cool."
ESP.TRADUIT: 我就像这样，乒，乒，乓，是的，你想尝尝这个吗？而他们说，"哦，不，别杀我。你太酷了。"
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ford [0402856D] (mod) Quest : ([0406C066]aaFordQuest) Ford's Companion Quest EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaFordVoiceType\aaFordQues_aaFordAskBestUs_0006C89D_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaFordQuest.bKiller to 1
Easily over a dozen. One was a pederass cowboy who'd come down from town, raping and, like eating children. He was a rough one.
ESP.TRADUIT: 轻松超过一打。其中一个是从镇上下来的牛仔，他强奸，还喜欢吃孩子。他是个粗野的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ford [0402856D] (mod) Quest : ([0406C066]aaFordQuest) Ford's Companion Quest EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaFordVoiceType\aaFordQues_aaFordAskBestUs_0006C8AF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He tried to rape me, but I shot his johnson off with a shotgun, then I made him eat it. Nasty fucking pederass had it coming.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他想强奸我，但我用猎枪把他的鸡巴打断，然后让他吃了。那个该死的肮脏恋童癖罪有应得。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ford [0402856D] (mod) Quest : ([0406C066]aaFordQuest) Ford's Companion Quest EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaFordVoiceType\aaFordQues_aaFordAskBestUs_0006C8AF_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaFordQuest.bKiller to 2
Have you ever actually killed anyone?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你真的杀过人吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Because of my balls, that's why. I'm also fucking smart. I'm talking street smart. I'm a goddamn street genius, I can read people a mile away.
ESP.TRADUIT: 因为我有种，没别的了。我他妈的也很聪明。我说的是街头智慧。我可是个街头天才，我能在一英里外读懂人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ford [0402856D] (mod) Quest : ([0406C066]aaFordQuest) Ford's Companion Quest EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaFordVoiceType\aaFordQues_aaFordAskBestUs_0006C8B8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: One day I'll be remembered as the greatest killer ever, maybe even better than you and Randall. You wait and see.
ESP.TRADUIT: 总有一天我会被人们记成是有史以来最伟大的杀手，也许比你和兰道尔都要好。你等着瞧吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ford [0402856D] (mod) Quest : ([0406C066]aaFordQuest) Ford's Companion Quest EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaFordVoiceType\aaFordQues_aaFordAskBestUs_0006C8B8_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaFordQuest.bKiller to 3
Why do you think you're such an effective killer?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你为什么认为你是个有效的杀手？

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is some kind of like... a fucking test, isn't it? You're trying to mind-fuck me with proctology? I'm a born killer, nothing else for me to do.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这有点像。。。这他妈的是个测试，不是吗？你是不是在用直肠病学来动摇我的观念？我可是个天生的杀手，而且我可没别的事可做。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ford [0402856D] (mod) Quest : ([0406C066]aaFordQuest) Ford's Companion Quest EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaFordVoiceType\aaFordQues_aaFordAskBestUs_000749AD_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: People talk about rangers and centurions, they don't scare me. You know I kicked the shit out of a ranger once?
ESP.TRADUIT: 人们谈论游骑兵和百夫长，但他们吓唬不到我。你知道我曾经把一个游骑兵打出屎么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ford [0402856D] (mod) Quest : ([0406C066]aaFordQuest) Ford's Companion Quest EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaFordVoiceType\aaFordQues_aaFordAskBestUs_000749AD_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It was in a bar outside Reno. Some ranger came in, started laying hands on the bartender, Pam. I told him to knock it off.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那是在里诺外面的酒吧里。有个游骑兵走了进来，开始动手打那儿的酒保，帕姆。我叫他停下。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ford [0402856D] (mod) Quest : ([0406C066]aaFordQuest) Ford's Companion Quest EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaFordVoiceType\aaFordQues_aaFordAskBestUs_000749AD_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He said, "I'm a Ranger, you little maggot." And I told him, "I'm Ford, the famous bounty hunter." I could tell he was scared.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他说，"我是一个游骑兵，你这个小蛆。"我告诉他，"我是福特，著名的赏金猎人。"我可以看出他被吓到了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ford [0402856D] (mod) Quest : ([0406C066]aaFordQuest) Ford's Companion Quest EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaFordVoiceType\aaFordQues_aaFordAskBestUs_000749AD_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He went for his pistol, but I shot it out of his hand. So we squared off, and he gave me his best shot!
ESP.TRADUIT: 他去拿手枪，但我开枪从他手里把它打掉了。所以我们摆好了肉搏的架势，他给了我他最好的一下！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ford [0402856D] (mod) Quest : ([0406C066]aaFordQuest) Ford's Companion Quest EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaFordVoiceType\aaFordQues_aaFordAskBestUs_000749AD_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Pow! Right in my kisser. I didn't even flinch. Then I gave him the palm strike of death, like this! <He twirls about while flailing his arms>
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘭！就在我的嘴上。但我甚至没有动一下，因为我根本不怕他。然后我给了他致命一击，就这样！<他一边旋转一边挥舞手臂>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ford [0402856D] (mod) Quest : ([0406C066]aaFordQuest) Ford's Companion Quest EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaFordVoiceType\aaFordQues_aaFordAskBestUs_000749AD_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I could've broken his neck, but I held back. One hit was all it took to knock him out. Then Pam kissed me, and we fucked in her room. Rangers, pfft.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我本可以折断他的脖子，但我忍住了。只要一拳就能把他打倒了。然后帕姆吻了我，我们就在她的房间做爱了。呵，游骑兵(轻蔑的态度)。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ford [0402856D] (mod) Quest : ([0406C066]aaFordQuest) Ford's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaFordVoiceType\aaFordQues_aaFordAskBestUs_000749AD_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaFordQuest.bKiller to 4
Have you ever considered doing something other than bounty hunting? You might not be cut out for it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有没有考虑过除了赏金狩猎以外的其他事情？你可能不适合干这行。

ESP.ORIGINAL: How do you feel about working for the NCR?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你觉得为NCR工作怎么样？

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's the best. I would've enlisted, but I have a minor asthma condition. Doesn't mean I can't hack it, though. Nobody fucks with me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是最好的。我本想参军的，但我有点哮喘。但并不意味着我不能容忍它。没人能搞烂我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ford [0402856D] (mod) Quest : ([0406C066]aaFordQuest) Ford's Companion Quest EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaFordVoiceType\aaFordQues_aaFordAskNitpic_0006C89E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The best thing about the NCR is freedom. You accept it, or we'll fuck you in the ass. Pretty soon we're going to fuck the Legion, too. You watch.
ESP.TRADUIT: NCR最棒的地方就是自由。你接受吧，否则我们就操你的屁股。很快我们也要操军团了。你等着好了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ford [0402856D] (mod) Quest : ([0406C066]aaFordQuest) Ford's Companion Quest EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaFordVoiceType\aaFordQues_aaFordAskNitpic_0006C89E_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Man, they're all pussies except the bear. NCR is a fucking supertastic system that will bring law and order, and I'm going to help them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 伙计，除了熊，他们都是娘娘腔。NCR是一个他妈的超级系统，它将带来法律和秩序，而我将帮助他们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ford [0402856D] (mod) Quest : ([0406C066]aaFordQuest) Ford's Companion Quest EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaFordVoiceType\aaFordQues_aaFordAskNitpic_00095690_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sister's Legion is a bunch of fucking weirdos who stick rods up their asses for pleasure. They better not try that on me, or I'll fuck them first.
ESP.TRADUIT: 婊子军团是一群他妈的怪人，他们为了享乐而把自己的屁股竖起来。他们最好别这样对我，否则我会先操他们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ford [0402856D] (mod) Quest : ([0406C066]aaFordQuest) Ford's Companion Quest EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaFordVoiceType\aaFordQues_aaFordAskNitpic_00095690_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, I heard about this guy named House. He drinks piss and throws puppies from some tower in New Vegas. True fucking story.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，我听说过一个叫豪斯的人。他喝着尿，从新维加斯的某个塔上扔小狗。这可是真事！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ford [0402856D] (mod) Quest : ([0406C066]aaFordQuest) Ford's Companion Quest EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaFordVoiceType\aaFordQues_aaFordAskNitpic_00095690_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you think of the different factions in the Mojave?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你觉得莫哈维的不同派系怎么样？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Man, that town's a haven for bandits and heathens. We should just hang them all, you know? And then let the good people like me take over.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哥们，那个镇是强盗和异教徒的天堂。我们应该把它们都挂起来，你知道吗？然后让像我这样的好人接手。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ford [0402856D] (mod) Quest : ([0406C066]aaFordQuest) Ford's Companion Quest EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaFordVoiceType\aaFordQues_aaFordAskNitpic_00095691_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I could be mayor of a town, you better believe it. I'd be the best fucking mayor in history. They would make me mayor for life.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我可以当镇长，而你最好相信这点。我会成为历史上最好的市长。他们会让我成为终身市长。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ford [0402856D] (mod) Quest : ([0406C066]aaFordQuest) Ford's Companion Quest EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaFordVoiceType\aaFordQues_aaFordAskNitpic_00095691_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd tax small titties and ban lawyers. Women would fight in an arena just to have the opportunity to suck my giant dick.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会对小乳头征税并禁止任何律师。女人们会在竞技场上打架，只是为了有机会吸我的大鸡巴。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ford [0402856D] (mod) Quest : ([0406C066]aaFordQuest) Ford's Companion Quest EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaFordVoiceType\aaFordQues_aaFordAskNitpic_00095691_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's the sort of government I'd have. What about you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这就是我想要的那种政府。那你呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ford [0402856D] (mod) Quest : ([0406C066]aaFordQuest) Ford's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaFordVoiceType\aaFordQues_aaFordAskNitpic_00095691_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you think of Frosthill?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你觉得霜地怎么样？

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're trying to like, mind-fuck me, aren't you? Won't work. I am the greatest mind-fucker of all time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是不是尝试，让我混淆是吧？这不会起作用的。我可是有史以来最伟大的疯子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ford [0402856D] (mod) Quest : ([0406C066]aaFordQuest) Ford's Companion Quest EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaFordVoiceType\aaFordQues_aaFordAskNitpic_000956A0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have so much fucking charisma that random women just walk up and ask permission to suck my cock. I'm a giant fucking pussy magnet, I can't help it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我他妈的魅力太大了，随便哪个女人都会走上前去请求我的允许。我他妈是个巨大的吸铁石，我可情不自禁。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ford [0402856D] (mod) Quest : ([0406C066]aaFordQuest) Ford's Companion Quest EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaFordVoiceType\aaFordQues_aaFordAskNitpic_000956A0_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have to ask - do you really believe the things you're saying?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不得不问-你真的相信你说的话吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: They learned to fear me right from the start since I'm a killer. I'm not afraid to criticize em', either. They respect my advice, because I am smart.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们从一开始就害怕我，因为我是个杀手。我也不怕批评他们。他们尊重我的建议，因为我很聪明。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ford [0402856D] (mod) Quest : ([0406C066]aaFordQuest) Ford's Companion Quest EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaFordVoiceType\aaFordQues_aaFordAskNitpic_000956A1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: One time this guy got in my face cause I told him he was dressed like a girl. I punched him in the balls and he started crying like a bitch.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有一次这家伙因为我告诉他他穿得像个婊子似的而惹我生气。我揍了他一拳，他哭得也像个婊子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ford [0402856D] (mod) Quest : ([0406C066]aaFordQuest) Ford's Companion Quest EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaFordVoiceType\aaFordQues_aaFordAskNitpic_000956A1_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nobody fucks with me, cause they know I'll punch them in them in the dick, if they're lucky. Piss me off good and I'll show you my killer side.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没人能干死我，因为他们知道如果他们幸运的话，我会揍他们一顿。把我惹火了，我会让你看到我杀手的一面。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ford [0402856D] (mod) Quest : ([0406C066]aaFordQuest) Ford's Companion Quest EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaFordVoiceType\aaFordQues_aaFordAskNitpic_000956A1_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How do you get along with the other bounty hunters?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你和其他赏金猎人相处得怎么样？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have the spirit of a deathjaw, and when I'm stirred up good and proper I'll unleash the animal inside me. Nothing can stop me then.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有一种死颚的精神，当我被良好和适当地唤醒时，我会释放我体内的动物本能。没有什么能阻止我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ford [0402856D] (mod) Quest : ([0406C066]aaFordQuest) Ford's Companion Quest EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaFordVoiceType\aaFordQues_aaFordAskNitpic_000956A2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's like I'm possessed by some demon, and I just kill everything I see. All my enemies piss their pants and flee, sort of like in the novels.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就像我被恶魔附身了，我把看到的一切都杀了。我让所有的敌人都尿裤子逃跑了，就像小说里那样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ford [0402856D] (mod) Quest : ([0406C066]aaFordQuest) Ford's Companion Quest EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaFordVoiceType\aaFordQues_aaFordAskNitpic_000956A2_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm a mind-fucking whirlwind of bullets and mayhem, sent by Jesus Christ to make the world right. It is in the bible.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是一个让人胆寒的子弹和混乱的旋风，是耶稣基督为了让世界变得正确而派来的。这就写在圣经里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ford [0402856D] (mod) Quest : ([0406C066]aaFordQuest) Ford's Companion Quest EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaFordVoiceType\aaFordQues_aaFordAskNitpic_000956A2_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What is this "Killer Side"?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这"杀戮之间"是什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Because I'm the fucking best! I've seen and done it all. People should be honored when I take a shit on them. End of story.
ESP.TRADUIT: 因为我他妈是最棒的！我都看过了，都做过了。当我对他们大动干戈的时候，他们应该受到尊敬。故事结束了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ford [0402856D] (mod) Quest : ([0406C066]aaFordQuest) Ford's Companion Quest EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaFordVoiceType\aaFordQues_aaFordAskNitpic_000956A3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: My words are like gold nuggets that I shoot from my dick with the speed of a tornado, smashing your face with truth. {Pleased with himself}Yeah.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的话就会从我的鸡巴像龙卷风的速度一样射出来金块，用真理砸碎你的脸。{对自己很满意}是的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ford [0402856D] (mod) Quest : ([0406C066]aaFordQuest) Ford's Companion Quest EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaFordVoiceType\aaFordQues_aaFordAskNitpic_000956A3_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why are you so critical of everyone and everything around you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你为什么对周围的人和事都这么挑剔？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm scared of Jesus and {Struggling to recall name}Doctor... Doctor Duluth? I can't remember his name. They say he roams the wastes with deathjaws and zombies at his side.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我害怕耶稣和{努力回忆名字}医生。。。德卢斯医生？我记不起他的名字了。他们说他在废土里游荡，死颚和僵尸在他身边。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ford [0402856D] (mod) Quest : ([0406C066]aaFordQuest) Ford's Companion Quest EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: I hear he hunts children and rapes them in power armor, then sends roaches to eat their corpses. True fucking story. That shit scares me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我听说他猎杀孩子，强暴他们，然后派蟑螂吃掉他们的尸体。这他妈的是真事。那鬼东西吓到我了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ford [0402856D] (mod) Quest : ([0406C066]aaFordQuest) Ford's Companion Quest EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaFordVoiceType\aaFordQues_aaFordAskNitpic_000956A4_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Regaining confidence}You know, of course, I'd still kill him. I'd shoot his dick off and make him eat it, just like that other guy.
ESP.TRADUIT: {重拾信心}你知道，当然，我还是会杀了他。我会把他的鸡巴射下来让他自己吃了，就像那个人一样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ford [0402856D] (mod) Quest : ([0406C066]aaFordQuest) Ford's Companion Quest EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaFordVoiceType\aaFordQues_aaFordAskNitpic_000956A4_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Is there anyone that you're afraid of?
ESP.TRADUIT: 有你害怕的人吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your braggadocio suggests a raging superiority complex. You need to take it down a notch.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的自吹自擂意味着一种强烈的优越感情结。真是自卑，你得把它降低一点。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What? Look, you can stow all your fancy book learnings. I am from the school of hard knocks, I don't need no book smarts.
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么？听着，你可以把你所有花哨的书本知识都收藏起来。我来自艰苦的学校——死斗，所以我不需要书本知识。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ford [0402856D] (mod) Quest : ([0406C066]aaFordQuest) Ford's Companion Quest EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaFordVoiceType\aaFordQues_aaFordAskWhyInB_0006C8A4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whatever, bub.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管怎样，随你便了，伙计。

ESP.ORIGINAL: No whatever about it. One day I'm gonna be the best bounty hunter who ever lived. Then they'll be writing dime novels about me. You'll see.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没什么不管怎么样的东西。总有一天我会成为世上最棒的赏金猎人。然后他们会写很多关于我的廉价小说的。你会明白的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ford [0402856D] (mod) Quest : ([0406C066]aaFordQuest) Ford's Companion Quest EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaFordVoiceType\aaFordQues_aaFordAskWhyInB_0006C8A5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I understand you completely.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我完全理解你。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I knew you would. One day, when I'm king of this wasteland I'll make sure to remember how you accepted my wisdom in these moments.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我就知道你会的。总有一天，当我是这片废土的国王时，我会记得你是如何在这些时刻中接受我的睿智的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ford [0402856D] (mod) Quest : ([0406C066]aaFordQuest) Ford's Companion Quest EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaFordVoiceType\aaFordQues_aaFordAskWhyInB_0006C8A7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're a disease.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你真是人类的一种恶疾。

ESP.ORIGINAL: If there was a disease making you badass, you'd be right. Maybe that's exactly what I am. I infect people with fear because they know I'm a killer.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果有一种疾病能让你变成了混蛋，你是对的。也许我就是这样。我用恐惧感染人们，因为他们都知道我是个牛逼的杀手。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ford [0402856D] (mod) Quest : ([0406C066]aaFordQuest) Ford's Companion Quest EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaFordVoiceType\aaFordQues_aaFordAskWhyInB_0006C8A6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Please explain how you'll kill Marko.
ESP.TRADUIT: 请解释你将如何杀死马尔科。

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's gonna be just like in the novels. We'll meet in a street, and he'll have my girlfriend hostage. You know, I don't have one yet, but I will soon.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就像小说里那样。我们会在街上碰头，他会把我女朋友当作人质。你知道的，虽然我还没有一个，但我很快就会有的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ford [0402856D] (mod) Quest : ([0406C066]aaFordQuest) Ford's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaFordVoiceType\aaFordQues_aaFordAskKillMa_0006C8AD_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He'll say, "You can't beat me, Ford. I heard you're a dangerous killer, but I have Satan in this pistol." And I won't even flinch.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他会说，"你赢不了我，福特。我听说你是个危险的杀手，但我把撒旦放在这把手枪里。"而我甚至都不会退缩一下。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ford [0402856D] (mod) Quest : ([0406C066]aaFordQuest) Ford's Companion Quest EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaFordVoiceType\aaFordQues_aaFordAskKillMa_0006C8AD_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll say, "The forces of evil won't save you, evildoer." He'll draw, but I'll be faster, and I'll put a bullet right through his heart.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会说，"那邪恶的力量救不了你，邪恶的人。"他会拔枪，但我会加快我的速度，我会用子弹射穿他的心脏。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ford [0402856D] (mod) Quest : ([0406C066]aaFordQuest) Ford's Companion Quest EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaFordVoiceType\aaFordQues_aaFordAskKillMa_0006C8AD_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then I'll whip out my footlong cock and begin pissing on his face and I'll be like, "This is for Randall, you devil worshipper!"
ESP.TRADUIT: 然后我就把我那只有脚那么长的鸡巴抽出来，开始在他脸上撒尿，然后我会说，"这是给兰道尔的，你这个魔鬼崇拜者！"
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ford [0402856D] (mod) Quest : ([0406C066]aaFordQuest) Ford's Companion Quest EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaFordVoiceType\aaFordQues_aaFordAskKillMa_0006C8AD_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He'll be all like, "That's the biggest dick I've ever seen. You won." My girlfriend will fling herself at me and we'll fuck right on top of his body!
ESP.TRADUIT: 他会说，"那是我见过的最大的鸡巴。你赢了。"我的女朋友会朝我扑过去，然后我们就在他身上做爱！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ford [0402856D] (mod) Quest : ([0406C066]aaFordQuest) Ford's Companion Quest EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaFordVoiceType\aaFordQues_aaFordAskKillMa_0006C8AD_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've come to realize that most everything you say is unadulterated bullshit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我逐渐意识到你说的大多数话都是一派胡言。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Very funny. My older brother Tommy used to call me a liar until I did a roundhouse kick to his throat. You wanna see my kick? <He flails about>
ESP.TRADUIT: 很有趣。我哥哥汤米过去常叫我骗子，直到我狠狠地揍了他一顿。你想看我的踢技吗？<他开始到处猛踢>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ford [0402856D] (mod) Quest : ([0406C066]aaFordQuest) Ford's Companion Quest EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaFordVoiceType\aaFordQues_aaFordAskKillMa_0006C8AC_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's just disgusting, even if it is a complete lie.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那太恶心了，即使这只是个彻头彻尾的谎言。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You can't handle the hard, gritty reality of it. I thought you were a real bounty hunter. Maybe you're going soft.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你无法面对这艰难的现实。我还以为你是个真正的赏金猎人呢。也许你变得软弱了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ford [0402856D] (mod) Quest : ([0406C066]aaFordQuest) Ford's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaFordVoiceType\aaFordQues_aaFordActualKil_0006C8B7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think I'm just going to stop asking you questions from now on.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想从现在起我就不会再问你问题了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your choice. You want to miss out on all this wisdom floating around in my head, you go right ahead. You might regret it, though.
ESP.TRADUIT: 随你便。你想错过在我脑海中飘荡的智慧，你就去吧。不过，你可能会后悔。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ford [0402856D] (mod) Quest : ([0406C066]aaFordQuest) Ford's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaFordVoiceType\aaFordQues_aaFordActualKil_0006C8B5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thanks for clarifying that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢你的澄清。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You got it, anytime.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你懂了，随时都行。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ford [0402856D] (mod) Quest : ([0406C066]aaFordQuest) Ford's Companion Quest EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaFordVoiceType\aaFordQues_aaFordActualKil_0006C8B6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm pretty familiar with ballistic trauma inflicted by shotguns, and your story is ludicrous.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我很熟悉散弹枪造成的弹道创伤，你的故事真的很可笑。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You weren't even there. He ate his own dick, swallowed like it was a bloody hot dog. The whole town saw it, and they were cheering.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你甚至都不在那里。他吃了自己的鸡巴，吞得像个热狗一样。全镇的人都看到了，而他们为此欢呼着。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ford [0402856D] (mod) Quest : ([0406C066]aaFordQuest) Ford's Companion Quest EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaFordVoiceType\aaFordQues_aaFordActualKil_0006C8B4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It was the right thing to do.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是正确的做法。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The right thing? He was an evildoer, probably kicked puppies and stomped babies for fun, just like the rest of them psychos. He deserved to die.
ESP.TRADUIT: 正确的事？他是一个作恶的人，可能会踢死小狗，还会跺烂婴儿来取乐，就像其他的那些精神病一样。他活该被杀。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ford [0402856D] (mod) Quest : ([0406C066]aaFordQuest) Ford's Companion Quest EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: I thought you were the real deal, but now you're acting like a pussy. What happened to you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我以为你是个硬汉，但现在你表现得像个娘娘腔一样。你他妈怎么了？
