ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ford [0402856D] (mod) Quest : ([0406C066]aaFordQuest) Ford's Companion Quest EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: When you've seen as much death as I have, maybe you'll understand the value of mercy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当你也像我一样见证过如此多的死亡之后，也许你就会明白仁慈的价值是什么了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Mercy? He was an evildoer, probably kicked puppies and stomped babies for fun, just like the rest of them psychos. He deserved to die.
ESP.TRADUIT: 仁慈？他是一个作恶的人，可能会踢死小狗，还会跺烂婴儿来取乐，就像其他的那些精神病一样。他活该被杀。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ford [0402856D] (mod) Quest : ([0406C066]aaFordQuest) Ford's Companion Quest EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaFordVoiceType\aaFordQues_aaFordDoolinMer_0006C8BF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I thought you were the real deal, and now you're just acting like a pussy. What happened to you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我原本以为你是个真的硬汉，但现在你只是装得像个娘娘腔。你他妈怎么了？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ford [0402856D] (mod) Quest : ([0406C066]aaFordQuest) Ford's Companion Quest EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaFordVoiceType\aaFordQues_aaFordDoolinMer_0006C8BF_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Listen, you sawed-off shitheel - don't ever question my decisions.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听着，你这个一文不值的让人讨厌的人-别他妈质疑我的决定。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What are you, inflatable? I can question you if I want, you just need to grow thicker skin and accept constructive criticism.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是什么，充气娃娃？只要我想的话，我就可以问你，而你只需要脸长得厚一点，然后接受我那建设性的批评就行了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ford [0402856D] (mod) Quest : ([0406C066]aaFordQuest) Ford's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaFordVoiceType\aaFordQues_aaFordDoolinShu_0006C8C0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Shut up, or I'll rip your skin off and use it to bind my next dime novel.
ESP.TRADUIT: 闭嘴，否则我会把你的皮撕下来，用来装订我的下一本低俗廉价小说。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sweet baby Jesus, you got it! Sorry, sorry!
ESP.TRADUIT: 亲爱的上帝，你说得了！对不起，我很抱歉！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ford [0402856D] (mod) Quest : ([0406C066]aaFordQuest) Ford's Companion Quest EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaFordVoiceType\aaFordQuest_aaFordDoolinTP_0006C8CC_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaFordQuest.ShutUp to 1
<Choke him>One more word and I'll break your fucking neck.
ESP.TRADUIT: <掐住他>你再出一声，我就折断你的脖子。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Coughs, recovers breath}Ok, all right, Sorry! It was figurative! Wow, you're right, I was being a disrespectful asshat. It... it won't happen again, I swear!
ESP.TRADUIT: {剧烈咳嗽，恢复呼吸}好吧，好吧，对不起！这只是个比喻！哇，你说得对，我是个无礼的混蛋。这。。。我发誓，这不会再发生了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ford [0402856D] (mod) Quest : ([0406C066]aaFordQuest) Ford's Companion Quest EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaFordVoiceType\aaFordQues_aaFordDoolinCho_0006C8C7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaFordQuest.ShutUp to 1
I have the right to slit your goddamn throat.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那我有权割断你这屁话连天该死的喉咙。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whoa, take it easy. It's just an exchange of opinions, nothing more. I'll be more reserved. Even if I'm right and you're wrong.
ESP.TRADUIT: 喔，别紧张。我只是在交换意见而已。我会更加保守的。即使我是对的而你是错的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ford [0402856D] (mod) Quest : ([0406C066]aaFordQuest) Ford's Companion Quest EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaFordVoiceType\aaFordQues_aaFordDoolinMel_0006C8CA_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whatever.
ESP.TRADUIT: 随便。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You are slipping. You keep it up, and I might not be able to be there to save you when Marko comes calling.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在我心中的形象正在滑落。你再这样坚持下去，当马尔科来索命的时候，我可能就不能在那儿救你了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ford [0402856D] (mod) Quest : ([0406C066]aaFordQuest) Ford's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaFordVoiceType\aaFordQues_aaFordDoolinIgn_0006C8C9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The opinions of a mouthy runt mean nothing to me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一个满嘴垃圾话的人的意见对我来说毫无意义。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You don't really mean that, do you? I'm entitled to my opinions, and you have an obligation to hear them. I have a right to be heard, goddamit!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不是真是那个意思吧？我有权享受分享我的意见，而你有义务听取这些意见。我可是有权被听到的，天杀的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ford [0402856D] (mod) Quest : ([0406C066]aaFordQuest) Ford's Companion Quest EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaFordVoiceType\aaFordQues_aaFordDoolinDic_0006C8C8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I stand by my decision, and that's the end of it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我坚持我的决定，谈话结束。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're slipping. Keep it up, and I might not be there to save you when Marko comes calling.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在我心中的形象正在滑落。你再这样坚持下去，当马尔科来索命的时候，我可能就不能在那儿救你了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ford [0402856D] (mod) Quest : ([0406C066]aaFordQuest) Ford's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaFordVoiceType\aaFordQues_aaFordDoolinMor_0006C8CB_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you want to die, just keep talking.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你想死的话，就继续说下去吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Uh, just forget I mentioned it, all right? Nothing to criticize, you're doing fucking great!
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃，忘了我说的话，好吗？没什么可批评的，你他妈的太好了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ford [0402856D] (mod) Quest : ([0406C066]aaFordQuest) Ford's Companion Quest EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaFordVoiceType\aaFordQues_aaFordPorterPsy_0006DBD8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Stare coldly at him>Shut. Up.
ESP.TRADUIT: <冷冷的盯着他>闭嘴。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You can't handle the hard, gritty reality of it. I thought you were a real bounty hunter. Maybe you're going soft.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你无法面对这艰难的现实。我以为你是个真正的赏金猎人呢。也许你变得软弱了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ford [0402856D] (mod) Quest : ([0406C066]aaFordQuest) Ford's Companion Quest EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaFordVoiceType\aaFordQues_aaFordPorterShu_0006DBD5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Ignore him>
ESP.TRADUIT: <无视他>

ESP.ORIGINAL: You can't handle the hard, gritty reality of it. I thought you were a real bounty hunter. Maybe you're going soft.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你无法面对这艰难的现实。我以为你是个真正的赏金猎人呢。也许你变得软弱了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ford [0402856D] (mod) Quest : ([0406C066]aaFordQuest) Ford's Companion Quest EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaFordVoiceType\aaFordQues_aaFordPorterIgn_0006DBD7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Mutant or not, it felt wrong to kill him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管他是不是个变种人，杀了他都是不对的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You can't handle the hard, gritty reality of it. I thought you were a real bounty hunter. Maybe you're going soft.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你无法面对这艰难的现实。我以为你是个真正的赏金猎人呢。也许你变得软弱了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ford [0402856D] (mod) Quest : ([0406C066]aaFordQuest) Ford's Companion Quest EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaFordVoiceType\aaFordQues_aaFordPorterCoo_0006DBD6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Sweet Revenge] <Press the barrel against his head and cock the hammer> Criticize away.
ESP.TRADUIT: [甜蜜的复仇] <把枪管抵在他的头上，然后拨开击锤> 说说吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I got nothing else, absolutely nothing!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我什么话都没有，绝对没有！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ford [0402856D] (mod) Quest : ([0406C066]aaFordQuest) Ford's Companion Quest EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaFordQuest.ShutUp to 1
The well of fucks given has run dry.
ESP.TRADUIT: 瞎搞八搞给你的井已经干涸了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then you... better find more fucks to give! What I'm telling you is important! It might save your life. You hear me? What I'm saying matters!
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么你。。。最好多找些东西给我！我告诉你的东西很重要！可能会救你的命。听到了吗？我说的很重要！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ford [0402856D] (mod) Quest : ([0406C066]aaFordQuest) Ford's Companion Quest EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaFordVoiceType\aaFordQues_aaFordPorter02I_0006DBE3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Blood-Nap] <Press the blade against Ford's throat>You even whisper, and I'll open your throat.
ESP.TRADUIT: [血煞枕边]<用刀锋抵住福特的喉咙>你敢发出一声，我就割开你的喉咙。

ESP.ORIGINAL: <He nods emphatically>
ESP.TRADUIT: <他断然点头>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ford [0402856D] (mod) Quest : ([0406C066]aaFordQuest) Ford's Companion Quest EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaFordQuest.ShutUp to 1
Walk in my shoes for a while and you might see things differently.
ESP.TRADUIT: 站在我的立场上走一段时间，你可能会有不同的看法。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I won't walk in your shoes. You've gone too soft. At least I'm a real killer.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不会走你的那种路的。你太软弱了。至少我是个真正的杀手。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ford [0402856D] (mod) Quest : ([0406C066]aaFordQuest) Ford's Companion Quest EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaFordVoiceType\aaFordQues_aaFordPorter02C_0006DBE2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sniping at your betters' every action is the enterprise of a true cunt.
ESP.TRADUIT: 狙击你上司的一举一动是一个真正的婊子才会做的事情。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, not listening to your... lowers is even worse. You think you're better than me? My opinions matter just as much as anyone else's.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，别听你的。。。下级的人会更糟的。你觉得你比我强吗？我的意见和别人的是一样重要。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ford [0402856D] (mod) Quest : ([0406C066]aaFordQuest) Ford's Companion Quest EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaFordVoiceType\aaFordQues_aaFordPorter02P_0006DBE4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Since we're on the topic of criticism, how about I assess the flavor of your liver?
ESP.TRADUIT: 既然我们讨论的是批评的话题，我来评估一下你肝脏的味道如何？

ESP.ORIGINAL: <He shakes his head emphatically>
ESP.TRADUIT: <他断然地摇头>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ford [0402856D] (mod) Quest : ([0406C066]aaFordQuest) Ford's Companion Quest EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaFordQuest.ShutUp to 1
What's with all the hostility?
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么你有这么大的敌意？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Because you're a shitbird who's ridden a wave of good publicity to glory. I know it's bullshit. You know it's bullshit. You're a fucking fraud.
ESP.TRADUIT: 因为你是一只混蛋，一个有着一个良好的宣传荣耀的混蛋。我知道这都是些胡说八道。你也知道这是胡说八道。你他妈的只是个骗子罢了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Thorne [04020845] (mod) Quest : ([04029364]aaHunterDialogue) Dialogue for Named Bounty Hunters EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaThorneVoiceType\aaHunterDi_aaThorneBeefWit_0006DBE8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's nothing personal. I had just heard some crazy-ass stories about you. That, and I wanted to see if you were legitimate.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这卡不是什么私人问题。我刚听到一些关于你的疯狂故事。我想看看你是不是真的清白。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Thorne [04020845] (mod) Quest : ([04029364]aaHunterDialogue) Dialogue for Named Bounty Hunters EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaThorneVoiceType\aaHunterDi_aaThorneBeefWit_0006DBE9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I understand that fact is stranger than fiction and all that, but some of it is hard to accept. Have you heard all the things they say about you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我明白，事实会比小说和现实中的所有的一切都要显得陌生疯狂，但有些是难以接受的。你听到他们关于你吹嘘的那一切了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Thorne [04020845] (mod) Quest : ([04029364]aaHunterDialogue) Dialogue for Named Bounty Hunters EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaThorneVoiceType\aaHunterDi_aaThorneBeefWit_0006DBE9_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, where are you from?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么，你是哪里人？

ESP.ORIGINAL: My last home was a snug spot deep inside your mama's vault. Before that? Well, I don't talk about my past with shitbirds.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我最后的家是你妈妈阴道深处一个舒适的地方。在那之前？好吧，我不跟像你这样的混蛋谈论我的过去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Thorne [04020845] (mod) Quest : ([04029364]aaHunterDialogue) Dialogue for Named Bounty Hunters EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaThorneVoiceType\aaHunterDi_aaThorneWhereFr_0006DBEA_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hayfork, back in NCR. It's a ways west of Redding. Damn beautiful place. It's not so hot as the Mojave, nor is freezing like here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 海福克，在NCR那里。那是一条雷丁西边的路。真他妈是个漂亮地方。不像莫哈维那么热，也不像这里那么冷。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Thorne [04020845] (mod) Quest : ([04029364]aaHunterDialogue) Dialogue for Named Bounty Hunters EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaThorneVoiceType\aaHunterDi_aaThorneWhereFr_0006DBEB_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Haven't been there in a long while. Set out from there at a young age, made my own way since. Not much else to tell.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我已经很久没去过那里了。从小就从那里出发，从此走上了自己的路。没什么好说的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Thorne [04020845] (mod) Quest : ([04029364]aaHunterDialogue) Dialogue for Named Bounty Hunters EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaThorneVoiceType\aaHunterDi_aaThorneWhereFr_0006DBEB_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think about it, sometimes. Might still have family back there. Not going back, though.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有时会想。可能还有家人在后面。不过，不会再回去了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Thorne [04020845] (mod) Quest : ([04029364]aaHunterDialogue) Dialogue for Named Bounty Hunters EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaThorneVoiceType\aaHunterDi_aaThorneWhereFr_0006DBEB_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaHunterDialogue.ThorneStory to 1
Left there when I was sixteen, turned my back on my father after a fistfight. I sort of drifted for a while before I came into this profession.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在一场拳脚仗之后我背着我父亲，在十六岁的时候离开了那里。在我进入这个行业之前，我还有点飘忽不定。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Thorne [04020845] (mod) Quest : ([04029364]aaHunterDialogue) Dialogue for Named Bounty Hunters EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaThorneVoiceType\aaHunterDi_aaThorneWhereFr_0006DBEC_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I got word years later that he had died. We hadn't spoken since I left, so I didn't go to the funeral. Closest brother sent me a harsh letter.
ESP.TRADUIT: 几年后我听说他死了。我离开后我们就没联系过，所以我没去参加葬礼。离的最近的兄弟给我发了一封严厉的信。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Thorne [04020845] (mod) Quest : ([04029364]aaHunterDialogue) Dialogue for Named Bounty Hunters EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaThorneVoiceType\aaHunterDi_aaThorneWhereFr_0006DBEC_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Told me I was just a dreg, with no real family anymore. He had always been dad's favorite, a little kissass farmboy. That wasn't me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 告诉我我只是一个渣滓，再也没有真正的家庭了。他一直是爸爸的最爱，一个只会亲屁股的小农家男孩。而那不会我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Thorne [04020845] (mod) Quest : ([04029364]aaHunterDialogue) Dialogue for Named Bounty Hunters EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaThorneVoiceType\aaHunterDi_aaThorneWhereFr_0006DBEC_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Still... you only have one family, but I've worked hard to bury all those old feelings. Those kind of connections make you weak. What do you think?
ESP.TRADUIT: 尽管。。。你只会有一个家庭，但我努力工作来埋葬这些所有的旧日感情。这种关联会让你变得虚弱。你是怎么认为的？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Thorne [04020845] (mod) Quest : ([04029364]aaHunterDialogue) Dialogue for Named Bounty Hunters EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaThorneVoiceType\aaHunterDi_aaThorneWhereFr_0006DBEC_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaHunterDialogue.ThorneStory to 2
What makes you say there's no going back to Hayfork?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你凭什么说不能回海福克？

ESP.ORIGINAL: What makes you think you're such a great bounty hunter?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你凭什么认为自己是个伟大的赏金猎人？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, a lot of that is just putting up a strong front. Image is important in this business, it can help you bluff people, avoid violence.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是啊，很多都是因为我摆出一个坚强的姿态。形象在这个行业可是很重要的，它可以帮助你吓唬人，还能避免暴力。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Thorne [04020845] (mod) Quest : ([04029364]aaHunterDialogue) Dialogue for Named Bounty Hunters EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaThorneVoiceType\aaHunterDi_aaThorneWhyThin_0006DBF8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Truth is that I spend more time planning my actions than actually fighting. You know what I'm talking about, right? Job can be boring sometimes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 事实上，我花在计划行动上的时间比实际战斗上的时间要多得多。你知道我在说什么，对吧？有时候工作真的很无聊。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Thorne [04020845] (mod) Quest : ([04029364]aaHunterDialogue) Dialogue for Named Bounty Hunters EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaThorneVoiceType\aaHunterDi_aaThorneWhyThin_0006DBF8_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You track some slob for days, bribing, intimidating people for information, and then when you finally find him... you have to be ready to fight.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你跟踪一些蠢蛋好几天，贿赂，恐吓路人来获取信息，然后当你终于找到他的时候。。。你却必须准备好战斗。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Thorne [04020845] (mod) Quest : ([04029364]aaHunterDialogue) Dialogue for Named Bounty Hunters EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaThorneVoiceType\aaHunterDi_aaThorneWhyThin_0006DBF8_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's worth it, though... seeing the light go out of some maniac's eyes. Never gets old to me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过，这是值得的。。。如果能看到光芒从疯子的眼睛里消失的话。这对我来说永远不会过时的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Thorne [04020845] (mod) Quest : ([04029364]aaHunterDialogue) Dialogue for Named Bounty Hunters EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaThorneVoiceType\aaHunterDi_aaThorneWhyThin_0006DBF8_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's always a risk of getting hurt, but you can't ignore your own family forever.
ESP.TRADUIT: 总有受伤的危险的，但你不能永远忽视你自己的家人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, that kind of pain can be worse than a gunshot wound, you know? Hell, that's kind of cowardly, though, not to mention unfair to my kin.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是啊，那种疼痛可比枪伤还严重，你知道吗？不过，这显得有点懦弱了，更不用说对我的家属显得有些不公平。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Thorne [04020845] (mod) Quest : ([04029364]aaHunterDialogue) Dialogue for Named Bounty Hunters EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaThorneVoiceType\aaHunterDi_aaThorneFamilyG_0006DBF1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaHunterDialogue.ThorneFamily to 1 set aaNVB3Master.ThorneFate to 1
It's none any of my business, really.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这不关我的事，真的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, I shouldn't lay out that kind of baggage. It won't come up again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是啊，我不应该把那种话题摆出来的。这不会再出现了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Thorne [04020845] (mod) Quest : ([04029364]aaHunterDialogue) Dialogue for Named Bounty Hunters EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaThorneVoiceType\aaHunterDi_aaThorneFamilyN_0006DBF2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think your old man had the right idea throwing you out. You're a raging asshole.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想你老爸把你赶出去是对的。你只是个乱发脾气的混蛋。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Everybody loves their family, but you're right - they can expose you to danger in this business.
ESP.TRADUIT: 每个人都爱他们的家庭，但你是对的，家人会让你在这种事上面临更多的危险。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sad truth, partner. Savages in the wasteland will exploit anything you care about to hurt you. Just got stay focused on the job, I suppose.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真是可悲的事实，搭档。废土里的野蛮人会利用你关心的任何东西来伤害你的。我想，我只是把注意力全部放在工作上了吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Thorne [04020845] (mod) Quest : ([04029364]aaHunterDialogue) Dialogue for Named Bounty Hunters EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaThorneVoiceType\aaHunterDi_aaThorneFamilyY_0006DBF3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, what have you heard?
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，你听到了些什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: They say you killed some giant pervert called "The Judge", bashed his head in like a bag of fucking carrots, didn't even break a sweat.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们说你杀了一个叫"审判官"的大变态，把他的头撞得像一袋该死的胡萝卜泥，而其连一点汗都没有出。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Thorne [04020845] (mod) Quest : ([04029364]aaHunterDialogue) Dialogue for Named Bounty Hunters EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaThorneVoiceType\aaHunterDi_aaThorneStoryTe_0006DBF7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Later, you beat Red Bear in a knife fight and threw him off a cliff, let the coyotes eat him. Then you cut off Sergio's head with a machete.
ESP.TRADUIT: 后来，你用刀子干掉了红熊，把它从悬崖上扔了下去，让山狼吃掉了它。然后你用砍刀砍掉了塞尔吉奥的头。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Thorne [04020845] (mod) Quest : ([04029364]aaHunterDialogue) Dialogue for Named Bounty Hunters EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaThorneVoiceType\aaHunterDi_aaThorneStoryTe_0006DBF7_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There were also stories about you killing mobsters, finding gold, and then fighting in some battle at the ranger station.
ESP.TRADUIT: 还有一些关于你杀死暴徒，找到金子，然后在游骑兵站打仗的故事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Thorne [04020845] (mod) Quest : ([04029364]aaHunterDialogue) Dialogue for Named Bounty Hunters EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaThorneVoiceType\aaHunterDi_aaThorneStoryTe_0006DBF7_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: To top it all off, I even heard that you took a boat to Arizona and freed a bunch of the slaves. You can understand how someone would be skeptical.
ESP.TRADUIT: 最重要的是，我甚至听说你们乘船去了亚利桑那州，解放了一帮奴隶。所以你可以理解为什么会有人对你持怀疑态度了吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Thorne [04020845] (mod) Quest : ([04029364]aaHunterDialogue) Dialogue for Named Bounty Hunters EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaThorneVoiceType\aaHunterDi_aaThorneStoryTe_0006DBF7_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't care about that sort of nonsense. I know who I am.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不在乎那种胡说八道。我知道我是谁。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're not curious in the least? Okay.
ESP.TRADUIT: 到头来你却一点也不好奇？真可以啊。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Thorne [04020845] (mod) Quest : ([04029364]aaHunterDialogue) Dialogue for Named Bounty Hunters EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaThorneVoiceType\aaHunterDi_aaThorneStoryDo_0006DBF6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaDocMusgroveGoodbye

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Musgrove [040286C8] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I need to get going.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我得走了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaNVB3IntroSlidesTOPIC01
ESP.TRADUIT: aaNVB3介绍幻灯片主题01

ESP.ORIGINAL: {4 seconds of silence}<Ominous Music>
ESP.TRADUIT: {4秒的沉默}<不祥的音乐>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dick from Management [0407098B] (mod) Quest : ([0407098C]aaNVB3IntroSlides) Introductory Slideshow EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaNVB3NarratorVoiceType\aaNVB3Intr_aaNVB3IntroSlid_00070992_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3IntroSlides.Topic to 1 aaNVB3NarratorREF.Say aaNVB3IntroSlidesTOPIC01
{4 seconds of silence}<Ominous Music>
ESP.TRADUIT: {4秒的沉默}<不祥的音乐>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dick from Management [0407098B] (mod) Quest : ([0407098C]aaNVB3IntroSlides) Introductory Slideshow EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaNVB3NarratorVoiceType\aaNVB3Intr_aaNVB3IntroSlid_00070993_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3IntroSlides.Topic to 2 aaNVB3NarratorREF.Say aaNVB3IntroSlidesTOPIC01
{Virgil}It's a nice, long walk to Frosthill, so pay attention and you might learn something.
ESP.TRADUIT: {维吉尔}去霜地的路很长，但会是场好旅程的，所以要注意，你可能会学到一些东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dick from Management [0407098B] (mod) Quest : ([0407098C]aaNVB3IntroSlides) Introductory Slideshow EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaNVB3NarratorVoiceType\aaNVB3Intr_aaNVB3IntroSlid_00070994_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3IntroSlides.Topic to 3 aaNVB3NarratorREF.Say aaNVB3IntroSlidesTOPIC01
Over the years, travelers have told stories of a man in black, the most dangerous killer alive, from somewhere far to the east.
ESP.TRADUIT: 多年来，旅行者们都讲述了关于一个黑衣人的故事，他是从遥远的东方来的最危险的杀手。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dick from Management [0407098B] (mod) Quest : ([0407098C]aaNVB3IntroSlides) Introductory Slideshow EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaNVB3NarratorVoiceType\aaNVB3Intr_aaNVB3IntroSlid_00070995_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3IntroSlides.Topic to 5; DELIBERATE SKIPPING aaNVB3NarratorREF.Say aaNVB3IntroSlidesTOPIC01
For you, he was merely a name: Marko. He would've remained just that, if not for a chain of events after you emerged from the grave.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对你来说，他只代表了一个名字：马尔科。如果不是因为你从那坟墓里出来后的一连串事件，他会一直保持这样的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dick from Management [0407098B] (mod) Quest : ([0407098C]aaNVB3IntroSlides) Introductory Slideshow EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaNVB3NarratorVoiceType\aaNVB3Intr_aaNVB3IntroSlid_00070997_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3IntroSlides.Topic to 6 aaNVB3NarratorREF.Say aaNVB3IntroSlidesTOPIC01
You squared off with the Mojave's worst... and prevailed. Some began to speak of you as a living legend of the wasteland.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你跟莫莫哈维最糟糕的人对决。。。并获胜了。所以有人开始把你说成废土的活传奇。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dick from Management [0407098B] (mod) Quest : ([0407098C]aaNVB3IntroSlides) Introductory Slideshow EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaNVB3NarratorVoiceType\aaNVB3Intr_aaNVB3IntroSlid_00070998_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3IntroSlides.Topic to 7 aaNVB3NarratorREF.Say aaNVB3IntroSlidesTOPIC01
None of this would have mattered until you met a man named Sergio... and killed him. Then... you had Marko's full attention.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但在你遇到一个叫塞尔吉奥的人之前，这些都不重要...直到你杀了他。然后...你便得到了马尔科的全力关注。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dick from Management [0407098B] (mod) Quest : ([0407098C]aaNVB3IntroSlides) Introductory Slideshow EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaNVB3NarratorVoiceType\aaNVB3Intr_aaNVB3IntroSlid_00070999_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3IntroSlides.Topic to 8 aaNVB3NarratorREF.Say aaNVB3IntroSlidesTOPIC01
When he heard about his brother's death, he sent me to find you, to bring you to him... so that you could settle this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当他听说他兄弟死了之后，他就派我来找你，带你去见他。。。这样你们俩就可以解决这个问题了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dick from Management [0407098B] (mod) Quest : ([0407098C]aaNVB3IntroSlides) Introductory Slideshow EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaNVB3NarratorVoiceType\aaNVB3Intr_aaNVB3IntroSlid_0007099A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3IntroSlides.Topic to 9 aaNVB3NarratorREF.Say aaNVB3IntroSlidesTOPIC01
Now... there will be a grim meeting between you and the Man in Black... after which... only one legend will endure.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在。。。你和那个穿黑衣服的人会有一个可怕的对决。。。而之后。。。只有一个传说会继续流传下去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dick from Management [0407098B] (mod) Quest : ([0407098C]aaNVB3IntroSlides) Introductory Slideshow EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaNVB3NarratorVoiceType\aaNVB3Intr_aaNVB3IntroSlid_0007099B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Killing yourself isn't the way, Randall. Wouldn't your family want you to live on?
ESP.TRADUIT: 自杀可不是好办法，兰道尔。难道你的家人会不想让你活下去吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: My family's dead, partner. Ain't no way around it. Best that happens to me is that I linger on as a living corpse, maybe go feral. What an end.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的家人都死了，伙计。不可能的，一切都是不可能的。我遇到的最好的事情只是，像一具活生生的尸体一样留恋着他们，也许我会变得更加野性一些。那会是多好的结局啊。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallSuicid_00072F3A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, if Marko's dead, I know what I'll do, and ain't nothing gonna stop me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，如果马尔科死了的话，我知道我会怎么做的，到那时夜再也没有什么能阻止我了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallSuicid_00072F3A_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There are still some people around who care about you, just so you know.
ESP.TRADUIT: 周围还有一些人关心你，就像你知道。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, I just... I forget sometimes. You get in the habit of detaching yourself from other people in this business so you don't feel too much.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，我只是。。。我有时会忘记而已。当你养成了一个习惯，并在这件事上把自己和别人分开之后，你就不会有太大的感觉了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallSuicid_00072F39_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm just talking out my ass, anyway. Let's... let's get back to work.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管怎样，我只是在胡说八道罢了。让我们。。。我们继续回去工作吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallSuicid_00072F39_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: All this self-pity is distracting. We need to focus on finding Marko.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所有的这些自怜都只能让人分心罢了。我们需要集中精力来寻找马尔科。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's about the smartest thing to ever come out of your mouth. You're goddamn right. Fuck all this contemplation, let's get to killing!
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是从你嘴里说出过的最聪明的话。你他妈的说得对。去他妈的所有这些沉思，让我们开始杀人吧！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [0400FC83] (mod) Quest : ([0400FC84]aaRandallQuest) Randall's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaRandallVoiceType\aaRandallQ_aaRandallSuicid_00072F3B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You scared?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你怕了吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Scared? {Scoffs}No, not in the least. I'm gravely disappointed. You had to get involved with every little thing, didn't you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 害怕？{嘲笑}不，一点也不。我非常失望。你必须插足每一件小事，不是吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marko [040357E4] (mod) Quest : ([04035DD8]aaNVB3Main04) Ain't No Grave EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main05Mar_00072F3D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Before you killed my brother, I had a good thing going here. I had real peace for the first time in my life, and you took it from me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在你杀了我兄弟之前，我本有件好事要去做。我这辈子本该第一次有了真正的平静，而你却夺走了它。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marko [040357E4] (mod) Quest : ([04035DD8]aaNVB3Main04) Ain't No Grave EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main05Mar_00072F3D_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll get it back with the NCR, but it's going to be a while before the fire goes out inside. That's why I hate you... you remind me of what I am.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会把它和NCR一起拿回来，但要过一段时间怒火才会熄灭。所以我恨你。。。你让我想起我是怎样的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marko [040357E4] (mod) Quest : ([04035DD8]aaNVB3Main04) Ain't No Grave EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main05Mar_00072F3D_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd kill you a thousand times if I could, just to see that look... the moment when you realize that you're no better than me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果可以的话我会杀你一千次，只是为了看看你的样子。。。当你意识到你不比我强的那一刻。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marko [040357E4] (mod) Quest : ([04035DD8]aaNVB3Main04) Ain't No Grave EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main05Mar_00072F3D_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Even if you survive, you'll carry the curse. You'll never have a normal life. People will always see the blood on your hands before anything else.
ESP.TRADUIT: 即使你活下来，你也会背负诅咒。你永远不会有正常的生活的。人们总是会先看到你手上的血。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marko [040357E4] (mod) Quest : ([04035DD8]aaNVB3Main04) Ain't No Grave EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main05Mar_00072F3D_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So no, I'm not scared. I pity you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以不，我不害怕。相反，我可怜你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marko [040357E4] (mod) Quest : ([04035DD8]aaNVB3Main04) Ain't No Grave EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main05Mar_00072F3D_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I only regret that I didn't personally see to your demise... to bind, prod, whip, skewer, and slice you until all that remained was twitching flesh.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我只是很遗憾我没有亲眼看到你的死。。。绑，戳，鞭，串，切，直到剩下的只有不断抽搐的肉块。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marko [040357E4] (mod) Quest : ([04035DD8]aaNVB3Main04) Ain't No Grave EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main05Mar_000956B9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I regret the passing benevolence which tainted my judgment, made me doubt my own nature, my strength. It was an infection of weakness.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我后悔我过去的仁慈玷污了我的判断力，使我怀疑自己的本性和力量。那是被软弱的感染。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marko [040357E4] (mod) Quest : ([04035DD8]aaNVB3Main04) Ain't No Grave EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main05Mar_000956B9_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I wish I could've scourged your friends in front of your eyes, then let you listen to their screams after I'd blinded you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我真希望我能在你眼前鞭打你的朋友，然后让你听他们在我把你弄瞎后的尖叫。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marko [040357E4] (mod) Quest : ([04035DD8]aaNVB3Main04) Ain't No Grave EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main05Mar_000956B9_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you know what I feel when I think of the townspeople, Randall, or his family? Nothing. They were no more than insects, mere parasites.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道当我想到镇上的人，兰道尔，或者他的家人时我的感受吗？什么都没有。它们不过是小虫子，只是寄生虫。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marko [040357E4] (mod) Quest : ([04035DD8]aaNVB3Main04) Ain't No Grave EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main05Mar_000956B9_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This world is hate, and I am its greatest pupil. Bring your courage, your righteousness... measure it against my resolve, and you will fail.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个世界是仇恨的，而我则是它最伟大的学生。带上你的勇气，你的正义。。。以我的决心来做个较量吧、而你会失败的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marko [040357E4] (mod) Quest : ([04035DD8]aaNVB3Main04) Ain't No Grave EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main05Mar_000956B9_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You'll regret everything you've done, soon enough.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很快你就会后悔你所做的一切。

ESP.ORIGINAL: So the toad says to the wolf. Death is a comfort to me, nothing to be dreaded. Even if I fall, I am happy... no, overjoyed at your suffering.
ESP.TRADUIT: 于是蟾蜍对狼说。死亡是我的安慰，没有什么可怕的。即使我跌倒了，我也很快乐。。。不，为你的痛苦而高兴。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marko [040357E4] (mod) Quest : ([04035DD8]aaNVB3Main04) Ain't No Grave EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main05Mar_000956BA_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You'll never live this down. Never. If I die, you'll still be remembered as failure, tainted forever. I can die happy knowing that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你再也活不下去了。再也不会了。如果我死了，你仍会被记为失败，永远被玷污。只要知道这一点我会高兴的死去的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marko [040357E4] (mod) Quest : ([04035DD8]aaNVB3Main04) Ain't No Grave EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaMarkoVoiceType\aaNVB3Main_aaNVB3Main05Mar_000956BA_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You don't care that you're about to die?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不在乎你会死吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaFelinaWhatWantLife
ESP.TRADUIT: aa费琳娜想要生活

ESP.ORIGINAL: Survival isn't enough? I guess it never is... we're always looking for something more, no matter if we're in the peaks or the valleys.
ESP.TRADUIT: 生存还不够吗？我想永远不会的。。。我们总是在寻找更多的东西，不管我们是在高峰还是在低谷。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felina Robbins [04017DBB] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: I want my daughter to get an education, something I never really had. If I could turn a profit with the bighorners, that would be nice.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想让我女儿接受教育，这是我从来没有过的。如果我能用大角羊来盈利，那就太好了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felina Robbins [04017DBB] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's embarrassing to admit, but... I would like to paint. You know, like with brushes. I've seen some of the pre-war pictures, and I'd like to try.
ESP.TRADUIT: 承认这个很尴尬，但是。。。我想画画。你知道，就像用刷子一样。我看过一些战前的照片，我想试试。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felina Robbins [04017DBB] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: For so many the world is a place of words, but to me it is a collection of tiny images, how do you say? Portraits? Yes, that's it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对这么多人来说，世界是一个文字的地方，但对我来说，它是一个小图像的集合，你怎么说？肖像？是的，就像这样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felina Robbins [04017DBB] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: I see them in my mind, especially when I'm in bed, waiting to fall asleep. It's so vivid in those moments when you're alone with your mind.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在脑海中看到过它们，尤其是当我躺在床上等着睡着的时候。当你在独自思考的时候，它是如此的生动。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felina Robbins [04017DBB] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: Pardon me, I got carried away. I've never told anyone about that. It's probably just a childish impulse, nothing to it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对不起，我有点沉浸其中了。我从没告诉过任何人。这可能只是种幼稚的冲动罢了，没什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felina Robbins [04017DBB] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaFrosthillDialogue.FelinaLife to 1
What do you hope to get out of life up here in the mountains?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你希望离开这里，在山上的生活中得到些什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: If circumstances allow, I think you should do it. I'd like to see your work.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果情况允许，我想你应该尝试的。我想看看你的作品。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You have such a high opinion of my hypothetical work! I'm flattered, and I do appreciate the encouragement. You are very kind.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你对我的假想作品评价太高了！我很受宠若惊，但也很感激你的鼓励。你真好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felina Robbins [04017DBB] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: If I may reciprocate, what exactly are you trying to get out of life?
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我可以回报你，你到底想从我的生命中得到什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felina Robbins [04017DBB] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaFrosthillDialogue.FelinaRelation to aaFrosthillDialogue.FelinaRelation +1
It's best to bury those urges. This is a hard world, and you should focus on protecting your family.
ESP.TRADUIT: 最好把那些欲望埋了。因为这是一个艰难的世界，你应该集中精力保护你的家庭。

ESP.ORIGINAL: So true. So very true. I respect your candor, as well as your openness.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真正确啊。非常正确。我尊重你的坦率，也尊重你的开放。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felina Robbins [04017DBB] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Painting? This is what you dream about? You're a lost cause, lady.
ESP.TRADUIT: 画画？这就是你的梦想？你是个失败者，女士。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You asked, you nosy pig! That's a hell of a thing to say after I share my thoughts with you. You can go fuck yourself!
ESP.TRADUIT: 这明明是你问的，你这个爱管闲事的猪猡！在我和你分享我的想法之后，这真是一个难听的像地狱一般的话。操你自己去吧！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felina Robbins [04017DBB] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaFrosthillDialogue.FelinaRelation to aaFrosthillDialogue.FelinaRelation -4
I survive.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我活了下来。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You know who you sound like? Marko. That's what he's all about. Being the last man standing. Can't argue with the results.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道你听起来像谁吗？马尔科。因为他就是为了这个而活的---成为最后一个站着的人。没人能对结果提出异议。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felina Robbins [04017DBB] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: I set things right, even if I have to get my hands dirty.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会把事情安排得很好，即使这会弄脏我的双手。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who has clean hands? Nobody here, that's for certain. I only worry about the setting things right part of it. Who decides what's right? Government?
ESP.TRADUIT: 谁的手干净？这里没有人，这是肯定的。我只担心把事情安排好。而谁来决定什么是对的？难道是政府么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felina Robbins [04017DBB] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: I just hope you remember that there's wrong in all of us, so don't set things too right.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我只希望你记住我们所有人都有过错，所以请不要把事情搞得太对了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felina Robbins [04017DBB] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I like to travel, find new challenges, and to help people when I can.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我喜欢旅行，寻找新的挑战，并在力所能及的时候帮助别人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: How very noble. Do you attack many windmills? Yes, even a lowly peasant like me has read a few books, don't look so surprised.
ESP.TRADUIT: 多么高尚啊。你袭击过很多风车吗？是的，即使像我这样的一个卑微的农民也读过几本书的，别这么惊讶。（指唐吉坷德）
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felina Robbins [04017DBB] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: To be honest, I'm not sure.
ESP.TRADUIT: 老实说，我不确定。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That answer might make some people uncomfortable, but I love the truth of it. Who the hell has all the answers? I certainly don't. You're all right.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个答案可能会让一些人不舒服，但我喜欢它的真相。到底谁知道答案？我当然不知道。你会没事的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felina Robbins [04017DBB] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: I live to bathe in my enemies' blood. That's sort of like painting, right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我活着是为了沐浴在敌人的鲜血中。这有点像绘画，对吧？

ESP.ORIGINAL: What is wrong with you? You have demented mind, you know that?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你怎么了？你的大脑发狂了，知道吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felina Robbins [04017DBB] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's a subject of some debate.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这会是个有争议的话题。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ah, you have sown your seed in many fields, I take it? I was once a great aficionado of women, I applaud your vigor and... dedication.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，看来你已经把你的"种子"撒在许多田地里了，我说对了吗？我曾经也是一个伟大的女性爱好者，我为你的经历和。。。奉献精神鼓掌。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vasquez [04035DD5] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\aaFrosthil_aaVazquezFamily_00072F59_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, but I haven't see them in a long time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，但我好久没见过他们了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: But they're out there, alive, no? Even the thought of them can give one comfort. I will pray for them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但他们还活着，不是吗？即使是想到他们也能给人安慰的。我会为他们祈祷的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vasquez [04035DD5] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\aaFrosthil_aaVazquezFamily_00072F57_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't have any family.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我没有任何家室。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Lo siento, it was rude of me to ask, please forgive me. I will pray for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真抱歉，请原谅我，这样问你真是太无礼了。我会为你祈祷。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vasquez [04035DD5] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\aaFrosthil_aaVazquezFamily_00072F58_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd prefer not to talk about my family.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不想谈论我的家庭。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Trust me when I say I have no malignant designs on your brethren, but I understand your prudence. It is a savage age, I am afraid.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想说我对你的弟兄并没有恶意，你应该信我的。但现在我却只看到了你的谨慎。恐怕这就是一个野蛮的时代吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vasquez [04035DD5] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\aaFrosthil_aaVazquezFamily_00072F5A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaNVB3EndingTopic01Intro
ESP.TRADUIT: aaNVB3结局主题01导入

ESP.ORIGINAL: And so it was that the clash between the Courier and Marko had come to its conclusion.
ESP.TRADUIT: 而这，就是邮差和马尔科之间恩恩怨怨冲突的终结了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dick from Management [0407098B] (mod) Quest : ([040675DB]aaNVB3Ending) Ending Slideshow EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaNVB3NarratorVoiceType\aaNVB3Endi_aaNVB3EndingTop_00072F6A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Ending.Topic01 to 1 aaNVB3NarratorREF.SayTo Player aaNVB3EndingTopic01Intro
Their actions had reshaped Frosthill and irrevocably changed the fortunes of numerous inhabitants.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们的死斗，行动深深地改变了霜地的面貌，并且不可挽回地改变了无数居民的命运。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dick from Management [0407098B] (mod) Quest : ([040675DB]aaNVB3Ending) Ending Slideshow EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaNVB3NarratorVoiceType\aaNVB3Endi_aaNVB3EndingTop_00072F6B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Ending.Topic01 to 2 aaNVB3NarratorREF.SayTo Player aaNVB3EndingTopic02Jill ;Temporary until Jill is voiced ;aaNVB3NarratorREF.SayTo Player aaNVB3EndingTopic03Dana
aaNVB3EndingTopic02Jill
ESP.TRADUIT: aaNVB3结局吉尔主题02

ESP.ORIGINAL: Shortly before the massacre at Frosthill, an argument between Cocker and Cutty resulted in Cutty actually walking the fuck out the door.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就在霜地惨案发生前不久，科克尔和卡蒂之间的一场争吵导致卡蒂真的走出了他们的家门。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dick from Management [0407098B] (mod) Quest : ([040675DB]aaNVB3Ending) Ending Slideshow EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaNVB3NarratorVoiceType\aaNVB3Endi_aaNVB3EndingTop_00072F6C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Ending.Topic02 to 1 aaNVB3NarratorREF.SayTo Player aaNVB3EndingTopic02Jill
Cocker insisted on following Cutty as he walked out of the Deep Creek Mountains, berating him the entire time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 科克尔坚持着跟着卡蒂走出了深溪山脉，并一直在斥责他。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dick from Management [0407098B] (mod) Quest : ([040675DB]aaNVB3Ending) Ending Slideshow EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaNVB3NarratorVoiceType\aaNVB3Endi_aaNVB3EndingTop_00072F6D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Ending.Topic02 to 2 aaNVB3NarratorREF.SayTo Player aaNVB3EndingTopic02Jill
This continued for several weeks, until Cutty walked to an NCR recruiting station and enlisted to spite Cocker.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这种情况持续了好几个星期，直到卡蒂走到NCR的一个招募站，并应征入伍来报复科克尔。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dick from Management [0407098B] (mod) Quest : ([040675DB]aaNVB3Ending) Ending Slideshow EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaNVB3NarratorVoiceType\aaNVB3Endi_aaNVB3EndingTop_000A25BC_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Ending.Topic02 to 3 aaNVB3NarratorREF.SayTo Player aaNVB3EndingTopic02Jill
Undettered, Cocker enlisted beside his friend, and immediately volunteered for front-line duty.
ESP.TRADUIT: 科克尔一言不发地，同样选择在他的朋友身边应征入伍，并立即志愿到前线进行执勤。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dick from Management [0407098B] (mod) Quest : ([040675DB]aaNVB3Ending) Ending Slideshow EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaNVB3NarratorVoiceType\aaNVB3Endi_aaNVB3EndingTop_000A25BD_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Ending.Topic02 to 4 aaNVB3NarratorREF.SayTo Player aaNVB3EndingTopic02Jill
Insistent that Cocker was in fact a pussy, Cutty volunteered for the same.
ESP.TRADUIT: 卡蒂坚持认为科克尔实际上是一个娘娘腔，所以也自愿这么做了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dick from Management [0407098B] (mod) Quest : ([040675DB]aaNVB3Ending) Ending Slideshow EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaNVB3NarratorVoiceType\aaNVB3Endi_aaNVB3EndingTop_000A25BE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Ending.Topic02 to 5 aaNVB3NarratorREF.SayTo Player aaNVB3EndingTopic03Dana
aaNVB3EndingTopic03Dana
ESP.TRADUIT: aaNVB3结局主题03达娜

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Freeside Suicide}Unable to retain ownership of the family farmstead, Dana soon uprooted and moved to Westside in the hopes of finding gainful employment.
ESP.TRADUIT: {自由城自尽}由于无法保留家庭农庄的所有权，达娜很快就背井离乡，搬到了西区，希望能找到一份有报酬的工作。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dick from Management [0407098B] (mod) Quest : ([040675DB]aaNVB3Ending) Ending Slideshow EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaNVB3NarratorVoiceType\aaNVB3Endi_aaNVB3EndingTop_00072F71_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Ending.Topic03 to 1 aaNVB3NarratorREF.SayTo Player aaNVB3EndingTopic03Dana
With few prospects, she attempted to provide for her homeless family through prostitution, but struggled to find enough clients.
ESP.TRADUIT: 由于前途渺茫，她试图通过卖淫来供养无家可归的家庭，但很难找到足够的客户。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dick from Management [0407098B] (mod) Quest : ([040675DB]aaNVB3Ending) Ending Slideshow

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Ending.Topic03 to 2 aaNVB3NarratorREF.SayTo Player aaNVB3EndingTopic03Dana
She committed suicide soon thereafter. Her boys turned to begging, then succumbed to chem abuse and prostitution. They died before the year's end.
ESP.TRADUIT: 此后不久她便自杀了。她的孩子们不得不转为乞讨，然后屈服于化学品滥用和卖淫。他们在年底之前就死了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dick from Management [0407098B] (mod) Quest : ([040675DB]aaNVB3Ending) Ending Slideshow

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Ending.Topic03 to 3 aaNVB3NarratorREF.SayTo Player aaNVB3EndingTopic04Doolin
{Hangs on to farm}Thanks to the Courier's largesse, Dana was able to retain ownership of the family farm. In time, she managed to salvage their fortunes.
ESP.TRADUIT: {挂在农场上}多亏了邮差的慷慨，达娜得以保留她家庭农场的所有权。后来，她设法挽救了她们的家产。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dick from Management [0407098B] (mod) Quest : ([040675DB]aaNVB3Ending) Ending Slideshow

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Ending.Topic03 to 1 aaNVB3NarratorREF.SayTo Player aaNVB3EndingTopic03Dana
She eventually made a deal to sell produce and livestock to the Crimson Caravan, ensuring stable income for her foreseeable future.
ESP.TRADUIT: 她最终与商队达成协议，将农产品和牲畜出售给深红商队，确保在可预见的未来中都有稳定的收入。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dick from Management [0407098B] (mod) Quest : ([040675DB]aaNVB3Ending) Ending Slideshow

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Ending.Topic03 to 2 aaNVB3NarratorREF.SayTo Player aaNVB3EndingTopic04Doolin
{Killed by player, children become sex slaves}When Dana's life came to an unexpected end at the Courier's hands, her children were left helpless and without means.
ESP.TRADUIT: {被邮差杀死，孩子们变成了性奴}当达娜的生命在邮差的手中意外结束时，她的孩子们束手无策。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dick from Management [0407098B] (mod) Quest : ([040675DB]aaNVB3Ending) Ending Slideshow

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Ending.Topic03 to 1 aaNVB3NarratorREF.SayTo Player aaNVB3EndingTopic03Dana
Desperate and hungry, they began begging in Freeside, and soon turned to chem abuse and prostitution. They died before the year's end.
ESP.TRADUIT: 绝望和饥饿迫使他们开始在自由城乞讨，并很快转向化学品滥用和卖淫。他们在年底前就死了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dick from Management [0407098B] (mod) Quest : ([040675DB]aaNVB3Ending) Ending Slideshow

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Ending.Topic03 to 2 aaNVB3NarratorREF.SayTo Player aaNVB3EndingTopic04Doolin
aaNVB3EndingTopic04Doolin
ESP.TRADUIT: aaNVB3结局主题04杜林

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Killed by player}Unsung and soon forgotten, Doolin was just another notch in the Courier's belt.
ESP.TRADUIT: {被邮差杀死}生死不明，并很快就被遗忘了，杜林只是邮差腰带上的另一个刻痕罢了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dick from Management [0407098B] (mod) Quest : ([040675DB]aaNVB3Ending) Ending Slideshow EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaNVB3NarratorVoiceType\aaNVB3Endi_aaNVB3EndingTop_00078B38_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Ending.Topic04 to 1 aaNVB3NarratorREF.SayTo Player aaNVB3EndingTopic04Doolin
His relatives in California sometimes wondered what became of him, but they ultimately concluded that his outlaw ways had caught up with him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他在加利福尼亚的亲戚们有时会想知道他后来怎么样了，但他们最终得出结论，他的不法行为已经让他付出了代价。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dick from Management [0407098B] (mod) Quest : ([040675DB]aaNVB3Ending) Ending Slideshow

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Ending.Topic04 to 2 aaNVB3NarratorREF.SayTo Player aaNVB3EndingTopic05Porter
{Went home, became farmer}Forsaking his criminal past, Doolin quietly headed west and reunited with his relatives on the family farm.
ESP.TRADUIT: {回家，成为了农民}放弃了犯罪的过去，杜林悄悄地往西边走去，并最后在家庭农场与亲人团聚。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dick from Management [0407098B] (mod) Quest : ([040675DB]aaNVB3Ending) Ending Slideshow EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaNVB3NarratorVoiceType\aaNVB3Endi_aaNVB3EndingTop_00078B39_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Ending.Topic04 to 1 aaNVB3NarratorREF.SayTo Player aaNVB3EndingTopic04Doolin
While there was always some distance between Doolin and his kin, he eventually found peace through steady, honest industry.
ESP.TRADUIT: 虽然杜林和他的亲戚之间总是有一定的距离相隔，但他最终通过稳定、并诚实的工作找到了和平。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dick from Management [0407098B] (mod) Quest : ([040675DB]aaNVB3Ending) Ending Slideshow

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Ending.Topic04 to 2 aaNVB3NarratorREF.SayTo Player aaNVB3EndingTopic04Doolin
He often wondered what became of the Courier who had shown mercy when there was no reason to give it. Doolin died in his sleep several decades later.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他常常想知道，那位在没有理由施舍的情况下表现出仁慈的邮差后来怎么样了。在几十年后，杜林在睡梦中去世了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dick from Management [0407098B] (mod) Quest : ([040675DB]aaNVB3Ending) Ending Slideshow

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Ending.Topic04 to 3 aaNVB3NarratorREF.SayTo Player aaNVB3EndingTopic05Porter
aaNVB3EndingTopic05Porter
ESP.TRADUIT: aaNVB3结局主题05波特

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Killed by player}For all his rage and ferocity, Porter could not cope with the Courier's fatal attack.
ESP.TRADUIT: {被邮差杀死}尽管他狂怒凶残，波特还是无法应付邮差的致命攻击。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dick from Management [0407098B] (mod) Quest : ([040675DB]aaNVB3Ending) Ending Slideshow EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaNVB3NarratorVoiceType\aaNVB3Endi_aaNVB3EndingTop_00078B3A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Ending.Topic05 to 1 aaNVB3NarratorREF.SayTo Player aaNVB3EndingTopic05Porter
His frozen corpse would endure as a testament to the power of the Courier.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他冻僵的尸体将会成为邮差实力的证明。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dick from Management [0407098B] (mod) Quest : ([040675DB]aaNVB3Ending) Ending Slideshow EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaNVB3NarratorVoiceType\aaNVB3Endi_aaNVB3EndingTop_000791E7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Ending.Topic05 to 2 aaNVB3NarratorREF.SayTo Player aaNVB3EndingTopic06Lee
{Goes to Jacobstown}Unshackled from his psychological bonds, Porter sought out other supermutants who aspired to live in peace.
ESP.TRADUIT: {去了雅各布斯顿}摆脱了心中的束缚，波特找到了其他渴望和平生活的超级变种人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dick from Management [0407098B] (mod) Quest : ([040675DB]aaNVB3Ending) Ending Slideshow EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaNVB3NarratorVoiceType\aaNVB3Endi_aaNVB3EndingTop_00078B3B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Ending.Topic05 to 1 aaNVB3NarratorREF.SayTo Player aaNVB3EndingTopic05Porter
He made his way to Jacobstown, where he hoped to begin a new life herding livestock and assisting other supermutants who had lost their way.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他去了雅各布斯镇，希望在那里开始新的生活，过着放牧牲畜，并帮助其他迷路的超级变种人的平静生活。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dick from Management [0407098B] (mod) Quest : ([040675DB]aaNVB3Ending) Ending Slideshow

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Ending.Topic05 to 2 aaNVB3NarratorREF.SayTo Player aaNVB3EndingTopic06Lee
aaNVB3EndingTopic06Lee
ESP.TRADUIT: aaNVB3结局主题06李

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Killed by player}Though sure of himself at the time, Lee's decision to fight the Courier resulted in quick death.
ESP.TRADUIT: {被邮差杀死}虽然当时对自己很有信心，但李与邮差作战的决定，导致了他的快速死亡。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dick from Management [0407098B] (mod) Quest : ([040675DB]aaNVB3Ending) Ending Slideshow EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaNVB3NarratorVoiceType\aaNVB3Endi_aaNVB3EndingTop_00078B3C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Ending.Topic06 to 1 aaNVB3NarratorREF.SayTo Player aaNVB3EndingTopic06Lee
His cadaver was dumped on the outskirts of town, where it was torn asunder and consumed by local predators.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他的尸体被丢弃在城郊，在那里被撕碎，并当地的捕食者吃掉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dick from Management [0407098B] (mod) Quest : ([040675DB]aaNVB3Ending) Ending Slideshow EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaNVB3NarratorVoiceType\aaNVB3Endi_aaNVB3EndingTop_000791EE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Ending.Topic06 to 2 aaNVB3NarratorREF.SayTo Player aaNVB3EndingTopic07Godwin
{TP - Goes to California and becomes librarian}Petrified by a Courier's mere presence, Lee hastily departed for the NCR under a new alias.
ESP.TRADUIT: {TP-去了加利福尼亚，成为了图书管理员}被一个邮差的出现吓呆了，李匆忙用一个新的化名去了NCR。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dick from Management [0407098B] (mod) Quest : ([040675DB]aaNVB3Ending) Ending Slideshow EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaNVB3NarratorVoiceType\aaNVB3Endi_aaNVB3EndingTop_00078B3D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Ending.Topic06 to 1 aaNVB3NarratorREF.SayTo Player aaNVB3EndingTopic06Lee
Fearful of incurring the Courier's wrath, Lee became a librarian in a small town. He never raised his hand in violence again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 由于害怕招致邮差的愤怒，李成了一个小镇的图书管理员。他再也没有尝试过施暴了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dick from Management [0407098B] (mod) Quest : ([040675DB]aaNVB3Ending) Ending Slideshow EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaNVB3NarratorVoiceType\aaNVB3Endi_aaNVB3EndingTop_000791EF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Ending.Topic06 to 2 aaNVB3NarratorREF.SayTo Player aaNVB3EndingTopic07Godwin
{Heads south, is killed by Ranger Watson}Pleased with himself for having escaped justice, Lee went south in the hopes of joining a warlord rumored to be active in the deserts of Mexico.
ESP.TRADUIT: {往南走，被游骑兵沃森杀死}对自己逃脱了法律制裁感到高兴，李往南走去，希望加入一个据传活跃在墨西哥沙漠的军阀。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dick from Management [0407098B] (mod) Quest : ([040675DB]aaNVB3Ending) Ending Slideshow EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaNVB3NarratorVoiceType\aaNVB3Endi_aaNVB3EndingTop_00078B3E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Ending.Topic06 to 1 aaNVB3NarratorREF.SayTo Player aaNVB3EndingTopic06Lee
Instead, he met a patrol from Firebase Zulu, and after one of the rangers recognized the gunslinger, Lee confidently went for his pistol.
ESP.TRADUIT: 相反，他遇到了来自烈火基地祖鲁的巡逻队，在其中一名游骑兵认出了这位枪手之后，李很自信地去掏手枪。（译者注：Firebase Zulu出自作者另一著名mod：The Better Angels）
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dick from Management [0407098B] (mod) Quest : ([040675DB]aaNVB3Ending) Ending Slideshow

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Ending.Topic06 to 2 aaNVB3NarratorREF.SayTo Player aaNVB3EndingTopic06Lee
Before Lee fired a shot, a round from Ranger Watson's revolver ploughed through his brain, killing him instantly.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但在李开一枪之前，游骑兵沃森的左轮手枪的一发子弹就穿透了他的大脑，让他当场死亡。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dick from Management [0407098B] (mod) Quest : ([040675DB]aaNVB3Ending) Ending Slideshow

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Ending.Topic06 to 3 aaNVB3NarratorREF.SayTo Player aaNVB3EndingTopic07Godwin
aaNVB3EndingTopic07Godwin
{Survives, continues making bombs}Godwin continued raising bighorners while secretly manufacturing mail bombs sent to NCR offices.
ESP.TRADUIT: {幸存下来，并继续制造炸弹}戈德温在秘密制造寄给NCR办公室的邮件炸弹的同时，继续放牧大角羊。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dick from Management [0407098B] (mod) Quest : ([040675DB]aaNVB3Ending) Ending Slideshow EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaNVB3NarratorVoiceType\aaNVB3Endi_aaNVB3EndingTop_00078B3F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Ending.Topic07 to 1 aaNVB3NarratorREF.SayTo Player aaNVB3EndingTopic07Godwin
His attacks claimed the lives of dozens of officials and innocent civilians in the years that followed. Godwin would never face justice.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在随后的几年里，他的袭击夺去了数十名官员和无辜平民的生命。葛德温永远都不会面对正义的制裁。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dick from Management [0407098B] (mod) Quest : ([040675DB]aaNVB3Ending) Ending Slideshow EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaNVB3NarratorVoiceType\aaNVB3Endi_aaNVB3EndingTop_000791F2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Ending.Topic07 to 2 aaNVB3NarratorREF.SayTo Player aaNVB3EndingTopic08Frost
{Killed, children eaten by mongrels}When Godwin was slain by the Courier, his campaign of terror against the NCR came to an immediate conclusion.
ESP.TRADUIT: {被杀死，孩子被杂种狗分食}当戈德温被邮差杀害时，他对NCR的恐怖行动便立即结束了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dick from Management [0407098B] (mod) Quest : ([040675DB]aaNVB3Ending) Ending Slideshow EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaNVB3NarratorVoiceType\aaNVB3Endi_aaNVB3EndingTop_00078B40_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Ending.Topic07 to 1 aaNVB3NarratorREF.SayTo Player aaNVB3EndingTopic07Godwin
Without their father, Godwin's children struggled to maintain the ranch and care for livestock.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没有他们的父亲，葛德温的孩子们努力维持着牧场和照顾牲畜。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dick from Management [0407098B] (mod) Quest : ([040675DB]aaNVB3Ending) Ending Slideshow EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaNVB3NarratorVoiceType\aaNVB3Endi_aaNVB3EndingTop_000791F3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Ending.Topic07 to 2 aaNVB3NarratorREF.SayTo Player aaNVB3EndingTopic07Godwin
In the middle of an intense blizzard, starving mongrels would break into the dilapidated home, where they killed and consumed Godwin's children.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在一场强烈的暴风雪中，饥饿的杂种狗闯进了她们破旧的房子，在那里他们杀死并吃掉了葛德温的孩子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dick from Management [0407098B] (mod) Quest : ([040675DB]aaNVB3Ending) Ending Slideshow EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaNVB3NarratorVoiceType\aaNVB3Endi_aaNVB3EndingTop_000791F4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Ending.Topic07 to 3 aaNVB3NarratorREF.SayTo Player aaNVB3EndingTopic08Frost
{Alive, peaceful}Having ceased his campaign against the NCR, Godwin turned his inventive energies into other endeavors around the ranch.
ESP.TRADUIT: {活着，并展示和平}停止了反对NCR的运动后，葛德温把他的创造力转化为牧场周围的其他努力。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dick from Management [0407098B] (mod) Quest : ([040675DB]aaNVB3Ending) Ending Slideshow EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaNVB3NarratorVoiceType\aaNVB3Endi_aaNVB3EndingTop_00078B41_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Ending.Topic07 to 1 aaNVB3NarratorREF.SayTo Player aaNVB3EndingTopic07Godwin
With a collection of improvised contraptions and a steady source of power, Godwin's ranch burgeoned into a major supplier of bighorner meat.
ESP.TRADUIT: 戈德温的牧场拥有一系列即兴做的奇异装置和稳定的能源，在之后他的牧场迅速发展成为一个大角羊肉的主要供应商。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dick from Management [0407098B] (mod) Quest : ([040675DB]aaNVB3Ending) Ending Slideshow

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Ending.Topic07 to 2 aaNVB3NarratorREF.SayTo Player aaNVB3EndingTopic08Frost
aaNVB3EndingTopic08Frost
ESP.TRADUIT: aaNVB3结局主题弗罗斯特08

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Alive}Frost continued to move from town to town, always vigilant against the threat of assassination.
ESP.TRADUIT: {活着}弗罗斯特继续从一个城镇搬到另一个城镇，时刻警惕着暗杀的威胁。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dick from Management [0407098B] (mod) Quest : ([040675DB]aaNVB3Ending) Ending Slideshow EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaNVB3NarratorVoiceType\aaNVB3Endi_aaNVB3EndingTop_00078B42_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Ending.Topic08 to 1 aaNVB3NarratorREF.SayTo Player aaNVB3EndingTopic08Frost
Eventually he headed toward the Great Plains, and he was never seen again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 最后他朝大平原走去，再也没有人看见过他。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dick from Management [0407098B] (mod) Quest : ([040675DB]aaNVB3Ending) Ending Slideshow EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaNVB3NarratorVoiceType\aaNVB3Endi_aaNVB3EndingTop_000791F6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Ending.Topic08 to 2 aaNVB3NarratorREF.SayTo Player aaNVB3EndingTopic09Ford
{Dead}Despite the NCR's best efforts to suppress news of Frost's death, it was eventually leaked to the press, setting off a frenzy of reporting.
ESP.TRADUIT: {死亡}尽管NCR尽最大努力压制弗罗斯特的死亡消息，但最终这还是被泄露给了新闻界，引发了一场疯狂的报道。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dick from Management [0407098B] (mod) Quest : ([040675DB]aaNVB3Ending) Ending Slideshow EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaNVB3NarratorVoiceType\aaNVB3Endi_aaNVB3EndingTop_00078B43_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Ending.Topic08 to 1 aaNVB3NarratorREF.SayTo Player aaNVB3EndingTopic08Frost
The backlash from both the public and the media would eventually compel the NCR to publicly enact measures that prevented the invasion of privacy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 公众和媒体的强烈反对最终迫使NCR公开采取措施防止大众侵犯隐私。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dick from Management [0407098B] (mod) Quest : ([040675DB]aaNVB3Ending) Ending Slideshow EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaNVB3NarratorVoiceType\aaNVB3Endi_aaNVB3EndingTop_000791F7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Ending.Topic08 to 2 aaNVB3NarratorREF.SayTo Player aaNVB3EndingTopic08Frost
However, in a few years a new agency was founded to exploit loopholes in the legislation, and surveillance of citizens continued unabated.
ESP.TRADUIT: 然而，几年后，一个新的机构成立了，以利用立法上的漏洞，而对公民的监视仍然持续着，并有增无减。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dick from Management [0407098B] (mod) Quest : ([040675DB]aaNVB3Ending) Ending Slideshow EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaNVB3NarratorVoiceType\aaNVB3Endi_aaNVB3EndingTop_000791F8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Ending.Topic08 to 3 aaNVB3NarratorREF.SayTo Player aaNVB3EndingTopic09Ford
aaNVB3EndingTopic09Ford
ESP.TRADUIT: aaNVB3结局主题09福特

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Dead}Ford's dream of becoming a wasteland legend died with him in Frosthill when he met the Courier's wrath.
ESP.TRADUIT: {死亡}福特想成为荒原传奇的梦想在他遇到了邮差的怒火时，与他一起被埋葬在了霜地。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dick from Management [0407098B] (mod) Quest : ([040675DB]aaNVB3Ending) Ending Slideshow EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaNVB3NarratorVoiceType\aaNVB3Endi_aaNVB3EndingTop_00078B44_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Ending.Topic09 to 1 aaNVB3NarratorREF.SayTo Player aaNVB3EndingTopic09Ford
In the final seconds before he died, Ford hoped he would earn his own chapter in the next dime novel about the Courier.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在他死前的最后几秒钟，福特仍然在希望他能在下一部关于邮差的小说中赢得描写自己的那一章。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dick from Management [0407098B] (mod) Quest : ([040675DB]aaNVB3Ending) Ending Slideshow EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaNVB3NarratorVoiceType\aaNVB3Endi_aaNVB3EndingTop_000791F9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Ending.Topic09 to 2 aaNVB3NarratorREF.SayTo Player aaNVB3EndingTopic10Coopers
{Alive}Ford swiftly fled the Deep Creek Mountains, eventually making his way to Sac-Town, where he found work as a security guard.
ESP.TRADUIT: {苟活}福特迅速逃离了深溪山脉，最终前往萨克镇，并在那里找到了一份保安的工作。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dick from Management [0407098B] (mod) Quest : ([040675DB]aaNVB3Ending) Ending Slideshow EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaNVB3NarratorVoiceType\aaNVB3Endi_aaNVB3EndingTop_00078B45_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Ending.Topic09 to 1 aaNVB3NarratorREF.SayTo Player aaNVB3EndingTopic09Ford
Due to his cruelty and arrogance, Ford was soon despised by the general populace, though he made for an effective watchman.
ESP.TRADUIT: 由于他的残忍和傲慢，福特很快就遭到了大众的鄙视，尽管他的确是一个有效的守护者。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dick from Management [0407098B] (mod) Quest : ([040675DB]aaNVB3Ending) Ending Slideshow EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaNVB3NarratorVoiceType\aaNVB3Endi_aaNVB3EndingTop_000791FA_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Ending.Topic09 to 2 aaNVB3NarratorREF.SayTo Player aaNVB3EndingTopic09Ford
One night a homeless man grew tired of Ford's incessant derision and shot him in the testicles. No one helped when he bled to death in the street.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一天晚上，一个无家可归的人厌倦了福特对他不停的嘲笑，朝他的蛋蛋开了一枪。当他在街上慢慢流血致死时，没有一个人愿意帮忙。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dick from Management [0407098B] (mod) Quest : ([040675DB]aaNVB3Ending) Ending Slideshow

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Ending.Topic09 to 3 aaNVB3NarratorREF.SayTo Player aaNVB3EndingTopic10Coopers
aaNVB3EndingTopic10Coopers
ESP.TRADUIT: aaNVB3结局主题10库帕

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Alive}Like the Courier, Cooper survived the ordeal of near-death, and became closer to his new master as a result.
ESP.TRADUIT: {活着}像邮差一样，库珀在濒死的折磨中幸存下来，并因此与他的新主人更加亲近。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dick from Management [0407098B] (mod) Quest : ([040675DB]aaNVB3Ending) Ending Slideshow EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaNVB3NarratorVoiceType\aaNVB3Endi_aaNVB3EndingTop_00078B46_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Ending.Topic10 to 1 aaNVB3NarratorREF.SayTo Player aaNVB3EndingTopic10Coopers
He followed the Courier to the Mojave, determined to remain a loyal companion, no matter the end.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他跟着邮差来到莫哈维废土，决心不管结局如何，都要做一个忠诚的伙伴。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dick from Management [0407098B] (mod) Quest : ([040675DB]aaNVB3Ending) Ending Slideshow EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaNVB3NarratorVoiceType\aaNVB3Endi_aaNVB3EndingTop_00079887_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL:
set aaNVB3Ending.Topic10 to 2
if aaNVB3EstherREF.killed == 1
aaNVB3NarratorREF.SayTo Player aaNVB3EndingTopic11Esther
elseif SomeguyMaster.EstherStatus == 2 && aaNVB3EstherREF.killed != 1
aaNVB3NarratorREF.SayTo Player aaNVB3EndingTopic11Esther
else
aaNVB3NarratorREF.SayTo Player aaNVB3EndingTopic12bThorne
endif
{Dead}In spite of his resilience, Cooper eventually fell victim to the violence that engulfed the Deep Creek Mountains.
ESP.TRADUIT: {死了}尽管库珀很有韧性，但他最终还是成为吞没了深溪山脉的暴力的牺牲品。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dick from Management [0407098B] (mod) Quest : ([040675DB]aaNVB3Ending) Ending Slideshow EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaNVB3NarratorVoiceType\aaNVB3Endi_aaNVB3EndingTop_00078B47_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Ending.Topic10 to 1 aaNVB3NarratorREF.SayTo Player aaNVB3EndingTopic10Coopers
It is said that a mysterious traveler buried Cooper next to his former owner, Steven Randall.
ESP.TRADUIT: 据说一位神秘的旅行者把库珀葬在了他的前主人史蒂文 兰道尔的旁边。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dick from Management [0407098B] (mod) Quest : ([040675DB]aaNVB3Ending) Ending Slideshow

ESP.ORIGINAL:
set aaNVB3Ending.Topic10 to 2
if aaNVB3EstherREF.killed == 1
aaNVB3NarratorREF.SayTo Player aaNVB3EndingTopic11Esther
elseif SomeguyMaster.EstherStatus == 2 && aaNVB3EstherREF.killed != 1
aaNVB3NarratorREF.SayTo Player aaNVB3EndingTopic11Esther
else
aaNVB3NarratorREF.SayTo Player aaNVB3EndingTopic12bThorne
endif
aaNVB3EndingTopic11Esther
ESP.TRADUIT: aaNVB3结局主题11伊瑟

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Left Alive, Jackson Alive}Esther acknowledged the Courier's mercy as an opportunity to finally turn away from her criminal past and focus on her new family.
ESP.TRADUIT: {活着，杰克逊也是}以斯帖承认邮差的仁慈，作为一个机会，她终于摆脱她的犯罪过去，专注于她的新家庭。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dick from Management [0407098B] (mod) Quest : ([040675DB]aaNVB3Ending) Ending Slideshow EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Ending.Topic11 to 1 aaNVB3NarratorREF.SayTo Player aaNVB3EndingTopic11Esther set SomeguyMaster.EstherStatus to 3
A few years after the incident at Frosthill, Esther, Jackson, and their children moved back to NCR territory, establishing a ranch near New Reno.
ESP.TRADUIT: 霜地事件发生的几年后，以斯帖、杰克逊和他们的孩子搬回了NCR地区，在新里诺附近建立了一个牧场。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dick from Management [0407098B] (mod) Quest : ([040675DB]aaNVB3Ending) Ending Slideshow

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Ending.Topic11 to 2 aaNVB3NarratorREF.SayTo Player aaNVB3EndingTopic11Esther
One of their sons would go on to be a respected lawman and judge, never knowing about his parents' history.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们的一个儿子将成为一个受人尊敬的律师和法官，并永远不知道他父母的过去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dick from Management [0407098B] (mod) Quest : ([040675DB]aaNVB3Ending) Ending Slideshow

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Ending.Topic11 to 3 aaNVB3NarratorREF.SayTo Player aaNVB3EndingTopic12bThorne
{Left Alive, Jackson Dead}With her partner dead, Esther struggled to keep the ranch in working order, and nearly died delivering her child alone.
ESP.TRADUIT: {活着，但杰克逊死了}她的伴侣死了，以斯帖挣扎着维持牧场的正常运转，差点独自分娩自己的孩子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dick from Management [0407098B] (mod) Quest : ([040675DB]aaNVB3Ending) Ending Slideshow EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Ending.Topic11 to 1 aaNVB3NarratorREF.SayTo Player aaNVB3EndingTopic11Esther set SomeguyMaster.EstherStatus to 4
In spite of poverty and deprivation, Esther managed to eke out a living and provide for her son.
ESP.TRADUIT: 尽管贫穷贫穷，伊瑟设法维持生计，养活她的儿子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dick from Management [0407098B] (mod) Quest : ([040675DB]aaNVB3Ending) Ending Slideshow EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Ending.Topic11 to 2 aaNVB3NarratorREF.SayTo Player aaNVB3EndingTopic11Esther
Over the years she indoctrinated her son with a singular hatred for the Courier, so that he might seek vengeance when he came of age.
ESP.TRADUIT: 多年来，她给儿子灌输了一种对邮差的极度仇恨，这样他长大后就会去向邮差寻仇。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dick from Management [0407098B] (mod) Quest : ([040675DB]aaNVB3Ending) Ending Slideshow EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Ending.Topic11 to 3 aaNVB3NarratorREF.SayTo Player aaNVB3EndingTopic12bThorne
{Dead}Word of Esther's death reverberated through the wasteland, but so did rumors of the Courier's involvement.
ESP.TRADUIT: {死了}伊瑟死去的消息在废土上回荡着，但邮差参与的传闻也是如此。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dick from Management [0407098B] (mod) Quest : ([040675DB]aaNVB3Ending) Ending Slideshow EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Ending.Topic11 to 1 aaNVB3NarratorREF.SayTo Player aaNVB3EndingTopic11Esther
When bounty hunters and other vigilantes heard that the Courier was a child killer, some of them set out to deliver their own brand of justice.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当赏金猎人和其他义务警员听说邮差是一个儿童杀手时，他们中的一些人开始传递他们自己的正义。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dick from Management [0407098B] (mod) Quest : ([040675DB]aaNVB3Ending) Ending Slideshow EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Ending.Topic11 to 2 aaNVB3NarratorREF.SayTo Player aaNVB3EndingTopic12bThorne
aaNVB3EndingTopic12Glanton
ESP.TRADUIT: aaNVB3格兰顿结局12

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Killed}In spite of his best efforts to evade the Courier, Glanton finally met his end deep inside Knifepoint Cavern.
ESP.TRADUIT: {被杀死}尽管他尽了最大努力躲开邮差，格兰顿终于还是在刀尖山洞中找到了他的归宿。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dick from Management [0407098B] (mod) Quest : ([040675DB]aaNVB3Ending) Ending Slideshow EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaNVB3NarratorVoiceType\aaNVB3Endi_aaNVB3EndingTop_00078B4E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Ending.Topic12 to 1 aaNVB3NarratorREF.SayTo Player aaNVB3EndingTopic12Glanton
Glanton's surviving supporters hailed him as a martyr, and soon hunted the Courier in a quest for retribution.
ESP.TRADUIT: 格兰顿幸存的支持者们称他为烈士，并很快开始追捕邮差来寻求报复。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dick from Management [0407098B] (mod) Quest : ([040675DB]aaNVB3Ending) Ending Slideshow EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaNVB3NarratorVoiceType\aaNVB3Endi_aaNVB3EndingTop_0007DA05_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Ending.Topic12 to 1 aaNVB3NarratorREF.SayTo Player aaNVB3EndingTopic13Marko
{Left Alive, goes to Mexico}Avoiding the Courier once again, Glanton found himself alone in a hostile country, so he set his sights toward the arid expanse of Old Mexico.
ESP.TRADUIT: {活着，去了墨西哥}再次避开邮差，格兰顿发现自己独自一人身处在一个敌对的国家，所以他把目光投向了干旱广阔的旧墨西哥。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dick from Management [0407098B] (mod) Quest : ([040675DB]aaNVB3Ending) Ending Slideshow EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaNVB3NarratorVoiceType\aaNVB3Endi_aaNVB3EndingTop_00078B4F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Ending.Topic12 to 1 aaNVB3NarratorREF.SayTo Player aaNVB3EndingTopic12Glanton
He had heard stories of a tribal warlord, El Quemador, who ruled the distant dunes of the Altar Desert, burning all who encroached in his lands.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他听说了一个部落的军阀，埃尔 奎马多，他统治着圣坛沙漠遥远的沙丘，并烧掉了所有侵占他的土地的人。（El Quemador为mod作者的另一著作：The Man From Old Mexico中的组织头目）
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dick from Management [0407098B] (mod) Quest : ([040675DB]aaNVB3Ending) Ending Slideshow

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Ending.Topic12 to 2 aaNVB3NarratorREF.SayTo Player aaNVB3EndingTopic12Glanton
Sensing an opportunity to redeem himself in the eyes of the NCR, Glanton headed south with one goal: to take El Quemador's scalp.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在NCR的眼皮下，格兰顿感觉到了一个自我救赎的机会，于是他带着一个任务南下：去拿下埃尔·奎马多的头皮。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dick from Management [0407098B] (mod) Quest : ([040675DB]aaNVB3Ending) Ending Slideshow

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Ending.Topic12 to 3 aaNVB3NarratorREF.SayTo Player aaNVB3EndingTopic13Marko
aaNVB3EndingTopic13Marko
ESP.TRADUIT: aaNVB3结局主题13马克

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Dead, Town dies - mentioned children}In the end, Marko was undone by the very trait he so often touted: resolve. The Courier persevered through pain and death in order to claim victory.
ESP.TRADUIT: {死了，小镇也变是-孩子们提到}最后，马尔科被他经常吹捧的特质：决心给毁了。为了取得胜利，邮差忍受了痛苦和死亡。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dick from Management [0407098B] (mod) Quest : ([040675DB]aaNVB3Ending) Ending Slideshow EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaNVB3NarratorVoiceType\aaNVB3Endi_aaNVB3EndingTop_00078B50_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Ending.Topic13 to 1 aaNVB3NarratorREF.SayTo Player aaNVB3EndingTopic13Marko set SomeguyMaster.MarkoStatus to 1
Without his strong leadership, the NCR outpost at Frosthill floundered. Once the 80's resumed their raids, the town was abandoned.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没有他强有力的领导，在霜地的NCR前哨站只能挣扎求生。一旦80年代帮重新开始突袭，这个城镇就会被彻底遗弃。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dick from Management [0407098B] (mod) Quest : ([040675DB]aaNVB3Ending) Ending Slideshow

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Ending.Topic13 to 2 aaNVB3NarratorREF.SayTo Player aaNVB3EndingTopic13Marko
Even after his death, Marko's name incurred fear and dread whenever it was muttered. His body had perished, but the legend endured.
ESP.TRADUIT: 即使在马尔科死后，每当人们听到有人咕哝他的名字时，他们也会感到恐惧和恐惧。即便他的身体已经消亡了，但这个可怕的传说仍然存在。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dick from Management [0407098B] (mod) Quest : ([040675DB]aaNVB3Ending) Ending Slideshow

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Ending.Topic13 to 3 aaNVB3NarratorREF.SayTo Player aaNVB3EndingTopic14END
{Alive, Town thrives - mentioned children}When Marko heard that the Courier had survived, he appeared stoic, but inwardly... he couldn't help but smile at the Courier's good fortune.
ESP.TRADUIT: {活着，小镇繁荣发展-孩子们提到}当马尔科听说邮差活下来的时候，他显得很坚忍，但内心深处...他对邮差的好运忍不住笑了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dick from Management [0407098B] (mod) Quest : ([040675DB]aaNVB3Ending) Ending Slideshow EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaNVB3NarratorVoiceType\aaNVB3Endi_aaNVB3EndingTop_00078B51_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Ending.Topic13 to 1 aaNVB3NarratorREF.SayTo Player aaNVB3EndingTopic13Marko set SomeguyMaster.MarkoStatus to 2
Forsaking any further acts of vengeance against the Courier, Marko turned his focus toward rebuilding and safeguarding Frosthill.
ESP.TRADUIT: 马尔科放弃了对邮差的任何进一步报复行动，而将注意力转向重建和保护霜地。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dick from Management [0407098B] (mod) Quest : ([040675DB]aaNVB3Ending) Ending Slideshow EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaNVB3NarratorVoiceType\aaNVB3Endi_aaNVB3EndingTop_0007DA0C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Ending.Topic13 to 2 aaNVB3NarratorREF.SayTo Player aaNVB3EndingTopic13Marko
So long as the man in black ran Frosthill, few raiders or outlaws had the temerity to tread in the surrounding mountains. Those that did... suffered.
ESP.TRADUIT: 只要那个穿黑衣的人跑进霜地，很少会有歹徒或不法分子敢在周围的山上乱来。那些胆敢做的。。。都死了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dick from Management [0407098B] (mod) Quest : ([040675DB]aaNVB3Ending) Ending Slideshow EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaNVB3NarratorVoiceType\aaNVB3Endi_aaNVB3EndingTop_0007DA0D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Ending.Topic13 to 3 aaNVB3NarratorREF.SayTo Player aaNVB3EndingTopic13Marko
Frosthill soon flourished, invigorated by waves of new settlers. In spite of this, Marko struggled to repress the malign urges in his being.
ESP.TRADUIT: 霜地很快繁荣起来，新移民的浪潮给它带来了活力。尽管如此，马尔科仍然努力抑制自己内心的恶意冲动。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dick from Management [0407098B] (mod) Quest : ([040675DB]aaNVB3Ending) Ending Slideshow EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaNVB3NarratorVoiceType\aaNVB3Endi_aaNVB3EndingTop_0007DA0E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Ending.Topic13 to 4 aaNVB3NarratorREF.SayTo Player aaNVB3EndingTopic13Marko
He married, raised children, and became recognized as a shrewd leader. Nonetheless, as time went on the wanderlust steadily took hold of him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他结了婚，养了孩子，成了公认的精明领袖。尽管如此，随着时间的推移，漫游癖还是牢牢地抓住了他的内心。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dick from Management [0407098B] (mod) Quest : ([040675DB]aaNVB3Ending) Ending Slideshow EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaNVB3NarratorVoiceType\aaNVB3Endi_aaNVB3EndingTop_0007DA0F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Ending.Topic13 to 5 aaNVB3NarratorREF.SayTo Player aaNVB3EndingTopic13Marko
Over a decade after taking control of the town, Marko inexplicably vanished, supposedly gone to the west, though no one was certain.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在控制了这座城市十多年后，马尔科莫名其妙地消失了，据说他去了西部，尽管没有人确定。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dick from Management [0407098B] (mod) Quest : ([040675DB]aaNVB3Ending) Ending Slideshow EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaNVB3NarratorVoiceType\aaNVB3Endi_aaNVB3EndingTop_0007DA10_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Ending.Topic13 to 6 aaNVB3NarratorREF.SayTo Player aaNVB3EndingTopic13Marko
The prevailing theory was that he had sought out the Courier, hoping to settle their old score with a duel.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当时流行的说法是他找到了邮差，希望用决斗来解决他们的旧问题。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dick from Management [0407098B] (mod) Quest : ([040675DB]aaNVB3Ending) Ending Slideshow EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaNVB3NarratorVoiceType\aaNVB3Endi_aaNVB3EndingTop_0007DA11_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Ending.Topic13 to 7 aaNVB3NarratorREF.SayTo Player aaNVB3EndingTopic14END
aaNVB3EndingTopic14END
ESP.TRADUIT: aaNVB3结局主题14结局

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Ending - Courier killed Marko, MALE}Despite Marko's best-laid plans, the Courier battled back from the brink of death and prevailed in the legendary duel.
ESP.TRADUIT: {结局-男性邮差杀死了马尔科}尽管马尔科有最好的计划，邮差还是从死亡边缘绝境反击，并在传奇的决斗中获胜。
