ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dick from Management [0407098B] (mod) Quest : ([040675DB]aaNVB3Ending) Ending Slideshow EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaNVB3NarratorVoiceType\aaNVB3Endi_aaNVB3EndingTop_00078B52_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Ending.Topic14 to 1 aaNVB3NarratorREF.SayTo Player aaNVB3EndingTopic14END
Though Marko was dead, the Courier had not emerged from the contest unscathed. He would bear physical and mental scars for the rest of his life.
ESP.TRADUIT: 虽然马尔科死了，但邮差也没有能毫发无损地从死斗中抽身。他将在余生中承受身体和精神上的创伤。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dick from Management [0407098B] (mod) Quest : ([040675DB]aaNVB3Ending) Ending Slideshow

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Ending.Topic14 to 2 aaNVB3NarratorREF.SayTo Player aaNVB3EndingTopic14END
Quietly enduring his injuries, he steadily limped back to the Mojave Wasteland, where uncertainty... and war... awaited him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他静静地忍受着伤痛，一瘸一拐地回到莫哈维废土，因为那里充满了不确定性。。。还有战争。。。等着他去终结。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dick from Management [0407098B] (mod) Quest : ([040675DB]aaNVB3Ending) Ending Slideshow

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Ending - Courier killed Marko, FEMALE}Despite Marko's best-laid plans, the Courier battled back from the brink of death and prevailed in the legendary duel.
ESP.TRADUIT: {结局-女性邮差杀死了马尔科}尽管马尔科有最好的计划，邮差还是从死亡边缘绝境反击，并在传奇的决斗中获胜。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dick from Management [0407098B] (mod) Quest : ([040675DB]aaNVB3Ending) Ending Slideshow EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaNVB3NarratorVoiceType\aaNVB3Endi_aaNVB3EndingTop_00078B54_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Ending.Topic14 to 1 aaNVB3NarratorREF.SayTo Player aaNVB3EndingTopic14END
Though Marko was dead, the Courier had not emerged from the contest unscathed. She would bear physical and mental scars for the rest of her life.
ESP.TRADUIT: 虽然马尔科死了，但邮差也没有能毫发无损地从死斗中抽身。她将在余生中承受身体和精神上的创伤。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dick from Management [0407098B] (mod) Quest : ([040675DB]aaNVB3Ending) Ending Slideshow

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Ending.Topic14 to 2 aaNVB3NarratorREF.SayTo Player aaNVB3EndingTopic14END
Quietly enduring her injuries, she steadily limped back to the Mojave Wasteland, where uncertainty... and war... awaited her.
ESP.TRADUIT: 她静静地忍受着伤痛，一瘸一拐地回到莫哈维废土，因为那里充满了不确定性。。。还有战争。。。等着她去终结。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dick from Management [0407098B] (mod) Quest : ([040675DB]aaNVB3Ending) Ending Slideshow

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Ending - Courier left Marko alive, MALE}Whether through practical self-interest or in an admission of defeat, the Courier decided to forego a final confrontation with Marko.
ESP.TRADUIT: {结局-男性邮差让马尔科活着离开}无论是出于实际的自利还是承认自己的失败，邮差决定放弃与马尔科的最后对抗。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dick from Management [0407098B] (mod) Quest : ([040675DB]aaNVB3Ending) Ending Slideshow EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaNVB3NarratorVoiceType\aaNVB3Endi_aaNVB3EndingTop_00078B53_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Ending.Topic14 to 1 aaNVB3NarratorREF.SayTo Player aaNVB3EndingTopic14END
Once word of the Courier's defeat spread, many began to see him as broken, or even cowardly.
ESP.TRADUIT: 邮差失败的消息一传开，许多人就开始认为他是个失败者，甚至是个懦夫。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dick from Management [0407098B] (mod) Quest : ([040675DB]aaNVB3Ending) Ending Slideshow EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaNVB3NarratorVoiceType\aaNVB3Endi_aaNVB3EndingTop_0007DA16_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Ending.Topic14 to 2 aaNVB3NarratorREF.SayTo Player aaNVB3EndingTopic14END
These insults may have compounded the Courier's guilt concerning the incident at Frosthill, but it mattered little... because he was alive.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这些侮辱可能加重了邮差对霜地事件的罪责，但这无关紧要...因为他还活着。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dick from Management [0407098B] (mod) Quest : ([040675DB]aaNVB3Ending) Ending Slideshow EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaNVB3NarratorVoiceType\aaNVB3Endi_aaNVB3EndingTop_0007DA17_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Ending.Topic14 to 3 aaNVB3NarratorREF.SayTo Player aaNVB3EndingTopic14END
Eventually the events in Utah would be overshadowed by the contest for Hoover Dam... where the Courier's legend would finally be decided.
ESP.TRADUIT: 最终犹他州的这场死斗将被胡佛水坝的决战所掩盖。。。邮差的传说的落幕将在那里被决定。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dick from Management [0407098B] (mod) Quest : ([040675DB]aaNVB3Ending) Ending Slideshow EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaNVB3NarratorVoiceType\aaNVB3Endi_aaNVB3EndingTop_0007DA18_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Ending - Courier left Marko alive, FEMALE}Whether through practical self-interest or in an admission of defeat, the Courier decided to forego a final confrontation with Marko.
ESP.TRADUIT: {结局-女性邮差让马尔科活着离开}无论是出于实际的自利还是承认自己的失败，邮差决定放弃与马尔科的最后对抗。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dick from Management [0407098B] (mod) Quest : ([040675DB]aaNVB3Ending) Ending Slideshow EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaNVB3NarratorVoiceType\aaNVB3Endi_aaNVB3EndingTop_00078B55_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Ending.Topic14 to 1 aaNVB3NarratorREF.SayTo Player aaNVB3EndingTopic14END
Once word of the Courier's defeat spread, many began to see her as broken, or even cowardly.
ESP.TRADUIT: 邮差失败的消息一传开，许多人就开始认为她是个失败者，甚至是个懦夫。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dick from Management [0407098B] (mod) Quest : ([040675DB]aaNVB3Ending) Ending Slideshow EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaNVB3NarratorVoiceType\aaNVB3Endi_aaNVB3EndingTop_0007DA19_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Ending.Topic14 to 2 aaNVB3NarratorREF.SayTo Player aaNVB3EndingTopic14END
These insults may have compounded the Courier's guilt concerning the incident at Frosthill, but it mattered little... because she was alive.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这些侮辱可能加重了邮差对霜地事件的罪责，但这无关紧要...因为她还活着。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dick from Management [0407098B] (mod) Quest : ([040675DB]aaNVB3Ending) Ending Slideshow EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaNVB3NarratorVoiceType\aaNVB3Endi_aaNVB3EndingTop_0007DA1A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Ending.Topic14 to 3 aaNVB3NarratorREF.SayTo Player aaNVB3EndingTopic14END
Eventually the events in Utah would be overshadowed by the contest for Hoover Dam... where the Courier's legend would finally be decided.
ESP.TRADUIT: 最终犹他州的这场死斗将被胡佛水坝的决战所掩盖。。。邮差的传说的落幕将在那里被决定。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dick from Management [0407098B] (mod) Quest : ([040675DB]aaNVB3Ending) Ending Slideshow EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaNVB3NarratorVoiceType\aaNVB3Endi_aaNVB3EndingTop_0007DA1B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm just doing my job.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我只是在做我的工作。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's the most haggard excuse known to civilized man. You'd don't even have a legitimate profession, as far as I can tell.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是文明人所知道的最憔悴的借口。据我所知，你甚至没有合法的职业。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Frost [0406B362] (mod) Quest : ([04061050]aaNVB3Side01) The Long Arm EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaJoeFrostVoiceType\aaNVB3Side_aaNVB3Side01Fro_00073C91_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You hunt people down and execute them in an impersonal, extrajudicial fashion befitting a slaughterhouse. At least a butcher feeds people.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你以一种与屠宰场相适应的非个人的、非法的方式追捕和处决人们。至少屠夫还能养活他人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Frost [0406B362] (mod) Quest : ([04061050]aaNVB3Side01) The Long Arm EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaJoeFrostVoiceType\aaNVB3Side_aaNVB3Side01Fro_00073C91_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're incapable of creation or innovation, just a rigid, unfeeling extension of the state's will. You're not a human being. You're a tool.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你无法创造或创新，只能当做是国家意志的僵化、无情的延伸。你甚至不是个人。你只是个工具。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Frost [0406B362] (mod) Quest : ([04061050]aaNVB3Side01) The Long Arm EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaJoeFrostVoiceType\aaNVB3Side_aaNVB3Side01Fro_00073C91_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I remain loyal to the NCR, whatever its flaws. You committed treason, plain and simple.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我仍然忠于NCR，不管它有什么缺陷。但现在的问题是你犯了叛国罪，简单明了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Plain and simple aptly describes your line of thinking. I suppose the weight of complex moral questions is too much for your fragile mind to bear.
ESP.TRADUIT: 简单明了，这恰当地描述了你的思维方式。我想复杂的道德问题对你脆弱的心灵来说太过沉重了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Frost [0406B362] (mod) Quest : ([04061050]aaNVB3Side01) The Long Arm EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaJoeFrostVoiceType\aaNVB3Side_aaNVB3Side01Fro_00073C92_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, you're a perfect example of everything the NCR is looking for in its subjects. Unwavering obedience, turning a blind eye to every malfeasance.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，你是NCR在其主题中所寻找的一切的完美例子。看看这坚定不移的服从，对每一个渎职行为都视而不见。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Frost [0406B362] (mod) Quest : ([04061050]aaNVB3Side01) The Long Arm EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaJoeFrostVoiceType\aaNVB3Side_aaNVB3Side01Fro_00073C92_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Enjoy this new republic. The one I knew is long dead.
ESP.TRADUIT: 享受这个新共和国吧。因为我认识的那个早就死了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Frost [0406B362] (mod) Quest : ([04061050]aaNVB3Side01) The Long Arm EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaJoeFrostVoiceType\aaNVB3Side_aaNVB3Side01Fro_00073C92_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll consider letting you live... for now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会考虑让你活着。。。至少现在。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good to know that my very life or death will be determined by your moral compass. This truly is the worst of all possible worlds.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很高兴知道我的生死将由你的道德指南针来决定。但这确实是所有可能的世界中最糟糕的那一个。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Frost [0406B362] (mod) Quest : ([04061050]aaNVB3Side01) The Long Arm EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaJoeFrostVoiceType\aaNVB3Side_aaNVB3Side01Fro_00073C90_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Close your eyes. I'll make it quick. <Attack>
ESP.TRADUIT: 闭上眼睛。我会让你马上解脱的。<攻击>

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, no!
ESP.TRADUIT: 不！不要！！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Frost [0406B362] (mod) Quest : ([04061050]aaNVB3Side01) The Long Arm EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaJoeFrostVoiceType\aaNVB3Side_aaNVB3Side01Fro_00073C93_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaJoeFrostREF.startcombat player aaJoeFrostREF.say flee
I'm gonna enjoy watching you bleed, traitor. <Attack>
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会很高兴看到你流血的，叛徒。<攻击>

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, no!
ESP.TRADUIT: 不！不要！！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Frost [0406B362] (mod) Quest : ([04061050]aaNVB3Side01) The Long Arm EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaJoeFrostVoiceType\aaNVB3Side_aaNVB3Side01Fro_00073C94_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaJoeFrostREF.startcombat player aaJoeFrostREF.say flee
aaNVB3EndingTopic12bThorne
ESP.TRADUIT: aaNVB3结局主题12索恩

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Doesn't go home, resumed work with Followers}Just north of the Mojave, Thorne said his goodbyes to the Courier and headed towards the setting sun.
ESP.TRADUIT: {没有回家，继续与追随者工作}就在莫哈维北部，索恩向邮差道别，朝着落日走去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dick from Management [0407098B] (mod) Quest : ([040675DB]aaNVB3Ending) Ending Slideshow EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaNVB3NarratorVoiceType\aaNVB3Endi_aaNVB3EndingTop_00078B4B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Ending.Topic12bThorne to 1 aaNVB3NarratorREF.SayTo Player aaNVB3EndingTopic12bThorne
Unwilling to return to his home, Thorne decided he would reconnect with the Followers of the Apocalypse and renew his career in medicine.
ESP.TRADUIT: 索恩不愿回到自己的家，所以他决定与天启追随者重新联系，重新开始他的医学生涯。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dick from Management [0407098B] (mod) Quest : ([040675DB]aaNVB3Ending) Ending Slideshow

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Ending.Topic12bThorne to 2 aaNVB3NarratorREF.SayTo Player aaNVB3EndingTopic12bThorne
By assisting the helpless and healing the infirm, Thorne was able to move past the events at Frosthill. He prayed that the Courier could do the same.
ESP.TRADUIT: 通过帮助无助的人和治愈体弱的人，索恩得以抚平了霜地事件的伤痕。他祈祷邮差也能挺过去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dick from Management [0407098B] (mod) Quest : ([040675DB]aaNVB3Ending) Ending Slideshow

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Ending.Topic12bThorne to 3 aaNVB3NarratorREF.SayTo Player aaNVB3EndingTopic12cBrookshire
{Goes home, starts practice}Just north of the Mojave, Thorne said his goodbyes to the Courier and headed towards the setting sun.
ESP.TRADUIT: {回家，开始练习}就在莫哈维北部，索恩向邮差道别，朝着落日走去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dick from Management [0407098B] (mod) Quest : ([040675DB]aaNVB3Ending) Ending Slideshow EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaNVB3NarratorVoiceType\aaNVB3Endi_aaNVB3EndingTop_00078B4C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Ending.Topic12bThorne to 1 aaNVB3NarratorREF.SayTo Player aaNVB3EndingTopic12bThorne
Taking the Courier's guidance to heart, Thorne headed back to Hayfork and enjoyed a cathartic reunion with his relatives.
ESP.TRADUIT: 带着快递员的指引，索恩回到了海福克，和他的亲戚们享受了一次宣泄般的团聚。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dick from Management [0407098B] (mod) Quest : ([040675DB]aaNVB3Ending) Ending Slideshow

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Ending.Topic12bThorne to 2 aaNVB3NarratorREF.SayTo Player aaNVB3EndingTopic12bThorne
Soon thereafter Thorne married and established a medical practice, serving the community of Hayfork for generations.
ESP.TRADUIT: 此后不久，索恩结婚并建立了一个医疗机构，为海福克社区服务了几代人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dick from Management [0407098B] (mod) Quest : ([040675DB]aaNVB3Ending) Ending Slideshow

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Ending.Topic12bThorne to 3 aaNVB3NarratorREF.SayTo Player aaNVB3EndingTopic12bThorne
Thanks to the support of his family, Thorne was able to move past the events at Frosthill. He prayed that the Courier would do the same.
ESP.TRADUIT: 多亏了家人的支持，索恩得以从霜地的事件中走过去。他祈祷信使也能挺过这一切。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dick from Management [0407098B] (mod) Quest : ([040675DB]aaNVB3Ending) Ending Slideshow

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Ending.Topic12bThorne to 4 aaNVB3NarratorREF.SayTo Player aaNVB3EndingTopic12cBrookshire
aaNVB3EndingTopic12cBrookshire
ESP.TRADUIT: aaNVB3结局主题12布鲁克希尔

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Goes to Mojave, gets promoted, working at NCR Embassy}Fresh off his successful operation to annex the Deep Creek Mountains, Brookshire was warmly received by his superiors at the NCR Embassy.
ESP.TRADUIT: {来到莫哈维，升职，在NCR大使馆工作}刚刚完成了吞并深溪山脉的成功行动，布鲁克希尔就受到NCR大使馆上级的热烈欢迎。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dick from Management [0407098B] (mod) Quest : ([040675DB]aaNVB3Ending) Ending Slideshow EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaNVB3NarratorVoiceType\aaNVB3Endi_aaNVB3EndingTop_00078B4D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Ending.Topic12cBrookshire to 1 aaNVB3NarratorREF.SayTo Player aaNVB3EndingTopic12cBrookshire
After he ferried the surviving orphans of Frosthill to state homes, Brookshire quietly filed a report that classified the Courier as MIA.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在他把霜地幸存的孤儿送到州立医院后，布鲁克希尔悄悄地提交了一份报告，将这名邮差归类为MIA（在行动中失踪的武装人员）。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dick from Management [0407098B] (mod) Quest : ([040675DB]aaNVB3Ending) Ending Slideshow EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaNVB3NarratorVoiceType\aaNVB3Endi_aaNVB3EndingTop_0007DA09_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Ending.Topic12cBrookshire to 2 aaNVB3NarratorREF.SayTo Player aaNVB3EndingTopic12cBrookshire
For his efforts, he was awarded with a promotion and a special commendation. His agency's director would call him "A model for us all."
ESP.TRADUIT: 由于他的努力，他获得了晋升和特别嘉奖。他的机构主管称他为“我们大家的榜样”
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dick from Management [0407098B] (mod) Quest : ([040675DB]aaNVB3Ending) Ending Slideshow

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Ending.Topic12cBrookshire to 3 aaNVB3NarratorREF.SayTo Player aaNVB3EndingTopic12cBrookshire
Brookshire then planned his next operation from within the embassy, confident of his success, never considering that the Courier might return.
ESP.TRADUIT: 随后，布鲁克希尔从大使馆内部计划了他的下一次行动，他对自己的成功充满信心，从未想过邮差可能会回来寻仇。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dick from Management [0407098B] (mod) Quest : ([040675DB]aaNVB3Ending) Ending Slideshow

ESP.ORIGINAL:
set aaNVB3Ending.Topic12cBrookshire to 4
if (SomeguyMaster.MartinStatus == 10) && (aaNVB3GlantonREF.killed != 1); Glanton killed in Russell; aaNVB3NarratorREF.SayTo Player aaNVB3EndingTopic13Marko else aaNVB3NarratorREF.SayTo Player aaNVB3EndingTopic12Glanton endif
Beg if you want, pray if you think it will help. Nothing will save you now. <Attack>
ESP.TRADUIT: 乞求我的仁慈吧，如果你想的话，只要你认为它会有帮助的话，就祈祷吧。因为现在什么也救不了你了。<攻击>

ESP.ORIGINAL: Shit!
ESP.TRADUIT: 该死！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brookshire [0402E666] (mod) Quest : ([04029364]aaHunterDialogue) Dialogue for Named Bounty Hunters EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaNVB3GenericVoiceType\aaHunterDi_aaBrookshireFIN_00084A11_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaBrookshireREF.startcombat player
You think you're safe here? I'd kill you in front of the president, you slimy fuck. <Attack>
ESP.TRADUIT: 你觉得你在这里安全吗？我会在总统面前折磨你的，你这个愚蠢的混蛋。<攻击>

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, no!
ESP.TRADUIT: 不！不要！！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brookshire [0402E666] (mod) Quest : ([04029364]aaHunterDialogue) Dialogue for Named Bounty Hunters EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaNVB3GenericVoiceType\aaHunterDi_aaBrookshireFIN_00084A10_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaBrookshireREF.startcombat player
What kind of things?
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么东西？

ESP.ORIGINAL: We're planning something that could end this war... hits the Legion in their own backyard! You could be the instrument of our victory.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们正在计划结束这场战争。。。在军团自己的后院袭击他们！而你可以成为我们胜利的促成者。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brookshire [0402E666] (mod) Quest : ([04029364]aaHunterDialogue) Dialogue for Named Bounty Hunters EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaNVB3GenericVoiceType\aaHunterDi_aaBrookshireFIN_00083CC7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Legion is doing their best to suppress it, but we believe there's a slave rebellion going on right now... outside Flagstaff.
ESP.TRADUIT: 虽然军团正在尽全力镇压它，但我们相信现在那里有一场奴隶叛乱正在进行。。。就在弗拉格斯塔夫外面。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brookshire [0402E666] (mod) Quest : ([04029364]aaHunterDialogue) Dialogue for Named Bounty Hunters EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaNVB3GenericVoiceType\aaHunterDi_aaBrookshireFIN_00083CC7_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let me go, and I promise you a spot in the most audacious covert operation ever attempted. Do we have a deal?
ESP.TRADUIT: 让我走吧，我向你保证，这会是有史以来最大胆的秘密行动的。我们达成共识了么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brookshire [0402E666] (mod) Quest : ([04029364]aaHunterDialogue) Dialogue for Named Bounty Hunters EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaNVB3GenericVoiceType\aaHunterDi_aaBrookshireFIN_00083CC7_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You broke your word, and you left an entire town to be butchered. You're finished. <Attack>
ESP.TRADUIT: 你违背了我们的诺言，眼睁睁看着一整座城镇被屠杀。你被终结了。<攻击>

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, you can't do this!
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，你不能这样做！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brookshire [0402E666] (mod) Quest : ([04029364]aaHunterDialogue) Dialogue for Named Bounty Hunters EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaNVB3GenericVoiceType\aaHunterDi_aaBrookshireFIN_00084A0F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaBrookshireREF.startcombat player
Why did you do it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你为什么要这么做？

ESP.ORIGINAL: You think it was easy, cutting a deal with a purported psychopath, letting a town get wiped out? It wasn't, but I did what was best for the NCR.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你认为和一个所谓的精神病患者达成协议很容易，让一个城镇被屠戮殆尽？那可不简单!但我做了对NCR来说最好的事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brookshire [0402E666] (mod) Quest : ([04029364]aaHunterDialogue) Dialogue for Named Bounty Hunters EmotionType : Puzzled Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaNVB3GenericVoiceType\aaHunterDi_aaBrookshireFIN_00084A12_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We're fighting a war. Wars cost money. Since the Brotherhood zapped our gold, we've been scrambling for precious metals.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们在打仗。而战争要花钱。自从兄弟会抢走我们的黄金以来，我们一直都在争夺着贵金属。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brookshire [0402E666] (mod) Quest : ([04029364]aaHunterDialogue) Dialogue for Named Bounty Hunters EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaNVB3GenericVoiceType\aaHunterDi_aaBrookshireFIN_00084A12_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's probably more silver up in there than in ten Silverwoods! Do you know how many weapons that will buy? How many troopers it will save?
ESP.TRADUIT: 山上面的银矿可能比十个银林里的银矿还多！你知道这会让我们购买到多少武器吗？你知道它能拯救多少士兵吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brookshire [0402E666] (mod) Quest : ([04029364]aaHunterDialogue) Dialogue for Named Bounty Hunters EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaNVB3GenericVoiceType\aaHunterDi_aaBrookshireFIN_00084A12_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I would've sacrificed a division if it meant holding those mountains, even if it was just a trading outpost.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果这意味着我要守住那些山，即使那只是一个贸易前哨，我也会愿意牺牲一个师的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brookshire [0402E666] (mod) Quest : ([04029364]aaHunterDialogue) Dialogue for Named Bounty Hunters EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaNVB3GenericVoiceType\aaHunterDi_aaBrookshireFIN_00084A12_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Giving up you and Randall wasn't a choice, it was an obligation.
ESP.TRADUIT: 放弃你和兰道尔不是一种选择，而是一种义务。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brookshire [0402E666] (mod) Quest : ([04029364]aaHunterDialogue) Dialogue for Named Bounty Hunters EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaNVB3GenericVoiceType\aaHunterDi_aaBrookshireFIN_00084A12_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Walk out of here, and never come back.
ESP.TRADUIT: 离开这里，再也不要回来了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: A wise decision. You'll never see me again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 明智的决定。你再也见不到我了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brookshire [0402E666] (mod) Quest : ([04029364]aaHunterDialogue) Dialogue for Named Bounty Hunters EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaNVB3GenericVoiceType\aaHunterDi_aaBrookshireFIN_00083CC9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.additem caps001 10000
showmessage aaBrookshireLeftMessage aaBrookshireREF.disable aaBrookshireREF.markfordelete set Someguymaster.Undefined02 to 2
aaSEMojaveBomberBark
ESP.TRADUIT: aaSE莫哈维炸弹客大叫

ESP.ORIGINAL: Stand aside, I got a special delivery from Utah!
ESP.TRADUIT: 躲开，我从犹他州那里收到了一份特快专递！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Courier [0407EDD7] (mod) Quest : ([0408572A]aaNVB3MiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaNVB3Misc_aaSEMojaveBombe_0007EDCA_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Stand aside, I got a special delivery from Utah!
ESP.TRADUIT: 躲开，我从犹他州那里收到了一份特快专递！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Courier [0407EDC7] (mod) Quest : ([0408572A]aaNVB3MiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaNVB3Misc_aaSEMojaveBombe_0007EDDA_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Stand aside, I got a special delivery from Utah!
ESP.TRADUIT: 躲开，我从犹他州那里收到了一份特快专递！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Courier [0407EDD0] (mod) Quest : ([0408572A]aaNVB3MiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaNVB3Misc_aaSEMojaveBombe_0007EDD3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you have for sale?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你这卖些什么呢？

ESP.ORIGINAL: A little bit of everything. Here's what I have.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这有一点点，那有一点点。这是我有的东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stoudenmire [04028659] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaStoudenmireVoiceType\aaFrosthil_aaStoudenmireBu_00081BFB_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: showbartermenu
aaStoudenmireYourStory
ESP.TRADUIT: aa斯塔登迈尔你的故事

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fucking bear chased me here, same as damn near everyone else. Would you believe I was in their army? I was a fucking patriot, no less.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那该死的熊把我追到这里的，和其他人一样。你相信我曾在他们的军队服役过吗？我居然是个该死的爱国者。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stoudenmire [04028659] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaStoudenmireVoiceType\aaFrosthil_aaStoudenmireYo_00081C0F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Back home... funny, I still call it home now... everybody waves the flag and roots for the troops, but they don't know the truth of it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 回到家。。。好笑，我现在还是叫它回家。。。每个人都会为部队挥舞旗帜和扎根于此，但他们不知道真相是什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stoudenmire [04028659] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaStoudenmireVoiceType\aaFrosthil_aaStoudenmireYo_00081C0F_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Seen enough of war to know that nations are just an extension of a man's worst impulses. Control, greed, hate. That's what fuels the machine.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当你看够了战争，才知道国家只是人类最坏的冲动的延伸物罢了。控制，贪婪，仇恨。这就是国家机器的燃料。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stoudenmire [04028659] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaStoudenmireVoiceType\aaFrosthil_aaStoudenmireYo_00081C0F_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Did things I regret... told myself I was doing it for my country, made me go to sleep easier, but it didn't stop the nightmares. Only time does that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我做了让我后悔的事...告诉自己我是为国家做的，这才能让我更容易入睡，但这并没有阻止噩梦。也许只有时间才能做到吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stoudenmire [04028659] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaStoudenmireVoiceType\aaFrosthil_aaStoudenmireYo_00081C0F_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaFrosthillDialogue.StoudenmireStory to 1
What brought you to Frosthill?
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么把你带到了霜地？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Years ago I was a radioman in the bear's army, took part in dozens of operations in multiple theaters. It was bloody business.
ESP.TRADUIT: 几年前，我是熊军团的一名无线电兵，在多家影院参加了数十次行动。这是一桩血淋淋的生意。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stoudenmire [04028659] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaStoudenmireVoiceType\aaFrosthil_aaStoudenmireYo_00084370_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Probably would've stayed in for twenty if things hadn't gotten all fucked up. We got a new captain during one campaign, an absolute fuckwit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果事情没有搞砸的话，我可能会在那儿呆上20年。我们在一次战役中换了一个新队长，他是一个十足的混蛋。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stoudenmire [04028659] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaStoudenmireVoiceType\aaFrosthil_aaStoudenmireYo_00084370_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: During one sweep the psycho fuck of a CO ordered my unit to wipe out tribal kiddies. I was the one who would relay the order, so I refused.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在一次扫荡中，那个变态的混蛋命令我的部队消灭部落的孩子。是我接手的这条命令，所以我拒绝了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stoudenmire [04028659] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaStoudenmireVoiceType\aaFrosthil_aaStoudenmireYo_00084370_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: In principle, you have the right to refuse an unlawful order, but in practice? Saying no to an officer is a ticket to the clink or a firing squad.
ESP.TRADUIT: 原则上，你有权拒绝非法命令，但实际上呢？对长官说“不”是去监狱或行刑队的入场券。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stoudenmire [04028659] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaStoudenmireVoiceType\aaFrosthil_aaStoudenmireYo_00084370_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: CO pulled a pistol, told me to issue the order or he'd shoot. I voiced the order on a dead mic... soon as he lowered the pistol I went for him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 队长拔出手枪，叫我下命令否则他就开枪。我不得不在一个死麦克风上发出命令。。。他一放下手枪，我就扑向了他。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stoudenmire [04028659] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaStoudenmireVoiceType\aaFrosthil_aaStoudenmireYo_00084370_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fighting is hairy enough when there ain't no loaded pistol involved, but let me tell you, that was an ordeal. He was big, damn near had me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在没有子弹的情况下，打斗已经算是可怕的了，但让我告诉你，那简直是一种折磨。他是个大块头，差点就抓住我了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stoudenmire [04028659] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaStoudenmireVoiceType\aaFrosthil_aaStoudenmireYo_00084370_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wasn't till that pistol went off in his chest that I was clear of him. He had just about choked the life out of me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 直到他胸口的手枪发出爆鸣，我才发现他已经死了。他差点把我掐死了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stoudenmire [04028659] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaStoudenmireVoiceType\aaFrosthil_aaStoudenmireYo_00084370_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There I was, a lowly corporal standing over a dead captain. I wasn't going to let some bunch of officers on a jury decide my fate.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我就在那儿，一个卑微的下士站在一个死去的上尉面前。我才不会让陪审团里的一些官员来决定我的命运呢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stoudenmire [04028659] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaStoudenmireVoiceType\aaFrosthil_aaStoudenmireYo_00084370_8.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There were bounty hunters, assassins and the like when I ran, but I got clear of them... eventually. Been here fifteen damn years.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我跑的时候有赏金猎人，刺客之类的家伙，但是我没有让他们发现。。。最终。我在这里呆了15年。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stoudenmire [04028659] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaStoudenmireVoiceType\aaFrosthil_aaStoudenmireYo_00084370_9.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaFrosthillDialogue.StoudenmireStory to 2
What did you do in the service?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在服役期间做了什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Had a wife and two daughters up here, but she up and left, said she was tired of the cold, was heading back to California. She writes sometimes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在这里有过一个妻子和两个女儿，但她起身离开了，说她受够了这里的寒冷，正在回加利福尼亚。她有时写信过来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stoudenmire [04028659] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaStoudenmireVoiceType\aaFrosthil_aaStoudenmireYo_00084372_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ol' Vermillion was head over heels for that gal of his, um, Tammy. I never had nothing like that, ours was more like a business arrangement.
ESP.TRADUIT: 老弗米利恩为他的那个叫，嗯，塔米那女孩十分认真，他是个十足的崇拜者。我从来没有过这样的经历，我们的婚姻更像是一种商业安排。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stoudenmire [04028659] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaStoudenmireVoiceType\aaFrosthil_aaStoudenmireYo_00084372_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Life is short, and kids is as close as you can get to immortality. Figured since we liked to fuck that we'd go on to the next stage of things.
ESP.TRADUIT: 人生苦短，而孩子们是最能让你接近永生的。我想既然我们喜欢做爱，我们会继续做下一阶段的事情的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stoudenmire [04028659] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaStoudenmireVoiceType\aaFrosthil_aaStoudenmireYo_00084372_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ain't romantic, but hell fire, who's got time for that sort of nonsense? Next week we could be yao guai shit or worse, so no use ruminating on it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这并不浪漫，但地狱之火，谁有时间去胡说呢？下周我们可能成了妖怪的排泄物或更糟，所以没有什么必要反省的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stoudenmire [04028659] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaStoudenmireVoiceType\aaFrosthil_aaStoudenmireYo_00084372_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaFrosthillDialogue.StoudenmireStory to 3
Do you have any family left?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你还有家人活着吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I need to get going.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我得走了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: See you later.
ESP.TRADUIT: 回头见。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stoudenmire [04028659] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaStoudenmireVoiceType\aaFrosthil_aaStoudenmireGo_00081BFC_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaDocMusgroveYourStory
I was trained by the Followers, then opened up a practice in my hometown, Bishop. It was a good life until my wife died suddenly... brain aneurysm.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我接受了追随者的训练，然后在我的家乡开设了一个诊所，叫主教。我的生活一直很好,直到我的妻子突然去世之前。。。因为脑动脉瘤。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Musgrove [040286C8] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaDocMusgroveVoiceType\aaFrosthil_aaDocMusgroveYo_00081C0A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I picked up a drinking habit not long after... it started to affect my work. One night I botched a delivery... the mother and baby died.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不久后我养成了喝酒的习惯。。。它开始影响我的工作。一天晚上我搞砸了一场分娩手术。。。母亲和婴儿死了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Musgrove [040286C8] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaDocMusgroveVoiceType\aaFrosthil_aaDocMusgroveYo_00081C0A_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was nearly lynched, surely would've been hanged or shot if I'd gone to trial. I managed to slip out of town before the sheriff could find me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我差点被私刑处死，如果我去受审也肯定会被绞死或枪毙。在治安官找到我之前，我设法溜出了镇子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Musgrove [040286C8] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaDocMusgroveVoiceType\aaFrosthil_aaDocMusgroveYo_00081C0A_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So that's what brought me here. I like to be up front about my past with any patients, sorry if that was... awkward.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以这就是我来这里的原因。我喜欢跟任何病人说我的过去，如果这让你很尴尬的话。。。抱歉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Musgrove [040286C8] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaDocMusgroveVoiceType\aaFrosthil_aaDocMusgroveYo_00081C0A_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I quit drinking years ago, so you don't have to worry about me sawing off the wrong limb or anything.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我几年前就戒酒了，所以你不用担心我会错误的锯下你的肢体。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Musgrove [040286C8] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaDocMusgroveVoiceType\aaFrosthil_aaDocMusgroveYo_00081C0A_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaFrosthillDialogue.DocStory to 1
What brought you to Frosthill?
ESP.TRADUIT: 是什么把你带到霜地的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: You have to decide that for yourself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你得自己决定。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Way to take a stand on the issue. Thanks for listening, anyway.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在这个问题上采取观望的方式吗。但无论如何，谢谢你的倾听。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cal Vermillion [04035DD4] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaVermillionVoiceType\aaFrosthil_aaVermillionCha_0008437E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You forged the chain that you wear. Make your choices and deal with the consequences.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你锻造了束缚你自己的锁链。做出了你的选择之后，你就要为选择带来的后果负责。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's putting it pretty straight, then. No hiding behind thoughts of destiny or fate. Fair enough.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那就真的是直截了当了啊。不要躲在相信天数或命运的思想后面。这很公平。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cal Vermillion [04035DD4] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaVermillionVoiceType\aaFrosthil_aaVermillionCha_0008437B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's putting it pretty straight, then. No hiding behind thoughts of destiny or fate. Fair enough.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那就真的是直截了当了啊。不要躲在相信天数或命运的思想后面。这很公平。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cal Vermillion [04035DD4] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaVermillionVoiceType\aaFrosthil_aaVermillionCha_0008437C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Paps chose.
ESP.TRADUIT: 乳头选择。（低智力）

ESP.ORIGINAL: You need to follow your instincts.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你需要相信你的直觉。

ESP.ORIGINAL: No offense, but I get so tired of those types of platitudes. "Trust your gut" and "Look within" just makes me nauseous. Fuck it, I'll just drink.
ESP.TRADUIT: 无意冒犯，但我厌倦了这些陈词滥调了。"相信你的直觉，寻求内心想法"这种话只会让我恶心罢了。去他妈的，我去喝酒算了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cal Vermillion [04035DD4] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaVermillionVoiceType\aaFrosthil_aaVermillionCha_0008437D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaVermillionChangeDeterminism
No use fretting over it, then. Even if we change paths, I suppose that's part of the package.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那就不用为它烦恼了。即使我们改变了路径，我想这也会是其中的一部分。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cal Vermillion [04035DD4] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaVermillionVoiceType\aaFrosthil_aaVermillionCha_00084379_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: A man can surely do what he wills to do, but cannot determine what he wills.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一个人当然可以做他想做的事，但不能支配他自己的意志。

ESP.ORIGINAL: No use fretting over it, then. Even if we change paths, I suppose that's part of the package.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那就不用为它烦恼了。即使我们改变了路径，我想这也会是其中的一部分。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cal Vermillion [04035DD4] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaVermillionVoiceType\aaFrosthil_aaVermillionCha_0008437A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Paps no chose.
ESP.TRADUIT: 乳头没有选择。（低智力）

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Remain Silent>
ESP.TRADUIT: <保持沉默>

ESP.ORIGINAL: And I just shared my deepest fears and doubts with an idiot. Wonderful.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我居然和一个白痴分享了我内心中最深的恐惧和怀疑。太他妈精彩了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cal Vermillion [04035DD4] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaVermillionVoiceType\aaFrosthil_aaVermillionCha_0008437F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You have a choice to stop being a pussy. There you go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你可以选择不做娘炮。我说的没错吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Asshole.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你个屁眼。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cal Vermillion [04035DD4] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaVermillionVoiceType\aaFrosthil_aaVermillionCha_00084380_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What brought you to Frosthill?
ESP.TRADUIT: 是什么把你带到了霜地？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was drawn in by the placid peaks, serene snows, and colossal canyons. Certainly you're not so credulous as to accept that fucking nicety.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我被平静的山峰、宁静的雪和巨大的峡谷所吸引。当然，你是不会那么轻信，以至于无法接受了这种他妈的美好对吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Al Swearer [04017DB2] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaFrosthil_aaAlSwearerYour_00084382_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, I care little for the gelid gusts that shrink my scrotum, nor for the blinding blizzards that bar my morning ambulation, which I hold dear.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，我不在乎那阵阵使我阴囊收缩的寒风，也不在乎那阻挡我早晨行走的令人目眩的暴风雪，我很珍视它。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Al Swearer [04017DB2] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaFrosthil_aaAlSwearerYour_00084382_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was a fucking tremendous practitioner of law, renowned as a goddamn doyen in my field, beholden to no cocksucker in existence.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我他妈是一个伟大的法律从业者，在我的领域里以一个该死的笨蛋而闻名，感谢没有任何一个混蛋在这。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Al Swearer [04017DB2] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaFrosthil_aaAlSwearerYour_00084382_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I should have been content with my station, sated with wealth and respectability, but I craved power, that awful, demonic whore.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我本应该满足于我的地位，满足于财富和体面，但我渴望权力，那个可怕的，恶魔般的婊子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Al Swearer [04017DB2] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaFrosthil_aaAlSwearerYour_00084382_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Politics... it is a poison that dashes morality, reason, and even common sense. Furthermore, the fickle masses are vengeful, flagitious beasts.
ESP.TRADUIT: 政治。。。它是一种毒药，能冲破道德、理智甚至常识。此外，变化无常的群众是复仇的、凶残的野兽。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Al Swearer [04017DB2] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaFrosthil_aaAlSwearerYour_00084382_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was sacrificed on the altar of an ochlocratic orgy, thrown to the mob after a... misstep, a mere stumble on the steps to higher order.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我被牺牲在一个赭色狂欢的祭坛上，在一次。。。失足之后，仅仅是在通往更高层次的台阶上绊倒而已。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Al Swearer [04017DB2] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaFrosthil_aaAlSwearerYour_00084382_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Animals masquerading as men pursued me, sought to mutilate my person and dissect me like fucking wild game. I would have none of it!
ESP.TRADUIT: 伪装成男人的动物追着我，试图残害我的人，像他妈的野味一样解剖我。而我一个也不要！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Al Swearer [04017DB2] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaFrosthil_aaAlSwearerYour_00084382_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now... I am a vendor of spirits, a purveyor of bottled mirth and giver of counsel. This is my station, and I am content with it. I fucking swear it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在。。。我是一个卖酒的人，一个瓶装欢乐的人，一个提供忠告的人。这是我的电台，我很满意。我发誓。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Al Swearer [04017DB2] (mod) Quest : ([040153E1]aaFrosthillDialogue) Dialogue for Frosthill NPC's

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaFrosthillDialogue.AlStory to 1
Why did you get into bounty hunting?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你为什么要涉足赏金狩猎？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I wanted justice. Real justice... that's rare in the wild parts of the world, but maybe even more so in what we call {Condescending}"civilization".
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想要公正。真正的正义。。。这在废土世界上的荒野地区是罕见的，但在我们所称的{居高临下}的“文明”中可能更是如此。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Thorne [04020845] (mod) Quest : ([04029364]aaHunterDialogue) Dialogue for Named Bounty Hunters EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaThorneVoiceType\aaHunterDi_aaThorneWhyBoun_0009496B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Seeing genuine injustice, when basic morality is mocked right in front of you... that's what I witnessed, and it changed me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当你看到真正的不公正，当基本道德在你面前被嘲笑的时候。。。我亲眼所见的这些事情，改变了我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Thorne [04020845] (mod) Quest : ([04029364]aaHunterDialogue) Dialogue for Named Bounty Hunters EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaThorneVoiceType\aaHunterDi_aaThorneWhyBoun_0009496B_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: As a hunter, I feel like that dog that keeps wolves at bay. The livestock might resent his methods, his personality, but they need him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 作为一个猎人，我觉得自己就像是一只让狼远离的狗。家畜可能会讨厌他的方法，他的个性，但他们需要他的保护。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Thorne [04020845] (mod) Quest : ([04029364]aaHunterDialogue) Dialogue for Named Bounty Hunters EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaThorneVoiceType\aaHunterDi_aaThorneWhyBoun_0009496B_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I used to be one of the cattle, blind to the dangers around me, or just content to bury my head in the sand. That hound was always inside, though.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我曾经是一头牛，对周围的危险视而不见，或者仅仅满足于把头埋在沙子里，充耳不闻。不过，那只猎犬总是在里面。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Thorne [04020845] (mod) Quest : ([04029364]aaHunterDialogue) Dialogue for Named Bounty Hunters EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaThorneVoiceType\aaHunterDi_aaThorneWhyBoun_0009496B_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What about you? Are you one of the hounds, or are you just one of the beeves?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你呢？你是一只猎犬，还是一块牛肉？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Thorne [04020845] (mod) Quest : ([04029364]aaHunterDialogue) Dialogue for Named Bounty Hunters EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaThorneVoiceType\aaHunterDi_aaThorneWhyBoun_0009496B_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm actually a barking cat that triggers nuclear explosions.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我其实是一只会引发核爆炸的炸毛狂猫。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Awkward}Well, that's a first. I'll be sure not to set you off. {Muttering}Fucking freak.
ESP.TRADUIT: {尴尬}好吧，这是第一次。我一定不会让你生气的。{咕哝着}你这该死的怪物。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Thorne [04020845] (mod) Quest : ([04029364]aaHunterDialogue) Dialogue for Named Bounty Hunters EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaThorneVoiceType\aaHunterDi_aaThorneAnimalW_00094973_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I suppose I'm akin to a guard dog.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我觉得我就像一只看门狗吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's what I thought. Good to know.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我也是这么想的。很高兴了解这点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Thorne [04020845] (mod) Quest : ([04029364]aaHunterDialogue) Dialogue for Named Bounty Hunters EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaThorneVoiceType\aaHunterDi_aaThorneAnimalH_00094977_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think this inquiry is painfully idiotic. Save your barnyard metaphors for a children's book.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我认为这项调查真的非常愚蠢。把你那些谷仓里的比喻留作给小屁孩当做涂鸦本吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sorry to have troubled your fucking majesty. Have a nice day, fucko.
ESP.TRADUIT: 抱歉打扰了我该死的陛下。祝你今天愉快，傻逼。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Thorne [04020845] (mod) Quest : ([04029364]aaHunterDialogue) Dialogue for Named Bounty Hunters EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaThorneVoiceType\aaHunterDi_aaThorneAnimalS_00094975_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Remain Silent>
ESP.TRADUIT: <保持沉默>

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Slow, deliberate due to player's stupidity}Ok, are you like a dog? A good, friendly dog who keeps the wolves away, or are you... fuck it, this is pointless.
ESP.TRADUIT: {由于邮差的愚蠢而缓慢、故意}好吧，你是像条狗一样吗？一条好的，友善的狗，能把狼赶走，还是你。。。去他妈的，跟你说这些毫无意义。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Thorne [04020845] (mod) Quest : ([04029364]aaHunterDialogue) Dialogue for Named Bounty Hunters EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaThorneVoiceType\aaHunterDi_aaThorneAnimalS_00094976_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I probably align more with the wolves.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我可能更像狼一点。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I respect your honesty. Sometimes the line between hunter and protector can be blurry. If you do cross that line... I'll come for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我尊重你的诚实。有时猎人和保护者之间的界限会很模糊。如果你真的越过了那条线。。。我会来找你的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Thorne [04020845] (mod) Quest : ([04029364]aaHunterDialogue) Dialogue for Named Bounty Hunters EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaThorneVoiceType\aaHunterDi_aaThorneAnimalW_00094974_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaThorneAnimalBull
ESP.TRADUIT: aa索恩动物红牛

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm like a rabid deathclaw, actually. Do you know how many people I've killed?
ESP.TRADUIT: 实际上，我就像一只狂暴的死亡爪。你知道我杀过多少人吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just... stay away from me, ok?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你。。。离我远点，好吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Thorne [04020845] (mod) Quest : ([04029364]aaHunterDialogue) Dialogue for Named Bounty Hunters EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaThorneVoiceType\aaHunterDi_aaThorneAnimalD_00094978_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whatever its faults, I'm partial to democracy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管它有什么缺点，我都偏爱民主。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, no shit, that's NCR. Accept it or we fuck you. I fucking love democracy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，不开玩笑，那就是NCR。接受它吧，否则我们会操你的。我他妈的爱民主。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ford [0402856D] (mod) Quest : ([0406C066]aaFordQuest) Ford's Companion Quest EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaFordVoiceType\aaFordQues_aaFordGovernmen_0009569A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I would rule as a dictator.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会以独裁者的身份统治。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ha! You'd fuck it all up in a week. The people would revolt and feed you to the dogs, no doubt about it. I'd rule forever, though.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哈！你一周内就会把事情搞砸的。毫无疑问，人们会反抗，把你喂给狗吃。不过，我会永远统治世界的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ford [0402856D] (mod) Quest : ([0406C066]aaFordQuest) Ford's Companion Quest EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaFordVoiceType\aaFordQues_aaFordGovernmen_0009569B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd kill everyone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会杀了所有人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Uncertain, faking humor}That's a good one... heh. You know, I think we should keep moving.
ESP.TRADUIT: {不确定，假装幽默}这是一个很好的。。。嘿。你知道，我认为我们应该继续前进。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ford [0402856D] (mod) Quest : ([0406C066]aaFordQuest) Ford's Companion Quest EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaFordVoiceType\aaFordQues_aaFordGovernmen_0009569D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: My first act as mayor would be to shoot you in the face.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我做市长的第一件事就是朝你的脸开枪。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You'd fucking miss, and then I'd shoot you in the face! Then I'd get a medal from the NCR and a parade, and then we'd make your death a holiday. Ha!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你会他妈的打偏，然后我会朝你脸上开枪的！然后我会得到NCR的奖章和游行，然后我们会让你的死成为一个节日。哈！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ford [0402856D] (mod) Quest : ([0406C066]aaFordQuest) Ford's Companion Quest EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaFordVoiceType\aaFordQues_aaFordGovernmen_0009569E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't care.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不在乎。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Seem that's your problem. You act like you don't give a fuck, but deep down you do. Are you listening to me? This is important!
ESP.TRADUIT: 看来这就是你的问题。你表现得好像一点也不在乎，但内心深处你是在乎的。你在听我说吗？这很重要！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ford [0402856D] (mod) Quest : ([0406C066]aaFordQuest) Ford's Companion Quest EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaFordVoiceType\aaFordQues_aaFordGovernmen_0009569C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: To hell with governments.
ESP.TRADUIT: 让政府见鬼去吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's crazy talk. Are you one of those... antichrists? You have to have government, like the NCR.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那真是疯子的话。你是那种。。。反基督者？你必须有一个政府，比如NCR。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ford [0402856D] (mod) Quest : ([0406C066]aaFordQuest) Ford's Companion Quest EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaFordVoiceType\aaFordQues_aaFordGovernmen_00095699_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Shut up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 闭嘴。

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, government is important, and you should listen to me. You have an obligation to hear my opinions and agree, at least if you're smart.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，政府很重要，你应该听我的。你有义务听取我的意见并同意，至少如果你聪明的话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ford [0402856D] (mod) Quest : ([0406C066]aaFordQuest) Ford's Companion Quest EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaFordVoiceType\aaFordQues_aaFordGovernmen_0009569F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaCuntyIntro
ESP.TRADUIT: aa贱人介绍

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hold it baby bonanza, it's me Cunty McLean!
ESP.TRADUIT: 别动，让我发财的宝贝，是我！坎蒂·麦克林！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cunty McLean [04097DFF] (mod) Quest : ([0408572A]aaNVB3MiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaCuntyVoiceType\aaNVB3Misc_aaCuntyIntro_0009849A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3MiscDialogue.CuntyGreeted to 2
Who are you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是谁？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Cunty McLean, your arch nemesis and worst nightmare!
ESP.TRADUIT: 坎蒂·麦克林，你的死敌和最可怕的噩梦！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cunty McLean [04097DFF] (mod) Quest : ([0408572A]aaNVB3MiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaCuntyVoiceType\aaNVB3Misc_aaCuntyWho_0009849B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you fucking serious? Cunty...McLean!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你他妈的是认真的吗？坎蒂...麦克林！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cunty McLean [04097DFF] (mod) Quest : ([0408572A]aaNVB3MiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaCuntyVoiceType\aaNVB3Misc_aaCuntyWho_0009849D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sorry, I'm terrible with names - what do you call yourself again?
ESP.TRADUIT: 抱歉，我不擅长记忆名字-你能再说一遍自己叫什么么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm Cunty McLean! I've said it three times already! Jesus! Any more questions?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是坎蒂·麦克林！我已经说了三遍了！天哪！还有问题吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cunty McLean [04097DFF] (mod) Quest : ([0408572A]aaNVB3MiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaCuntyVoiceType\aaNVB3Misc_aaCuntyWho_0009849C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I feel awkward admitting this, but your name slipped my mind. What was it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我承认这件事感到很尴尬，但我忘了你的名字是什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why do they call you Cunty?
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么他们叫你贱人呢？

ESP.ORIGINAL: It was the name my mother gave to me. She loved me very, very much.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是我妈妈给我起的名字。她非常非常爱我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cunty McLean [04097DFF] (mod) Quest : ([0408572A]aaNVB3MiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaCuntyVoiceType\aaNVB3Misc_aaCuntyWhyCall_0009849F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: My father came from a long line of McLeans.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我父亲出身于一个历史悠久的麦克林家族。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cunty McLean [04097DFF] (mod) Quest : ([0408572A]aaNVB3MiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaCuntyVoiceType\aaNVB3Misc_aaCuntyWhyCall_0009849F_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's about it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就这样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cunty McLean [04097DFF] (mod) Quest : ([0408572A]aaNVB3MiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaCuntyVoiceType\aaNVB3Misc_aaCuntyWhyCall_0009849F_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why are you fondling yourself?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你为什么在抚摸你自己？

ESP.ORIGINAL: What else am I supposed to do when I'm talking? Not fondle Myself?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我说话的时候还能做什么？不爱抚我自己？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cunty McLean [04097DFF] (mod) Quest : ([0408572A]aaNVB3MiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaCuntyVoiceType\aaNVB3Misc_aaCuntyWhyFondl_000984A2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you here to kill me? At least give me the reason.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是来杀我的吗？至少告诉我原因。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Really? You don't remember?
ESP.TRADUIT: 真的？你不记得了？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cunty McLean [04097DFF] (mod) Quest : ([0408572A]aaNVB3MiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaCuntyVoiceType\aaNVB3Misc_aaCuntyWhyWantK_000984A0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: My cousin Donald came out to the wasteland to make a name for himself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的堂兄唐纳德走上废土让自己出名。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cunty McLean [04097DFF] (mod) Quest : ([0408572A]aaNVB3MiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaCuntyVoiceType\aaNVB3Misc_aaCuntyWhyWantK_000984A0_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He got caught up in some Fiend group and ended up getting recruited.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他被某个恶魔帮抓住，而最后被招募入伍。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cunty McLean [04097DFF] (mod) Quest : ([0408572A]aaNVB3MiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaCuntyVoiceType\aaNVB3Misc_aaCuntyWhyWantK_000984A0_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You murdered him...you murdered him and you don't even remember!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你杀了他…你都杀了他了，而你都他妈的不记得了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cunty McLean [04097DFF] (mod) Quest : ([0408572A]aaNVB3MiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaCuntyVoiceType\aaNVB3Misc_aaCuntyWhyWantK_000984A0_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He had the smile of a child.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他笑得像个孩子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cunty McLean [04097DFF] (mod) Quest : ([0408572A]aaNVB3MiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaCuntyVoiceType\aaNVB3Misc_aaCuntyWhyWantK_000984A1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And the mouth of a smaller child.
ESP.TRADUIT: 还有一个小孩子一样的嘴巴。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cunty McLean [04097DFF] (mod) Quest : ([0408572A]aaNVB3MiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaCuntyVoiceType\aaNVB3Misc_aaCuntyWhyWantK_000984A1_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It would have been obvious if you hadn't blown his head off.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你没有把他的头炸掉的话，这就很明显了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cunty McLean [04097DFF] (mod) Quest : ([0408572A]aaNVB3MiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaCuntyVoiceType\aaNVB3Misc_aaCuntyWhyWantK_000984A1_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How could I have known your cousin wasn't bad?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我怎么知道你的表兄不是坏人？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can't we solve this another way?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们不能用另一种方法解决这个问题吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I didn't walk tens of miles just to not kill you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我走了几十英里可不是为了放你活着离开的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cunty McLean [04097DFF] (mod) Quest : ([0408572A]aaNVB3MiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: How could I have known your cousin wasn't bad?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我怎么知道你的表兄不是个坏人？

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right, let's get this over with.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，让我们结束这一切。

ESP.ORIGINAL: About time! Prepare for your imminent and possibly painless death!
ESP.TRADUIT: 差不多到时间了！为你即将到来的无痛死亡做好准备吧！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cunty McLean [04097DFF] (mod) Quest : ([0408572A]aaNVB3MiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaCuntyVoiceType\aaNVB3Misc_aaCuntyFightCoo_000984A6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaNVB3CuntyMcleanREF.startcombat player aaNVB3CuntyMcleanREF.setav aggression 4
There has to be a peaceful resolution, right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 肯定有一个和平的解决方案，对吧？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I didn't walk tens of miles just to not kill you. I must avenge Donald.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我走了几十英里不是为了放你走的。我必须为唐纳德报仇。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cunty McLean [04097DFF] (mod) Quest : ([0408572A]aaNVB3MiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaCuntyVoiceType\aaNVB3Misc_aaCuntyFightWim_000984A4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There is! You can stand there and not fight, and then I'll kill you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有！你可以站在那里一动不动，然后我就能杀了你了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cunty McLean [04097DFF] (mod) Quest : ([0408572A]aaNVB3MiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaCuntyVoiceType\aaNVB3Misc_aaCuntyFightWim_000984A5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaNVB3CuntyMcleanREF.startcombat player aaNVB3CuntyMcleanREF.setav aggression 4
Is there any other way we can settle this?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们还有别的办法解决这个问题吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Marine Corps.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这里是海军陆战队。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good morning, Marine. Quarters are in the basement. Rat repellant and blanket will be provided.
ESP.TRADUIT: 早上好，两足多功能畜生马润。宿舍在发霉结冰的地下室。部队将提供防鼠剂和破毯子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private C. Luster [0409CFB6] (mod) Quest : ([0408572A]aaNVB3MiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaPvtClusterVoiceType\aaNVB3Misc_aaPvtClusterMar_0009D64D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fuck-fuck games begin at 0400 hours and continue until 1800 hours. Discarded MRE's will double as rat repellent and meal rations. Oorah. Yut. Kill.
ESP.TRADUIT: 操屁眼的训练游戏从深夜4点开始一直持续到午后18点。腐烂发臭的MRE将有驱鼠剂和口粮数量的两倍。哦。对了。记得杀戮。（MRE：单兵即食餐）
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private C. Luster [0409CFB6] (mod) Quest : ([0408572A]aaNVB3MiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaPvtClusterVoiceType\aaNVB3Misc_aaPvtClusterMar_0009D64D_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3MiscDialogue.ClusterGreeted to 1
Army.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这里是陆军。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good Morning, Soldier. Report to formation at 0600 hours, followed by formation at 0900 hours, followed by formation at 1200 hours...
ESP.TRADUIT: 早上好，士兵。早6时报到编队，早9时报到编队，午后12时报到编队。。。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private C. Luster [0409CFB6] (mod) Quest : ([0408572A]aaNVB3MiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaPvtClusterVoiceType\aaNVB3Misc_aaPvtClusterArm_0009D64B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Followed by formation at 1500 hours. Final formation is held at 1700 hours. Hooah.
ESP.TRADUIT: 随后在午后15时编队。最后的编队在午后17时举行。解散。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private C. Luster [0409CFB6] (mod) Quest : ([0408572A]aaNVB3MiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaPvtClusterVoiceType\aaNVB3Misc_aaPvtClusterArm_0009D64B_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3MiscDialogue.ClusterGreeted to 1
Navy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这里是海军。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good morning, Sailor. Quarters will be held adjacent to chow hall.
ESP.TRADUIT: 早上好，水手。宿舍将会定在周堂附近。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private C. Luster [0409CFB6] (mod) Quest : ([0408572A]aaNVB3MiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaPvtClusterVoiceType\aaNVB3Misc_aaPvtClusterNav_0009D64E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You will be issued moustache trimmers, anal lubricant, and condoms. Please note the serial number for each item. Have a good day.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你将得到胡子修剪器，肛门润滑剂和避孕套。请记下每件商品的序列号。祝您今天过得愉快。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private C. Luster [0409CFB6] (mod) Quest : ([0408572A]aaNVB3MiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaPvtClusterVoiceType\aaNVB3Misc_aaPvtClusterNav_0009D64E_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3MiscDialogue.ClusterGreeted to 1
Air Force.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这里是空军。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Welcome, Airman. Report to quarters at your leisure. Hot towels and breakfast in bed will be served daily.
ESP.TRADUIT: 欢迎，飞行员。闲暇时请到宿舍报到。部队每天都提供热毛巾和早餐。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private C. Luster [0409CFB6] (mod) Quest : ([0408572A]aaNVB3MiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaPvtClusterVoiceType\aaNVB3Misc_aaPvtClusterAir_0009D64A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Air Force barracks also feature an on-site masseuse and catered food. Enjoy your stay.
ESP.TRADUIT: 空军营房还设有现场按摩师和餐饮服务。祝您入住愉快。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private C. Luster [0409CFB6] (mod) Quest : ([0408572A]aaNVB3MiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaPvtClusterVoiceType\aaNVB3Misc_aaPvtClusterAir_0009D64A_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3MiscDialogue.ClusterGreeted to 1
Coast Guard.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这里是海岸警卫队。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good morning, Coast Guardsman. Report to the frozen pool for kayak training and fishing lessons. Have a nice day.
ESP.TRADUIT: 早上好，海岸警卫队。到结冰的游泳池去参加皮划艇训练和钓鱼课程。祝您有个美好的一天。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private C. Luster [0409CFB6] (mod) Quest : ([0408572A]aaNVB3MiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaPvtClusterVoiceType\aaNVB3Misc_aaPvtClusterCoa_0009D64C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3MiscDialogue.ClusterGreeted to 1
What exactly is this place?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这里到底是什么地方？

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is the Mountain Warfare Training Center, a combined arms facility constructed in 2050.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这里是山战训练中心，一个建于2050年的联合武器设施。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private C. Luster [0409CFB6] (mod) Quest : ([0408572A]aaNVB3MiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaPvtClusterVoiceType\aaNVB3Misc_aaPvtClusterQue_0009D652_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The MWTC pools the knowledge of all branches in order to better prepare troops for fighting communism in arctic and/or mountainous terrain.
ESP.TRADUIT: MWTC汇集了所有分支机构的知识，以便更好地为在北极或山区打击共产主义做好准备。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private C. Luster [0409CFB6] (mod) Quest : ([0408572A]aaNVB3MiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaPvtClusterVoiceType\aaNVB3Misc_aaPvtClusterQue_0009D652_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: In the absence of regular maintenance, avalanches and heavy snows have compromised the structural integrity of most buildings.
ESP.TRADUIT: 由于缺乏定期维修，雪崩和大雪已经损害了大多数建筑物的结构完整性。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private C. Luster [0409CFB6] (mod) Quest : ([0408572A]aaNVB3MiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaPvtClusterVoiceType\aaNVB3Misc_aaPvtClusterQue_0009D653_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This was unforeseen in planning, as the contractor, Hallenron, guaranteed structural integrity for two hundred and fifty years.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这在规划中是不可预见的，因为承包商哈伦龙保证了250年的结构完整性。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private C. Luster [0409CFB6] (mod) Quest : ([0408572A]aaNVB3MiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaPvtClusterVoiceType\aaNVB3Misc_aaPvtClusterQue_0009D653_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What happened to this place?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这地方怎么了？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Accessing data... Chief engineer John Goodman designed a fail-deadly protocal for all robotic entities in the MWTC.
ESP.TRADUIT: 正在访问数据。。。总工程师约翰古德曼为MWTC中的所有机器人实体设计了一个失败且致命的原型。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private C. Luster [0409CFB6] (mod) Quest : ([0408572A]aaNVB3MiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaPvtClusterVoiceType\aaNVB3Misc_aaPvtClusterQue_0009D654_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Private files indicate he was wary of vocational insectoids, aka "Business Radroaches". CRITICAL ERROR! INITIATING PRIME DIRECTIVE NUMBER FOUR!
ESP.TRADUIT: 私人档案显示，他对职业性的昆虫，也就是"商业性的蟑螂"很警惕。严重错误！启动质数指令4！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private C. Luster [0409CFB6] (mod) Quest : ([0408572A]aaNVB3MiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaPvtClusterVoiceType\aaNVB3Misc_aaPvtClusterQue_0009D654_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaPrivateClusterREF.startcombat player aaPrivateClusterREF.setav aggression 3
Why are the robots running amok?
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么机器人在乱杀人？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I should get going.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我该走了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Have a pleasant day. Thank you for your service.
ESP.TRADUIT: 祝你愉快。谢谢你的服务。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private C. Luster [0409CFB6] (mod) Quest : ([0408572A]aaNVB3MiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaPvtClusterVoiceType\aaNVB3Misc_aaPvtClusterBye_0009D650_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaCuttySmokesUpAss
ESP.TRADUIT: aa卡蒂抽烟

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't know a goddamn thing about the smokes. They're probably up your ass.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我一点也不知道抽烟的事。他们可能取决于你的屁股。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cutty [0409CF88] (mod) Quest : ([0408572A]aaNVB3MiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\CreatureLowIntSM\aaNVB3Misc_aaCuttySmokesUp_0009D659_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaCockerREF.Say aaCockerSmokesReply01
Why you gotta keep smoking? It makes me sick to my stomach, I don't like it! Coughing, gagging. I'm trying to cut hair here!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你为什么要一直抽烟？它让我恶心，我不喜欢它！咳嗽，呕吐。我只是想在这里剪头发！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cutty [0409CF88] (mod) Quest : ([0408572A]aaNVB3MiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\CreatureLowIntSM\aaNVB3Misc_aaCuttySmokesUp_0009D65C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaCockerREF.Say aaCockerSmokesReply01
You think I care about the noise? You don't scare me, I was in the Master's Army. I don't give a fuck about your fucking noise.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你觉得我在乎噪音吗？你可别吓我，我在主人的军队里。我才不管你他妈的吵闹。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cutty [0409CF88] (mod) Quest : ([0408572A]aaNVB3MiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\aaNVB3Misc_aaCuttySmokesUp_0009D65E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaCockerREF.Say aaCockerSmokesReply01
Hey, don't disrespect the master! Oh, very good, very mature! We got a customer in here, act like a fucking baby! <Angry banter>
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿，别不尊重主人！哦，很好，很成熟！我们这里有个顾客，像个巨婴一样！<愤怒的玩笑>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cutty [0409CF88] (mod) Quest : ([0408572A]aaNVB3MiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaCockerVoiceType\aaNVB3Misc_aaCuttySmokesUp_0009D660_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaCockerREF.Say aaCockerSmokesReply01
That's why we don't have customers, cause you act like a fucking moron. Keep pushing me, I'm gonna walk out that fucking door, you just fuckin watch!
ESP.TRADUIT: 这就是为什么我们没有顾客，因为你表现得像个白痴。继续惹怒我吧，我要走出那该死的门，你他妈的看着！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cutty [0409CF88] (mod) Quest : ([0408572A]aaNVB3MiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\CreatureLowIntSM\aaNVB3Misc_aaCuttySmokesUp_0009D662_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaCockerREF.Say aaCockerSmokesReply01
aaCockerSmokesReply01
You lying, boy! Where'd you put my fucking smokes? I like my pre-war menthols.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在撒谎，小子！你他妈的把我的烟放哪儿了？我喜欢我那战前的薄荷醇（译者注：万宝路香烟）。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cocker [0409CF4C] (mod) Quest : ([0408572A]aaNVB3MiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaCockerVoiceType\aaNVB3Misc_aaCockerSmokesR_0009D65B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaCuttyREF.Say aaCuttySmokesUpAss
What are you, the general fucking surgeon now? Shut the fuck up, give me my fucking smokes, or I'm gonna make the noise.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是什么东西，是该死的外科医生？他妈的给我闭嘴，给我他妈的烟，不然我就要开始大吼大叫了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cocker [0409CF4C] (mod) Quest : ([0408572A]aaNVB3MiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaCockerVoiceType\aaNVB3Misc_aaCockerSmokesR_0009D65D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaCuttyREF.Say aaCuttySmokesUpAss
Oh, Master's Army? Okay, you asked for it. AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHH!
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，教主的军队？好吧，这是你自找的。啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊哈哈哈~~~~！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cocker [0409CF4C] (mod) Quest : ([0408572A]aaNVB3MiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaCockerVoiceType\aaNVB3Misc_aaCockerSmokesR_0009D65F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaCuttyREF.Say aaCuttySmokesUpAss
Now that wasn't so hard, now was it? You just don't have a great appreciation... for this beautiful voice.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在那不是很难了，对吧？你只是不太欣赏。。。这个美丽的声音罢了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cocker [0409CF4C] (mod) Quest : ([0408572A]aaNVB3MiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaCockerVoiceType\aaNVB3Misc_aaCockerSmokesR_0009D661_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaCuttyREF.Say aaCuttySmokesUpAss
aaCuttyHaircut
ESP.TRADUIT: aa卡蒂理发

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, yeah! Absolutely! Twenty, twenty caps, that's it!
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，是的！当然了！20,20个瓶盖，那就够了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cutty [0409CF88] (mod) Quest : ([0408572A]aaNVB3MiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\CreatureLowIntSM\aaNVB3Misc_aaCuttyHaircut_0009DCFF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd like a haircut.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想剪个头。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaCuttyShuffle
ESP.TRADUIT: aa卡蒂洗牌

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm doing it for my health, jackass. It's good for you to walk... and stuff. You wouldn't fuck about, mister smoke and rot to pieces.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我这么做是为了我的健康，混蛋。走路和塞东西对你有好处...等等。你不会乱来的，你个死烟鬼，然后给我腐烂成碎片吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cutty [0409CF88] (mod) Quest : ([0408572A]aaNVB3MiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\CreatureLowIntSM\aaNVB3Misc_aaCuttyShuffle_0009DD07_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaCockerREF.Say aaCockerShuffle
Uh, no way. I'll live at least as long as that. I'll live much longer. I'm a superior fucking, uh, specimen.
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃，不可能。我至少能活那么久。我会活得更久的。因为我是个老卵高级的，呃，标本。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cutty [0409CF88] (mod) Quest : ([0408572A]aaNVB3MiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\CreatureLowIntSM\aaNVB3Misc_aaCuttyShuffle_0009DD09_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaCockerREF.Say aaCockerShuffle
That's uncalled for. You don't bring Cazadors into the argument. Those goddamn, devil fucking bug things are straight from hell. That's a dick move.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那是不必要的。你不会把卡扎多尔带进争论。那些该死的，该死的虫子的东西是直接从地狱来的。这是个愚蠢的举动。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cutty [0409CF88] (mod) Quest : ([0408572A]aaNVB3MiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\CreatureLowIntSM\aaNVB3Misc_aaCuttyShuffle_0009DD0B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaCockerREF.Say aaCockerShuffle
Not that you would understand, but I have an issue with firearms. They make me uncomfortable. I prefer to smash things.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不是你能理解的事情，但我对枪械有意见。它们让我不舒服。我喜欢打碎东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cutty [0409CF88] (mod) Quest : ([0408572A]aaNVB3MiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\CreatureLowIntSM\aaNVB3Misc_aaCuttyShuffle_0009DD0D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaCockerREF.Say aaCockerShuffle
Just keep it up, keep calling me stupid, I'm gonna walk out that fucking door! I'm still the fucking healthier one. Fucking smoking piece of shit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 坚持住，继续叫我笨蛋啊，你再试一次，我就从那该死的门出去！我还是他妈的更健康。你他妈的烟鬼。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cutty [0409CF88] (mod) Quest : ([0408572A]aaNVB3MiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\CreatureLowIntSM\aaNVB3Misc_aaCuttyShuffle_0009DD0F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaCockerREF.Say aaCockerShuffle
aaCockerHaircut
Twenty caps and we'll get you fixed right up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 只要二十瓶盖我们就能让你修整完毕。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cocker [0409CF4C] (mod) Quest : ([0408572A]aaNVB3MiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaCockerVoiceType\aaNVB3Misc_aaCockerHaircut_0009DD00_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd like a haircut.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想剪个头。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaCockerShuffle
You know how long I've lived smoking these fucking things? Two hundred years! That's longer than you'll ever live. Mister fucking health...
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道我吸这些该死的东西多久了吗？两百年！这甚至比你能活的都要长。你他妈的健康先生。。。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cocker [0409CF4C] (mod) Quest : ([0408572A]aaNVB3MiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaCockerVoiceType\aaNVB3Misc_aaCockerShuffle_0009DD08_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaCuttyREF.Say aaCuttyShuffle
Oh, really? What happened when we ran into the Cazadors east of Reno? You were crying like a little fucking girl. Specimen... my ass.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，真的吗？当我们在里诺东面遇到大毒蜂的时候发生了什么？你哭得像个小女孩。样品第。。。才怪。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cocker [0409CF4C] (mod) Quest : ([0408572A]aaNVB3MiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaCockerVoiceType\aaNVB3Misc_aaCockerShuffle_0009DD0A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaCuttyREF.Say aaCuttyShuffle
Not my problem you fight like a fucking idiot, running out there with a goddamn sledgehammer. What the fuck was that about?
ESP.TRADUIT: 不是我的问题，你像个他妈的白痴一样打架，拿着一把该死的大锤跑出去。那他妈的是怎么回事？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cocker [0409CF4C] (mod) Quest : ([0408572A]aaNVB3MiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaCockerVoiceType\aaNVB3Misc_aaCockerShuffle_0009DD0C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaCuttyREF.Say aaCuttyShuffle
Wait, you're scared of guns, but you'd go toe-to-toe with a goddamn Cazador? Even by mutant standards that's indescribably stupid.
ESP.TRADUIT: 等等，你害怕枪，但你会跟一个该死的大毒蜂鬼混？即使以变种人的标准来衡量，这也太愚蠢了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cocker [0409CF4C] (mod) Quest : ([0408572A]aaNVB3MiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaCockerVoiceType\aaNVB3Misc_aaCockerShuffle_0009DD0E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaCuttyREF.Say aaCuttyShuffle
aaCuttyPayHaircut
ESP.TRADUIT: aa卡蒂支付理发

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just tell me how short you want it, we'll get you set right up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 只要告诉我你想要多短就行了，其他的我们都会帮你打理好的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cutty [0409CF88] (mod) Quest : ([0408572A]aaNVB3MiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\CreatureLowIntSM\aaNVB3Misc_aaCuttyPayHairc_0009DD06_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.removeitem caps001 20
showbarbermenu
Sure, here's the caps. <Pay 20 Caps>
ESP.TRADUIT: 行，这是你要的瓶盖。 <支付20瓶盖>

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaCockerPayHaircut
Just tell me how you want it, and I'll make it happen!
ESP.TRADUIT: 只要告诉我你想要什么发型，我就让它变成现实！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cocker [0409CF4C] (mod) Quest : ([0408572A]aaNVB3MiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaCockerVoiceType\aaNVB3Misc_aaCockerPayHair_0009DD05_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.removeitem caps001 20
showbarbermenu
Sure, here you go. <Pay 20 Caps>
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的，给你。<支付20瓶盖>

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaCuttyBye
ESP.TRADUIT: aa卡帝再见

ESP.ORIGINAL: Bye!
ESP.TRADUIT: 拜！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cutty [0409CF88] (mod) Quest : ([0408572A]aaNVB3MiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\CreatureLowIntSM\aaNVB3Misc_aaCuttyBye_0009DD04_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I need to get going.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我得走了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaCockerBye

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cocker [0409CF4C] (mod) Quest : ([0408572A]aaNVB3MiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I need to get going.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我得走了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What brought you to Frosthill?
ESP.TRADUIT: 是什么把你带到霜地来的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was a young barber when the bombs dropped. Just kind of picked it back up, once I got, uh, like this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在核弹爆炸时我还只是个年轻的理发师。只是尝试捡起以前一直做的事情罢了，就像我得到了，呃，像这样的工作。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cocker [0409CF4C] (mod) Quest : ([0408572A]aaNVB3MiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaCockerVoiceType\aaNVB3Misc_aaCockerBackgro_000A1F14_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Was a real shitstorm for a while, but managed to make my way to New Reno. Cut hair for the wiseguys until they started getting fresh.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有段时间我真的感到很翻找，但还是设法去了新里诺。为那些聪明人剪头发，直到他们开始变得与众不同。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cocker [0409CF4C] (mod) Quest : ([0408572A]aaNVB3MiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaCockerVoiceType\aaNVB3Misc_aaCockerBackgro_000A1F14_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I hired Cutty here as an apprentice, slash, uh, bodyguard. Weird combination, I know. He helped me stave off the wiseguys for a while.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在这里雇了卡蒂当学徒，砍人，呃，做保镖。我知道，这听起来真是个奇怪的组合。但他帮我避开了那些聪明人一段时间。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cocker [0409CF4C] (mod) Quest : ([0408572A]aaNVB3MiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaCockerVoiceType\aaNVB3Misc_aaCockerBackgro_000A1F14_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Finally they shot up the place, burned it down, and I figured, well, that's fucking enough.
ESP.TRADUIT: 最后他们开枪把我的房子烧了，所以我想，已经他妈的够了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cocker [0409CF4C] (mod) Quest : ([0408572A]aaNVB3MiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaCockerVoiceType\aaNVB3Misc_aaCockerBackgro_000A1F14_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I kind of like the cool weather, so does Cutty, and since we were basically walking dead men in Reno, we figured this would be safe.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有点喜欢凉爽的天气，卡蒂也是，因为我们在新里诺基本上就是行尸走肉，所以我们认为这里会是安全的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cocker [0409CF4C] (mod) Quest : ([0408572A]aaNVB3MiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaCockerVoiceType\aaNVB3Misc_aaCockerBackgro_000A1F14_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We don't have any intricate outlaw stories, we're just kind of lazy slobs who like to cut hair. Good enough? Okay.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们没有任何错综复杂的非法故事，我们只是喜欢剪头发的懒汉。够了吗？那就可以了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cocker [0409CF4C] (mod) Quest : ([0408572A]aaNVB3MiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaCockerVoiceType\aaNVB3Misc_aaCockerBackgro_000A1F14_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What brought you to Frosthill?
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么把你带到了霜地？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well I robbed caravans and ate babies, and then sacrificed virgins in the name of the master.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，我抢劫商队，吃婴儿，然后以主人的名义献祭强奸那些处女。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cutty [0409CF88] (mod) Quest : ([0408572A]aaNVB3MiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\CreatureLowIntSM\aaNVB3Misc_aaCuttyBackgrou_000A1F15_1.ogg
