ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm just fucking with you, I came here with Cocker to cut hair. Not much else to it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我只是在和你放屁，我带着科克尔来这里是来剪头发的。没什么别的了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cutty [0409CF88] (mod) Quest : ([0408572A]aaNVB3MiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\CreatureLowIntSM\aaNVB3Misc_aaCuttyBackgrou_000A1F15_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Worked with the Master, that, you know, didn't work out. Kind of a fucking disaster... and worked as a bodyguard.
ESP.TRADUIT: 和师父一起工作，你知道的，没有过什么成功。还有点他妈的灾难。。。我还做过保镖。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cutty [0409CF88] (mod) Quest : ([0408572A]aaNVB3MiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\CreatureLowIntSM\aaNVB3Misc_aaCuttyBackgrou_000A1F15_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Got kind of tired of getting beat up and shot, so, so Cocker agreed to train me if I'd protect his shop in Reno from the wiseguys.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有点厌倦了被殴打和枪杀，所以，科克尔同意训练我，如果我能从那些聪明人手里保护他在里诺的商店的话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cutty [0409CF88] (mod) Quest : ([0408572A]aaNVB3MiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\CreatureLowIntSM\aaNVB3Misc_aaCuttyBackgrou_000A1F15_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You know, they were a real persistent bunch. I killed a few, made one guy's head into like, this grape jelly substance, kind of impressive, actually.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道，他们真是一帮坚持不懈的人。我杀了好几个，甚至把一个人的头变成了，像这种葡萄果冻的物质，实际上这有点让我印象深刻。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cutty [0409CF88] (mod) Quest : ([0408572A]aaNVB3MiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\CreatureLowIntSM\aaNVB3Misc_aaCuttyBackgrou_000A1F15_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But, uh, they don't really give up, they're like, fucking, swarm of bees or something. So, yeah, we decided to come here cause it's more laid-back.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是，呃，他们不会真的放弃的，他们就像，该死的，蜂群什么的。所以，是的，我们决定来这里是因为这里比较悠闲一些。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cutty [0409CF88] (mod) Quest : ([0408572A]aaNVB3MiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\CreatureLowIntSM\aaNVB3Misc_aaCuttyBackgrou_000A1F15_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I really like the snow, though. I mean, it's fucking cool, you don't get to see that shit much anywhere else.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过，我真的很喜欢雪。我是说，这真他妈的酷，你在别的地方可看不到那玩意。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cutty [0409CF88] (mod) Quest : ([0408572A]aaNVB3MiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\CreatureLowIntSM\aaNVB3Misc_aaCuttyBackgrou_000A1F15_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I like fucking snowmen. I really making them, and taking the carrots, and little beads and shit...
ESP.TRADUIT: 我喜欢他妈的雪人。而我真的做了一些，用胡萝卜，小珠子和屎。。。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cutty [0409CF88] (mod) Quest : ([0408572A]aaNVB3MiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\CreatureLowIntSM\aaNVB3Misc_aaCuttyBackgrou_000A1F15_8.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And I enjoy it. And the kids around here are nice, you know? I don't have to break people's heads open. It's a really cool place.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我很享受。这里的孩子都很好，你知道吗？我不必费力把人们的头打开。因为这是个很酷的地方。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cutty [0409CF88] (mod) Quest : ([0408572A]aaNVB3MiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\CreatureLowIntSM\aaNVB3Misc_aaCuttyBackgrou_000A1F15_9.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaCuttyDrink
ESP.TRADUIT: aa卡蒂喝酒

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, I think I'm just gonna have a Nuka Cola here. That's all I need.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，我只想要一瓶核子可乐就够了。那才是我所需要的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cutty [0409CF88] (mod) Quest : ([0408572A]aaNVB3MiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaCockerVoiceType\aaNVB3Misc_aaCuttyDrink_0009DD13_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaCockerREF.Say aaCockerDrink
Oh, that sounds like a case of... not my fucking problem, right there. Spent all day calling me a dick-licker, why would I want to drink with you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，听起来像是。。。不是我的他妈的问题，就在那里。你整天叫我舔鸡巴，我为什么要和你一起喝酒？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cutty [0409CF88] (mod) Quest : ([0408572A]aaNVB3MiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\CreatureLowIntSM\aaNVB3Misc_aaCuttyDrink_0009DD15_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaCockerREF.Say aaCockerDrink
Lori? well, uh, okay. But you better not call me a dick-licker again, fuckface!
ESP.TRADUIT: 洛里？好吧，好吧。但你最好别再叫我舔鸡巴了，混蛋！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cutty [0409CF88] (mod) Quest : ([0408572A]aaNVB3MiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\CreatureLowIntSM\aaNVB3Misc_aaCuttyDrink_0009DD17_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaCockerDrink
Now goddamit, don't let me go in there by myself! You know, all kind of fucking weirdos... you ever tried to have an extended conversation with Al?
ESP.TRADUIT: 天哪，别让我一个人进去！你知道的，那里全他妈的是怪人。。。你难道没试过和艾尔进行长时间的谈话吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cocker [0409CF4C] (mod) Quest : ([0408572A]aaNVB3MiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaCockerVoiceType\aaNVB3Misc_aaCockerDrink_0009DD14_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaCuttyREF.Say aaCuttyDrink
Oh, mister big, bad mutant can't take a little ribbing. First round's on me, you big pussy. Oh, and Lori's working tonight.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，大个子，坏变种人可受不了一点嘲笑。第一轮就包在我身上算了，你这个大婊子。哦对了，洛里今晚要工作。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cocker [0409CF4C] (mod) Quest : ([0408572A]aaNVB3MiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaCockerVoiceType\aaNVB3Misc_aaCockerDrink_0009DD16_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaCuttyREF.Say aaCuttyDrink
aaCuttyFart
ESP.TRADUIT: aa卡蒂放屁

ESP.ORIGINAL: Excuse me, but this is a perfectly acceptable and natural release of gas. It was starting to strain my bowels.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对不起，这是完全可以接受的纯天然气体泄漏。我想我开始拉肚子了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cutty [0409CF88] (mod) Quest : ([0408572A]aaNVB3MiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\CreatureLowIntSM\aaNVB3Misc_aaCuttyFart_0009DD1B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaCockerREF.Say aaCockerFart
Oh, you're so dramatic! What do you think it's like for me, smelling your nasty fucking smoke, twelve hours a fucking day. Fucking goddamn hypocrite!
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，你太戏剧化了！你觉得对我来说是什么感觉，闻到你那讨厌的烟味，一天12个小时。你这该死的伪君子！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cutty [0409CF88] (mod) Quest : ([0408572A]aaNVB3MiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\CreatureLowIntSM\aaNVB3Misc_aaCuttyFart_0009DD1D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaCockerREF.Say aaCockerFart
You are like such a fucking little, little child sometimes. Can't take a slightly uncomfortable smell. Get the fuck over it!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有时候真是个他妈的小孩子。这闻起来有点不舒服。他妈的快过去吧！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cutty [0409CF88] (mod) Quest : ([0408572A]aaNVB3MiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\CreatureLowIntSM\aaNVB3Misc_aaCuttyFart_0009DD1F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaCockerREF.Say aaCockerFart
Oh, please. You don't even have a fucking nose, how can you fucking smell it? Big fucking ghoul baby. We'll get you a special fucking mask.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，求你了。你连鼻子都没有，你他妈的怎么能闻到？你他妈的大尸鬼宝贝。放心，我们会给你一个特别的面具的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cutty [0409CF88] (mod) Quest : ([0408572A]aaNVB3MiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\CreatureLowIntSM\aaNVB3Misc_aaCuttyFart_0009DD21_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaCockerREF.Say aaCockerFart
You try it! I'll take the razor away, cut your head off, and put your head on a fucking zombie snowman. By the way - are you playing cards tonight?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你试试看！我会把剃刀拿开，割下你的头，把你的头放在一个该死的僵尸雪人身上。顺便问一下，你今晚想打牌吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cutty [0409CF88] (mod) Quest : ([0408572A]aaNVB3MiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\CreatureLowIntSM\aaNVB3Misc_aaCuttyFart_0009DD23_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaCockerREF.Say aaCockerFart
aaCockerFart
Nothing natural about that, you evil motherfucker! Goddamit! Strain your bowels, your straining the life out of my fucking soul!
ESP.TRADUIT: 没什么自然的，你这个邪恶的混蛋！真他妈该死的！拉紧你的肠子，你把我他妈的生活都从我的灵魂中挤压出来了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cocker [0409CF4C] (mod) Quest : ([0408572A]aaNVB3MiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaCockerVoiceType\aaNVB3Misc_aaCockerFart_0009DD1C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaCuttyREF.Say aaCuttyFart
How the fuck can you compare a cigarette to... what you just fucking dropped in here? I can't fucking, you cocksucker!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你他妈的怎么能把香烟比作。。。你刚才他妈的顺道说了点什么来着？我他妈的不能....妈的你这个吸吊混蛋！

I don't think that could've been worse if you had squatted down and taken a shit right on my face, you heinous, disgusting, rude motherfucker!

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cocker [0409CF4C] (mod) Quest : ([0408572A]aaNVB3MiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaCockerVoiceType\aaNVB3Misc_aaCockerFart_0009DD20_1.ogg

That's it! One more fart... you look at me wrong... anything! I'm gonna cut your fucking throat with this razor! You're dead to me!
ESP.TRADUIT: 够了！你胆敢再放一个屁。。。你可是看错我了。。。不论什么方面！我要用这把剃刀割你的喉咙！你死定了！

Spades? Oh, you can count me in. We're gonna stomp those other motherfuckers, partner.

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaCuttyWomanAdvice
ESP.TRADUIT: aa卡蒂女士

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's right. Didn't you always tell me that a barber gives advice to clients? I'm just giving some good tips about romance.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这就对了。你不是一直告诉我那理发师给客户提建议吗？我只是给你一些关于浪漫的好建议。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cutty [0409CF88] (mod) Quest : ([0408572A]aaNVB3MiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\CreatureLowIntSM\aaNVB3Misc_aaCuttyWomanAdv_0009DD28_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaCockerREF.Say aaCockerWomanAdvice
Oh, yeah, the women are falling all over for you, mister fucking melting skin. Please, enlighten me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，是的，女人们都会为你倾倒，他妈的融化了皮肤的先生。求你了，“进来”吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cutty [0409CF88] (mod) Quest : ([0408572A]aaNVB3MiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\CreatureLowIntSM\aaNVB3Misc_aaCuttyWomanAdv_0009DD2A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaCockerREF.Say aaCockerWomanAdvice
Yeah, that's real practical advice for customers. Hey, come on in! You got a big dick? No? Here's how you eat pussy. Never fucking see them again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，这对顾客来说是很实用的建议。嘿，进来！你有个大“家伙”吗？不？这就是你如何吃小穴的方法吗？你他妈再也见不到它们了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cutty [0409CF88] (mod) Quest : ([0408572A]aaNVB3MiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\CreatureLowIntSM\aaNVB3Misc_aaCuttyWomanAdv_0009DD2C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaCockerREF.Say aaCockerWomanAdvice
I think what you just did counts as sexual assault in some places. Don't ever do that again. I'm gonna go vomit now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我认为你刚才所做的在某些地方算是性侵犯。别再那样做了。我要去呕吐了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cutty [0409CF88] (mod) Quest : ([0408572A]aaNVB3MiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\CreatureLowIntSM\aaNVB3Misc_aaCuttyWomanAdv_0009DD2E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaCockerREF.Say aaCockerWomanAdvice
aaCockerWomanAdvice
First, I said to give good advice. Second, calling it romance demonstrates how little you know.
ESP.TRADUIT: 首先，我说过我要给个好建议。第二，称之为浪漫，表明你如此的知之甚少。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cocker [0409CF4C] (mod) Quest : ([0408572A]aaNVB3MiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaCockerVoiceType\aaNVB3Misc_aaCockerWomanAd_0009DD29_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaCuttyREF.Say aaCuttyWomanAdvice
Okay. First, you need money. Second, you need confidence. Third, if you don't have a big dick, you better learn how to eat pussy. That's it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 行吧。首先，你需要钱。其次，你需要自信。第三，如果你没有一个大鸡巴，你最好学会如何吃小穴。就这样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cocker [0409CF4C] (mod) Quest : ([0408572A]aaNVB3MiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaCockerVoiceType\aaNVB3Misc_aaCockerWomanAd_0009DD2B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaCuttyREF.Say aaCuttyWomanAdvice
That's cause you explain it like a fucking pervert. You gotta be smooth. Hey buddy, how are things with the lady? Not good? <He demonstrates>
ESP.TRADUIT: 那是因为你解释得像个变态一样。你得冷静点。嘿，伙计，你和这位女士怎么样了？不怎么好？<他示范>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cocker [0409CF4C] (mod) Quest : ([0408572A]aaNVB3MiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaCockerVoiceType\aaNVB3Misc_aaCockerWomanAd_0009DD2D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaCuttyREF.Say aaCuttyWomanAdvice
And that's why you can't satisfy the ladies, you don't get down and dirty. Mmm, I love it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这就是为什么你不能满足女士们，因为你不能变得下流肮脏。嗯...我喜欢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cocker [0409CF4C] (mod) Quest : ([0408572A]aaNVB3MiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaCockerVoiceType\aaNVB3Misc_aaCockerWomanAd_0009DD2F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaCuttyMojave
ESP.TRADUIT: aa卡蒂莫哈维

ESP.ORIGINAL: I mean, technically I can only root for the NCR, because they're probably the only ones who wouldn't just try to kill me on sight.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是说，从技术上讲，我只能支持NCR，因为他们可能是唯一不会一看到我就杀了我的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cutty [0409CF88] (mod) Quest : ([0408572A]aaNVB3MiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\CreatureLowIntSM\aaNVB3Misc_aaCuttyMojave_000A1F16_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaCockerREF.Say aaCockerMojave
God, you're so ignorant! Plenty of mutants serve with distinction in the NCR armed forces. You're just discriminatory against mutants.
ESP.TRADUIT: 天哪，你太无知了！大量的变种人在NCR武装部队服役。你这只是在歧视变种人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cutty [0409CF88] (mod) Quest : ([0408572A]aaNVB3MiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\CreatureLowIntSM\aaNVB3Misc_aaCuttyMojave_000A1F18_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaCockerREF.Say aaCockerMojave
Oh, and what about the special zombie brigade, or whatever? Oh, we'd like to pin a medal on you, except it fucking falls off your rotting flesh!
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，那特别尸鬼组成的旅呢，或者别的什么？哦，我们想在你身上钉一枚勋章，除非它从你该死的腐肉上掉下来！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cutty [0409CF88] (mod) Quest : ([0408572A]aaNVB3MiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\CreatureLowIntSM\aaNVB3Misc_aaCuttyMojave_000A1F1A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaCockerREF.Say aaCockerMojave
What do you know about ninjas? We got fucking nightkin, they're the real fucking ninjas. Fucking... very efficient killers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你对忍者了解多少？我们都有他妈的夜郎，他们才是真正的忍者。他妈的。。。他们真是非常有效率的杀手。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cutty [0409CF88] (mod) Quest : ([0408572A]aaNVB3MiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\CreatureLowIntSM\aaNVB3Misc_aaCuttyMojave_000A1F1C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaCockerREF.Say aaCockerMojave
You want to talk about their mental condition? What about you, mister talks to himself, making little fucking weird lists in his head and saying it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你想谈谈他们的精神状况吗？那你呢，那先生会自言自语，在他脑子里列个奇怪的小单子然后再说出来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cutty [0409CF88] (mod) Quest : ([0408572A]aaNVB3MiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\CreatureLowIntSM\aaNVB3Misc_aaCuttyMojave_000A1F1E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaCockerREF.Say aaCockerMojave
I have a slight bowel condition, but you use it in every argument. No logic or reason, just make fun of the mutant's farts. Very fucking mature.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我只是有轻微的肠病，但你在每次争论中都会用到这个。没有逻辑和理由，你只是拿变种人的屁开玩笑。真他妈成熟。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cutty [0409CF88] (mod) Quest : ([0408572A]aaNVB3MiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\CreatureLowIntSM\aaNVB3Misc_aaCuttyMojave_000A1F20_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaCockerREF.Say aaCockerMojave
Thank you for proving my point. Mutants can be useful contributors to the NCR armed forces. I win. Shut the fuck up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢你证明了我的观点。那些变种人可以成为NCR武装部队资源的有益贡献者。我赢了。你他妈的闭嘴。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cutty [0409CF88] (mod) Quest : ([0408572A]aaNVB3MiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\CreatureLowIntSM\aaNVB3Misc_aaCuttyMojave_000A1F22_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaCockerREF.Say aaCockerMojave
<Spiteful muttering>
ESP.TRADUIT: <恶毒的咕哝>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cutty [0409CF88] (mod) Quest : ([0408572A]aaNVB3MiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\CreatureLowIntSM\aaNVB3Misc_aaCuttyMojave_000A1F24_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaCockerMojave
What, like you'd be able to join the NCR? Can you imagine them trying to put you into a uniform? It'd be the stupidest looking fucking thing ever.
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么，就像你能加入NCR那样吗？你能想象他们想让你穿上制服吗？这是他妈的最蠢的事了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cocker [0409CF4C] (mod) Quest : ([0408572A]aaNVB3MiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaCockerVoiceType\aaNVB3Misc_aaCockerMojave_000A1F17_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaCuttyREF.Say aaCuttyMojave
Oh, please, they look like clowns, really. Big, lumbering mutant. Look at me, wearing a uniform, I'm suddenly more intelligent and dignified.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，拜托，他们看起来像小丑似的，真的。他们是又大又笨重的变种人。看着我，穿着制服，我突然就变得更加聪明和端庄了呢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cocker [0409CF4C] (mod) Quest : ([0408572A]aaNVB3MiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaCockerVoiceType\aaNVB3Misc_aaCockerMojave_000A1F19_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaCuttyREF.Say aaCuttyMojave
We don't need your fucking medals, because we got killer instincts and natural fucking stealth. See this razor? I could use it like a fucking ninja.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们不需要你他妈的勋章，因为我们有杀人的本能和天生的隐秘能力。看到这把剃刀了吗？我可以像他妈的忍者一样使用它。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cocker [0409CF4C] (mod) Quest : ([0408572A]aaNVB3MiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaCockerVoiceType\aaNVB3Misc_aaCockerMojave_000A1F1B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaCuttyREF.Say aaCuttyMojave
You want to bring Nightkin into this? Last one I saw was worshipping a fencepost. It was crazy as a shithouse rat, just like the rest of them!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你想把蓝皮变种人也带进来吗？我看到的最后一只正在向篱笆做礼拜呢。就像其他老鼠一样，这简直是疯了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cocker [0409CF4C] (mod) Quest : ([0408572A]aaNVB3MiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaCockerVoiceType\aaNVB3Misc_aaCockerMojave_000A1F1D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaCuttyREF.Say aaCuttyMojave
I'm just organized, because I'm the one who has to keep this ship afloat! You just walking around and fart all over the place, scaring off customers!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我只是有效率罢了，因为我是让这艘船浮起来的人！而你只是到处走来走去放屁，吓跑顾客！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cocker [0409CF4C] (mod) Quest : ([0408572A]aaNVB3MiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaCockerVoiceType\aaNVB3Misc_aaCockerMojave_000A1F1F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaCuttyREF.Say aaCuttyMojave
Slight condition? Last time you made Vermillion vomit! NCR should just deploy you as a biological weapon, you'd be a fucking war hero for them!
ESP.TRADUIT: 轻微状况？上次你把弗米利恩都弄吐了！NCR应该把你作为生物武器部署，因为你会成为他们的战争英雄！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cocker [0409CF4C] (mod) Quest : ([0408572A]aaNVB3MiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaCockerVoiceType\aaNVB3Misc_aaCockerMojave_000A1F21_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaCuttyREF.Say aaCuttyMojave
<Spiteful muttering>
ESP.TRADUIT: <恶毒的咕哝>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cocker [0409CF4C] (mod) Quest : ([0408572A]aaNVB3MiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaCockerVoiceType\aaNVB3Misc_aaCockerMojave_000A1F23_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaCuttyREF.Say aaCuttyMojave
aaCuttyBaddest
ESP.TRADUIT: aa卡蒂最坏

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, I gotta think about that one. Maybe Django Westwood. Uh, I also heard of John Goodman, he's pretty crazy. Um, it's pretty much Legate Lanius.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，我得想想那个。也许是狄昂坸 威斯特伍德。呃，我也听说过约翰 古德曼，他也很疯狂。额..几乎就和那个拉尼厄斯特使差不多吧。 （译者注：Django Westwood是作者另一个模组：新维加斯杀手中的一个杀手）
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cutty [0409CF88] (mod) Quest : ([0408572A]aaNVB3MiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\CreatureLowIntSM\aaNVB3Misc_aaCuttyBaddest_000A25BF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaCockerREF.Say aaCockerBaddest
You always pick him, because he's a fucking ghoul! He's like your little fucking hero. You want an action figure of him so you can play with it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你总是挑他，因为他是个该死的尸鬼！他就像你的小英雄。你想要一个他变成动作明星是吧，这样你就可以一起玩了？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cutty [0409CF88] (mod) Quest : ([0408572A]aaNVB3MiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\CreatureLowIntSM\aaNVB3Misc_aaCuttyBaddest_000A25C1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaCockerREF.Say aaCockerBaddest
Oh, I guess you're going feral already, turning into a fucking idiot, because you've never heard of Bad Mothafucka. He's the baddest mutant ever.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，我想你已经开始变得疯狂了，变成了一个该死的白痴，因为你从来没听说过坏的操妈傻逼。他是有史以来最坏的变种人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cutty [0409CF88] (mod) Quest : ([0408572A]aaNVB3MiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\CreatureLowIntSM\aaNVB3Misc_aaCuttyBaddest_000A25C3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaCockerREF.Say aaCockerBaddest
I swear to God, you're going fucking feral. Bad Mothafucka is not a retard. He is... a fucking philosopher. He changed my life!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我发誓，你他妈的要疯了。那个恶棍傻逼不是弱智。他是。。。他妈的哲学家。他改变了我的生活！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cutty [0409CF88] (mod) Quest : ([0408572A]aaNVB3MiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\CreatureLowIntSM\aaNVB3Misc_aaCuttyBaddest_000A25C5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaCockerREF.Say aaCockerBaddest
All right, I'm gonna have to start wearing a helmet, cause you're gonna try to eat my brains. Full fucking zombie mode here, clearly.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我得开始戴上我的头盔了，因为你想要吃我的大脑。你现在他妈的是完全的僵尸模式，这很明显，用屁眼都看得出来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cutty [0409CF88] (mod) Quest : ([0408572A]aaNVB3MiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\CreatureLowIntSM\aaNVB3Misc_aaCuttyBaddest_000A25C7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaCockerREF.Say aaCockerBaddest
Oh, I got a great example: Doc Friday. Feral fucking, uh, zombie! I said it: zombie!
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，我有个很好的例子：星期五医生。真他妈的，呃，僵尸！我说了：僵尸！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cutty [0409CF88] (mod) Quest : ([0408572A]aaNVB3MiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\CreatureLowIntSM\aaNVB3Misc_aaCuttyBaddest_000A25C9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaCockerREF.Say aaCockerBaddest
No, no - this is a partnership, I got half interest! I'm firing you, motherfucker! You get the fuck out of my half, don't touch my shit!
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，不-这是合伙，我有一半的利息！我要炒了你，混蛋！你他妈的给我滚出我的那一半，别碰我的东西！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cutty [0409CF88] (mod) Quest : ([0408572A]aaNVB3MiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\CreatureLowIntSM\aaNVB3Misc_aaCuttyBaddest_000A25CB_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaCockerREF.Say aaCockerBaddest
Oh, like they were coming here because of your good looks! If we'd have put you on the sign or billboard, they'd have burned this fucking place down.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，好像他们来这里是为了你的美貌！如果我们把你放在招牌或广告牌上，他们就会把这个该死的地方烧了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cutty [0409CF88] (mod) Quest : ([0408572A]aaNVB3MiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\CreatureLowIntSM\aaNVB3Misc_aaCuttyBaddest_000A25CD_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaCockerREF.Say aaCockerBaddest
You bet your ass I will, starting with... well, what about the vending machine? Be a lot of fucking work. You wanna just get drunk?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你这头蠢驴，我将从...开始，行吧，自动售货机呢？ 这可是很多该死的工作。 你想喝醉吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cutty [0409CF88] (mod) Quest : ([0408572A]aaNVB3MiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\CreatureLowIntSM\aaNVB3Misc_aaCuttyBaddest_000A25CF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaCockerREF.Say aaCockerBaddest
aaCockerBaddest
Not bad, but I still think it's Doc Friday. Great pistolero, and he's also smooth with the ladies. He's a fucking hero, that's what he is.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不错，但我还是觉得那是星期五医生。他是个很好的手枪射手，而且他对女士们也很好。他就是个该死的英雄，那就是他。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cocker [0409CF4C] (mod) Quest : ([0408572A]aaNVB3MiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaCockerVoiceType\aaNVB3Misc_aaCockerBaddest_000A25C0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaCuttyREF.Say aaCuttyBaddest
You're just jealous because the ghouls have legitimate heroes. What do the mutants got? Nothing!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你嫉妒只是因为那些尸鬼有合法的英雄。而变种人得到了什么？没有都什么！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cocker [0409CF4C] (mod) Quest : ([0408572A]aaNVB3MiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaCockerVoiceType\aaNVB3Misc_aaCockerBaddest_000A25C2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaCuttyREF.Say aaCuttyBaddest
Oh, I heard of him. He only says one word, right? Yeah, he's a retard. Why don't you making a fucking statue out of him? Fucking dumbass mutants.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，我听说过他。他只说了一个字，对吧？是的，他是个他妈的弱智。你为什么不用他做个雕像？他妈的蠢驴变种人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cocker [0409CF4C] (mod) Quest : ([0408572A]aaNVB3MiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaCockerVoiceType\aaNVB3Misc_aaCockerBaddest_000A25C4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaCuttyREF.Say aaCuttyBaddest
You know what? Why don't you just go marry him? You can start your own little mutant... buttfuck cult. That's what it will be - buttfuckism!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道吗？你为什么不嫁给他？那样你可以开始养你自己的小变种。。。他妈的该死的邪教。就像这样-只会操屁眼的臭傻逼！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cocker [0409CF4C] (mod) Quest : ([0408572A]aaNVB3MiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaCockerVoiceType\aaNVB3Misc_aaCockerBaddest_000A25C6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaCuttyREF.Say aaCuttyBaddest
That's taking it too far, you mean-spirited sonofabitch! Fucking calling me the z-word... you don't even know what that means? You ever seen a feral?
ESP.TRADUIT: 太过分了，你这个刻薄的婊子养的混蛋！他妈的用Z开头的词叫我。。。你甚至不知道那是什么意思吗？你就没见过野人吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cocker [0409CF4C] (mod) Quest : ([0408572A]aaNVB3MiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaCockerVoiceType\aaNVB3Misc_aaCockerBaddest_000A25C8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaCuttyREF.Say aaCuttyBaddest
Whoa now! You just fucking shit in my hat right there! Get the fuck out here! You're fired! Get the fuck out of my barber shop, right now!
ESP.TRADUIT: 哇哦！你他妈的就在我帽子里拉了泡屎！他妈的给我滚出去！你被解雇了！快从我的理发店滚出去！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cocker [0409CF4C] (mod) Quest : ([0408572A]aaNVB3MiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaCockerVoiceType\aaNVB3Misc_aaCockerBaddest_000A25CA_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaCuttyREF.Say aaCuttyBaddest
Fine! We'll paint a line down the middle! I'm gonna steal all your customers, because you're a shitty barber, and you're fucking... ugly!
ESP.TRADUIT: 这太他妈好了！我们在店铺中间画一条线！我要偷走你所有的顾客，因为你是个邋遢的理发师，你他妈的。。。丑逼！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cocker [0409CF4C] (mod) Quest : ([0408572A]aaNVB3MiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaCockerVoiceType\aaNVB3Misc_aaCockerBaddest_000A25CC_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaCuttyREF.Say aaCuttyBaddest
I see your lips moving, but I just hear dogshit coming out them. We're through, pack your shit and stay on your half of the building!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我看到你的嘴唇在动了，但为什么我只能听到狗屎喷出来。我们玩完了，收拾好你的东西，呆在你的那半栋楼里！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cocker [0409CF4C] (mod) Quest : ([0408572A]aaNVB3MiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaCockerVoiceType\aaNVB3Misc_aaCockerBaddest_000A25CE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaCuttyREF.Say aaCuttyBaddest
Oh, shit, that's a good point. I don't want to lift shit. Let's just get drunk.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，妈的，真是个好点子。我不想留下满地"黄金"。让我们都一醉罢了吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cocker [0409CF4C] (mod) Quest : ([0408572A]aaNVB3MiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesIII.esp\aaCockerVoiceType\aaNVB3Misc_aaCockerBaddest_000A25D0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: As a result of your scars, your rate of fire and draw speed with guns will suffer, but you'll deal more damage.

ESP.TRADUIT: 温柔的雪耻

ESP.TRADUIT: 甜蜜的复仇（兰道尔的.44马格南左轮）现在会造成额外的伤害。

ESP.ORIGINAL: While Ford is a companion, the player benefits from an increase in luck.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当福特是同伴时，你将从运气的增加中受益。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Mangled
ESP.TRADUIT: 撕裂

ESP.ORIGINAL: The wounds inflicted by Marko will negatively impact your agility, endurance, and strength until you've had adequate time to heal.
ESP.TRADUIT: 马尔科造成的伤口将对你的敏捷性，耐力和力量产生负面影响，直到有足够的时间来治愈。

ESP.ORIGINAL: This toilet is clearly inoperable, but someone with adequate repair skill could easily get it in working order. ? (Repair 40 or higher Required)
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个马桶显然无法使用，但是具有足够维修技能的人可以很容易地使它正常工作？ （需要维修40或更高）

ESP.ORIGINAL: Leave it alone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别去碰它。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Repair the toilet.
ESP.TRADUIT: 修理厕所。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Cooper has given you the Follow Your Nose perk.
ESP.TRADUIT: 库珀给了您“紧跟嗅觉”的perk。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You have lost Cooper's Follow Your Nose perk.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你失去了库帕的“紧跟嗅觉”Perk

ESP.ORIGINAL: Glanton has left for parts unknown. It is uncertain if your paths will ever cross again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 格兰顿已经离开去了未知的地方。你不确定你们是否会再次相遇。

ESP.ORIGINAL: By ridding the Frosthill Hotel of its vermin, you now have access to your own quarters, complete with safe storage and crafting apparatus.
ESP.TRADUIT: 通过清除霜地酒店的“害虫”，你现在可以进入自己的宿舍，获得安全储藏和加工设备。

ESP.ORIGINAL: DEBUG 01
DEBUG 02
DEBUG 03
DEBUG 04
DEBUG 05

You emerge from a vivid nightmare, quickly sitting up in a strange bed. You notice a familiar face across from you - Thorne. Your hands throb as you begin to shift your weight, but you eventually struggle to your feet. Your legs wobble as you stand, and it becomes painfully apparent that you haven't recovered from your recent injuries. How your managed to survive your ordeal in the grave remains to be seen...
ESP.TRADUIT: 从一场生动的噩梦中醒来，你迅速在一张陌生的床上弹坐了起来。 你看到对面是一张熟悉的面孔————索恩。 当你开始转移身体重心时，发现自己的手好像有点抖动，但最终你还是挣扎着站起来。而当你站着的时候，你的腿摇摇晃晃的像是要倒了一样，很明显你还没有从最近的伤病中恢复过来。如果你疑惑你在坟墓里是如何度过那死一般的难关的，这还有待观察。。。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alive!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你还活着!

DEBUG 07
DEBUG 08

ESP.ORIGINAL: Timer: Setup 02
Timer!
Virgil has left for Marko's encampment. It is uncertain if your paths will ever cross again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 维吉尔已离开马尔科的营地。 不知道你们的道路是否会再次重合。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
You stand poised to depart the Mojave Wasteland for Frosthill, Utah. It will be a long, arduous journey, and you will be unable to return until you've dealt with Marko. You will have limited access to food and munitions during your time in Frosthill.
If you're up to the challenge, inform Virgil that you are indeed ready to depart. Marko awaits...
ESP.TRADUIT: 你准备离开莫哈维沙漠，前往犹他州的霜地（Frosthill）。 这将是一段漫长而艰苦的旅程，并且直到与马尔科决出胜负之前都不能返回。 在霜地的期间，你获得食物和弹药的机会有限。 （再次提醒：模组作者建议您不要携带任何原版同伴或是模组同伴，这将造成死亡等风险，建议您将他们留在莫哈维废土，如发生任何状况，请自行承担风险） 如果你准备好了迎接挑战，请告知维吉尔，你确实准备出发了。而马尔科，他正在等你...

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Departure
ESP.TRADUIT: 启 程

ESP.ORIGINAL: Remain in the Mojave Wasteland.
ESP.TRADUIT: 留在莫哈维废土

ESP.ORIGINAL: Depart for Frosthill.
ESP.TRADUIT: 出发至霜地

ESP.ORIGINAL: Skip the slideshow.
ESP.TRADUIT: 跳过幻灯片。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Glanton has bound the captive for transportation. The ropes are digging into his wrists. He's obviously suffered from Glanton's abuse.
ESP.TRADUIT: 格兰顿把俘虏绑起来准备运输。绳子缠绕着并在手腕上打了个结。 他显然遭受了格兰顿的虐待。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Leave the captive to his fate.
ESP.TRADUIT: 让俘虏听天由命。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Untie him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 帮他松绑。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
THIS FALL... Albert Breach, in association with John Goodman, proudly presents a tale of unbelievable horror, unbridled lust, and arbitrary procreation... JANET'S BABY!
Steel your senses for debauchery, time travel, and child abandonment as Albert Breach delivers a terrifying new chapter in his ongoing saga of the wastes! Will Al be reunited with his offspring? Is his child in fact the spawn of Satan? Has Janet abandoned Al to fornicate with demons? Find out in... JANET'S BABY!
DISCLAIMER: Consult your physician before engaging in intercourse immediately after viewing "Janet's Baby". Side effects may include blindness, salivation, vaginal spasms, visions of Jesus-Zimmer, syphilis, time travel, demonic possession, and/or conception of The Antichrist. Please direct any legal inquiries to Ferret, Goodman, and Whistles LLP.
ESP.TRADUIT:
这个秋天...阿尔伯特 布莱奇与约翰 古德曼一起自豪地讲述了一个令人难以置信的恐怖事情————宣泄肆无忌惮的欲望和任意为之的繁衍…………那便是“珍妮特的宝贝！”
阿尔伯特·布莱奇在他不断进行的废土传奇中开辟了一个令人害怕的新篇章——让你为放荡，时间旅行和被遗弃的孩子而热泪盈眶！ 阿尔会与他的后代团聚吗？他的孩子真的是撒旦的产物吗？珍妮特放弃了阿尔而与恶魔通奸了吗？ 请在“珍妮特的宝贝！”中找到结局！
免责声明： 观看 "珍妮特的宝贝"后在立即进行性交之前请咨询您的医生。 副作用可能包括失明，流涎，阴道痉挛，耶稣 齐默尔的视力，梅毒，时间旅行，恶魔的财产（孽种）和/或“反基督者”的信念。 如有任何法律疑问，请直接联系费雷特 古德曼和惠斯的律师事务所。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Janet's Baby
ESP.TRADUIT: “珍妮特的宝贝”

ESP.ORIGINAL: You stand poised to return to the Mojave Wasteland. You are certain that you'll never be able to get back here. Are you sure you want to leave?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你准备返回莫哈维废土。你肯定你大概永远都不会回来了。你确定要离开吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Return
ESP.TRADUIT: 归 途

ESP.ORIGINAL: Remain in the Deep Creek Mountains.
ESP.TRADUIT: 留在深溪山脉。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Depart for the Mojave Wasteland.
ESP.TRADUIT: 动身前往莫哈维废土。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Skip the slideshow.
ESP.TRADUIT: 跳过幻灯片。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Glanton has bound the captive for transportation. The ropes are digging into her wrists. She's obviously suffered from Glanton's abuse.
ESP.TRADUIT: 格兰顿把俘虏绑起来准备运输。绳子缠绕着并在手腕上打了个结。她显然受到了格兰顿的虐待。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Leave the captive to her fate.
ESP.TRADUIT: 让俘虏听天由命。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Untie her.
ESP.TRADUIT: 帮她松绑。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your agility, endurance, and strength have all decreased due to injuries inflicted by Marko. In all likelihood, you will not recover from these wounds until you return to the Mojave Wasteland.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的敏捷、耐力和力量都因马尔科造成的伤害而降低。这些伤口很可能在你回到莫哈维废土之前无法恢复。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Mangled
ESP.TRADUIT: 撕裂

ESP.ORIGINAL: Porter has left for parts unknown. It is uncertain if your paths will ever cross again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 波特已经离开，去往了未知的地方。不确定你们今后的旅途是否会再次重叠。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
With the Mojave Wasteland now purged of its most dangerous elements, rumors abound of a mysterious newcomer seeking out the now-famous Courier. While many of the accounts vary, they all share a common message delivered by the traveler: "Tell [%] to go where it all began."
Recalling your past deeds as a bounty hunter, you soon realize it can only mean one place: Randall & Associates. Perhaps you should seek out this stranger and ascertain his motives. New Vegas Bounties III is recommended for veteran Couriers (Levels 35+).
ESP.TRADUIT:
随着莫哈维废土上最危险的元素被一个个的清除，一个神秘的新来者正在寻找现在最著名的邮差的传闻比比皆是。尽管许多细节的部分各不相同，但它们都共享一条由旅行者传递的共同信息："告诉[%]去一切开始的地方。"
回想你过去作为赏金猎人的种种行动，你很快就意识到这只意味着一个地方：兰道尔的同盟会。也许你应该找出这个陌生人并弄清他的动机。 新维加斯赏金猎人III 推荐资深邮差（35级以上）进行参与。 （译者注：模组作者建议您不要携带任何原版同伴或是模组同伴，这将造成死亡等风险，建议您将他们留在莫哈维废土，如发生任何状况，请自行承担风险）

ESP.ORIGINAL: New Vegas Bounties III
ESP.TRADUIT: 新维加斯赏金猎人 III

ESP.ORIGINAL: Brookshire has departed the Mojave Wasteland for parts unknown. It is uncertain if your paths will ever cross again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 布鲁克希尔已经离开了莫哈维废土，前往未知地方。 不确定你们今后的旅途是否会再次重叠。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Angel Lee has left for parts unknown. It is uncertain if your paths will ever cross again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 安杰尔·李已经离开，去往了未知的地方。不确定你们今后的旅途是否会再次重叠。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Though you've recovered during the trip, your hands are now permanently scarred from gunshot wounds. As a result, your rate of fire and draw speed will suffer, but you'll deal more damage.
ESP.TRADUIT: 虽然你在回程中已经恢复了健康，但你的手已经被枪伤留下了永久性的疤痕。因此，你的射击速度和拔枪速度会受到影响，但死斗的经验让会你造成更加可观的伤害。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Scarred
ESP.TRADUIT: 历战勇猛

ESP.ORIGINAL:
You are on the verge of starting your final bounty mission with Randall. If you elect to proceed, you will set in motion events which will occupy you until Marko is finally brought to justice. As a result, any other quests or missions you are pursuing in the Deep Creek Mountains will be rendered moot.
Do you wish to continue with this course of action?
ESP.TRADUIT:
你即将和兰道尔一起开始你最后的赏金任务。如果你选择继续，你将启动事件，这将占据你接下来的所有行动，直到马尔科最终被绳之以法。因此，您在深溪山脉执行的任何其他任务或任务都将被视为无效。
你想继续这样做吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Last Bounty
ESP.TRADUIT: 最后的赏金

ESP.ORIGINAL: Postpone the pursuit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 推迟追捕。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set out for Marko.
ESP.TRADUIT: 动身逮捕马尔科。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Doolin has left for parts unknown. It is uncertain if your paths will ever cross again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 杜林已经离开，去往了未知的地方。不确定你们今后的旅途是否会再次重叠。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Having avenged Randall, you will now deal additional damage with Sweet Revenge.
ESP.TRADUIT: 为兰道尔报仇后，你现在使用甜蜜的复仇（兰道尔的.44马格南左轮）可以造成额外伤害。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Avenged
ESP.TRADUIT: 温柔的雪耻
